bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin/ dpal daru ka'i nges khar brjod pa las bza' ba dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma'i bya ba lalag
pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'i lta sum cu rtsa gcigapa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bza' dang ston mo 'dus pa ste// yapadagachog gang gis na// dngos
grub myur du rab 'jug pa'o// phyugasa rnams kyi ni dgugapa nyid// sgrubapos sngar bstan rim pa 'dis// phyugs rnams dang ni de bzhin la// bong bu rus sbal mi mo//
cespang rtal sogs rnams kyis// dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// phyugs 'di dag ni sgrub yan lag/ rigs rnams las ni rigs mchog
phyugs// kong bzhi rnamos las glapor brjod// 'dab chags rnams 'a sa ngang pa nyid// dud 'gro rnams las rus sbolargyal// lha rnams las ni mtshuge ba// rnam
pa de ltabarjod pa ste/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// phyugs de dag ni rnam par bshad// lA dang chu skyal rtse pa dang/ skye gnyis blon po chen po dang// khrung
khrung bzhad dang gdam pa// bza' deng sbyin sreg gtor bya bas// 'dod padagun 'grub par 'gyur// khyi nag po yi 'o thugane// ma sha'i 'bras ni nag por ldan//
'dod pas dgos pa med pa ru// jisrid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar// ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg bya/ de nas yi dgas langs nas ni// sgrub po de la 'dri byed do// ci bgyi
zhesani smra 'gyupazhing// sa 'og las sam ral gri 'am// tshar gcod phan 'dogs de dag dang// ril bu mig sman gter rnams sem// rkang mgyogs dag gam
bcud kyis len// dngos 'di de bzhin gcig byin nas// 'gro bar 'gyur gyis gzhan du min// steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub// rgyud 'dir khe tshom med pa yin// ba lang
gnas dang ldi nga banyid// lhag ma skam po rtsa de nas// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor bya// yang na rus sbal dgagi 'o// 'di de dngos grub sbyin 'gyur zhing// phyag bzhi pa dang
zhal bzhi pa// ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar// sku ni dkar po'i khro bo che// de nas drag shul gzigs 'chang ba// rdo rje phag mo re gzigs pa// de yi sku mdog mtshon
cha'achang// dpa' bo sprod pa'i 'phreng ba can// sku la thal bas nye bar byugs// rol pa'i u0f7cdpan mdung dang ldan// phyag rgya yis ni sku la brgyan// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad
gtsigs// yi dgos chen po gdan du byas// sgrub pa po yis dus rtag tu// sngags de shes nas bsgom par bya// de lta'i yon tan khyad 'phags pas// 'dod pa yi ni dngos
grub 'gyur// dpal le ru ka'i nges par brjod pa lasaM/ dud 'gro'i phyugs dang ro langs sgrub pa dang/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mo ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
de nas sgrub po'i mchog kun ni// sbyor ba kun la med pa'o// bza' dang bca'adra zhashasogs// nus pa ribazhin bya ba ste// med par gyur kyang bza' ba dang//
lnga pa nyid du bya ba yin// bza' dang bca' ba rgya che ba// rtag tumtshan mo nyid du bya// de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing// khyad par du ni sgrub pa po// rang gi pang du mgo gzhug la//
dpa' bo gnyis med rab tumachod// ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// bu mo 'am yang na chung ma gnyen// rnam pa 'di lta'i chog yis// bcings pa las
nirab grol bya// de nas sngagasan grub 'gyur te// ji srid 'byung ba lod bar du'o// slob dpon lus su legs gnas te// sgrub pa po las mchod pa len// dpa' bo rnam/
kyi stan dag dang phyag rgya nyid du the tshom med/ sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ glu dang gar la sogs pa bya// srid lus cen thams cad kyang/ ]rnal 'byor lung shes
zhinam gyur// de srid 'khor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing// sdug bsngal mya ngan gyis g.yas 'gyur// dngos po kun gyis sgrub pa pos/ de nas phyag rgya mchod bar bya// mchod pas
mchod par 'dod pa ste/ khas pa yis ni nges par bsreg/ phyag rgya chen po dang po 'grub// rnal 'byor rgyud du mi rnams kyis// rab tu 'badapas mchod par bya// dngos po kun/
gyis rnal 'byor pa// phyinas dpa' bo rnamasakyisani// dpa' nyid laspyad par bya// de ltar mchod byas donasani// sa 'og sgrub po langs pa dang// zhib nyid dang rgyas pa dang//
dbang dang dgug pa dag dang ni// gsad da bskrad pa la sogs dang// rmugs dngares la de bzhinate// dbye banyid dang tshar gcod dang// las kyi dngos grub mchod par bya// gang
ci' la rung ba'i las gyur la// nyonami mongs pa 'grub 'gyur te// the tshomamed par sgrub pa po'i// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa/
las gsang ba'i mchod pa dbasnyen bkur gyi mchod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//de nas mkha' 'gro ma drab 'i// 'khor lo zhes pa'i cho ga rgyas// las
gapaci yapad myur bar// sgrub pa poni the tshom med/ dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma// pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar/ smin ma'i dbus su gzhug par bya// a ba tI'i
gnas de bzhin// dpa' bo'i 'chol bar byas chags par// bza' ba yang ni do nas sreg gro mas dang phyir// 'bad pas bsreg bya lnga dag bya// de nas 'bar ba'i byin
bral// srog blugs dgu ni sbyin par bya// 'bar 'phrang rgyamatshobalta bar bya/ kun nas sgo yi 'khor 'a nyidaM// dpa' bo'i dbang po nal bzhi pag dpa' bo dpa' mo'i
gnas de bzhin// 'dab la pho nya mo bzhi yin// dpa' bo kun dang gnyis med bde// chogaji bzhin rnam pa yis// khoNAr te phyi rol sbyin// rang gagazugs su rnam
bzhugs pa// 'khor lo'i dbusasu blta bar bya// 'khor 'di dag gsal bar ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// rig pa'i rgya mtsho'i las de bzhin// mdor bsdus nasani
@#/ gsungs pa yin/ phota gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dbal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las tho 'amo'i sbyin sreg dpa bgug
zaba'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de nas las kyi rab mchog ni// ji bzhin rim gyis mtshon pa ste/ mchod pa gnyis med smyoba'i bdag/
las ni so sor sbyar bar bya// gang dag rab grub byed pa'i sngags// de yi dbye ba ma bzhin bshad// kha dog pho nyasogs sngags gang// mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su
'khor// phan tshun mdadu rgyus dpa' bo ni// yul nyid kyis bya ba 'o// sabon 'brong bas de nas gzung// namatha' ruganas pa yin// bsgrub pa 'gog par gyurapa
a ni gom pa gcig kyang ma 'gro 'o// kha sbyor sbyar bar gyur pa dang// rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas// rdo rjedabye banyid dang ni// dbazhin bung ba ltar 'khor bya// lcags
kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang/ gtun shing gis bskyod de bzhin te// rdodzanyid kyis 'dobs par bshad// dbugs la mdas na sbyar bya ste// dus min 'chi ba bslu ba la//
yan lag khakr-i dag dang sbyar// thod pa'i mchod yon snodaduni/ zhal dumatshon changes par sbyar/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las gnyis su med pa'i las dngongs ma yin
par 'chi ba bslu ba'i choga' le 'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga la'o//'de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang// sngags kyi dgod par rab tu grags// myur du dngos grub byedaparani//
phyag rgya'i mchod 'di the tshosamed// mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar te// mkha' 'gro dpa' bo gnyisamed pa// snying bo rnams kyis de bzhin du// sngags pa mkha' 'grom la sbyar//
blo ldan makha' 'gro ma bsrub bya// gang yang phyag rgyaganon pa zas// las dang mtshon chadrag gi mthu// de bzhin sngags pas snying pos dang// dbazhin rnal 'byoram sbyar bya//
dag pa'i lus ni rang 'dodapa// dpa' khe mchod pa rnams byas nas// lasan 'bad panyid kyis bya// rnam dbye rang dgas sngags pani// phyin ci log tunges par sbyar// tshar
gcod ban 'dogs don rnams la// las kyi dngos por rnam par bsgom// de nyid dbye bar thunas// rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya// rab tu sgrubapas sbyor don la// phyi rol
ji bzhinanang de bzhin// 'di yis myur du lha dang ni// lha min mir bcas bsgrub par bya// dpal ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las de kho na nyid kyi mchod bod las kyi cho ga'i le'u sA sum
tshudrug pa'o///danas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gzugosan gnon pa'i chog ste// phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngagasani// mkha' 'gro ma dgacig tu
ba @#// sbyar bza' ba zos mid de nasani// bzlas pa'i mthar n skyug par bya// mtshanamo bdunani rdzogs pa dang// bza' dang btung ba dag la sbyar//
za 'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar// dbang du 'gro bar the tshom med// ser skya'i ma ni 'thungosanas su// bzlas pa'i mthar nistug par bya// deyis rang gi gdong bskuson//
gal te rtag tu khros gyur pa// mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du'agyur// til maras lu btags pa dang// ldan pas lus nibaskos gyur cing// snum khur sngags pos byas
nas ni// bza' ba lani rab tu sbyar// gal te las 'di ma btangan// ji srid 'tsho bar rtag dbang 'gyur// til nag dgan zos nas su// so tshe bcas pas skyugs pa
dang// ru chu bshang ba dang ldan pa// las skyes lta ba'i srin bu ni// rang gi khrag dang btags nas ni// rang gi khu ba nyid dang sbyar// bza' btungamigasman gos la ni//
byug pa nyid du rab tu sbyar// 'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar// dbang du 'gyur bar gdonami za// ba langasha sreg sbyin sregani// khrag gis bskusan lha rnams ni// de mod
dbang du 'gyur ba 'am// gal te ma 'ongs 'chi bar 'gyur// bdag nyid de yi mdun du ni// bsgoms nas mkhas pas sbyin sreg bya// sbyin sreg mthar ni gtor ma bya// khams
gsum skad cig gis 'gugs pa/ mtshan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rtenagasuman rnyed dka' ba'i// dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshananyid ni// rtag tu rang
sngags sbas pa yis// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya// sbas don rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing// skal ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos
kyang// ngamanyes byas pas rnyed par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi dbang duphya ba'o tshoga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// ba
de nas brda ni mkha' 'gro ma'i// lus kyi mtshan nyid gang yin dang/ dpa'abo'i yan lag dpe bani// grub par 'gyur bde 'grub 'gyur// dpa' bo'i dbang
phyug mi bri zhing// rnam pa kun tu sba bar bya/ gang gi thad du'ang mi gdonati// g.yon pa'i kun spyod sgrub pa pos// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' 'gro yi// sngags
rnams bag med pas 'donan// de la nga ni mi blta ste// mkha' 'gro stong phrag du ma yis// nganapa'i bodag nyid can de tha// dmatshog 'joms shing ngan spyod de//
bram ze gsod par the tshom med// sdig spyod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// bslus gyur ngan pa'i bdag nyidede// mkha' 'gro ma yis zos gyur kyang// de la pani skyob mi byed//
gsang ba pa yin na ni// sgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra// bla ma dmatshig 'a/ 'khu ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten de las lhung// der ko dpal blta
zadaka'i rgyud// gang zhig srungabar bu pan// mkha' 'gro mar bcas dge gdong zhes// de la nga ni rjes su 'dzin// bla ma la ni bsnyen bkur byed// gso por smra ba'i
sgrub pa po// mkha' 'gro ma la rtag dga' ba// de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrub pa po ni dpa' nyid 'gyur// khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag/
sgrub po dang 'a bo nyid 'dod pa// thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// de ni rnal 'byor lab 'jug yang dag sbyin pa'ang rig par gyur// dar kuyi brtul zhugs 'dzin
slob dpon dang 'a bo mthong gyur na// mthong zhing mthong zhing kun tu dga'// sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis// dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog/ 'a nabadun du ni
brjod par bya// rab bsngags hU~M la sogs pas phye// de rnams 'bad de phyag byas n// sangs rgyasa'asogs thams cad mchod// rtag pa nyidapudapa' chan dang// ro
par ldan par the tshomamed// de yi thugs kar gnas yagamo// nga dang dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// pho nya rnams dang lhan cig bcas// de dang gang zhig 'bigs tsus pa//
srog chags bsod namasamathong ba yin// 'bab chu'i 'gram dang rgya mtsho dang// ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo dang// lteng ka dang ni khronapa mtshe'u// khang stong dang ni lam srang
drag/ thams cad du ni mkha' 'gro ma// kun tu zhen par lta la gnas// 'jigs pa chen po dur khrod du// mkha' spyod de bzhin sa 'og dang// ro las kyang ni du ma
zhig/ 'jigasapa'i gzugs dang stobs chen pos// de dang lhan cig dpa' bo che// ci bde ba ni rol bar mdzad// ri sul tshang tshingags pa dang// rnal
'byor ma dang gsang ba'i mi// phyogs ni de dang de dag tu// sgrub pa po dpas stang rol// dpalalen duga'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i sa dang gsang ba'i
dpa' bo'i gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che// sngagasani rnam pa brgyad kyis dgod// de nas 'di la yang
dag mthong// gsol bar 'gyur bar gdon mi khra// 'jigs pa'i sgrani rnam mang po/[“ ]/mi bzad mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed pa// dpa' bo 'jigs par gyur na ni// skag
cing rnam par 'abur bar byed// gal te dpa' bo mi 'jigasan// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni// rang gi gnas su khyer nas su// mkha' 'gro mni de dag dang//
tha @#// rtag tu mngonapar rtsa byed de// bde ba can gyi gnas 'gro 'gyur// de ra ka dpalagus 'dod pas// mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// sgrub pa re
ni sngags lus can// 'khor bar 'chi dang rgyab med// dpal ku'i nges par barjod pa las blta ba dang nga tar dgod pa'i cho ga'ile'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o///
dan rab tu bshad bya ba// gang gis sa steng dbang du 'gyur// dpa' bo'i sngags kyis zla ba yis// rnal 'byor cho gar gnas pas 'grub// sgron ma myos byed bcas pa
dang// nya yi sha dang ldan par ni// dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du// nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa po'i/ mtshan mo'i sbyin sreg la gnol// dngos grub rgya chen
gsol bar 'gyur// brgya dang rtsa brgyad ldan nyid kyis thun gsum dun sgrub byedan// rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa ni nyin bdun gyisanI dbang du 'gyur// phyed kyis
dpa' bo'i blon pe ste:/ de yi phud kyis blon po yi// rgyul phran sogs la sumacu gnyis// sreg pa'i rim gyis sbyin sreg bya// nyi shus bram ze nyidalani/[° ]/nyi ma bdun gyis
sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin rgyal rigs dag la bdun// sbyin sreg lta po rje rigs la// dmangasarigs lani sbyin srog gsum/ tha ma la ni sbyin sreg gcig/ de ltar dpa'i
bas rigs rim gyis// zla ba gcig ni yapa dag spyad// sngags kyi nus pa sgrub pa pos// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// dpa' bos tshe ga snga ma yis// 'dod
pas bsnyenan thob par 'gyur// sa sta 'dod pa 'i dbang phyug bzhin// dpal ldan skal ba bzang por 'gyur// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// yid 'ong 'gyur bar gdon
mi bla/ dpalaphe ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rigs lnga po dbang du bya ba dang phyag rgya chen po bstan pa'icho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//de nas las kyi mchog rab/
[A ]gang gis shes nas sgrub pa pos// dbang dang dgug dang dpo ba dang// gsad dang bsad pa lasogs dang/ rmugs dang rengs par bya ba dang// rmongs dang de bzhin
phur bus gdab// tsheg 'phrig lkugs par 'gyur ba dang// 'on dang de bzhin long ba dang// ma ning nyid du bya bdang// gzugs na yongs su sgyur ba ste// lasachen bcu
gnyis 'di dag ni// rtag tu sgrub pa po yis bsgrub// dngos grub sgrub pa pol ni// dran pas 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za// thams cad bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha'
'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas// yul dang yul dumangon bar skye// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// de rnams mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad/
ku lu ta dang dgon pa dang// sina'i yul dang grongakhyer dbang// gser gyi gling dang sor// de bzhin lha yi khyim dang ni// yi dgas grong dang kha ba'i
gnas// kAlci'am l^apa ka yi yul// ka li ka dang kos la// tri shaku ne o tre dang/ ma rUpamA la wa// lha mo'i mkhar dang rAmi'i dbang// go dA wa ri a6
tAr/ orgyan dza lan+d+ha ra dang// pu l+li ra ma la ya sogs// yul 'di dag gi bu mo gang// dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byoram// de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te//
yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug pa yin// rnala'abyor ma drugaku lu tar// ma ngam yul nam mo rnams // sina'i yul na lAm ste// rigs kyi gtso mo na ga rar/ lam ka dang so
pham rawar// rigs kyi lha mo rnams yin no// yi dgas grong du nag chenamo// mkha' 'gro rU pi kA bcas// kha ba'i ri dang kAny+tsi ni// byi bcas ma ru bshad pa ste// pany+tsalA
yiyul dgan/ khyim gyi lhamo ka ling kar// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ kosalar nisha za ba// yi dgas grong du de bzhin du// rdo rjemakha' 'gro sbom
dbang phyug/ tIsha kuner dum skyes ma/ pa wI ma 'a yade bzhin/ gserarir sme sha can rigs skyes// bud medastong phrag nyi shu gcig/ lhag ma gzhan dag ji snyed pa//
dpal ldan de ru ka yin// 'khor le'i rnal 'byor ma yin no// de ru ka dpal sbyor ba che// de yid kyil 'khor gtso mo yin// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dis// rgyudang mi/
rgyu 'jig rten gsum// 'gro ba kun ni 'di yis khyab// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig 'di// sprul pa sgom pa nyid yin te// bsam gtan la sogs gang ci'ang rung// sa
stong na ni rdzogs 'gyur ba'o// g.yon gyi spyod pa gcer bu yis// mtshan mo rtag dumanyam bzhag pas// skyes pa'am gal te g.yon pa kun// rnal 'byor ma kun dpan
bo 'gro// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// rang byung rtag tumachod na ni// ma lus lus pa med grub cing// g.yon pa'i mchod pa la rab 'jug/ dpal bod ru ka'i nges par
brjod pa las yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khoradagod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//de nas dpa' bo me tog chu// 'thungs nas sngags 'di
rjes na bru// rtag tu 'di ltar bya ba nyid// phyagargya lhan cig sgrub pa pos// mtshan mo rtag tusha bza' ba/ sngags 'di nyid kyis lan gsum bsngags// myur du
bde ba thob par 'gyur// 'thungs dang de bzhin byin pa dang/ rig nas bzhag na gtse mo che// bden pas tshangs par spyod pa dang// thog mar bzhad pa'i phyag rgyayiso//
blta ba'i bsnyams pa grags ldan pa// mtshan mo'ang de bzhin nyin mo ni// 'disan bzhad pa dag tu bya// gzugs dpalas kyigasang ba gang/
ji ltar gnas pa dpa' bo nyen// rtag tu de yi mchim 'byung// dad pas de yi spu yang ldang// rdo rje ni 'gom mi byed// de bzhin gcer bur mchod pa ste// 'dod pa'i
dbang phyug thams cad kyi// phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim pa nyid// dbugs 'byin skul dang dgod pa dang// sgrig pa'i gar ni ngo mtshar bas// sna tshogs dbang phyug mdun
byedacing// phyag rgya sngags ni rjes dran bya// hang he harnam brgyad bzhad// sna tshogs dbang phyug mchog tu dga'// hAhAzhes bya 'di nye bar// rtag tumachi mo 'byungab
dang// de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing// bsam gtan gyi sngags legs par sbyor/ gtso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni// spu ldang ba dang lhan cig bde// rdo rje 'gom par
mi bya ba// g.yonabs yongasasu brtags pa yin// dpal ha ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las bzhad pa'i sngags dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi sgyu ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
rtsa gnyis pa'o///de nas spyan ras gzigs bshad de// dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med ma// gnas kyi dbye ba cho ga shes// sgom la rtag tu mngon dga'
[ba'o// lamachibazhi mdo'am khyim dag gam// dpa' bor gnas dang ri bor ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dmatshig gnas// ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur// phag
rgyas gcer bu mchod pa yi/lagapasago 'phang dam pa ste/ gos nyid kyis ni bkab pa'am gzhan// 'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin sa grol gtsor gyur
pas// las rnams thams cad brtsamapar bya// rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan// phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa yis// lha dang lha yi tshogasakyis kyang// ma
mthong bar ni mchod par gyis// snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste// mkha' la spyong la gyen du 'thor// me togade dag ma lhupazhing// me togasal ma mthong na: gnas kyi
khyad par la gnas dang// mkha' la 'grob stong phrag gi/ gnas la dbang ni bad pa ra 'gyur// ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang// ngag gi dbangaphyug 'gugs par 'gyur/
lha dang lha ye gtamashesangashing// rim pa ji lta bzhin du'o// skar ma'i rgyab shes par 'gyur// sa 'og rnams su gang byung dang// grong dang grogs dang dgon pa dang// grong
khyeradang ni bzhi mdo dang// shing gcig dang ni dpa' bo'i khyim// ri rtse ngani mtshan drung du// snying po'i nye snying rtag dranan// lha da mi yisamathong mi 'gyur// de bas/
yul phyogs 'di dag tu// sgrubapale ni rtag tu gnas// yig bdun gyi bdag nyid can// shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas// myuradu lhung ba/
mi phyed par// sa rnams kyang ni gzhan du min// bdag gi lus la rnam bkod de// sa 'daku sha'i stan du nyal// yi ga bdun gyi bdag nyid sngags// brgya rtsa brgyud
ninyid du bzus// rmi lam ngan bya ba kun// yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur// dus min 'chi dang bcom dang nyams// bya ba kun tu gang 'gyur dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs
gzhan dag kyang// thamasacad rmi lam dag tu ston// de bzhin sngags bzlos ral gri zhu/ mthe bong mar me ma lepal// sngags pa bdag nyid rtago rnal 'byor// phra so
na ni 'bebs par byed bsgoms nas 'an bdun bzlas brjod pas// dge dang mi dag ston par 'gyur// de nas dpa' bo'i yi ge bdun// sngags dgong dbye ba nyid
kyis te// nyi ma'i dbus su bsamasanasani// stong gi bar du bzlas par bya// shel gyi rnam pa lta bu ni// nad kyis gdus la bstan par bya// mthong ba tsam gyi
mod lani/ nad kun 'jig par the tshom med// nad las rnam par grol gyur na// ston ka'i dus kyi zla ba 'dra// zla ba'i dbus su rnam bkod cing// lag pa g.yon
[/]pa 'khorale nyid// yi gangashel gyi mdog ltar snang// nad rnams kun la dgod par bya// rims dang gden sogs brjed byed dang// gzer sogs kun dang mdze
can dang// dug gis zin sogs nad rnams dang// nad kun the tshom med par ni// zla gzugs yi ge bsams na ni// phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur//
mtshan mo gsang ba la gnas te// gomungasani mngar gsum btugs// yig bdun gsang sngags shes pa dang// stong phrag brgyad du sbyin srog khas// sngags pas
nang par dus suni// gser srang stong ni ljid par 'gyur// sbyin srog stong phragabacuyis ni// yul 'khor dam parnyed par 'gyur// yang na gsang sngagasargyal po ni//
gnasani gang du bsams pa dang// de dang der ni de yi tshe// skyobar 'gyur bar gdon mi zla/ dkarapo yis ni zhi bar 'gyur// nag pos skad cig dag gisagasod//
dmar pos dbang du 'gyur ba ste// 'phraladunges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ @#/ ser pos thams cad gnon 'gyur te// 'di ni bstan bcos nges pa yin// ser pos dpung ni
gnon pa dang// gru dang 'khrul 'khor glang po gnon// dkar po bsams pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba nges par slong bar 'gyur// sbrul chen brgya yis zinapa ni// de yang myur
@#// duslong bar byed// dug gis brgyal ba rnams mthong nas// rab tusadapas sad par 'gyur// rims dang gdon dang brjed byang ni// lag pamathong bas
'jigasapar 'gyur// brgyan po'i dus su khu tshur bcings// yid la rtag tu zlos byed na// khu tshur ma bkrol de srid du// bya ba thams cad sgrub par 'gyur// dgra bo
gal te 'ganani/ mtshon cha 'phyar bar byed pa yang/ jisrid khu tshur mkhakrol bar// mtshon cha gtong bar mi nus so// gzhan yang bya ba thamasaMcad ni// de bzhin nyid du
sgrub par byed// 'bras bu me tog 'dab ma dang// so rtsi de bzhin zas rnams la// lus kyi sbyorab dang po ste// de bzhin gnyis pa nus pa yin// gsum pa dag ni ngag
nyid do// bzhi pa dmigs par mi 'gyur te// sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// sa gzhi shing dang bcas pa dang// rgya mtsho ska rags btugs de la// 'di ni
'grub par bye tshom med// khams gsum rgyudang mi rgyu'i bar// dmod 'debs phan 'dogasanus pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nye ba'i snying po'i las sgrub
pa'i choga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsumapa'o///de nas pho nya la brten te// yi ge bdun pa dang nang// gang du las ni yang dag brtsams// de yi mod
lamyur du 'grub// yi ge bdun pa'i cho ga yis// rnal 'byor ma drug rnam par dgod// 'khor lor legs par gnas pa drug/ rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis// g.yon
pa nyid du bskul dang bcas// gang gis gzugs 'dzin bsams nasani// kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos// galalalagapa de bstan pa// de ni nges par 'gugs
par 'gyur// tsan dan dmar po'i rjel du ni// de bzhin sku tshe lan tshwa dang// bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes rdul// gcig tu byas nas btag par bya/ lag pa gnyis
kyis mnyes nasani// rnal 'byor ma la sbyin srogabya// mtshan mo sna sha can mi 'am/ @#/ dur khrod me la phye ma srog/ bsgrub par bya la mngon phyogs te// sbyorab 'di ni
brtsam par bya// jisrid brgya yi bar du bzlos/ desan ngos par 'gugs par 'gyur// bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang// nor dang skye bo dbang du 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di
ni grub pa ste/ gzhan du nani nga mi smra// rdul doted ni blangs nas su// lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsres// dur khrod ras 'du gtumasanas ni// lan bdun bzlas labazhi
mdoru// sor brgyad tshad dus brkos nas// dgra yi ming dang bcas pa ni// gang gi ming smos sbas gyur pa// de ni myur duganon par 'gyur// phyi ma de nyed bzlas nas su//
'bad de ba yi 'o ma yis// de ni slar yang gsos gyur na// 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med// pho ma de nyid blangs nasani/ myos byed lnga dang ldan pa ru//
de ni dur khrod ras kyis bcings// dgra yi ming yang bri bar bya// bzlas brjod 'an brgya byas nasani// dur khrodang ni ngos sbasan// bsgrub byasmyo banyid du 'gyur// bton pa/
nyid kyis thar par 'gyur// bton nas bayi 'o ma yis// 'bad pas de bzhin bkru bar bya// slar yapagaso ba de dag ni/ 'grub pa nyid du ba tshom med// dpal hor ka'i
nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug gi yi ge bdun gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o/// de nas las kyi rab mchogani// ngag gi dngos grub/
byed pa'o// ka ra wA ra'i ma tog dmar// brgya rtsa brgyad ni blangs nas su// 'bade ba yi 'o ma dang// bzlas brjod brgya yang bya ba yin// lan re bzlas pa'i ma tog gis//
lo ka'i spyi bo bsnun par bya// de ltar shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// nyi ma bdun du bya ba yin// de nas nyin zhag bcu gcig par// me tog dag ni blangs nas su//
chu bo chen por song nasaMni// re re nas nitshul dor// de dag thams cad rim bzhin du// lan re bzlas nas ring du bya// chu bor me tog tha ma ni// rgyun las bzlog ste
lharab 'baban// chudang bcas par blangs nasani/ sosam reg par de 'thusan// gsang ba'i rgyud las byung ba yi// sgrub po'i tshigan 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas/
skye gnas rgya bcings la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlasanas ni// sngags pas bsgrub byar mngon phyogasan// bsgrubapar bya ba'i lte bor gnas// de la yid gnas bzhin du//
blo ldan thun gsum mthe'u chung bskyod// bram ze gsod pa dag gis kyang// zhag bdun brgya byin sogs nges 'gags// tsan dan dmar po'i rdul las ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i
gzugs byas la// tshab gsum gyis lus la bsku// pra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug/ sgrub pa po yi gsang gnas su// zasama'i khab kyis phuganasani// seng ldeng
mdag ma dum la// mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du bsro// lan brgyabazlas te bzlas pa'i mthar// mi yi bdag po mdunan 'don// btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa ni//
nges par 'gugs par byed pa yin// mi bdag 'khor bcas gro ga yi// 'debamar bri bya'i g+hi'u wang dang// royi son rtsisakhris nas ni// mi dang spel nas gapal ni//
mngon par phyogs te brgyabazlas nas// seng ldeng ma la de gdusashing// dur khrod me stangasgrub phyir bshad// ji sridapa tshalam zhu'i bar// bsros par gyur na rgyal po ni//
'khor lo sgyur dang bcas par yang// nges par 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin// bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes las// tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni//
zadur khrod lhag ma thal khas spos// sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus la// seng ldeng man du med la// rab tu 'badapas bsro bar bya// rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni//
mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas nas ni// rdzogs srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub// rdul de blangasanas ma yengs par// dbugs mi 'byin par sbasan ni// brgyal zhing sems dang
bral 'dra la// myosangashing nyon mongs pa nyid dang// rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs nas ni// sgrub pa po yisnyadu lhung// phyugs sam yang na pho nya mo// mkhas pa yis
ni dbye ba yin// de nas las kyi pho nya mor// bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa nyid// ka ra wI ra'i lcag mni// brlan bcas dpung pa'i tshadamanyam blangs// sgrub pa pos ni gang
shigagis// gang gis sngags ni mngonabris nas/ 'bur 'gyur ro bsregs me 'dor// ji srid de nim tshig pa// myur du song ste de blangs la// rig pa lan bdun
bzlas nas ni// gapazhig bzlas te bskor na ni// den de yi skad cig la// skyes pa'am bud med rang gzugs can// rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur// ka ra wI
ra'i me tog dmar// brgya bzlas rgyal gyi sbyor ba las// sgrub pos gi'u wang gis phyugs la// me togachu la gnas pa la// chu bo chen por zhugs nasani/ lte
ba man chod chur bcug ste/ lag pa sbyar ba'i dbus gnas la// rig pa stong du bzlas nas ni// lag paganyisakyis phyir blags ked// chu dang bcas pa btung bar bya//
de nas sgrub pa po de yis// tshig gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyal po'am rgyal po'i chung ma ni// yid kyis nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// lhar bcas lha min mi
rnams ni// myur dudabang du byed par 'gyur// khros pas tshig gis gsod 'gyur zhing// dbye dang bskradapanyid kyang byed// sgrub pa po yi tshig nyid kyis// tshar gcod
pa ni byed par 'gyur// tshig tsamagyis ni chu bo dang// shing rta'akhrul 'khor rgyamatsho dang// glang po rta dang de bzhin sprin// skyes bu'am yang na bya yang ganon/ yid
kyis yid la gang 'dod pa// tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur// dgug pa yi ni sbyor ba dag/ bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa// ka ra wA ra'i me tog ni//
dmar po yang dag blangasanas su// rig pa lan brgya bzlas pa dag/ skye gnas dbus su gzhug par bya// me tog de ni kha sbyar byas// gsang ba'i gnas su nges par sbyar//
gnyisamed langashes rnal 'byor ldan// sngags pas brgya phrag gcig tubazlas// skye gnas dbus gnas me tog de// sgrub pa po yis gcig
blangs la// me tog gisani gang bsnun pa// de ni mod la dbang du 'gyur// brgyalazhing sems dang bral ba dang// yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste/ mngon
gyurasams ni bzlog pa ru// skad cig gis ni dbang du byed// 'di ni yid ches dngos grub ste// don yodadabang du byedapa yin// dpal ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las
sa: rnal 'byor ma drug dang tshig gi dngos grub lung bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'us bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/// denas yi ger la ni// las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa//
gang zhigangashes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o// haho ho ho/ yi ga yulnga lag pa yis// bskul dang ldan pas mnyes na ni// kha nas kyani
khrag 'dzag cing// gru bo de yi mod la 'chi// rang gi khragani thod gnas pa// srin lag gis khrag mnye bar bya// ji srid bskams kyi bar du ste// des ni bsgrub bya rnam
par 'jig/ gal te khro ba 'bar ba dang// mig dmarab yis bzlasanani// dpung tshogs bzhon par bcas pa yi// rgyal po myur du 'chibar byed// byi la dang ni ni'u
0 le dang// zhwa dang wa dang chu skyarani// mkha' 'grom la stobs can sbyar// 'di dag myur du grub yin par// rgyud 'dir ni the tshom med// ri bong la sogs spra las ni//
srad bu byas te lan stong bzlas// gang gi mgul du bcings gyur ba// de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// lagapar bzlas brjod song byas te// kar wI ra'i me tog dang//
yig re re mngon bzlas la// sbrum ma lan rig gyuran/ mngalan rnam par 'pho 'gyur te// btang na thar par 'gyur ba yin// gang la sdigs mdzub byas te 'chi//
slar yapa'atsho bar byed pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las yi ge ha lnga'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad
bya ba// mkha' 'gro kun gyi snying po ste/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis kyang// dngos grub thams cad spyod byed yin// de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rig pa chen po bzlas na rigs
thams cad dbang du byedapar 'gyur ro/ rtag tubazlasabarjod byas pasan dpal chen bo skyed par 'gyur ro// mi rus kyi rgyul phur bu sor drug pa byas pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par
bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs brgyud rnams gcod par 'gyur ro// zhing dang/ ra ba dang/ ma hadang/ glang po che dang/ rta'i gnas su sngar bzhin du brgya rtsa
ba// brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas brkos te sbas na thams cad rlag par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na rgyal po'i sgor sa la/
byas pa'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa byas la// mkhas pas bzhag nas nyin zhag dngapo 'am dulung ka'i me tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams dang/ ku su ma bsres pas sbyin
sreg brgya stong byas n de dbang du 'gyuro// sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang/ gnon pa dang/ skoms pa dang/ rmongs pa dang/ tshig 'phrog pa dang/
tsho/le bar byed pa dang/ rig pa nyid dang/ slar gtong bar byed de/ de nas skyes pa bud med du bya bar 'dod na skyes pa'i ro'i me tog dang/ kAkaN+Da ki'i 'bras bu dang/
kha khA'i sen mo dang/ rkang pa'i 'og gi pags pa cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag dang btags te ril bu bcu gcig byas l grib ma la bsam mo// de bzhin pu'un zhag bzang po la
lag pa la bcings te nyi ma bcu gnyis pa la gang gi spyi bor phye ma bzhag pa de bud med du 'gyur ro// de nas skyes pa khyi bya bar 'dod na skar ma rgyal gyi gnam lcags ne'u le'i mgo bor/
bzhag la mtshan mo bdun gyi bar du brgya stong bzlas par bya'o// nyin zhag brgyad pa la gur kum dang mnyam por sbyar te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas
[./]la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyir 'gyur ro// slar gso ba gcig ni mtshanamo'idus su mkha' 'gro ma rnams la mchod pa chenapo byas te gtor ma byin na de'i 'og tu rnal
mar 'gyur ro// rdzas rdzasam yin par bya bar 'dod na gser shigi 'brasabu la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas n rdzas ma yin par 'gyur ro// a ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas n rnalamar
'gyur ro// denas skyo bar bya bar 'dod na bya chen po'i gnas kyi sbyin sreg byas n nyi ma bdunapa la smyo bar 'gyur ro// slar bazlog pa ni 'bras kyi phub ma'i sbyin srog byas na ni bar
'gyur ro// byi 'a 'ispyi zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe bsdus la gang gi ming nas smosanas sprugs kyi sbyin sreg byas nas thalab de gangag spyi bor bzhag pa de byi lar 'gyur ro// slar bzlas
na rnalamar 'gyur ro// bya rog gi rgyus pa la srad bu khyos pa bzul mngon par bzlas te gang gi mgul du bcings pa de bya rog tu 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gi rgyus pa srad bur byas pa'/
mngon par bzlas te mgul du bcings pa de de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin dukhA dang/ thi ba dang/ rma bya dang/ chu skyur dang 'ug pa dang/ khra dang/ bya rgod kyi
gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// b.lang gi spyi las srodabu byas la lan brgyad brgyabazlas brjod byas te mgul du bcings na de ba lang du'agyur ro// rkang pa bzhipa la sogs pa
gang dang gang gi spyi la srad bu byas la mngonapar bzlas te mgul du btags na de de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bkrolan thar par 'gyur ro// 'bras
so ba la bzlas lanor gyi bdag po chenapo'i khyim du bcug lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur na mtshan mo bdunagyis so ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// dpal daru ka'i nges
par brjod pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/////de nas gzhan yang bshang bya
ba mkha' 'gro kun gar dge ba yi// snying po rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// 'dod don thams cad sgrub byedapa'o// gang zhig drunapa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po g.ye/
byad cing// rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang// yang dag dngos grub rim gyis so// su Taya hU~Myani skyob badz+dzaya nI kit+tArUbu chus o/ sngags 'di bklags pas 'grub par
'gyur// las rnams kun byed dgo ba yin// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang// khatsA ro dalAm sogs// mkha' 'gro mni thams cad kyi// sngags ni
'di nyid yin par grags// sa 'og yan mtho ris sam// de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang// las ni gang dag yod pa dag/ sngags kyis de dag thams cad sgrub//
dngos grub kun byed dgab yin// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// 'dilas shinatumchog gyur gang// 'jig rten gsuman ci yang med/ gang phyir 'di/
ni blamed de// las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin// lha yi thabs ni rab ston byed// mkha' 'gromani kun gyi gnas// mdor bshad rgyas par ma yin no//
me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis// ri bo bozang po bri bya zhing// de yi steng du jug bsgom pa// mkha' 'gro de bzhin 'am dang// khaN+Da ro hornal 'byor ma// dpa'
bo rnams kyi dpa' bo nyid// data te zhes bya ba// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yo/ mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad/
dbazhin pad+ma gar dbang dang// shrI he ru ka nyid dang ni// mkha' snying dang ni rta mgrin nyid// rin chen rdo rje stobs po che// mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang//
rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang// rdo rjeyumadzad dpa'achen po// de bzhin rdo rje ral pacan/ myu gu can dang rdo rje'i lus// jo rje 'od ni nyid dag dang// 'od dpag med
'di dag thams cad khyab// dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro nyid// rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs// bya ba kun la sgrub pa pos// 'khor
ler bzhugs par blta bar bya// gruba'adod shinatumanyam bzhag pas// 'khor le'i bdag nyid rtag tu sgom// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i
bde mchog brjod// 'khor le chen po grub kun gnas// de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi gzhi// 'di ni sangs rgyas bya ba dang// dpa' bo bya bas legs par gsungs//
mkha' 'gro ma ni re re yi// 'khor ni bya ba dag tu'agyur// rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' 'gro nyid// gzugs canamadang dum skyes ma// de bzhin lAm la sogs ni//
dngos grub kun byed dag pa yin/ dpal ra ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyiganas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa
brgyad pa'o/// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ji bzhin tshogs phyugs bsgrub bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur dudangos grub thob 'gyur
ba'o// sngags pas 'bras kyi phyam las/ rim bzhin du ni phyugs gzugs bya/ midaMng rus sbel ja mo dang/ bong bu spyang ki Na 'a sogs// de ltar sna tshogs phag dag
ste phyugs 'di dgatu shes par bya// mtshan nyid ji ltar gyur pa dang// 'di rnams lasani bshad par bya// skye pa gcig dang skye pa gnyis/ gsum mam bzhi'am lnga nyid/
dang// skye ba drug dang bdun gyur pa/ phyugs rnams su ni gdon mi za// gangag khayi dri zhim zhing// migami 'dzums par rnam pa rab lta// bden par smra zhing mthongan
dga'// rtag tudam chos dgur 'gyur zhing// rang gi skye ba shes pa dang// lus kyi drin rtag tu zhim// mtshan nyid 'di dag ldan par ni// skye ba bdun du 'byung ba/
yin// de ni thos patsam gyis ni// lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// bsams pa 'am reg pa tsam gyis kyang// gang zhig thig le byed pa de/ med 'grub par
'gyurang ste// 'di ni rang dga'i gzugs bar 'gyur// de yi snying ka'i rnga tshan// mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas ni// snying po'i sngags nobazlas nas su// deyi thig le
ba ba yin// sems can gang dang gang gini// gzugasasu byed par 'dod pa na// de dang de yi gzugasas ni/ thig les 'gyur bar the tshomamed// mkhas pas
shing lo khub ni// ro tsa nar bcas blangasanasasu// dpal par thig le byas na ni// de gzugs 'gyur bar the tshom med// phyugs nyid kyi ni ba spu yis// lagapa
spyi bor bcing bar bya// de yi yan lag lngar ldan zhing/ de yi baspyadang rnam bsresal9lag baspyi bor bcingasanani//de yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med// rnal 'byor la ni goms
shing zlos// mi rnamasanus pa ldan yin yang dka' zhing nyon mongs la dga' ba// dngos grub lamani 'gog pa yin// glang po rta dang bong bu dang/ rus sbal nga
mo phag dngawa// khu dang bug sogs bya rgod dang// khrung khrung khro dang sa ral// gzugs bzang ba dang gzugs ngan dang// lha yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro// rnal
'byor dang 'a chen rang dga'i gzugs// skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'di bas shin tun cho ga grub pa// 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin// dpal red ka'i nges par
brjod pa las su babadun pa bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongs sukharjeba'i cho ga'ile'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o///de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ nges par dbang du
bang 'gyur ba/ yang dag tsheg gang gisani// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad// gomangasan myos byed sre// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya// sangs rgyas
kyang ni dbang 'gyuran// phran thogs mi ni smos ci dgos// khachusongashing dag dang ni// de bzhin rang gi lus mnyes pa// myos byed ming dang bcas pa yis// khams
gsum dag ni dbang du'agyur// blo mtshar gyi mi khrag dngani// zos nas rlon pa'i zas dag dang// mi yi su dad ldan pa yis// mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin//
rang gi lus las skyugs pa 'am// mkhas pas rangasas sbyin sreg bya// nim pa'i shingalarab sbyar na// mod la dbye bar 'gyur ba yin// mnyam par bzhag pasad+dadun
me nyungs mar tshan der bsgros pa yi// bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg bya// 'phral du 'chi ba'am skyod par 'gyur// nyaladangam nyal 'dug pa 'am// bras dang
sbyor ba sogasa' yang// mkhas pas rtag tu zlos byed na// do' bgags ni yod ma yin// wa ye sha yis srog blugs brgyas// yang dag srog blugs byed pa'i mi/
doni zla ba gsum rjes la// rigs kyi dbul ba 'jig par 'gyur// sha chen dag gis ga la zhig/ myos byed ldan pas sbyin sreg byed// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni//
sgrub pa po ni thun gsum byed// ma lus sa rnams sbyong pa dang// zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur// tshim 'gyur mkha' 'gro ma de la// rgyal sristar bar gdon mi
khri lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni// thunaganyis bar du sbyin sreg byas// rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis// mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur/ dgo mA yu ba'i
ngu'u/ sha chang gis// phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bu// myur du de yi lag tu'agyur// dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'ag/ sngags kyi bzlas brjodautshan
mo bzlas// yul 'khor yang ni 'gugs par byed// de ltar nyin re byas na ni// rgyalapo nyid du de byed 'gyur// 'di las rab mchog gzhan dag ni// 'jig rten
gsum na yod ma yin// rnal 'byor chen po rang dgas 'chi// sAtshogs gzugs 'dzin cingarel// bil pa de bzhin pa la sha// u dum nyid dag ni// sbyin
sreg 'bus byas myur du ni// nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur// gomangs dang myos byed bsre// rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes
byas na/ dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur// gom yu ni bsreg byas pas// cibade bar ni 'grub par 'gyur// go mA yu yi sbyin sreg gis// myur du nor bdag
mnyam par 'gyur// brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med na yang// bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// lhag pa'i tshe dpa kuny+tsan+d+haM// mdag mA sha tsaka/ sbrang rtsi
gtsigs ma ste tshe dang// khyim gyi ta ma la 'deb blas// kha bcings par ni 'gyur ba yin// irung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang du duga' ba der gnas so//
de nas gzhanaya nga bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yi sa dang gnas// he ru ka dpal yan lag nyid// thams cad brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid can// gnas ni rab tu
dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing na 'od 'phro ba// tshamyong ni mngon 'gyur nyid// lta ba'i tshani spyang
dka' ba// 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legasapa'i blo gros nyid// lta ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sngon// bri ba ka gzhung
stod pa'i/ 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid sa/ pha rol phyin bcus rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma yi brda yi skad// mtho ris sa stangs 'og tu// dang 'a bo'i yan lag
brtan g.yo'i bdag/ pu lil 'asogs gang bstanapa// phyin bdag nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso//
kun tuphyag dang zhabs ldan zhing// thams cad du ni sdunazhal dbu// kun tuthos ldanu 'jig rtanan// thamasacang g.yogs ta rnam par bzhugs// de nas dngos
grub bsgrub bya ba// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs pa yin// dpal par ka'i nges par brjod pa
las dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'is bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa/de nas de yi rab bshad bya// man
ngagangashin tu rnyed dka' ste// dpa'i bo'i brda yi skad du ni// nga yi sa rgyud du smras pa yin// gos dang phyag rgya lta la sogs// shes rab yan lagi phur bu dra/ A la
kA zhes brjodang// sgyu la sogs stong mngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra lasogs pa nas// ji sribasdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa// bdung ni tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag
pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba// go cha chenapos yang dag srung// sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdusanas ni bshad pa yin//
mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag 'dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'is 'thob cing// skye dang su bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos
ldan 'gyur// ji ltar sngon bsags sdig pa yi// mtshan nyid thams cad dmanapa ste// gapazhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa// sa la 'dod pa kun dab phyug/ dper na mar
gyis gang ba'i snod// me yi dbus su bzhag ste// mar gsar steng du zhu 'gyurazhing// snod kyi dri ma 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin shAhe ru ga yo// mtshan gyis sdig pa 'jig
par 'gyur// bsam gtanasems pa tsam gyis sam// klog cing kha ton bris pa yis// mtho ris longs sod 'thob 'gyur ba'am// yang na 'khor 'desgyur ba 'thob
rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'itshe// khrag 'thung dpalasogs rnal 'byoras// lagan me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshegs dang/ relo me'i sgra
ni sna tshogs dang// sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa yis// 'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed// de 'dra'i dpa' chen rnal 'byor ma//
sa steng nani'idapar dka'// dpal ldan dze ru ka'i rgyung chen// gapazhig shes nas ma dad pa// dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par// de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur//
mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang// rnargyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang// ngo shalamago yi 'phropab dang// sa rags sil sil sgra sgrog pa// ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yo/
lte bar A likAli skyes// dkar mo bdag po rnams gnon cing// rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud// nyi shurtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang//
nye ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// dpa' bokun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// 'khor bcas dbus su sbyor ldan pa// thams cad dgyes shing gnyisamed
gyur 'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin// mos pa du ma'i sems can la// spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzadade// sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ba//
thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yin// zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la// gal te mes par ma gyur kyang// smed pa dag tumi bste// chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran pa// gang
gis 'dir bdag yul min pa// gang gis chos nyid mi shes yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni// bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams
nibyung gyur tam// ma byung na yang rnam kun tu// bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni// 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin// de ltar rnam par gzhal nas kyang//
'jigarten pa kun yong mi smad// de yi bgrod pa bsam yasangashing// sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// mdo sde ba bsngodapa rnams // rnal 'byor gsang tha'i dbye ba nyid//
semasacan mos pas 'jug pa rnams // de dang de la dga' ba bzhin/ dpa' dar ka'i nges par brjod pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i rtog pa rmad du byung
ba ngo mtshar dang bcas pa byed pa bstan bcos thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal ha ru ka dpa' bo chen po bklags pas grub pa thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdod nas grub pa blam yin no//
dpal daru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so/// rgya gar paNachen pad+ma kA ra dang// grogs
pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan mtho ldan pa'i// rin chen dmatshungs rin chen bzang po yis// mkhas pa pad+maka ra'i zhal snga ni// rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las bsgyur/
lhag pa'i tshul khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing// dri med dka' don 'thad pa dang bcas par// rtog pa dang ldan grags pagizhal sngar ni// sgra bsgyuradage slong pa[]kirti dang//
rigs kun @#/ marapa sgra bsgyur chos kyi dbang phyug gis/ mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus kyi bla ma nA ro pa'i phyag dpe dang gtugs pa'o/// rgya
gar skad du: a b+hi d+hanaut+tar tan ma/ bod skad du/ mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal le/ ji
srid 'gro ba drug gi mthar// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung// rdo rje sems dpa' yis ni byed// chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal ldan rdo rje
mkha' 'groni// sku gsum yengashes lnga yi dngos// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs// 'gro ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod// dzisrid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/
kun tu rtog pa'i bcings pa bcad// 'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug/ de srid rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang/ mkha' 'gro dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs te/ der bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thamasacad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang/ mkha' 'gro dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dra pa mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i snying po ngas bshad kyis/ lagan rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bangag po 'khor
snatshogs par rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis legs par rab tunyon la yid la zung zhig/ de la bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsolato// thal mo sbyar ba btud
pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de nas gsang ba bshad byas pa// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas pa min/ ]dpal he ru ku yang rag sbyor// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed
yin// bla ma las kyang bla man// mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu
bzhugs/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sems dpa'ani// rdo rjesems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin// thog
ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di// b+ha gar srid sgra gzugs skyes gnas// dam tshigaspyod pa'i spyod yul yin// thogam dbus mthar dri ma med// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka'
ba bsrubs dang bsrubs par yang dag sbyor// gang la de la ji ltar bzhin/ rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba// gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin// rtag tu zhes
bral zhi ba ste// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa// spro dang sdud par byed pa yin// rang bzhin dag pa rang byung ste// rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster// bzlas dang bsam
gtanaldan pa dang// sbyor nyid cho ga'i yengashis kyi// dengag rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon// dbugs 'byin par mamchog dag dang// dri yi
chudang bcasar dag/ mkhas pas ril bur byas nasani// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod// 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad pa ra la// pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub//
mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste// mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung// dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi// dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ rang rdzas thig lo'isangs
rgyus dang// byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni rig pa dang/
thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te// de ltar 'di la the tshom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed//
bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang// skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dmatshig 'ba'ajug pa'i gsang bsdus pa bstan nga
sta le'u dang po'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas// dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungasapa/ chags pamedacing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste// dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang/ dpa' bo chen po tshor nga rdo rje zhes bya ba dang/ dpa' bo chen po bdu shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang/ dpa' bo
chen po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang/ dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang/
dpa' bo chenapo gti mug rdo rjadang/ dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang/ dpa'apo chen po sna rdo rje dang/ dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang/ dpa' bo chen po phrag dag rje skye!
dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces kha ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang/ dpa' bo chen pos rdo rje dang/ dpa' po chen po mu rdo rje dang/ dpa' bo chen po
ma rdo rje dang/ dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje dang/ dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang/ 'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shi b.lus pa med pa chos kyi ngabyings kyi mthas gtug
pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor la sna tshogs 'dus pa/ gsang ba gsum gyi ngan tshig gi 'khor 'de dang thabs gcigatu
bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen pe rdorje thod pa'i dum bu dngo/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje kong rus chen po dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rdzamache brnam
pa gcigs pa dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha ngag dang/ dpa' bo chen po rong dang ga medadang/ dpa' bo chenapo rdo rje 'od dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang/
dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hUMmadzad dang/ dpa'apo chen po rje rje
rab bzangadang/ dpa' bo chen po rje bzang po dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang/ dpa' bo chen po rje rje mig mi bzang dang//
dpa' bo chen po rje rje stobs po che dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mchog dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje nam mkha' snying po dang/ dpa' bo
chen po rdo rje dpa' daru ka chen po dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+magar gyi dbang phyug dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa'
dang/ 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis namamakha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar mthong ngo// dunas bcom ldan 'das
rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dmatshigaganyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung
rnal 'byor mdung/ dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dmatshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo lhung byed ma zhes bya ba dang/
rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor medamo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo gar gyi dbang phyug mo zhes bya ba dang/ rnal
'bor mchen mo pad+ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang/ mkha' 'grom chen mo rje rje mkha' 'grom zhes pa ba dang/ mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang/ mkha' 'gro ma/
chen mo rdo rjedum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang/ mkha' 'grom chen mo rdo rdzogazugs can ma zhes bya ba dang ! rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtumam zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo
gtum mig ma zhesakhyab dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna chenam zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i blo gros ma des
bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'u thung ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen me lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya ba dang/
rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa srungs ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal
'byor ma chen me chang 'thung sa zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang/ rna2tshalango ram chen
rta rna ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong pa zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor mchen mo 'khor le'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo dus skyes ma
zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chenamachang 'tshong ma zhes byapa dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor 'di'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo
rab dpal mo zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen mo nyas bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor sgyur ma zhes bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus
chen mo zhes bya ba dang/ de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pasanam mkha'i khamasakyi mthar thug par hUMdangaphaT+Ti sgra sgrogs pa/ gangasna tshogs byedacing rang gi dam tshig dang/
'khyud pa dang/ tsupa nasasnying rje chen po'i re yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang/ rnal 'bor ma rnams kyigang bar mthong// mthong nas zhus te/ dpa' ba'am mchog
rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su dran no// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang dag par 'byupatingashes rab kyi pha rol
tuphyin pa 'byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thamasacad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rje tshe ma mo khrag/deng ma zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rjem mo 'ug
gdong ma zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rjem mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje ma mo gshin rje srog ma zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho
mo zhes bya pa dang/ rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba ma zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje ma mo gshin rje khajoms ma zhes bya pa dang/ 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyis nam
mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i langashes 'byung ba dpal haruka shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i
bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag byung//
'din dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje
sems dpa' dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad+magar gyi dbang phyug dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
chenapo rdo rje pe rag dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rnamchog dang/ rigs drug po de ni yan la ga drug tu dgod
pa ste srung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las byung ngo// rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/
rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phagame dang/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo la mi ni dang/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo gse:
byengam dang/ rdo rdzodabang phyug chenamo skag byedam dang/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo tsaN+Di kaste/ 'di lta bu s yang nam mkha'i khams dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis
gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par srung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsabachen poste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo mchog gis mchod pa byas
nas thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gi spyi bos gtugs so// de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang
gi ba spu'i bu gnas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba dum la thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs
pasamangun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i sIbarje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir
gnyisasumed pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsum/ chudang ma dang/ rlung dang/ dbang chen gyi

steng du stsa tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa// de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po
phyung nas sdos te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal por sprul pa kun tu badzrangapo chen po byungahaM/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par bzhugs so//
phun sumatshegs pa sna tshegs pas brgyan pa// rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis sdud pa// zlo ba dang nyin rimadog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang/ rnga yab dang/ rgyal mtshon dang/
g.yer ka'i dra bas migamangs ris su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig srad du chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/
srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ yi pags dang/ sha bradang/ smyo byed dpa/ brjod byed dang/ grib gnon dang/ ma rungs pa dang/ shin tu gdug pa dang/
po langs dang/ ro dang/ ro srog pa dang/ khyi dang ce spyang dang/ rtse sprang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpa' bo dang/ mkhar 'gro dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra 'phreng dang
a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dril bu dung cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang dge ba'i las kyis grol
ba sams can thams capalasIng rdzab nges phan 'dogs pa rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gar gyisagar pa cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas
brkyang bas gnas pa// 'gapa'i thal mo sbyong ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi mchog zab mo'i tshul dang/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa// sku lus
chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrog pa// rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i byamachen mo nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i
rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba na/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i ston pa// sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhi ston par byedapa sems dpa' chen po 'gas so 'degs
so lagan rdo rdzalegs par nyon cig/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snyingapo gsus pa/ snyipakhar zla ba bsgomasanas ni// rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phrulab// bde gshegs thams cad gsang bani//
mkha' 'gro ma ya dra ba'i sdos// de ni gsang ba byin brlabs pa// snying po mchog legs par nyon// bla ma yi yang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// so

swa b+hA ba shud+d+hasam+bad+ham+maT+Thaswa b+hA ba shud+d+honyAhaM/ oM shA r+ya tAdzAn swa b+hA ba At+ma koDahaM/ oM badzra shud+d+hasar maH badzra'ud+d+heT+TahaM/ o yo ga 'urasawad+hamA: yo ga shurnyeTAhaM/ o dzAn shud+d+ha

sarbadzoman shusnyowAhaM/o sa ma ya shud+d+hasarbad+hams ma ya shud+d+hony+dzahaM/ o sawata thA ga te shun+ya tAanulA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko'adza/ osawata thAg ta su pra ti bi shud+d+ha: saMthad+ha[']

tu dzAn badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kony+dza/ osarba marongashud+d+ha sadzernyamAsarngaman shud+d+hewAhaM/o kro d+ha hU~M: sarbad+hasmA: kro d+hashurtsoT/ oM tsit+ta'ud+d+hasarba d+ha byA tsit+taMshud+dehaM/ oM bA ga'u

sawid+ham bkangashud+d+honyAhaM/ oM kA ya shud+d+hasawad+hisaH kAya shud+d+hoT/ o dzA na a mra dngashasarba d+harmA: dzA mU a mr-i tu shud+d+honyAhaM/ oM nAnAs ma ya shud+d+hasarba d+harmAn+ta nAs ma ya uts+tshin+dasaM

oMAmyan ya shud+d+hasarba d+harmAtsA na ya shut+taMhaM/ o tri yo ga pa ri shud+d+hasarba d+harmA: trayog pa ri shud+d+haMhaM/ o a b+he ka shud+d+hasarba d+harmA: a b+hi She ka shud+d+hony+nyahaM : o pU dzashud+d+hasar d+ha

pA dza'adzoT/ oM sarbatathA ga ta a da yaM pU dza badzra swa b+hA baAt+ma ko'ag+ho/ o maN+Di la'u sawad+hamA: maN+Dal shud+d+howahaM/ oM ad+hi pa tishud+d+ha: sawad+ha a d+hipa tishud+d+howahaM/ o bA ra

shud+d+hasarba d+harmAbA ra shud+d+hoTahaM o yo gI ni shud+d+hasawad+him+mA: yo gi ni 'urtsowahaM/ o ta wa sarba d+harmA: ta tre shud+d+hony+dzahaM/ i ti ha tu a pa ga tasarbad+hamaHhetu a pa gtewahaM/ ru i
tiru ka ra a pa ga ta sadzad+hamAru ka ra a pa ga toT+Ta/ kai ti na kAtsit+ta sbe tasarba d+harmAnAkAtsit+ta sbi to3haM/ oM dzATi ta ka ra shud+d+hasawad+harmA: dz+haTikA ra shud+d+hoTahaM/

oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hasarba d+harmAwaMswa b+hA ba shud+d+hoTahaM/ odza la shud+d+hasawad+hamAdzA la shud+d+ho'agro 1 o A ra shud+d+hasarba d+harmA: A ha ra shAn+tit+tihaM: o b+ho kAshud+d+hasarba d+hAmA:b+ha shud+hony+nyahaM/

mo nyashud+d+honyAhaM/ o rag shud+d+hasarba d+harmArAg shulcogaM/ oM mA na shud+d+hasarbad+hamamAn shud+d+hony+dzahaM/ oM a ra shud+d+hasarba d+hamA:a ra shud+d+honyAhaM/ oM kha badzrashud+d+hasarba d+harmA khe

ba shud+d+hony+dzahaM/[u0f00] tItsakra parishud+d+hasarba d+harmA: tItsakra pa rid+d+hishud+d+hony+nyahaM/ oM DA ki nI shud+d+hasarbad+harmA ki nIshud+d+hony+dzahaM/ 'o o ku le shud+d+hasam+ba d+harmA ku la shud+d+hoNAhaM/ o mAtri'ud+d+ha
sarba d+harmamA tIshud+d+hony+dzahi/ oM bi to'ud+d+hasarba d+hamAThapi tAMshud+d+hony+tsa/ 'di ltar ji bo'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag pa'i shes par bya'o/ pu dza o a go ra de ma//
o tI ko ka lekatipra gri so sunas ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te// shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag/ bcu po de dag rnam pa
sgrung
sgom// 'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge/ dus dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas// rnal 'byor ma yi yid dga' ba// sum cu rtsa
bdun rnam dag don// mngon mtho da ra ka las byung// mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i glu// gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o// g.yon dang g.yasasu bskor ba yis//
dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya// gang gis de nyid shes pa yis// badzan lnga po bstan par bya// gang yang dbang bskur med pa la// gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig/
mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis// dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin// gzhan du slob ma spo ba dang// brgyal dang rmongs pa dog tu 'gro// mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang/ 3
napa dar ni ltung bar 'gyur// glegs bam bshes min la starab// ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi// pho' mig rims dang dug dang nad// mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses
par 'gyur// mi bsun rdeg dang 'tshog dag gis// gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du//
de nyid rtag tu sbasan ni// myur du sngags kyis dngos grub 'gyur// bla mas thamasacad rim bzhin du// mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin// lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor/
@#/ ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur// de ma thag tu byang chub ste// mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur// mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra spangs//
bdag gi dam tshig mi shes shing// drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan// mi bsrun snying rje med pa dang// brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang// spya zhingangan la phrag dog
can// skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang// rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang// 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya// sbyorab 'i dngos grub ring ba yin// puk+ka sA ni mdzes sdug
N+NaM blang/ gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyan// sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems/ brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes// dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tshamed//
nga rgyal med cings sna mdo// sngags pa ragi spyod pa ste// rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis 'phong// phagastsaldani rtag tu'achang// mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas//
thodapa dngani kha TaM 'dzin// thalakha'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs// rtag tumatshAs bza'// thams cad btung bas myos pa dang// ro ye u0f7a gdan la 'dug pa dang//
pags pachen po gos su gyon// rjes su 'thun pa'i brda'abakra// zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang// grong ngam dgon pa dag suyang// gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na//
rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing// rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la// yang na tshong dus gnas pa dang// nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i// mi shes gti mug gis khyab
pa nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i// gtsug lag khang du gnas mibya// ji ltaraskyes bu dbul po bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas// rdo rje
gar gyis rnam par rol// rtag tu dur khrod la gnasashing// drichen sha chen zas su bza'// myosabyed btung bar ldan pa yi// dpa' ba'igatso bos rtse gcig pa'i//
sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chenapo ma rnyed na// g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// de ni yi shes 'byuganas te// shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung
gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigasapa'i/ gnyis sumed pa nyid la gnas// rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang// sgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na// bde la dga' ba'i das
grub 'gyur/ shes rab thabs kyis cho ga'i rim// phyag rgya che dang nges par rol// sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis// rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// skye la
'del dngos grub 'gyur// g.yonapa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// gas pa de bzhin thabs yin no// sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobasani// sumacu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed/
rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang// gnod sbyin klu yi yum dang// gzhan yang sna tshogs dri phamo// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod// danyid gsang
ba'i mchog gyur pa// A kA li rtag tu sgom// rangagi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag/ dpa' bos brda rnamaMs bstan pa ni// rnal 'byorang
yis lag g.yon gyis// brda rnams la ni 'jug par byas// dpa'apo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin//
rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid// mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas// srin 'a ga dpa' bo dngos grub can// tha ma la na mozad sku//
sen mo'i Tis la mgrin gnas// g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni// dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad// lag mthil pho la 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab tu shin tu nges byas
[; ]bani lnga po bstan pa ra ba// sgrub pa po yis shes pa gyis// sa ni sbyan zhes bya bar bshad// chu khams mA ma kI ru bshad// me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad//
rlung ni sgrolam dag phyagrags// 'o khyed ni stong pa ste// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin// dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni// mkhas pas rgyab lugashegs su gsol//
[s ]gsang pa 'di ni ma bstanacing// rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// daltar brdzu yis dang 'a bo rnams // dad ldan cig bza' bas batha'// dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//
mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi// sna tshogs brdani bshad par bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid dang// pho nya rnams kyi mtshananyid
dang// sgrub pa po la phanapa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bshad par bya// ras ris dngani sku gzugs dag/ 'drin de bzhin dam tshig dang// sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis//
gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa// sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzad pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// lha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba/ rnal 'byor mni sna tshogs
mchog/ dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i// rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus// mkha' 'gro ma yang yang dag 'dus// rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa// bla ma
brgyud pa'i bka' bzhinadu// slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir// bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas// sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs// gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa//
dang// mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas/ phyugs kyi mtshan nyingasngags pas rtogs// sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang// rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang// mkha' 'gro
ma yang de bahin te// phyi rol ma me'i phyag rgyu dag phag mo yi rigs las byung// dpa' bo kun gyi spyod pa dang// 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu
bslabs/ phyi yi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas// dar ka dpal rigs las byung// dgo ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs// yulakyi
spyod pa'i khyad par dang// slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod dang// rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba// bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim// thams cad
rgyud rnams rnam par shes// 'grub pa'o lung dang bstan bcos dang// mdes skyes rabs de bzhin te// bla na mepa'i sred pa dag/ shes rab pha rol phyin las byung/ phyi
ro' bstan bcos yongs la mkhas// phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog/ spyiranga'i sgom par ldan pa dang// yid ganyis med pa nyid kyis ni// bza' ba thams cad bza'
bar bya// yi ge brgya pas thams cad du// gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su// rang gi mi dang ldan par ni// gcig tu sprul nas bzlas pa bya// rtag tu 'phreng
ba'i sngags kyang bzla// don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// gsang sngags btus pasago tshadang//
snying po dang ni nye snying dang// gsang sngags btus pas rjes su bsrung// dkyil 'khor shin tumadzes pa la// yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas// dpa' bo rnal
'byor ma rnams bskyed// 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do// mamo rnams kyi dam pa mchog/ gsang ba dga' bsus pa su// gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa/
yin/ gsang sngags kun gyiganas yin no// 'gro ba 'byung ba'ang mamos khyab// de nyid 'dini mi bstan te// dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yis// sgom pa 'di
ni mchog yin te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med// skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed// byams pa'i go chab gos pa ste//
snying rje chos kyi go chayin/ shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin// nyon mongs bdung ni rnam par spangs// phyir bzlog chen mos bsrung ba dang// rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam
par mtshan// skugasung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha sbyar gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan// thams cad mchog gi srub che// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// bka'
yi 'khor lo srung ba che// phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur// srub mchogan 'di dag gis// sgrub ba po la byang chub stsol// rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang// rdo
[/ ]4// rje'i sa dang dra ba dang// stongagi gur dang bla re yis// gdug pa'i bdud ni bskad byas nas// mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin// gang gis rang sems
za thul ba yis// bdag gi semasan bcings pa yin// gang la gang gis gsod pa yin// mnyam pa'i semasani dri yin te// gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin// tsanangan
dkarapo lus yin te// mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no// me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa/ 'bad pas gtor ba yin par bashad// rab zhin dag pa bdug pa ste//
mnyam pa'i sgomapa bdug pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma chen po lasaM/ de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjemakha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsungs pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa
bzhin// phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa// rtog pa me pacing dpyod pa med// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spongs// tshes
grangs med cing skar ma med// bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yo da ma yin// gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'ib kha'angayod ma yin// dus dang tshong las rnam par grol:
dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// ril bu dang ni ri'i rtsi dang// chu bo chenapo'i rigs dag dang//
rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dwang// shingagacig dang ni dgo ba'i gnas// ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam/ sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum ra dang// lha khang dang ni mchod rten
gnas// khyim mam gzhi mdo dag tun// sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// gnas brtag pa byas nas kyang// yid nigapa
du dga' ba der// sna tshogs bde mchod dam pani// de ru bsgrubasan dngos grub 'gyur// sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni// du mar dbye ba'i sgom pa yis/
ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsisani// sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yis// me tog 'badapas 'gram par bya// snatshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong
gdan// mnyam par bzhag pas rgya cher bya// rtse gcig pa yi semasakyisani// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa sgrub// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas te//
bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa bya// dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni// sems can kun don yang bya// phyi dang nang du bltas na ni// chos rnams thams cad stongapa yin/
byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa// sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas// rang gi sIpakha mkha' dkyil du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par sgom//
stong nyid mchog gyur pa// ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin// sna tshogs 'od zer gsa' ba yi// rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab/ sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni/
byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin/ nam mkha'i khamasani sgos dga' bas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mo'ong ba yin// dil gyi gang bu lta bu yi// lha dang khro bos khyab//
par mthong// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso// lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni// bdag gis mchod cing rjed par bya//
sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs// khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor mes// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams // sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed// nam mkha'i
dkyel ni kun khyab pa'i// mchog de ma tho nas bsdus nas sa// thams cad gsum la skyabasasu mchi// byang chub mthar thug bar du ni// sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams /
sangs rgyas go 'phang de la bzhag/ de la sgrub pa pos gsol gdab/ dag ba'i las las byung ba la// rtag tu bdagani skyabs su mchi// rmos pa'i gzugs can nga rgyal ]
ba00dang// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang// 'du byed rnam shesade bzhin no// hUM hUM hUMhot+tahUMhi/ de ni rnamapar snang mdzad dang// rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug/ rdo rje
rgyal pos khyab pa yin// rdo rjesams dba' mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// nge toru ka dpal rdo rje yi// mig dang rna ba sna dngani// lce dang reg pa yid de
bzhin// o tsA tu oM khaM6/ gtiyug dang ni zhe sdang dang// de bzhin phrag dog 'dod chags dang// ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid// skye mched dag ni thams cad la//
dbang phyug rdo lnga nyid yin no// sa dang chudang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha'anyid dag go lAmIpItAM khaM/ ltung byed ma dang gsod ma dang// 'gug byed dang ni gar dbang
dang/[° ]pad+ma'i drab mo lha 'o/// mkha' mnyamanam mkha'alta bu 'o// de ltar phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rnamasani rnal 'byor pas// tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/
yongs su dag par shes par bya// tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste// bdagakyang yongs su dag pa yin// de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro// sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis//
har ka dpal dgagyur nas// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// phu ru ka yi go 'phang mchog/ thob nas sems can ma lus pa// 'di la 'dzeg cing 'god par shog/ opa/
grogati pa ri shud+d+hasawad+hapra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+hoTahaM/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hasarba d+hamasub+hA ba shud+d+hony+dzahaM/ lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya// dngos mod mdun
sogs phyogs bcu ru// snying po'i 'phreng ba spro bar bya// da nasnying po de mthong nas// dra ba re ba de bzhin te// rdo rjes sogs byin gyis brlabs// bla re mda' yi dra ba dang
rdo rje ma ni 'bar bar bskor// phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya// oM ma de ni badzib+ha ba badzra paM d+ha hUM/ oM badzrapA ka rapaMhUM/ oM badzrapaN+Dar paMhU~M/ o badzrapi ta na hU~MkhaM hUM/
oM badzrasha padzA la trakaMhU~M/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lAn hUM hUM/ ngehar ka yi bka' 'khor la// gtso bo brgyad po 'bar ba dag/ dmathong nas ni logs pa ru/ nyi ma'i dkyol/
tsha 'khor dbus bzhugs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra// phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan//
shes rab skyil krung legs par bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu// mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyan bzhugs// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thams cad
mtshan masamtshan pa yin// dpe byad kun gyis brgyan pa ste// thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing// rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// zhags pa lcags kyu'adzanamadzad cing//
dpal chen bde ba'i go 'phang zhugs// dkar zhing ser la ljang khu ste// zhalagadong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog tshul gyis// de yi khro po
brgyad dag spro// rdo rje drag po'o lasku// rdo rdzogatsur tor de bzhin te// thab sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang// rdo rjenag po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba//
khro bo 'di dge rnam par dgod// sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar// ljang khu duba'i mdog can te// dkar zhing gnag lagur kum mdog/ rab 'jigs klod pa'i dbu rgyun/
can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad na ra'i rus pa yi// rgyan gyis spyad pa rab tu 'byar// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// sna tshogs pa yi nang
bzhugs shing// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusan bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag/ zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bsam// thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin//
zhags pa lcagasakyu mchog kyang 'chang// thams cad dril bu cang te'u// shes rab bdebs legs par 'khyud// dmase radabu skra dag gis brgyan// mchaparnam
gcig 'jigs pa can// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// 'jigs pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan can te// des na bdag nyid rgyan du byas// rdo rje mdzad rnam par sgom//
khro zhinge 'bar la g.yo ba dang// dragaci 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis 'degs par brgyan// g.yas brkyang nga yi gnas pas
bzhugs// lcags kyu zhags pa khaTaM 'chang// dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin// mgo yi do shal sku la 'chang// thod pa 'phreng ba'i ska rags can// gdug pa thams
cad zhabs 'og mnan// thabs dang shes rab mnyam pa ldan// rdo rjesams dpa'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya// khro bo gnyis po rnam par sgom//
steng du gtsug tor 'khor sgyur te// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par sgom// 'og tu rdo rjes 'og go/ dkaralaso ba'i mdog can yin// thod pa dang ni kha 'dzin// 'khor
dang ni mdung 'dzin cing// zhags pa lcagasakyu dril rdorje// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// phur bu khro bor byas nas su// de ni phyogs bcur rnam par spros//
de la bka' lung bsgo ban// bgegs ni myur dumed par gyis// gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su// phyogs bzhi dag tumanyam par gzugs// mthe bong sdigs mdzub
sbyor ba yis// phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdab/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~MhU~M phaT/ shamadu'o/ oM rbad+d+hagrots+tshahU~MhU~MphaT/ byang du'o// o grostsapa ya grany+dzA pa ya hU~M phaT/
nub tu'o// u0f00 A na ya ho:b+hag paM bi d+ha rA dza hU~MphaT/ lho phyogs su'o/ gsang sngags rgyal bo 'di yis ni// bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la// rdo rje phur bus dgod
cing mnan// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yin// oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba du[]bi hUM hUM phaT/ o kI la ya[']la ya sarba pA paM hU~MhU~M phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzrakI la ya badzra d+ha
ro AdzAsarbaduny+tsan pa ya ti kA yakhAkatsit+ta badzrakI la ya hU~MphaT/ phurapa rdo rje khro bo ro// bltas nas yos su brtag par bya// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// dngos
grub rdo rjes brdung bar bya// ohUMbadzra mung+gar badzakI 'o ya Ako Ta yahUM hUMphaT phaT/ mkhas pas rje rdzokhro bo'i tshog/ gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla/ daa kha badzrablokabadzra
hU~MkA ra badza?hUM phaT/ oM badzratsaN+Da badzra hUMphaT/ o badzra a na lArka badza?hUM phaT/ o badzra u badzra yUphatwA/ oM badzakuN+Da la badza?hUM phaT/ oM badzrayakAbadzra hUM phaT/
tsho'adzrakA la bidzra hUM phaT/ obadzramahApe la badzra pUphaT/ o badzra d+hI paN bidzra hU~MphaT oM badzra uShatsakre bti badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA tA la badzra hU~MphaT/ bka' 'di dag ni
sgrub pa yi// de ma thag khyabagegs med 'gyur// u0f00sa rkang dang zhag kha chu// shukra rak+ta lhan cig sbyor// rnal 'byor pa yis rilakhur byas// zos na dngos grub nges par
'gyur// sngo zhing ser la ljang khuni// doNi hUMmadzad rang byas te// ser zhing gnag la ljang bu dang// dung kha ser la ser skya dang// dkar zhing/
ser la ljang khu dang// dmar hringasar la ltung ba ba// de ltar bzhi ni bdag po bzhin// mi bskyo da dbu rgyan dam tshig can// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzinapa dgyes// 'di ltar
khro bo thams cad kyang// dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed// 'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi// gtso bo'i bka'ani gling ba gyis// rnal 'byor pa ni bar gnas pa// bgegA
rnams thams cad med par mthong// gce khu'am yapanam gtse ra ba'am// sku grol thalapas yan lagakhyug/ ji ltar ji srid ma ngal bar// 'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa
bya stong pa ye shes rdo rjen// dad pas dranani mnyam par gzhag// oM shAn+ya tA dz+nyAn badzraswa phru ba At+makotrAhaM/ oM a nimit+tadz+nyA na badzrasA b+hA ba At+mako'akhaM/ o a pra Ni hita
dzAn badzraswa b+hA ba At+ma kony+dzahaM/ smig rgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni// sems can du ni rnam par brtag/ 'di nimakha' dang mnyam pa yin// chos med chos min pa lapa med// nas
mkha' gos pa med pa ltar/ dngos po med cing dmigs su med// gang gi snying khaka la sbyar dbus gnas gsal// phra bar lta ba rang byung ba yi sems 'jug pa// khams gsum na
nyid/lus gnyis med par ni nyir 'gro ba// gsal kha chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal// dbang po'i g.yo ba lta kun n dungs sbyar ba'i// ye shes rgyal ba ma lus
'dus pa'i snod gyur pa// khams gsum ma lus gnyisamed par ni nyi 'gro ba'i// mthong bamakha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/
chosani rjesasu dran pa sgom// chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi sku ni rang byung 'gyur// dbus nagasal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams
