kyis// shin tugasalab bsgoms pa las// 'bar ba 'di ni the tsom med// rtag tu snying la gnas pa yis// thigalegacig pu yi ge med// skyes bu de ni bsgoms
gyur na// ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog/ sems dpa'arjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// sems dpa' rjesasu dran par sgom// sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni/ chos
kyisams dpa' khyad par 'byung// bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa// smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang// mthong nas ji srid 'og tuni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus suni//
rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag/ dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// sngon po yon zhal dang bzhi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par basam// yi g.yaM las yang dag 'byung//
sngo ba'i mdog can gzhu lta bu 'o/ rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan par sgom// dud pa'i 'phro ba khyab par dmigs// de yi steng du yi ge raM/ me yi dkyil
'khor mchog dam pa// grugasum pa la dmar ba'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'bar bas khyab// nyim bye ba 'od mtha' yas// rdo rjes mtshan pa sgom par bya//
mi steng du chu nyid de// yi ge po mchog las byung ba// dushar rayi mdog 'dra ba// zlum la 'od zer 'phrangab can// de yi steng dus kyi dkyil 'khor// khaM las byung ba sa
botso// zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan// 'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs// rnal 'byor de steng sgom pa ni// rirab lhun po mchog gyur pa// zur bzhi pa la rin chen
bzhi// rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes// yi gtsu las legs par byung// 'od zer gzi brjidamchog dam pa'o// de yisnying du bsam pa ni// phro ni dkar po las
byung ba// de stong 'khor lor bcas pa dag/ khang pa brtsegasapa rnam par bsams// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi po// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// drab dra phyed kyis/
mdzes shing// ba dan 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zur gyi tshani thams cad dang// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnamasasu// jo jo rin chen gyis brgyan cing// phyi yi dkyil
bde yi nang du 'khor ni// brgyad po dkar po'i mdog can la// de yi dbus su pad+ma che// sAtshogs 'dabam brgyad pa la// lte ba ge sar//
gyis khyab pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rigamar bcas// dkar po ser po de bzhin te// dmar dang ljang khu zhal bzhi pa/ zhi zhing dgod
dang khro ba dang// rnam par 'gyur ba shin tu'ajigs// dze rje dril bus mnyam par ldan // mdung dang dgra stacang te'u dang// gri gug thod pa kha TaM ga/ tshangs pa'i pags
pa gos sumanabs// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag/ phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod panatsan
rgyan rnams thams cad yongasasu rdzogs// dpe byad man dang yang dag ldan// thugasakyi ye shes dam tshig can// cod pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// ltarathabs
bzhin shes rab de// phyagaskya lnga po byin gyisabarlabs// rigs kyi dbye bas phyanas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas//
su zhiganyis su me dpar thomo// mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor ni dang kha bo dang// rnal 'byor ma dang bcas pa byung// g.yas brkyang galen
@#/ brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs// dkar sngo ser dam pazhal mdog ste// 'khor le dril bus 'khyudapa'i phyag/ sngar gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i//
phyag mtshan rim pa 'dzin pa yin// thod pa'i 'phrang ba'i rgyan dang ni// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba rlon pas sad// zla ba khyad par b 'dzin pa// zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par
gtsigs// spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha zhabs kyis gnon pa// na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan
can// phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa bgos pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'groms pang du 'khyud pa/ sku la thod pa dang gdug pa la sdigs mdzub kyi
'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ byin pa gnyis kyis 'khrilab/ bde ba dang dgyes pas mos pa/ khams dang/ phung po dang/ skye mched rnams byin gyis brlab
te sa'i khams ni 'a stsa ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams ni maM sta gsod byed ma'o/ (ma'i bams nir sta 'gugs byed ma'o// rlung gi khams ni yaM ste gar gyi dbang phyug
ma'o// nam mkha'i khamasaM ni khaM ste pad+ma'i dra ba ma 'o// serab dang/ sngo ba dang/ dmar ba dang/ dud kha dang/ sngo ba'o// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par
ma lcamadzad mo mdog dkar po/ tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te oM gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu / 'dungashesakhris pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po/ 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po
nyaljang khu/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste hU~Mdakarapo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka so himadog nag po'o// mig bri ste
gtimugardorjodakar po/ rnabacu zhe sdang rdo rje sku nag po'i// snyani khaM phrag dog rdo rje ste ser po'o/ ngag chags pa rdo rje ste a dmar po'o// reg pa ni ser sna rdo rje sU haljang khu'o/
skya mchod thams cad dbang phyugardo rje ste hadakar po'o// lus ni phyi ste dkar po'o// gan Aste dmar po'o// yid ni o sta sngon po'o// de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi
bar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so// de la shar gyi 'dab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog sngonapo'o// lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lAm ni ljang khu ste sngo bsangs so/ nub phyogs/
kyi 'dab ma ladum skyes ma dmar mo// byang gi 'dab ma la gzugs can ma gser gyi mdogaser skya zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyanagasum pa/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang
ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thodapa dang/ kha To kha dang/ cang te'udang/ gri gug/
'dzanipa/ zhal gdong rjesasu chags pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chagasapasalta zhing reg pa'o// mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du/
byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi gzhug go/ shar du pra tapu rir stobs po che dang/ 'khor 'khongashugs can mnag po// byang du gro nyed ba tar rdo rje rin chen dang
dum skyes ma ser po/ nub tuso raThar rtamagrinadang/ chang 'tshong ma dmarapo'o// lharasu baN dIpar nam mkha'i snying po dang/ 'khor le'i gocham ljang khu'o// mer
nag rar dpal khrag 'thung dang/ rab tudang 'a mo dmar po'o// bden bral du sin+d+hAr pad+magar gyi dbang phyug dang/ stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang ser skya'o// rlung phyogs na ma
ru tar rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor lo sbyaram dung kha'i mdog can/ dbang ldan du phyogs lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo dkar po'o// stobs po che lasog
pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa// phyag bzhi pa/ ralapa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag gnyis la 'khor la dang drilabus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan la kha TaM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin
pa phyag rgya lngas brgyanapa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// 'khor le'ajishugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni gdong gcigapa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang/
sdigs mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa spyan gsum pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ skyagrol ba/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas pa/
phyogs kyi gos can ma/ mgrin pa'i nor bu dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rnachadang/ tshangs pa'i skud pa dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ mgo bo'i 'phro
ba dang/ g.yer kas 'og pag byas pa/ shar dang/ byang dang/ nub dang/ lce'i sgoralA gdong ma dang/ 'ug gdong ma dang/ khyi gdong ma dang/
thag gdong ma rnams so// ma dang/ bden bral dang/ rlung dang/ dbang ldan du ni gshin rje srog ma dang/ gshin rje pho nya mo dang/ gshin rje mche ba ma dang/
gshin rje 'dzoms ma rnams so// ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma bzhin bA gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba'ang de bzhinano// mtshamasakyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa yid 'phrog pa'i tshul
na/ yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po chen po thugs rjes sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba can no//
da dag ni sku'i 'khor 'khos 'og na gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te/ dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing/
sna tshogs ro bcud bde bste// chags pa'i bde ba chen po ni// de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed/ daa la la dgyes pa che// bde ba chen po de nyid yin//
bde gshegs lhani shin tu mdzes// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// dga' bas srid pa dag las grol// bde bar gshegs pa dag pa che// dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par
brtag/ mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur par// rnala'abyor la cig 'dod pa yin// mnga' skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste// ye shes dkyil 'khorab ltasanas ni// mchod
dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug/ sprodang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sgom// rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar// bzlos pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla//
skya ba can gyi lus grub ste// mkha' la spyod par the tshom med// o shAkAya trA karu lu ru lu hUM hU~MhU~M phaT/ wA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM swahA/ snying po'o// o ts+tshA hahahUM hUM phaT/
nyiba'i snying nge 'o// oM bud+d+hat+tA ki nI ye hUM ba ro tsa ni ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po'o// oM hUM sar bod+hu TA kin yahUM hUM phaT nya ba'i snyingapo'o// u0f00 ma hAb 'ag+ha hU~M phaT/
o tsakra po gsuMhUMphaT/ o hU~MraM badzra[W]hU~M phaT/ oM khacu re nge hU~MhUM pa3/ e hi hayogi ba gi bu hU~MphaT/ oMsherti ni ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM pu A kA shA ga hU~M hU~M phiT/ o
tsakra barmi NI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oka li shAhe ru ka ka li hU~MhU~M phaT/ oMsu bu re hU~MhU~MhU~M phaT/ o sa la pad+manarte shwa ras la hU~M phaT/ o ma rUb 'tshuhU~M phaT/ o le ba ro tsa nI ye//
hi'i hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM tsakra brtenA le hu hU~MphaT/ oM d+hi la badzra satwAd+hi li hud phaT/ o bI ma swA hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+yapUhUM phaTA/ o u lu kA spyi huhUM phaT/ ongashA nA mye hU~M:
yaT/ oM swAka rA s+ye tshu hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma rA d+hI ye hU~MhU~M phaTA/ o am du tIyecu pUphaT/ o yi ma dpyici ye hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye hU~M phaT/[u0f00] DA ki ni ye hUM phaT/
mo lA me huM hU~M phaT/ o khiN+Da ro hihU~MhU~M phaT/[u0f00] rUpa tI ye hU~MhU~M phaTA/ mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma sogs la//thog ma pad+ma la gnas nas/ mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang
bzla// rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po dgo/ 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// zhi ba dang ni dbang nyid dang// rmongs par bya dang gnon pa dag/ sku yi mkha' 'gros byed pa ste/
dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// dam tshig can dag langs dus su// yan lag drug lubasgom bya ba// rnam dag ye shes mig gisani// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams /
blta// o hasIng kha la/ na mahimago bol/ swa tasu spyi gtsug la/ o bo ShaT ye go cha'o// hUMhAhomig la'o// phaT phyogs yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o/
dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang// sngo dang ljang khu du kha dang// yid kyis mdog drug rnam par sgom// o bo sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ste lte ba/
la'o// yo yami ni so snying khala'o// dzAmo rmongasabyed ma ste kha la// hU~M yigalo bye ma snye mgo bo la'o// hUM skrag byed mas spyi gtsug la'o// phaT phaT nam
tsika su yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// dang 'a bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ 'a/ mkha' 'gro rnamasanibazhugs nas kyang// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams
cad 'de yis rnam par brtag/ 'chimad ye shes lha bza' zhing// ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya// jorjodam tshigacan mchod nas// dus bzhi dag tubasnyen pa bya//
mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma'as/ sku'i sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//de nasagazhan yang bshadabya ba/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam
bsgoms te// sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// gsung gi 'khor la rnam par sgom// rtsibs brgyad dmar po'i mdog can la// nang gi 'dab ma snga ma bzhin//
dordzasams dpa' bla med pa// gsung gi rdo rje rnam par sgom// gdong bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro mas
'khyud cing// rtag tu bde bache la bzhugs// pad+ma dril bus mnyam par 'khyud// dbang phyug chen po'i pags pa ni// phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang bar gnas/
lhag ma lnga pa'i rim pa bzhin// dbang phyug chen po'i mthar thug par// zhabs 'og mnan par rnam par blta// dam pazhing po la de bzhin sor// g.yonab dkar la spyan
gsum pa// ral pa'idabu rgyan dag gis brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu la mdzes// zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang// sna tshogs pad+marnam dgod cing// mtshab rnam
par gtsags pa dang// 'jigs pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing// sgrig pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi pags pa gos su bgos/ mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba
can// mgul rgyan gdu bu rnatsha dang// mgo bo'i 'phrangabs rnam par brgyan// mchod phyir thogs dang tha'abab ste// phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags// de dag pharel phyin
drug ste// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'o// de yi pang na bcom ldan m// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// gcer du
sgazhi grol bas// dum bu rgyan gyi ska rags can// phyag g.yon thod 'dzin 'khyud pa dang// gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing// pad ldan lagapas phyogs kun tu//
gdug pa kun la sdigs mdzub byed// drag cing bskal pa'i me ya gabri// zhal nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing// byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khril//
za bde bachen bo thugs rje'i bdag/ mkha' 'grom sogs sngar bshad bzhin// pad+mal sogs phyogs bkongan// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// sngar bshadamadog tu
gnas pa ste// 'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar po// dum skyes ma ni de bzhinaganag/ lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin// phyagagayon khaT thod pa dang// g.yas pa cung
te'u gri gug 'dzin// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang// 'chi med lnga po'i bum stesasu// byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA maru pa na myu
gucanadang/ sa srungs ma ste dkar po'o// byang du u tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed mchen mo ste dmar po'o// nub tu tIshakunen dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlugi
shugs can ma sta nag po'o// lha ru kos lar rdo rje hUMmadzad dang/ chang 'thung ma su nag mdog ljang khu'o// me phyogs 'baka'ang gan rab bzang dang/ sngo bsangs moste
sarapo dang dkaraskya'o// bden bral du lwa pa ka na rdo rje bzang dang/ rab bzang ma ste dkarapo'o// rlung phyogs su ki po tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rta rna ma ste ljang khu'o//
dbang ldan la ni hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang/ bya gdong ma ste gnam mdog sngo bas sa so// gsung gi 'khor lo sa la sprod pa'o// myu gu can 'al sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni nal
gcigapa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ phyag gnyis na pad+ma dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phug nakha dzug/ g.yas na cate'u/
phyag rgya lnga la sogs pasabargyan pa/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pasabazhugs pa'o// dpa' bo la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa// nal
gcig pa la thod pa dang// sdigs mdzub pad+macan gyis 'khyud// mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang// rna tshatshangs pa'i skud pa dang// mgrin pa'i rgyan dang thod pa'i
'phrong// 'og pag dag gi ska rags can// sngar bshad sgo srungs la sogs bzhin// gshin rje srog sogs lha mo rnams // mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par bya//
dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang// dpral bar pa'i 'phrangabacan// phungapo skye mched khams rnams kun// sku gsung thugs su rnam par brtag/ sngar bshad pa/
yi cho ga bzhi// yig rnamasani dgod cing sgom// thugs ni A: stadamar po yin// gsupani o ste dkar por bshad// rdo rje sku ni hUM yin te// nam mkha' zla ba la
dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang// thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms nas su// ye shes 'khor le de mthong nas// dbang bskur bas ni gzhug par bya//
thams cad byung ste thim nas su// thams cad sgom zhing bsam par bya// sku gsung thugasakyi rim pa yis// spro bsdu dag sbyor bar bya/ oM shIbAkat+taki A ro likahU~M
phaT/ At+taki ni dzA shaM ba raM swA hA/ snying po'o// oM A ro likahi ya/ snyaba'i snying bo'o// oM pad+ma TA ki ni yahidahUM phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// u0f00sarbabang:
kinI ye ahuhU~Mba'/ nyeba'i snying po'o// u0f00 DA ki nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT a lA mtshuhUM phaT/ oM khats+tshA ro to tshuhU~M phaT/ oM ru pi NI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM phaT haM ku ri ka phaT huM hU~M
phaT/ o a rab tIyaM hU~M phaT/ o dpa badzra dza Ti la da ngad duhU~M phaT/ oM ma hA b+he ra bA ya hu hU~MphaT o pa tsami pAbI ra pa tsa hU~M hU~MphaT/[u0f00] bA yu be ge hU~MhU~M phaT/ o b+ha kA

badzra hU~M kA ra b+ha klu ba sa ru d+hi ra an mA lA ba laM bi na hUM hUMphaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye hu h+phayaT/ o grosu b+ha dra gro:sad+d+ha pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sasaMbA tam+b+ha ya ta yahU~M hU~M phaT/ o shAm de
bI li hUM phaT/ o A kaSh+Tha badzrasu b+ha dra A ka hu hU~M phaT/ oM su bu drihUM hUMphaTaM/ otsum wAb+hi ra ba hU~MhU~MhU~M phaT/ o hayakits+tshe hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM [] bi rU pAk+Sha le dzI duhU~MphaT
o kha grwa nane hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM kA kA kye huM hUM phaT/ o u lu kA mye hU~MhU~M phan/ o shA nA mye hU~MhU~M phaT/ oMswA ka rA+e hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM ya ma rA d+hI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM ya ma
du tIyi rgyuhUM phaT/ oM ya ma raMTiNi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma thanI yihU~MhU~M phaT/ rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas/ bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya// dgug pa dang ni/
rgyusaM pa nyid// sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur// chos can yid 'ong gyur pa ste// ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang bar ma thams cad dang//
thams cad mthar gnas la// de la thams cad gnas pa ste// sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchogadam pa// 'dod pa'i chags pas rjes su chags// 'dod pa'i
dga' bas myos pa dag/ bdag nyid chenapo sgrub pa po// de yi dbang du gnas pa yin// sna tshogs pa mdzes gnas nas// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// byur
bu'adod chags chos kyi bdag/ bde ba che la rnam par bzhugs// langs pa'i dus su dam tshig/ dri chen rdo rje chu bza' zhing// chos kyi phung po rdzogs rgyur nas
rig pa'i rgyal po la sogs 'grub/ u0f00 hasIpakhal/ na mahisago 'a// sAhAA ro lika spyi gtsug la/ bo Na Ta dgo rma/ tosigala'o// phaT haM
u/ mtshon cha'o/ (chos kyi rdo rjedang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang ! pad+magar gyidabang phyug dang/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dang/ rdo rje nyim dang/
rtamchog su/ dmar ba dang/ ser ba dang/ dkar ba drang/ sde pa dang/ gur kum gyi mdog dngo/ lcangakhu ste bye brag go/ o ba pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma/
so lte ngala'o// hayo pad+maya me ni dang simo pad+ma'i rmongs byed ma dang/ Ipad+magayo khyod ma dang/ [﹚]/u0f74pad+maskrag byed ma dang/ phaT phaT hopad+matsaN+Dika sto/
snying kha dang/ mgo dang/ spyi gtsug dang 9 mig dang/ chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so// dmar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ dkar ba dang ser ba dang/ ljang khu
u dwang/ dud kha'i mdogacan no// bzlas pa'i dus su dgodapa ste// ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// go 'phang gnas ni bzhugs pa
yin// mnyam par bzhag pas drod 'byung ba// rtse gcig dmigs pas blang bya ste// gsungagi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// chos rnams
thams cad rab tu brtag/ rdo rje chu dang rnam snong dang// sbrang rtsi mar dkar lhan cig sbyar// lce li dam tshig sbyor ba yis// snying po'i yi shes do nyid do// bdag po dbu rgyan
[/]la bsgoms la// ci bde ba ni bza' bu khaza'/ lha yi gzugasasu gyur nas su// 'dod pa'i lha yi bdag por skye// bza' ba 'o ma'i btung ba yis// nad/
dang rga ba rnam par sbyangs// sems can rjes su chags pa yi// lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis// byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi// sems sun don ni bla med
mdzad// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis// thugs rje bskyadacingabastan par mdzad// gsang ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang// ngag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub//
sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji lta ba ni bstan pas grol// de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas// sna tshogs du ma mang po yi// dam tshigamachod pa ngomatshar
rmad/ mig phye nas ni bstan pa ni/ daA bar daru sur tasu kha bA hAsu kha ma tAso khyam ya/ sa ma ya ra ma ra ma te/ su ra taso khya ya lngas ma tsa ri taM/ su ga ta swAnam ya pa/
ba bkumyab karma/ sur ta ra tu di a pad+madzA le/ pra bi dzam+ba su ra to ta su kha pad+ma dzule/ pu+inamAnarta su kha sa de na pad+madzule/ bra bi madzrasu ra ta ma ba sa bi shu le heha
tsa/ a sa ma su kha su kha ta dzem yi ram ra ma ho/ sur ke tusu kha ba hUM bi ti ti dzamu kra dzam te dza ni/ han dngahob rA1/ sa su kha ho hUM ho ho su ra to trar ga su kha ra ti ri
na ba ra ma bar ho// pa ra ma red tumahAsu kha to/ su kha ma nu yon pa ra me shu raho/ hob+hag ban ma hAsu lo hU~Mho/ ba hu pi ti ba ti bi shA dzAr ti bi
sha ma ho/ su ra tisu khaM gtsitIpa ram mahAsu kha ho/ su kha mnu gro lngato/ su ra ta ut+tam san di su laM a Aro liko/ a mo nAsu kha gro sbyaho/ glu 'di dag ni blangs
tsam gyis// dga' zhing bde ba yang dag 'dus// bde bachen po yid 'dod pa// dngos grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur// 'khor tshogs chon po byin brlabs nas//
dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che// pad+madra ba'i sdom pa yin// mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud blama'i blam las/ gsagi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
de nas gzhan yang bshad byab// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// gzhal yas brtsegs ma'i dbus dag tu// 'khor lo mchog nidagod par bya// sngonapo'i mdog can
gzi brjid che// gsang ba las byungartsibs brgyud pa/ de yi dbus su pad+mani// sna tshogs pad+mage sar can// 'dabamakhargyud du bshad pa ste// rnam dag gdan du
byas pa yin// de yi dbus su zla ba sgom// derani zla ba khyab pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// lha mchog grol zhing bzhengs par 'gyur/ dao oM ma hAsu
la a la la ho/ ma hAsu ra ta tsu sur dusu khepa yokasu ra su ri pa go su ta ma klu bo susaMsu ba mnasid+d+hAho/ su ra tapa ya so khyu ma ya/ o AhU~Mho: b+ha ga wanam su kha ut+ta ra/
ut+tar/ sadz+dza ut+tas so khya sa ya hU~M/ a la la ho/ ma yAsu kha hU~M/ pa ra ma su khA ma 'du+i ba ut+tam la su khaM a la la ho// su ra taso khya ma ya/ bcom
ldan bde ba chen po ni// 'khor dang bcas par mnyam par bzhengs// thugs kyi'akhor lo zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa'i
zhabasakyis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mtshab rnam par gtsig pa/ sngo ba dang/ dkar ba dang/ ser ba dang/ dmar ba'i zhal// rdo rje dang dril bus
'khyud pa// khyab 'jug gi mgo bo phyagan bsnams pa/ khyab 'jug gi pags pa rlon pa brgyang nas phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o// lhag ma sku'i mkha' 'gro dang
mtshungs so// thod pa'i 'breng ba can/ mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'chang ba/ mgo de'i 'brang bas ska rags bcings pa/ rdo rjesemasadapa' dbu rgyanatsan// zla ba phyed
pa'i rgyan yapa 'chang// sna tshogs rdo rje cod pan gnon// stag gi gas pa gos su mnabs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma ni zhal gcig
pa phyag gnyis kha spyan gsumakha/ sku grol ba/ gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i sa rags can/ phyag g.yon pa thodapa thogs pas 'khyud pa/
g.yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzubacan// ska rags g.yar ka'i sgra sgrog pa// chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong ba// 'byung 'gyur ba bye ba med// chos kyi dbyings te stong pa yin//
mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/ bya byedapa yang de bzhin sgom// sbyor ba mchog gi dam pa ste// rnam dag legs par brtags nas su// mnyam nyid chos kyi ro gcig byas//
'khor 'khol ni rnam par blta// shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro dang// lho phyogs 'am de bzhin te// nub phyogs dum skyes ma dang ni// byung phyogs gzugs can ma de
bzhin// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu'i mdog can mchog dam pa// thod pa dang nib TaM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug de bzhin te// spyan gsum pa la
bzhin rnams bsgyur// gcer bu skyagrol 'jigasaphacan// g.yas brkyang baya gnas pas bzhugs// 'dod pa'i chags pas legs par myos// cung zad ngo tsho'i
mig zur dang// nu ma rab rgyas dag pa 'dzin// zhal gyi mchab cung zad gtsigs// phyag rgya lnga yis rgyayang gdab// mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ ye shes
bdud rtsis gang ba dgod// de steng byang chub sems kyis ni// yongs su gang ba gzhag par bya// thugs kyi 'khor le'i shar phyogs su// pu li ra ma la ya na thod
pa'i dum bu dang/ rab gtum ma ste dkarapo'o// byang du lamaran kengs chen po dang/ gtum mig ma ste ser po'o// nubatu orgyan keng rus can dang/ 'od
ldan m sta dmar po'o// lce phyogs su ar pu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ sna chenam ste ljang khu'o// ma'i phyogs na go dAb rin lhadagradang/ dpa' ba'i/
blo gros ma nam mkha'i mdog can ma'o// bden bral du ra mengashA ra na 'od dpag med dang/ mi'u thung ma skye dkar skya'o// rlung gi phyogs na de bi ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang//
lang ka'i dbang phyug ma sa ljang khu dang mu tig lta bu 'o// dbang ldan na ma la ba na rdo rje lus dang/ shing grib ma ste pad+madang ser skya'o// thugs kyi 'khor lanam mkha' la
spyod pa'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni gdong gcigapa/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'a pa'i cod pan/ thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu'i
phyag gnyis 'khyud pa// g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis la kha TaM ga dang nying te'u 'chang/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// rab
gtumam lasogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcigapa/ phyag gnyis pa/ sdigs mdzub kyis thod pa 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ser skya'i gzugs
za cano// sgra grol ba/ gzugs gnyis pa/ gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan pa/ phyogs kyi gos can rnam par rol pa/ mgrinapa'i nor bu dang/ gdu bu dang/
dpung rgyan dang/ rna cha dang/ tshangs pa'i skud pa dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ mgongo'i 'phrengab dang/ g.ye tsaka'i ska rags can/ sgo dang zur gyi lha mo rnams // khA
gdong gshin rje sreg la sogs// ji ltar mkha' 'gro mdog bzhin du// rwa gdeng la sogs de bzhin no// mtshams rnams lha mo dbazhin te// gzugs gnyis 'dzin cing
yid 'phrog pa'o// phyag sogs de ltar bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tustsol// ye shes 'khor le de mthong nas// mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang
bsgyur// sgom pa rtsa gcig byas na ni// bdagamed ma yi go 'phang gnas// snying po ye shes dam tshigani/[– ]/sgrub pos 'dod pa kun kyi phyir// sku gsung thugs la rnam
bkong nas// sangs rgyas mchog ni rnam par spro// rtag tudam tshig bskyang bya zhing// ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu/u0f38/ ngam tshig mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du
bzlas pa bya// so btsit+tarU kig a paM puphaT/ pA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM swahA/ snying po'o// oM hUM dpa da hU~MphaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 badzrat+tA ki nIhUM phaT swahA/
nyeba'i snying po'o// oM sarba badzra DA ki nI ye badzrapaN+NanA ya 6pUphaTasAhA/ snying bo dang nye ba'isnying po'o// o TIki nI yehUMphaT/ oM lAme hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro hu[%]phaT/

ste daru ka nam mkha'i mdog can no// homig 'a ste rdo rje nyi ma gser btso ma lta bu 'o// phaT daMno yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon chaste rta mchog ljapa' ser skya'o// oM khaM

'gro ba du ma'i bsam pa la// thugs kyi rdo rje tshul can 'di// gnyis med sbyor ba mtha' yas pa/ srid pa kun gyi dngos por gnas// nges med cing nga rgyal med/ yi

'as nasan// gla 'di yis ni skul bar byed// hUM rol cig rol cig dgyes pa bo// bde bachen po'i rdo rjen// bde ba chen po ro nyid las// 'di nyid du ni bzhengs
su gsol/ sa la le ho dgyes pa che// khyod ni bde ba'i mchog yin te// khyod kyi zhalan khums tsam gyis// bdagagis 'dir ni ri ci red// kye ma'o bcom ldan bde

la dongagyes pa che// bcom ldan 'dod la dgyes pa khyod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par stsol// pad+mamchog la dgyes par rol// o a la la bodagyes pa cha/

serab dang/ dmar ba dang/ ljang khu'i zhal te/ spyan gsum pa// phyag bcuganyis pa/ g.yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan zhabs 'og tu
mnanang// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas dam tshig rdo rje phag mo 'a 'khyud pa/ phyag gnyis po ni tshogs bdag gi pags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i gsum pa na cang/
te'u/ bzhi pa la dgra sta/ lta pa la gri gug/ drug pa la rdo rje mdung bsnamasapa/ phyag g.yon pa'i gsum pa na rdo rje kha TaM ga/ bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/
lta pad rdo rje nags// drug pa la bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsnams nga ral ba'i cod panargyan tshacan// dbu la thod pa'i 'phreng ba 'chang// zla ba phyed pa dbu 'a 'dzin//
dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan// 'jigs pa'i mtshang rnam bsgyur zhal// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi pags pa gos sumanabs// mi yi mgo bo'i 'phreng
ba 'dzin// mgrin nang gdu bu rna ma dang// mgo yi nor bus rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i skudapa thal ba ste// phyag drug tu rab tu grags// de yi pang na btsos
ldan ma// dam tshig rdo rje pag mo ni// sku mdog de dpa 'dra bar bya// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyisaM pa// spyanaganyis pa la skra grolaMkha// gcer bu ska rags 'og pag
gis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas 'khyud pa ste/ bdud kyi khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa/ g.yas pa na sdigs mdzub rdo rje dang

lha me dgong pa yis// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// mkha' 'gro ma dang lam dang// dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// g.yon phyogs bskor ba'i dgong pa pos//
rnal 'byoram la dngos grub stsol// gnag cing sar la de bzhin dmar// ljang khu drag po'agazugs can te// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum gi sa

phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan// gnagacing sngo la ltung ba dang// shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can// serazhing gnag la ljang khu ste// snying rje'i ri ni yongs su rdzogs//
dmar zhing gnag la lta ba dang/ sgog pa la sogs nyams kyi 'khor// lcang zhigunag la ser ba dang// 'jam zhi khro bas 'jigs pa dang// thod pa dang ni pat+taM/

sgom// sngar bshad rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// go cha bzhin du dgod par bya// dbang chen dang ni chu dang ni// me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi// de yi dbus su bkod pa ni//
sa phyogs bzhi po dag yin no// ltung byed sa dang gsod ma nyid// 'gugs byed ma dang gar ma dag/ de nyid nam mkha'i khams yin te/ pad+ma'i dra ba stong pa yin//
gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad yin// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes garadabang rgyal po ste// 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste//

mnyam par bsnol ba/ bde ba chen po'i snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ dmar ba dang/ ljang khu dang/ ser ba dang/ sdo ba'i zhal gdug cing 'jigs par mdzad pa'o// bcom
ba ldan 'das kyi zhal dpasku mdogaji ltakha/ phyag dang sku mdog kyang de bzhin du phyes te/ 'di rnal 'byor pa mchog gis nang gi gnas la sogs pa'i rim par dgod do// bu ste thod ba'i
dum bu dang/ rab gatum ma nimab 'go/ su ki rusachen po dang/ gtu5pa'i mig can ma ni spyi gtsug la'o// oste kengs canadang/ 'od ldan mni rna ba g.yas par ro//
a ste mche ba rnam par gatsog pa dang/ snachenamani spyi bo'i rgyab tu ste gnas so// go ste lha dag dang/ dba' bo'i blo gros mni rnabagayonaparo// rAsAsmin ma'i dbus su ni do
dpag med dang/ mi'u thu ma'o// de ste mig gnyis su ni rdo rje'i 'od dang/ lang ka'i dbang phyugama'o// mAste dbu rtsa ran rdo rjes lus dang/ shing grib ma 'o// taba'i gnas
te thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la spyod pa'o// kAsnyemachan khung gnyis su ni myu gu can dang/ sa srungs ma'o// o ste nu ma gnyis su rdo rje ral pa can dang// 'jigs byed
chen mo ste zhing ngo// sku lte ba'i dbus su stobs po che dang/ rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko sta sna rtse ra ni rdo rje hUMmadzad dang/ chapa'athungs ste nye ba'i zhing ngo// kas ba 'a ni rab
bzang dang/ sngo bsangs lhamo'o// lAste mgrin par ni rje rje 'od dang/ rab bzam ste tshan de ngo// kAsusnyiba'ani rdo rje 'jigs byed dang/ rta sna ma'o// hastobashang sgol
ni mig mi bzadang/ byagadong ma'o// nye ba'i tshan de ngadaste lagasung 'khor las la spyod pa'o// pra ste mtshanam la ni stobs po ched/ 'khor le'i shugs/
ma'o// gri sta gzhang lan rdo rje rin chen dang/ dum skyes ma'o// 'dus pa 'an no// so ste brlaganyis su ni dmagrinadang/ chang 'tshong ma'o/ su te byin pa gnyis la ni
nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khopale'i go cha ma'o// nye ba'i 'dus pa can no// nase sor mo rnams la ni dpal du ka dang/ shin dpa'ame'o// sis rkang bol gnyis su ni/
pad+magar gyi dbang phyug dang/ stobs chen ma'o// dur khrod de// ma ste mthe bong gnyis la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor 'osgyur ma'o// kusnye pus me gnyis su rdo rje semA
dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus chenamo'o// nyeba'i dur khrod de sku'i bakhor 'as 'og na gnas pa'o// mkha' 'gromani rdo rje lAm ni dril bu/ dum skyes ma dgazugasacanam
nigla po che'i pags pa 'dzinapa'i khu tshur/ khragadong ma ni rdo rje mdung/ 'ug gdong ma ni lcagasakyu/ khyi gdong ma ni gri gug/ phag gdong ma ni cang te'u/ gshin rjesregam/
ni thod pa'i kha gam/ gshin rje pho nya ma ni zhagasapa ma gshin rje mchob man tshangs pa'i mgo bo ma/ gshin rje 'joms ma ningag snyam/ byang chub kyisams kyi snod ni
zhal bzhi'i ngolo/ sa'i khams bde bas ma/ chu'i khams ni gsodam/ me'i khams ni 'gugasam/ rlung gi khamasanigar gyi dbang phyug ma/ namamakha'i khams
ni pad+ma'i dra po cano// gzugs kyi 'aponi rnam par snang mdzad/ tsher ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma// 'du shes kyi phung po ni bad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal
bo/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dba'aste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyidano dang la nged ra ka'o// mig gnyis nigatismug rdoN+Da/ rna ba gnyisan zhi
sngang rdo rje/ sna ni ser sna rdo rje/ kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje/ reg bya ni phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad 'ani dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni mi 'khrugs pa/ ngag ni tshe/
dpag med/ lus ni rnam par snang mdzad do// o hasnying la rdo rje sems dpa'/ na matamago la rnam par snang mdzad/ swa haduspyi gtsug lapagar gyi dbang phyug/
bo za byed dpung gnyis 'a he ru ka/ hUM mig gnyis su rdo rje ma/ phaTahayan lag thams cad du rdzumchog gi khe cha'o// o TaM lce bal rdo rje phag mo'o// yo snying la ya
mi ni'o// sdomo kha la rmongs byed ma'o// sdomr-imago la skyod byed ma'o// hUMhUMspyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o// phaT phaT tsan+ti ka ste yan lag klan sa rud kyi go cha'o//
mdzub mo mdud byas gungame nges bapaspyir/ mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar// de yi dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas// bskor zhing bskor
bas kun tu bskor bar bya// rkang bo mnan cing stong du blta// gyen du pho kyi sgra sgrog cing// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnamA
'gugs// hU~M baM ho: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgagacing rab tu gzhug ste btsong la dbang du bsdu'o// dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma des nam mkha'i dkyil
'khor yongs su gang bar mthong bzhin thod pa bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang bas stang stabs dang bcas pas dbabaskur dbul la// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang// de bzhin
gshegs kumakhrusagasol ba// lha ya tshuni dgapa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o// oM sam+ba tathA ga ta a b+hi Tika sa ma yapa'i6/ rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi
stongadu thor// de yi le abaskyod pa la/ ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis yongs su gangab/ thuba'i cha bcu drug pa la yi ge dang AoM gyis byin gyis brlabs to/ yi ge gsum pa'i sgo
ba las 'khor lagasum 'byung bar sgom mo// oM sa ma ya shud+d+hasarba d+harAs ma yang shud+d+horAhaM chos thams cad kyi bcudamanyam paganas pa bsam mo// ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba
yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chub tung ngo// u0f00 badzraa mr-ita u da kaTha rta dra a khaM hU~Mo ! ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor 'tsho mchog ni rnam par spro// dung chen
'phreb blangs nas ni// de nas de la bzlas pabya// rang srogastsol ba byas nas ni// bsgoms pas de ma thag tu 'bar// oM badzra shrI he ru ru kaMdzu[%]pha/ oMt+taki nI dzA
lasaMkha'i sAhA/ og+hihaha6hU~MphaT/ snying bo dang nyeba'i snying po/ o badzrab i ro tsa nI ye hU~MhUMphaT/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzrab ts+tshani ya hUMphaT swAhA/ lha mo'i sipo
dang nye ba'i snying po'o// cis dza' boram gyur na// de ltar bzlas shing bsam gtan bya// ngalabar gyur ni rnam dag sgom// de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te//
gzhen/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'groma'o// tshor ba dranapa nye bar gzhag pani lAma'o// chos dranapanya bar gzhag pani dum skyes ma'o// sems dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rab tu gtumamo'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ni gtum pa'i miganyanama'o// dpyod pa'i
'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi skadapanis chen ma'o// ye shes kyi pad+ma rnam par sbyabago/ dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo chen ma'o// brtson//
'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o// dran pa'i dbang po ni langaka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam
par sbyar ba'o// shes rab kyi dbang po nis srungs ma'o// dad pa'i stobasan 'jigs byed chen mo'o// brtson 'grusakyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i stobs ni
chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobasani sngo bsangs lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyiyan lagani rta rnama'o// brtson 'grus
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagani bya gdong ma'o// gsung gi 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa
ka yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dumaskyes ma'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha
ma'o// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagani shin tudapa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chenama'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// yang dag pa'i
ngag ni dpa' bo chenamo'o// sku'i 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o// yang dgapa'i las kyi mtha' ni khA gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni'ug pa'i gdong canano// yang dag pa'i rtsol
bani khyi'i gdong canano// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni bgag gdong ma'o// rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal ru ka// shin tu rnam
bar dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang gi ngo bo ni bdag kho na'o// dge ba'ichosam skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni gshin rje sreg ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyasapa rnams yabadag
par srub ni gshin rje pho nyamo'o// mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spongab ni gshin rdzomachab ma'o// mi dgekha'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyod panagashin rje'ajo sa
ma'o// dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i rnam par sbyang ba'o// 'di ltar ma lus pa bsgoms na// sgrub pos nges par 'grub par 'gyur// sems can don du rnal 'byor bdag mnyam
nyid dam tshag dam pa'o// 'khor lo lnga po so so yin/ cho ga so so'i dbye bsgom// mngal skyes so so'i dbyabadag/ 'khor lo lnga yi mchog nyid na// rnal 'byos
sogs gtsor sgom pa// so so'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin// ji ltar rdo rje he ru ka/ de bzhin lha mo'idabus suni// sangs rgyas mkha' 'grom sbyor ba// rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor
bzhin// rdo rje sku yi dpa' bo dag/ b+haga'idabus su rnam par sgom// ji ltar sgomapa'i rim pa yis// de lta'akhor lo gsum du sbyor// b+ha ga lnga po bdag gis sgom/
dbus sumakha' 'gro ma sbyor dang// pad+ma'i mkha'a'agro ma'i sbyor dang// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma byel// b+haga'idabus su 'khoralagasum/ te ka
ni mchog nyid sgom// dam tshig 'khor lo bsgoms pa la// dam tshig mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor// ye shes mkha' 'groma'i dkyil 'khor// sna tshogs pad+mal
sogs dbus// ye shes 'khor lo'i sbyor bdag/ de 'di b+ha ga'i dbus dag tu// 'khor lo lnga po dag la sgom// dpa'abo gcig pu he ru ka/ bzhin phagamo de bzhin du//
sku mdog zhal dang phyag dang mtshan// de nyid sna tshogs par sgrom// de nyidapad+ma'i dbus dag tu// de ru ka nimchog nyid sgom// thod pa lhan cigamanyam par ni// lnga yi dbye
ba bdag sbyor te// rnal 'byor ma yi rim pa sgom// b+ha ga'idabus su rnam par sgom// 'khor lo'i bdag po mthong ma gyur// 'khyud pa yi niphyag rgya can// dpa'abo
'khor 'bro po la bsam// rang rang gi ni rnal 'byor ma// snying du sbas pa rnam par sgom// tshogasakyi 'khor lornal 'byor ni// phyagabazhiyas ni rnam par mdzes//
gnyis ni 'khyudapa'i phyag yin te// gzhanani snatshogs mtshanam 'dzin// phyag gnyis dag ni'akhyud pa dang// de yi b+haga'i dbus su ni/ dpa' bos sgom pa mamathong ngo//
00 kun rdzob spras pa'i sbyor ba ni// sgom pa'i mchog kyang ma mthong ngo// sgo nga las skyes rim sbyor ba'i// sgom pa'i rnam par sgom pani// lnga po 'dus pa'ibasamal ste//
sgong skyes mchogani sgom pa 'o// 'khor lo'adabye ba'i dbye ba yis// 'di ltar rnal 'byor sgom pa 'o// ji ltarebasam pa'i bye bragagis// de ltar 'dod pa sgom pa'o//
bdagapo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par sgom// lha mo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// bdag po yang ni rnam par sgom// ming gi dbye ba'i dbe ba yis//
mkha' 'gro ma yi sgra la sbyor// yang na skugasum dbye gang gis// de ni bdag por bya gang yin/ bdag po la sogs dbye ba yis// 'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin//
rigs kyi dbye ba thams cad kyis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yas dbya// mnga'askyes glu yis sbyor ba yis// sgom pa rnams ni yongs su brtag/ sgong skyes glu ni mod
ba ste// sgradang sgra nyams spangs pa'o// 'di ni rang byungabcom ldan 'das// rnal 'byor bde ba'imchog dem pa// kha cig gzhi rnal 'byor 'dod// khacig rnal
'byora'adod min te// glasgra' sogs spangs pa yi// dngos po mdapa'i go 'phang bzhugs// phra zhing mi zad dngos po med// gzung 'dzin pa rnamasngasala'o//
klu sgra lasags pacas bams/ ga 'ayabasams/glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yis// go 'phang mchog bag lengs sbyong ni// glu sgra la sogs srangs pa yi// dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs//
za phra zhing me zad dngos po med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o// go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni// glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad
kyang/ phan dang snying brtse bdag gis bza'// sems can don la brtson pa yis// bzodapa brtson 'grusamag dmapa// rnal 'byor pas klumasmadacing// mkha'
'gro mas ni phan par dgyes// nyo nga srid pa gsum na bde brnyes gtso// a la la ho/ rgyal ba bde can 'phrong ba'i tshogs// palani rdo rje rol// a la la ho/ bde
gshegs bral ba'i bzhad las grol// bdag po dgyes pa kun gyi bcud// chags pas rab tu dgyes mdzad cing// srid pa gsum na tshogs kyi bcud// a la'aho/
dgyes pas mngon par grol bapo// bdag ni 'dod las rab grol mdzod// Al las ni byung ba yi// pad+mayi ni rnal 'byor pas/ glayi rgyal po 'di blangs pas// rdo
rje rnal 'byor bde ba ni// ba'i dri ba las bzhengasaso// 'dis bskul bas nimagon po rnams // bde chen bde phyir gzhal yas nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad bzhes 'khrung
[5; ]rgyulab ma lus skye bar 'gyur// gludabacasapa'i dngos po med// sgong skyes rmani spangasapa yi// de yi gzugs ni ma mthong ste// bde ba med cing sdug bsngalamed/
gnyis su med cing dngos po med// brtag pa'i spyod yul rnam par brtag/ chos dang chos las rnam grol zhing// sdig pa nyes pas mi gos so// thamasacad gnyis med rnam
grol ba'i// sgoskyes dngos po dang bcas yin// glus ni gnyid las sad pas na// rmongs pas mkhas pa mi smadado// ma rtogs pa dang rtogs bya'i phyir// sems can
don du sangs rgyas so// zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo/[” ]/gnas skyes rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// rigs skyes mamo skyes lha mo// mi snyang makha' spyodam de bzhin/ tha ma'i
skye ba mchog nyid de// bar ma sna tshogs dam pa yin// sum cu pani sa la spyod// sa 'og spyod pa 'og naganas// gnod sbyin m dang klu mo dang// mi 'am cimo dri za mo//
lha mo thams cad sngon grub dang// gzhan yang bde gshegs bsam pa can// dkonamchog gsum la bdag dga' ba// thams cad phyi yi dkyil 'khor lo// snachogasaklu
ninyer spyadacing// rtag tukluniblang ba@#// sna tshogs ro yi bde ba yis// lha mo mkha' 'gro'i gtso bomchog/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// sku yi 'kholo
rnam par sgom// mkhas pas tshul rab gnasanas// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgom// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// thugs kyi dkyil/
'khor bde bache// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa// ye shes dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// de la bsam bzhin rnam par sgom//
b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus suni// sna tshogs pad+ma'i rnam par sgom// nyima'i dkyil 'khor dbus suni// dpa' bo gcig bu rnam par sgom// 'khor lo pad+mado snga'aphreng// 'khor
gsumapo yongs su bskor// ji ltar dam tshig mchog 'khor// sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'phrang gis bskor// yi dwags rnam pa las de bzhin// phyi rol dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor//
phyi rol dur khrod ma rungs pa'i// pags mdog can mchog dam pa// sna tshogs shingani mnyam dga' ba// khyi dang ce spyang 'jigs pa dang// bya rog 'gu pa chu sbyar dang// bya rgod
dang nisi bi ka/ sreg pa'is yang de bzhin te// keng rus gsalangashing bskyon pa dang// rag reg bsregs pa rnam par 'phyang// dbazhin phyed tshig phyi ma tshig/ mgo bo thod pa rje
radang// khogapa lag pa mgo bo dang// ce spyang sgrani sgrog pa dang// sprulani tshogs dga' bar gnas// seng me phagadang stagadang ni// ra dang lug dang de bzhin te// glang
po khyi dang khob glang// mo sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang// chang gi btung ba'i mchog rnams dang// dpa' bo 'dus nga 'i mchog dag dang// rnal
'byor mni mchog sna tshogs/ thod pa btsug 'dzin cing// gri gug cang te'u mchog rnams dang// sna tshogs lha yi rnga dag dang// romchog bza' bsna tshogs dang// sna tshogs
num pa A kA// ku sha le mchog dam pa dag/ de lta bu yi dur khrod du// gnod sbyin ro langs srin pol// gtor ma de la sbyin bya zhing// he ru ka yigazugs rnams sgom//
ca te'u rdzorjephril bu dang// sil snyan gar rnams rab tu bya// phyogs kyi gosacan phyag rgya sbyor// hUM phaTabaco'i sgra 'byin cing// zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis//
'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// khanidam tshig gis bkang nas// 'di la gsang sngags rjes dran bya// o A ral ho hUM ho/ badzra DA ki nI sa ma ya hU~M mr-i to/
'di gsum mam ba lngaru// yang dang yang dubarjod par bya// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// thod par de rnams la yapasbyin// rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas// 'dil/
gsang sngags gdab par bya// oM kha kha khA hikAhi/ sam+bayak+Sha rAkas b+hUtape ta potsa/ unamA da a pa smA kaNAkicud ya: i maM ba liM khrinus ma ya rak+khaMtu/ mamasarbasid+d+hi//
pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya thi bi ya theN+NaM/ b+huny+dzatha/ pi ba tha/ rdzug+hAtha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba kar ta yA sad su kha pa shud+d+hal sa taye kaM b+hakhenu pu/u0f74phaTawaNasAny+tsa/
chog 'di yi rim pa yis// thun mtshams bzhi sbyin par bya// gcig pu bde bar gnas nas su// ma dmaM sa don bya ste// rnal 'byoraM mnyam par gzhaganaMsan// 'di'i
thams cad bza' bar bya// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gnyis su med pa'i 'khor le'i rim par phye bstan pa ste le'u dgu pa'o//
gzhanayang bshad bya ba// dgapa'iganas kyi chog ste// gsang ba'i cho ga'i gsang ba ni/ mkha' 'gro ma yi snying bo mchog/ gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba// dngos
grub thams cad stsol ba yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad la dbang phyug chen po'i rdo rje 'khor dang mag gzhug dang bcas pa/ mkha' 'gro chen po dang/ mkha' 'gro
ma'i tshogs rnams dang/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'dasakun tu bzang po chenapo rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams rang gi bdag po la phyag byas te gsol pa/ a ma'o bde ba'i sems dpal khyod//
e ma'o bdeba'i gtso bo yis// mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang ba mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// rdo rje rnal
khyomchog gyur ba// rang gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs/ 'jig rten gsum gyi bde ba 'byung// rdo rjerin chenapad+mache// snatshogs sbyor dang sna tshogasaga'/
ragi dkyil 'khoradag pagasus// rdo rje rnam snang las 'byung ba// gzhal yas zur bzhi rebatumadzes// sgo bzhidang ni yang dag ldan// rgyan rnams thams cad
yongs su rdzogs// dkyil 'khor bde ba las byung ba// deyodabusasu 'khor lo gnyis// thugs dang gsung gi 'khor 'amchog/ rtsibs brgyad pa la sngo dadamar//
jo rdzopad+mas rnam par bskor// phyi rol 'khor los bskorab shrI/dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchogagisani// phyi rol rnal 'byor masna tshogs// glu dang garagyis rnam
par rol// phyi rol yi dgas 'phrongapa yi// sna tshogs mdoganimchog dam pa// lag pa'i gar gyis gar byed pa// gdod ni rnam bsgyur lce yang bskyod// dadabus stong
par gyur pa ste// zla bar yi ge Umchog yin// der ni rdo rjes khyab pas// rdo rjesams dang 'a rnam par sgrom// zhal gsum phyagazhig pa ste// sku gsum snying rje'i nyamA
da ldan// phyag chadang yapadage ldan// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan stongs su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus suni// dkar zhing skyo lagur
@#/ ku ma zhal// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// thod pa dang ni kha Ti 'dzin// rdo rjephril bus ya ngadag 'khyud// cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'chang// mi bskyod
za pa yi cod pan 'dzin// mkha' 'gro'i gnas ni dgod bya ste// dpa' bo'ang de bzhin dgong par bya// khams dngaphupo skye mched rnams // sku gsung thugs su rnam par sgom//
lhamo'ang de 'dra'i gzugs can te// phyugargya chenapo bde ba yin// snying khar maM gyi sa bon ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// soganyis dang ni bcas pa ru// sngon du
dngos grubarjes dran nas// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// de ma thag tulha mo yi// snying kha'i gsang ba'i papal// chags par spyod par gyur nas su// mgon po chen po
chags pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chos// de dang lhan cig rol pa ste// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor bar 'gyur// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// yid ni dga'
bar gyur nas su/ dga' ba yi ni bsams pa yis// cang te'u'i sgra yis bskul nani// mnyam nyid dga' las bzhes par 'gyur// A li kA'i mnyam sbyor ba//
bde ba chen po dgyes par 'gyur// de nas nam mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa tham sa cad kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa
dang/ gsang ba'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'grom dang bcas pas khyab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos mdun du bdar ba/ ma lus shing lus pa med nga 'i mkha' 'gro
dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang/ phyi'i rig ma'i bdaganyid pho nya dang pho nya ma'i tshogs rgya che ba rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig gis lta zhing mnyam par 'khyud de/ gar gyi rnam par
'phrul pa yis// dga' bachen pos langs nasani// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// byin gyis brlabs kyis dgyes pa yis// mgon po chen po dgyes pa yi// klu
'di dgagis bskul bar bya// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// e ma'o ngomatshar rmad kyi lugs// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsang// e ma'o bde ba las byung ba// ma mas/
kun tu bzang po'i don/ a ma'o bde ba yang dag 'dus// e ma'o bde chenadag pa ste/ e ma'o bde ba bde ba'i mchog/ e ma'ogasang sngags mnyamasbyor ba// a ma'o thug
kyi spyod pa ste/ (a ma'o mnyam nyid phyag rgyar ldan// e ma grubapa yang dag 'byung// am pha rol phyin pa yis// oM ma rig pa rjes chagasapa// e masna tshogs 'a sachen bo/
e mo ba sbyar gsum dag pa// e ma rdo rje mnyam la sbyor/ a ma pad+ma rnam 'byed pa/ e ma dbangapoganyis mnyam ldan// e ma rmad byung mnyam pa ste// e ma dag pa'i gar
chenate// e ma dri med glu re legs// e ma 'ol mo legs sbyor ba/ a ma phaDa kyisan selab// e mame tog na bza' mdzes// e ma bdug pa/
zla g+ha ti bdug/ e ma sgron mgati mug sel// e ma dri mchogabasil ba ste// e ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba// e ma sgyu 'phrul mkha' lta bu // e ma gdod nas sangs rgyas
gdod nasardo rje ste// e ma gdod nas rin chen bde ba rab stsol ba// e mgadod nas pad+ma gdod nas bris pa ste// e mo snatshogs sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba yin// e
ma ngo mtshar rmad sangs rgyas// e ma ngo mtshara'adi nyidarmad/ daa ma ngo mtshar sems can rnams // e ma ngo mtshar lcamo yin/[“]'dis bskul ba ni mgon po rnams //
mchog tu sbyor ba'is bon las// gur kum gyinimadog lta bu // rdo rjes mtshan pa 'byung bar 'gyur// zhal drug phyagani btsuganyisapa/ phag mo yis ni rnamapar brgyan//
dpa' chen 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// skyil krung phyed par yang dgaganas// spyan gsum pa la rab tu bzhad// dragacing 'jigs la rngam pa dang// snying rjegar gyi nyams canate//
'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dgu/ zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs// zhabs g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor 'byung ba chen po skyes// zla ba'i
tshadakyil 'khor dbus suni// sna tshogs pad+madag la bzhugs/ ge sar gsar pa'i mdog can la// phyag rgya des ni rnam par brgyan// sngo zhing lnga pa' serab dang//
dmar zhing dkaral zhi bsta// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyasagazugs kyis rnamapar mdzes// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i kutsa 'tshar
ba dang/ tshangasapa'i skud pa 'dzin mdzad cing// drag po'i 'jigs byed lpags pa ni// rked pa 'chi zhing bzhugs pa yin// thod pa ba TaM ga 'dzin cing// lagri ut+pal
mda' bsnams shing// lcagasakyu zhags pa cang te'u// mgo bo gzhu yang de bzhin no// de yi sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhin// rdo rje phag mo chen moni// chags pa chenapo'i
go 'phang gnas// byin pa gtas kyis legs par 'khril// dga' b chen mo yid 'ong ba// mgo bo'i 'phrang bas sku lus brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par mtshan//
'di ltar sngags pas bsgoms byas te// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che// gnas sogs bdag por sbyor ba yis// ye shes lasogasabadag po kun// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sbyor
bstod// sdom pa sdom pa'i mchog yin no// thog ma thugs kyi'akhor lo ste// shar phyogs kyi rtsibs su pu li ram la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang/ rab gtumam ste dkar ba dang//
sngo ba dang/ ljang khu'o// byang phyogs su dz+wa lamar dkeparus chen po dang/ gtum mig ma ste ser ba dang/ sde bdang/ ltakhu'o// nub phyog
su o nan keng rus canadang/ 'od ldan m ste dmar ba dang/ spro ba de/ ljang khu'o// lce ru ar pu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ snachenam ste ljang bu dang/
sar ba dang/ dmar ba'o// ma'i phyogs la go da ba rir lha dgra dang/ dpa' ba'i blo gros ma sta dmar ba dang/ ser ba dang/ ljang khu'o// bden bral du ra me shwa ra na 'od
dpag med dang/ mi'u thungam sta dkar ba dang/ sor ba dang/ ljang khu'o// rlung gi phyogs su de bi ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang/ lang ka'idabang phyug ma ste nam mkha'i mdog
can/ sor ba dang/ ljang khu'o// dbang ldan du mu la ban rdo rje lus dang/ shing grib ma sgo ljang khu dung/ ser ba dang/ sro ba'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo ste thod pa'i
dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bon rab gtum ma la sogs pas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzinapas 'khyud pa'o// gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo'ang shar phyogs kyi rtsibs su kA ma rUpan myu gu can
dang/ sa srungs ma sto dkar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ ljapakhu'o// byang phyogs su o tre na rdo rje ral pa canadang 'jigs byed chenamo ste ljang khu dang/ sarabo dang/
0wa/sbyo ba'o// nub tu tIshakunen dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlung gi shugs canAm ste sngo ba dang/ sor ba dang/ ljang khu'o// lho ru ko sa lan rdo rje hUMmadzad dang/ chang 'thung ma
ste dmar ba dang/ so ba dang/ ljang khu'o/ ma'o phyogs su ka ling kar rab bzang dang/ sngo bsangs masu ljang khu dang/ sor ba dang/ dmar ba'o// bden
phral du laM pa ka na rdo rdzo'od dang/ rab bzang ma ste ser bo dang/ sro ba dang/ ljang khu'o// rlung phyogs su kAny+tsin 'jigs byeng chen po dang/ rta nas sta du pa'i mdogadang/
so ba dang/ sro ba'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su nyi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang/ bya gdong ma sti gnam gyi mdog dung/ sor ba dang/ ljang khu'o// gsung gi 'khor
laso myu gu can la sogs panis srungs ma la sogs pas pad+mad pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzinapas 'khyud pa/ de ltar mkha' la spyod padang/ sa 'a spyod pa'i 'khor leganyis po yin no//
gsum pa'i sku rdo rje 'byung ba ni zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgorasre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste sngo ba dang/ sar ba dang/ ljanga'a'o/
byang phyogasakyi sgo la gri hade ba tAn rdo rjerin chen dang/ dum skyes ma ste sor bdang/ sdob dang/ ljang khu'o// nub kyi sgorasorak+Shan rtamagrin dang/ chang 'tshong ma ster merab
dang ser ba dang/ ljang khu'o// lho'i sgorasu waN dI pa nam mkha'i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i gi chams dkar ba dang/ sde ba dang/ lta bu 'o/
ma'i phyogs su nag ra na khrag 'thung dang/ rab dpa' mo snyanam mkha'i mdog dang/ ser ba dang/ ljang khu'o// bden bral dusin+d+hun pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ stobs chen
ma ste sor ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ ljang khu'o// rlung gi phyogs su ma mu tun rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor la sgyu ma ste dkarab dang/ so ba dang/ ljang khu'o// dbang
ldan du ku lu tan rdo rje sems dang 'dang/ brtson 'grusachenamo ste dkar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ ljang khu'o// sku'i 'khor la stobs po che la sogs pa ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la/
sogs pas 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o// dpa' bo 'di thams cad g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa// spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/
thod pa dang/ kha TaM ga dang/ cang te'u dang/ gri gug bsamasapa/ riltar dpa' bo'i phyag dang phyagamtshan bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang de bzhin te/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i
dbu rgyan can// ring gi rigs kyi mchog gis brgyan// thamasacad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin cing// stag gi pags pa gos sumanabs// lha mo dbu skra grol bste/ byin paganyis kyis
legs par 'khril// thams cad phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing// sku lus 'jigs pa rnam par bsgyur// de'i dbus badram pa'i rdo ni// zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs
rdo rje rnam gnon pa'o// phag mo dbu skra grol ba ste// gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can// yeshes 'khor 'bakug nas ni// snga ma'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// bcuganas thim
par rnam par sgom// stong pa bzhi ru byin gyis brlabs// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// gnaM 29 sogs pa'i rim par dgod// khams dang phung po skyemached rnams // sku
gsung thugs kyidam pa ste// sIpo ye shes mchog gyur pa/ dbang bskur yang ni dbul bar bya// de nas go cha dgod bya ste// mkhas pas ye shes bzlas pan// srog rtsol bsdas+sa
te legs bzlas pa// sgomapa' bsgoms pas gsang bar bya// oM AHhU~M/ spro bsdu dag gi sbyor ba yis// gnyisamed 'phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla// de nas dam tshigasams ngapa'i
ni chog bzhin bzlas pa bya// obamany+dzabadzratshu/AhU~M phaT/ DA kinI dzA la saM be ri phyuphaT swAhA/ obadzra bA rA hipUphyuphaTaswAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra khaN+DakapA li hU~M hU~M phaT/[u0f00] pra

pa'i o baN+Da ro hi huphrupha3/ o d+hi pa la gri btsuhU~M phaT/ i shin+ta nI yo[%]phaT/ mduphru A kA sha gargyu lo'i/ otsakra bamiNI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ oMka li ki li he ru kahU~MhU~MphaT/

oMsu bI ra hU~MhU~MphaT/ o si li si li pad+manateshwa ri huphaTi/ oM ma sprub le tshu[%]phaT/ o hi li hi li bo ro tsanI ye hu hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra brtenI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM d+hi li d+hi li badzrasatAhU~MhU~M phaT//
[z ]oM ma hAbI hU~MhU~Mphan/ dung chen 'phreng ba blangasanasazhi// gsang sngags chog bzhin du bzla// dus bzhir sbyor ba byas nas ni// bzlos ngang bsgomapa rtse gcig byu ]/rnal 'byor myur
du grubanasani// gsang sngags grub pa'i rim pa yis// bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan byas nas// sngags pas rtag tu mchod pa rabya// sngags pas dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni/ @#/
sku gsung thugasakyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor mchogani 'grub pa yin// dkyil 'khor lha yi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad rab
tustsol// mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yapabla ma las/ 'khor 'khogasum gyidakyil 'khor gyi choga'i rim pa ste le'u bcupa'o///de nas gzhan yabashad
byab// rigs kyi bya ba'i mchog dam pa/ gnas sogs sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// phyogs kyi rim pas rnam par dbye// thams cad mchog gi sbyor chen po// rnal 'byor dbang
phyug rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sku las nges 'byung ba// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa thams cad dang/ yang dpa' bo dang rnal
'byor ma thams cad 'dus shing 'ongs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde bachen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ mig g.yangs dga' bs gar byed cing/ myur bas bsdus
@#// pa'i rim pa yis// rkangapagayas dang g.yon gyis ni// mdun du gom stabs spros pa yis// 'di ltar rnam bsgyur khros pa'i baspyan// sminam 'degs dang 'khor
bar ldan// skye med phyag rgyur 'gro bdag/ mig gi phyag rgyas phyag 'tshal te// rdo rjesams dpa' chen po la rnam pa du mas bskul nas zhus te/ rnal 'byor mtshan mo thams cad dgyes
pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi de nyid dang// dkyil 'khor mchogani mdzes pa ste// dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bde bache// rol pa'i
bde ba chen po ni// de ring du ni bdag gis red// a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bde bachenapomchog tu dgyes// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// shin tu
! sridapanges ldog pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa che// dkyil 'khor duni rnam par brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rjesems dpa' dgongs shing spyan rnam par phye ste/
'khor bzhi rnam par 'khor ba'i gar gyis sminam 'degs shing/ mdun du gzigs shingagom stabs kyis/ dregs pas sems par rnam 'khor ba'i// sku gsung thugasani rdo rje rang//
ponyi 'di la bzhugs pa yin// dkyil 'khor dang ni dkyil 'khor ming// rdo rjeye shes thugs la gnas// rtog pa med par bdagasbyorab// rdo rjedakyil 'khor mchog yin no// blaba'i ]
dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bani// ngagyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bo/ ri mo mkhan gyidakar po ltar// byang chub sems mchog 'di lta bu // sngo zhing 'bar ba
sna tshogs pa'i// rlung gis bskyod pa'i me lta bu // zla ba phyed pas bdag nyidamadzes// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs// cha brgyad dkyil 'khor yid 'ob/ 'bar pa'i
nyi ma dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor rdo rje rin chen de// bde ba mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'adab brgyad la phyo ba// lte ba gsar gyis khyab pa// pa pad+manyid lasani// dga'
ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba yin// dkyil 'khor mchogani mthong ba na// byin za 'bar badzibazhin du// las kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor du// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
'di ltar de dag mtha' yas pa// dkyil 'khor du ni rab tubartag/ gang du gangal sprul pa ni// rdo rjesams dang la lasabyungayin// thams cad bdaganyid kun tu bzang// namamakha'i
khams ni kun tu khyab// mkha' dbyings sa yi mchog gyur par// khang pa brtsigs par rnam par sgom/ khang pa brtsegs ba'i dbus dkyiladu// dkyil 'khor lnga ni rnam par brtag/
sna tshogs pad+ma mdzes pa 'a// ji ltar gnas su rnam par dgod/ dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// horu kani rnam par sgom// sngar bshang skumadog gnas rnams dang//
phagamo'i bde la rnam par gnas// shar du pu li ma la yar shod pa'i dus bu dang/ rab gtum ma'o// byang du []latsAr kepas chen po dang/ rab gtum ma'i
mig can ma'o// nub tuotsun lakeng rus can dang/ 'od ldan ma'o// lho ru ar pu dmatshab rnam par gtsags pa dang/ snachenama'o// dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor de'ishar gyi dkyil
'khor gyi dbus su go dbarir lha ngag dang/ dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o// shar phyogs su rAme shur 'od dpag medadang/ mi'u thung ma'o// byang phyogs su de bi ko Tan po 'od dang/
langaga'i dbang phyug ma'o// nub du mA ra ba na rdo rje sku dang/ shing grib ma'o// lho phyogs su kAm rU pa na mu gcanadang/ sa sras ma'o// byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
su o sngon rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo'o// shar duphrin ku nen dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlung gi shugs can ma'o// byang du kos la na rdo rjemadzadadang/ chang 'thung
la ma'o/ nub phyogs su ka ling ka na rab bzang dang/ sngo bsangs lha mo'o// lho phyogs su lwa pa kan rdo rje rab bzad/ shinatubawa mo'o// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
sukAny+tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rta rnama'o// shar phyogs su+im la ya namig mi bzang dang/ bya gdong a'o// byang du pe dbu rir stobs po che dang/ 'khor le'i shugs can
[. ]ma'o// nub tukri tade btsun rdo rje rin chenadung/ dum skyesama'o// lcer so ra na rtamagrin dang/ chapa'atshong ma'o// lha phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus susu war+Na dI pa na nam/
mkha'i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'igo chama'o// shar du nag ra na dpal khrag 'thung dang/ rab dpa' mo'o// byung du sin+d+han pad+magar gyi dbang phyug dang/ stobs chen ma'o// nub tu
ma ru na rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// lha ru kulu tan rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang/ rab
gtum ma la sogs pa thams cad kyang gzugs sna tshogs pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ spyan gsum pa// g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lngas rgyas btab pa/
lha mo gcer bu skyagrol ba/ thod pa dang/ khaTaM ga dang cang te'udang ! gri gug dang/ rdo rje dang/ dril bus 'khyudapa/ lha mo'i byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril ba/ dgyesapa
chen po'i dga' ba'i ros rnam par myos pa'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'a bo yin// zur bzhi bum pa'i stongang ni// byang chub sems kyis yongs gang ba'i// thod pa'i smongani
gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi zural ni)/ bum pa'i thod pa gnyis po dgod// mtshams kyi char mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po gzugs phud pa bud med dbang
[uz]@#// phyug ma ste/ zhalagasum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ phyogs kyi gos can sgra grol ba// phyagargya lnga brtan par
'dzin pa'o// rdo rje'aphrong bas yongs bskor ba// dkyil 'khor lnga yi phyi rol tu// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bri// dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyang snyatshogs pad+ma'i
steng du yi dgas kyigadan la bzhugs pa/ sgo bzhi'i shar phyogs su rwa gdong ma khros pa'i mig can/ shel mig khros pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ gri gug dang/ mgo bo dang/ thod nga
dang/ kha khro dang/ dril bu dang/ capata' 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ skragrol ba/ gcer bu sna tshogs pa'i mdog can/ g.yas brkyang bsaganas pa/
yi dgas dang sna tshogs pad+mal bzhugs pa// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs te/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyanapa'o// bug gdong ma dang/ khyimadong ma dang/ phag
gdongamane/ ji ltar lA gdong ma'i mdog dang/ phyag dang/ 'dug stangs dang/ gangan bzhin no// bong bu dang/ phamo dang/ radang/ byi la'i zhal te/ shin tudrag
pos mngon gsol ba'o// gshin rje srog ma nas/ gshin rje'ajoms ma'i bar ni gar byed pa'i dbang phyug ma ste/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas
[@]/brkyang bas gnas// phyogs kyi gos can/ snatshogs pad+ma dang yi dgasamanan pa/ phyag rgya lngas byin gyis brlabs pa// thod pa dang kha TaM ga 'dzin pa/ mgo bo dang gri gug bsnams
pa cang te'u dung/ rdo rje dang/ mdupa'adzin pa// mtshab rnam par gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rang ba/ thams cad kyang mi mgo'i thod pa'i 'phreng ba rgyun du'achang ba/ thod pa'i
'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje sems dpa'idabu rgyan can/ codapan rdo rje'i 'phreng bas byas// rdo rje las byas rgyun can te// sna tshogs rdo rje bla dkyis// dbu la mnan cing brgyan
pa yin// ji ltar bcom ldan mog bzhin du// rdo rjephag mo'i zhal mdog phyag/ phyag rgyu 'dug stangs las kyang de// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// dum bu'iska rags rgyan can te/
'on kyang rdo rje phag mo yi// steng gi zhal gdong dkar po ste// mchob rnam pa ragacigs pa 'o// ji ltar gnas kyi rim pa dag/ 'bum pa mngon brjod rim pa las// rnal 'byor
ma yi dkyil 'khor gyi// la 'u rdo rjesems dpas bshad// gzhanang rdo rjemakha' 'gro dang// mngon brjod rgyud kyi dngapo yi// le'u nges par 'gal ba med// sems pa'i dkyil
'khor gyi ni chog ste/ lnga po lnga pa'i bdag nyid sbyor chen po// sdom pa'i chog sbas pa gsang ba ste// mkha' 'gro ma ni ma lus thams cad kyi// 'di ltar gzhan du bka' yi phyogs bzhin
du bum pa rnam pa snatshogs pa// bum pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin// gser dang dngul las byas pa ste// sna tshogs gos kyisamadzes pa dang// me tog 'phreng
bas rnam par brgyan// 'chi med lnga yis yongs su bkang// rnam lnga smanadang yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang bcas pa dang// 'bru lta dag gis rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor
phyogs dang mtshams rnams su// bum pa bcu drug gzhaganas kyang// mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs mchod// glu dang gar dang bde bache// phyogs kyi gos rgyan sku grol ba// snachogA
rol mo'i sgra dag dang// sna tshogs yi dgas 'phrang ba yis// dkyil 'khor phyi rol yongs su bskor// de yi phyi rol mu khyud kyi// dbus su mkha' 'gro ma yin te// phyi rol sa rigs
kyis bskor ba// dur khrod rnam par 'jigs pa dag/ sna tshogs dums rnam par mdzes// mdun du ye shes dam tshig gi/ dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong nas kyang// mngon brjod dam/
tshig de bzhin mchod// rim pabazhin du dub yang bskur// mkhas pas 'dus la bkod nas ni// gcig pubasdus te thamanas su// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// phung po khams dang
skyemached rnams // go chaganyis po bgo bar bya// 'khor la thams cad rnam bsgoms nas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// lus ngag yid la rnam par dgod// ye shes sems
dpa' snying la dgod// sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba yi// dam tshig lha yi mchod pas mchod// ye shes bzlas pa'i bya ba dag/ gros med pa ni rnam par spros// dung chen 'phreng ba blang
nas su// mnyam par bzhaganas bzlas pa bya// ngani yengashes 'khor lo la// mkhas pas mchod bstod bzlas pa bya// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor pa
yis smon lam gdab// theg pa chen po'i chos rnams ni// rnal 'byor pa yis myur bas 'grub// oM badzra re ru ru kaM kA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM upUphasAhA/ o hihahahuM hU~M phaT//

bsgom dang bzlas pa bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas po 'phel/ yid du 'ong ba'i dngos grub thob// sgong skyes dbye ba'i mchogadam pa// sbyor bas 'dod pa thams cad stsol// ji lta'i las
rnams byas nasani// 'grub par yang ni the tsom med// sbyor ba'i dngos grub dam pa'i mchog/ blama'i ngag las rnyed par 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byoram yaganas// brgyudapa'i
rim pa'i mchogagyur pa// yang na sngon gyi dngos grub ni// rmi lam du ni ston pa yin/ gzhan yang bla ma'i go 'phang brnyes pa'i// rnal 'byor ma yis rab tustsol// dam tshig mchog gi
gsang ba dang// sbas ba 'di ni bstan mi bya// rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dang ni// sangs rgyas thugs mchog gyur pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po gsang// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog yin
no mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las/ dngos grub kyi rim pa le'u ste bcugacigakha'o///de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// 'dodapa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// blam
las kyang blom ste// mkha' 'grom yi drab 'i sdom// phag mo bdag mo chenamani// rnal 'byor ma yis legs bsgrubs pa// 'di ni kun gyi rnal 'byor te// rnal
'byor snying po bsdus pa yin// pad+ma'adab brgyad la brib// sna tshogs mdog canamchog dam pa// lte bge sar bcas pa la// thams cad yongs su dag pa'i gdan/ de'i dbusas zla ba'i cha/
de bzhin dgaci drim med// de steng A kA li ste// dbusasu paM gyi rnam pas brgyan// de dbus lha mo bzhengs pa ni// rdo rje phag mo rnal 'byor ma// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis//
spyanagasum pa 'gazhal rnams bsgyur// skyel mo krung ni phyed par bazhugs// gar gyi rnam par legs brgyan cing// phyogs kyi gos can sku grol ba// phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal// dkar
la dmaba'i gzugs 'dzin cing// thod pa'i cod pan rnam par brgyan// sdorjedril bu phyag na 'chang// pad+ma'akhyil bas rnam bskor cing// dpal ba yi ni phyag rgya 'bar/ gnyis
kyis mi yi pags pa mnabs// thod pa dang ni khahUM 'chang// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin// cang te'agri gug tshangs pa yi// mgo bo gdong ni bzhi pa ste// sngo zhing sel//
ljang ba yi// zhal gyis lha mo rnam par brgyan// gal gdong mcheb rnam gtsigs shing// zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan mtshan// dngos grub thams cad/
za rab tu stsol// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing// lhamo dumabu'i ska rags brgyan// g.yer ka'i sku rags sgra dang ldan// rkang gdub dag gis legs par brgyan// dpung rgyan dag
gis rnam par mdzes// dpralab 'azhi rdo rje'i 'phreng// rdo rjes mtshanang 'i phyag rgya can// sku 'asamadzes shing yid 'drogapa'o// shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'grom/ seng ge'i gdong ste
rnam pa 'jigs// g.yon du phagag gdong can te// lha mo lAm rab 'jigs ma// nub tulha mo glapo'i gdong// dum skyesam ni dbang ma'o// lte mu lha mo'i tshul canani// gzugs
canam ste rta ya gdong// spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs gzugs// thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzan cing// mgo dang gri gugaphyagan bsnams/ gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la// gar gyis kyang ni
lags par mdzes// yi dgas rgyab la skyil krung phyed// bzhin rnams bsgyur zhing rab tu 'jigs: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ lha mo'i zhabs kyi 'og tumanan/ me
sogs mtshams ni bzhi po la// byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod// bumaM pa'i steng du rnam par dgod// dung dang kund zla ba'i mdog/ 'khor lo rtsibs ni drug pa bri// mkhas pas
dadabus dri ba ni// ma mo'i rigs nibazhi pa ste// mAm kId spyan dang ni// lha mo sgrol ma gos dkaramo// sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba ste// lha mo rdo rje rigs dbang phyug/ dkar dang sngo
dang dmar ba'i zhal// lha mo rtag pa'i rigs yin no// ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba yi// lhamo las kyi rigs yin no// dmar dang ser dang ljang khu yi// lha
mo pad+ma'i rigs yin no// spyan gsum pa la sku grol zhing// phyogs kyigs mchog 'dzin pa yin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan//
thod pa dpanipa Ti 'dzin// rang gi phyag mtshan bzhi paste// rdo rje 'khor la kun rdo rje// pad+madamarapo mchog dam pa// thams cad de bzhin dril bu 'dzin// thod pa 'khyil bas rnam par
bskor// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam gnon cing// gar dang glu yis bzhad pa'i zhal// sna tshogs pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs// rigs kyi dngos grub rab ster ba'o// phyaganamakho
bo cang te'u bsnams// rdo rjegri gug gis rnam brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng pa'i dbu rgyan can// mgo yi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thur gyi cha ni thams cad du// gnasal
sogs pa'i rim pa dgod// shar du rtsibs drug 'khor 'al// ji lta'i rjes 'brang lha mo dgod// thog ma'i thur la pu lIr// ma la ya na rab gtum ma'o// gnyis pa
dzA lan ngan gtumamig ma'o// gsum pa otsunan bad ldan ma'o// bzhi pa ar pu dan sna chen ma'o// lnga pa go dA ba rin dpa' ba'i blo gros ma'o// drug pa rA me shwa ran mi'u thung ma'o//
gnyis pa byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs drugapa/ dang po de bi ko Ta na lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// gnyis pa mA la ban shang grib ma'o// gsum pa kA ma rU pa nas srungs ma'o// bzhi
pa o tun 'jigs byed chenumo'o// lngapa tIsha ku nen rlung gi shugs canama'o// drug pa ko sa la na chang 'thungama'o// nub kyi 'khor lo gsum pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar du ka ling ka na so
bsangs lha mo'o// gnyis pa laM pA kan rab bzang ma'o// gsum pa kAny+tsin rta rnama'o// bzhi pa hem la ya na bya gdong ma'o// lnga pa pra tapa ri na 'khor le'i shugs can ma'o// drug
pa gri dpe ba dan dum skyes ma'o// lce'i 'khor le bzhi pa'i rtsibs drug gi shapalaso rawan chang 'tshong ma'o// gnyis pan su btsadIpan 'khor lo'i gocha ma'o// gsum pa na ga ra na rab tu
dpa' mo'o// bzhi pa sin+d+han stobs chen ma'o// lnga pa ma ru ta na 'khor lo sgyurama'o// drug pa ku la tan brtson 'grus chen mo'o// thog ma dkar zhing ltung ba dang// thod pa dang nikha
tsug/ 'khor 'bacang te'u gri gug go/ gnyis pa byang ni sngo la ser// rdo rje thod pa kha TaM ga/ cang te'u dang ni gri gug go/ gsum pa nuban dAmar la ser// thod pa dang nib TaM ga/
pad+macang te'u gri gug go/ bzhi pa lha yi lha mo ni// sor dmar sna tshogs rdo rje dang// cang te'u gri gug thod pa dang// kha TaM ga yang yongs su 'dzin// lha mo de dag thams cad kyang//
phyed ni bud med dbang phyug ma'o// spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang// skyil mo krung phyed gar bcas pas/ yi dwags rgyab la
zhabs kyis bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rkang rgyan dang ni ska rags dang// dbu rgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// 'khor le de yi rgyab tu
ni shar du rdo rje 'phreng bas bskor// byang du 'khor le'i 'phreng ba ste// nub tu sna tshogs rdo rje 'phreng// lho ru pad+ma'i 'phrab 'o// dbus su rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan// zur gyi
chani thams cad du// sna tshogs rdo rdzomanyam par bri// de rgyab yi dgas sna tshogs kyi// 'phreng bas mkhas pas bskor bar bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgo rnams dang// zur gyi
tsha ni bzhi po la/ mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i gzugs de ni// mnyam par bzhag nas bri zhing dgod// rwa gdong shar du dgod pa ste// sngo la dmaradang yid 'phrog pa// 'gro gdong
byasgoradagong pa ste// ljazhing dmaralegs par mdzes// khyigadonganubakyi sgo ni// sor zhing dud kha rab tugadug phag gdong lde ru dgodapani/ ljapazhi sngo ba'i gzug
canano// spyanagasumakhazhin bsgyur rab gdug cing// ngas pa phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba'o// mig g.yon dang ni gzugs mi sdug/ g.yaN brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// sna
tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dbus bzhugs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// khod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// gcer bu skagrol rnam par
jigs// gshin rje srogam ma gdong// me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// gshin rje pho nyagong bu'i gdong// bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// gshin rje mchab
mo'i gdong// gdug pa rlung phyogs rab tubazhugs// gshin rje'ajoms ma yi gdong// 'di dag chags pas rab tu myos// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs
gzugasacan yid 'phrog ma'o// gserabu dbu skragrol ba la// skyil krung phyed pasagaradangabacas// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// spyan gsumapa la g.yo ba'i sku// snachog
pad+ma'i lte dbus bzhugs// mi sdug rjes su chags pas myos// thams cad la dgasasteng bzhugs// 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams // thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing//
gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang// phyogagayas dgan cang te'uyi// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ phyi rol bskor ba'i tshul cano// gzhan du rnam pa du ma yi// gludang gar gyi
mchod pa dang// sna tshogs dam tshig pa yi// me tog spos dang mar me dang// drid 'phrengab byug pa dang// lha yi gos kyi rnam pa dang/ lha mo sil snyanamchog dam pa// phyi
rol rnal 'byor ma dag mchod// de yi dbus mdun mtha' yas pa'i// thams cad du ni 'khor yongs kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba'i/ phag
mo'i mchogani dmapa dang// rnal 'byor ma gdug rnams kyang mchod// mchog 'di dag ni gsang zhing sba// su yang ni mi brjod do// phyi rol yi dgas 'phreng ba yis//
dkyil 'khor mchog gi rangabazhinani// rnam par 'phrul pa dgong bu ste// ji lta'i rim pas rjes su dgod// senamo so ni rab gtum ma'o// slar sdu ni gtum mig ma'o//
pags pa dang drimani'od ldan ma'o// shan sna chenam// rtsa rgyusani dpa 'ba'i blo gros ma'o// rus pa ni mi'u thungama'o// mkhalamani 'ang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// snying ni shing
grib ma'o// migani sa srungs ma'o// mkhris pa ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o// glo bani rlung gi shugs can ma'o// rgyu mni chang 'thung ma'o// gnyi ma ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o//
ltab nirab bzas lha mo'o/ sgrungapani rta rnama'o// skra mtshams na bya gdongama'o// bad kan ni 'khor le'i shugs can ma'o// rnagazhi dum skyes ma'o// khrag ni chang 'tshong ma'o//
rdul ni 'khor lo'i go chama'o// tsha' ningashin tu dpa' mo'o// mchiman stobs chen ma'o// mchil mni'akhor lo sgyurama'o// snabs ni brtson chenama'o// pul+li ra ma la ya ste mgo bo
la lab gtum ma'o// dzA lan d+hu ra ste spyi gtsug la gtum pa'i migacanamago/ ocan te rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o// ar du da ste spyi bo'i rgyab tu sna chenama'o// go dA ba'i
sta rnab g.yon par brtanang 'i blo canama'o// ra me shwa raste sminama'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o// de ba ko Ta ste mig chu langaka 'a dbang phyug ma'o// mA la blta phrag pa gnyis sunashing/
grib ma'o// kAm rUpa ste mig gnyis la sasrungs mo'o// o lngaste num gnyis su 'jigs byed chen mo'o// tIshaku ne ste lte bar rlung gi shugasacanama'o// kos la lto sna
rtsa rani chang 'thuma'o// ka ling ka ste khar nishum de bA'o// laMpA ka ste mgrin par shin tubazangamo'o// kAny+tsi ste snying khar ni rta rnama'o// him la la stamadoms suni bya gdong
ma'o// pra tapa ri stamtshanam la ni 'khor lo'i shugs canama'o// gri de bas gzhanga' ni dus skyes ma'o/ soraThas brlaganyis 'a nichang 'tshong ma'o// su btsadIpaste rdzong
gnyis 'a ni'akhor ba'i go cha ma'o// nag raste sor mo rnams la dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o// sin+d+hAste rkang pa'i bol la stobs chen ma'o/ ma ru sku mthe bong gnyis la 'khor loskyama'o
kul ta ste pus mo gnyis la brtsonachenama'o// sa'i khams ni 'bebasam/ chu'i khams ni gsodaMm/ me'i khams ni 'gugs ma/ rlung gi khamasani gagyi dbang phyug mo'o//
nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma'i drub ma'o// gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad/ tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje'i ma/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni gakyi dbang phyug/
'du byed kyi phung po ni de rnga tshagasal/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje shAharu ka'o// migani gtimugardo rje/ rtsa
pani zhe sdang rdo rje/ snani phragadog rdo rje/ ngagazhigs pa rdo rje/ lus ni phrag dog rdoNaM/ mchod thams cad ni dbang phyug rdorje/ mingani mi 'khrugs rdo rje/ gni dpag med rdo rje/
lus ni snang mdzad rdo/ 'di dag dgod par bya ba ni// ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba yin// sbyor ba 'di la gnas nani// de yis thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur// dbang bskur
mchod dang dam tshig dang// sgom pa mnyam pa bcud du byed// de snying la ngashesasems dpa' la// ye shes bdud rtsi bcud kyis mchod// lus ngag yid kyi dmatshig rnams //
sems dngasems min 'alegs par brtag/ bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rnam rtog thams cad sbas nasani// dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis// gsang sngags rgyal
bo mchog kyang bzla// oM badzra bai ro tsa ya hUM hUMphaT swahA/ osarbabad+d+ha DA kinIya badzrab ts+tsha nAya huhUMphaT/hA/ bstod dang ma dang yang dag sbyar// hUM hUMphaT dang ldan pa yi// rab
