cad[]samanyam pa// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog yin te// de bsadabasgoms rnam par dag/ sum cu bdunapa'i go 'phang mchog/ bdag med chos dalam dang ni//
dkyil 'khor mchogal rab tu bzhugs// shes rab pha rol rnal 'byor ma/ rnal 'byor las ni pal bsos nas// mtshanamed go 'phangaganas nas su// mtshan med la ni
mnyamapar brten// chos rnams med cing mtshanam med/ chos min chos can dag kyang med// rten 'brel chos kyang mkha' dang mnyam// dngos po med cing mtshan ma med//
de nyid gzhi la 'di gnasan// ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin/ gnas sogs 'khor ngesaparayang// nyi zer rdul dang mnyam par mthong// sgra yi rtse mo 'bum gshag
pa'i// tshayang yongs su rtogs shing mthong// b+haga'i dbus na bzhugs pa yis// theru rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ 'khor lo sgyurapa rab sbyor ba// rwa gdongal sogs phyi rol
dgod/ he ru ka dpal bdag po ni// mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor// phan tshun bdag po bya ba ni// rdo rjesems sogs sbyor bani// rnal 'byoram dang thunamong 'grub//
sbyor pa gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ khamasagasum bdag po chen po ni// rnam par spyod pa mthongam gyur// mi 'grub 'khor lo sgyur ba dang// khams gsum
bdag po'i rgyal por 'gyur// gruban de na rnal 'byogache// srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'thob// de bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// stobs kyis shi ba bzo'abar bya// mtshams med
pa nibyed pa dag/ bkug la mkhasapas byin gyisabarlab// gzhan dudangos grub 'jig par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'bras// phyugs bsad pa yi sbyor ba ni//
rnal 'byor ma la zhus te bya// lha bshos sgrub pa'i sbyorab 'o// ma dang sring mo lhan cig tu// mchog dang bar ma de bzhin te// gzhan du bu mo lhan cig tu// dbang po gnyis ni
mnyam sbyor ba// mnyam pa mchog gi sgrub pa'o// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa lnga ni spyadapar bya// phag mo runebadag bsgoms te// lte bar sdigs mdzub bzhaganasani/
mkha' 'grom sogs 'khor 'khor bzhugs M// lha mo rab tu dad byas nas// sgo dgu lan zhugs nas kyang// snying po pad+maphuganasani// rnal 'byor ma brgyab tsam gyis// maskyes
mchogani btung bar bya// bsnun pa de yis brosanani// sangs rgyas 'gyur gyi gzhanang mon// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i gnas sgrubapa'imtshanama'i
rim pa bstanapale'u ste bcuganyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor dpa' bo'i chog dang// rnal 'byor mayi gnas 'byung ba// 'dus
pa padag gisabashadabar bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// blama'i bka'alas gzhan du min// thams cad mkha' 'grom rnamasani/ nges par legs pa stsol bar 'gyur//
re'u mig dgu pa dbusasusnyo// phyi rol du bcu drugabri// re'uyig dbus kyi dkyil du yang/ shin tu mdzes pa'ipa bi// sna tshogs pa brgyadapa ste// lte ba dngag gi ser bcas//
dedabus zla ba bltar byas te/ ]a la sogs pa rnam par sbyar// A li kA li mnyam byas te// hU~Mni nang du chud par bya// rdo rje sems dpas mkhyabar// de ru ka ni rnam par sgom//
zhal lnga phyugan bcupa ste// phag mo yisan yongs su brgyan// dkazhing spo la de bzhin dmar/ lcapakhu serapo steng du sku// spyanagasum pal 'jigs pa'i zhal// g.yas
brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dusamatshamanyid shin tu myos pas zhabs 'og gnon// thod pa'i 'phreng ba dbu rgyananyan// zlabaphyadapa 'dzin pas mdzes//
sna tshogs rdo rje cod pan can// phal pa'i dbu rgyan dbul 'ching// phyag rgya drugagis rgyas btab cing// sku la rdo rje rgyan gyis spud// rdo rje dril bumanyam par ldan// bde ba chen po'i
bde ba mchog/ rtse gsum dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// rdo rje gri gugade bzhin te// thodapa kha TaM tshangs pa'i mgo/ ngagra snyad dezhags pa 'o// g.yas
dang g.yon phyag lani// nara'i pags pa gos su mnabs// zhabs gnyis mnyam par 'khril ba ni// phag mo yis mi ba sbyar byas// de mdog phyag dang bzhugs stangs
can dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can// drag po'i thod pa'i 'phrangab can// thugs rje'i chags
bas rnam par myos// shar gyi 'daba' mkha' 'gro ma// byang du lA ma mkha' 'gro ma// nub tu dum skyes ma yin no// ltar gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma// gnag dang
sngo bsangs dmar sar skye// phyogs kyi gos 'chapa g.yas brkyang bzhugs// thopa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skragrolaganyisasu med pa ste// zur gyi tshani thams cad
tshak+kha byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gazhag/ thod pa ba'i dril bu dang// na ti'u gri gug mgo bo thogs// zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnams bsgyur// drag po chags pa'i chags
pas myos// bcom ldan bde bas gzigs nasan// bdeb che la rjes su chags// mgo bo'i do shal 'chang ba yis// de ru ka ni rnam par sgom// 'di ltare'amig
dbus dkyil du// mchog de dag kyang bsgom par bya// de yi shar gyi re'u mig la// pul+li ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang/ rab gtum ma ste ser po'o// byang du[]lan+dA
ran keng rus chen po dang/ gtumamigamasu sngon po'o// nub tu ar+yan na keng rus canadang/ 'od ldan ma ste dkar po'o// lhor ar du da namachab rnam par gtsigs pa dang/
snachem lha ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs su go da ba ri na lha dgra dang/ dpa' ba'i blo gros ma sa dmar po'o// bden bral du pAmashA ra na 'od dpag medadang/ mi'u thung ma ste pad+ma'i
mdog canano// rlung phyogs sud si ko Tan rdo rje 'od dang/ lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste rung ba sngon po'o// dbang ldan du ma la ba na rdo rje lus dang/ shing gribam ste ljang khu dang/
mu tig lta bu 'o// phyag na rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'o// de lare'amigaganyis pa'i shar phyogs su kAm rU pa na myu gu can dang/ sa srungs ma ste dmarapo'o// byung du o dron
rdo rjeral pa canadang/ 'jigs byed chen mo ste ljang khu'o// nub tu tri sha kunen dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlung gi shugasacanams sngonapo'o//lho phyogs su ko sa lan rdo rje hAmadzad dang/
chab 'athum ste dkar po'o// ma'i phyogs su ka ling kan rab bzang dang/ sngo bsangs lha mo ste nam mkha'i ser skya'o// bdonabral du laM pA kan rdo rje bzang dang/ rab bzangam ste
dmar po'o// rlung gi phyogs su po tsan 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rta rnam ste sarapo'o// dbang ldan du shim la ya na mig mi bzang dang/ bya gtol ma ste/
[/ ]sngon po'o/ pad dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o// re'u mig gsum pa shar du pra tapu rin stobs po che dang/ 'khor le'i shugs can ma ste nam mkha' dang ser skya'o/
byang du gri de ba tAn rdo rje bod dang/ dumaskyes ma ste ser po'o// nub tuso ran rtamagron dang/ chang 'tshong ma skye dmar po'o/ lho phyogs su su baN dA pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang/
'khorale'i go cham ste sngon po'o// ma'i phyogs su nag ra nadapal khrag 'thung dang/ rab dpa'amo ste dud pa'i mdog can no// bdenabral du siman pad+magar gyidabang phyugadang/
stobs chenam sta ljang khu'o// rlung gi phyogs sum ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khoralesgyuran sta sngon po'o// dbang ldan ng ku lu ta na rdo rjesems dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus
chen mo ste dkarapo'o// 'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o// gzhan yang thod pa dang [”]/ kha'i ga dang cang te'u dang/ gri gug dang/ mgo bo 'dzin pa/ phyag
drug pa/ zhal gsum pa ste/ zhalaniman ngag gi rjes su 'brong bas bstan/spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyabs bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// stagagi pags pa
gosasu mnabs//mgopo'i 'phrang bas brgyanang ste/thod pa'i 'phrakha'i rtsedapan can// dze rje'aphrodapang 'khor le/gsa' la zla bzhi pa dbang
ji lerathabs bzhin shes rab ste// mtshanama' phyagargya legs khyab pa// zur bzhi pa la sgras zhal/// ji lta'i rim pas dpral 'u brgyan/lha mo
babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyad kyis brgyan// dar dang 'phrabs rnam par brgyan// 'khor le'igakhrugasacan la bkod nas// ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag/
[<]ltar phyi yi 'khor 'khe yi// de bsgosrungs rnams kyang dgod// mtshams dang zur du lcamo rnams // mkhas pas bri bar byabaste// chog du ma thos nasani// 'bad pasagacig tu
bsdus pa yin// shar gyi sgo ni kha gdong ma// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ g.ya sa dgayonakyi zhal gdong ni// bya rog musbyar zha' yin te// mi rtsa thung la mi spyag zhal/
byang gi sgor ni 'ug gu dang// 'gapa phyi la rnam mdzes te// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong gi/ lce bskyod 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma// nub tupa bgi zhes pa// khyi dngas
gi'i gdong pa can// g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa yi// lce bskyod shin tu mdzes pa'o// lho phyogs sa 'dzin lhamo ni// phag gdongam he'i gzugs can// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal
gdongani// zab cing drag 'a'ajigs pa 'o// thog ma bu gdong zhes bya ba// gnyis pa bug pa de bzhin te// gsum pa bye yi gdong can la// bzhi pa dag ni
phag nyid do// so dang dud la dkar po'i gdong// ljang khusur po dmar po ste// sa zhing dmar la sogs pa'i zhal// dkar dang sngo dang ljang khu'i mdog/ dpo mnas dbang ldan bar//
gshin rje sreg ma pho nya mo// gshin rdzamache ba 'joms pa nyid// dmar dang ser dang ljang khu dang// sngo dang ser dang ljang khudang// dung kha seradang ljang khu dang// dkar dang
sor dang ljang khu ste// de dag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// spyanagasum g.yas pa brkyang bsabazhugs// phyogs kyi gos 'chang gsus pa 'phyang// dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste//
[:]phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing// 'khor med ni thams cad kyang// yi dgas steng du rnam par bzhugs// sna tshogs pad+manyem dang// zla ba'i dkyil 'khoradag la bzhugs/
thod pa dang mi la hUM ga ]zhags pa lcagasakyun ta'u dang// mgo bo gri gug phyag na 'chang// thod pa'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// dga' zhingadagyes pas rnam par myos//
rjes su chags pa'i zhal gdong ni// 'jigs pa'i sdang mig 'gyur ba'o// denas gshin rjesrog sogs sgo// rwa gdol sogs mtshams su sta// ragi thabs dang mnyam par
gzhag/ sbyor nga'i rim nga bsgomasanas ni// 'khor ledapa'abo thams cad kyang// ji srid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// snga ma'i rjes su thams cad kyang// mkha' 'gro ma sogs kun de
banyin/ jibazhin bla ma'i bka' bzhin du// ji ltar 'dod pa gnas de bzhin// ji ltarasems kyi khyad par gyis// rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor sgom// bum pa sna tshogasasbyor
ba yis// thod pa yis ni yongs su brgyan// 'o mas bkang ba'i thod pani// bum pa'i stong dugazhag par bya// phyi rol yongs subaskor bas// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa/
glu dang gar ni nyid ldan pas// sna tshogs rol mo rnam par sprul// me tog bdug spos mar me dang// dri dang gos mchog dam pa ste// sna tshogs dam tshig re yi thas// snachog
bza' bachang gis mchod// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa// phyi rol yi dgas kyis yosabaskor// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sgom// byama'i man ngagabaka' bzhin du//
rdo rdzopad bskor 'khor le ni// zur bzhi pa ni rab tuganas// mtshams su rdo rje phupas mtshan// rdo rje ka ba'i mdunadabusasu// re'u mig rdo rje ldan par bya// sna tshogs pa/
yi chog mchog/ gnas sogs rim pas dgod par bya// khams dpaphung po de bzhin te// skye mched drug kyang rnam par dgod// yengashes rdo rje rnam par sgom// sku gsung thugs su/
sbyor ba yis// yengashes 'khor lemathong pan// ag+ni zhabs bsil dag gis mchod// dam tshig sna tshogasamchog dam pa// sna tshogs pa yi khyad par
gyis// tshwas rak+ta drag gis mchod// go chaganyis po sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya yengashesamchog dam pa// ro gcig ma lus bsgoms na ni// ye shes 'khor lo rnam par sgom/
tshe rig pa yin khyad par gyis// mkhasabs sbyor ba gsum du sbyar// bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don// mkhas pas sum cu rtsa bdun te// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba
yis// dam tshig gsum mchogagis bza'// sprod bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa'i sgom pa rnam par sgrom// dus bzhi dag tungam tshig can// gnas sbyor
mkhas pas bsrung bar bya// sa steng du ni mthong ba kun// thams cad phyi ru ka dpalagazugs// 'gro ba drug po'i sridapa sbyangs// sems can don nigazhalamadabyas//
thams cad zhugs te bzhugs sbyor bas// 'dis ni thams cad gzhugapar bya// 'di ni sbyor ba nges pa ste// nges pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dung chen 'phrang bdag
gis ni// dmatshigamchog gisabazlas pa bya// tshogs kyi go cha'i rim pa bzhin/ rnal 'byor pa yis sngagasamchog bas/ ongashib har mukaM DA ki nI dzA la saM b.raMrgyu

hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM d+hihahahU~MhUMphaT swAhA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bo// oM badzra bai ro tsa ni ye puM hUM phaT swahA/ oM sam+babud+d+hA ki nI ye badzra war+Na nI ye hU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/ phagamo'i
snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// o ka ra ka ra khatsAka pA li phyits+tsaphaTaAhA/ oM pra tsaNe hUMphaT swahA/ okur ku ru ma hA kaM ka la huMphaT swAhA/ o tsan+d+ra kI ye hU~MhUMphaT swahA//
mo bar brtswa kaM ka la hU~M paN+Da/ o pra b+ha ba tIya hU~MhU~MphaT/ o pas ya tu sa ya nga ka 'diTI Na hUMphaT/ oMm hAnAse6yuphaT/ oko b+ha ya kro d+ha ya su ral ri NahUM hUMphaT/
o pI rim tI ye yu phaT/ oM pradzraa mi tAb+hAtupUphaT/[u0f00] kharba rI ye[《]ya3/ o brang po pAhU~MhU~MphaT/ so lo kosha rI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM waM yaMbadzra de ha huM hU~M phaT/ o
ngumuts+tsha ya tshuhU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaT aM ku rig putuphoT/ oM a ra ba tIye hUM hUM phaT/ oM da had dang rdzong la yuhUM phaT/ oM ma hAb+he rab ye hu[é]phruphaT/ oM pa tsa pa tshe ma hAbi ra hU~M

hU~M phaT/[u0f00] bA yu be ge huMhUMphaT/ o b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha badzraka rab sa ru d+hi ra anamA lA ba laM bi ni hUM hUMphaT/[u0f00] su ra b+hak+Shaye hUM hUMphaT/ oM kr-igaMsu b+ha dra sapa pA tAl ga ta b+hu tshig
sawaM bA ta ya ta ya huM hUMphoT/ o ba mo de bI ye d+huphoT/ o A kazla AkaSh+Tha badzrab+ha dra hU~M phaT/ o su b+ha dra hipuphaT/ o IpImahAd+hi ra ba hU~MphaT/ oM ha ya kalce 6tshuphaT/
o tsho tsho bi mukA hU~MhU~MphaT/ o kha gA nan [%]yaT/ oM kaM ma ba le shu hU~M phaT e tsakra be ga hU~M phaT/ oM harat+tabadzra hutuphaT/ oM khaN+Da
hU~M phaT/ o ho hi has grwa ba tshadu phaT/ ongashots+tshanI yatshushuphaT/ o d+ha kA sha garje tshupat+taM/ otsakra barmiN+Di yakhyo shuphaT/ o li ki li hatshuka bud pa Ta/ a
suhI ri yuphaT/ yongashili shi la pod+maneto shA ri hupApa'i/ oM ma hAb le hUM phaT/ o la gyi li be ro tsa nI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ otsakra brtenI ye hU~M phaT/ i d+hi li d+hi'i badzra
satAhu'uphaT/ oM ma hAdI hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM DA ki nI ye huM hU~MphaT/[u0f00] lA mi yu[%]phaT/ o khatsA rod tshuphruphaT/ oM pa tI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ akA kArtse hU~M phaT/ oM
u lu kA stsa6hUMphaT/ o shAnA s+ya pUphaT/ o su ka rAspyi duyaT/ o ya marAye hU~MtshuphaT/ oM ya ma rU tIye hu[%]paT/ oM ya ma do'i TI ye huphyuphaT/ oM ya ma
thanIyi duhU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor tshog bzlas tsam gyis// rdo rdzobakug cing gnasanas su// 'khrugaciparab tshugayo ba ste// lus las 'o 'bor 'god pa dang// de yi
mig ni 'bar ba dang// tshig 'jam pa dang 'bar ba dang// rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas tsam gyi// rdo rje'ajug pa mthong ba dang// sngags pa mnyam bzhag bzlasanasani//
dam tshigaspyod pa ldan byas nas// srog dang rtsol ba bsdom byas te// gas la byedahU~Mni brjod nas kyang// chos kyi dbyings su spro bar bya// sems can kun la phan pa dang//
gdul dka' ba dag gdul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du sro/ khro bo'i go 'phang de mthong nas// khams gsum dag tu bsdu bar bya// lus ngag yid la
bcug nas kyang// sa steng du ni spyod pa spyad// mnyam gzhag min pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snying rjes ban pa nyid kyisani// sems can thams cad mthong ba na// srid pa
gsum po he ru ka/ sngags pa ci dang ci za ba// dam tshig mchog ni bsgoms nas kyang// thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal// mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas// dam tshig
can ni langs dus su// bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas/ byang chub sems kyi chus khrus byas// yid 'ong phyag rgyu la gnas nas// khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang// rnal 'byor
ma dang mkha' 'gro ma'i// go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas// yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshad// mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la// smon lam dag ni bya ba yin/
dem thag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na// rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das// rangang nyin yang ni dngos med byas// semasacan rang bzhin dag pa ste// sridapa
mchog tu byas pa yin// rdo rje phagamo bla med pa/ phyag rgyar ni byin brlabs nas// rang gi lha yi sbyor pa yis// thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag mngon
bar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 'amig dgod pa dang gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o/// denasags pa bshad bya ba// gnas dang
'dus pa mchog yin pas// dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhinani/ mnyam par 'dres pa bcupadu 'gyur// gnyis medablos ni mnyamagazhag ste// 'khor lo gsumamadog ldan
par ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog/ de yi dbus su pad+mache// sna tshogs pad+malegs par mdzes// 'dab ma brgyud pa lte bar
bcas/ gsar dag gis nye bar mdzes// gru bzhi pa 'asgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// 'phro ba dang ni 'thung phyed brgyan/ mtshan nyid kun dang yabadag
ldan// nyima'i dkyil 'khor dbus suni// rdo rjesams dpa' bde ba che/ AlikA li zhu gyuralas// ye shes lngani rnam par sgom// de yi yongs su 'phel 'gyur bas//
rdo rjeha ru ka rnamasgom// dus mtha'i me chen 'chol ba yis// gdul dka' thams cad rab tu bsrog 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyi 'og tu rnam gnonacing
zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs// sku lus dag ni sngon po las// sngo ni 'bar ba'i sku yang sprul// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan/
can// sangs rgyas ltasani byin gyis brlab// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pa rnam par mdzes// zhal drug dpa' bo mi sdug pa// sgog pa dang ni bzhad pa dang//
drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing// sku ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud/ phag mo dang ni 5 padag ldan M/ byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'khyud//
g.yas brkyang bas nabs gnas shing// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// dadamadzad cingahU~MhUm da// hi mdzad cing 'jigs pa can// du mdzad cing phaT phaT
can/ a Ta Ta yi sgrachen sma// sngo zhing saral de bzhin dmar/ ltang khu dkar po de bzhin te// steng gi zhal gdong gdug pa che// bras su gdug pa longs spyod cing// rdo rje dril
bumanyam ldan pas/ lhamo dag ni nu ma 'chir/ drag po'i pags pa'i gos mnabs shing// khrag rlon 'phrog pa rab gsol te// thod pa dang ni khaTaM 'dzin// mdung dang gri
gug lcags kyudang// zhags pa dang mgo bo 'dzin// gdug pa gtun shing cang te'u da[=:]/ mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can// 'brel ba dag tu rnam par mdzes/ da lta'i
phyag dbaskumadog bzhugs// dbu skragrol zhing gserabu ste// 'dilta'i phyag rgya rnam par sgom// dumabu'i ska rags kyis brgyan cing// phag mo yapa ni/
'di 'drar sgos// rnal 'byor somanyesbangs nas ni// thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pas// thugs rjechags pa'i bde ba yis// sems can don gyi phyir byung ste// snying
rje chenapos brgyanapa yi/ nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis// thugs rje chen po'ibacudabade pas// 'gro drug srid pa rnam sbyangs nas// sems can don nimchog nyid mdzad/
stong pa'i ye shes las byung zhing// rtogs pa med pa'i gnas bzhi la// rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra// thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mthong nasani/
phyi dang nang gi mchog gyur pa// snying rje ye shes dam tshig ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// der ni phyag mtshan mdog mthong nas// zla ba'i rdo rjes bon ni// da'adir
snying po bsgom bya ste// bsnyen pa'i rnal 'byor dag tu brtag/ mkha' 'gro la sogs rim pa yis// padag medagod nga ra bya// shar duakha' 'gro dgod par bya// byang du de
bzhinalAm ste// nub tu dum skyes ma yin no// lho ru de bzhin gzugs can ma// sde dang ljangadang dmar ba dang// ser te de bzhin bzhi po ni// bzhin rnams bsgyur zhing spyan gsum
[d ]gdug/ sku grol phyogs kyi gos can yin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga pa des rgyas btab cing// thod pa dang ni kha hUM ga/ g.yon gyi dpung pa la//
brtan cing// cang te'u gri gugamago bo ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog byang chub sems kyi chus gang ba'i// thodapa bum pa'i stapadu gzhag/ 'khor 'a dgodapar
bya ba ni// sngon du grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// byin gyis b.rub sogs rim pa yis// shar phyogs byang g rim pa ste// pul+li ra ma 'a ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang/ rab ba tum masdu
nam mkha'asar skya'o// dzAlan+dA ra na keng rus chen po dang/ gtum mig ma ste mdogasar po'o// o rgyanan keng rus can dang/ 'od ldan m ste mdog ljang khu'o// arapu da
na mtshab rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ snachenam sa mdeganamamakha'aser skya'o// go dang rin la ngag dang/ dpa' ba'i blo gros ma snyamadogasarapo/ ra me shwa ran 'ong dang ga med dang/
mi'u thung ma ste mdog ljang khu// de ba ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang/ lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste namamakhab ser skya// mAl pa na rdo rje lus dang/ shing grib ma ste mdogaser po/ kAn/
rupan myu gu can dang/ sa srungs ma ste mdog ljang khu/ o trAn rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen me sta namamakha'adang ser skya/ tIsha kun 'jigs byed chen po dang/
rlung gi shugs canam ste mdogaser/ ko sa la na rdo rje hUMmadzad dang/ chaya'athum ste mdog lcapakhu/ ka ling kan rab bzapadang/ sngo bsangs lha mo ste nam
mkhab ser skya/ la po ka na rdo rje bzang po dang/ rab bzang mo ste mdogasar/ kAny+tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rtarnam ste mdog ljang khu/ him laya na mig mi bzang dang/
bya gdong ma ste nam mkha' ser skya// pra tapu Tin stobs po che dang/ 'khor le'i shugs canam ste mdog ser/ gra ha de ba tAn rdo rje rin chen dang/ dum skyes ma ste mdog ljapabu'o//
sorapan rtamagrin dang/ chang 'tshong ma ste nam mkha' ser skya'o// su btsudIpa nanam mkha'i snying po dang/ 'khorale'i go che ma ste mdog ser/ nagar na ru ka dang/ rab
dpa' mo skyo mdog ljang khu/ sin+d+han pa gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ stobs che ma ste nam mkha' sor skya/ ma ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor 'gyur ma ste mdog sar/
ku'u tun rdo rje sems dpa' dang 6 brtson chenamo ste mdog ljapakhu/ yang na sku gsung thugs kyi ni// ji ltaramadogan dbye bar bya// g.yon gyi rim pa ji lta bar/ sgo
rnams dag ni bya ba ste// shar du lA gdong ma/ byang du 'ug gdong ma/ nub tu khyo gdong ma/ lho ruphag gdong ma/ sngo ba dang/ ljang khu dang/ dmar ba dang/ ser po'i
mdog canano// me'i phyogs su gshin rjesug ma mdog dmarapo/ bden bral gyi phyogs su gshin rjel tam mdog sngon pe/ rlung gi phyogs su ga shin rjemache ba ma dung kha ram ra ]
sprin gyi mdog lta bu / dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gshin rje 'joms ma mdog dkar po ser skya'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang/ rab gtum ma la sogs pa 'dra bar
gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba na/ stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ lha mo'i zhabs/
kyis 'khyud pa/ gcer bu mgo bo'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa// thod pa'i 'phrang bas dpral ba brgyan pa/ rdo rjedapadril bu 'khyudang/ gnyis sum pa'i sbyor ba'i
mnyam pa dang ldan pa// lha mo'i num 'tshir ba/ thod pa dang kha To ga 'dzin pa/ cang te'u 'chang ba/ yang na rigs gsum dbye bas rtsa ba'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ thams cad phyog
kyi gos 'chang zhing// lhamo skra grol gdug pa me// khwa ba ni[”]lasogs lha mo rnams // sa grol phyogs kyi gos can la// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// spyan gsum
pa'atshal rnams bsgyur// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can: mgo bo'i 'phrang ba'i sa ra' brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga ya nga b.rang// 'dod pa'i chags pas rab tumyos/
rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu// mi g.yo ba dang de bzhin sbyor// lto ba 'phyapazhilag pa 'phyapa// sku lus 'jigs shing gdong yang bsgyur// rab
'jigs te mapad+mayi// sang sgrub par rab ganas nas// gang zhig ltapa'odod pa bzhin// rjes su chags pas zhal nyid ni// de lta bu yi bsam pa yis// rnala'abyor
pas ni bsgom par bya// thod pa ba khri 'dzin cing/ cang te'u gri gugamagopo'achang// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kun// yi dgas la ni bzhugs pa sgom// mkha' 'gro'i
tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nye bsnyen rjes su rnal 'byor te// dpa' bo'i yan lag sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa lhag pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ sonamo dang so dbanithod pa'i dum bu'o//
skradang spudag ni kengs chen po'o// pags pa dang dri ma dag nikapa sacanano/ shanimatshab rnamapagacigs pa'o// rtsa rgyusan lho dgra'o// rus pani 'od dapag tu medang 'o//
mkhalamo dag ni rdo rje 'od d// snying ni rje rjesku'o// mig ni rdo rje myu gu canano// mkhris pa'i rdo rje ral pa canano// glo ban dpa' bo chepo'o// rgyum ni rdo rje mdzad do// gnye ma
nir btubazapo'o// lto bani rdo rjebazalego/ snang ban 'gas byed chen po'o// skra mtshams ni mig mi bzang ngo// bdakanani stobs po che'o// rnag ni rin chen rdo rje'o//
khrag ni rtamagrinano// rdu'anam mkha'i snying po'o// tshilani dpald ka'o// mchimani pad+magar gyi dbang phyug go/ mchil mnirnam par snang mdzad do// snabs ni rdo rjesams
dpa' 'o// pul+li ram 'a yaste mgo bor ni rab tu gtum ma'o// dzAlan+d+har ste spyi gtsug tugatum pa'iyig canAma'o// or+yan te rna bgayas par 'od ldan ma'o// arapu da ste spyi bo'i
rgyab tusna chenam ste gnas pa'o// go dwa ba'i sta rna ba g.yon par brtan pa'i grocanama'o// rAye shAka ste smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o// de ba ko Ta ste mig ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//
mu 'bab ste phrag pa gnyis suni shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so/ kAm ru pa ste mchan khung dag nis srungasama'o// o des nu ma gnyis su 'jigs byed chenamo ste zhing ngo// sdig
na sta lte ba ni rlung gi shugs canama'o// ko sa la ste sna rtser ni chang 'thung mo ste nye ba'i zhingang// ka ling ka ste khar ni sngo bsangs lhamo'o// r-ipAkaste mgrin pa nishin tu bzamoste
'dusapa canano// kAny+tses snying kharani rta rnama'o// him la ya ste mdomasasuni byagadong mas lta ba'i 'dus pa can no// pra tapu risnyamtshanamal ni 'khorala'angeshugasacanama'o//
gri had ba tAste bshanganga'i lam 'a ni dum skyes mas 'dus pa can no// so rab+baste brlaganyis su chapa'atshong ma'o// sukhats+tshadIpa ste byin pa gnyis 'khor le'i go cha ma ste nye ba'i
ba@#// 'dus pa can no// nag ra ste sor mo rnams la ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// sin+ta ste rkang pa'i bol la ni stobs chen ma ste 'di dag ni dur khrod do// ma ru stemathe
[】 ]bodag la ni 'khor lo sbyarama'o// ku lu taste bus mo gnyis 'a ni brtson 'grus mchen mo ste 'di dag ni nyi ba'i dur khrod do// sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams ni
gsodabyang ma'o// ma'i khams ni 'gugs byedama'o// rlung gi khams ni gor gyi dbang phyug ma'o// nam mkha'i khams nepa'i drab ma'o// gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam

par snang mdzad do// tshorab 'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+magar gyi dbang phyug go/ 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rjesams
dba' sta/ de bzhinag shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni dpa'aphur ka'o// mig gnyis ni gtamug rdo rje'o// rnapaganyisanizhe sdang rdo rje'o// snaganyis ni ser sna ngoji'o// khani
'dod chagasaro=/ reg byani phrag dog rdo rje/ skyamached thams cad ne dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni mi 'khrugs rdo rje/ gni dpag med rdo rje/ lus ni rdo rje rnam snang ngo// 'di
dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yin// rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes 'khor la bkug nas su// de dag sprulatsing bkod nas ni// ji lta'i rim pas dbang yang bskur//
0 ]zhugs par gyur nas bcing bar bya// dgyes pas rjes su chags pas sbyor// rang gi ngo bo gcig gyur nas// de la go chaganyis po dgod// oM hasIpab la rdo rje sems dpa'//
namamago bo la rnam par snang mdzad/ sAha puspyi gtsug lapad+magar gyidabang phyug/ boT phrug pa gnyis la de ru ka/ hUM mig gnyis la rdo rje'i ma/ phaT lus thams
cad kyigo chaste rtamchogago/ ob lte ba rdo rje phag mo'o// haMyosIpabal ya mi ni'o// oMmo kha la rmongs byed ma'o// hwa mgo la skyod byed ma'o// hUMphyugaspyigatsugalaskrag
byedama'o// phaT phaT tsaNIkaste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar// mthe bong do rdzabartanapo rab tu sbyar// ngonodapral ba'i dbus
su rab gazhaganas// bskor cing bskor bar kun tusbyar bar bya// rkang pa phyengamanan steng du blta// gyen du pho gyisgrasgrog cing// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i//
dpa'abo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug/ dza:hU~MpaM ho/ sbyor bas bkug nas gzhug pa dang// bcingasanas dbang du bya ba yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnamasakyis// mkha'
dkyil yongs sugang mthong nas// yeshes chuyi bdud rtsi yis// gang ba'i bum pa blangasanasani// lagapa de la dbang bskur bya// glu dang gar gyi mchodapa yis// dbabaskur
dag ni dbul bar bya// da lasngagasani/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi katas ma ya shri le waMg+haM/ glu 'di blangs pas bskul ba 'am/ yapanamakha' 'grom
tshanamo rnams thugs dgyes pa dang rab tudagyes par 'gyur te/ dbang bskur rol mo'i bde chenapo// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chenapo// dgyos chen gsol ba'i bde chen po///
mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chenapo// gsal mdzad bde ba chen po ste// mkhaM' 'gro dra ba'i bde chenapo// a la la ho/ mchog tugyur pa bde chen po// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen
po a la la ho/ bde chen yengashes dgyes nas ni// dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs// ye shes gcigabasgoms nas ni// ro gcig 'khorale'ang de bzhin sgom//
rdo rjesams dpa'i dbu rgyan can// ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang// tshangs pa'i skud pa 'a sogs btags// rdo rje phag mo'i sngags
gang yin// mgul nas mgul du rnam par brgyan/ lhamo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni// 'phreng ba brgya phyed kyis brgyan cing/ gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis// nor bu mcho
legs mdzes shing// sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'grom// pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags kyi// ska rags rgyan du byas pa yin//
0go cha drugapo dag gis ni// phyag rgya'us ni rab tumadzes// 'khor 'kho kun rnal 'byor ma// sngags kyi btupaba'i thod pa yi// rnam snang mdzadam sngags gagi/ thod pas spyi
gtsug rgyan du byas// dpa'alo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag/ de ltar bdag nyid rnamabasams te// tsham rngam sngags kyis legs par srung// tshangs
par spyod pa brtag gyur nas// rkangapa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsam// spro dang bsdu ba'i ye shes sgom//
snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya// rnal 'byor chen po sgrubachen po// rdo blakhro bo'i thig le las// khams gsum du ni spro bar bya// rdo tsho'i sna yi rtse mo 'bar// spro byinam
mkhar thig le las// rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pas// bslu khung bu'i boradag nas// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyubar// khro bo sangs rgyas sprin rnams sngo// rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor
ni/ sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin// lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pani mkha' 'gro ma'o/ tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pane lAma'o// ches=na pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o//
sems dran pa nye bar gzhug pani gzugs can ma'o// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum mig ma'o// dpyodapa'i rdzu 'phrul
kye rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ne sna chen ma'o// dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa'apo'i blo gros can ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung
ma'o// dran pa'i dbangabo ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dang po ni shing grib ma'o// shes rab kyi dbang po nis srungs ma'o// dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o//
brtson 'grus kyi stobasani rlung gi shugasacan ma'o// dranapa'i stobasani chang 'thung ma'o// ting 'dzinagyisobasani sngo bsangs lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting
pa'adzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rnama'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi ya na lag ni khyo gdong ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yana' ga ni 'khor 'ongoshugasacan ma'o//
shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi 5 nag ni dum skyes ma'o// chos rnam nga la'abyed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagazhi cha'atshong ma'o// dran pa la dag byang chub kyiyana' ga ni'akhor
'a'i go cham// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyiyan lag ni shin tudapa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta banistobs chenama'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor 'oskyar ma'o// yang dag
pa'i ngagani dpa' bo chen mo'o[” ]/yang dgapa'i las kyi mtha' ni bya rog gi gdong canama'o/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho bani 'ug pa'i gdong namama'o// yang dag pa'i rtso 'dapon khyi'i gdong can ma'o//
yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdong canama'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpa' le ru ga'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni gshin rje sug ma'o// dge ba'i

chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rjemachab ma'o// mi dgo pa'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyid pa zhigashin
rdzo'adzomasama'o// dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'i sgom pa'o// de nas dam tshig 'khor lo dag/ mnyam par bzhag ste bzlasapar bya// haha/ shud+d+ho/ hihi/ pha/

a a/ oMng+gashibadzradape ru ru kaM hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA' shaM ba raM swAhA/ oM hahahahu phaT swAhA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 badzrab ro tsa nI ye hU~MhUMpha'aAhA/ oM sarbabats+tsha/

nI ye badzrab ts+tshanI ye hU~MhU~M phaTaswAhA/ lha mo'i snyiyodapa nye ba'i snying po'o// o kinAye d+hI phaT swAhU~M/ [u0f00] lA me hU~MhU~M phaTaswahA/ oM khaN+Da rohahupUphaNasAhA/ o rUpo N+DiyaM hU~MhUphaNAyAhA/

si khatsAkapA li ni ka ra kor du hUphaT/ oM pra tsaNahuhUMyaT/ oM ma hA kaM ka la ku ru ku ru hU~MphaT/ o tsats+tshAkA ye hU~MhU~M phaT/[u0f00] kaM ka la ban+d+habanA usu phaT/ oMpra b+hA ba tIya hu huphaT/
so bi ka Tado'i Na pas ya tas ye hU~MhU~Myan/ oM mdzAnA se hU~M phaT/ o su rA bi ri Tiko b+ha yi ko b+ha ya hu hU~M phaT/ i bI ra ma tIye husnyuphaT/ oM a mi tAb+ha hU~M hU~M hU~MyaMT/ o khen+darI yi
hU~MhUMphaT/ oM badzrapa b+ha hAhU~MyaT/ o la bA rI ye hU~MphaT/ oM badzra de waM khaM hU~MhU~M phaT/[u0f00] dru mats+tsha ya huM hU~Mya3/ o a ri ka phaT phaTahuphruphaT[/]

oM a ra ba tIye hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM badzra dza Ti la da pa bdutshuphaT/ om b+hAb+hi ra ba ye hU~MphaT/ om pUbI ra pa tsapatsahu yatwA/ o bA yu bo ga ruhU~MphaT/ oM badzrahUMka rab+hak+Sha b+ha kA Ti sa ru
b+hi an+nAmA lA ba laM bi ni huphaT/[u0f00]sur b+huk+ti ye hudI ye/ oM su b+ha dregrits+tshagats+tshas pu pu tAl b+hu dzeg sarmapA tam+b+ha ya ta ya pUya9/ o ku ma hI yetsit+taMphaT/ obadzrab pa A ka
A wa ri pa'/ oM su b+ho duhU~MhU~M phaT/ omahAd+hi pa btsu'i hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM hayakaN+Na6 pa tsakra ba gsuphaT/ o badza?hAdzAdutshuphaTi/ akhats+tsa'i yu saT/ oM ha ya grwapa pIwIr shu pa
o bi rU pA paNaM/ oka kha gAn ni du hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA ki klu shuphaT/shi ts+tsha nI ye huM hU~M phaT oMAkA sha garlahU~MhAyaT tsakrakhami
Niya du[%]pa oM de ru ka ki li ki la hu hU~Mya'o/ oMsu ra bA rA yetsit+tiMphaT/ oM pasmanaste kA ri si li si li hU~MhU~MphaT/ oM ma hrub le hU~MhU~M phaT/ ob ron hi li hi li hU~MhU~M phaT/
mo bkra b.rInI ye hU~MtuphaT/ o badzrasatAd+hi li d+hili huphruphaT/ oM ma hAdItsetuhUMphaT/ oka kA s+ye hU~MphaT/ o u lA kAkye hU~MhUM phaT/ o shA nA s+yahU~MhU~M phaT/ oM sUka rA s+ye hU~M
[d]hU~MphaT/ oM ya ma rA NI ye tshu phaT/ oM ya ma rUt+tile tshu[%]phaT/ oM ya ma rI NI ye hU~MphaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye hUM hUMphaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// dung chen
'bring ba blas nas su// leg g.yon mthe bong srin lagis// gsang sngags dgan bezlas pa bya// dus bzhir ji ltar 'dod pa ru// rnal 'byor pas nibazlas pa bya//
bsgom pa rtse gcig bya ba ste// dam tshig dang ni dam tshigasbyor// bza' ba bzlas pa bsdusanas su// chog bzhin du gtor ma sbyin// dkyil 'khor lanici bde bar/ gcer
bu skra grol 'dug pa yis// brtul zhugs can gyisagator ma sbyin// rkang pa g.yas brkyang gnas nas su// mnyam par bzhagaste phyag rgya bcing// mdzub mo mdu byas gung
mongs pa sbyar// mthe bong rdo rdzobartan po rab tusbyar// dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su rab bzhag nas// gzhi gcu zhi bskor nas 'di brjod do// oM A ral+li ho: ba
badzrat+tA ki nI sa ma ya sU dzra ho/ 'di ni gsum dang bzhi dang ni// lnga yi bar dubarjod par bya// skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis// rnal 'byor mtho ba'i gnas las/ lho
phyogs kha bltas gnas pa yis// mtshan phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin// lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas// de nyidagasum gyis mngon bsngags te// rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas//
gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod// oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarbayak+Sha sa rakas/ b+hAta/ pra ta/ pishatsa/ unamAdaM/ a pa smA ra/ DAka nAka rgyu
da ya/ i maM ba laMkhrits+tsaMdus ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ mamasarbasid+d+him+mepra yats+tshan+te/ ya thathaM/ ya thenaM/ b+huny+dzah+pha pa bo tha/ dzag tha/ mA ti kramathA/ ma ma sar-i kA ra ta yaM/ sati
su kha bi shud+d+haye/ sa hayi ka b+ha banu hU~M phaT swAhA/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// bde chen mtshan gyis grar mdzad cing// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs//
A li kAlo mnyam byas te// de ni re pha'i sbyor ba yis// steng du 'bar ba'i re phani// 'og tu'adzag par byed pa yin// 'dzag pa'i khu ba'i tshul tsanani// 'chimed thigs
pa'igakhrugs su 'gyur//bsu dang bsrubasapa yang dgasbyor//ye shes me la las kyi rlung// na tu bskyod par byas pa yis// lta ba'i dkyil 'khor dud pa 'byung// 'od thar dag ni ba bar bar
byed// dam tshig 'khor lo dus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag bsregs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'khor ler song ste/ thabs des 'an gsum
du bskor ba byas nas/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo las 'das te byung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa'/
ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blas te/ spyi bo'i gtsug gser sgo dzAlan+d+ha ra zhes bya bar zhugs teso'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas/ longs spyod kyi 'khor lor la bsos nas bsregs
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' babaskyod nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro// des skra'i rtse mo 'bum dugshegs pa'i chatsam yang 'byung ba dang 'jug pamamathong
ste dga' zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas so// rangalhag lhayi rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtago/ bsam pa med la bsam pa ste// sems kyang mtshon par bya ba min//
bsamadu med pa'i sgom pa yis// dngos dang dngos min rnam spangs yin// sems kyi bsam pa'i sems de ni// red pa gang yin gzung bar bya// kha TaM ga ni lha yi sku// Da ma ru sgra
shes rab yin// nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste// mchanamo rnal 'byor ma ru bshad// dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pani// phag mo dag gi gzugs subastan// shi ni gnyis med ye
shes te// d+hani rgyu tshogs rnam par spangs// ru bkodapa dang bral ba// kan gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o// rnal 'byorasems ni ngal bsos la// mya ngan 'das zhes bstan yin//
rnal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe// yurakasogs dpa' rnal 'byor// lag na me tog sna tshogs bsnams// snyatshogs rgyal mtshan ba dan can// sna tshogs rol mo sgra sgrog cing//
snatshogs gluyis mchod par bya// 'chib zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gnyis
su med pa'i sbyor ba'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa 'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ mamo'i bsgom pa dbye bar bya// gsang sngags kun gyiganas sbyor ba//
de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad// bde ba chen pos kun la khyab// mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdagaste// sems can kun gyi snying la
gnas// o A// oMI aM hUM/ oM aM/ oM[']o/ oM A:hU~M/ 'di ni bcom ldan de nyid kyi// der kani dbang phyugamchog/ mkha' la drimad sgrub yi/ lte ba'i
dbus su bsgomaparabya// bar hUM/ mkha' 'gro ma nipad 'dab bzhugs// kaMkhaM saM ga paM/ tse tshodzidz+hitaM/ Ti NaM tIt+taMNaM/ rtathodi dz+hanaM/ papho po d+hi maM/ de yi thod pa'i dumasogrwa
i dang gtum mig ma la sogs kun gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor les// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// yaM raM laM waM/ shik+ShasaMhaM kaM/ de yi rwa gdong la sogs
dang// gshin rjesreg sogs kun gyi 'o// yige k+Sha yi bdag nyid ni// bde ba chen po'i shu kra'ogazugs// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// sangs rgyas kun gyiganas
yin zhing// kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong// brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus// 'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs// rang gigazugs ni mkha' lta bu // 'di ni dganyid bcings pa/
ste 'di ni dgrol lamakhas pa yin// 'di yi lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing// shu kra'i gzugs kyi bde chen gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// 'khor legasumakyi
dbus su dgod// 'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te/ gang la ya ni bstan mi bya// sngarab shad phyag dang phyag mtshanadang// go chayang ni de bzhin te// starab shadabazhin du
bkod nas kyang// phung po khams dang skya mchod dag/ dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid// byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// sngar
bshad 'khor lo rnam padagod// thams cad dkarapa'i mdogacanal// 'khor lo gsumani bocu drug dgod// dpa'ango ya ni so sor dgod// rnal 'byor ma yaso sor
te rang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa yin// dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang// gnyis su med par gnas pa yin// mkha' 'gro sogs dang byig do
sogs// rang gi thabs dang gnyis med gnas// de ni rdo rje snying po 'o// rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste// mchog tugasang ba sbas pa dag/ rdo rje snyingapos zhusanasani// bcom ldan
[p]// 'dus kyis gsungs pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bam las/ dpal he ru ka dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ dpa' bo dang/ rnal 'byor
za ma rnams bsgoms ngas bskyod pa ste le'ubaco lnga pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dang po'i las kyi sgom pa ste// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog gyur pa//
cigacar du ni bskyed pa dag/ rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa yin// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig la// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur// 'jigs byed dang ni nges mtshan dag/
g.yas brkyang pa las mgo la mnan// rgyanadrug sna tshogs rdo rje dang// zla ba phyed pas rnam pa la brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su minabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnamapar
brgyan// thod pa kha TaM ga bsnams shing/ ni rdo rjemchog kyang gsol// phag mos kyang ni rnam par 'akhril// de yi mdog dang phyag gi gnas// byin pa gnyis kyisamanyam
ba'akhyud/ grod pa rdo rje sdigs mdzubakyis// phyogs su bsdigs shing sku grol la// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
phyag gnyis zhalan gcig pa ste// phyag rgya lnga ni mnyam par sbyor// spyanagasum pa la drag po'i gzugs// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// sgom pa mchog gi sgom
ba 'o/ dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rjen/ ba'i mdog can bde ba che// bad+ma'i dbus su sgom pa ni// mkha' 'gro mni rabo'i mdog/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang//
mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par ni// dpa'abo mdog nag po la// mkha' 'gro mnadakarab nyid// gsugi 'khore'i dpa' bo ni// dmar ba'i mdogacan chera'abar ba//
mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin nag po ste// sku mdog gnyis su rnam par sgom// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// zlabasar skya legs brgyun bas// de la mkha' 'gro ma yadamar/
ci 'dod gzugs su'a'agyurab yin// khA gdong la sogs kun ljang khu// gshin rje srog sogs kun dudul// de ltar mdog gi bye brag gis// sgom pa'i mchog gis shes
par bya// mkha' 'gro ma thong la ya'adzin// cang te'ugar gyi rnam par bzhugs// thams cad dabu skra grol ba ste// phyogs kyi gosacan bzhad pa'i zhal// thugs kyi 'khor
le'i dpa' bo rnams // rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// rnal 'byor mni klong rdo rje// sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas// gsung gi 'khor le'i dpa'akho rnams //
pad+madril bus rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma ni thod pa// sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig pas// skuyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams // 'khor la dril bu rab tu 'bar// rnal 'byor
ma 'khor sdigs mdzub can// thod pa rkang gis gang ba'o// khA gdong la sogs lha me ni// thod pa dang ni ba khri ga/ gri gug dang ni sdigasamadzub bcas//
gshin rje srog sogs lha mo ni// cang te'u mgo bo sdigs mdzub dang// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyanacan// snyilakrung phyed pas gar dang bcas// dpa' bo g.yas brkyang gnas
paste// mkha' 'gro ma yi byin pas 'khril// gnyis su med par manyam ldan pa// thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba che// ye shes 'khor le mnyam ldan pas// bde ba'i bde ba
gcig pu'agyur// chos kyi ko'as yang dag 'byung// rang min sa bon dang bcas pa// 'phrangaba'i sngags dang mnyam par sbyar// gsal byed mnyam par sbyar nas su// hU~M
gnyis phaT dang yang dag sbyar// dpa' bo'i gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// rnal 'byor ma yang de bzhin bshad// ngagaming gi sa bon dbus// gsal byed du ni mnyam par ldan//
huhUMphaT kyang de bzhin te// sngags pa 'di ltar sbyar bar bya// dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rjeste/ gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla// o shi habadzrahaharu ru kaM huMstsapha3/ o

hU~MhahahuphruphaT/ snyingapo dang nye ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 badzra hihU~MhU~M phaT/ oM badzrab i ro tsa nI ye huphruphaT/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// dus bzhidag tu cho ga bzhin//
rnal 'byor pa yis bzlasapa bya// mdun du ba spu'i khung bu las// chos dang longs spyod rnam par spro// sams can rnams la phan gdags phyir// chos kyi 'khor la bstan par
bya/ 'gro ba rigs drug grol nas ni// bla med gnas su 'jog par byed// sngags pas ngelta 'dod sbyor ba// rigs lnga rnams kyidabus su yang// gang gis rigs
gsum dbus khyab pa// khams gsum gyi ni bdag po ste// sangs rgyasathams cad yang dag 'dus// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba 'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud blama'i blamalas/
las dang po pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu drug pa'o//rdo rje snying pos rab bshad pa// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste// phyagabazhi pa yi chog
yis// dbang po b.ram rnam par sgom// cig car bskyod nga 'i sbyor ba yis// sgom pa dag ni rnam par sgom// phyag bzhing 'a zhol bzhipa// sanagasum drag po 'jigs pa ste//
g.yas brkyang ba yeganas pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang nadus mtshanaganon// sku lus mi mgo'i do shal can// thod pa'i dbu rgyanamchog can te// zla ba phyed pas mdzes pa
yin// snatshogs de rjes rnam pa mtshan// phyag rgya drug po drag po'i gzugs// sku mdog dkarapo 'jigs pa ste// sngo zhi ljang bu dmarapo ste// stong gi zhal gdong rnam par sgom//
[/ ]@#/ thod pa dang mib 'dzin// rdo rje dril bu cang te'u dang// rdo rje phag mo mnyamapar ldan// lcame'i ku rtsa 'char ba ste// stag gi pags pa gos sumanabs//
phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// skyagrol dum bu'i ska rags can// de phyug zhal dmadog gis mtshan// mkha' 'gro ma ni sngo la sar lA ma lcang dang ser po ste// dum skyes
mni dmar 'a ltung// gzugs can ma nisir la dmar// thod pa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// gri gug mgo ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ cate'u skrunedu masgrog/ gcer bu skrani grol ba ste//
thod pa dag gis cod pan byas// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i zhal// rang gi mdog dang phyag de bzhin// skyil krung phyed pa'igar can te// bdud bzhi zhabs 'og gnon pa dang// 'dod
bas lta zhing rtog pa ste// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// sdodasar bar rnam par sgom// de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'groma'ang// dkar zhing sngo bar rnam par sgom// thod pa dang ni kha :
la 'dzin// rdo rje drilabus legs par 'khyud// cang te'u yin sna tshogs sgra// rdo rje skrun sasu rdzogs// thod pa dngani sdigs mdzub dang// gri gug dang ni mi thoda'adzin// lhamo'i
phyag rnams de bzhin te// byin paganyisakyisa' gsal 'khril// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs pa chen bo bzhin rnam bsgyur// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i cod pan byas//
dpa' bo rdo rjesamtshan ma'o// gsung gi 'khor le'i dpa' bo gang// dam zhing gnag la 'jigs pa ste// pad+ma'i dpa'abos rnam par khyab// rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste// pad+ma'i
mkha' 'gro mdabazhin// ldang dang dkar ba'i sku lus can// sku yi 'khor 'di'i dpa' bo yang// sor dang ljang ba'i sku lus can// 'khorales dpa' bo yongasasu khyab// 'khor
la sbyar ba'ang ster bar byed// 'khor le mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// dkar dmar dang ni yid 'phrog pa'o// rang gi mtshan dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba//
lwa gdong sogs bzhi mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs mdog nyams 'phrog pa'o// thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin// gri gug mgo bo cang te'u 'dzin// gshin rjesreg byed sogs lha mo//
dung bdamarapo de bzhinano// gshin rjadabyig togri gug mgo/ thod pa dang ni khahU~M 'dzin// 'khor gyi ma sogs mkha' 'grom// yi dgas gdan 'a rnam par bzhugs//
byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'akhril// mkha' 'gro ma nidagyes pache// skra grolaphyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing// thopa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thams cad phyag rgya lnga'adzin/
cing// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor// spyan gsum drag po rnam bsgyur ba// dpa' bo 'dod pa'i zas la rol// chags pa'i mig gis rnam par blta// sngarab shadachoga'i
rim pa bzhin// gsang sngags la nga min sa bon dang// dpa'abo gsang sngags 'di ru bshad// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di
zla nyid ni/ gsang sngag43 mchog kyang de bzhin no// oM shrI badzra haru ru kaM huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ o hitaha hU~MphaT/ o badzrab rAhipaM hUMphaT swahA/ o badzab lo tsa nIye hU~MhU~M phaT/
thams cad bsgoms te mthong ban// bdag po dang ni'akhor la sogs// yashesa'akhor 'a de mthong nas// legs par dbang bskuragazhug par bya// bsgom pas gcig tubyas
nas ni// bdud rtsi mchog gis tshim pabya// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo tshogs mchog sngosanas ni// dpa' bo mo'a'a'agro mthob na// sku gsung thugs
kyi rim pa yis// dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya// 'khor sogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// don dam bzlas par bshad pa yin//
mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbapo bar ma'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu bdunang bo/ pa gde nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje snying po'i
gsang ba ste// gang yang de nyid rim pa dag/ sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// dbang po rnon po'i bsgom pa bshad// bskyod pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dag/ sgom pa de yis bsgom par bya/
[: ]thams cad mkhyepa'i ye shes so// lam gyi rnam mkhyen ye shes so// A kA'i mnyam sbyor ba// bdag nyid he ru kar yang/ mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// slan
gsum rnam par bsgyur ba'i zhal// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ 'jigs byed dang nadusamtshan gyi// mgo bo lani zhabs kyis gnon// na ra'i pags pa gos su
mnabs// zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo ljadabu la mnan// thod pa'i 'phrang ba'i dbu rgyan can// sku lus phyag rgya drug gis btab// rdo rje phag momanyamapa ldan/
gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'akhril// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// thod pa yin 'phrengab ste// snying rje nga de bas
rnam par myos// rdo dril bu mnyam ldan pa// 'dod pa'i chags pas bde bar dgyes// thod pa dngamib Ti 'dzin// ral gri dang nicang te'u 'chang// tshangasapa'i mgo bos phyag
gzhan la// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// de yi sku mdog zhal phyag mtshan// 'on kyang gri gug 'dzinapa yin// gnam mdog ser skya dmar da dkar// rnam thar gsum dang
skagasumadang// thams cad 'khor sogs mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mkha' 'gro// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drugapa// spyan gsum g.yasabarkyang gnas pas
@#/ bzhugs// yi dgas gdan la brtan par gnas// gnyis sumed pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs// mkho'agro mni kar sngo dmar// lA ma ljang khu sogs la
dkar// dum skyes ma ni dmar dkar sngo// gzugs can ma nisar sngo dmar// 'di dag ni sunagasum pa/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ yi dgas kyi steng du g.yasapa rkyang bas bzhugs
pa/ thodapa dang/ la gdang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ gri gug dang/ mgo bo dang/ cang te'u bsnams pa'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor marnam
rgyu ga shar duthod pa'i dum bu dang/ rab gtum ma ste sngo ba dang/ dkar ba dang/ dmanga'o// byang du keng rus chen po dang/ gtum migam ste dmar ba dang/ dkar ba dang/ stso
ba'o// nub tu keng rus can dang/ 'od ldan m ste dkar ba dang/ dmar ba dang/ ljang khu'o// lha rumache ba rnam par gtsags pa dang/ sna chen ma ste ljang khu dang/ dkar ba
dang dmar ba'o// me'i phyogasasu lha dgra dang/ dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste dmab dang sngo ba dang/ dkar ba'o// bdenabral du'od dpag tu med pa dang/ mi'u thung ma ste ser ba dang/
sngo pa dang/ dkarab 'o// rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje 'od dang/ lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste sngo ba dang/ dkar ba dang/ dmar ba'o// dbang ldan du rje lus dang/ shing grib maste lnga ba dang//
[4]dkar ba dang/ dmar ba'o// gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su myu gu can dang/ sa srungs ma ste dmarapa dpa/ so ba dang/ dkar ba'o// byang phyogs su rdorje ral pa canadang/
'jigs byed chen mo ste sngo ba dang/ dkar ba dang/ dmar ba'o// nub tu dpa' bo chenapo dang/ rlung gi shugs can ma ste ljang bdang/ dkarab dang/ dmarab 'o// lce ra rdo rje hUM
mdzad dang/ chang 'thung ma so sor ba dang/ sdob dang dmaba'o// ma'i phyogs su rab bzadang/ sngo bsangs lha mo ste ljang ba dang/ so bdang/ dmar ba'o// bden bral
gyi phyogs su rdo rje bzang po dang/ rab bzangam ste sngo ba dang/ dkar ba dang/ dmar ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su 'jig byed chon po dang/ rtarnam ste dmar pa dang/ sngo ba dang/ song ba'o
dab ldan ng mig mi bzang dang/ byagadongam ste dkar bdang/ sdo ba dang/ lce khu'o// sku'i 'khor le'i shar phyogs su stobs po che dang/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste dkar po dang/
sngon po dang/ ser po'o// byang phyogs su rdo rje rin chen dang/ dum skyes ma ste ser ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ ljang khu'o// nub phyogs su rta mgrin dang/ chang 'tshong ma ste dmar ba
dang/ so ba dang/ dkar ba'o// lte phyogs su nam mkha'i snying po dang/ 'khor 'dego rtsam ste sngo ba dang/ dmar ba dang/ ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs su khrag 'thung dang/ rab
dpa'amo ste ljang khu dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po'o// bden bral du pad+magar kyi dbang phyug dang/ stobs chenamoste dkar ba dang/ sngo bdang/ ljang khu'o//
ba rlung gi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzadadang/ 'khor lo sgyur ma sta ljangab dang/ dmar ba dang/ ser ba'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus chenamo stonam
mkha'i mdog can sngo bsangs dang/ sor bdang/ ljang khu'o// shar phyogs kyi sgorakhA gdong ma ste sngo ba dang/ sarab dang/ dmarab 'o// byang du'ug gdong ma ste ljang khu dang/
dmar ba dang/ dkar ba'o// nub tu khyigadongam ste serab dang/ sngo ba dang/ lcakhu'o// lho ru phag gdong ma ste dmar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ ljang khu'o// mi'i phyogs su
gshin rjesrog ma ste dkar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ ljang khu'o// bden bral du gshin rje pho nya ma ste sngo pa dang/ dkur ba dang/ dmar ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su gshin rjemache bam ste dud
khadang/ dmarab dang/ dkar ba'o// dbang ldan dugashin rje'ajoms ma ste dmarab dang/ sngo ba dang dkar ba'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dang/ rab gtumam la
sogasal rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan pa/ lagri dang/ cang te'u dang/ mgo bo dang/ thod pa dang/ kha TaM ga 'dzin pa/ pad+mapad+ma'i labu dung/ 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril
bu ste// sku gsung dag ni gnyis po yang// thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta ba'o// lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang// gri gug kyang ni de bzhin te// rwa gdong la sogs pa ni ral gri dang/ cang
ta' dang/ gri gugadang/ thodapa dang/ khaTaM ga nga/ mgo bo dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o// gshin rje srog ma la sogs pa ni thod pa dang/ kha b+haM ga dang/ ral gri dang/
lcags kyudang/ cang te'udang/ phril bu dang/ mgo bo 'dzin pa'o// de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ na ra'i pags pamanabs pa/ dpa'
bo rnams ni g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i 'phrang can/ rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can/ yi dgas kyi snying na bzhugs pa/ rnal 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par
'khril ba/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// khA gdong ma'asogs pa dang/ gshin rjesrogam la sogs pa'i lhamo rnams ni gcer bu sa grol/ yi
dgas kyi steng du g.yas brkyang ba'i zhangs kyis gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba can/ gsus pa rlob/ skye gnas ring ba/ mchod
rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ thugs rje'i chags par myos pa/ 'jigs pa'i g.yo bas 'jigs su rung ba/ 'diltar ma lus bsgoms nas ni/ ye shes 'khor la
mthob dang// ye shes chu sogs argyu dpa// dam tshig mchog gi mchod par bya// mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur// mchod nus thim par byas nas ni////
ye shes bzlas pa'i chog bzhin// btab nas 'thor 'a/ dam tshag 'khor la bad+mas byas nas// 'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig
gsang sngags khro bo'i tshig gis bzla// bde ba'i dngos grub ster ba mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad bya// mnyam
par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya// shes rab thabs kyi chog khazhin// rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen star// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa'// mngon sumadun mchog kyang stsol
ogi khadza?hahar ra katshuphruphaT/ oM a A/ i I/ u A/ sa a/ o o/ oM a: shrIhAhUM phaT swAhA/ oM hU~MhahahU~MhU~MphaT/ oM badzrapo ro tsa nI ye hU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/
oM sam bud+d+ha b+hA ki nI ye badzrab ts+tshanI ye hU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/ dpal khraga'ithungadang/ phag mo'i snying bo dang/ nyapa'i snying po'o// o ki nI ye hUM hU~MhU~MlaT/ u0f00 lA me yAM hUMphaT/
oM khaN+Da ro hilaMut+tiyaT/ isi lowuhu[%]phaT/ oM ka ra ka ra kaM hUMphaT/ o pratsaN+DitahU~M phaT/ o ku ru ku ru kaM huphruphaT/ o tsats+tshakI yaphud+d+haM waT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+dAkaMhuM hU~M phaT
oM bra b+ha ba ti ye hU~MyuphaT/ o pas ma tu sa ya paM ut+taphaT/ om pAnA se hU~MhU~M phaT/ o ko b+ha ya ko b+ha ya saM hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM hI ra ma tIye hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM hri A yu[%]phaT/
o kharba rIyi u wat+taM/ o hAhobatsu[Q]yaT/ a laM ke shwa rA ye hU~MhU~MphaT/ o pho pho ba hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM rus yi hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaTaidzuhUM phaT/ oM a ra ba tI ye hU~M

phaT/ oM ya ma ma than ye tshuhUMphaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bzlas dang bsgom pa byas nas ni// ye shes bdud rtsi bsgom byas Mnas// rang gi lha yi sbyorasaMganas//
mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rjes su bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o/// rdo rjesnying pos gsus pa/ de nas mchogagi
dam pa bshad/ mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa mchog/ cig car 'jug pa mthong nas su// rdo rje sems
dang 'basgoms nasasngo// A li u0f7a u0f7ada li las byung ba// daru kar ni bdaganyid byas// sor dang sdod lta bu ste// stong ni dkar po zhi ba'o// dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can//
spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste// phegamo yis ni rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo la g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs// drag po gdul dka'
'dul mdzad cing// bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// zla ba phyedadang ral pa 'chang// sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon// sku la phyag rgya drug gis mtshan// phyag rgya ]
[/]sdom pa mchog yin te/ stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste// gcer bu skrani grol ba yin// de yi sku dang zhal
dang mtshan// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mchu dang mtshune pa de dam// g.yeng ba yi ni ska rags can// rigs kyi dga' bas/
rnam par mos// rdo rje dril bumanyam ldan pas// phagamo yi ni ku rtsa 'dzin// thod pa dngani pa hU~M 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyumchog kyang 'dzin// tshangs pa'i pags pa brkyang
nas ni// mgo bo'i snying du phyag gis 'dzin/ cang te'u skranasnyan pa dag/ chos kyi sgras ni rab tu 'gangs// g.yonadang g.yas kyi thad du ni// mkha' 'gro bzhipo rnam par sgom/
g.yas phyogs mkha' 'gro ma lAm// byang du dum skyes gzugs canam// sde dang ngu smig dkar la ser// spyan gsum rnam bsgyuradrag po dang// dkar sngo ljang dmar dupasmig
doni rab tu cher 'bar ba'o// g.yas pa'i phyogs sukhasgoms nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// g.yon phyogs dmar dang so dang ljang// dkar po stongagi
zha' de bzhin// ljang dang dmar po ser po ste// stangagi sngon po bde ba'angade// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'chang ba dang// sku grol ba ni/
'jigs pa ste// mgokho'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnan// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin//
rdo rjedu ni phyag na bsnams// nara'i pags pa gos su mnabs// phril bu cang te'u de bzhinate// mgo po'agrigug phyag na bsnams// g.yeraka'i ska rags sgra sgrog pa// rkang
rgyan du lu ru lu'i sgra// sna tshogasapad+ma'i steng duni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs te// gdan gcig 'a na rnam par bzhugs// snying la dam tshig ye shes ni// de mdog
phyag dang phyag mtshan te// rdo rje sems dpa' pho ru ka/ mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can// thams cad de ltar bsgoms nasani// mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa// ye shes gcig
du byas nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa bzlas/ oM Ang+ga badzra pe haru ru kaM khA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM hUMphaT swahA/ oM hIha da hU~MphaT/ oM AbadzrapA rA sIye phyayaM/ zla

ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM huphruphaT swahA oM badzraparo tsa ni ye hU~MhUMphaT swAhA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang/ phag mo'i snying po dang/ nye ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 badzracha ki nI ye hU~MhU~MphaT/ obadzralA/
mo hU~MhU~MphaT/ oM badzrakhatsA re te hUM phaT/ oM badzra pi NI ye paT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bzlas ba dang ni bsgom pa bya// dus bzhi rjes 'brangarim pa yis// dam
[z tshig sdom pa gnyis med pa// mar me yang bza' bar bya// rtag tudur khrod nang du sgom// nub bdun gyi ni sbyor ba yis// mi sna dngos grub nges par 'grub// mtho bar byed
par yang kun 'gro'o// snatshogs gzugs can bde ba che// bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing// skom gyi btung ba'ang de bzhinate// phyogs kyi gos canag gyis ni// myos shing
myos pa lta bu r gnas// grib ma yang ni med pa ru// rnal 'byor chen po rnamapar spyod// ma pAr rnyir bcas pa yis// drichen chunimanyam ldan ng sa// mIs sna tshogs du ma dag/
rtse gcig pa ru bza' ba bza'// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// rtag tu zhen pas 'grobar bya// mnyam par mabazhag sbyor ba'i bdag/ yongashes mig gis mthong ba yin/
mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sdom pa'i chog ste le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// chog
bzang po bzhin nang mi// zhal brgyad pa 'a phyag bcu drug/ yang gzhalo ni bcu gnyis te// phyag na nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal// phyag ni brgyadang ldan par bya//
yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// byang chub sems dpa'i dpa' bo dang// mkha' 'gro ma dang gzungs dang ni// pha rol phyin pa'ang de bzhin te// phan tshun bye brag can gyi zhal//
mdog ni bye brag sna tshogs dang// phyag ni stongadapa'abum gyi bar// sna tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang// sna tshogs pa yi zha' ldan pa// sna tshogs pa ye gar
mdzad cing// g.yas brkyang ba mi g.yengs pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed chen po dang/ dus mtshan la sogs pa dang/ chongs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ nye dbang dang/
drag po dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ kun 'gyod gzhon nu dang/ karti ka dang/ nag po chen po dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ kub ra dang/
zla ba dang/ nyim dang/ snatshogs pa'i bdud dang/ bgags thams cad bsab tu zhabs kyis mnanapar bltas te/ 'jigs su rungub/ bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ drag
po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ bzhad pa/ mi sdug pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa/ dpa' ga/ sgog pa/ rngam pa/ sminam rnam par g.yo ba/ snyems pa/ zhi ba
g.yo ba/ zha' mi g.yo ba/ zhal rnam pa gdangs pa/ rnam par rol pa/ ljags rnam par bskyod pa/ sna tshogs pa'i nyams kyis mchog ster bar mdzad pa'o// thod pa'i
[I]'phreng ba dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rdo rje sems dpa' spyi gtsug brgyan// spyan gsum stag gi pags pa mnabs/
[4]]mgo rlon 'phreng bas sku lus brgyan// phyag rgya drug po sku la rdzogs// 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis sbyang mdzad pa'o// sku laphagamos 'khril mdzad cing// phyogs kyi gos can skagrol ba//
phyag gnyis pa 'a zhal gcig pa// dum bu'i rgyan gyi sa rigasacan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan can te// rdo rjesdigs mdzub thod pas 'khyud/ byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam pa 'khyud//
dga' bas khyab cing rnam par myos// ro drodril bus mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i ku rtsa 'tshir ba dang// thodapa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// glang po'i pags pa brkyang ba ste/ lcags kyu zhags
pa dgra sta dang// mdung rtse gsum pa mgo bo nyid// cang te'u dang nigri gug dang// mda' dang gzhu ya nged bzhin te// thod pa'i dbyug to mdung thung dang// sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun
gshing dang// 'khor lo ral gri rin chen dang/ pad+masna tshogasaro rdzudang// dbyug to yu ba rdo rjecan// ga da gdung dang pa Ti s+ya// gshin rje dbyug to chu gri dang// dung dpar du pa Na ha//
pa wa ging bu rdza rnga che// rdza mtshon chaphyag mchan bsnyams// rtsa me rmobar bltas nas su// sbatshogs phyag mtshan snatshogs 'byung// dzisrid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar// phyag rgyas
chags de bzhin te// cho ga sna tshogs de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor rnams dang// dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang// rnal 'byor mni snatshogasangag/ mdoganimatha' ]
yas sna tshogs mdog/ phyag mtshan snatshogs 'dzin pa yin// phyogs kyi gos 'chapas grol zhing// sna tshogs nyams kyi bde ba can// 'jigs rung drug/
po dang bzhad// sna tshogs gar gyis 'os spyod cing// glu dang rol me nyams de bzhin// sna tshogs dam tshig bras rnams dang// me tog sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// dridang bdug
pa de bzhin gos// ma 'phrang ba yid 'ong ba// phunasum tshogs pa'i mchod pa rnams // mdog ni sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ 'diltar sngags pas bsgoms nas ni// rnal
'byor mchog gis rdzogs byas nas// der ni 'phreng pa'i sngags kyang bzlas// yi ge nyi shuganyis bsres nas// lha mo rdo rje phag mo ni// 'di ltar de bzhin bsgom par bya// zhal
gdong sna tshogs legs mdzes pa// phug mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// phyogs kyi gos can sku grol bya// byang chub pha rol phyin pa ste// sa 'dzin thams cad de bzhin no// 'di/
skaltar chog byas nasani// 'phreng bas gsang sngags bzla bar bya// oMng+gashi ba hahe ru ru kaM/ ker ka ra/ ku'u ku'u/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tas ya las ya/ ko ya ko b+ha ya// hU~MhU~M/

cing// 'gro ba'i gnas su 'gro byed// dus ni de ma thag tuyang// sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin// rdo rje phag mo'i gsang sngags 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad stsol//
o badzra pA rAhi/ pra ti ga pra tige/ na han/ pA tAM ki Ni/ lo khi Ni khul ni/ rdzun d+hun/ badzra ste/ sho Sha ya sho la/ kha hU~M ga ka pA la d+ha ri ni/ ma hApi shi taM/

mor bdag nyid bsgoms byas na// rtsa ba brgyad kyi sngags ldan pas// bdag nyid kyang ni mchod par bya/[” ]zhal bzhi byin brlabs byas nas su// oM suM b+ha naM suM b+has mchod// yang na
zhal bzhi kun de de yi lte bar har dpal// bdag nyid bsgom pa byas nas ni// 'khor dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin bsgom// ba sha 'al sogs bza' zhing sgrub// bde gshegs
bstanal 'gro ba gdug/ skya ba cananib shar grags// dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang// mtshams med pa ni byed pa dang// gang zhigaslob dpon smong pa dang// theg pa chen
pa smod pa dang// phyugs de rnamasani bsad nas kyang// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// phyugs de rnams dgug pa yang// sgrubaposasngon du bskyod pas bya// phyugs bdun dang ni
de bzhin phyugs// bong bu mi dang rus sbal dang// khyi dang dramo ce spyang rta/ phyugs kyi marame 'di rnams ni// sgrub pa'i dbye ba'i yan log grags// rigs kyi kha dog dbyiba'i phyugs//
rkang bzhi rnams 'as glangapo che// bya rnams las ningang bsgyur te// dud 'gro rnams las mchugayo ba'i// lha rnams la lha bshos te// 'di ni phyugs kyi
brtag par bshad// grub pa'i sgrub pa rnam bshadapa// bya rog bya skye sangadang// skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang// khrung khrubazhad dang kang bu ka/ bza' dngasbyin srogagator ma
bya dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom bya ba// khyi mo nag mo'i 'om dang// sranam nag po 'bras dang ldan// ro yi khar ni sbyin srog bya// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad par bya// de nas ro de la=
nasani// ci bgyi zhes ni sgra 'gyur zhing// sa 'og 'gro ba'am ral gri 'am// tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dang ni/ ril bu mig sman gsar rnams sam// rkang mgyogs dag gam
bcud kyis 'am// gcig cig sbyin par byas nas ni// 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub// rgyud 'dir the tshomamed pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'irgyud
zabla ma'i blam las/ rnal 'byor gyi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//denas gzhanayang bshad bya ba// srung dang phyir bzlog rim pa ni// rgyu gzhan las
ni sbas pa yi// srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rgyud 'dir rab tubashad par bya// sa brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// thatsom za bar ma byo ste// sems cad rjes su srung ba'i phyir//
pad+ma'adab brgyud bri bar bya// pad+ma'i lte bar ga sar can// de rgyab sna tshogs rdo rje ste// gnod mdzes gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// de yi phyi rol ska rags bya// 'dab ma bcu drug bri
bar bya// de ni cho rnams rnam bkod de// de yis phyira'ayongs su bskor// mkhas pas lte bar bri ba ni// rdo rje rtse mo bcuganyis pa// de yi lta rab dgong pa ne// hU~Mni 'jig
pa rnam 'jigs pa// hU~Mgi lte bar yig thaM// dzaM gyi lte bar yi ge suM/ bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel zhing bri// mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhi po dag/ de yi g.yon nas dgod bsgor ba/ !
lwa kA'i ngo rudagod// u0f8bro 'alhan cig tu// mkha' 'gro dgod cing ming dngani// rnam par spel zhing bri bar bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i ma ji bzhin// mkhas pas 'dab
mar dgod bya ba// khaM= shar gyi 'dab ma la// byang du kaM tsanyid yin te// nub tu kaM yaM kho na 'o// lho ru paMmaM nyid yin no// me sogs dbang ldan phyogs rnams su// paM yaM khaM raM
laM bihU~M// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// yi ge hUM dang spel nas su// sa bon dag ni bri bar bya// kaM khaM go g+hodaM/ tsi tsho=/ 'di dag ni pad+ma'i ska rags su bri'o// rdo rje ni bcu
gnyis pa// bskoralabin du rnam par brgyan/ 'dab ma'aphyi rol bcu drug tu// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri// de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs ba// g.yon nas bskor zhing
dgod par bya// mkha' 'gro dang dpa' bo 'o// oM e/ bAmaM ma po dzaM suM suM kaMthaM suMmaM hayaM khaM/ maM mdzakhaM haMsaM/ oM suM oM su paM maM khaM/ tsa maM ! 'di
nihridang sprul nas su// o dang spel zhing bri bar bya// sgrub pa'i ming ni nang du bya// lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangabri// dzInyaTi ti TAd+ha NaM/ taM thod dz+hanaM/ paM yaM khaM g+homaM/ phyi rol
du ska rags bri'o// 'khor lo'i phyi rol gru bzhi pa'o// nanged sgo ni 'brel bar bri// ji ltar lAgadonga' sogs rim pa'i bar// gshin rje'ajoms sogs sa bon dgod// kaM

u0f00ngahuM suM/ yaM yaM yaM yaM// yaM raM laM wang TaMsaM hasbyar zhing/ hU~Mdang phaT dang rnam par spel// ming dang yang ni spel bar bya// sgo yi steng du rtse bzhi pa'i// rdo rje phyed dang khri bar bya//
zu rnams suni nyi zla dang// rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya// de steng rkang brgyad kyis brjod pa'i// khro bo brgyadapa'i zhal du blta// phyi rol sa gas dbus dag tu// phyir bzlog 'di dag bri bar

la bya namasaman kA ya pAlit+tabadzraha ru kAnI/ oM badzra he ru ka tsakrab rtisarba lo kika 'dekot+tarA Ni/ yan man tanatsun+d+hu pra yo ga dI ni ye na kan tsit+tanas ni[']kaN+Da A kaSh+Tha/ tardza ya ta
ya grots+tshagro/ b+hikAya b+hak+Shaya/ lus ya pas ya/ han han/ dgung ha/ patsapa'i/ :ts+tsaM/ ma tha ma tha/ bi b+hUs ya birIs ya/ sha ta sa has tatsuts+tshaya
tsuts+tsha ya/ oM phaT/ badzraharu ka u tsakra brti ta skye ba mu khaM tsak+Sha b+hAn b+hAn+tA/ pU/ a mu kas+ya/ shAn+taM ku ru hUM hUMphaT/ 'di yis yongs su bsko byas nas// kA ye/
ba dbus su dgod// yi le kA yi phyi lo'i tu// thayis yongs su bskor byas nas// dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongs bskor// he ru kar bdagabasgom byas nas/ yi ge bdun
pa'i sngags kyang bzla// o hiha haa mu kas+yashAn+taM ga ngu[é]hU~MphaT/ rigs nganayang na bram ze 'am// rgyal po'i bu mo'i khyad par du// rang byung me tog blangs nas su// glang chen
me tog dang bsros dang// byang chub sems ni mnyam ldan pa// ro tsa na dang lhan cig sbyar// pad+ma rdo rjechu de bzhin/ mig sman chen po dang bsres nas// lhamchog 'khor 'gro bar
bya/ rdo rje 'phrang bas rnam par bskor// mi yi pags pa'am grog 'am// yang na yi dwagasagos kyang rung// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// mar dang 'om blangs nas su// gsang
sngags rkang pa brgyadan brjod// de bzhin brtul zhugs can gyis mchod// gser ram dngulagyi bum pa dag/ ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu// gang ba'i dbus su bcug nas su// 'khor ba
srad bu dkar pos dkri// 'phreba'i gsang sngags de bzla// denas dbang bskur sbyin par bya// nad yodapa nind med byed// nad med pa yang nadadu byed// myos byed chang gi dbus su ni//
mkhas pas de 'bacug nasani// nad med nang du byed pa ste// ji lta'i las kyi rjes su 'brang// gang yang rung ba'i las rnams la// 'phreng ba'i sngags kyis rnam
par bskor// rnal 'byor sgrubapa 'khora'ani// mgo bo'i nang du sbas nas ni// mkha' 'gros de la byin rlabasani// gdon mi za bar byed bar 'gyur// ci 'dod thams cad 'grub
'gyur te// bgegs med par ni dngos grub 'gyur// mngon rab rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ srung ba'i phyir bzlog gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig ba'o//
nasang yi sgom pa bshad// sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa'i// skad cig gis ni bdag nyid dag/ lha mo phyir bzlog rim pa sta// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu drug/ gdug pa rnam
[R ]pa sna tshogs pa'i// bgegasani pad+ma'i 'og mnan nas// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusan gnas// dkar zhing sngol dmar dang ser//
steng gi zhalagyis rnamakhar brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// na babru'adakar ba'i rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas lta yi dbu rgyunacan// 'chib yang dag 'tsho ba'i
mchog/ spyan gsum pa la 'jam pa'i ngag/ gzhan gdug cing gtum pa la// sdigs mdzub rdo rjegasor mdzad cing// dril gu zhags pa 'dzin pa'imchog/ rdo rje ral gri mdudani//
[4]dgras thod pa lcags kyu dang// gzhu dung kha TaM ga 'dzin cing// mda' ni dam pa 'gasal byed// thob 'khor la mi 'jigs pa// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o// yang/
'di lan zhal brgyad la// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i ngos dag tu// g.yas pa sngo zhing dmar la ser// drag shul har bzhad pa 'o// g.yon pa ljang zhing dmar ba dang// dung kha
dag gi mdog can yin// steng mdzes shipazhi ba ste// sku lus zla ba'i mdog can no// de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// dad pas shin tu
mnyam gzhag ste// 'chi ba 'tsho ba'i rig sngags bzla// oM a mr-i ta saM dzIpin/ ma yA a mr-i tasu u kha thaM/ pra be sha yapra be sha ya/ sarba badzrapad+mas ma yo ga mA ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta'i
thabi ta mAhU~MhU~M/ A A A a sahA 'di ni khri tsam bzlas byas pas/ 'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed// dus min 'chib zhi 'gyur zhing// 'chiba'asani nges par slong
gzhan da rnala'abyor ma dgyesanas// rmad du byung bar mdzad pa ni// so so nasani gar mdzad cing// hi hi dgagis dga' ba dang// de hodag gis dgyes pa dang/ dpe dag gis
tshig tu sna/ 66 dag gis rdzogs pa'o// 6dudag ni bsam gtan no// phaT phaT dag gisagasod pa dang// 6hudag gis phur bu 'o// dza6 dag gis legs par drongs// sa
sa dag ni bden par byed/ nges par legs so zhes pa'i sgra'o// hubru dag ni gsod pa 'o// hUMb+hihUMhUM hUMphyudagan thal bar rlog pa'o// ha dag gis gsal
bar byed pa'o// hUM hUM dag ni gzi byin byed// d+hidzIdagagis legs par drongs// kr-i tridag ni mchod pa 'o// saMs dag gis dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o// hihidag
ni rmongs pa'o// le lo dag ni shis pa'o// de di dgan 'dzin pa 'o// [《]dag ni legs par dros// yuphungag ni 'khor ba'o// hIhridagazhigasodapa'o// r-idag ni makas par
mdzad pa 'o// ho da dag pa rjes su chags par bya'o// yaM dag ni srung ba 'o// hopod na dgyes pa 'o// Ti rigs dag ni gdug pa 'o// klu g+ho dag ni me tog 'o// gi gi dag ni bri'o//
dzAnaM dag ni gsang ba'o// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// zhi ba la sogs chog yi// rim pa 'di la rjes su gnas// mngon par brjod po'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 'chib
slong bar byed pa'i las thams cad byed pa'i sgom pa bstan pa ste 'a'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//de nasagazhan yang bshad bya ba/ sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim// rdo
rjesnying pos bshad pa ste// gsab kun gyimchog tu bshad// rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud pa'i rim// gsang zhing gsanga' mchog tugasang//
bskyed ba'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te/ bdaganyid de ru ku ra byas nas// mkha' 'gro mas ni yongs su khyab// sku lus dmar po 'jigs pa che/
ye shes la las nges byung ba// dmarazhing so la ltas dang// sa zhing ni stong zhal dkar// spyanagasum pa la phyag bcu gnyis// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//
'jigs byed che dang dus mtshanadag/ skyabs su 'ongs nas zhabs 'og gnon// phyag rgya drug dang zla ba phyed// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang// glang po'i pags pa gos su mnabs//
rdo dril bumanyam par ldan// ja'agri mdung ni'ajigs pa'i mchog/ thod pa dang ni latshigs 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu'achang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang//
mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnamakhar brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyasaM lnga yis rnam par brgyan// de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni// de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin//
zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang// mgo bo 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// byin pa gnyis kyis 'degs pa 'khril// gnyis med sbyor ba
mnyam ldan pa// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// klu yi ye shes las byung// de yiskud zhal phyag mtshan// zla ba'idakyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sems
@#/ dpa' rnamapar sgom// bcu gnyis cha las nges 'byung ba// dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che// thams cad mkhyen pa nges 'byung ba/ sngags kyirgyud ni
'di bzla// shrI badzra hepe ru ru kaM/ a A/ i I/ u A/ e o// o au/ aM a: TAkinI dzA la saM ba'i yuhAphaT swahA/ o a A oMA:hU~MhUMphaT/
snying bo dang nye ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 badzrab rA hi/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o o/ aM aM hAphaTasAhA/ oM badzrab i ro tsa nI ye a// saM a phyihUphaTaswAhA/
lha mo'i snying bo dang nye ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 DA ki ni dza uhUMphaT/ a lAmarI hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da rob la hU~MhU~M phaT/[u0f00] rU pi NI yo tsAhU~MphaT/[u0f00] khaN+Da ka pA la kaM hUM phaT/
o pra hU~MhU~MyatwA/ oM kaM kA la/khaM hU~MhU~M phaT/ o 6 du phaT/ oM ma h+phakaM kA le kachu[%]pa'/ oM pa hApa'i/ o bi ka To di te hUM hUMphaTi/ oM maMhuphaT/ oM su rabi ra NidaM hUM
