hU~MpaT/ o hU~MphaT/ oM badzradang phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM ma hAb+ha rab NaMhU~M phaT/ oM ha hUM phaT/ oM bi rU pAk+Sha[']hU~MphaT/ oM khaM hU~M phaT/ oM ma Ab la zinuphaT//
ri chutshu khaT/ gorata badzadaM hUMphaT/ og khi hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grwa ba b+hihUMphaT/ ogo hU~MphaT/ oM A kAsha gan+d+hanaMphruphaT/ o tsa hU~M phaT/ oM he ru ka paM hUMphaT/ oM
sushubaT/ oM pad+ma narte shwa ra ya tshuphaT/ oM maM hU~M phaT/ o pa ro tsazhib cuphaT/ oM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzras tA b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM ma hUM phaT/ oM yaM hUM phaT/ o rje hUMphaT/
e li hU~MphaT/ oM hUM phaT/ oMri'i hUMphaT/ iNi huphaT/ oM saM hU~M phaTaM/ oM ha yaTi/ 'di dag ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsong ba'i
mchog tugyur pa// de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa'apo dmar// mkha' 'gro mni sngon po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// 'jigs
byed chen po bzhin rnam bsgyur// zhe sdang gis khyab bde chen bo// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dkar// mkha' 'gro ma ni dmar bo ste// pad+madril bu mnyam par ldan// 'dod chags
kyis khyab bde chenakho/ sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo sar// mkha' 'grom dkar me yi mdog/ gti mug gis khyab bde bache/ mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams // sna tshogs mdog
canasnod chen po/ lA gdong la sogs lha mo rnams // dmarasadakal lcapakhu 'o// gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams // so zhing saral ljang ba dang//
dbazhinadakarab 'imadogatamano 'khoralasogs pa thams cad kun// spyan gsum g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// dpa'apho stag gi pags mnabs shing// lhamo thamA
cad gcer pu ste// skragrel ba ni rnam par mdzes// byin pa gnyis kyis 'degs par 'khril// dum bu'irgyan gyi ska rags can// thams cad blopa'i 'phreng ba 'chang// phyag rgya
lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing// dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams // thod pa rdo rje pad+madang// 'khor leyang ni de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro ma sogs bu gdod//
gshin rje srab sogs lha me rnams // thod pa dngani bkr-i 'dzin// ma la dri dang ro dang reg/ gos mchog yid du'ong pa dang// cang te'u dungani dril bu 'dzin// mkha' 'gro mni
thodapa dang// khaTaM ga yang 'dzin mdzad cing/ dril bu cang te'u gri gug bsnams// khAgadong la sogs lha mo rnams // phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag/ thams cad yi dgas
gdan la bzhugs/[© ]phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ thugasakyi'akhor lo drag po ste// gsung gi 'khoralaskyod pa'i zhal// sku yi 'khor lo nib ste// mkha' 'gro mni
bzhin ma bsgyur// jiltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nasani// dbusakyigatsobor rnam par brtag/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dba'am/ khrobo sna tshogs dum 'am// gcig
dbazhin gshegs pa 'am// mamo rigs kyi khyadabar dang// 'od zer cananam skul bye dam// shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin// gang dang gang dag sgom pa ni// yid kyi dbang po
spor ba dag de yis dregs pa byas pani// snatshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// yang na rdo rjesams dpa' ni// stsatshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar gnas// thams cad
mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad// bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las/ rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstanapa
ste le'anyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/// de nasagazhanayang bshad bya ba/ mkha' 'gro rigs kyi cho ga'i rim// snatshogs du ma'i rigs su bshad// mdor bsdus
nani gsum dang lta// pra tuyang ni rab tu grags// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i blom ste// mkha' 'grom 'khoralasogs kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// rigs las yong
dag 'byung ba yin// sku na sogo 'byung ba ste// gzhan du thams cad mtsho'i rigs// dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong ba// yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa/
@#// chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bgapos de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon 'dikhashad cibastan pa/ hU~M oM hrilawaM/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis// sangs//
rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams // rab tugayo zhing brgyal nas kyang// rdo rje ye shes rjes su dran// mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// 'od dpag med dang don yod
grub// rdo rjesems dpa' bde ba che// 'di ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang// rdo rjemakha' 'gro rab tu grags// thog mar rdo rjemakha' 'gro ste// gnyis pa sas rgyas mkha' 'gro
yin// gsum pa rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// bzhi ba papa'i mkha' 'gro yin// lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// drug pa rdo rjesams dba'ain// lnga po har karashes bya// jo dpa' bo
yang de nyid// nam mkha'ibras kyis longs spyod cing// sgruba'i brasakyisayongs kyang spyad// sprul pa'i longs spyod nam mkha'aste// pad+ma'i zas kyis longs spyod cing// snatshogasales
spyod spyal sto/ sna tshogs gas kyi mchog dmal/ mkha'amanyamadri mngarnam par dag/ gas kyi rang bzhin lta bu bsil// dag pa'i mdo gcan mchogagi mdog/ zlaba'i zadang 'drab chog
smyonagasum skalab sna tshogs bzang// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// zla ba nye ma'idabusan gnas// rdo rje skyilamo krung du bzhugs// thams cad la kha'icod pan can// thod pa'i 'phreng
ba' de bzhin te// phyag rgya drug ni thams cad rgyu// rang gi kha dgalalegs par bzhugs// glababasang se rta dang ni// rmakhyadang mamakha' lding// de yi steng du yi dgasal/dan// bsgomam
nadangos grub rab tu stsol// rdo rjelag gis sa la reg/ rdo dril bu dkur brten cing// zhal gyi mtshunirnam par bsgyur// 'khor la dril bu 'gying dbacas// rin chen phri'i bu'ade bzhin
pa'i dril bu'i rim pa dang// dril bu sna tshogs rdo rjenyid// thams cad snyams par rnam bsgoms te// rigs kyi rdo rjemchog dam pa// dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya// sgo bzhi ni yang dag
ldan// jo rdzo'akhor los sgyur ba ste// rin chen pas de bzhin sgor// sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba ste// dbus su rdo rjes bskor bar bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// khang pa brtsegs pa yid
lo mchog/ rigs drug dag ni rnam par dgod// der niganas sogs rim par dgod// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa ni// rdo rjesems dpa' bde ba che// de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la/
pul+li ra ma ya na thodapa'i dum bu dang/ rab tum ma'o// byang du[]lamyur na kengarus chen po dang/ gtumamig ma'o// nub tu orunan keng rus can dang/ bod ldan ma'o lcer
aredu tanam ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ snachenam snyadabus niso dngapo rab tudaga' ba ste/ dpa'ab sku mdog nag po/ mkha' 'gro mtha' ba dang sprin gyi mdog can/ dpa' bo ni ro drang
rdo rje dril bu dang/ mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang/ rdo rje sdigs mdzubate// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khoradabus su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde/
chen po'o// shar phyogs kyi sgorago dA ba rin lhag dang/ dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o/ byang du me shA ran 'od dpag med dang/ mi'u thung ma'o// nub tud bko Tan rdo rje 'od dang/
lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// lho ru mul ban jo rje sku dang/ shing gribam ste dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po/ mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'o// dri ma med pa'i sa ni dbus ma ste sangs rgyas mkha' 'groma'o

'od byed pa'i sa'i dbus na rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ shar gyi sgo ra kA ma rU pa na myu gu snyan dang/ sa srungs ma'o// byang du o sngon rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo'o// nub tu tri sha ku
chen dba' bo chen bo dang/ rlung gangeshugasacanama'o// lho ru ko sa la na rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang/ chang 'thung ma ste dpa' bo sopo/ mkha' 'grom ljang khu'o// 'od 'phro ba'i sa'i dbus su pad+ma'i
mkho 'a 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor ka li ka na rab bzang dang/ sngo bsangs lha mo'o// byang du lopA kan rdo rje bzang dang/ rab bzangamo'o// nub tukAkhyen 'jigs byed chen po
dang/ rta rnamakho// lce ru him la lan mig mi bzadang/ bya gdong ma ste dpa' bo dmarapo/ mkha' 'gro mni dkar mo'o// sbyang daka' ba'i sa dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar
gyi sgo dre ta pu rin stobs po chadang/ 'khor de'i shugs can ma'o// byang du gro bde ba tAn rdo rje rin chen dang/ dum skyes ma'o// nub tu sorawan rta mgrin dang/ chang 'tshong ma'o//
lha ra su brtsa dri pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha na sa dba' bo nag bo da mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'o// mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs
kyi sgor na gar ni daru ka dang rab dpa' mo'o// byang ng sin parnagar gyi dbang phyug dang/ stos chen ma'o// nub tum ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// lho ru
ku la tu na rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ brtson chen mo stongang 'khonistsotshogs kyi mdog canol/ mkha' 'gro ma dung ba'i mdog canano/ dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol tu// yi dgos 'phrobs
gongs su bskor// de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje// zur du mkha' 'gro ma yapa// mkha' 'gro ma dang lam dang// dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// thod pa bzhi ni mtshams su//
dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtshamasusuni// ring dusos mkha' 'gro ma// 'am mi g.yo ba yi sa// legs pa'i blo gros dum skyes ma// gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin// sngo zhing ser la
ljang ba dang// bzhi pa dmar ba'i mdog can yin// khu gdonga' sogs mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrogam// gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma// byed ni bu
mdadab phyug zhal// dpa' bo thams cad gayas brkyang gnas// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phrobs rnam
bar brgyan// khyogs kyi gos 'tshang sku grol ba// yid 'ongamakha' 'gro ma yi rigs// thams cad yi dgas stang du bzhugs// dkyil 'khor mchog nirnam par sgom/ pad+ma'aganas
'khor leni// dkyil 'khor sdom pa'i mchog yin no// thod pa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// cang te'u ni phyag g.yasan// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs// phyag mtshanadag gis rnam
bar brgyan// bA gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma// lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan// g.yon par pa tshigs g.yas pa ni// jisrid zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// dril bu yang ni/
bzhin no// gshin rje srog sogs mkha' 'grom// me long ni pi wang dang// dri dang ro ni g.yas pa na// g.yon la thod pa kha TaM ga/ dngos grub thamasacad rab stsol ba'i// rang
tsha gicigs kyi dbu rgyan can// thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas// 'khor leso sor bsgoms nas ni// 'khoradabacas pas yongs su khyab// ye shes sems dpa' thugs kar blta//
rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis// ye shes 'khoralede mthong nas// bsgoms pas thim par byas nas su// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis// dbang bskur nasanirim par spro//
oM AbAhU~M/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// srog dang rtsol pa rim pas bya// mnyam pa sngos nas dbang bskur byin// ji lta rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// rtogs pa med par bzlas/
bsgom bya/[” ]ji ltar gsang sngags rjesamathun par// dam tshig can gyis brlas par bya// hAhU~M/ oM hU~MlaMthaM/ o a paM hUM/ ong ma dAsu khaM badzras tAb+hAkini dzA'angashaM ba raM hUM
phaT sAhA/ ongashibat+taka a 'a la A:hAt+taki ni dzA ngagaM ba ra AthaT sAhA/[u0f00] shrI rataDA ki hU~M A a/TAka ni dzA la saM ba ra hUMphaT swAhA 9 shi ba kAke tsha a bu ki ni dzA'agaM
ba ra yaT sAhA/ oM shrI badzra TA ka hU~M phaT/[u0f8b]TA ki nI dzA 'a ngashi ba ra hUM phaT swahA/ o Ti bi sha DA ka po'i A U DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra hU~M phaT swAhA/ obaAphaT/ o pra hrul//

'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun// bsgom la gnas nas bzlas pa bya// 'khor lo sgyur drug lhan cig tu// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma bzlos bya// dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba yis/
mtshig dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ gnyisamed 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas na dngos grub 'gyur// zla drug nges te gzhan min par// 'khor la sgyur drug dngos grub
'thob// yang na rdo rjesams sa' dang// rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang/ pad+mag dbang rgyal po dang// dbang phyug rta mchog de ru ka/ gnas sogs pa yi sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas nges
bar bsgoms nas ni/ rim par sbyor ba'i rim pa dang/ brgyud pa'i gnas kyi rim pa dang// rnal 'byor ma yi bka' dag ni// blama'i brgyudabs 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan du sngags pa
'khor byed cing/ bka' ni nam yong mtho ma yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rigs drug gi 'khor sgyur ba'i bka'ile'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/
de nas gzhan la bshad bya ba// rnala'abyor 'am ni red dka' ba// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor snying// gzhan gyi rnal 'byor rjes mthun par// yi ga las byungacig caratshul// cig//
caramtshanam phyag mtshan yin// cig car rdo rjesems dpa'aste// bde bachen po bla na med// de ru 'jug cing de yi tshul// cig car du dpal mchog/ ston ka'inamamakha' dri med
ltar// zar ma'im tog dang mtshungs pa// phyag brgyud pa 'a zhal bzhi pa// 'jigs shing rab 'jigs par mdzad// g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum rnal 'byor
ma yi bgatso// zhal gdang g.yon dkarags dmar te// stangagi zhal ni seral mdzes// dpal ngo bod pa'i 'phreng ba can// sangs rgyas lnga yis byin rlabs can/ stag gi pags pa
gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dusamtshan dag/ zhabs kyi pad+mar gnon par bazhugs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas 'khyud// phagamo
yi ni byin bas 'khril// gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pas// dbu skra grol ba phyogs gros can// sku mdog mnyam zhing mtshungs par ldan// ma bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ de
gi zhal dang phyag mtshan can// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab tu stsol// thod pa dang ni kha 'dzin/ rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste// thob mdu sa gzhan du min// tshangs pa'i mgo bos
brgyan pa la// zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// rdo rje mtshanam dag gis brgyan// rdo rje 'phrangapa'i
dbu rgyan can// 'og pag rnag gis ska rags byas// dpung rgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa ste// sngags pa'i gtsobos gsang stogasani// 'di ltar choga'i snying po shes// phag mo bde bar
gnas pa ni// rgyal ba'i pags pa rnam par spras// phag mo'i rgyal ba'i mtshanasogs las// cang te'u gri gug rnams kyis brgyan// bcom ldan 'dasan lte ba'i dbus// pad+ma'adab
brgyad yid 'ong ba// sna tshogs pad+mamadog mdzes la// thams cad rnam dag mchog dam pa/ shar gyi 'dab sogs phyogs cha// mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod// shar yul
la phyag brgyadapa// spyanagasum drag po gzi brjid can// skyil mo krunganiphyed par bzhugs// sku grol ba ni yid 'ong ba// phyogs kyi gos can mgo yi 'phreng// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par
pa khad dpa'// khyad dupAm dbazhanatra// nub tu dum skyes ma yin no// lhar gzugs can ma yin te// rtogs dang soradang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dag ni bzhi pa 'o// zhal bzhi pa/
brgyan// thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing// dril buca te'u gri gug dang// de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzinacing// jo rdzamadung mchog phyag na 'dzin// snyems pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing//
na thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos// sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang// ljang khu stong gi zha'adaka'o// sel zhing spol ljang ba dang// stong gi zhal gdong drag la dmar// mar dang sngo dang
ljang bu dang// stagi zhal ni dkar la zhi// ljangadang dmar dang sngo ba dang// stong gi zhal ni ser po mchog/ bdud bzhi po ni zhabs kyis gnon// bcom ldan 'dasal gdong gis blta//
zur gyi cha ra ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gab// de yi stang du thong pani// byang chub 'o mas rab gab// phyi lo'i dam tshig gsum 'khor le// khang pa brtsegs pa
legs par mdzes// shar phyogs su ni go rwa sti// byang ng de bzhinatsir ma/ nub tu rab rmongs ma yin no// lho ru yang ni ro langs ma// ma 'a wes byed ma yin te/ bdenabral
nga ni gtum mo yin// rlung phyogs sma ma nyid yin te// dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste/ de bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyang ni// dkar mo sor sngo ljang khu// skul byed dam 'a sngo ljang khu//
rab rmongs ma ni sngo ser ljapa// rolas ma ni dkar po ljang// lces byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog/ dmar dang sngo dang ljang khu'o// gtum mo yang ni lcang sosaro// smra mo yang ni dung sngo
ljang// har ka masngo ljang dmar// 'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang// spyan gsum pa lasku grol ba// phyogs kyi gos 'chang gar dang bcas// yi dgasagangan la legs par[I]
bzhugs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par bargyan// kha hUM thod pa dril bu dang// cang te'u zhugs pa lcags kyu thogs// thams cad thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan//
zla mi bskyodapa yi cod pan byas// 'di ltaraganas dang gnas kyi// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// 'di ltar thugs kyi 'khor leni// lha mo dkar mo la sogasab// rnal 'byor
'gyi mni rab tu bshad// bsnyen pas bka'adrin stsol mdzad de// thog pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'grub// lha mo ma ba'aspyod grub nas ni// mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang rnyed// de phyir phyi
rolagasung 'khor lo// shar du pe wang stang stabs ma/ byang du gling bu'i stang stabasam// nub tu rdza chostang stabs// lha ra rdza lnga'i sangostangs te// so dang ser dang dmar ljang
khu ma sogs rje bzhad ma ste// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rdzaglu// rdo rdzogar te dmar ba dang// phyogs dang sor dang lcapakhu'o// de dag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// gcer bu dbu skra grol kha
dang// thod pa yini'aphreng ba can// spyan gsum pa 'a yid 'ong ba// thod pa dang na ba hU~M 'dzin// tsham rngam lag pa'i stastabs kyis/ ro dril bu stangastabs can// mkhrig ma/
mnyamakha byas nas ni// pad+mabaskorapa'i stang stabs can// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dani// tshan de dang tshan do ha// de dag 'od dpag medadabu rgyan// sku yi 'khorale'i shar du ni//
[z]ma tog ma byang bdug pa ma// nub tumar me lho ru dri// serd dung kha dmadakar po/ me longaro dang reg bya chos// me phyogs la sogs mtshams bzhi ste// zla ba'i mdog can/
dmar ljangadakar// de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste// gcer budabu skra grol ba dang// zhabs kyis kun tu gar byed cing// phyag tumachod pa thogs nas ni// thod pa kha rgyug 'dzin cing//
cang te'u ni phyagan bsnams// shod pa ya ni 'phreng ba can// lha mo de dag 'dus pa dang// nye ba'i 'dus pa dur khrod dang// nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te// rnam par snang mdzad dbu
rgyan byas// sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang// rdo zhags pa rdo rje sgrog/ rdo rje dril bu de bzhin te// rtogs dang lnga dang dmar dang ser/ shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi phyogs
kyang de bzhin no// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ni// gshin rje srog la sogs pa dag/ dmar dang sngo dang dung kha sar// thod pa dang ni kha ga/ rang gi mtshan cang te'u dang//
gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang// spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// gcer bugur gyi gnas bas bzhugs// thams cad phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// thod pa yi ni 'phreng ba can// rang gi
rigs kyi cod pan can// ji lta'i rim pas rjes su gnas// de yi snying khar yongashes sems// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor 'bo gsum// gtso bo'i bangagapo bsgom par bya// dkar dang
dmar dang spro ba yi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ ji lta bu yis bsgoms pa na// rjes su bstan pa'i bsgom pa las// ye shes lcags kyu dag gis ni//
la shes 'khor lo bkuganasani// jiltar rim pas mchod dbang bskur// gcig tu bsdus te bstims nas su// ji lta'i rim pa bsgoms nas su// ye shesabazlas pa dag kya@#//
spro bsdu srog dang rtsol ba yis// 'thor 'thung rim pas byas pa yi// slob dpon gyisani bzlas pa bya// oM AhUM/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis// grangs med par ni byas nas su
jisrid skyo bar ma gyur par// gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni// mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas par bya// dung chen 'phreng ba blangs nas ni// sdom pa mchogagi bzlas pa bya// oM A:hU~M o

shrI badzra he ru ru kaMud+d+haMphaT/ DA ki ni dzAl saM ba raM swahA/ oM badzra bA rAhehU~MhU~MphaT/ oM b+hA ki nI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/[u0f00] lA me huhU~M phaT/[u0f00] khaN+Da ro hahU~MhU~MphaT/ o ra pa NI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/
o gi ri hU~MhU~MphaT/ o rihU~MhU~M thaT/ oM pra mo taduhU~MphaT/ o be ta lA tshu[%]phaT/ o puk+ka si dzuk+tiyaT/[u0f00] tsaNa'adu phaT/ oM sma rIhu hU~M phaT/ oM he ru ka b+he hu hU~M phaT/

ba00 badzra ni ta hU~M phaT/ oM badzrapAny+tsa hU~M hU~MphaT/ oM badzrarU pahU~MhU~M phaT/ o badzradIpe hU~MhU~M yan/ oM badzragan+d+he hU~MhU~M phaT/[u0f00] rU pa badzra dzAphaT/ oMrAs badzra phuhUM phaT/ o sngarangasha

hAphaT/ oM ya ma rU tI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM ya mang+goNi ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma thanA le hUM hUM phaT/ dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas// mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tul zla// nang gi bdage
nyid sbyor ldan pas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// rang gi thabs dang rig pa'i lus// gnyis su med par mnyam pa'i bdag/ khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas/ 'gro ba gsum po
bcas pa ni// har karani byas nas kyang// sa rnams gsum po ma lus par// thamasacad der bsdus nas kyang// sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor tshog ste//
'khor lo bsgom pa'i bzlas pa'o// ragi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rgyu dang mi rgyumathong ba na// dam tshig can nyid la ngas dus su// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// dpa' bo da ni rnal
'byor ma// mkha' 'gro dang nimakha' 'gro ma// kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya// khro bo bde ba'idagyes pa yi/ longasasbyong 'a sa nibyungab yi// rab rmos ma yis bsnyen byas nas// bde/
ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te// ya te nad Tamasu ra Am su hU pa ra dzo i ni ka ma la su hu/ a la 'kha ho/ sur a ut+ta ma ma hUM mahAsid+d+haM/ u mdzoki ni dzalam
ho/ A I/ a A ra ho/ aru byin nu su ba yanAha/ su ra a ru dud nyib ra TA in/ dzalasu hUb sa pha na ta ro Na Na pa de he ma hAs yU mdzAm b+hu mo klu pa la ka kha su/ tut+taMs skrun mi sut+taM/
badz+dziu mo khu su hU/ in i du/ kho la thai mo khu su'u/ ba su ipaM ka a madz+dza tanun bar/ Apa da twaM/ b+hu dza tanu muny+tsa ma ha sa/ i la dpAl/ u ma hU/ a ra baagi
a paM u ri su/ 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni// dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste// snyanacing 'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i dbyangs// dpyid kyi rgyal bo'iglablangs pas// mkha' 'gro'i//
dral dri med rnams // gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yi// rdo rdzob yid 'ong ba// sbyor bas das grub thams cad 'grub// dgyes pa 'di yis bskul n ni// bde ba chen po stsol ba yin/
sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu// rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar// thogam dbus dmathar thug par// yi ge brgya nga 'i gsang sngags bzla// 'khor lo dgazhi brtan byas te// dpa'abod nimakha'
'gro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngagasate// khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// thams cad snying kha'i brtan byas te// bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur// gal te bdag
00/ nyidadas grub 'dod// dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin// oM badzra ru ka sa ma ya ma nupAlA ya ba ha ka/ tenopatiSh+Thadri d+ho me b+ha ba/ su to'u eb+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po
blomi thu ba/ sarbasid+d+him+me pra yatsa/ sarba karmasutsametsit+taMshe ya: kuruhUM/ ha ha ha ho:/ bu ga ban/ badzahar ka mA memulcabar ka b+ha ba/ ma hAs ma ya sa tA pa: hU~MphaT swAhA/ 'di
ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing// yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa// har ka mchog rab nyid yin// phyir bzlog pa gang yin pa// bcu drug 'dab ma 'bakod cing// rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil
'khor kun// bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor pa yis// theltar bde ba gnas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms nani// khams gsum pa yakhamathong
gyur te// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshananyid de// de ltarasridapa'ang stong pa yin// bsgoms pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas// 'di ni dka' thub bshad pa med// 'phreng ba medacing
sngags kyang med// gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dpa// choga'irim pa'i gzhi yang med// rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis rim pa'ang med// rdo rje/
chen po dngos 'dzin pa// rang byung dngos grub kun madzadab/ 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med// bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni// lteba'i dbus su
rnam par sgom// yi le gnas kyi mchog gyur pa// lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni// de yi dbus su rnam par bsam// sku gsung thugasani 'dus pa can// de la/
lus 'a sa 'dasagyur te// sems kyi dngos kyabatsal du med// chags pa med cing chags pra' med// chags khral dang ni ldan gyur pa// snying gi pad+ma'i dbus suni// brtags pas legs
tshu par rnyed pa ni// yid kyis ngal bsos byas pa ste// rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin// phyag rgya ma chog tu bshad pa'o// zla ba'i steng du brgya byed brgyan/ ye shesasems ni bsams pa ni//
mchog ste spyad par bya ba med// blama'i man ngag lam dang ni// sems ni mchog tu 'bad pa yis// 'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni// 'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te// sbyor dang sbyor ba brul byas
nas rtago 'phangagacig pus khyab pa yi// 'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu red par dka' ba ste// dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge las byung gzhan du yang// stugs ngan gzhung lugs 'degs pa'i blo gros/
nyid ni// ma ni shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sku gsung thugs kyiganas kyi rim pa'i 'bu ste nyi shu rtsa lngakha'o/
de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// thod pa sangs rgyas mchogadam pa// de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab stso'akha// gsangal 'jigs par sbabyazhing// gang
gis sula'ang ma bstan to// de nyid mchog gi sgom pa bzung// rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas// gsang ba bstan par spa bya zhing// blama'i ga ni bsgom par bya// dur khrod gnas
ni yid 'ong ba// sgrub pa po yis nges bstan pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje lte ba'i dbusasani// yig hU~Mnibasgom par bya// de yis khyab par
bag nyid ni// sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog/ gnasamed zhi zhing dag pa ste// rtog pa thams cad rnam sras yin// A li kA 'a 'das rang 'byung// gnyisamangamchog tu zhi ba ste//
phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// 'dzam bumadog can mnyam pas khyab// 'od zer 'phro bas kun tub khrigs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//
spyan gsum pa 'bazhadang zha'/// sems dpa' kun gyi sgom pa ste// gnyis med chos ni blon med// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// nara'i pags pa stong du brkyang// thod pa dang/
ni kha hU~M 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// mgopo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni// rkang gis rab tug bdang//
semasacan kun gyi don gyi phyir// ye shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa/ khaTaM ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor// thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste// 'jigs pa ma lus mi/
'jigs grol// gdugacing 'jigs bam 'dus kun// 'di ni zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad// gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong// zla ba phyed pa zhib/
za 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan// rdo rdzo'aphreng bas dpal bamadzes// rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan chacan// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi// lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni//
'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ chags pa zhe sdapazhabs kyis gnon// ye shes sems dpa' da gzugs can// yi ge hU~M las byung bar sgom// thugs kyi 'khor le snying kha ru/
ru kani rnam par sgom// gsung gi 'khor lo bal sgom// sku yi 'khor 'o snga ma bzhin// sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang// phyag drug pa 'bazhal gsum pa// rdo rje dril bu mnyamapar/
ldan// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams bsgyur// thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin// rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang// rang gi lus dang yang dag 'as// bde ba chenapo'i go 'phang gnas// dkyil
[” ]'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu// yi ga gsum sogs las byung ba// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rang gi mtshanama'i mchog dang ldan// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sdom
pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa// mkha' 'gro ma da' ma dang// dum skyesam dang gzugs can ma// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas 'al dgod// thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te// mkha' 'gro mni
kha dogasar/ lA ma pa la sha yi mdog/ dum skyes ma'i sngon po ste// gzugs canamani dmara' 'bar// thod pa dngani ba khri 'dzin// g.yas nga mi 'jigs mchog yin te// sgo rnams
suni lca mo bzhi// rwa gdo' sogs mkha' 'gro ma// so dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// lta bu drag po'i gzugs can no/ mtshams su gshin rje srog la sogs// rab 'jigs
shin tu 'jigs pa ste// thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin// mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te// cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid// bdud ni bzhi po'i stong na bzhugs// spyan gsum pa las grol
ba phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// thed pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// ma le ro dang dri dang ni// 'og gi mchod pa bzhi po ste// sa bcu dag ni ri/
pa dang// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun// byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ ka 'asogs pa nyi shu bzhi// mgo la ban dus mnan pa ste// gsal/
byed yuMganyis dang yang sbyar/ mthar ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yi ming// mthar ni hU~MhUM
phaT yonate// 'di ltar rab gtum mkha' 'gro ma// sngagasakyid nyid bde ba ster// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo ni// hU~MA:o/ 'di nirab tu gsang ba ste// pad+ma'i 'dab 'amakha 'gro ma//
gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa// hU~Mni gnyis pa nyid yin te// mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// gdong la sogs gsang sngagasani// ya ral wa/ gsal byed
dang ni bcas paste// mthar ni hUM phaTadangasbyar// gshinarjesreg ma la sogasakha/ shaShasaha/ gsal byed dang ni hU~Mganyis dang// phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus su sangs
rgyas thodapa yi// gsang sngags de bzhi rjes su dran// u0f00 aM kaM/ oM I/ aM hUM/ e e/ oM aSha swAhA/ khams dang phung po skye mched la// go cha dang ni sbyar bar bya/ g.yeshes
'khora' dam tshig dag/ mnyam pa'i ra yis mchod par bya// mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams // ramipagasal byed byas te// 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar// sangs rgyas
thod pa las byung ba// rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste// thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar// 'thor 'thung du rab sbyar bas// gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya// sprod bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ 'khor/
lo gsum gyi rim pa dang// 'dir ni choga'i sbyorab yis// dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su// dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya// dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig can gyi
gsang sngags kun// sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag/ dmatshig rtag tubaskyang bya zhing// yongashes 'chi med lta
mi mag yang na rang mi bzlas pa bya// sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya// u0f00 shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li hU~M A:hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raMhU~MphaTasAhA/ 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor mchog/ rnal 'byom
gi ye shes mchog gang du dam tshig nyams pa la/ sbyor ba 'di'i sbyin par bya// zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa// rnal 'byor yi dbang yang bskur// dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis// phyi dang
nagi chus khrus bya// yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang// bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste// dam tshagasani 'gal zhonganyams// bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod
cig/ gtso bo rdo rdzob yin pa ste// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// 'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi// des ni the tshom med byas nas// nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur// mngon par brjod
ba'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o///denas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i de nyidared dka'
ba gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang// 'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang// rnal 'byoram dang dpa'abo kun// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin// mi zad gnyid med rnam par
ga/ thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// a yi ye shes las byung ba// rdo rjesams dpa' bde ba che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyanagasum pa 'khrugs rje'i nyams// phyag rgya dang
yang dag ldan// rang bzhin dgaci dri ma med// ral pa zla phyed dbu la brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mtshan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas/
lnga yis rnam par brgyan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// rdo rjedi'i bumanyamapar ldan// ral gri lcags kyuphyag na bsnams// rin
chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad rab tustsol// dkar dngaso dang dmar ba'i zhal// rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes sems dang 'asnying kha ru// 'khor
lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom// hU~M las thugs kyi 'khor 'aste// de yang phyag mtshan sngon po dang/ Alas gsungag 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshanadamarapo 'o// o~M las sku yi
'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor// sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med// raMlas phyag rgya chenapo ste// lteba'i dbus su rnam par bsam//
i las lhag pad+maste// byang chub zla ba drim med// u ni snying khar bsam pa ste// a ni mgo rnam par dgod// an spyi gdatsug dag tu dgod// oM ni mig tudagodapa ste// au ni go
char byas nas su// a ni mdun gyimatshon cha'o// las lha mo spyan yin te// yolas dam tshig sgrol ma yin/ lAlas lha mo gos dkar mo// tAM las rin chen yang dag 'byung
rin chen sgron dang yongashes sgron// dkar zhing 'ashayi mdog/ dmar zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i mdog/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa// spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos// thams cad
phyogs kyigos can te// rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan// 'khoralesna tshogs rdo rdzudang// pad+ma dmar po rin chen dang// rdo rje dril bu lhan tsig sbyar// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// ral
gyi mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin// gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thod pa yini cod pan can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni// sems dpa'i
skye'amo krung du bzhugs// de dag sgo 'dagodapa ste// dbus su gtso kho'i zla ba'i gdan// zur 'al mchod pa rnam pa bzhi// phyogs kyi gos can sku grol ba// zhal gsum pa la phyag dragapa//
spyan gsum thopa'i 'phrangab can// mele dang ni pi wang dang// drid du dang bcud kyis len// chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod// gzhan du ji ltarab dag po bzhin// rgyan rnams thams cad
yongs su rdzogs// skyil kruphyed pas legs par bzhugs// lag pa snyim pa'i thal mo yis// mchod pa 'a ga tu thogs nas ni// 'di lta'i chogs thams cad makhyen// A li de nyid drin
med// gsang ba mchog ni red dka' ba// rdo rjesems dpas bshad pa yin// sngags kyi de nyid tsho ga dag/ sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar// oM shrI ma hAsu kha bas tA A/ atshut+taki'i
la shaM ba raM swAhA/ oM sid+d+hi lo tsa nA:hU~M swA hA/ oM sa ma ya tA re tut+tar tu re yaMAhU~MswAhA/ oM bad+mob+hAwe pAtsA ra ba si nisi tAM AhU~MswAhA/ oM ratAku la ke ka rat+tha
zadzA'i nI[]AhU~MswAhA/ oM ru ra badzi[é ]/ oM shap+ta badzIhUM/ ogatsA badzIwaM/ o ra sa badzihi/ thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par sgom// A li
rdordzogasang ba ste// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba/ 2 bar yi gsang ba bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru// bzlas dang bsgom par
ldan par bya// som ti kha Na sa cad spangs nasani/ sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan// yengashes 'khor lo mthong nas ni// dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur/// de dag
gcig tu bstims nas su// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu // 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang// ma 'ongs pa la dus
gsum po// de ltar sems can gsum po la// rdo rjesams dpa'i go 'phang gnas// lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag/ thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no// mngonang ra brjod pa'i/
rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o/// de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad// 'jam pa'i rdo rdzasgrub bani/ maM gyi yi ge
'a[4/ ]las byung ba'i// 'jam pa'i rdo rjebade ba che// zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste// skumadog dkar po dri ma med// spyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can// phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan/ mi
bskyod pa yi cod ban can// thod pa'i 'brang bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba khyad pa zhi ba 'dzin// phal pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid// ser dang ljang khu de
bzhin te// steng gi zhal ni zhi ba sta// lcal dngos grub 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje dril bumanyam par ldan// la gri pa ti 'dzin pa ste// ut+pal dang lcags kyu nyid// ye shes 'as can
rnam pa bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par sgom// sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar/ gsang sngags 'di ni
rjes su dran// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gsang ba ni// gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can// da 'bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o// o gi ma su kha maN+Dabadzraa maM hUMt+tAki nI dzA la saM ba raMswAhA/ rang
gis dbang bskur byas nas ni// brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla// gsang gsum 'khor 'kho spros nas ni// khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// 'doni mchog tu gsangabaste// khang
gis su la'ang bstan mkhya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 'jam pa'i rdo rjesgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa 'o///de Nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
yi go dgu pa sgrub pa ste// kA yi li ga las byung ba// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// tha byed mkha' 'gro za byedacing// rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed// mkha' mnyam/
stong pa las byung ba// nam mkha'i longs spyod zabyedacing// zhal drug phyagani panuganyis pa// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// g.yas brkyang ba yizhabasakyis bsgyur// gdug pa'i
bdu ni za byed cing// 'jigs byed dngani 'dzagis byedamo// kha sbub zhabs kyis mnan por bzhugs// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par rgyan//
thod pa'i 'phrongaba'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// sna tshogs rdo rjes ra'apa can// phyag rgya drug gis sa lus brgyan// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// 'jigs
byed rab tu cher 'jigs shing/ so dang dud kha ljang khu dang// dam dang ldapaser po 'o// drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ stong gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs// thal ba sprin gyi mdog canal/
gdug pa thams cad rab 'jomasam// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing// pang du rdo rjephagamo ni// de mdog stang zhal phag mo ste// gnyis sumed par
mnyam par ldan// sku grol ba dang phyogs gos can// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rjechags pas rnam par myos// thod pa ba rlig 'dzin cing// tshangs pa'i pags pa
mnangs ba ste// rdo mdung dang cang te'u dang// gri gug zhags la mgo bo dang// phyag tu ra' 'phyar ba ste// drag bo ba/dug pa kun 'joms pa// snying kharaye shes mkha' 'gro ni//
khAgadongal sogs yos kyis khyab// 'khor 'dab brgyad dbus dag tu// g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni// dur khrod dang ni dur khrod// mkha' 'gro mchogani dgod par bya// yaM
kaMwaM/ kaM saM haM/ yengashes 'khor lo mkha' 'gro dgod// zhag bdun bar du bsgoms nas ni// gang yang thunani bzhi yi rim// chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du// bsgoms pas
dngos grub nges par red// 'brog pa dang ni gsod byed cing// gang du las ni ci 'dod pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub// las 'dir yid gnyis dpyod pa med// spro dang bal sha
yi mdog/ dmar dang bzhi pa ser po ste// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal// dmar dang so dang dud khaste// zhal mdog dkar po mchog mdzes//
thams cad spyan gsum pa yi zhal// sku grol ba 'kha phyogs gos can// khA gdong g.yonadang g.yas kyi zhal// zug gdong na la yang de bzhin te// gsum pa khyi yi zhal gdong yin// bzhi
gapha gi zhal gdengs// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gdong ni// gapo'igozugasacan cho ga bzhin// gshin rje srog sogs zhal gdong ni// g.yon dpagayas paganyis de bzhin//
a/ thug ri mo dang ni// seng ge ra dang glang ma// gzhan yang dom gyi khul yin te// thams cad kyang nimanyam par bya// thod pa dang ni ba kr-i 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu
phyag na bsnams// dril bucang te'u gri gug dang// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// yi dgas gdan la gar gyis bzhugs// mi 'u thung la skye gnas
ring// mchab rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thugs rje'i re yis rnam par myos// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// sgom zhing rab bsgom par bya// hUMAlo// 'di ni gsang bar bshad/
paste// rdo rje pad+ma'akhor lo dbus// yengashes mkha' 'gro snying b.ru// mkha' 'gro'i yi le 'khor lo ni// ye shes 'khor dmathong nas// mchod cing thamo par rnam par sgom// mnyam par/
gzhaganas ya gi rnams // srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla// rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas su// gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro// oM shi kAt+yA nI dzA la saM ba ra huhUMphaT swahA/ thogam
gsa'abyedamingadang hUM// mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar// mkha' 'gro zla bas bshad pa yi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni sbyin mi
byang zhag bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te// rtse gcig pa yis bsgomasanani// 'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
ba bla ma las/ kA'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu kha'o///de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// kA li mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste// A li ye shes las byung ba// A/
limaba' 'gro mchog dam pa// zhal brgyad pa la phyagabacu drug/ spyanagasum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa// zhal gyi mtshab rnam par gtsigs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//
bla ba phyed pa ralapar 'ching// thod pa 'phro bas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan// dpral pa la ni rdo 'phreng// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// phyag rgya drug gis sku
la brgyan// rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid// srid dang phrag dog dusamtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad// gdul dka'athams cad 'dul mdzad cing// bgegs kyi mgo
bo'i 'phreng ba can// sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes// dkar ba'i mdog can rked pa phra// lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can// sngo zhing seral dung kha dang// g.yas pa'i zhal yang de
bzhin te// lcapakhu dmar dang ser skya ste// g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes// stapagi tha' ba sprin mdog zhi// chags shing rjes su chags pas blta// thugs rje'i ro ni yang dab rdzog/
sku lus ldem zhipa 'dzobagacan// A li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku// phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu la brgyan// skra grol ba yis rnam par myos// spyan gsumanag
@#// po 'jigs pa can// de yi mdog can sku rags can/ khyin pa gnyis kyis 'degs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan//
za lha mo 'i ku tsa 'tshir ba 'o// Niltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgyu ltar// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar// phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la// khyab 'jug lpags pa mnabs pa yin// thod pa dang/
tsha ni ba blo 'dzin/ ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang// mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid// dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin te// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang// gri gug dang ni'akhor le nyid// snying
khar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis ba'i// 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// dmadog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang// phyag dang

phyag rgya de bzhin te// shar du dum tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rdzamakha' 'gro ma yi ga i'i rig pas byung ba'o// byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge A las byung ste bzhug
pa'o// nub phyogasasunam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a dang sbyar bar bya'o// lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces byaba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ga i las yang dag par bzhugs
pa'o// ma'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste// thogam che ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi le u dang sbyar bar bya'o// bden bral du
drag kho mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge dang sbyar bar bya'o// rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchogaces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yig a dang sbyar bar bya'o// dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog/
ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// dengazhin 'dis ne mtshanas bzhin// dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa// yig las dngos grub kyi mchogaces bya ba'i mkha'
'grom dang/ yig las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ yi ge raM las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ yi ge lA las gtum pa'i mchog ces
bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi// yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// thams cad spyan gsum rnam bsgyur zhal// sku lus dkar pathams/
capa la// so dang ljang bu gnyis med bde// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyisani// mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// phyogs kyi gos canagar dang bcasaM// sku grol ba la rab tu 'jigs//
bod pa dang ni kha Ti 'dzin// cang te'u dang gri gug mchog/ mdung dang mgo bo thams cad kun// sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams// ro yi mgo yi sku bzhugs shing// thugs rje'i ro ni
yongs su gas// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// thams cad thod pa'i 'phreng ba 'dzin// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// thams cad a la yi sgra/ (u0f00na thugs kyi rdo rje ste// Ani gsung du
'gyurab yin// a ni sku yi rdo rje ste// rdo rje pad+ma'akhor lo'i dbus// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog/ rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste//
rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin// dkyil 'khor 'khor le'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod// ye shes 'khor la de mthonganas// gcig pa chos kyi ro yang sgom// ye shes
bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// 'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro// mchog de mthong nas slar yang bsdu// yan lag bcu
gnyis mchog dam pa// sani bcu gnyis dag yin te// rdo rjes nibasdu gsum pa// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro pa// spyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur// ring du song
dang mi g.yo ba// legasala'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan// de ltaras ni bcu gnyis po// 'khor le'i lha mo rnam par dgod// dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog
kha/ ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dbusasu'o// 'bol sogs pa kun gyi sngags// ming dang gsal byed hU~M byas te// de dag mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngagasani/
rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// ye shes 'khor lo 'dimathong nas// gcig tu bsdus pamachod par bya/ bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang// mnyam par
[4 ]gzhag ste mi smra bzla/ rang gis 'thog 'thubyas nasani// blo ldan srog stsol bzlasapa bya// ong+ka'i Alan+d+he ka a aMt+taki nIdza' shaM ba ra hUMphaT sAhA/ srid pa ma lus glas cad kun// dngos/
po med pa'i rang bzhin te// sngags dang dbyibasad chos bdag nyid// sbyor ba yini bdag nyid rnams // sems can khams ni gnas pas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sbyor zhing
mchod par bya// mnyam par ma gzhagasams kyis ni// bsgom zhing rab tubasgoms byas te// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyidade// chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin// chos rnams bdagamod nyid
yin te// rang bzhin med pa'i chos 'a ni// rjes su brtag par bya ba yin/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba a li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste le'u sum
cu tham pa'o//de nas sbyor ba bshad bya pa// sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/ thams cad mchog sta rna'a'abyor che// dngos grub chen po legs stsol pa// bskyed
pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// nyima'i dkyil 'khor dbus suni// saM o bA+olas rdo rje 'byung// de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de// gsal byed mkha' 'gro
mchog gyur pa// sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog/ thams cad rim gyi mchog dam pa// zhal drug pa la phyagabacuganyis// spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i sgra// zla ba phyed pa zhu ba 'dzin/
thod pa'i 'phreng bas sdud pa ste// sa tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang// spyi gtsug phal pa 'chil ba ste// phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan// lha yi rgyan gyis spyadapa ste// skal/
nganamu stegs can rnamasani// zhabs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu na// lta ba lnga yi rim pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yazhabs kyis mnan// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs can/ zhabs drug gis ni rnam
par brgyan// khyab 'jug gi ni lcags pa mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phrang bas brgyan pa ste// rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud// gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can// skra grol ba la snyan gsum can//
mchudang mchu ni rnam 'tshir zhing// rdo dzodril bu mnyam par 'khril// byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshar zhing/ byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rjechags pa'i ro yisabade//tshangs
pa'i bags pa'i yan lag ni// phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'chang// dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thegs// mdung rtse gsum dang ral gri dang// cang te'u
zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams// dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba nyid// sar dang dud kha ngur smig ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu// de la dang nye ba la// mkha' 'gro mni gnyis po sbyar//
chos kyi mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// yi khe/dAlas yang dag 'byung// g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya// yi ge saM las nges byung ba// rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya ba ni//
[rdordzom kha' 'grom gnyis ni// sna tshogs mdog canasna tshogs zhal// spyanagasum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// skyil krung phyed bas gnas ba ste// zhapas ni gar dang bcas pa'o// zhal
ga' phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis rab tu mnan par bzhugs// mgrin pa dag ni dreg dang bzhi/ phyag rgya lnga
mis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i skarags can// rkang gdub g.yer ka'i sil sgra can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa// rdo rjegaso zhing sdigs mdzub kyis// gnyis su med par rnam par brgyan// thod pa gnyis med rnam brgyan te// zhags
ba lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// thod pa ni gri gug mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbu la brgyan// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dbus su// 'khor legasum
gyi thabs kyang sgom/ oM gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni// thugasakyi 'khor lo'i dbusasu ste// sku gsung thugasakyi mkha' 'groni// rang gi snying khar de dag sgom// sngar bshad sbyor ba'i ma
pa yis// gnas la sogs pa'i rjes ma pa// de ra bsam zhing rnamakhasgoms te// gsum po'i rim pa rjes su spro// des ni dngos grub gnyis su med// mkha'agros dang ldan cig sgom//
ye shes 'khor 'di'i ro rnams ni// bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas par bya/o'i pra Na ba b+hA ka A A/ o d+hu'u ki nI dzA la saM pa ra a sAhA o b+haM d+harmA
ut+ta me/ ma hAbadzra ki nIyi dwaphaT sAhU/ osaM sA gar ut+tame ma hA badzra DA kin ya saM hUMphaT swAhA/ gsang gsum ye shes bzlas nani/ dpa' bo mkha' 'grom bzlas//
gsal byed rang mingahU~Mgs dang// mthar niphaT dang sbyar bar bya// gsang gsum 'khor bsgoms nasani// gsum po basmra zhing bsgoms nas su// dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba
lis// lha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// byang chub zla ba drim med// thugs kyi 'khora'adon dgasum// gco po dag ni gsum yin te// mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro//
sdud cing skyed par mdzad pa ste// b+ha gar rdo rje phagamon// gsang ba gsum du rnam par sgom// de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// de na nga rgyal rnam sras nas// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis//
de bzhin bsgom dang bzlas pa bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing// 'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba// bram ze chadang sbrang rtsi mar// ma hAmaM sa mnyam ldan pa// de nyid gsum gyis mngon
bsngags te// bza' ba dag ni bza'ab bya// 'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med// yongs su bzungaba'i 'khor yang mde// lengs spyod min pas longs spyod la// 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza'
zhing// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bastan// longs spyod med pa'i khras bza' zhing// rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sgrom yang btung// gzhan du gang yang btung ba yin/ nang gi bdag nyid sbyor/
ldan bas// rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ bcom ldan makha' gro pi' ba// rnal 'byor ma ni pa la// thabs ni bal par shes bya// shes rab nyeba'i pa la// grong khyer
mthar ni pi 'anyid// grong gi mtha' ni'i pa la// zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba// pa la dang ni nyiba'i yin// skad cig sbyor ba pa la ba// dga' btaba'i pa 'a ste// mthu stobs dug ldan
pani// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin// pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing// lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin sgrub// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dusanas// dus la mthun pa 'dus byas nas/
glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang// 'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsal
byed mkha' 'gro'i sgrub pa'i mtshan yu bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dngos grub sbyor ba'i mi blta/ mkha' 'gro mdang
mkha' 'gro sbyor/ dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yi// chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde bache// mkha' dbyis rdo sde'i dbus gnas pa// dkyil 'khor dmatshig mchog
@#// dam pa// de yi dbus su 'a khor che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dbus su nyi ma'i gdanayang mdzes// A li kA li mnyam par ldan/ sum cu rtsa
gnyis mtshan dang ldan// dpe byad bzang bo brgyud nus brgyan// byin gyis brlangs pa byas nas ni// rang gi sa bon las baspyad de// yi le nyilas yang dag 'byung// dus mtha'i me ltar
rab tu 'jigs// zha'agyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum lngags ni bskyod pa'i zhal// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon// khro ba dunganibazhad pa'i zhal/ bskal pa'i
mthar yang 'khrug pa ste// ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// mgo bo'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byedachenapo'i pags pa yis//
kod pa'iska rags bcings ba yin// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu rgyunacan// sna tshogs rdo rje zla byed 'chang// dpral ba las ni rdo rje 'phrong// khrobo mthong nas rnam par brtag/ lha rnams
thams cad tsharayang gcod// keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'chib 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad nges bar gnon/ phyag rgyangug gis sku lus brgyan// snatshog
rgyan gyis sbud pa ste// phyag rgyajug pa zhal lngal// sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can// sngo das dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dkarapo zhi ba ste// rdoN+Didrilabumanyam ldan pas// phab mo
[o]pa'i sku lus khyab// lha chen pags pa 'dzin mdzad cing// bla re'i tshul du brkyang bar mdzad// thod pa dang ni kha 'dzin// drug pa nanicang te'udang// zhabs g.yon du ni dusamtshanamanan//
gugs pa yis ni 'jigs byed de// zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing// rmongs shing rab tu myos par mdzad// rdo rje phag mo de mdog can/ skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste// thod pa'i 'phreng
ba'i dbu rgyan can// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// ma'u la bas 'khyud cing myos pa ste// de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams// gri gug cung
te'u mchog kyapa'adzani// drug pa 'ani tshangs pa'i mgo/ 'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkhas pas re'u mig dbus su dgod/ shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste// byang du las kyi
mkha' 'gro yin// nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste// lho rin chen mkha' 'gro yin// dkar dang sdo dang dmar ba dang/ ljang khu dang ni ser po'o// 'khor la dril bu mnyam par ldan//
galasabarkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// ljang khuser po dmar po sngo/ dkar po sa bltas dril bu dang// sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud// g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs//
dmar bo sor dang ljang bu dang// dkar po yang ni de bzhinano// pad+ma dri ba snyoms 'jug cing// lha mo'i nyi ma 'tshor ba'o// ser po son po de bzhin dmar// lta bu dkar po kha dog ste//
ba/ @#// richen la bus snyomasal 'jug/ g.yas bskyang ba la zhabs kyis bzhugs// dadag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te// sdom pa la yang de nyid do// me dang bden bral rlung
dani// dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro/ pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa laskra grol ba//
dpa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos canagar mchogacan// mgo yi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan
thodapa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// rdo rdzomada' la sogs pas brgyan// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na mdzes// 'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing// thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs// thugs rje'i
'dod pas rnam par myos// cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can// dgyes pa stsol bas bde bste// de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis// dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su khyab// du ma'i gzugs dang

gzugs sdug ma// rdo rjemachu dang 'od byed ma// rtagadong dang ni drag po'i gdong// rdo rje drag po snyan grags ma// rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sen// rdo rdzo gzhon nu ma de bzhin// kam potso yab bzhin te//
rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni// ngo rdzom mo'ang de bzhin te// dricanam dang 'jigs byed zhal// zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te// khro gnyer canadang sna tshogs gzugs/ rdo rdzogrigugade bzhin te/
ni/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni// sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byedam// na ra ki dang ser ma// rdo rje 'baram thal sbyoram// rdo rje'ajigs byed ma nyid de// dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mkha' 'grom//
mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag kun// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// gsus pa 'phyang la skra grol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs//
phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gsang mchog ste// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thams cad ro ye gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid
'phrog pa// thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing// zhags pa lcags kyi phyag na bsnams// rdo rjemchog na gsor mdzad cing// dril bu dang nicang te'u mchog/ zhal gsum dpa' zhing sgug pa ste//
thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// spyan ni thur gyis gzigs mdzad cing// dgyes pa'i rtsol bas g.yo ba ste// dngos grub thams cad sol mdzad cing// sgrub pa po kun rjes su chags/
zla ba drug gis sgrub pa bo// mkha' 'grom mi 'khor 'kho'agrub// yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/ mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yi// dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang// mkha' la spyod
pase chom med// nang gi pho brang de nyid ni// re'u mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas// sgo rulha mo bzhi bkod la// mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub ster// phyi rol dkyil 'khor mo bri// snam
bu'i mtshams bzhi di ru ni/ lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing// mkha' 'gro ma sogs mtshams rnams su// zur bzhi pa la sgrolazhib// phyi la dkyil 'khor dag tu
brtag/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// 'dod pa'abras bu thams cad stor// rtababs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// zur bzhi chan thamasacad dang// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams
su rdo rjerin chen gyis brgyan cing// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de yi nang du re'u mig dag/ sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste// 'diltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma// dra ba'i
sdom pa stong pa ste/ byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin// dbus su sa ni sku gsum ste// phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod dpe du khrod/
'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par// sdom pa mchog ni bsgom bar bya// de ni thugs kyi ye shes te// yengashes mkhaka'agro mkha' 'groma'o// phung po khams dang skyo mchod la// cho ga
gnyis po sbyang bya// ye shes mchog gi sdom pa ste// gsang ba gsum gyi 'khoraledagod// byed dang phyed du rnam par dgod// mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus// dam tshig
rnal 'byor 'byung bache// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas// zhabs bsi'abyas nas gzhug par bya// ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas// gtsobo dag ni rnam par sgom// bdag med/
07 chos kyi chos kun gyis// dam tshig mchog ni dri mamed// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad las// dam tshig gsang ba gsum spos nas// sems can ma lus dmatshigagi/ mkha' 'gro ni/
sa gnas khyo// 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang// gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya// sngon grub pa mkha' 'gro ni// byin brlabs gnas su dgod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje theg chen
ta/ mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs// sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa yis// blonamed pa'i go 'phang ster// dus bzhi dag tu 'dod khar// skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom// 'grwa
su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// 'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro// ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du// bde mchogaspros nasamachod par// rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas// 'gog kha khro
bornam par sgom// ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu// sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bu r bzla// 'gro zhipa'ong ba'i sbyor ba las// mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che// zhag bdun gyisan nges par yang//
mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te// g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang// 'khrugacigayongs dang gzhug pa dang// nadamed pa ni nad yod byed// nadayodapa ni nad med byed// de lta bsgom
pa byas nas ni/ las 'dir the tshomamapa yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyoraldan pas/ bsgoms dang bzlas la dga' ba dang// dmatshig khas 'daga' ba ni// thogs pa med pa'atshoyang
@#/ bstan// 'di ltar ngag gi tshogs bzlas// sangs rgyas gnas su legs pa 'jug/ der ni dam tshig 'khoralani// mkhas pas bsgomamachod bzlas pa@#//

gsung sngags 'di dag bshad par bya// oM shrI badzra TA ki ni kAHhUMt+tAka nI dz+wa la shaM yaM ri hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM shrI bud+d+hat+tA ki ni A ts+tsha hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM suM hUM phaT swahA/ o shIkAmAt+tA kaa laM

uN+Daki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM phaT sAhA/ oM pad+ma TAka a sid+haM tA ki nI dzA la sha ba ri hU~McuphaT swAhA/ o 'a rat+makA ka mad aM hUMt+tA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM hU~MhU~M phaT swAhU~M/ mkha' 'gro pa ni po de dag dang/
mkha' 'gro ma dbalAm dang// dum skyes ma dngagazugs can ma// mgrin pa mnyam par bstsal ba ste// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhabs// phyag

mtshan rnams kyang rnam par sgom// lha mo mngon du byas nas ni// snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin// u0f00 shrI badzrab rA hiyaM hUM hUM phaT swahA/ oMng+gashiTA ki ni hUM duhUMphaT swAhA/ o 'u 'amelaM
hU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/ oM hUM khaN+Da ro hilaM huhUMphaT swAhA/ oM bi rU pi Ni huhUMphaT swahA/ 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o// mtshams kyi mkha' 'groma'i sngags ni/ oM shrI bud+d+hat+tAkInAhU~M
phaTasAhA/ oM karma TA ki nIhU~MhUMphaT swahA/ oM shrIpad+ma TA ki nI hU~MyAyaNaswAhA/ o shir:t+tAnihu[%]phaT/hA/ sgo mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster//
bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te// jibazhin rigs kyis kun la khyab// oM tsub shaM chub tshuhUMphaT/ o su lu pe hU~MhU~MpaT/ o badzadun+ti huhU~MphaT/[u0f00] pra b+ha kA ri hU~MhU~M shar phyogs kyi
nisnyam bu la// lha mo bzhi po dgodapa ste// sku lus dkar bo'i mdog can la// de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin// oMbadzub DA ba mu ba 6hUMphaT/ o sgor mu khi hud+d+haMyatwA/ oM badzragroN
chuhUM phaT/ o ya shasI ni hU~MhU~M phaT/ lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya// sku mdog dag ni sor pa ste// de yi sngags su bshal yin/ oM badzradA pidzAyo/
o'adzamakhi upha3/ oM badzra ko ma rIdaM phaT/ oM badzrakaMputs+tshahuhU~MpaT/ nub phyogs kyin snyam bu'o// lha mo bzhi bo sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no// ebadzrang tA li hU~M
b+huphan/ oM badzras yiki hU~MhU~MphaT ! oM gan+d+harIhU~MhUphaT/ o khi ma ba dan huM hUM phaT/ byang gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang khu pa'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ a tsan+d+ha haM
khar tuphaT/ o b+haku Ti tu yaT/ obishArUpa hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM badzrakaT+ThAn d+hupUphaT/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'imatshams bzhir lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can
de'i sngagasabashadab/ o shAbadzrakha li hU~MhU~M phaT/ o'i ma ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ o shA ya sha ka rihU~M hU~MphaT/ o shAnA lA lA ka huphaT/ sgo rnams su ni lhamo bzhipi sna tshog
pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ de'i sngags bshad pa/ shar du/ yo'i badz+dzapaM ga le dzadzahU~MhU~MphaT/ lhor/ oM nInAl kahU~MhU~M phaT/
nub tu/ oMng+ga'akhodzrakurtsal pa66hU~MphaT/ byang du/ o'abadzrab+hi ra bi ho hUM hUMphaT/ thams cad gsal byedamatha' ru ni// shin sbyar zhing chig rim bzhin// sngags pas de ltar bzlasan/
na// mkha' 'gro mni dra ba yi// sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste// zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur// gcig tu byas te bsdusan ni// rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can// drab 'imchog
ni 'grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ni// khri 'am 'bum du bzlas na ni// gsangasngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin// snyingapo dag ni bzlas pa yis// dpa' bo mkha'
'grom grub cing// rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par gyur// gzhan gyis lus su 'gro zhing/ mi snang bdag thob nasan// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin
ba yin// mngon par brjod pa'irgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dmatshig gi sdom pa las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
denas gzhanayang bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro cho ga'i rim// sngarab shadasangs rgyas mkha'agro yi/ lung lasogs pa'i rim pa bya// rnal 'byobalungami shesal/
00 sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te// rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya// dkonamchog gsum nimi spang zhing// sangs rgyas chos dang dag bdun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro// shes
rab pha rol phyin dmigs na// rnal 'byor gyini dngos gruba'agrub// dgacar 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis lus ni rnam par bsam// sngo zhing drag pa bzhin rnams bsgyur//
gtum zhing 'jigs la 'jigs par mdzad// zhalamache ba rnam par gtsigs// ral pa zla phyed spyi gtsug 'ching// sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnon// thod pa'i 'phrengabasarnam
bar brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// khaMhU~M padzralas byu sku lus can// phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// skyil krung
byed bas legs par gnas// spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can// mgrinapa bzhi la zhal bzhi pa// bcuganyis phyag dang yang dag ldan/ stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog/
gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i 'phreng// dus mtha' las byung doshal can// gdug pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon// nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang// sred pa gtilugaphyag rogs/
dusamtshanango nikhas phul la// gdugapa'ikhagogs na 'jigs pa can// thams cazhabs kyi 'og gnon// nam mkha' dang ni skya ba dang// dkarab da ni dmar ba dang// lung/
khu steng du bltas pa'i zhal// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa/ phag mo dag dang bde bas 'khyud// kumAtuganyis med sbyor ba yis// chos rnams kun gyi 'o gcig
za tu: sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba// dpalakyi bde ba chen po ni// rje dmu ka nyid yin// thod pa dang ni brko 'dzan// chos kyi 'khor lo 'khagasil dang// lhung bzed mdung
dbazhigs pa dang// lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang/ dgayas dang g.yonaba'i phyag dag gis// na ra'i pags po brkyang nas bsnams// shar du ma tang gi dpa'o b+hika/ dzar ki dang
buk+kasI// khaMDakwa dang sha pa ri// d+hi bo ri dang sa marI// lha mo brgyad po de ngag ni// ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod// ser dang so dang de bzhin dmar// dud pa la ni mdog can
te dumar dang ljongangang dung kha'i mdog/ brgyad pa dkarapo nyid yin no// sgo rnamasasun dgod bya ba// khrag 'thubajo rdzogatum mo dang// rdo rje sring mchog ma dang ni// rdo rje 'jigs
a byed drag moste// gdul dka' thams cad gsolamadzad cing// thal ba sprin mdog ljang khu dang// dmar dang so dang lhag par 'jigs// brgyud pa'i dbus su chos 'khar gsil//
thod ba ca te'akhri gug ste// phrag pa'i stang dgos 'dzin bgo// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// thod pa kha TaM ma 'jigs pa// chos kyi 'khar gsil cang te'u// zhal gcig pa 'phul/
ba00 ]bzhi pa/ yi dgas gdan gyi steng du ni// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum// phyis mi len dngatsog bu pa// gzhi ji bzhin dang stan
gcig pa/ bla ga ba med dngashi dus// dgon pa pa dang dur khrod pa// khrod pa dang ni phying ba po 'o// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa pas/ sbyangs pa'i yon tanarnam dag sgom// ye shes
mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog/ ro gcig tu ni rnam bar sgom// o b+himahAsu kha badzra de ha ru ru kaM kAHhU~MhU~MphaT/ oM ma ma taM gi hUM hUMphaT/ oM tAMbadzra Do pInI hU~MhU~MyaT/ A rA dza hU~M

phaT// o po khuk+ka sI hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM khaM pa ta hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM daMsha b.rI huM hU~M phaT/[u0f00] dzadzib ri pUphaT/ oM saM sa ma rIhuM hU~M phaT/ oM ha ru ki chuhUM phaT/ oM yaM badzatsaNi shud+hiya/
o hUMbadzrarAkAsI hU~MhU~Mphatsa/ o b+ho badzrab rab hu hU~M phaT/ de kun gcer bu skra grol ba// spyan gsum pa la zhi ba ste// mchab rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing// phyag rgya lnga yis sku'as
brgyan// thod pa'i 'phrong pa'i dbu rgyan can/ pazhad dpazhi dang snying rje dang// sgog bad bani rngam pa dang// drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te// bzlas dang sgom pa sngo zhing bsdu//
lus ngag yid la bde b.raganas/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs pas// gdul ba'i thabs kyi bde ba yis// yus dang yongs su spyod pa na/ bla med yengashes 'bras bu 'thob//
sems can thams cad 'di yi bde// 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis// yengashes bas bu red ba yin// 'di nisims can thams cad kyis// mchog gi go
'phang thob pa'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u snyasumacu rtsa gsum pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bashad byab//
char dbab chog rim pa ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyadamchog gi leb gsar bcas pa la// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can// phyag brgyad pa la zhal
bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs// rdo rjematshon nigasoramadzad cing// sdigs mdzub zhags pa ldan pa dang// thod pa dang ni ba hU~M 'dzin// lcags kyudangani
mdung bstsams shing// dpa' bo'i pags pa bsnams shing 'dzin/ cang te'u dang nibargyadabar bshad// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyisani// chu lta 'jigs pa myos pa gnon//
zla ba byed pa ral pa 'ching// sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam pa la brgyan/ phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam bar brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// khyod
ba'i 'pho ba'i cod pan mchog mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam bsgyur zhing/ khro bar blta zhing 'jigs par gazigs// 'dab ma brgyud la klu brgyad bri// mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas
0dag/ 'jog po pad+ma bad+ma che// dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang// ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te// ljang khu dang ni
sar bo sta// thal mo sbyar bar byas nas// bcom ldan 'dasal mngon phyogs pa// 'jigs bas bka' drin slong bar byed// skrag pas blta zhing gnas la go/ bcom ldan sku
lus sngon po can// 'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs bamadzad/ ga las pa dung khangamakhoste// g.yonapa lta bu dung ba'o// stong gi zhal mkha'aldingagadong/ zhal rnam
bskyar zhiba'ajigs pa'o// nyim dmar po'i gzi brjid can// nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi mnyam 'od// phag mo de deg gis 'khyud cing/ khyin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ yang
na phyog ni bcu gnyis pa// bde chenamchog ni bcu gnyis pa// gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// lha mo'i mchu ni rnam par 'tsher// gcer bu dbu skra grol
ba dang// sbyanagasum pa la ska rags can// 'dzam bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku// gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas// klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas// tshulha' chung mar bcas pa deng//
chu lha'ilus ni dkar bo can// bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed// snying khar ye shes 'khor lodag/ de mdog phyag dang zhal yang skyed// nga yi snying khoratsA nA yAdagod cing/ lus ngag
rgyu/ yid kyang de bzhin te// klu yi rapasnyingade nyid la// hU~MnaM hU~Mni rnam par dgod// gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho gni// khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlos brjod bya// chubo'i 'gram/
'am mtsho 'am// khronab 'am klu yi mtsho dang ni// rdzing bu lteng rnams su ni// blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya// yang na klu yi gnas su ni// sgomapa bzlas pa dag la 'jug/ oM
bakhadza?hi ha ru ru kaM hU~MnaMnAg bar TA pa ya hU~M ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUMphaT swAhA/ 'di dag bsgoms takhri tsam bzla/ dus bzhi dal gtu stong du'o// zhag bdunagyis ni nges par yang// sa rnamA
kun tu char 'bab 'gyur// dam tshig nasregamachod dus su// glu dang gAraninyer ldan pas// 'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung// rnal 'byorapas na klu brgyad bzla// 'o ma'i khrus
kyi cho ga yis// 'o mas sbyin srog sreg blugs bya/ 'oma'i shing gi bud shing bya/ 'o ma'i shing gi ya ma shing dang// 'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya// bumapa 'oms yongasasu
dgang// me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su// 'o mar bcas pa gtor ma sbyi// oM oM Anan ya hU~MnaM hU~MswAhA/ opaM bA su ko tsAnAhU~MswAhA/ oM taM takA kany+tsinaM hUMswAhA/

oM khaM pad+mahU~MnAhU~My+Ya oM tsho mahApad+mahU~MnaM hU~MswAhA/ oM shaM shaM phapA la hUMnA hU~MAhA/ oM kaM kako Ta yuMnAhU~MswAhA/ [']mi A nan tapa hUMnAhU~MswAhA/ oM tshulaM ba ru NA ya nA gA d+hi pa tayen gi bar
pa ya hU~MnaM hU~MswAhA/ 'di ba brus khro ba dang bcas pa// kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya// 'o ma 'bras rnying zas su bza'// dbang po thul cing yongasami smra// bri gzugs spangs pa'i
mngonatsam du/ khritsam bzlas namangon du 'gyur// mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing// smos pa tsam gyis char 'bebs da// 'di la the tsamam byed cig/ dpal gyi snod kyi nang duni/
yungs karadang ni chu blugs la// de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas ti/ sangase rgyas kyi sku gzugs la drichu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te/ chu 'gram gyis sbrus pa
las klu'i gzugs byas l nub tu mgo bstanate/ mgo bo dgu lachus dbang bskur te// denas chubo'i nang du gzhug go/ de ma thag tulhas char 'bebs shing/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char
'bebs 'gyur// sa rnam8 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhig/ nags tshal rnams ni 'pha' bar byed// sems can thams cad bde reganas/ phan tshun khro ba'i gzugs can ni// bdag
bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangasanas// gang gi snying khakhonani// tar rdo rdzobasgoms pa yis// char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur// ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs
su bzlas na so rab gcod pa 'gyur ro// cang te'u la longs su bzlasanamamached pa'i mi rengs par 'gyur ro// zhags pa la yos su bzlas ma'agugs par byed do// thod pa la yongs
@#/ su bzlas na brag 'gugs par byed do// dgrasta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do// la kr-i ga la yongs su bzlasan zhi bar byed do// gri gug la yongasasu bzlasan
'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byedade// mgo bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do// rdo rjegaso zhing yongs su bzlasanas 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// drilabu la
yongasasu bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs par byed de// glang po che'i pags pa la yongs subazlas te btipa na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyur 'gro zhing slar
lde go/ phyag rgya drug la yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyimadun du mi snang ba 'gyur ro// sa steng nganikun spyod cing// ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur// mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud blama'i bla
ts+tshAmalas/ char dbab ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang bamchog nimador bsdus nas// skad cig gis ni dgag sgom
ga pa nyaru ka dpa'agazugs su bya// sngo zhing drag po rnamakhasgyub// drag po spun gsum zhal drug mchog/ zla ba phyed pa la'ang 'dzin// snatshogs rdo rje dbumchogal// thod pa'i 'phreng
ba'i dbu rgyan can/ rdo 'phreng bas dbu rgyan can// sku la mgo bo'i do shal can// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// phag mo yis ni sku 'bargyan//
bya[j]zhabs gcig pa'i bzhengs pa ste// g.yas pasar la dung pa'i mdog/ g.yon pa dmar 'a ljang khu 'o// steng ge lan du gdong ste// dkar zhing srinamadog drag cing 'jigs// rdo rje dril bu
mnyam par ldan/ lcamo'i chun 'tshir ba ste// rgyal ba'i pags pa gos sumanabs// mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing// thod pa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// rdo rje mtshon gyis brgyanapa ste/
zhags pa lcags kya'agan btsums// cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te// phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tubashad/ dkyil 'khor dag thams cad kyang//
zhabs gcig tuni rnam par sgom// glang po'i gdong dang byi'u'igadong// seng ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te// dang po khyi yi gdong yin te// gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin// gsum
ba khag gi gdong yin// bzhi pa phru yi gdong yin no// gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid// sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin// mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste// thams
cad makhyen cing thams cad ng// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang// de bzhin sgom zhing rnam sgom ste// snatshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol// mngon
par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blo las/ las sna tshogs sgrub pa le sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub pa ste//
bskyed ba'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sgom zhing rnam par sgom// sku ni lcem bcu gnyis gzi// sku lus sin dur 'dra mi g.yo// me tog ban du ka lta bu // zhal
ba gsum pa la phyag drug pa// rgyan rnams thamasacad yongasasu rdzogs// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje dri'i bu mnyam par ldan//
dbu ska mdzes par 'khril ba ste// thabs kyi ha'amachu rnam 'tshir zhing// mda' dang gzhu ni'adzin pa ste// rnaba'i mthar thuga'agangs par byed// thod pa dang ni'aTA'adzin// lcags kyu
lamchog gis 'gugs pa ste// pad+madamar mo'i dbus bzhugs ngashing// 'dod pa thams cad rab tustsal// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung// stong gi la
tsho ni thag rgod gdong// drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi// shar gyi 'dabal rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon nga 'i phyogs su do dam tshig mchog/ nub kyi phyogs su rdo rjegabri brjid/
mchog/ lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog/ me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog/ bden bral phyogs su ro drorig mchog ma// rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma// dbang ldan
phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma// sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchogam// rdo rje gabri brjid mchog ma ste// rdo rje khro bo mchem dang// rdo rje mche mchog/ lha mo de dag thams cad kyang// dmar ba'i
tha0 mdog can zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// dbu sku dag ni grol ba ste// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing// rdo rjedril
bumanyam ldan pas/ rang gi lus kyis thabasala'akhril// zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang// thod pa dang ni kha 'dzin// gru bzhi dab//tumanga' gzhu dag/ yongasasu 'gengs pa gnas
par gzhag/ sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// gcerabu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// rdordzogasobazhib sdigs mdzub dang// zhag
ba dang ni yang dag ldan// gzhan yang phan tshun dag tuyang// jiltara'akhoralasogs phyag 'tshal// de sIr ye shes lha mo ni// skugasung thugs dngabacas par sgom// ye shes dkyil
'khor sbyor ba yis// chos kyire ni mnyam par thim// ye shes bzlas pa spros nasani// choga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu// dmatshog mchog gi bzlas pa yis// zla ba'i de nyid grub
bar 'gyur// oM badzrapA rAhikA hu hU~M phaT swAhA/ oMng+ga badzrag skya ut+tame hU~MhU~MphaTaswAhA/ oM shrI badzras ma ya ut+tamahU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/ oM badzra te dzot+tame hU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/ o

kI badzrarak+kot+tame hU~MhU~MphaT swAhA/ o shI badza?dz+hAnotam hU~MshuphaTisAhA/ oMng+ga'i badzra bid+ya ut+tame hU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzrasid+d+hot+tame hU~M phaT swAhA/ o Tibadzrab+hasmot+tam hUMphaT

hUMphaTasAhA/ 'di dgaji ltarim pa yis// bsgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya// bsdu dang srob byas nasani// chos rnams kun dang chos can ni// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag/
sems can thams cad rab tubartag/ rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te// gas bgasum la rab tugazhug/ gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te// chos kyang de bzhin da lta bu
bdag med chosani ches yin te// chos las chos ni yod ma yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba gsum gyidamatshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i 'a 'u sta
sum cu rtsa drug pa'o///de nasagazhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byoram drug cho ga'i rim// pad+ma'adab lta bris nas ni// lte bge sa khyabaparani// deyi
dbus su phag mo ni// dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal gsum pa la phyag drugamadzes// slanagasum dbu skra grol ba ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//
phyogs kyigs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ skyil krung phyed pa gar dang bcas// phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan cing// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzinapa ste// gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang
samtshan pa sbyang byas pa la// zhabs kyis kyang mnan par bzhugs// dmar dang sdod ljangab ste// sangs rgyas las ni rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang nil 'dzin// zhags
ba lcags kyuphyag nabastsams// mgo bo dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// snyingakhar ye shes dam tshig ni/ sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung// shar
phyogs lha mo la mi ni/ g.yon du bskor nas rnam par god// rmongs byedam dang skyod byed ma// skrag byed ma dngatsan+tIka/ spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// zhal gcig po' phyagabazhi
pa3 so dang dkar dngasarab dang/ ljang khu dung pa'i mdog can te// thod pa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// drel du nyung ti'u gri gugad// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgyal
mis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos canagar gyimchog/ mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'chang// thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba ste// gnyis
med sbyor bsamanyam par ldan// rdzordzasams sogs mchog de nyid/ phag mo dang ni rdo rjesams// ya mi ni dang rnam snamadzad// rmongs byedam dang pad+ma'i gar// skyod byed ma dang khrag
zung ste// skragakhyed rdo rjenyim dang// tsaNIka dang rta mchog ste// rdo rje sems skudakar po ste// rnam par snang mdzad ser bo yin// brlagar dbang dmar po ste// pe ru ka dpal sdomapo/
yin// ro nyi ma dmar po ste// mchog dag ni ljang khu'o// yang na so sorab sgom par bya// rdo rjesams dpa' zhal gsum pa// phyag drug spyanani gsum pa
za ste phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// rdo rjodril bu thong khat+taM// ral gri cang te'u mgo bo 'chang// na ra'i pags mnabs gar dang de nas// rnam snang la sogs dpo' bo kun//
wa zhal gcigab la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni ba tri dang// cang te'u dril bus mtshan pa'i mchog/ yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis// zhal gdong drug par bsgom par bya/ de dag gang

sngags 'di yin te/ oM'i oM khaM bihU~MhU~M phaT swAhUM/ oMng+gA'i hUMyo yi []hUMphaT swAt+tA/ oMng+gA'i phyi mo ma hubyuphaT swAhA/ oM shrI hU~MhIsaMhUM hUMphaT swAhA/ ongashrI hU~MhUsaM tuM phaT swahA/ oMtA'i
phaT phaT tsi nuhUM phaT swahA/ 'di dag ni rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so// oMhabi hUMphags swAhA/ oM namanyid+d+haM hUMphaT sAhA/ oM swahi tu wIhuhUMphaT phaT swAhUM/ obo ShaT ha ha hu wa
sAhA/ otshute drotshuphaT swAhA/ oM phaT ha hAhuM hUM phaT swahA/ 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags// bzlas pad ni bsgoms tsam gyis// 'khor lo drugazhi mchog grub cing// 'khor
le sgyur ba thob blto// 'khor la sgyu drug rgyal por 'gyur// mi 'pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs// stobs chen rtsa la mchog rnyed pa yin// phyag mtshan drug 'a rtag mchod cing// cho ga
bzhin du mngonabasngagasan// denimyur du grub nasani// rnal 'byor rgyal po mchog kyang thob// mi snapalasogs grubanasani// khamasagasum dag tu nam khar dpyod// 'gro bajug gi
sems can grol// bsgoms pas rdo rje'adzin dang mtshungs// yang na 'khor le'u drug la// bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur bdag
bo ni gur kum gyinimadog lta bu // gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i 'od can te// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo bo// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i goms
dang g.yonaba'i phyag gis 'khyud// ral gri po ti ba tAM ga/ thodapa lcags kyu zhags pa dang// ut+pal dang cang te'u// gur kum mdog dang sngo ba dang// dmar dang ljang pakhu stong zhal
dkar// chos kyir byings ni dag pa che// sems can khams ni rab grol byed// shar sogs g.yon skoradagod pa ni// rtamchogartsa ba'i ka dang bcas// de dag de ru dgod byas pas//
'jam pa'i rdo rjerapanyidagrug/ karadadamaradangasar ba dang// sngo dang dmar dang dkar sngo ljang// yan lag drug tu dpa' bo dag/ mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bcas// rdo rje sems
dang phag mo dang// rnam snang mdzad dang yamini// khad+magar dbang rmosakhyed bcas// khrag 'thungadang ni skyod byed ma// rordzanyam skrag byedam// lcangadang dudapa 'i mdog can te// de lta'i
sku mdog rnam par sgom// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o// lhamo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o// thod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dpa' bo thod pa kha TIg/ rang gi phyag
mtshanaganyis med sbyor// dril bu lhan cig yang dag ldan// cang te'u ni'adzin ba'i mchog/ spyan gsum pa 'gayas brkyang bazhugs// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// tho'i
'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mgo bo'i doshal 'dzin pa ste// thams cad yi dgas steng du bzhugs// dbus su'ajigs byed dus mtshan dag lhamo byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril// skukrol
