bal phyogs gos can// snying khar ye shes ngamatshigani// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// go cha gnyis pa yang dag sbyar// gnas kyi 'khor le bsgoms nas ni// dpa' bo
mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod// gsang ba gsumani snying khar gnas// khA gdong sogs mkha' 'gro ma// phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod// zur dgashin rje srog la sogs// thams
la cad gacer bu rnam par sgom// sngar bshadamadog dang phyag mtshan te/ yid gasagadana' yang dag bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas// drag po skani grol ba ste//
thams cad bod pa'i 'phreng ba can// rang gi phyi dang nang du yang// parol phyin drug rnam par dag/ sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i 'khor bzlas
pa bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom pa sprul pa'i 'khor ba'i tshogs spros nas// 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par bya/ nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pas//
'khor la gsum gsang bsgoms nasabazlas// de nyid gsum dang sngags lhan gaM dba'ago dang nimakha' 'grom// [%]shuphaTani mtha' ste/ 'khor 'gasum gyi bzlasab bya/ rnal
'byor chog bzhin du// dam tshig can gyis de bzlas pya/ o shImit+tabaAtsAhumaM hU~MhU~M phaT/hA/ onyapas tAhU~MgrulaT swAhA/ ob badzrapA ra hihU~MhU~M phaTaAhA/ oM namahrib pa'o
tsan shushu 'aT swAhA/ oM ha yo la mi naM hU~MhU~MphaTasahA/ o sAhAhubasmanirtab kA ra shul Ta sAwA o o mo hin hu hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM Ta gter du tshugrubaT swA hA/ oM hratshigasasany+tsal ni
tshug+ho TaswAhA/ ot+taho badz+dzasUr+ya shuphoTasAhA/ orgyus sa ni hU~MhU~M phaTaswAhA/ oM ya ba hib 'amAb shu ba swAhA/ oM phaT phaTatsaNI huM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM kA rtse hu hU~M phaT swAhA/
mo ku lu kArtse shushuphaT/ or/nA s+ya shu[%]phaT/ oM swA hu ba'/ ma ya ma da d+hI ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ gi lam rUtil hu hU~M phaT/ oM la maN+Dil shuhU~MbaT/ mo ya ma mi thanI yotuM
phywaT/ g.yond galas kyi lag gnyis su// go cha tis bkod nas ni/ gang zhig ji ltar 'dod b.ru// las rnams thams cad pyod pa yin// tshom med par las byas n//
nges par dngos grub gzhan du min/ yanamagon bo sa bcu'i dbang/ pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan
'ashes rab drug pa ste// thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang/ mer shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o// rab tu dgadang dri mamed// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro// sprus dka'apa dang
mngon du gyur// ring duso dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// 'di las rnam par dag pa sgom/ gshin sreg sogs bzhi po ni// 'phags pa'i bden par rnam par
sgom// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang// 'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te// bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rjadapal// chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam dag ste// yongashes rang gang de yin//
'di ltar rnam par dag par sgom// gnyis su med par sbyor ba 'am// gsapazhing mchog khyogasang ba ste// rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog/ sgrub pas rjesasu bstan pa dang// ji
bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang// blama'i rim pa legs par barlabs// 'di ltar chog gnyis med pa// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te// dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu// rnal 'byor
mthugs gsang bache// las rnams kun gyi 'bras bultar// mngonapar brjodapa'i rgyudabla ma'i blam las/ gnyis su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyod pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun
de nas gzhanayabashad bya ba// brdanimchogatugasang ba ste// brdaniyongs su mi shesapar// sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grubaste// 'dinis par:
shes pan// dngos grub 'grub par bcom med// dwazhes bya ba skyes bur bshad// dazhes bya ba budached yin// pu zhes bya ba gnod pa yin// su zhes bya ba za ba nyid/ ma zhesakhyu
bam ru bshad/ ya zhes bya pa chu mnyid/ b+hi zhes bya ba srimo yin// b+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad// lu zhes bya babu mo yin// sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad// so ni zhi ba'i
btung ba yin/ dpe zhes bya ba thug pa ste/ li zhes bya ba de bzhin sha/ bzhes bya ba khra ba yi// b+hu zhes bya pa 'dres pa yin// pa zhes bya bdur khrod yin// du zhes bya ba re yin no//
blo zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma/ gAnas bya ba lAmamin// tizhes bya ba gzugasacanam/ zhes bya ba mkha' 'gros// hani khaN+Da ro nyid ma// dzazhes bya ba byin pa gnyis bzhes
bya ba gsong bor smra/ grwa zhes bya ba legs 'os yin/ mi zhes bya ba nyayin la/ khyo zhes bya ba bca' ba min// phyo zhes bya ba btung ba min// gzhi bgrod dang bgrod min yin//
ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa min// sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro 2zhes bya la khyomadago/ duzhes bya bskyod ngan mo// sa zhes bya ba skalakhazangamo// na zhes bya ba skal nganam// sa zhes
bya ba dam tshig can// a zhes bya ba dam tshigamed// I zhes bya ba'ongs pa yin// na zhes bya ba ma 'os yin// so zhes bya ba chags pa yin// 'di dag mi/
ga'i brda yin te// dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor pas// bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya// dbang bskub ni mchog yin te// dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang// dam tshig can
gyi dmatshig dus// dam tshig 'khor le 'dus pa dang// dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya// ma dad pa la sbyin mi// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i 'a 'u ste sum cu/
rtsa brgyad pa'o//de nas gzhan la bshar bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni// gang gis shes ba tsam gyisani// sgrubal po yis dngos grub thob// bud
mad bad rtsa ltar dkar zhing/ pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig rtag tu gosani dkar la dga'// tsan dan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyung la dga'// de gis
las byung shes rabya// bud gang bcoma'i gsara'adra zhing// dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'// dzA titsam pa'i dri dang ldan// de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur// thams cad
ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs// dridang gos ni sngo la dga'// ut+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa// deni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro// bung med pa de da kar 'dramadog gang// rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i
dri deyang de bzhin dba' mo'i blo// dmar zhing sar skya'i bud med gang// gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang// mal ki dang ut+pal dri// den do'i rigs byung yin// sa zhing
lcang ba'i bud med gang/ gosazhi dkar la dga' ba dang// mgo la me tog dri dang ldan// de bzhinagashegs rigs rjesa'agro yin// bdamed gang zhig kha dog dmar// dmadog can gyi gos
'chang zhing// rtag tu ga pur sridang ldan// rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing// rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni// de ltar bdun bo ngas bshad pa// g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'//
pang gi mdog gis rigs drug ldan// rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang/ kha dog drub/ tu 'gyur pa yin// ragi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang// rang ri la sa byung tshig tusma// g.yonalas 'gro ba'i
budam dgab// rnapa 'byor 'gayon la brtag/ lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang// g.yon nas lta bas rnam par blta// lha mo rnams dang gang smab/ nga ni dam tshig ldan par bshad//
bud med gang byas de nyan cing// rigs kyis bon rab tu// rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste// rang gi bstan bshad mi 'doral/ rag rigs kyi rig la zlos// de nidamatshig ldan par bshang//
phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'chi ba/ gson ba'i lus kyi rtag tu'adud// lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba// de ni nges par bde bar 'gro// mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni// rkang pas ri mo 'dri byed cing//
mgo ni smyug par byed pa dang// zur gyis blta zhing lag pa ston// sgrub pa po la khyad par du// de yis rang rig dran pa dang// 'khur ba'am ko sko dag dngani// snadag tu
ni thalam ston// zur gyis blta zhibalan cig bsngags// zlos shing rigs la rnam par blta// bden pa 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma// nges par dam tshig can yin no// de nas red dka' rnal
'byor ma/[” ]/de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung// ya mi ni dngaskag byed ma// 'dod ldan phag 'o 'jigs gzugs ma// kun tuspyod pa ba su ra// rnal
wA'abyor ma ni rnam pa bdun// mdorab sdus rang mtshanabashad pa yin// gzugs canam dang tsum paki/ lam yongs gyur gyis bcas mo// mi ldeg e heka lha mo/ mkha' 'gro ma ni
bdun bshad// mngon par zhenapas blta ba dang// smin ma 'degs par g byed cing// ston bzhin gzugs ni sdud byed la// phyis mi 'jigs par byed pa dag/ gzugs canamani
yin par bshad// gnyis med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya// sdug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa// byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pano// da nitsum pa karashes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid//
zas mi lta bar zur du blta// khro gnyer dang zhigadong dag dang// smin ma bsgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang/ 'di ni gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/ 'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa// de ni
[a/]kAm yin pa ra pa stan/ phag dang dred dang phyi lo dang/ cesbyang ridags rtadag dang// thams cad der ni 'jigs byed ba// yongs su gyur par de bshad de// shin tu dga' bas dgod pa/
dag/ sol nas slar yang mi ldog la// rjes su chags pas gsal bar dgod// ma skyes la ni de bshad do/ yid nikun tu skyo ba dang// rkang lag pas bong ba 'am// gos mtha'am
yang na shing dag gis/ des re ba ni 'tshami 'gyur// mi ldog par ni shes bya ste/ sgrubaman par ni dengashadade// mkha' 'gro ma la rigs phyag rgyu// dpabos bsnyen cing mtshan mapalta
thod pa dag lta mchab dang// ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin// rdo rje dang ni dunganyid dang// rigs kyi phyag rgya yinabar bshad// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byorasa'i
mtshan ma'i le'ususumacu rtsa dgu pa'o/denas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// gang zhig yang dag shes pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i
ngamatshig la gnas pa'o// dmalangasaba'i bud med gang/ brla'i drini rnam par gtong// lta stangs rang bzhin zhi ba dang// zhenangs blta ba'i rjes 'gro ba// bud med gang gisonamo/
dmar/ mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang/ khyim du byang 'dri bani// pad+ma gar dbang rigs 'byung yin// smin ma'i dbus na rtse gsum yod// lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang// rtag tu rdo rje'i
bsgom pa// gang gi khyim du rdo rje badri// rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi// mkha' 'grom de dpal ldan ni// har ka yi rigs byungayin/ ga dpa la bar rtse gsumani//
mdung thung dag ni snapa'agyur shing// mig dmar mdogazhi dma' saradang/ de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang/ mkha' 'gro ma de dpal ldan ni/ de ya khyim du/
jo rjes mtshan// rtag gang zhing mchod byed pa// shAha ra ka'i rigs 'byungab// mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za// 'khor 'gang gi dpa' ba 'am// lag par yang ni snapa'agyur
da sbyin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni// rtag tu dpral bar 'chang byed pa// skal ba chen po kun tshogs shing// mchog rtabaden pa gang yin dang// khyim du 'khor 'a 'dribyed cing//
rtag tu de la mchod byed pa/ rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs// gang zhig mig smanaganag 'dra zhing// soni dkar zhing mtho ba dang// rtag tu
gangag par gyur pa dang// sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang// rtag tukhrus la dga' ba dang// mang duslabar mi byed cing// khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dang// rtag tu dge pas mchod byed pa//
rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba// stong phrag bcu dang lnga pa yin// serazhingagaser gyi mdog 'drar snang/ mig mi g.yo zhing ba spyasar// rdordzog gi dpral ba 'am// lag par yang nisna
'gyur ba// rtag tu rgyal srid dag la gnas// snyanas shi bden par smra bdang/ ma li ka yi dri 'byung zhing// gang gi khyim du rdo rje// rtag tu 'drizhing cher mchodal// dum skye ma yi rig
las byung/ rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug mchog gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'// skam zhing mig sman gnag pa'i mdog/ dbu la mdung rtse lta bu lod// gang zhig gdug pa'i las 'daga'
rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro// 'jigs pa med cing brtse med de// gang gis dbul bar thig le dang// khyim du thongang 'dri zhing mchod// dpal ldan sdug de yi// mkha' 'gro'i rigs las byung ba
yin// srin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang// sonis ma mkharab gnas shing// rtag tugadug ba'i las 'a dga'// g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang// de yi khyim du ngag sta ni// 'dra zhing/
rtag tumachedabyed pa// rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs 'byung khagi/ mkha' 'gro ma ni the tshom med// mkha'agrom yi tshogs 'di dag/ shAstar ka'i rigs lasabyung// sgrub pa po la phapa'i
phyir// mtshan nyid yang dag bshad pa yin// mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang
bshad bya ba// sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi// mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang// yan lag tshogs ni shes bya ba'o// gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu zlum por snapa 'gyur zhing// kha yi sma
ra rtag tu yod// dang smin ma ring ba dang// gos bzagatsapa'i zhi ba dang// mi 'khrug bden bar smra ba dang// rtag tu ma ba'i chos la dgag/ dpa' bo'i

sring mor dengashesakhya// pad+ma'i phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba// yang na rus sbalaphyabargya bya/ khags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid// phyag rgya'i lan du shes pa bya// de ni tshes bcu'i ris dag la// khyim du
pad+ma'adri bar 'gyur// lAmal ni bud med kyi// mtshan tid gyur pa 'di dag yin// gsus pa zhing mig dkyus ring// mig ni dmar zhings skyar gnas// phyug cing skal bzang dpal len
can// serazhingatsam pa lta bu r snang// shin tu ring min thuba'ang min// snatshogs pa yi gos la dga'// dpal par ri mo gsum yodacing// mtshams kyi gyon du bltasapanas/ rgod
cing dga' banyid dag dang/ lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas// gamu'adu mchi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam dag la rtag tu dga'// de lta'i rab dregs mthong ni// mdug phyag rgya stan
par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bsam pa yi// bdag nyid kyang ni bstanapar bya/ g.yon po dag niyos khazlogakha// phyag rgya'i lan niyin par bshad// bcu bzhi dngani tshes brgyadani//
de yi dus tshigs yin par bshad// khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa lang// khros nas de ni rtag tu mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug lam yi// mtshanyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ gang gi mkhur/
[4/]tshos dag tuni// khung bu sna ba gnas gyur cing// dbazhin rtag tu dmar zhing sar// mig ni lcangasaradag tusnang// sa ni de bzhin 'khyil ba dang// ma dang dpral bar der bcings
snang// rimo gcig pa rab tshuganas// de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang// rtag tugos dmar la dga' zhing// dgod cing klu galen pa nyid// lan 'ga' zhigani khro ba dang// sems
nirnam par g.yo ba dang// rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste// 'di 'dra'i rab drags mthong na ni/ mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan bar
bya g.yon gyi phyogs su ldog kha ni// phyag rgya'i lanani yin par bshad// thung zhing phyin pa sbom pa dang// rtag tu gos sar 'daga' zhing// phrag pa dag na gos kyang 'phyang// de 'dra'i
ba du medamathong nani// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing// 'bad pa yisani gnyis pa yang// dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon nas yongs subazlog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/
bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te// de yi khyim du rtse rdza'adri// wi he ru ka'am yi// mtshan nyid gyur bde dag yin// lus kun la ni ba su yod// mig ni gnagacing ser ba dang// sgom zhing rnam bsgyur
mi bzad pa// bzhin 'phel che zhing kha tshel// ma mchu blozhing kha dogagazhag/ mig zlum sna mi nyams pa dang// rtag tu glu ni malos pa dang// sprinagyi mdogacan yid 'phrog pa// 'di'adra'i
rab dregasamathong nani// klu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ gnyis pa ni 'bad pa yis// mdu gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// galen nas longs su bzlog pa ni/ phyag
rgya'i lanani yin par bshad// tshes grangs bcu gcig de yi dus// khyim du ma ba 'dribar byed// rdo rje phag mo la ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud blama'i
bla ma las/ lA ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bar rnams te// gang zhig spyan dang
sring mo ru// yang dag shes par 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig lag g.yon ston pa ni// gsong por smra ba ston pa yin// gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ gsolor smra ba'i lanagyur yin/
gang zhig lto ba ldebs pa ni// bdag ni bkres par ston pa yin// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni// nam mkha' lasazhi'ongs zhes pa'o// gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'dzud// zos zin
zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhig rtse ni bskyod pa dag/ za'o zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhig khus mo' reg pa// nga' la zhes ni ston pa yin/ gapazhig sor mo'i rtse la reg/ lasos
zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhigaso ni 'cha' byed pa// sha za'o zhes ni smra ba yin// lag pa g.yas pa ston pa la// 'di ltar gyis zhes ston pa yin// gang zhig broganyer ston pa ni//
bcings so zhesani smra ba yin// gapazhig mkha' lding ston pa ni// grol le zhesani ston pa yin// gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni// de la pa ta te bstan bya// gang zhig sku ni ston pa la//
rnam par 'gyur babaltas nasani/ laTo gzhi de la bstan// gang zhig yan lag bskyodapa dang// de la mchod bstanapar bya// gang zhig lag pas lag pa ston/ gtor ma bu zhes smra ba
yin/ gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston// da lta gyis shig smra ba yin// gang zhig rna ba la reg pa// gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin// gang zhig sen mos sen mo reg/ shi yas
bya zhes bya ba yin// gang zhig sa 'dridakyil 'khor du// de ring 'jug ces sgrub yin// gang zhig nu ma la reg pa// bdag gi bu ni srungs zhes bya// gang zhig mtho g.yonas la 'dri/
nyen dag srungs shig pa ru bshad// gabazhig mig ni rnam 'dzums ba/ de ltar bya zhes smra ba yin// gang zhig tshigs la reg byed pa// bde ba nyal zhes smra ba yin// pho nya ma ni gang/
mang rung// de dag kun gyis yang dag spyad// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ tha/ de nas yan lag phyag rgya/
mi mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya/ budagang spyi gtsug reg byed pa// mgo bo de la khastan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston pani// de la mkhur tshos bstan par bya// gang zhig
so ni ston pa la// de la lcenibastan par bya// gang zhig mchu ni ston byed pa// de la dpung pa bstan par bya/ gang zhig rked rgyu ba ston byed pa// de la sa ni bstan
par du// gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa// de 'ako sko bstan par bya// gang zhig lta ba ston byedapa/ de 'alte ba bstan par bya// gang zhig gsang ba ston byadang// de'aling ka bstan par bya//
gang zhig brla niston byed pa// de la 'og ni bstan par bya// gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa// de la byin pa bstan bar bya// gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa// de la rkang mthi'ang bstan par bya//
gang zhig sor tshig ston byed pa// de 'a sen mo bstan par bya// gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa// de la nam mkha' bstanapar bya// gang zhiganamamakha' ston byedapa// da' nyi ma bstan
par bya// gang zhig chu bo ston byed pa// de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud blama'i bla ma las/ yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum
pa'o//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// yan lag ji bzhin phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang zhig shes pas sngananamani// sring mor the tshom med 'gyur ro// sor
mo gcig ni ston pa yis// legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis// legs 'ongs lanani smra ba yin// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// yan lag phyag
rgyar rab tu bshad// mdzub mo gnyis bkug mig gi rgyu// sngags pas gang ba de bstanate// de mod ji srid 'tshob bar// dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med// gang zhig gung mo
ston byed pa// de la mdzub mo bstan par bya// gapazhig srin lag ston byed pa// de nibastan par bya// gang zhig pa na sa ston pa// da' mdunani bstan par bya// gang zhig
spyi bo ston byed ba// da' mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya// gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa// de la mkha'ani bstan par bya// gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/ de la mtshams ni bstan
par bya// gang zhigaso ni ston byed pa// de la mchu ni bstan par bya// gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa// de la kha ni bstan par bya/ gang zhig ngapral ba ston byed pa// de la lte ba bstan
par bya// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgyu yin// 'di dag rtag bstan gsang ba pa/ lang dag lta bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ mngon par brjodapa'i rgyud
ma'i bla ma 'dus/ mkha' 'gro ma'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de nas gzhan la nga bshad bya nga// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid do//
gang gis ring nas dpa' bo dang// dpal mo sring mor ngashis 'gyur ba'o// dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa// rnal 'byor longs spyodas gzhi yin// gzhir nis gzhi byas nas su//
rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod// go bzlogapa yis bltakhani// bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba dang// rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma g.yo// sna tshogs myur du shes bya/
[j ]ba de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'o// rnam bsgyur 'khyil bar shes bya ste// ri mo gsum pa yongs su zlum// mkha' 'grom rnams nges 'gro ba'i// de ye mnaM ma shis par
ba: bya ga' ldeg par gyur na ni/ sngar bshad don ni btang bar 'gyur// de yi dngos ni 'jig gyur pa// rdo rje lta bu s gsal ba yin// sgrani khu byug skadalta bu r// gsal ba de ni
rtag tu gyur// 'di ni mtshan ma'i khyim du ni// jo rdzalta bu me long bcas// ral gri 'dra ba'i ma lebacas// phyagamtshanamadung pa'adrar rtag tu 'byung// degasal me long yin zhes bya/
ngas mtshanamar byas pa'i gzugs dag ni// mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa// de nimakha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// mchog yin par ni shes par bya// po ti ga zhes bya ba ni gsopor smra ba'o//
pra ti gi zhes bya ba gsong por smra ba'i lanano// gamu zhes bya ba mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba yin no// laM bo zhes bya ba ni 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yin no// danas bya ba'i zas shes bya ba yin no//

gri han zhes bya ba ni bram ze zhes smra ba yin no// pi ra Nazhes bya ba ni snying nyid de// maN+Da zhes bya ba ni sgra ngan no// g+ham zhes bya ba ni kar nika'o// shi re ni brdzunano/ ka ra ni lce ba'o//

bar ni sgra'o//sha ma Ne ni rna ba'o//asmi dmAnibasubs pa'o//sa ma ga mni mi'o//ti la kanemakha' 'gro ma'o//na ra kanidil 'khor ro//a mo ni dur khrod do//ka li kani sgo'o/ shwasazhi bram ze'i rig so//pa'i hU~Mni rgyalarigs//bi ra tisiDi'u

gso/kye ranyidams reg soamas+sani shacanano//pangashu li ka'i khyimamo//(kani sring mo'o/me la ni chu'o krihar Dani rdo rje chu gtong ba'o lce so la reg pa'i ltog pa ston pa'o/tI ni phris bsgo ba'o// ku ta ni gnas che khe go nas 'ongs so zhes bya ba'o//
ki ran ni me togago/ tumu'an rgod nga 'o// tanani char dbab pa bzlog pa'o// tripa nizhu ba'o// d+hur droni shes pa'o// ni ni srinano// rU pa ni bdug pa'o// sa du ni ri bo'o//
si tani chu bo'o// a gu 'a ni yan lag go/ ba nga nan gdong ngo// dza ni lce'o// anan naso'o/ pakAni rgyal mtshanano// tshan do ni'aphreng ba'o// tsalani rlung ngo// pa shuni re dgas sa//
yan+tani dkyil 'khor// sha namani bzhi mdo'o// phal ku shrI ni skye ba'o// ma dkar ba ni phyugs chen po'o// gnir skyesaso// nami'i// goni khyu mtshogako dmani ma 'o// b+hani ba
ba'o// nyani rnam grangs so// a myuni rgyal po'o// kha la reg pa ni bros so zhes pa'o// lce la reg pa ngems so zhes bgo/ nistani snying po'o// khrini ngo tsha'o// ma thu nan gyis shig
pa'o// bslal reg pa ni stopa'o// steng du gcig go/ 'og lumed pa'o// phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lanano// dpa' bo'i gsung gi gsang ba'i brda'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i tshig le'u subazhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o///de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni// rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad//
skyes pa'am bud med g.yonanas 'gro// 'dod pa'i dngos grubastar bar byed// khyim dang zhing ngu rnam gnas pa// shinaturing ye shes par 'gyur// he ru ka las sbyogazhanamod//
slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni// rgyud 'di ru ni bsgrub pa'o// legs par gyur pa nyid yin te// banas mi bya zhing spang mi bya// nus pa yis ni mchod par bya// pho nyamo brgyad 'di dag/
mos da dad pa 'phel ba// rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu// dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba'o// lha me gzhan dag kun sbyor ba'i// 'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang// gnyis su
mong dang thogs med dang// dam tshig sprad par spyad pa dang// bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor// tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin bzhi// khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod// 'di brgyad dam tshig
kun spyod yin// bsgrub pal ni gnas pa yi// sgrub pa po yis rtagashes bya// rgyud kun gyini thunamong ste// rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya// dad pa nyidakyis blang bya yi// mig dang
lagapas ma yin no// gsang ba 'di ni mi ldan cing// rab tu'abad de sba bar bya/ khe ldan mathe'u chung bskyod pa ni// pho nyamo rnams yang dag gnas// dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste/
sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas/ mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang// gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o// lul yul ngu'i dka' thub can// pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshanam bag/ pho nyal/
gri so 'drazhing// dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin// de bzhin phe 1legs 'dres pas// sgrub pa po yis dngos grubathob// bzlas mchod bsam gtam mang par ya nga// myur ba nyung du 'grub

par 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgyu sgrub pa pos// mchod partepal rab tu 'jug/ 'di las gzhan nga 'i mchong mdade// de ltar bstan bcos ngesapa yin// pho nya'i 'a ma la dga' ba dang// sgrub pa po ni dngos
grubabartson// rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// zas la rtag tuspyad par bya// sgrub po la ni legs pa ru// mnyam par gazhag pa'i rigs rnams ni// kun la lta bar spyad bya zhing// bawazhin
par ni mi brtagago/ 'di nyid du ni de dbyer med// pho mo yi sgrub po gnyis// das grub chog 'a sngod tshe// pho nya gcig po kho na yin// byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni// sgrub pa dag dang lta

dang/ bla ma brgyud rim gyis theb pa'i// dbang bskur bas ni sngags de gas ldan// phonya rnams su yang dag bshad// phyag rgya lags sbyor ngang tshul dang// chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang// ye shes

chu skyes yang ngag rdzogs//sems kyi bdag nyid nang pa ra langs/ lus kyi bya ba kun byas te// lus la shin tumatshon tshani// lus la gnas par kun tu spyad// dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni// rtag tu sngags
kha4
@#/ ni brjod pa bya// rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing// mtshon cha rnams ni bsgomam bya/dam tshig can la khro mi bya//mngon par brtson 'as 'da' mi bya// de dang lhan cig bde bar
[3 ]bya bdag gi don dang gzhan don du// dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya// 'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya// mtshanamo rtag par namamakha'i gos// gnag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyu byu// srog chags yan lag
las byung gyon// bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur// mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsang// shrI he ru kas byin brlabs pas// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// dus kun tuni yang dag gnas//rigs
dang rigasamin ngor mi blta// spyigatsug la sogs bcing ba sbyang// pho nya gtsangasbra dang po yin/ gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod// zasagacigatu ni tha pa nyid// gtsapa snga gsum pa yin par bshad//
gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyas pas// gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rin thoban// dngos grub ga'a'abyungami 'gyur// de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang// de bzhin bde mchogalas gang gsungs// gsang ba'i
rgyu las yang dag bshad// de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang// rdo rje 'jigs byed nyidalasagasungasaM// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub// da 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni// sngags pas
zha' min par// kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus// dpal ldan khrag 'thungaya shes che// rnam dag mtshan nyid kun sgrub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thub// dag byed sdig pa 'jigs byed yin// rig
pa dang ni smras pas kyang// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing// lus ngag skyon ni med pa yi// gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi// mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni// rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi//
sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur// skya zhing skye bar de bzhin gshegs// rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas// dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin// de nas mchod pa
rnam dag pas// mya ngan 'das pas byung dpa' bo// de bzhin bdaganyid mchod pa dang// sangs rgyas kun tshogs sras bcas dang// dang kha bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma// brtan pa dag dang g.yo ba dang
spyan gyi mchod pa 'i dus 'dzin pa// zla ba'i dus la gnas pa yi// spyan dang bu dang lhan cig tu// bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba// sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang// gang shes de ni bstan mi
bya: dag byed ces 'a spyod pa mi// rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas 'gyur// gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya/man ngag rnam par nyams mikhya// dam tshig gnas 'a ci rigs par//man ngag rnams
kyang sbyin par bya// pho ma gtogs gzhan dag la// 'dod pa rmongs par 'gro mi byed// rtag tu pho rtachags bral ba// mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya// skye gnas dmanal mi gnas pa// bsnyen bkur/
nyid ni bya ba min// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// chung ma pho nyamo nyid gnas// 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la// dka' ba nges par bad bar 'gyur// mchog dang tha ma lhan cig
'gugs// de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin// rnal 'byor pa rtag g.yon nas spyod// rkang pa g.yonab sngon du 'dor// lag pa g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur// g.yon gyi phyad ni rab machod byed/ lus n
@#/ g.yonani rnam par gnon// g.yon pa yis ni tshim dang tha// brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs// sgrub pa po ni dmatshig brtson// dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang// lhan cig zas 'aspyod
par byed// gas ltal ni kun spyod ba'i// gsani rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags// rigs gcig la kun spyod pa'i// rnal 'byor sgrub la rab tum chod// b.lungashadang rtag pa khyi shadag dang snatshog pas//
dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas n ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi zas// sngags pas phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa yi// nyer spyod la stan
bcos kun la brtag/ rtag tu de dgagazu zhing srung// las rnams dag thams cad la// bgegs med ji bzhin 'grub 'gyur bar// 'di ni gzhanadaga'agyur ma yin// 'dini pho nya mchog bzang
bo brtsonazhib lhan cig ldan pa yin/ ma chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs// rnal 'byor kyirnam dbyed// bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing// de yi don ni mchog mtshungs pa'o/
spyan dang lan pha dang ni// bdag po nyid duskad cig mthong// lce sbomamig dmar ser la// rtsub cing spyanani dmasar yin// dngos grub kun gyi thunamongadu// bzlas dang brtul zhugs la/
rtag dga'// dran pa dngan yang dag ldan// pho1lasogs gnas dang bcas// mkha' 'gro mamchogazhi shu bzhi// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ste// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrubabyed
ba'i// rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos// rgyudang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba// gsang sngags 'di las byung ba yin// sngags dang phyag rgyur yang dag ldan//
phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngagasano// lus can rnams la byin mi rlob// jisrid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag/ shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// rnal 'byor pa la/
gang zhig snang// khyi yi skye gnas brgyur skye ste// sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur// dperan la la mar 'dod pas// 'bad pasatshun bsrubs gyur kyang// mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi//
lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad// 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni// 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i// rnal 'byor gzhan la rten pa ni// gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur// rnal 'byor
che mchog dpa' bo ni// yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa// rigs ngan kla klo yin na yapaM/yul de yongs su brtagasapa yin// sems can rjes su bzung pa'i rgyur// de rang ni rtag tu
gnas/ mngonapar brjodapa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ pho nya'i grags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
mkha' 'gro ma yi sIng po mchog/ dpa' bo rnams kyi khyad b.rani// gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po g.yo byedacing// rjes su dran pa tsam gyis ni// yang dag dngos grub
zla rim gyis ster// oM sarba bud+d+hat+taki nI ye badzrawanI ye hU~MhU~MphaT swahA/ gsasngags 'di ni gsang sngags che// las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ sngags chen bklags pas grub
paste// 'dod pa thams cad grub pa yin// mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dum skyes ma dpalAma' de// oM had duyaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che// las rnams
thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub// gsang sngags kun gyi gsang sngags gtso// thodapa'i dum bu la sogs pa// dpa' bo kun kyisnying po mchog gsang
stags de dag mchog dam pa// 'dod pa'i donakun grubakhyed yin// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// dpa' bo'i sdom pa mchog yin no// 'di ni kun gyogasang sngags te// 'di ni sngags su grags
pa yi// sa 'og da nga nimatho ris dang// jiltar mtshams kyang de bzhin te/ gang yang dzibazhin las rnams kyis// 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin// de yis thams cad grubanasani// gsang sngagasamchog

ni bla med pas// 'jig rten gsum bo grub pa yin//gang gis bla na med pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'grub/ mkha' 'grom dang dpa' bo kun// mdor bsdus rgyas par ma yin no// ri bo mdzes par bris nas ni//

sna tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan// de yi steng du dkyil 'khor sgom// mkha' 'gro mi dang lA ma dang// rnal 'byor ma dang dum skyesam// dpa' bodang ni dpa'amo nyid// dang de zhes bzhad pa// nye shu rtsa bzhi dpa'/
po'i rigs// mkha' 'grom yi dra ba'i sdom// sngar bshad dpa' bo dpa' bo'i mchog/ dpalo'imchog ni thams cad nyid// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo rnams // de yis 'gro ba grangs med khyab//
dpa' bo dang nemakha' 'gro nyid// rnal 'byoram dang lA ma dang// dum skyes ma dang de bzhin te// 'khor ba'i gnas su rnam par blta// las rnams thams cad 'grub byed cing// 'khor 'dor bzhugs
la rtag tumachod// legs par mnyam gzhag 'dod pa 'grub// sngar bshad cho ga bzhin bzlas shing// mkha' 'gro ma yi drab 'i sdom// bsams pas 'khor lo chen po yi// dngos grub kyang ni
thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas bye bas gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro mna'i ral// 'khor gyi gras kyang bye bas// rnal 'byor ma dang/ma dang// dum skyes ma ni khyad par du// dngos grub

thams cad byed pa dge/ mngon par brjodapa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma dang dang 'beis kyi rim pa sgrub pa rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo gnyisasu med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun
skade nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sku gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni// dung chen dgami khon las// mkhas pas gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste//
za mtshan nyid thamasacad yongs su rdzogs// yan lag dnganinying lag mchog/ mos pa'i yidi ni sngon 'gro ba'i// rnal 'byor bas ni gzung zhing sgrub// khri chen chu dang rak+ta dang// shu krar bcas
bsamachod par byed// nar dpa' chenabadug spos ni// dpa' bo'i las kyi sgrub pa ste// bla ma yi ni go 'phang 'grub// de nas bdag nyid mchod byas te// 'dod pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing//
tshargyal po'i bumed rnyed par 'gyur// ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas// 'gag pa 'imachod pa rab tu bya// pags chen ri mo bris nas ni// sgrub pa po yis mnyamabazhagan// zhag bdun gyisani 'grub

'gyur te//the tsom med par rnam par spyod// rnal 'byor ma dang bla ma mchod// mkha' 'gro'i gnas su de bzhin skyo// des ni bde brnyed nas kyang// las ni rtag tubyed par 'gyur// rtag tu bla ma mchod nas
ni deye dngos grub myur du 'grub// mkha' 'gro ma ni sgrubapa yis// glang po'i pags la sku gzugs bri// rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub pa yis// ba lang lngagasal rimo bri// mkha' spyod dag ni
sgrubapa yis// rta yi pagasal ri mo bri// sa la spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis// ma de'i pags la ro mi khri// sa 'og spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis// phag gi pags 'al ri mo bri// gnod sbyin mon sgrub pa yis//
shibaspangalebal sku gzugasabri// lha yi bu mo sgrub pa yis// tsam pa'ispaleb sku gzugs bri// klu mo sgrub po dag gisan// klu shingaspapa le ba ri mo bri/ in sgrub par 'dod pa yis// dur khrod gos
lasku gzugasabri//pha rol blta ba'i sgrub pa dag// bobu'i bags la sku gzugs bri// nor rnams sgrub par 'dod ba yis// byi ba'i pags la sku gzugs bri//chang ni 'gogs pa 'dod pa yis// spre'u'i
pags la sku gzugasakhri// khrag ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thod lan sku gzugasakhri// sa bone'i shugs par 'dod pa yis// phug romalngagos la sku gzugs bri// lha ni bgugs par 'dod pa yis//
thangashing saleb sku gzugasabri// grong khyer 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// tsa spyang lpags 'askugazugs bri// zhi pa'i las la bram ze'o// zla mtshan byung dusagos la bri// des na zhi bar gyur pa yin//

rgyas pa rgyal rigasamo yi ni// zla mtshanakhyung dus gos la bris// dpangalardza'u rigasamo yi ni// zlamtshan byung dus gos la bri// mngon spyod la ni dmangs rigs kyi// blamtshan byung dus ges la bri//
brgya'abar bya ba dag la ni// rgyu'amtshan gos la ri mo bri// rengs par bya ba rdo lab ste// dgar ba 'a ni rngame 'o pags// dgug pa la nising ga'o/ las kun l ni bya yi bags// yang na lcags ni kho
na 'o// gzhan du sna tshogs las rnams ni// na pa tsam gyis nges par 'grub// bgegs rnams med par bya ba'i phyir// ri bong lcags pa dag la bri// bgagasaneldab byed pa la// shi ba'i pags pa
rnams la bri/gser dang dngul la sogs pa la// zas dang shel dang thang shing// rdo rdzolas ni bya ba ste// dngos grub mchog ni khyung pa yin// tsan dan da nithang shing dang//
tsan dan dmar bo tsam pa ka/ ashoka ni grub pa'o// shi brik+kanor sbyin 'gyur// argakhur dngostan shang// 'o mngashing gi bye brag dang// stag pa'i shing la sogs pa rnams // grub pa yi ni dngos grub
'gyur// sbal pa'i rus pa las byas dang// klu shing dag gi bye brag dang// rus sbal rus pa glang po'i so/ khyad par dunicharayang 'bobs// bram ze'i rus pa zhi ba ste// glang po'i rus pa rgyas
zla pa yin// dbang la rta ya rus bste// gsad b.lanim de'i sa// dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i dus// sngangal ltadang ma de'o// rengs par bya la/khyi yi rus// dgug 'a ni seng ge'i rus// sa yi
[Y]'og tu 'gro ba'/// phag gi rus pa dag la bya// sa dkar dag las byas pa ni// rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyas pa lan sar ba yin// dbaladamar po'i sa yin la/ gsodang lan sanag
ste/ 'dinimador bsdusachog 'o// dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag/ mig sman chen po de bzhin te// mi yi rus pa brdar ba yi// mdog khulhan cig sbyar nas kyang// rang byung me togs bon dang//

rigs nganadang ni bram ze dang// gdol pa mdangagayu modang// khrus mkhan ma dang garamakhanam// ma 'am yang nasring mo 'am// bu mo yizhi bye brag gi/ 'di dag drug du blangs nas su/[F]shuka rak+ta'i khyad
[z]par dag/ sna tshogs 'di dag bsres nas kyang// chog bzhin du sku gzugs bri// grogamakhar gyin sa dag la// shi ba'i sku dang nus ba yi// pir gyis rim pa bri bar bya// thig skadashi ba'i skud
ba yis// sku gzugs thig skud mchog yin no// yi dgas 'phreng sogs bsnyenanasani// bsas kyang ni mar ma@// dpa' bo chen po'i bdugaspes dang// rkang gis lha bshes bya bas// dri chen
ngodzeuyi dri// thod pa dag gi bum pa ste// arga'i snod ni thod pa 'o// arga rus pa'i nuNaste// 'bad pas skyes bu dbul 'byin no// ji ltar nus pa dgatu spyad// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis//

thabs dang shes rab ldan barani// sku gzugs yang niri mo 'am/ gzhan yang mkhaMs pas cho ga khyu// dzil lasakyi rjes mthun par// de lta'i gos kyi rjes 'chang zhing// gcer bu skra ni grolba dang// gzugs mdog ga ni bsgyur nas kyang
gtso bo dang ni rnala'abyor ba// slob dpon yang ni de bzhinataM// phyag rgya'i rigs par gnas nas su// drichen chu dang dpa' bo btsa'// mnyam
par gzhaganas bzlas pa bya// rnam pa du mkhye brag gi/ klu dang gar ni rnam pa dang// bza' btung mchog ni spyad par bya// de dag rdzogs kyi bar byas// de 'di choga'i rim pa'o// rab tu gnas pa'i/
dus dag tu// nyis 'gyuratshogs kyis spel ba ste// gdubu dang ni kang ka dang// pung rgyan gos kyi bye brag dang// sor gdub dang ni mchod phyir thogs// rkangargyan dang ni thod pa dang// gdugs dang
07 @#// rngalab de bzhin te// sna tshogs skyes bu sbyin zhing dbul// sna tshogs dpa' bo mchog dam pa// myos byed btul ba'i bye brag rnams // dam tshigachog mchog rnams dang//
snutshogs ro dang bcud rnams dang// sna tshogs me tog mchog rnams dang// lha mo mchog gilus rnams dang// rol mo sna tshogs sgra rnams dang// slob dpon phyag rgyur sbyorab dang// slob ma'i
tshogs kyi khyad par rnams // bza' ba'i mchod pa dag gis mchod// bdug pa'i srimchog rnams dang ni// sna tshogs rgyal ba'i bdug pa dang// khyad par du nyi mar me'i 'phrong// gdugs dang bla la
dbazhin te// mele dngani yab dang// dra ba dang ni dra phyed dang// chun po dgagis rnam par brgyan// bum pa ris dang ldan pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// rin chen lnga dang sman dang ni/
dri yi bya brag dgagis ni// argyu'i snod ni khyad par du// tsuta pa la blta dang// aM khu []bu ka dam pa// bi pa dI dzaparas dgang// ba'amo kri tan dza// kodrika ri ka ldan pa/ e kU tI ra sa hade//
sman rnams kun ces bya ba la// lngapo de dag shes byas// mkhas pas bum par gzhug par bya// gsadang dzA ti pha la dang// gla gor zhongasha dbazhinano// gsaragyi mchod phyir thogs dang ni// phyag rgya
drug gis rnam par bargyan// sgrub pa po kun gacer bu yis/ bkra shis glu yi glu len cing// rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni// dadapa'i blo ni sdoma'agrobs// sa dang gnas skabs thams cad du//
sna tshogs rgya che'i mchod par bya/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyudabloma'i blam las// ras ris la sogs pa rab tuganas pa'i chogale'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o//de nas gzhan
yang bshang ba// dkyil 'khor dkyilanyakhor dam pa mngonan thohe ru kazhes bya// dkyil 'khor snying bos bsdus pa yin// shin tumanyam gzhag sgrub pa pos// dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya// dam tshig
nyams pasadakyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dwangos grub 'thob mi 'gyur// sbrang rtsi mtshal dang gapur btsas// dmar dang tsan dan sbyor ba ni/ tshogs kyi nang du zhugs ba ni// thams cad bcud kyis
len du gnas// thams cad rdo rje'i mtshanam 'dzin// sbom po mtha'a'agartse sbyor bas// rnal 'byor rim pas rtag tu spyad// zhiba'i btubs bzhin myangs na// dngos grub rtag tu thob par
'gyur// 'di ni mi 'chi su phyed 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad 'jug pa yin// mchod bzhi dbazhinadang 'bo ni// dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi// snyoms par 'jugapa'i de nyid 'dzin/ ]

mngon du bsnyen pa bya bani// chog bzhin du 'bum du bzla// 'khorale'i gsang sngags 'bum bzlas shing// rang ba lha'i yapa 'bum du bzla// gzhanani khri ru bzla bar bya// bka' bzhin 'khor 'a bri bya zhing/
mdangs ldan mi mchog dag gis ni// dkyil 'khor bri zhing dgod par bya// sngarab shadaganas ni gang yin pa// der ni dkyil 'khor bri khabya// sa ni yongs su sbyang bar bya// brdung zhiba'ags par bsdus
@#/ ga/ nas su// mnyam zhing zug rngu rnam par spang// sa la ma lhubalce pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa'i nyebar byug/ dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang// mi 'chi bcu phyedabacas pa yis//
dkyil 'khor sani nyerabyugs te// der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam// dur khrod dang kun spyod cing// ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang// dur khrod brgyadad ldan pa yi// slob dpon legs bamanyam
gzhag ste// dkyil 'khor bzang de bri bar bya// slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// mtshanam ngan pa kun spangs shing// yang dag shasangashing rgyud shes pa// dpa' ldan khrag 'thugasang sngag
shes// khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang// sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro// thepas spyi bor rgyan byas shing// yan lag thalabasakhyugs pa dang// gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing// rus
'phreng rus par yang dag gnas// dumagacig spyi bor rgyan pa dang// sa pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// khahUM ba ni lag na gnas// bdag nyidaha kar ni// byas nas de yi 'og tshune//
dpal ldan ru ka dranabya// 'khor 'go 'di yi snying kharadagod// deltar bdag nyid go bgos nas// rab rnamason phyogs su dgod// 'ogatu'ang mtshon chadagodang ra bya// 'khor 'a'i bdag
nyidabakonas ni// stong du mda' yi drang dang// bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra ba bya/ de ltar go bgos sum ni// rtsa gsum pas kyang gazhig minus// de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing//
ba00/ sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// de nas sems medabradasu 'a// ra phyi la ni chen pos brgyan// dpal ldan khrag
'thu grong mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya// khru bzhi pa la khru brgyad pa// sgo bzhikun nas zur bzhi pa// sngags pas nyis gyur rnam spyod cing// mkha' 'gro ba
bde mchog bzlas// de yi dbus su bzhag ba ni// 'dab chags lte ba 'bar dang bcas// gsar yang dag ldan pa yi// stsatshogs pad+ma'adab brgyad pa// lte bar bkod bya dpa' bo ni/
'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can la// mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar// dazhes byar sgra cher bzhad// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan// bzang po spyanagasumana'akhama'/
glang po'i pags pa rnam par bgos// smin ma bzang po rdo rje'abyas// phyogan kha TaM ga bsnams shing// brgya phreng 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// dmadun gnas pa'i lha mo ni// rdo rjephag/
mo zhes bya ba// rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs// spyanagasum drag po'i gzugs can bya/ ka pAl ni anus bkang// khanas ru snyir 'dzagacing// lha dang lhamin mir bcas
da phyogs kun tuni sdigs mdzubacing// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'dri'u bzhi// phag mo yi ni rigs las byung// phyogs dang phyogs kyimatshams rnamasani/ 'khor lolte bar mchod par bya//
de bzhin 'dir nidapa' bo yang// 'khol por yang dag gnas pa mchod// sgrub po la dngos grub 'dod// gnyis med dpa' bo mchodabar bya// de nas bum pa bya ba ni/
tsa lanag bo la sogs med// mu tig gser dang rin chen dang// byu ru dngul dang zangs ma ste/ bza' bkun gyis legs bkang ba'i// snod ni stong nga gzhag par bya// mgrin pa srad bus
dkri ba dang// khani 'dab mas brgyan pabya// gos zung gis ni lags dkris pa// brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod// gos zung gisani dkris pa yi// bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag/
gsar ram dngul lam rin chenanam// mu tig rnamasazhimadzes par bya// dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang// gsar rnams kyis mdzes par spyad// grong mchog yid 'ong mchod nas ni//
grub pa nyid du the tsom med// bdag nyid kyi ni gdong lus kun// driyi chu yis legs par basad// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i mkha'i
'gro ma rnamasazhi// yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod// sa stengasamakha' 'gro ma gang yin// dkyil 'khor kun tu dgopar bya// gang yangs 'og rnamasasu dgod// mamo thams cad
phyogs dang ni// phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dring me tog bdug sa dang/ mar me brgyayang dbul bya zhing// dba' ldan khrag 'thung
dkyil 'khor gnas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor mamachodabya// rgyal mtshanadamaradang de bzhin ser// dkar dang gnag dang soraskya dang// de bzhin gosani sna tshogs dang// me tog 'phreng bdun dang//
bla'i dag dang darab cas pa'i// mdabangashin tumadzes pa dang// de bzhinubaza' bca' btung ba yis// rab manyam bzhag ste mchodapa bya// de nas sgrubapos dngos grub kyis// dang por slob dpon
mnyes par bya// grub 'dodashin tumanyam bzhagapas// ci nus par ni blamamachod// driladapyas ma tog spos kyis brgyan// shin tus snyanadri'i bu dkrol// sgrub pa po yis rngabs
shing// ha zhes ni brjod pa'ang bya// deltar chog bzhin dkyil 'khor// 'dod pa kun ldan machod nasani// dayi bu sdug gdong ni// dar gyis legs par bkab nas su// me tog
gis bkabathal mo dag/ pad+mas gtor nas bskor bani// g.yon phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te// yudang phaT kyi sgra yang brjod// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// dngos grubasras po/
gzhag par bya// tha'amo me tog gtor nas ni// gang du babs pa'ibasam pa ni// bskorab dag kyang byas nas su// shin tumanyam par bzhag pa yis// sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug/ de nas
yon thegs grong khyer du// g.yas pa'i phyogs su brtananasani// snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor// dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs// de yi rigs nibastan par bya// de nas slob dbon/
[©]/ legs pa ni// rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgyamachod// de nas slob ma gnyis pa la// mtshal chenalanagasum bzlas pa yi// la thig le byab yin// de nas slob ma'i
gdeng phye la// dkyil 'khor dag nibastan par bya// gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin// der de 'ang drag bstan par bya// slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu// rab cubatud pa byas nas ni// g.yon
nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis// de nas bskor ba rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la// ji bzhin tshogs phyag bya'o// de nas blam dgayon// de bzhinagashegs pas gsungs pa//
lta dbul// gsar ni brgya stong dbul ba dang// rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang// ras ni rlung gyur ba nyid dang// glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram// rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang// mgul gdung
sor gdub dam pa dang// gsor las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs// chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid// bran pho branamo sring mo rnams // phyag byas nasani dbul bar bya// deng nas brtsams dbran
duni/ khyod la bdag ni dbul 'gas zhes// blo ldan kun nas dngab yis// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya// de ltar nges par bya bani// sgrub pa po yis rang nges byas// de nas de la mkha'
'gro ma// rnal 'byor marnamasamanyes par 'gyur// mkha' 'grom dpa' ma dang// dum skyesam dang gzugs can ma// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig/ dedang rnam sbyonga'agro ba kun// sgrub pa/
pani de dag gi/ cibagyi byed par the tsam med// rnal 'byor 'di'i grub 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum dug zlogs shing// misnangaphug dang gnas mkha' rgyu// rkang mgyogs de bzhinabacud kyis len//
sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis// rtag par rgyun du spyadapar 'gyur/ gzugasani dum byed pa dang// nam mkha' lani 'gro bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par bya// nges gnon 'gro ba thams
cad kyang// lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis// skad cig gisan sbyoranyid skyed// sngags pas dkyila'akhor ma mthong bar// gang zhig rnal 'byor ba nyid bdod// mkha'al bu tshur gyis rdeg dang//
smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang// sbyorab kun gyi dam pa yin// gang zhig rtag tu'aded gyur pa// de ni lcam zil gnon 'gro// de nyid bsdus par gyur pa 'am//
gsang ba'ang dordza'ajigs byed las// dkyila'akhor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung// de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas// mngon
par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor gyi choga'ile'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyor ba'i mtshams dpalangadag ldan/
chu med pa nimatshams yin te// gos pa medacing chags spangs pa// mtshamasazhi 'byung po thams cad pa// danisams can thams cad de// mtshams ni srid pa dag pa ste// dbyangs skyong he ru ka nyid
yin rnal 'byor pa yis bsgoms shing bzla// gcig cing 'byung bar snang ba ste// du dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan/
rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// skyagrol dpAl bar thodapa ste// spyi gtsug tuni zla ba 'o// he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan//
mtshams rnams grubang 'i mchogadam pa// thun bzhi ni bya ba'o// dga' ba bzhi po dga' b dang// lte ba'i snying padanama'i dbus// lcayicu dang mgo stang du// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid//
ngam par dga' dang lhan cigaskyes// dang po 'dab ma drug cu bzhi// gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yin te// gsus pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa// bzhi ba sum cu rtsa gnyes 'dab// phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsa gnas
pa lhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thungamchog/ sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtshamasasu ni// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom bya// sdug bsngalasprul pa 'khor 'khoste// kun 'byung chos kyi 'khogal yin//

'gogapa lengs sbyong 'khor lesi// lam ni bdeb chen po yin// de ltar mtshams su byin brlabs nas// rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste// dkar dngo so dang ljang bdang// spyanagasum thugs rje stongapa'i nyams//
rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum gyis// yos su dag par rim par sbyor// rdo rjedril bumanyam par ldan// thod pa dang kha 'dzin// mgo bo gri gug phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs//
zla ba yi dgas pa dbus su// skragrol phyogs kyi gos can yin// dgas ba nyams kyis mos pa ste// dus dag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na// sdom pa mchog ni grub ba yin// drichen rdo rjeudang ni//
rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang// don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te// de dag rtag tu bsresanas su/ rnal 'byor rtag tumatshams 'dod// gsang sngags 'di dag rtag tu yang// de ru kani dbyang sasbyong
mchog/ o par kAya khyi phyam ba ra dzaya n+tim han par pa dzod ya A:/ rtag tumatshams ni rnams bsgoms na// dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya// dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed//
las rnams thams cad byed pa dag[” ]dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang grub// 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta gyi// don ni sngags bas rtag tu smra// dngos grub 'di ni rang
lu'agrub// de ma thag tu grub chen bcas// 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin// sgrub po'i dbang bos rnams bsgoms te// khrag 'thungachog bzhin shes nas// zhag gsum brtul zhugs
la gnas na// lha yi gnas 'gro ba yin// lha yi ye shes thob nasani// lca yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin// ngag rnams kun la dbang thob cing// thams cad mkhyen par gyur nasasu// rga dang
'chib rnam par spangs// sangs rgyas lha yis bston pa ste// sridapar sangs rgyas po'abar mdzad// nyin zhag gsumagyi bar du yang// phyag rgya lhan cileg 'byung ba spyad// mthong nas sring mo yang dag
@#// sgrub zhag gsum bar du mchod byas nas// rdo rje haru ka dpal lha// thams cad kyang gi 'byon par 'gyur// pus mo sa la btsugs nasani// de yis phug ni byas nas kyang//
sgrub pos rtag tu mchod pa bya// sgrub bos 'dong ba dga' bas ni// nad la dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen/ gtso bo thams ca'adzin pa ste// khams gsum kun tsurnam spyod cing// sgrub pa po
rimchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni deb 'chin dpa' bo ste// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis// sagazhi sku rags kyis bskor ba// lha dang lha minami rnams kyang//
sgrub pa po ni de nyid kyi// mod la dbang du gyurapa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbyangs skyong gi mtshams kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o/// de nas gtan
yang ng shang bya ba/ yi ge bdun pa sgom pa ste// yi gtsAlas yang dag 'byung// ro rdzomakha' 'gro bde bacha// phyag drug zha'agasum spyan gsum pa/ mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing/
dpe byungabasang pobargyad cur ldan// A li kA li las byungogatso// phag mo dang na mnyam par ldan// stong zhing thugs rjes khyab pa ste// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// na ra'i pags pa gos
su mnabs// thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing/ g.yas pa'i phyagan mdung rtse gsum// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thamasacad stsol// thod ba'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rjera'
'chang// zla ba phyed ba'i spyi gtsug gtsang// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// sna tshogs pad+ma'id la
bzhugs// 'khor lo drug gi dbus su bzhugs// rnal 'byor ma drugamanyam par sbyang// myur dudangos grub stsol ba yin// dang po khrag 'thung lha mo ste/ gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed sa//
gsum pa dug gcus ma yin te/ dbazhi pa rdo rje nyi ma mo// lnga pa pho drag mo ste// drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ g.yon gyi phyogs nas dgod par bya// lha mo de dag cher gtum zhing// spyan gsum
dbu sku grol ba ste// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin// thams cad yi dgas stang bzhugs// sngo zhings la ltung ba dang// dmar dang dungu kha de bzhind kar// cang te'u dang dril bu 'dzin:
thams cad na ra'i pags pa 'dzig/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyanacan// g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs// yi ge drug las yang dag byung// lha mo gzigs pa mtshan pa yen// ji
ltar mgon po'i mdeg bzhin du// phag mo yang ni de bzhin te// phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhinan// sde dang ser dang ljang ba dang// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ lha mo'i byin par mnyam pa pa'agrel/
mchog tu dga' bar rnam par mos// o hahahU~MhU~M phaT 3 yi ge de lasamakha' 'gro ma// yan lag drug pa rnam bar sgom// bdun pa dbus su dgod pa ni// yi ge phyogs las de ru ka/ dbus su dran pa yang dag
[©]// byang chub kyi yan lag ste bcom ldan 'das dpa' han ka'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rjehar ka ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan 'gan

rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yana' gzhi drag gtum ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagazhi do rdzatem ma'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagazhi
rdo rdzodrag mo'o// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo mkha' 'gro ma ste/ byang chub yan lag 'di bdun sgom// ji lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing sgom// gsang sngags gzhal med pa//
bzlas shing// khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste// bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang// zla phyed nang du dngos grub ste// rtag tuzhagar bsgoms pa ni// zhag bdun gyis ni the tshom med// dpyid zla tha
chu nyalani// sring mo bu mo tsha mo dang// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// nyin mtshan bzlas shing bsgom byas pas// tho rangs dpal khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur// mngonapar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
blam las/// ba'i snying bo bsgoms pas bskyod pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// gzhan yang snying po bshad bya ba// semasacan kun la phan 'dogs pa// hU~Mgi yi ge las
byupa// bde ba chen po de las byung// sngo nad kar la drag po ste// zhal brgyad pa 'angashin tu 'jigs// spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu drug mgo yi 'phreng bas rnam par bargyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i
dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pa'i ral pa 'chang// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbul mnan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po 'jigs pa ni// g.yas brkyang nga ye zhabs kyis gnon//
ngasamtshan shin tu 'jigs pa yang// g.yon bskum pa yi zhabs kyis gnon// rdo rje dril bu mnyam len pas// phag mo yi nika tsha 'tsher// tshangs lpags bshus nas rgyan pa'adzin// mdung rtse
gsumadang dgra sta dang/ kha TaM nang ta'u gri gug mchog/ brgyad pa la ni lcags kyuthogs// g.yas pa'i phyag rnams de bzhin no// thod pa dang ni kha TaM ga/ mgo bo zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog
byob sdigs mdzub dam pa ste// 'i sa u0f7a ye shes yang dag rdzogs// wang du phag mo'i gzugs yin te// dragacing dmar la dkarapa yin// byin pa ges kyis legs par 'khril// sku grol ba 'a
spyan gsum pa// thod pa'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// deye zhal dang phyag tu gnas// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// phyogs kyis gos can chags pas
gzugs// rked pa'i dkyil 'khor skya yang che// sngo zhing dkar la de bzhin dmar// serazhing lnga la du ba ste// du thal ba sprin gyi mdog/ de 'dra'i zhal dang gzugs su gnas// lu mo mnga'
ngang gnu 'dzin cing// tshangs pa'i pags pa rnamapar srangs// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// zla ba'i ma'i dbus su bzhugs// 'khor lo brgya pa'i dbus bzhugs par// phyi yi re':
'khor rnam par sgom// pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni nges par dgod/ a ni shar gyi 'dab ma la// gsal byed mkha' 'grom dang dgod// bani
byang gi bdabal ste// rtagadong mkha' 'gro ma yapadagod// phrani rdo rje drag mo su// mkha' 'gro nub khudagod par b// rule phyogs 'dab la dgod// gsar gyimadog canamakha' 'gro ma//
song dang stobasangs dkar dang dmar// zhal gsum rnamabaskyar drag po ste// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// ra yi snying du bzhugs pa ste// g.yas brkyang ba yis bdud bzhi 'joms/ thod
pa'i 'phreng ba drag po ste// pad+masbom po'i 'dab ma la// chags pa can gyi gzugs shing bzhes// thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde bayin// mda' dang gzhu yapa'achang bste// zhags pa lcags kyu

'dzin pa'i mchog/ thod pa dang ni baTaM bsnams// cang te'u ni sgra yang sgrog/ sor dang ljang khu sde ba dang// sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar ba dang// dkar dang ljang khu spro ba dang// dmar dang sngo dang
ljang ba ste// 'di ltar mdog ni khyad par gyis// dam tshig mchoganibasgom par bya// mtshams bzhir ni bum pa dag/ byang chub sems kyis gang bar gzhag/ shar gyi phyogs su pheyan to// ming
ha'i ka zhes bya/ byang gi phyogs su puyin te// mkha' 'gro mni dki/ nub kyi phyogs su ruyinate/ rutsakam li zhes bya// lho yi phyogs sukaM yin te// keng rus ma zhes grags pa'i sa
ma yi phyogs su hUMmadzod ma// bden bral phyogs su phaT mdzad ma// rlung gi phyogs su rngam ri// dbabaldan ke li ke la ste// de brgyad lha mo chen mo ste// dngos grub thams cad rab tusol//
ji ltar zhal dang gzugs bzhin du// de bzhin 'dir yapa'agyur ba yin// thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos can g.yas
brkyang bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan canate// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan// drag cing gtum 'a rab 'jigs pa'i// thams cad ro yi snyapa
bzhugs sgom// spyan gsum pa la chags pas myos// dab ldan zur la ut+pal sngon po zhes bya ba// rlung gi phyogs la dra ba'i mchog ces bya bste// bden bral phyogs la gsus pa 'chapas

zhes bya ba// ma yi phyogs la sha pa ri zhes bya ba ste// sor dang sngo bsangs sde ba dang// dmar ser dang nibazhi pa ste// thod pa dngani ba hU~M 'dzin// gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te// bzhi pa rdo rjemadung
yin no// phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol// bzangamo lto ba 'phyam ste// skye gnas ring la rgya yang// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur zhing drag/ skra grol ba'i rab tu 'jigs// thod pa'i
'phur ba'i dbu rgyan skyon// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spyad pa'o// shar sgorakhaM las gtum ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang lha'i sgor raM las rol gtum mo zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/
00 ku@#// nub kyi sger sa las 'bar ba'i mchog ces ba'i mkha' 'grom dgod do// byang gi sgor ha las 'brang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ sngo dang dkar ser nyid yin te/

lcags kyu dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// thod pa kha hUM ga bsnams te// gri gug mgo bo sngags mdzub dang// dkar dar sngo dang ljang ba dang// zhags pa dang na cang te'u 'dzin// thod pa kha oM ga 'dzin cing// sdigs

mdzung gri gug mgo bo'adzin// dgar dang spro dang ljang khu ste// lcags sgrog cang te 'u gri gug dang/ thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing// mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzug mchog ljang dang dkar bo 'dres pa dang// sor dang dmar
ba'i zhal mchog yin// dul bu cang te'u gri gug dang// kha TaM ga dang thod pa dang// mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub phyag/ sku grol ba la gdug pa che// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhalag/ zhal gdangs

ljags ni bskyod pa ste/ ga yas brkyang g.yon bsam tshul gyis bzhugs// thod la'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// ro dang bats+tsha'i nyi dbus bzhugs// mgo pe'i 'phreng bas

rnam lar brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing// mgo bo'i do shal rnams kyis brgyan// mi bskyod ba yi cod pan 'ching ba ]rnam bskyar sbyin nag po bste// yi ge'i shu gnyis las byung// snying mkhar

mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi// yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog/ o ga ba dra he he ru ru kaM hUM Tiki nI dzA la sha bo tshutshulaT sAhA/ yi ge re re dgod ba ste//mkha' 'gro ma yi

ma/ snying de bzhin/ hU~M lha dang lha mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba 'o// dbusu rnam dag bcom ldan 'das// sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs/ gzugs su lta ba stong/

pa ste// nang gzugs med par phyi rol gzugs su lta ba'ang stong pa yin// sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa lta kha'ang stong pa yin// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong ba ste// rnam shes

mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin// ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin/ 'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o/ 'du shes dang na tshor ba 'ang 'gog

bar lta ba stong pa yin// phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste// nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/

'dus byas stong pa 'di dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mkhrub las 'dus pa stong ba nyare dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong ba nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid dang/ chos

thams cad stong pa 'di dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du// bag mo yang
ni de bzhin te// gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das// he ru ka dpal rnam par shes// khag tsho nam mkha' lta bu 'o// lha mo bzhi yis rnam dag pa// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// don
a khyu// yang so so yang dag rig/ rta gdong mgang yin pa'o// chos rnams so so yang dag rig/ rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro la// nges tshig so so yang dag rig/ gser mdog can gyi mkhar

tha 'grom rdzasbyongs ba so so yang dag rag ga lhamo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus/ rton ba rnam pa bde po na// de la ka na don la rton pa ste// rutsa ki ni tshig 'bru rton pa yin// ru tsaka ma la ni la shes rton/ ker

rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin// shar dang byang dang nub dang// lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor la// chos kyi mgron bzhi bo dgod// hU~Mn 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o//
ma'i chos thams cad bdag med bko ki li ki lin chos thams cad zhi ba'o// che dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan 'khor lo de dag kun// lhamo yis ni rnam par dag/ mi 'jigs ba bzhi dngos po'i chos

lce chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni ut+pa la sngon po ma'o// chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni dran pa'i mchog go/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni gsum pa
myang ma'o// zag pa zad pa shes ba la 'jigs pa med pa nas bar ma'o/ mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni// 'ad yas zur bzhi rnam par dgaM/ sgo bzhi dag tu lha mon// gtum byed ma ste dad pa'i

dbang pego rol gtum mnabartson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ 'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu ni bcom ldan 'das

dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje/ sum cu rtsa gas mtshan rnams ni// 'phags pa shes ra ba bcom ldan ma// rdo rje phag mo 'di yin no// mngon bar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ yig gi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying
bo bsgomA pas bskyod pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga/ dkyil 'khor dgun rnam dag pa// 'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te// rnam par snang mdzad theg
tu grags// b+ha gas khyab pa'i rim pa go/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes// dus ni sna tshogs 'gas su shes// mchod pa sna tshogs tsheg bzhin// pul+li ra ma pad+ma'o// dzA lan ra thugs 'khor lo/

oMcan gsung gi 'khor lo ste// ar khu da ni sku'i 'khor go/ go dA ba'i zur bzhi 'o// rA me shwa ra ma phyogs so// de ba koT bden bral yin// mU la ba ni rlung ga zur// dbang ldan kAa mye pa ste// gruban

rnam par dag pa ni/ 'di la the tshom med pa yon// o dri dag ni shar gyi sgo'o// drisha ku zhe lho phyogs sgo// kos la ninub kyi sgo'o// ka lang kani byang sgo ste// shar gyi rta babs l^apA kaM/ kAny+tsi lha rta

babs yin/[·]hi ma la ya nub phyogs so// bre ta pu ra kyang yin te// gri ha do ba lha snam bu// sarakhAnA rin chen sa// su bar+ya dI pa dra ba phyed// na ga ranirnga yab dang// dril bu rgyal mtshan ba dan no// sin d+hu

rdo rje thig zlum pa// ma ru ta ni sge khyud de// ku lu tan rdo rje dang// rin pe tsho dang dkyil 'khor gyi// thig ni bla na med pa yin/'o/ zur bzhi pa la sgo ban pa// rta babs bzhis na rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyed/
kyis brgyan cing// dar dang 'phreng bas rnams khar brgyan// zur gyi cha ni khrims cad dang// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing// sku yi 'khor lo'i
zas 'di na/don yodagrub pa rnam par spyod// gsung gi 'khor lo 'od dpag med// khams kyi 'khor la tsha bskyed pa// pad+ma'i dbus ni rin chen 'dzin// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can na/rnam par snang/
ste/ mdzad rnam par sgom// tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste// 'dus shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin// thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de// rnam shes par ga don mi za// ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa// de yis rnam
dag rang bzhin can// sa dang ri mo thams cad kun// dpa' bos yongs su dag par sgom// ri mi ta shu rtsa bzhi pa// de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag/ 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dge/ lte bar phag mo'i
waM sa bon klu he ru ka dpal mchog yin no// 'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dog/ dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag gi/ sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor snying bo mdor bsdus na// dkyil/

cha 'ar drang po yig ste// dkyil 'khor gnyis la phyag mtshan yin// gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad// bzhi pa gzugs su gyur ba ste// lnga ba me tog mchod pa yin/ drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid//

dbus ni'i ba tu dga' ba'i sa// bad+ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa// thugs kyi 'khor lo rim med// gsung gi 'khor lo 'di khyed ba// sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba// zur bzhi ba ni sbyong dka' ba// ring du song ba sgo bzhi

pham/ bzhi/ zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i thog// chos kyi sprin ni lha babs yin// 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas// rtag tu sgom zhing mchod par bya// dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// sdom
pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi// dkyil 'khor mchog gi de 'den/ he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog/ b+haga'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor na// phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa// de na dkyil 'khor 'dus pa skye
dkyil 'khor ba de chen mchog yin na/ dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin// bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin// lha yi de nyid de bzhin te// sngags kyi de nyid/
khyag rgya yin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog/ yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing// rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs// phyi mo'i thog la las 'das shing// de na de la 'khor
mchog yin no// chos rnams thams cad brtag tu med// chos dang chos min rnam par spyod// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa na// rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa// chags dang chags med tshag
bar mnyam// pad+ma ra ga chu mnyam byung// rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog// de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// yid ni khams rnams thams cad de// gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med/
bskul zhing sad pa 'di yin te// sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te//
rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba/ sa 'og sa steng sa blar khyang// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgom ba bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//
de nas gsong pa bshad bya ba// sems can kun la phan stsol ba// A li kA le las byung ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog/ dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa// dar dang 'phreng bas rnam
lca/ par brgyan(de yas dbus su rdo rje che/ zhal ban pa la rnam par 'gyur// de la lte ba'i dbus su ni// snatshogs 'khor le lte bar bcas// thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa// lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa// lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste// nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// hU~M las he ru ka byas te// zhal bzhi la phyag brgyad pa// spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yaM na ku tsho'ang 'tsher// stag
gi pags pa gos su mnabs// phyag rgya drug gis skul brgyan// gdug pa kun gyi klad pa la// g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis mnan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dug/ brgyal zhing rnam par
myos pa gi/ kladog lan zhabs kyis mnan// gcer bu 'o dod 'bod pa mnan// rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste// lcags kyi phyag gis 'dzin pa dang// gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te// thod
ma ba la blo ga lang 'dzin// gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// zla ba phyed pa da bu la'ang// thod pa 'brang ba'i dbu rgyan can// mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug brgyan
tshangs pa'i do shala'adzin ba ste// bdag gi khro bo bdun smros nas// ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du// phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te// sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs gozi byin mdud

kyis mdzes pa ste// gri gug thod pa kha TaM ga dril bunang te'u mdung dang na// lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no// lha mo phyag na brgyad pa ste// dkar nang rdo la ltang ba 'o// stong gi zhal ni dmar bo/
mdzes/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhalagadongani// sar zhing ljang ba'i gzugs can te// gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du// phag mo yang na de bzhin gyur// gcer bu skra ni grol bra ste// ma nyams dum bu'i
ska rags can// pad+ma pan la mkha' 'gro ma// thur la bum ba rgod pa ste// thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshe de bzhin// gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis// shar
dang byang nub lho ru go/ sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te// rwa gdong la sogs thams cad do// zur la gshin rje srog la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par gi/ rdo rje snying pos rashad pa ste// kha cige/
rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod// bla ma'i gnas kyiN+Disa'am la// sngar ga shad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bsgom par bya// gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni// mkha' 'gro ma
yi mdog bzhin dang/ phyog mtshan phyagargyur sngar bshad bzhin// gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod/ sngar bshad pa yi chog bzhin/ gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod
sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// sgrom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// A li kA li nang byung ba// bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par// sems can khams ni
rab tu 'o jug// rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste// sul yang ni bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las// chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pago
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga/ b+ha ga pad+ma glom pa ni// rdo rje sAng pos zhus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba// A li kA
li zur gsum gnas// pad+ma 'dab gsum rnam par sgom// rdo rje phag mo he ru ka/ lci ba la ni rnam par sgom// roN+Dimakha' 'gro lam dang// gsum ba dum skyes ma nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ni dmar
la sdo// bag tsho yang ni dga' sngo ste// mkha' 'gro sde la ser ba dang// lA ma lcang la ser ba ste// dum skyes ma 'demar la ser/ zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ba// bcom ldan dgon po zhal bzhi pa//

zhabs bzhi ba la phyag bzhi ba// thod pa dang ni' tAM 'dzani// dril bu rdo rjes le gas par mtshon// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste// zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang// mi 'khrug
rtag bar gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing// byed pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te// byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing// gcer bu dbu skra grol
la/ rna spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis// zhabs kyisarnam par gnon pa ste// g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs// sku lus phyag rgya drug
'dzin cing 'o brgya ba rnam bgatsigs pa dang// thugs rje chags pas rnam bar mos// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon ljang khu// steng ni sngo skya sku lus da kar// gzugs can ma ni b+ha gar brtag//
A li kA li b+ha ga'i mchog gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag tu// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rnam par sgom/ khrug kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su// sna tshogs par dpag tu rtag/ dbus su de ru ka phag mo//
'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs dgod// zur du thod pa dkarabo dag/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod// shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lag/ rlung gi zur gyi 'khor la// khA gdong la sogs rnam
brgyad do// gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral zur// 'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la// shar sku yi mkha' 'gro ste// rlung phyogs ga shin rjeb mkha' 'gro gi/ bden bralagasung gi mkha' 'gro ste
dbus su rdo rje he ru ka/ sngo zhing dkar bo dud kha dang// sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi bo yig/ rang gi phyag mtshanamanyam par ldan// gzhan du rang bdag mdog bzhin du// dpa' bo 'khor lo mdog dbazhin//
thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma// dam pa'i mdog can rnam par bsam// dor ba phob ze dog na nag po lag/ ga'us med 'khyud pa 'i sbyor ba 'o// sku la 'khor lo'i dpa'
bo dag// sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam// mkha' 'gro ma ser bo mdog/ dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor// kha gdong gshin rje brtan la sogs// gzugs gnyis phyed na bud med nyid//
rang gi thabs dang lhan nug tu// dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar/ mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang khu 'o// sngar bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams // de
mang rags kyi dbye bas so// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// mgo bo'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing// phyag rgya drug gis bdag po dgod// thamA
cadu rang rage cod nga/na can// ji lta ba yi rim pas sgom// mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis// ji lta'i rjes su rnam bsgoms nas// go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya// sku gsung thugs
kyi'am bra dag/ sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo'i yan lagrwa rim pa sgom// gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor la// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag nas su//
sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu sgom// 'di ni su la 'ang mi bstan te// de nyid su la'ang brjod ma bya// dbang bo gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag/ rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur// dmatshig rtag
tha tu bsrung bya zhig/ bza' dang bca' babang spyad par bya// 'gro zhing 'gro zhing dus kun tu// 'tshar nub dag tu rnam par sbyang// gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa// sngags pas myur du 'grub par
'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// gsang ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'u sta lnga bcu rtsa lnga ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i
yashis mchogagyur pa// ragi sngagaso gsang sngags rgya che ba// bsgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin/ logo pa'i shes pa'i shes pa kun// gang la'ang khyod kyis 'god mi bya// bla ma'i ram las ji
ltar bstan// gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba// skye ba phye ba stong phragatu// sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing// dad nga yang dag bskyod pa dang// rnal 'byar spyod tshul gnas pa yin// skyugs
shang glen la sdig ngan can/ @#/ byas pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongs su ma smin dang// phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa// de dag kun gyis mngeshos te// mi shes mun
bas khebs pa dang// khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'// nga rgyal la sogs gdug sums ldan// de kun kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi// spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so// he ru ka dpal yang dgo 'dzug
u// ni de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes// mthong ba dang na rig pa dang// thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur pa// de ltar de na the tshom med// lha rnamA
zabazlog ste bkod pa dang// sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang// dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang// so so bsgom pa'ang ma bya ste// bzlog pa'i yi ga btus nas ni// sgom pa gsang ba bzlog
pa ste// snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang// rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni// sems ni yongs su smin pa dag/ 'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi//
dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin// bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin// dug pa'i lus na skyon med pa// bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang// nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur//
des na srung med bza' ba med// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag po med// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin srog med// mdor na sams bsdus tshul can yin// bzung byas rnam shes yashes na//
bla mas bstan las brtson las te// phyi rol gyi na bstan bcos la// lam de shin tu range ba nyid// rnal 'byor ba rnams thabs kyis ni// bla ma'i bstan bkur la brtson pa// ston pa'i mtshan nyid
bstan pa dang// dpa' bo'i de nyid bstan pa yin/[” ]/skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cig rnam par phyag rgyar ldan// kun nas thams cad skad cig ste// skad cig gas ni gsang
ba sngags brjod// pus mo sa la btsugs nas su// bdag nyid kyisan gsol ba gdab// bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni// go 'apad rgya che gnyes med pa// 'di na 'byung po kun la gnas/
rgyab dang ni gi rgyu rol// rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni// ca rogis bshad kyis legs par nyon// brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar bgyi// thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par// gang
zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid// dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad// de ni sgo dgu dgacu 'gyur// de la lte ba'i 'khorale tshe// thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad// rdo rje can ni der zhugs
pa rngacha med tshan rnam spangs pa// lus can rnams kyi nang na rol// lus las 'das shing gos pa med// la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs// lar sna dang ngag dag dang// la lar rna bar sgra
dag dang// la lar dri chen rdo rjechu// lalar tshor bar bcas pa'i sams// la lar skom dang la lar bkres// la lar khro dngal lar na// la larab de la rnam par gzigs// la lar bud med
'dod chags te// la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste// la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad// la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas// la lar rol cange spyod par 'gyur// la lar srog tu rnam par gnas/
la lar sa dang chu dang me// la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga// lalar rigs kyi bye brag gis// bram ze dang na gdol pa dag/ la lar ma dang sring mo ru// la lar tshong ma bu mo ru// la lar tshangs dang
dbang ldan dang// khyab 'jug dang na nyi ma nyid// la lar zla ba skar ma bcas// la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur// la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun// byed pa po dang mi
bod rgyal// la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum// mo gsal stod pa'i rdo rje can// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar la [“]rol bdud las rgyal// la lar byas pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ la
la rgas shing 'khogs pa'o/ la lar nad chen gyis zin pa// la lar rgya dang brgya ba// la lar spro dang le brgan dang// la lar dkar dang ser ba'o// la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad//
la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ la lar spyan dang mA ma kA/ la lar dkar bzlog zhi ba mo// la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang// nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro 'de// la lar klu dang sbrul chen po
la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang// la lar mi lom mthong ba dang// la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas// la lar rlung dang mkhris ba drang// la lar khrag dang pags par 'gyur la lar myangon du ba dang/

la lar sreg pa'i ma dag yin/ la lar mtho ras skya ba ste// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu // thams cad bdage nyid bzhugs 'ang la// lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i [u0f38]/de yi skya ma'i sna tshogs 'di'i
rtag pa min pa rdo rje can// gzugs med par ni b+ha ga'i nang// lte ba'i nang na pad+ma che// bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par// yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas// khasgyur bya ba byas pa yani// de
dbus rtag tu gsang ba che// 'byin dang sdud par byed pa ko/ de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha// de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhig/ mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin/ gsang
ba'i mchog gi dgyes ba na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am// mi 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa/ skran nyag ma brgya yi cha// mchog gi gzugs
can bsam pas// stong pa ma yin dmigs su med// yi ge med rung stong pa'ang med// gos pa med runge sa bon med// gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste// rnam shes rang ga dengos po ni//
rnam shes yo shes dag tu bzung// thams cad gsal byed sgron ma ni// dang bo'i mtshan ma dag tu blta// gsal byed glog gi cha tsam ste/ mtshan mganyis pa dag tu brtag/ dkar po'i 'od kyi
tshul can ni/ phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas te// nyon mongos 'byin pa gsung ba yi// rnal 'byor ba gsarnam par brtag/ 'dod pa'i lha yi longs spyod na// bzhi ba rnam shes dag tu bstan//
gzugs dang reg segs lhatsho ni// phyogs kyi yashes lnga po yin// drug pa gzugs med ye shes te// bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyungs// brgyud par rang nyid 'dod bzhin du// sangs rgyas
'bras bu bdag yin no// sbas pa lta dang lag pa dang// 'khyud dang gnyis gnyase la sogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs// dgu pa bla ma bla ma// thams cad 'di'i
ba// ni bstan pa yin// rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid ma 'gyur dam pa yin// de nyidi thams cad khyab byed de// lus kun la ni/
za rnam par gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes to// he ru ka dpal yin par bshad// skyes pa ma nange la sogs nyid// phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin// yashes dag tu 'byung de la// gang
sbya zhig sa la gnas rnams dang// bstan bcos dgan ma lus dang// rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams // 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu// de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rig byed grub pa'i
mtha' rnams la// 'di ni snying po rab tu bshad// 'dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug pa rdzogs pa nyade dag dang// byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang// ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin
