de nas cho ga ming gzhan pa// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// de nyid du ni kun skyes pa// 'byin dang sdud pa byed pa yin// a A/ i I/ u u/ ri rI/ li lI/ a a/ o o/

skaoM a/ ka kha ga grung/ tsa tsha dzadz+ha nya/ Ta Tha D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Shisaha k+Sha/ oM hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin// mchog nyid lhag par gnas

ba yin// lha kun gyi ni bskyod pa dang// bsgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas// don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te// brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi theg pas// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas na// des ni 'di ni des rgyal
sa te thums cad shes rab thabs kyis 'gro// thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya// dge dang mi dge gang yin pa// de ni lha tshogs rgyan yin te// sku rags gnas rnams thams cad yin// rtag
tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa// chos rnams thams cud rtogs pa yin// A li kA li mdun bsams nas// rnal 'byor chen bo ngal sos te// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de// sems kyang brtag
bar mi bya'o soms de nyid kyang ma bsam ste// des na 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba// khyod la yang ni bshad pa yin// 'di na 'bad pas sba bya ste//
gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom// rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang// dpa' po'i yonolag thams cad kyi// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu 'thob// srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba
yin48 bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs lan/ bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad// gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing// sdug bsngal gyis ni soms kyang khor// sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor
par mya ngan 'das pa ma mthong ngo/ gang ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang// kun skyabastan pa'i gtam yang brjod par byed// lam yang ma bshad 'chang bar 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor
lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad// he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag sku kun brtan g.yo bdag nyid can/ gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing ni 'od byed shes
par bya// nye ba'i zhing na 'od 'phro ba// bdun pa mngon du 'gyur pa nyid// lte ba'i bdun pa sbyang dka' ba// 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye ba'i 'dus pa mi g.yo ba//
zadur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// shAhe ru ka'i gzhung spyod pa// 'di na nang gi bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad/
mtho si sa stengs sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag/ thogs med dus su gang bstan pa// phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa
kun gyi dbang phyug gtso// kun tu phyag dung zhabs ldan zhing// kun tu mag dang mgo bo'i zhal// kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na// thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs/ de nas dngos grub
bsgrub bya ba// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyito// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// man ngagashin tu rnyed dka' ste//
datso bo'i brda yi skad du ni// nga yas rgyud du smras pa yin// gos na phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra// A li kA li zhes brjod pa// rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin
'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid// bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba// go cha chen pos yang dag srung// sngags rnams
'a kun gyis mchod pa yin// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhin// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag 'dag/ de bzhin gshags pa'i
sa thob cing// skyo dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po tshes ldan 'gyur// de ltar cho ga ldan byas n// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// zla ba nya la sa stong du// 'di ltar
rnal 'byor bas bsgoms na// de yis bsod nams gyur pa yin// lha klu la la sogs pa kun// de yi bsod nams gang gyur des// bdag gzhan la'ang dag ye shes ldan// bsam gtan
soms ba tsam gyis sam// klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am// yang na 'khor lo sbyar ba thob// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// dpal ldan
khrag 'thung sogs da 'gro/ lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan ba ldan sna tshogs dang// rol mo'i sgra ni snotshogs dang// sna tshogs glu yi mchod pas mchod// 'chi ba
zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa// sa stangs su na rnyed par dka'// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang
ba'i yig bskyed cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btu ba/ )gcigau tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su//
mkhas pas san bsnyams nas su// bshad pa yis ni byug par bya// mahA rak+ta byugs nas kyang// bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// rigs ngan shan pa mo blangs nas// mo
zatog la sogs gdab par bya// dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dbul// zhag lo segs pa'i mar me sbar// cang te'u drul bu brdung bar bya// glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// lha yi rol mo'i
sgo bye brag dang// phyogs kyi gros can sgragrol la// lus ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan// A li kA li mnyam byas te// sdomtshanolan thom par bya// bzhi bzhi ru ni shas byas la// thub pa'i
mtshog gis rgyas par bya// der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya// don 'dod thams cad srung byed pa// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang// lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang// lnga pa yi na bzhi pa dang// dad
po'i gsum pa gang yin dang// de bzhin te shu rtsa dgu pa// bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang// mthar gnas pa la bzhi pa dang// de nyid kyi na gnyis pa dang// sum cu pa ni yang dag blang// nyi
tshazla shu drug pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum dang// dang po'i dang po nyidi dug dang// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang// lnga pa yi ni dang po dang//
dang pa yi nigasum pa nyid// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang// lnga pa yi yang ngan pa dang// mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang/
[/]gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang// lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang// dang po yin dang po dang// de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang// de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// gsum pa'i dang po gang yin
dang de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug ba// bzhi pa'i gsum po gang yin dang// u yi ni gnyis pa nyid// dang po'i dang bo gang yin dang/ de bzhin teshu rtsa bdun// ti shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo// dang
yi ni gsum pa dang// lnga ba la lang bzhi ba dang// de bzhin sum du rtsa gcig blang// bco lnga pa ni de dag dang/ de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga ba// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang/ de bzhin nyi
shu rtsa drug pa// yi gsumacu rtsa gnyis pa// uts+tsha yinatsamanyid// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang// lnga ba yini bzhi pa dang// gnyis pa yi nib pa dang// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang//
u ya ni gsum pa dang// gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// anuts+tshayi dang po dang// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// an+tas yi gnyiso ba dang// de bzhin yang no sumacu nga// lnga pa
yi ni dang po dang/ gaun yin dang po dang// de bzhin yi ge de nyid dag/ bzhi pa'i dang bo gang yin dang// u 'i dang po gang yin dang// de bzhin nyishu rtsa brgyad pa// dang po'i gnyis pa
gang yin dang// gsum pa'i dang po nyidi dag dang// dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang// bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang// anasmra la gnyis pa dang// gsum pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang/
ga le ga byan de nas blang// dang po yin bzhi pa dang// mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dag/ de nas brgyad pa nyid dag dang// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang// lnga pa yi
yang lnga ba dang// nyi shu rtsa gsum pa yang blang// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun dang// bzhi pa ya ni bzhi pa dang// slar yang tI rtsa bdun pa// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// tishu rtsalnga
yang dag blang/ sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang// bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang// lnga pa yin lnga pa dang// mgrar gnas pa yiganyis pa dang// bzhi pa yini lnga pa dang// bzhi pa yi ni bzhi
ba dang// dang po'i dang po 'di dag dang// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ an+tasgyu yi bzhi pa dang// de bzhin nyi'u rtsa gcig pa// u yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa//
thug ma yin dang po dang// mthar gnas pa yi gnyis ba nyid// gnyis pa yi ni dang pa dang// drug pa yin gnyis pa nyid// thog ma ya ni dang po dang// mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang// gnyis pa

pa ni dang po dang// bdun pa yin gnyis pa dang// drug pa yi nagasum pa dang// bzhi pa yi ni lnga ba dang// bzhi pa yis na sbyar bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang// lta ba yi ni lnga pal// bzhi pa yi ni
gnas su@#// lnga pa yi ni thog ma la// stong du sbyar zhing ma dang bcas// uklu yi gsum pa dang// mthar gnas pa yi thog ma dang// bzhi pa ya ni thog ma la// gzi brjid can gyis gdan du byas// bdun

sa pa yi ni gsum pa dang// drug ba yi 'ang dang bo ste// ka dang ba yi yi ge na// thog ma dag ni byang nas su// lnga pa yi na bzhi pa dang/ mthar gnas pa yi dang po ste/ de bzhin yang ni bsdus te blang// drug
pa yi ni bzhi pa dang// bdun pa yin dang po dang// urayi na bzhi pa blang// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dge/ rdoN+Disams dpas phye ba yin// ut+tan yi bzhi ba nyid// nyi ma yangon gdan du byas//
bdun bu yi ni bzhi pa la// mi yis 'og tu sbyar bar bya// gshegs su gsol dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa yin gatras ba dang// de bzhin te shu gnyis pa nyid// drug pa yi ni gnyis de bzhin//
bcu gcig pa dang nyi shuganyis// gsum pa'i dang po blangs nas// bzhi ba yi ni gsum pa dang// ub+hayi ni bzhi pa nyid// lcapa yi ni gsum pa dang'// bdun pa'i bzhi pa blang bar bya// nyi shu
tsa gcig de bla ngas nas// gnyis pa yin dang po dang// lnga pa la yang thog ma dang// gnyis pa yi ni yig drug/ lta ba yinA bzhi pa la// klu yi yagid bzhin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de blangs nas/
slar yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin// lnga pa yin gsum pa dung// ub+han ya gsum pa dang// mthar gnasal li gnyis pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang// tims slar yang gdab btsa// mi
ge nyi shu btab nas ni// bcu drug pa las stan du byas// 'og tu ma yi gtsobarjid can// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang// mthar gnas pa ya gsum kha dang// lnga pa yin gsum pa dang// drug pa yi ni
gsum pa dang// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi ba dang// nyeshurtsa lnga pa yis dbye// bzhi pa yinalnga ba dang// gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang// te ma'i bu yis rnam par dbye//
uts+tshan pa bzhi pa dang// dang po ya na gsum pa la// gAwe brjid kyis ni gdun du byas// bdun pa yin bzhi ba dang// khaco lnga ba yis gdan gnyis bya// u na yis gsum pa nyid// lta
lho pa yo na khrig ma la// bcu drug pa yis gdan du byas// nyi shu rtsa gcig de yis blangs// bzhi pa yin thog ma dang// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang// bzhi
pa yi ni dang po dang// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang// gsum pa yin gsum pa dang// dang po yi ni gsum pa dang// u na ya gsum pa nyid// nyishu rtsa gcig de bzhin te// nyim yi ni mnyam par
mnan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang// bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang// gsum pa yin gsum pa la// gzi brjid kyis ni gsal bar byas// mthar gnas pa la thog mar shes// der yang bcu drug ba yis
gdab// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// dang po yin gnyis pa dang// thog ma yi pang dang bo dang// bzhi pa la yang gsum pa dang// zlog la yi yang dang bo dang/ ma'i
pa yi yang dang po dang// de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o// khanu ba'i uT+Tha bzhi pa dang// nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas// ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang// nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid can// gsum
ba yi yang gsum pa dang// balnga pa yis gdan du byas// gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang// gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang// ku sha'i yi ga sa bon te// nyi shu lnga pa gdan du byas// slar
yang bsdu bar bya bsku// skun legs par btu ba ste// dbang chen gyis ni gdan du byas// ud+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang/ grwa tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang/ de bzhin
sum cu gsum pa nyid// sum cu rtsa gsum de bzhin te// lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun bsdu ba'o// de nas kyang ni bdu bya ba// gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te// gnyis pa yin dang bo dang// mthar
gnas pa la gsum pa dang// uN+Nan yi gsum pa dang de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// bdun pa yin bzhi pa dang// drug pa yi ni gsum ba dang/ lnga pa yi yang bzhi ba dang/ drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang//

gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste// ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ klo b+ha ya klo b+ha ya/ sro gaM/ rgyahu: pho phi/ phatra phaT/ dahA da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha bas

ru d+hirAn+tu mA lA ba laM bi ni/ grits+tsa grits+tsha/ sats+tsha pA tA la ga ta/ hUM dzag saMwaMtA/ daN+DA ya ta ya/ Akazla a kuts+tshA/ hri dr-i/ blo ts+tsaM/ h+phaN+NaM hAhU~M/ hIhUM/ hUMt+taM/ ki li ki'i/ si li si li/
hi li hili/ d+hi li d+hi li hUM hUM la/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags te// bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// 'di las shin tu mchog tshurag/ 'jig rten gsum na yod min te// dpal ldan
khrag 'thung sngags shes na// gzhan dag snying po med rtswa ra mtshungs// rtsa ba'i sngags su bshad pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rtsa ba'i sngagA
kyi la gi btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis// snying po'i yig bdun te snying po// la tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang//
na/ de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis// yi ge par ma dor byas pa/ yan lag drugan ha ru ka/ dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba// re'u myig drug tu bsgrom ba skye// haru ka yi bdag por 'gyur// yi ge gcig

tu yang dag gnas// oM na ma sAnA bo ShaT huM hU~M pharnga dang yang dag ldan// sgrub bos snying por shas por bya// dang po snying kha nyid du ste// gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya// gsum pa spyi gtsug dgatu
sbyar bzhi pa go char gyur ba yin// lnga pa mog tu gyur ba ste// drug bya mtshonocha zhes byar 'dod// denAsadabyangs [”]yig bcu gsum nyid// yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ dbyangs yig bcu
gcig yang dag sbyar/ yi ge drug bas brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge bdun pa nyid kyang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni// mkhas pas yi ge brgyad bar sbyar/
dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba'i// yi ge dgu bas brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid// yi go bcu gnyis po dang sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni// yi ga to shu/
la zhenu ba dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum bad na// yi ge bco brgyud pa'i sbyayA/sde tshan dang po blangs nasan+ti// gzhi ni/
gcig pa gzung// mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa// yi ga leshu ba dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa 'di dag// yig bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bco lngar yang dag ldan// yi ge bcu drug
bamadzes bya// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i// yi ge bcu bdun ba ru 'dod// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni// yi ge bco brgyad bzo sbyar// dbyangs yig gi naganyis pa ni// yi ge rishu
gcig par sbyar// phyi mo' lnga pa dang yang sbyar// yig nye shu gsum par sbya// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid na// yi ge nya shubazhi bor sbyar// sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge nyi shu
lnga par sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa'i// yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyug/ yi ge nyi shu brgyad dag ni/ yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar// gsumapa 'dang bor yang dag ldan// 'og gi tshani
ma dang bcas// de bzhin dbyas lag gnyis par sbyar// yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// yi ga gsum bcu rtsa gcig par// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// yi ge sum cu gnyis pa yang//
dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan par bya// yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa// nyi mar lang dag ldan bar bya// phyi mo'i ba zhi ba nyid dgagi/ yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan bgyi/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub khyed
cad sgrub pagi 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid na// me dang 'og tu bsgrub par bya// bzhi bcu gsum ba nyade dag na// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid
dang sbyar// yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa na// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar// dbyangs yig lnga ba nyid dag kyang// bzhi bcu rtsa drug par ldan pa// dpa' bo thams cad rab mchodatsang/ bzhi bcu
rtsa bdun pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis ba dang sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig ga dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis// mdzes pa mchog yin/
par 'dodo/ lnga bcu rtsa gnyis panyaden// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thamasu 'grub byed pa// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'ang//
dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// yi ge rnams las 'dri mchog ste// dgra rnams nges par gsod byed yin// sde tshan bzhi las de nyid do// yi go lnga bcu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yig
jug pa dag dang sbyar// an+tasgra yi bzhi pa dang// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur
'gyur// yigi drug cu rtsa gcig nyid// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// 'di nyid mchog ni yin par bshad/ de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa/u0f38/ dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyor ba ni/
mkha' 'gro ma mchog tu 'dod// yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig dug dang ldan// mdzes pa'i yi ga kun mchog yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpas
phye ba dag/ dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan// grub sbyin thar pa chen po'o// yi ge drug cu rtsa lnga pa// ma la gnas par yang dag ldan// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba// dngos
grub kun sbyin bde gshegs gsungs// yig drug cu rtsa drug kho// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba// bya ba kun las grub sbyin par// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// yi ge
drug cu rtsa bdun pa// ya ge gnyis ba lang dag ldan// rnal 'byor ma yi dgos pa kun// 'di nyid khyod bar the tshom med// drug cu brgyad pa nyid dag las// der ni yi ge ba sbyar pa// 'og gi cha ni
brtag par bya// yi ge bdun bdun gcig la// yi ga gnyis bar yang dag sbya// yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni// 'dinyid yin par the tsom mad// sum cu rtsa bzhi ba nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis
bar sbyar ba dag/ gdod nas grub pa yin par na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs// yi ge bdun cu lnga pa nyid/ ma mo'i drug pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog yin te//
dgo ba kun las dam pa yin// bdun cu rtsa drug ba nyidan// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing// 'og tu mo dang ldan ba las// gzhan dag mdzes pa yod ma yin// yi ga bdun curtsa bdun pa
der ni de dang sbyar bar bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes bar 'dod// bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// rgya yi mchog ni yin par 'dod/
za yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa// bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyad par dbye// gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te// dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o// yi go brgyad cu rtsa gonyis pa// de bzhin dpyad
yig gnyis por sbyar// phyi mo yin lcapa la// de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad// ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang// brgyudacu dgu pa de bzhin te// ma mo lnga pa blangs byas te// de bzhin yig dgu
bcu pa// ma mo'i lnga pa blangs byas te// yi go dgu bcu gcig par sbyor// ma mo ya ni gnyis pa dang// yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yige gnyas pa ldan pa yi// yi ge dgu bcun
k+Sha dgu pa// 'dug pa thams cad skrag byed pa// ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa// yi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan// ma mo bcu gsum ba nyidin// yi ge lnga pa dag
dang sbyar/ dgadug pa thums cade 'khrug byed de// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa yis ni// yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyar// bco lnga pa yis rab tu sbyar//
dbyangs yig bcubazhi ba nyid ni// yi ge dgu pa dag dang sbyar// stong du thig le yang dag gnas// yi ge dag ni sgrub pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par yin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa
ga nyid ni// yi ge bcu gnyis pa rang sbyar// stong du ban dus rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa/ dayi ge bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// 'byung
bo kun n skrag byed cing// sgrub pa pos na dega' ba yin// dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa las// yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyidi dag// yi ge sum cu gsum dang sbyar//

mtsho gnyis pa nyidi dag dang// yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhir sbyar// dbyangs kyi gnyis ba dag dang ni// yi ge sum cu drug dang sbyor// dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag/ yi ge sum cu bdun dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi
yi ge gsum pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba// ma mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni// yi ge bzhi bcu gcig dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyor// dbyangs kyi
gsum pa dag dang na yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar// ma mo'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang// yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge bzhi bcu dgu dang sbyar//

dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dge/ phyi mo'i lta pa nyid dang ni// yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa// thig les kyang na rnam par brgyan// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa// thog las
kyang ni rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa// thig les mgo la mnan par bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge drug cu drug cu sbyar// phyi mo
'ganyis pa nyid kyang/ yi ge drug cu bdun dang sbya// 'dug pa'i dngos grub kun 'grub cing// sgrub pa bo la dpal yang stsol// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang// yi ge
zabadun cu ba dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ phyi mo yin bzhi pa yis// yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar// bco lnga pa nIrab blangs te// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni// yi ge bdun

rtswa bcu bzhi par sbyar// phyi mo bcu bzhi dag pa na// yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbya// dbyangs kyi ye ge gnyis ba na// yi ge bdun bcu bzhi dang sbyar// phyi mo'i yig gnyis pa/

'ang yi ge bdun cu bdun dang sbyar// thig les kyang nirnam par brgyan// phyi mo yo ni gnyis pa nga// yi ge bdun cu brgyad dang sbyar// thig les gnyis kyi rnam par brgyan/ phyi mo yi ni gnyis ba yang//
yi ge bdunacu dgu dang sbyar/ ma mo'i ba ni panyid dang ni// yi ge brgyad cu ba dang sbyar// thig lesamago mnan par bya// dbyangs yig bzhi pa dug can// yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar// thuge le sgra
yis bskyod pa ste// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag/ yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar// 'og dang stong gi yi ge grangs// dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste// 'di
ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su// mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya// dngos grub kyin gnas yin zhing// mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'dzoms pa na// dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha gsargyal//

bklags pas grub la don yodapa// o na dang por sbyar bar bya// hU~M hU~M phaT ni mthar sbyar ba// 'ad na rtsa ba'igrasang sngags te// grub pa thams cad grub byed yin// de nas rang nyid bdag nyid kyi/dpa'

bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro man dru ba yin// 'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod// oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA kinI dz+wa la shaM ba raM swahA/ hAsA raM ba saM la dzA nI ki tra Tapha

hUM hUM kaMru ru he he dzrab gso/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po na// ma 'byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// N+Dal hU~M hU~M ha hahi o/ yi go paM dang yo dang ni// yi ge mo dang hri tade dang// hUM dang phaT ces bshad
pa yin// o Ta badzrapA rA hi/ hra go la min/dri mahonA/ kr-ihis lanA/ hUM hUM saM tras ni/ pha rnga phaTi tsan+d+rike/ rnal 'byor ma'i drug tu bsgrags/ re'u mig drug la rnam par sgom//
mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go cha'i snying po bsgom b.li'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// ka/ de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// snying po bla med bshad par bya///
oM badzra'i ro tsanI ye hUM hUM phaT sAnA/ lhamo'i snying po'i sbyor ba ni// bcu gsum pa ni dag nyid dag/ pad+mo dbus su phag mo ste// 'dab ma la na lha mo dgod// sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su// lha mo'i

snying po rnam par sgom// o las byung ba'i rta gdong dang// rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra// drag po yang nig lo ma dang// mi 'phrom dang dri med ma/ hU~M mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo// srog lugs ma dang/
ga phaza byedam// rang byung ma dang bcu gnyis te/ gtamadzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yan// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa// rdo dang ser dang dmar/
zab dang// ljang khu stong zhal dkar po ste/ skyon gsum pa la bzhin ma bsgyur// mchob rnam par gtsigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod 'phreng can// gsus pa sbom zhing sku grol ba//
phyogs kyi gos can 'dzin pa ste// rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas/[“]'jigs byedatsa muN+Di'ajigs mos// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs// thod pa dang na kha hUM ga/ mdung dang gri
gugacang te'u dang// rdo rje dril bu zhags ba dang// lcags kyu tshangs ba'i ma go bo dang/ dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub dang// na ra'i bags pa steng du brkyang// ska rags dang ni da dung brgyan
dang ra phyag rgya lnga yis rnamapar brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thugasarje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste// 'dab la lha mo thams cad dgod// ma mo dag na brgyad pa ste// sor dang dmar

dang ljang ba dang// lho na sngo ba'i mdog can te/ mo phyogs dmaral dud khaste// sngo ba dang nadikar ba dang// dbang ldan dun dgod pa sta// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag
ldan daskyil krung byed pas legs pas bzhugs// thod pa la'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnam bsgyur// thams cad yi dgos gdan la bzhugs// thugs rje'i chags pas
00 rnam par myos// rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing// thod pa bkyus bkang ba dang// dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrog/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin// sgo rnams su'i sgo srungs te// dbang
kho'i steng du nam khar bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la dbu skra mdzes// thod pa'i 'phrang ba'i dbu rgyan can// 'phreng ba'i rgyun gyis spud ba ste// khyod
pa drang na kha TIg/ rdo rje mgo bo phyag na bsnams// thams cad rnam bsgyur gsus pa 'phyang// thams cad mgo pe'i 'phreng bas brgyan// spro dang ljang dang dkar po ste// sor zhing phyag bzhi mdog
gnyis pa// gcer bu pad+ma'i rgya yang cha// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// thams cad rang thabs gnyis ba ste// bcu gsum pa ni rnam par sgom// snying bo mchog ni sgom ba yin// 'dod pa thams
cad rab tu stsol// mngon bar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go cha dang lha mo'i snying bo bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u sta lnga bcu rtsa dgu ba'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya kha
shin tu rnyed dka' dgod ba ste// gang zhig shos btsam rgyas gi/ myur du dngosogrub 'grub pa'o// sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong// tsan dan gyis ni nye bar bas// dri bzang dri ldan s lan// me tog sil
ma gcal bkram 'tshe// spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya// bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing// phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su// denas rdza rnga'i bcing byas te// re'u mig bzhin dgu zlum la// yi ge'i
phyi mo dgod par bya// der gnas pa las dpa' bo na// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed btu// rim bzhin 'byung dang rim man sa// dbyangs dang yi ge grub pos so// thub pa de
lta'i grangs 'gyur la// re'u mig sum cu gnyis pa blang// lnga ba yi ni khyad par bya// brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang// nyishu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye// re'u mig sumacu drug pa blang/ gsum
pa yis ni khyad par dbye// de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang// lta ba yisanI khyad par bya// de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung// nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// sum cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang/ re'u mig
bcolta la yir ldan// lnga ba dag dang yang dag bcas// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung// bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no// mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod// re'u mig gin bcu dgu pa//
ma yi bu dang yang dag ldan// re'u mag gsum par rnam par dbye// ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang// yang dag ldan pa'i yi gal 'gyur// slar yang yi ge de dag nyid//

'dod pa'i don kun grub byed leg/ de nas rang 'byung blangs nasasu// re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar// de nas nyishu gnyis pa gzung// btsugacig pa yang de bzhin no// no/
kun grub byed ces bya ba'i// tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad// re'u mig bcu dgu ba nyid la// nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan// sum cu gsum pa legs blangs to
re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan// mdzes pa'i mchog na yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid/ de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lanaganyis bzlas pa'i tshig tun//
shin tu mnyam par gzhug stobatu// de nas go rams bzlog pas gzung// re'u mig las ni dang po 'di// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyag/ de nas nyi shu gnyis/
pa gzung// bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no// chos don 'dod dang thar pa ya/ tshig na gsum pa yin par bshad// re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang// re'u mig sum cu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu/
drug pa dang// sum cu gsum pa yang dag nga// pa'amig bcu gsum pa yir ldan// re'u mig las na bcu pa nyidi// go rami bzlog pa sgrub pos blang// re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re'u
mig nyi shu gsum bal// gnyis pa dwagan yang dag ldan/ steng du thig les brgyan par bya// de nas chu yis sa bon bzung// brgyad po yang ni de bzhin te// me yi bu yis khyad par dbye//
yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o// o nasku la gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT na mtha' ru sbyar// rigs rgyal 'khor la
sgyur ba'i sngags// 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyug/ de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang// bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du// khro bo bzhi dang yong dag ldan// sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru//
dkyil 'khor srung ba'i don du na// 'dug ba kun la khyad par du// 'di'i rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang// brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur// sha chen bdag gi thams cad

kun rdo rje la ni med par bshad// rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni// dngos grub kun gyis 'bras bskyod pa'o// oM suM b+han sub+ha hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM shrIny+tsa griny+tsa hu hU~M phaT/[u0f00] grib la gris
pa ya hU~MhUMphaT/ o A na ya ho b+ha gtsA badza?hU~M hU~M phaTaM/ 'din gdug pa thams cad du// 'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad de// nam mkha'i khams kyis 'gag/ par 'i tsuba'i dbus
suni// rdo rjehUMmadzad rnam par sgom// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag na bcu drug yang dag ldan// zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur/ zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs ka
thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam bar brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thams cad kun gyi rnam par spyad// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/ sku lus drug po thugs rje nyamag/ gags
brkyang ba yi gnas ba yis// dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon// u ma mchog gi ku tsa gnon// khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// sku la mgo yi do shal can// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dbu la
bcings// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// 'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te// lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste// dpral ba'i stang du yang dag gnas// thugs kadapral ba phyag ste//
bgegasazhi rnam par gnon pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha 'dzin// ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste/ mdung dang mgo bo cung te'u dang// na ma'i pags pa'i stong du ste// phyagan bcu drug de bzhin no//
stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// rang rag gnyis med bde ba'i sku// sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang// dmar ba de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes// dkar dang sde dang sor ba dang// stong gi zhal na dmar bo/
sto spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// las rnams thams cad byed pa dag/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon// bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni// mi g.yo ba rdo rje/
sto sdodang ljang dang dmar ba dang/ [u0f38 ]/dud kha ngur smig bgros pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni//

bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon// na ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing// sna tshogs khro bo'i rigs kyang 'phro// byed pa dang na kha raM 'dzazhi// rdo rje sdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste// rang gi rig dang gnyis med
'khyud// khro bo'i lta ba gzigs mdzad cing// dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis// khro bo thams cad btsanges pa yin//
stag pags pa gos su mnabs// spyan gsum bzad 'jigs pa ste// thob dbyug to mda' dang na// ral gri dril bu de bzhin te// yang na rdo rje dral bu dang// thams cad khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro/
ma @#// 'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog/ sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba las/ dkyil 'khor dngos grub

mchog dam kha// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// oM su b+ha ni su b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM khri grihu hU~MhU~M phaT/[u0f00] grasgyur yu grid+d+hA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ o

rgyu/ An ya ho b+ha ga bI badzra hu hU~MphaT/ dba' bornal 'byor ma mthong nas// thams cad bskyod par rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor chen po sbyor ba ste// kha sbyor lnga 'di ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil
'khor yin// snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin// de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha// zungs kyi gtsug phud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi na bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya// ma lus lus pa
med grub cing// rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur// dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste// gsum char rgyu las byung yin na// chos kya ye shes lus can gyi// thod pa la ni su zhage snod// dpa' bo
thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas/ dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad// khrag 'thung rdo rjecan rnam pa// mngon par brjod pa 'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ srung ba zhal bzhi
bar byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris ba rdo rje shugadzad bskyod pa'i le'u ste drug cu pagokade nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sdomtshan brgyadan
mam rnamasgom// mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i dbus gnas par// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par sgom// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// g.yas brkyang ba ya zhabs kyis bzhug
zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste// mchob rnam par gtsigs pa 'a zhal// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// ral pa'i cod pan
'ching ba ste/ phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams// sku la thod rlon do shal can// thugs rje'i nyams kyis khyab par
mos/ rjadakar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs// sku na sgogacing ldem bag can// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag na// sar dang dmar dang ljang pa dang// dud pa yin mdog can no// rdo rjedril bus
mnyam ldan bas// rang gi rigadang yang dag 'khril// tshangs pa bshus nas mnabs par mdzad// rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin// thod pa kha TIg 'dzin cing// mdung dang cang te'u glu gug dang/
thod pa dgana' dzan pa ste// bcom ldan paM hUM nges 'byung ba// 'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar// shar 'dab lhachor dgod pa sa// ji srid lho phyogs de
bzhin te// ma lasogs pa 'ang dgod par bya// de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin// a yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// ka yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// tsa ya mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// Ta yi mkha'
ma ka/ 'gro ma dag ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang// sngo la'i mdog can lho phyogs so// dmar dang dud kha ljang khu dang// ser bo dbang ldan yang dag gnas// ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang
zani pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// de nas sa yi mkha' 'gro ma// sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa// de dag kun na spyan gsum ste/ zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi po// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad bo
yi rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon// rnamakhaskyar mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// skra grol thugs rje gro bongazhin//

drag kho lul 'khrug byed pa ste// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// 'gro ba thams da smon byed de// thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin// grod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan pa/ sde
sbyo tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste// 'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis sgom/ pa ngan phag mo dgod bya ste// bdag mo yang na gzhag par bya// rdo rje sams dpa'i dag po ste// mkhas pas kyang n bsgom
par bya// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba dag/ sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug/ o a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha hUM hUM phaT swahA/ brtan pa dang na ga lo pa'i bdag ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grug/
sdotshan mkha' 'gro dam kha mchog/ b+ha ga dbus su bsgom par bya// ag/ ka kaM/ tsarmatsa/ TaM ta pa ka/ ta pa sa ta tho/ pa ba na dza yaMm b+ha haMtsa/ sha ra b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar
bzhi dang bcas pa ni// rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad pazag/ rgas dang nad dang 'chemad par// skyo ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// chang gab tud pa dang bcas pa// zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// de
rnyed na yang sA lus bya// skyo ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing// phyugs nazas sa rta spyad na// skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i
rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i le'u sta drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o/// de nas kazhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor mchog gi gad ba// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor
mo/ ma mo'i dkyil 'khor ster bshad do// mkha' 'grom sogs mkha' 'gro gi/ gor dawa yi gzugs su bya// phag mo'i gzugs de nyid kyang// zhal ni gar du rtsa ru bya// sngar
bshad gnas dang khyad tsan dang// zhal na gzhan yang rtogs par bya// sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis// mkha'agro ma na lag mdung thogs/ thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun// mkha'
lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can// gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong// sku yi 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong// khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang// khA yo zhal gdong de bzhin te// zur la gshin rje srog sogs
kun// ma ho'i ri rigs zhal gdong yin// dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang// spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar// 'di ni rnala'abyor mchog dam pa// sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed//
rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag/ rnal 'byor mchog ni sta khar 'gyur// rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag dang// ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster// ma thos ba yi chos bstan pas//
soms can rnams ni srid las grol// bla na med pa nyid bstan pas// mi snang la sogs dngos grub 'gyur// su yang rung bsa'ajig rten gsum// de kun de ma thag tu mthong// sngarab shad dpa'
bornal 'byor ma// gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te// mkha' 'grom mo de bzhin no// sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams // bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing// rtag tu dgo
grub thams cad 'thob// rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni// gar du'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro// brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur// dbul
bo'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyug gnad yod pa yang med par 'gyur// long ba yas kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ 'bong bu'ishadang rta sha dang// khyi dang ba lang glang
bos// rngamo ce spyang de bzhin te// brgyad po'ang mnyam pas mchog yin no// rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bzag/ dri chon chu dang sbrang rtsi mar// bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas//
yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gzugs yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing// rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par/ khaza' ba yang na bza'i
mtha bar bshad// 'gro dang ma 'gro de bzhin te// btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur// mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni brjod mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma//
las// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa lo'u sta drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ 1/ de nas gzhan lang ba bshad bya ba/ mkha' 'gro lnga yi rnam sgrom
pa 3rigs las brgyad pa'i tshe ga gi/ gdun dang phyag mtshan sa bon te// 'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o// nga nya Nan ma zhes pa// 'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa/ gang ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/
ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin// Nani rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// na ni pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal
dang// chags dang brag dog de bzhin te// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gas// 'dod las grol pa'i 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma ral gri lnga pa yani// sngo dang dkar ba nyid/

dang// sar dang dmar po ljang khu dang// rdorje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog/ rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin to// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga ba yin// glang po seng ge rta dang ni/

mkhyamakha' lding de la nan te// khyab 'jug tshangs panyi ma dang// dbang phyug tshe dbang po yang de// rang rigs yan lag dang bcas pa// gnyis mod bde bas yang dag gnas// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni//
byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir// dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod// lngakho yang dag lnga sangs rgyag/ lnga po bdaganyado lnga yan no// t+'a ma'adakyal bar dbus sulta///
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du// lho dang nub dang de bzhin te// byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang nadabus su zla ba ste// shar du yang ni trema'i gdan/ de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste/ 'di

lta ste// rdo rje thod ba dang/ rdo rjemakha' mnyam dang/ rdo rje snying po dang/ rdo rje sla ba dang/ bzhi po de dgan rdo rjemakha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdanAkhri bya'o// rdo rje zla ba dang/

rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo rje rgyal bo dang/ rdo rje sgra dang/ de dugan ngesangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'adakyil 'khor to/ seng ge'i gdan khri// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje sprin dang/ rdo rje Ta ha ra dang/

rdo rje bzhad pa dang/ de dag rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ rta'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje me dbal rang/ rdo rje 'joms pa dang/ rdo rje srog phyed dang/ rdo rje dril bral dang/ de dag ni pad+ma'i
dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje brtan dang/ rdo rje glu dang/ rdo rje dpa' bo dang/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dang/ de dag las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o/
dpa' bo do dag kyang rang gi rigs dang/ thodapa' 'brang ba can/ sbyanagasum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyel mo krung gis yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ mche ba rnam par
tshagatsigs shinganam khar 'gyur ba/ stag gi pags pa gos su mnabasal/ zhal gcig la/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha hUM 'dzin pa/ cang te'u sba hUM dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i 'byor ba'i
shamagyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ralapa dang zla ba 'dzin paspro/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sha dkar po ) byang ljang khu/ nub dmarapo/ lho
sar po/ las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar sor po/ byang sngon po// nub dkar lo/ lce dmar po/ pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'ishar dkar ba/ byang ljang khu/ nub sngon po/ ltoser po// rin chon
mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang khu/ byang sarapo/ nub dkar po/ lhasngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang khu/ nub dmar po/ lcosar po/ 'du deg ji lta'i rim pa yis//
rdo rje 'khor lo'ol khri dang// pad+ma rin chen 'brang ba ya// chas na longs su bskor bar bya// grwa bzhir mtsho bzhi sgom sto/ ma mo rmongs byed ma dang// ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te// chags pa
yi ni ma mo dang// phrag dog ma mo'i bzhin te// me ya phyogs la sogs par dgod// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang// slagrol ma la bzhin rnam bsgyur// spyan gsum pa la gserabu ste//
phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yane// phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa// ri dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// dbang chen mo dang chu dang na// rlung gi rakyil 'khor dag tu gnas// rigs kyi gdon la
bzhugs pa yin// 'khor la rdo rje pad+ma dang// ral gri thod bakha TaMg/ gri gug kyang ni phyagana'achad// ma ning las byung lha mo sgrom// thod pa yin 'phreng ba can// skyil

mo krung ni phyed pa 'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje srung ba dang/ rdo rje 'gying ba dang/ rdo rje rta gdong dang/ rdo rje drod gdong dang/ rdo rje bde mchog der/ rdo rjedam tshig dang/ rdo rje rta mchog ste/
khro ba'i rgyal po de dgan/ sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po// dmar dang sngo dang dud kha rakar// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// dril bu thod pa kha TaM ga/
cang te'u yang ni di bzhin te// thod pa dbyug tog mdung dang na// dgra sta thod pa kha TaM ga/ mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa go/ zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzas/
phyag rgya ldani 'dzin pa ste// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ thod pa yi ni 'bring ba 'char// mgo bo'i do shal rnam par brgyan// nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du na// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis
bzhugs// phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// mche ba rnamagacigasarnam bsgyur zhal// spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can// rang gi rig dang gnyis med sbyor// snying rje yi nyams
can te// phyi rol rdo rje yi dgas kyis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya/ @#/thog mar gsal byed ming dang huM// mtha' rubaT dang sbyar ba@#// sngar bshad choga'i bsrung ba bya//
thatha phung po khams dang skye mched dang// lus ngag yid la bsgom par bya// mkha' 'gro'al drug phyag bcu gnyis// rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis// gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// mdung dang/

lcags kyu thod pa dang// kha TaM ga dang mgo bo dang// cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang/ rten pa'i pags pa 'dzin pa yin// sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang khu// dud kha dang ni dkar ba dang// dkar dang sngo
dang ser dmar dang// lcang deng thal ba'i mdog lta bu 'o// ra dang po dang dkar ba dang// dmar dang ljang khu pad+ma'i mdog/ dmar dwang dkar dang sngon po dang// sar dang ljang dang nam mkha'i
mdog/ lcang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang// sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog/ de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni// zhal mdog gzhi khyad par yin// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgom// 'phreng ba'i

gsang sngags mang dang bcas// mkhas pas zur ba'i mtshams nas so// mthar ni hU~MhU~M phaT dang sbyar// oM ma hA su kha badzra DA ga hUM nA kinI dzA' shaM par A hUM phaT swahA/ omahA su kha bud+d+ha DA kashrI na

kanI dz+wa la shaM ba ra AhUMphaT swAhA/ oM ma hA su kharata ka twaMr kani dz+wa la shaM ba ra A:hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha pad+ma kAhit+tAkinaM dzal shaM ba ra AhUM phaT swahA/ oM ma hA su kha bi shA kaM

u0f38ra ki nI dzAl shaM ba ra A:hUM phaT swahA/ de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying bo gsang sngags te/ 'di na yi shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no// oM badzra DA ka dzaM hUMphaT swahA/ oM bud+d+haNA kataM hUM phaT/
oM rat+na TA ka Ni hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma TA ka naM hUM phaT/ o bshANA ka laM hUM phaT/ lags dam tshig 'o gcig ba// mkhas pas bsgom par byas nas su// dam tshig gsani legA
dbang bskur// sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang// go'ayang dran nas dbang yang bskur// sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog/ de bzhin khyud dadatsum
ban// b+ha ga'i lang ga'i sbyor ba dag/ ye shes rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog/ shes rab thabasakyi phyag rgya drug/ rnam par blta zhing nges par brtag/ dga' ba dang bo shes rab ste// mchog tu
dga' ba mnyam par sbyor// bde bar dgab par grub pa che// lhan cig skyes dgab bla med la ni// sbyor pa dang narigAn tu sbyog/ sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor// de dag tsho go'i zhi ba'o/ thig le'i
gzhung gi sbyor shes na// phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thog/ cho ga nges bar bsgrubs nas ni// myur du rnal 'byor pa yis
khrub// 'di ni nges pa kho na 'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blamalas/ gsang ba'iya shes kyi le'u stodrug cu rtsa gsum pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad
bya ba// thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbugs gnas par// ye shes zla ba rnam par sgom// ma yi yi gi las byung ga/ rdorjesems dpa' bde ba che// kha
[/]ba kun da'i mdog lta bu // dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drugazhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// sna tshogs bad+ma'i zla dbus bzhugs// stong pa'i ya shas las
byung ba// zla ba phyed pa ral par 'ching// glod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rdorje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas// snying rje chags

dang mngon gyur pa// dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal// rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni rnam 'tshar te// rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang// kha TaM ga
dang thod pa 'dzin// ya gi A dang nyi dbus bzhugs// rdorje sems dpa' rnam bar sgom// i las rdo rje zla pa ste// i las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul le// a las chos kyi rdo rje ste// a las sna tshogs
sgyu 'phrul ma// lha mo bzhi bo de dag ni// de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa 'o// skra grol ba tshig po tsho// snying rje chags pas rnam par myos// rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/
dbus su ni// sna tshogs pa dgas stong du sgom// gtso bo shes rab skyil mo krung// thod ba'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan//
mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams// thod pa kha TaM ga 'dzin cing// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ji ltar dpa' bo' rnal 'byor bzhin// de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mo ba'i
yi kha sbyar gsang// snying po skye'i ba mchog yin no// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thums cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// gsang pa kun gyi mchog de nyid// mkha'
za 'gro ma yi snying po mchog/ gsang ba'i yi shu dam tshig ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin// u ni snying khar sgom pa ste// sku ni mgo bo de bzhin no// on gtsug dag tu sto// tshon
mig tu dgod par bya// oM ni go char dgod pa ste// an mtshon du rnam par dgod// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid kyang na sgom par gnas/ lo shas dam tshig sbyor ba yis//
bla med mchog dang dbang yang bskur// mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis// chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yin// dngos po kun n ro gcig ste// gnyis su med pa'i mchog grub pa// dam tshig
thun mtshams bzhin du ste// dus bzhi dag turnam par sgom// kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni// thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam// snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing// cha yod par n rnam par sgom//
thams cad rdo rje sams dpa' ste// shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro// rdadzarnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyog/ bdag nyid rdo rje drag bo yan// bgrang du yod pa'i sa ba yin// li gi bzlas pa yin par
bshad// bzlas pa ye shes bsgom pa ste// sprul pa dug ni spro ba// de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin// cho ga bzhin du bzlas ba@#// u o o u/ oM a: oM A : a A :
i I/ u u/ a a/ o au/ aM A = hUM swAhA/ dung chen 'phreng ba blangs nas na// rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po bzla// dag byed bsod nams chen po ste// dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa//
yin// sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing// dgo ba kun gyi 'bras bu ste// gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste// rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po ya/
dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba// lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde// rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das// rang byung rdo rje sams dang 'a yin// mngon par brjod
pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor gyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// ma rung
phyi dang nang 'joms pa// nam mkha' stong pa lta bu las// yi ge kya las mngon byung zhing// mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog gi/ phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum pa la 'jigs

ba'i zhal// ka la sa brkyang ba yis la shugs ba[R]) ]mkhungs bdud kyi dag gnon cing/ phyag rgya na po mnyam ldan pas// thod pa dril bus yang dag 'khyud// thod ba'i dum bus yid 'ong ba// rdo rje mchog gis rnam par mtshan/
yashes bdud rtsis yongs gang ga/ lag pa g.yas par gzhag nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la// phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan// zhal gdong mche ba rnam gcig shing// spyi gtsug
byed pas rgyan du byas// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan// blab phyed par l kha 'chang// rdo rjes mas dpa'i dbu rgyan can// rdorje 'jigs byed slom pa yin// dgos
ba rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos// rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas khyad par med par byed// byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la rgyan du byas// 'dzin med bde ba'i rnala'abyor legs
par bslabs pa'i bdag/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po na// ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrog par byed// gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed// gzhan
yang sgrub po rnal 'byor 'thun pa'i yul du sgrub// yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang// 'di la phyag brgyad rnam par sgom// dkar dang rdo dang dmar sor po// zhal dag bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa
mdzad// mdung dang rdo rje kha TaM ga/ cang te'u mgo bo gra khug thogs// sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags// hAhA hIti hU~MhU~M phaT phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog cing/ dpa' bo gcig
pu 'jigs mdzad pas// gdul dka' khrams cad 'dul mdzad cing/ sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i sngonan mkhas pas sngo// bsam gtan dga' ba sgrub pa'i phyir//
khro po yi ni sku ru sgrub// dam tshig bza' zhing bzlas pa bya// dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla// mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su// chos rnams ma lus bsgom por bya// o
sa ak+Sha hUM phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa zad byed cing// mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par// sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing// srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed// sbyor ba yin mchog dam
pa// bklags tsam gyis ni nges par 'grub// gdug cing gnod khyod sems can dang// ma rungs las la chags pa dang// log par lta dang bcas pa las// 'di dag nges par bca'
bar bya// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan rnams spro// khams gsum dag ni grol b.rabyed// sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni// ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzlo// oM phaT che ge mo b+ha//
ya phaT/ klu hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyisan// tshwas bza' zhing gcer bu dang// sku grol ro la mnan pa dang// zhags pa lcags kyi phyag gis 'dzin// gsang sngags cho ga
bzhin du ni// khri phrag stong du bzla zhing sgom// rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du na// khams gsum po dag gsod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma na 'khor bcas pas// bza' bar yang ni
rnam par bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'i// khro bo snying du gzhug par bya// snying dang rgyu ma rkang dang rus/ ]sha dang khrag rnams 'dul byed rung// mtshams med lnga rnams
byed pa dang// gdug pa can rnams bza' bar bya// mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor// rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas// zhag bdun gyis ni phangs
par gyur// bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis na// gdug pa bdag gis zos par gyug/ nyi ma khyod dang mtshan khyad dang/ las 'di dag la 'jug par bya// gcer bu
sa grol byas pa yis// gshinaN+Di'i phyogs su kha bltas te// khyim khyu'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis// ma yi gsang sngags bzla bar bya// hUM pha roloraM/ mtshams med pa 'dizhisabya ba//
riraM raM hU~M phaT/ ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis// nyin zhag bcu pa drag gis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang// 'chi bar yang ni the tshom med// gal te sdig can slar legan// 'di la
khozhi ba'i las rnams bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas nas/ 'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// oM swahA a A khaM a mu ka pA la kir to b+ha bi na ti tas ci shin+taM b+ha bcu/ paM aM a mo sAhA/
( 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gyon// zhi ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas// dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go// bya rogakhyi dang byi la dung// naku la yisha rnams bza'// thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te/
rgyu'adi la yid gnyis dpyod ba med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i ba las/ khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po kha sgyur gnon pa'i le'u sta drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga/ srid pa'i nang na skyo ba bdunaM/ sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni// lha yi gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// lha yi gzugs can gzi brjid dpal// pa shu'i nang na rgyal po
'a/ yin: skal ba zang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro// sku yi myu gu de bzhin ri sha/ mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs// de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung// lus las lha yi dri/
'byung zhing// kha yi dbugasan ga pur dra// ldan paMs sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor// gcin dang phyi sa gla rtsa'adri// tshag na 'jam par 'gyur ba dang// lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jom// ut+pa la yi dri dang

ldan// sa dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol// lus kyang snum zhing mnyen pa dang// snying dang thod pa lte ba ste// des na ro tsa na ru 'gyuraM/ gling bdun dang pa'i 'gros su 'gro// snying rje'i bsam pa can
yin te// dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dad// sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs na// mi gsod ma yas tshig mi 'gyur// srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag/

gang yang rung ba za mi nus// de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste// ma snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog/ 'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni// bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad// dri chen nu dang byang chub sams// mkhas
pas blangs te ril bu bya// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te// blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas// nye ba'i snying po lon 'bum bzlas// de 'di lag tu byon nas ni//
spyin pa 'di las bdag la byin// de 'di ni ma thag tu yang// mi bskyod pa ya r+ya pa rnyed// 'di ni deban par khur nasasu// mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub khar bya// gzhan yang las rnams rab bshad bya//
'u @#// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i mchog dam pa// de yi spyi bo'i sgra bcad nas// gzhan yang dud 'gro'i sbya dang ni// de bsros the gur byas nas su// gang gi mgul du bcings byas bas/
zade 'dra ba yi gzugs su 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa liko de yi bags kha blangs nas na// de la he ru ko da pa la gri/ dngon sum khro bo'i de ngos grub gi he ru ka dpa la byed pa yin/
brkang lag lcags pa blangs nasan// 'byung ba'i sku dang bcas bsres nas// phyema'i rilakhur byas nas su// mngon par basngags te cho ga bya// mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la// lcags
gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// lag pa g.yon pas de blangs te/ mthe bong sbas pa'i lu tshur gyis// khu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na// de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs/ rang ga lag gis dpung gnyis
blangs// rang sku zhags pa blangs nas thogs// g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas// the gu lnga yis rnam par dkris// phyogs gar nor gyis gang ba gi/ de yi phyogs mthong blang ba'ag/
khyim du bkod cing stong 'duganas// sngags khazlas nas mkha' la spyod/ o dza la yaM a paM hUM ho pa ra ha'i to// kha tsa 'dzihris nA/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gog/ yid la gang 'dod par
rung// de dag thams cad myur du 'gugs// khyim na gang bar longs su mthong// tshwas dganazis nas su/ lha yi lus su gyur pa la// rnal 'byoroNi'i lus gyur to// des ni zhi
ba dbang du'agyur/ chu ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas/ skadang bsres nas de bsgril te// tho gu cho ga bzhin du ni// bsgril nas zhags pa dag tu bya// g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par// gang gi
mang gi nga rjes brjod kyis// zhags pa padab nas de ma thog lha mo 'gugs shing de mdun gnas// rdo yi rus pa'i phye na yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 'di la dkyil 'khor
dadad+d+hag pa ni// ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas// gzhan yang rgyun du byas pa dang// rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya// chu ba ngag gis mchod phyir thogs// de ru brdar ba'i tsan dan gyis// byug
nga 'i ngartul zhugs 'dzin pa na/ mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin// sgrub pa del mar chen ngo// mig sman nges par byas nas ni// grib ma yang na mthong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhag gis
bskus na ni// mtshan na'ang nyes par lta bu r 'gyur// rnal 'byor rkang dang zos nas ni// tshem par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ji srid gnas par mi bkras shing// yid gzhungs dran ba 'phel
bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran// rdo rjesams dpar 'gyur ba yin// rgyu ma phyi mar byas nas su// mkhas pas grib ma 'kha yang skam// gang gi mgo la bzhag pa na// de ma thag
tu dbang du 'gugs// sngags pas glo ba zos na ni// de ma thag tu nad mad 'gyur// rkang pa blangs nas sa basmanan// char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs par byed// blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas skam//
bla@#// tsan dan dmar po dang bsres nas// de ni phyi mar byas nas su// bud med gang la byin na ni// 'dod pas gdungs pa'i bud med grang// dbang du gyur te mngag gzhugabyed/
tho pus mo'i rus pa kA la ya// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/ gang gi ming bcas sbras pa yis// de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ji h+pha bos na/ ngag gi dngos grub dag
tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor srid zos nani// sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur// so la rgyal po bzhi po dag/ stong 'og dag ni klongs nas kyang// bung ba yi ni gshog pa dang// tshub ma'i
'dab ma rdul dang ni// rdul 'dis sgrub pa byas na ni// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs// rtswa rnams bya mar byas pa yis// bud med thams cud bskam par 'gyur// rang byung ma tog rotsan/
'a ga da dang gur kum gyis// thig li sngags pas sbyaran ni/[“ ]/'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mig 'bras che ba yis// pha rol ston 'byed par 'gyur//
sku nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni// de ma thag tu 'om 'gugs// rnal 'byor mtshan ni [”]zos tsam gyis// bud med sa bon mod la 'gugs// rnal 'byor so dang san mo phyes// gang gis
gang gi mgo la gtor// grub ba brgyad po 'grub pa yin// pha dang bu na yin na yang// rnam par sdong bar byas par 'gyur// mchu phur byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// khani gnon par 'gyur
sa ba yin// sna phyar byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur// mgo bo'i pags pas mngon btags te// kha yi drung du mngon bzlas
na lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// thod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis// rak+ta 'gugs par byed pa yin// thod pa kha na sgrub pa yis// gnod par bya ba kho na yin// in+d+ra ba ru ro tsa na/
de gnyis gcig tu bsres byas nas// gang la thig le gtsoge gyur na// dbang po'i gnas na mthong bar 'gyur// rotsan dang myang sngas dag/ lhan cig tu na byug pa yis// thub pa med
pa'i stobs 'gyur te// pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur// pu tran u0f97la rotsan// lhan cig tun phyir byas nas// bud med gang la phyis gtor na/ de 'dod pas myos gyur nas//
ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas// ro tsan dang du tras gnyis// lhan cig tu ni bsus pa yas// byung po kun dang byung mo rnams // ci bgyi zhig ni sa bzhin du// de yi drung du 'khod pa
'gyur// ci 'dod pa dag stor bar 'gyur// rotsan dang dza ban ti// lhan cig tu na phyir byas te// shi ba'i mig dang mig sman sbyar// bskal par gnas kyi bar du ni// 'tsho bar yang ni
'gyur ba yin// chu srin lag ni ri tsan// lhan cig tu na phyir byas nas// nAgamado lhan gi tu// dril budag tu byas nas kyang// rdo rje gzi brjidi dang bsros nas// mig gi smanan byas
ma 1/ gyur na// nor skyong gi ni glang bo yang// mngon gsumadu ni gnas nas kyang// de la bdag gis zhon na na// glang chen 'khor namang bo dang// gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur/
za 'o/pha rolasdu nu 'dzoms byed cing// gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed nga 'i// 'dod pa na ster bar 'gyur// 'dram ma daNi ro tsa na// lhan cig tun sbyor ba yase// rig byed rgod pa med par
'gyur// rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsan// ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu// ri bu dag tu bsgribabyas nas// rma bya'i mjug mas btsangs na na/ bung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te// lha rnams
'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing// rig pa 'dzin pa 'ong bar 'gyur// de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur// lha yi gzhalamed khang 'phrog cing// lha yi bu mo'ang
'gugs par 'gyur// 'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing// mi 'dod so mas can don yang byed// mjug ma thur bltas byas na ni/ gter rnams kyang na mthong bar 'gyur// blangs pas sbyin
pa'ipha rol phyin// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba pa na// sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la// mjug ma bskor bar byas na// sgo dbya bas na 'jug par bya// lha min bu mo lhan cig rol/
lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len/ 'phrog cing des ni thos gyur te// 'dod pa'i lha ya gzugs su 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis// sems can don rnams byed cing 'gro// de nas
yan lag lnga pa yis// chog dag tu 'gyur ba ni// spu dang pags pa sha dang ni// rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su// dri chen chu dang ngu'u kra dang// mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu// la khu byas
nas khas ba pa bcu// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkrisanas// kha yi nang du sbas nasan/ nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang lhan cig tu// khams gsum du ni rgyal cher
'gyur/ mngon par brjod ba'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs chen sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
rang gi chos kyi yig sgos pa// rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor// bdag med chos ni yang dag sgril// rang chos ya gi mchog dga' ba// chos kyi sku lus rang byung yan// yi gehe las nges 'byung
ba he ru ka na rnam par sgom// ya ge ha las nges 'byung ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hU~M gi yi ge las byung ba// rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnam par sgom/[u0f8b]/hU~M gi yi ge las byung ba// mi
bskyod pa ni rnam par sgom// khaM gyi yi ge las bskyod pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par sgom// oM h+phu oM hU~M las byung ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// oM hUM raM sA las byung ba//
rin chen mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hU~M hU~M a las nges byung ba// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// kho haMho holasabyung ba// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// NA las mkha'/
ku/ 'gro ma nyid de// yaM las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// bri las lha mo sa la spyod// khaM las mkha' la spyod pa yin// khaM las cha mo nyid yin te// dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan
zadwags ma/ ha ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste// ru las ngagan byung ba yin// ka ni lus kyi derdzasta// yig gsum las byung he ru ka/ maM las 'jam pa'i rdorje ste// saM las kun tu bzang po
yin la las 'jig rten mgon po sta// k+Shalas sa yi snying po no/ khaM las phyag na rdo rje ste// mo las byams pa nyid yon te// khaM las nam mkha' snying por grags// kaM las nam mkha'
mdzod yin no// sa las sgrib pa kun sal ba// galas smos kyi glang po yin/ dza las yo shes tog kyang yin// a las blo gros mi zad pa// pralas spobs pa brnags pasda/ ]sa
! las ngan song kun 'dren pa// sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa// dza las dra ba can gyi 'do// tsa las zla ba'i 'od yin te// ra las byung ba'i rin chen 'od// sU las nyi ma'i 'od yin no// ga las
rdo rje 'od kyang yin// ma las mthu chen thob pa ste/ su ni su d+hu na yin no// byu las bzang skyong nyid yin te/ sa las blo gros rgya mtsho so/ kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten
mgon po sa snying po/ phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang// nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' mdzod/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang// sras kyi glang po nyid yin te// mi zad pa dang/ shes tog

ba spobs pa brtse gas pa mchog yin te// mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no// ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni// dra ba zla ba rin chen dang// nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste// su rdzu na dang rin chen thob// rgya mtsho

dang ni bzang skyong ngo// de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste// 'phrang ba'i gsang sngags rnamapar sbyar// de dag dam tshig tu bshad de// dngos grub kyi ni grubapa stsol// rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang// skul
byed dang na rin chen sgron// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// ro langs rdo rje gzhon nu ma// kaM po dza dang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin/ ]ya shas sgron dar rdor 'jig ma// ye shes/
sbyin dang rgyal byed ma// sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo// spyan dang mA ma kA mchog dang// rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang// rma bya dang ni'i khrod ma// lu gu rgyud dang phyir bzlog ma// lha mo
gtsug tor rdo'i 'jig ma// sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// gsal byed mang dang bcas par na// mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya// tha mar sAhAmanyam
par sbyar// sngags kyi dngos grub rang tu stsol// gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal// bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin// shes rab mthar byed bzhi bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub
khyad yon// 'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs po che// brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste// khro bo chen po sngon grub pa// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo/
'a @#// khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin// sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma rnams te// khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med gnas// rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags// ming dang yang dag sbyab
bya// gsal byed o na kun tu yang// mthar ni hUM pa trA sAhAr sbyar// gsal byed mang dang h+phadung na// mthar ni phaT dang sA hAr sbyar// gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang// dri dang ro yalha mo ste//
'dab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar// phyogs kyi gos canas grol ma// rag pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags// gnyis su med par yang dag gnas// dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal bo na/lha mo' rig pas bde bar
bzhugs// snying po rtos kyi dbyings su grags// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung// ye shes sems dpa' gnyis mdabazhugs// rdo chos kyi dbyings ma ste// gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes
ni chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs bkod de ni gsang bde nyid mchog/ rdozhin yang dag snyog/ che ba'i mchog na'adus ba ste// ro soms dpa' de ba'amchog/ sbyor brgyad kyi rjesa'adra ba//
bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma// rig pa'i rgya mtshomchog yin te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'ud zad cig/ skya 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no// rnal 'byor mni 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i rgya
mtsho rgyud yin no// nges brjodargyun ni bla med pa// 'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin// ji ltar bsam pa'i khyod par gyis// sams can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur )'dus pa mchog gi dam ba 'di/
ma3sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ste// rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar na// bdag po nyid du bya ba yin// ji ltar ming gi rjes 'thun par 1
nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dang/ rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni// nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya// yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te// gnyis su med pa'i sgom ba nyid// theg pa chen po' dam
pa mchog/ dngos grub che dang ldan rar 'gro// de nas dzug na tshan na chog bshad bya/ gzugs dang mdog gi choga'i rim// yi ge de las nges 'byung ba// bdag nyid he ru kar bskyod bya//
sku lus dkar la drag shul che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spyan gsum pa la zhalalnga nga// phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// thod pa'i 'phrang pa'i dbu rgyan can// ra pa zla byed
dbu 'a bcings// sna tshogs de tsho'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i dengashal gyis brgyan pa// dkar dang se ra dang de bzhin
dmar/ ljang khu stang zha' sngo nga 'o// bzhad dang rang 'a dang sgog pa dang/ rngam ngang zhi dang drag po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas// rgyal ba'i pag
gling mchog kyang 'dzin// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// thod pa dang na kha TaM 'dzin// rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og
tha07 1/ 1gnon// rig pa'i rdo rje lcang pa dang// dkar ba' ma sa yaljangadang sor dang dmar ba dang/ dkar ba'i g.yon ba'i zhal gdong ste// sdang gi
shul gdong sngo la 'jigs// skra grol bani rnam par myos// seng ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can/ byin pa gnyis ni legs par 'khril// byed pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// spyan gsum
shin tu dmar ba ste// rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan// mdung dang kha TaMphyagan bsnams// chags pa chen po me yi 'od// phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams//
gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing// sna tshogs sems can 'dul bar mdzad// thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzo gas// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs/
ka 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag zhabasakyis gnon pa rnam par sgom// 'khor kun dag ni zhal gsumang/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te// rigs
gsumagyis na phyiba'i gzugs// rigs gsum gyi na phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mos phya ba'i gzugs can ni// dam tshig gnyisasumad pa sbyor// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs//
g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni rnam par sgom// mtshams rnams sun bum pa dag/ thod pa zla ba yongs su gang// zur/
rnams su ni spo srungs te// ji ltar mdog gi cha rnams so// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ 'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can// thugs rje khro
bsarnam par mos/ dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba// ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rim pa'ang de bzhin no// lugs 'byung lugs las ngazlogaparan// 'khor sogs
na chog kyang dgod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbus su ni// rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na// rang gi byin rlabs 'char ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas tshu stogs can la spyi// bdu ni rab tu gsang ba ste//
bama'i ngag la gnas pa yin/ rnal 'byor ma la drin yin no// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor pa// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod// shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin// sa bonu pa pa
mchog 'gugs/ ba rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don// 'di na dri med sgom pa mchog/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge
la sa bskyod pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas ma chog tu bshad myo ga/ bdag nyid tshoga'i sgom pa'i rim// mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni/
lha sa sgrol ma gos dkar mo// 'od zer can dang dzam la// lha mo skul byed sa'adzan ma// rang gi sa bon las byung ba// phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum pa la galas
@#/ brkyang bzhugs// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa// rig byed bzhi la zhal gdong ste// phyogs kyi gos can yi gdan//
sku grol ba la 'jigs pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// khro bas blta zhing thugs rje'i nyams// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// de nyid yo shes mchog las byung// so sor yang drag/
sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shesagadon mi za// khro ba sna tshogs gzugs can// dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba// khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang// gos pa med par nyams pa yi//
bdag bo sgom pa nyid yin no// mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// phro ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can// snying kha'i pad+ma'i dbus su ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs
brtswa can// 'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing// rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sogs/ 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis// mchod 'os thams cad mchod
ba yin// gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba// de nirgyal bas mchod par bzhed// nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yin/ rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod// de bas rdo rje chog pa yis// yid 'dod rnams
kyi lus la 'dod/ mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bar// gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos med gzhil dgod ba yis//
lha yi gzugs su sgom pa yi// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad ra ba sgrub pa'o// sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yis// bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i// rgyud ni
don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa 'ang med// nyi'u rtsa bzhir phye ba yi// gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te// de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid// skyob
de nyid can gyis min// gal te de nyid mod gyur na// de la 'khrul pas ci zhig bya// 'on te de nyid ldan 'gyur na// de la 'khrul pa zhig yod// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams //
bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mnus bag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa na// sams can bsam pa'i dbang gas te// bsam gtan las/
gzhan bde med phyir// de bas bsam gtan mchogagazho'@#// rnal 'byor ba ni phyi rol 'khor// de yis khamasa rnams rbad par gyur// bde bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas
gnas par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis// thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs// de bas dgyes pas dngos
grub mchog/ ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur// des nirdzobatsun yashes kyang// rab tu khad de bsgrub par bya// snatshogs spyod ba yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs spyod pa yi//
spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir myong la// de nyid brtul zhugs la dgag/ gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas la// rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can// bsam gtan zas mchog
gzhol 'gyur bas/ smon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis// gcar khu'am yang na gcer bu min// gang rung ji ltade ltar 'gyur// rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la// de nyid gcig bu rnam po'
bsam/ lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis// zla drug tsam gyis nges bar ni// rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bstanan// rnal 'byor chen po 'di gsal 'gyur leshes sgron ma'i mchog
mthong na// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar// ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus jibazhin no// mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rtan du/ 'gro kun donan byed
zla ba'o// dpal ldan rdo rje'adzin par ni// mngon 'gyur 'di la bu tsam med// spyod ba 'di la nges par ni// ji skad bshad pa der gyur bar// sems ni dag bar gyis shig ces/ sems
can rnams la bdagagasol 'debs// gang gis rmad byung snying rjer ldan// gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur// rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni snying khar dgod// snying
khar rdo lcags gyur sbyor// thugs kyi rdo tshesanang sbyarati// gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya pa// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par brtag )rang gis namakhar sbyor nas su// gzi brjed gzugs
[]ni 'dzin par sgrog rang gi chos kyi yig dgod pa// rang drod rang bzhin dri ma med// rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgrom// ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yis// gzhan
nyi dgazugs kyi sgom pa la// yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi// dbang po gzhan ma bsgom par bya// ji lta ji ltar mos ba yis// gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya// mngon par brjod/
pa'i rgyud bla ma'i blam las ) bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u stodrug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i yishes
gsang ba 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bu r dri ma med// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya// legs so bya ba rnams
phyinanas// rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las// legs so legs la shes che// nges par brjod pamatshog gi mchog/ legs so rdo rje tshul drag po// sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin 'bag
legs so gnyis mon sbyor ba/ @#/ mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la// legs so zhes bya nges par sbyor// 'dod pa med pa'i sgom pa ni// legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon/ khog pa
chen po bstan pa 'di/ gnyis med la shes mchog dang// man ngag thob pa'i dang poste// legs so rdo rje bla ma kun// de la bstan ba rnal 'byor ma// legs so khor khyed kyil 'khor la//
dngos grub bla na med pa byin// rdzogs tre cang mi gsung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad gyi khro bo'i dordzo rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud glan med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla
lcam zhes bya bgasang ba'i yang gsang bas bde mchog rgyud kyirgyal po chen po the tshom med par de kho na bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o///mngon par brjod pa'i
rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde mchogagi rgyud kyits+tshal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so///rgya garagyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po pad+ma ka ra shAdzAn dang )

bod kyi 'tsho ba chen bo dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Dita chen po dz+nyA na shI dang/ lotsa ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o/ phyis paNi
[& ]ta Anan+ta dang/ lo chung gis lhag chad rnams bsabs nas zhu dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//

#// rgya gar skad du/ I badzratAkanAm mahA tawA rA dza/ bod skad du (rgyud kyirgyal po chen po dpal rdo rjemakha' 'gro zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan rasag zigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
mkha' 'gro kun r ngos soms dang 'a// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa
yi ni lhagacig nyid// 'byung gnas sgra tshul des 'byung rnams // dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// 'jigarten gsum du rnyedadaka' ba// thog ma dbus mthar yong dag gnas// dod chags ma
yin chags khral man// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu// 'di ni gnyis med ye shes mchog/ rnyed dang bde ba kun mos pas// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par
gyur// nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu zags// sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ni// snatshogs kun gyi sdom pa yis// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//
rdo rjes kha 'a 'gro zhes byar grug/ de nyid med sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dang// kun tu gzugs brnyan yin gyisan// lugs sogs rnal 'byor skya ba min// byang
chub sems chen rnal 'byor gang// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso/ byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no// 'gro pa'i rtsa lag rang bzhin gyis// sna
tshogs g.yogs te rnam bzhugs pas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sna tshogasatshul gyis mchod par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang// dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin te//
rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang// dba' bo thams cad nyid dang ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe
'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang ma 'am sbyor bgyi/rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjesams dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/
stsathams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ nam mkha' lan mtshan nyid med// khams gsum pa ni malus pa'i// 'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ 'gro' dmags su med
ba ste// mthong ba dang ni rig pa'i dngos// thams cad sgyum ji bzhin no// gang gis blun po 'ching 'gyur ba// 'dir des mkhos rnams rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sa gsum
ma lus bza' bar bya// gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni/ ma tshang mar me lta bu r bda'// gzugs na sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes pad+ma gar dbang sku// 'du
phyir ro rgyal po yin// rnam shes rdo rje sams dpa' ste// 'di dag dngos kun rang bzhin no// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes par grogs// gang dag chen po gcig pu'i lha// bde ba thams cad rab ster/
ba baT rdzasgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis// chags bral chags bzhes byar bshad// sa khams ltung byed ma yin te// de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o// ma khams 'gugs byed ma yin te// de bzhin
nga ni gar dbang go/ nam mkha'i khams na sgyu ma che// nga nyid mkha' 'gro zhes byar bshad// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor pa// mkha' 'grom ni 'bar ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin/
kyis/ de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas// mig gnyis gti mugardo rjer bshad// nyan ba zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod// sna ni sar snardo rje sa// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs/ de lus ni brag gordo rje
sta4 skyo mchod brams cad manyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid// stong pa'i tshul gyis mig gis ni// dogs pa med bar bsgom pa'i mchog/
rnam par mi rtog pa yis blta// nam mkha'i tshul gyis sems kyis ni// der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos// dogs pa yod pa'i sgom par ldan// rnam par mi rtog skye 'gyur zhes// rdo rje
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces
bya ba'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkha' mchog bdug par gyur pa'i bar// de sridasams can mtshungs med don//
mya ngan mi 'da' bar ni mdzad// de ltar sems can dam pa rnams // srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par// mi skyo bar na brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu sams can don rnams mdzad//
ba @#// nam mkha'i gnas kyi sa zlar grug par// smon lam rnam par spyod byed cing// sems can don brtson sems kyis ni// dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad// rtag tu 'dod
ze gas myos pa yis// lha yi 'di rnams dang nici/ gzhan yang skyo bo chags can phyir// 'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad// bde chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir// rtog pa rgyas par
