sgyug dbu ma bzung ba dag/ nyi shu dgu ba la ni bri// rlung gi phyi rol bzung nas ni// rus sbal rmi lam zla ba can// sum cu gcig la nyes 'gyur bri// slar yang rlung gi phyi rol bri// rus sbal rmi
lam zla la can// sum cu gsum par nyis 'gyur bri// dbu ma'i gnyis pa bzung nas su// slar yang nub kyi dang po can// sum cu lnga pas brgyan par bzhed// 'dugos pa rmi lam zla ba can//
da ni 'bal ba'ang sbyin bya ste// lho ya mtha' ni bzung nas su// slar yang de ngashin rlung dang ni// rlung gi phyi rol la bzung nas// 'bugs pa yis ni brgyan pa dag/ bcu bzhi pa la bri bar bya/
dbu ma'i gnyis pa bzung nas su// nub kyi dang po brgyan pa yis// sum nu lnga pa mdzes par bya// ri zhes bya ba'i stan gnas pa'i// dang go yin gsum ba dang// lce mtha'i stan la
gnas kha yi// rlung gi phyi la gzung bar bya// gti mug gis ni mdzes par bya// dbu ma'i dang po bzung nas su// rlung yang der ni spyan pa yi// bzhi bcu bdun pa brgyan par bya//
'bugs pa rmi lam zla ba can// shar gyi gsum pa bzung nas su// ra zhes bya ba'i 'og tu sbyin// lho mtha'i snyan la gnas pa yi// rlung gi phyi rol de nas bzung// gti mug gis ni
mdzes par bya// dbu ma'i dang po bzung nasan// de bzhin rlung dang bcas pa yis// ro'u+o mig bzhi bcu dgu pa la// brgyan pa mchog tu phan pa yin// 'khor 'di ni lha mo che// mchog
tuno ste rlag par byed// mar ngo ya ni tshes bcu dang// de bzhin yar ngo'i de nyid dam// yang na 'byung po'i mtshan mo la// thod pa 'i stan la gnas nas su// lho phyogs su na la bltas nas//
dug dang khrag dang gtum pa yi// sa bon gyis ni snag tsha bya// bar snang la na thod par blugs// mi yi rus pa'i sku gu yis// 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i sngags rnams btu// dang sha
chen gtor byin te// de nas las ni ra rtsam par bya// dmar ma ni sngon po yagi/ gos na khyad par dag tu bge/mchod pa rdo rje'i cho ga dang// de bzhin bsam gtan bzlas pa dag/ ji ltar/
sus kyang mi rtogs pa// de ltar sngags bas rtag tu bya// gsad la gshin rje'i rgyal po ste// yi dgas la ni ya dgas gzugs// ro langs la na ro langs dang// srin po srin pos mnan/
bar bya// stong la stong pa'i bad+ma ste// nges par 'joms pa'i grwa'u ni// sngags 'phreng rdo bzhin 'brang ba yi// rim pa de ltar brjod pa yin// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// sngags
[sa]@#// tshig bzhi ches rnam brgyan pa// rig rgyal 'khor la sgyur ba'i sngags// mkhyung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khrul ba khor chen po bcu gnyis ni// bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la
zabashad// 'di ni sdang ba thams cad kyi// de bzhin 'jigs byed mi bzad [”]yin// yang dgacho ga gang gis ni// dngos grub myur du 'jug byed pa// bza' dang ston mo 'dus ba yi// sgrub thabs
ts+tsha cho grwa de nas bshad// byugs rnams dag na dgugang nyid// sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pas bya// rgyu med pa yis phyugs rnams ni// rgyu mtshan med pas gzhom par bya// phyugs rnams dang ni de
bzhin lnga// bong bu ma dang rus sbal dang// rnga mo sbyar rta la sogs dang// khyi dang phag gi sha dag dang// thangs kyi gtsug phud can de bzhin// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtoram ni// ma dpyad par 'byas
gyur na// ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing// rgyal srid thams cad rab 'a khrub ces// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ngag/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro las/ 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o///tshe dang nad med spel ba
dang// bya dang bya man sbyor ba'i mchog/ dbugasakyi las la sogs mtshan nyid// nyon cag lha mo skal chen ma// nyi khri dang na chig stong dang// drug brgya ru ni brtsis pa ya// chu tshod drug
chu'i dbugs rnams kyis// nyin mtshan lo grags pa yin// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i 'bugs dag las// 'byung ba'i mtshan mas bgrang bar bya// blo dang ldan pas dbugs gnyis las//
'jug pa 'byung la thim par cu// gnas ni bcu gnyis dag tu yang// phyi rol mtshan ma gzhug par bya// tshes gros bye brag gsungs pa bzhin// dbyangs kyi bye brag shes par bya// gza'
rnams kyi ni bye brag dang// skar ma rnams kyi rgyu ba las// dug gi dug la sogs dang gzhan// rim pa 'di yis brjod par bya// dpyid zla ra ba nas brtsams te// nya ma byang du 'gro ba'i dus//
zla ba bcu gnyis po rnams ni// rim ni rim pa bzhin du bzhag/ shar gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas su// snga dro mkhas pas brtsi bar bya// tshes grangs gsum dang bcu gsum dang// bzhi dang
de bzhin bcu bzhi pa// lnga pa dang ni bco lnga pa// mtshungs pa nyid du sbyar bar bya// da ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon// 'di lta sta/ dang bo ni 'phul ba'o// gnyis pa ni gang mug go/ gsum
khan bzang bo'o// bzhi pa na khyu mchog gi/ lnga pa ni rus sbal la/drug pa na chu srin no// bdun pa ni yugs sa mo'o// brgyad pa nis ba'o// dgu pa na'i bugs ba'o// bcu pa na 'phyo
bgo// bcu gcig pa ni rmilam mo// bcu gnyis pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ dang bo na sa'i dbang phyug go/ gnyis pan 'phel ba'o// gsum pa ni gti mag go/ bzhi pa ni bzang po'o//
ca @#// lnga pa ni khyu mchog go/ drug pa ni rus sbal lo// bdun pa na chu srin no// brgyad pa ni yugs sa molo/ dgu pani smra ba'o// bcu pa ni 'a khugs pa'o// bcu gcig bani 'phyo ba/
zabacu la nyis pa na rmi lam mo// dang po na rmi lam mo// gnyis pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ gsum pa 'phel ba'o// bzhibani gti mug go/ lnga pa ni bzang pog/ drug pa ni khyu mchog go/ bdun
pa ni rus sbala'// brgyud pa ni chu srin no// dgu pa na yugs sa mo'o/ bcu pa na skye bgo/ bcu gcig pa ni 'bugs pa'o// bcu gnyis pan 'phyo ba'o// dang bo na 'phyo ba'o// gnyis pa
naglilam mo// gsum pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go bzhi pa ni'aphel ba'o// lnga po ni gti mug go/ drug pa ni bzang po'o// bdun pa ni khyu mchog go/ brgyad pa ni rus sbal// dgu pa ni
rgyu chu srin no// bcu pa ni yugs sa mo'i// bcu gcig pa na smyo ba'o// bcu gnyis pa 'bugs pa'o// dang po na 'khugs pa'o// gnyis pa na 'phyo ba'o// gsum pa ni rmi lam mo//
bzhi pa nasa'i dbad phyug go/ lnga pa ni phal ba'o// drug pa na gti mug go/ bdun pa ni bzang po'o// brgyad pa ni khyu mchog go/ dgu pa ni rus sbrul lo// bcu pa nichu srin no// bcu
gcig pa ni yugs sa min// bcu gnyis pa ni smra ba'o// dang po ni spyi ba'o// gnyis pa ni'abugs pa'o// gsum pa ni 'phyo ba'o// bzhi pa ni rmi lam mo// lnga pa ni sa'i dbang phyug
drug pa ni phal ba'o/ bdun pa ni gti mug go/ brgyad pa ni bzang po'o// dgu pa ni mkhyu mchog go/ bcu pa ni rus sbal lo// bcu gcig pa ni chu sen no// bcu gnyis pa na yug sa sa
mgo/ dang po ni yugs sachogro/ gnyis pa ni smra ba'o// gsum pa ni 'gugs pa'o// bzhi pa na 'phyo ba'o// lnga pa na rmi lam mo// drug pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ bdun pa ni 'phel ba'o//
brgyud pa ni gtige/ dgu pa ni bzang po'o// bcu pa ni khyu mchog ge/ bcu gcig pa na rus spal la// bcuganyis pa ni chu srin no// dang po ni chu srinano )gnyis pa ni yugs sa mogrwa/ gsum
pa nas ba'o// bzhi pa ni 'bugs pa// lta pa ni 'phyo ba'o// drug pa'i rmi lam mo// bdun pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ brgyad pa ni 'phel ba// dgu pa ni gti mug go/ bcu pa bzang
pa'o// bcu gcig pa ni khyu mchog go/ bcu gnyis pa na rus sbal lo// dang po ni rus sbal lo// gnyis pa ni chu srin no// gsum pa ni yugs sa mo'// bzhi pa na skye ba'o// lnga pa ni 'bugs
pa'o// drug pa ni 'phyo ba'o// bdun pa ni rmi lam mo// brgyud pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ dgu pa ni 'phel ba'o// bcu pa na gti mug go/ bcu gcig pa ni bzang bo'o// bcu gnyis pa na khyu mchog
go/ dung po ni khyumchog go/ gnyis pa ni rus sbal lo// gsum pa na chu srin no// bzhi pa ni yugs sa mo'i// lnga pa ni smo ba'o// drug pa 'bugs pa'o// bdun pan 'phyo ba'o// brgyad
@#// panirmi lam mo// dgu pa ni sa'i dbang phyug ge/ bcu pa ni 'phal ba'o// bcu gcig ba ni gti mug go/ bcu gnyis pa ni bzang po// dang bo ni bzang po// gnyis pa ni/
mchog go/ gsum pa na rus sbrul// bzhi pa ni chu srin go/ lnga pa ni yugs sa chog/ drug ban smra ba'o// bdun pa ni ba bugs ba'o// brgyud pan 'phyo ba'o// dgu pan rmilam kho// bcu pa ni sa'i
dbang phyug go/ bcu gcige pa ni 'phal ba// bcu gnyis la na gti mug go/ dang po ni gti mug go/ gnyis pa bzang botsho/ gsum pa na khyu mchog go/ bzhi pa ni rus sbale// lnga pa ni chu srin 'o//
drug pa'o yug sa molo/ bdun pa ni ba'o// brgyad pan 'bugs pa'o// dgu pa ni 'tsho bano/ bcu pa ni rmilab mo// bcu gcig pa ni sa'i dbang phyug go/ bcu gnyis pa na 'phel ba/
'phal pa zhig la skyes ba'i byis pani/ nyi ma dgu ba'am/ zla ba dgu pa 'am/ le dgun pa'i ched du ma gyur na/ khyug cing skal ba bzang ba dang/ sems gdumad cing nub la ma drod chung zhing yul mtha'
'khob kyigatso bo 'gyul/ g.yom pa la dga' ba dang/ thams cad du 'jam khor sna zhing nor dang ldan zhing nad med pa dang/ skyid pa la rtag par 'gyur te/ tshole brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'tshoste/ sa'i dbang

byugs gi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyulo sa'i dbang phyug gi 'gal btsas ba'i byis pa ni nyi ma brgyad pa 'am/ zla ba brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na nor dang 'bru rtag bar 'gyur zhing bden par stsal mdza'
cazhi bshes mang zhing chog shes pa dang/ mkhas la tshangs par spyod cing sems can kun la phan pa khyed la ) brjoshes pa dang/ 'jam bor zhing skal ba dang ldan te// bstan bcos thams cad rgyas par

gyur ba la the tshom med de/ tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa brgyad 'tshosta/ rmil gyi nyim la 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ninyi ma bzhi'am/ lnga 'am/ banu 'am/ min na zla ba brgyad
nam 3 lo brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ des blag nyon mongs par byed pa dang/ dpa' zhing rtul bod pas pha rol gnon ba dang/ dgra thams cad 'joms shing skye bo dam pa dang mdza' ba dang

skyabs med pa rnams kyi dbu nga gnyen byed cing thams cad du tshig lhung smra la sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed pa dang/ dbul zhing 'phyar ba dang ) nad med cing rtag tu bza' ba rnyed pa dang/ mthon po la brten

bas 'tsho zhing rtag tu sang ge dang 'dra bar sems te/ tshe lo drug cu 'tsho zhing/ 'phyo ba'i nyi ga la dgra'i mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba la sbe tshom med do// 'khyo ba'i nyin la btsas ba'i byis pa ni zla ba bzhi
ba dang/ drug pa dang/ dgu ba dang/ bcu ba la gal te shi chad du mgyur na/ de ni shes rab chung zhing blo dang me drod dman la/ snang ba mang zhing bu tsha mi 'tshol 'khor mang pa dang/ yo byad 'bal

[L]zhing sdug bsngal mang ba dang/ gnyen bdun thams cad dga' la/ ngan ngon la rtsi ba dang/ ro dang phyugs mang la chung ma gsum len cing cung zad tsam gyis khro ba dang/ nga rgyal che zhing dgra rnams
'jigs la khe phyogs kyis 'tsho// tshel brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'tsho zhing 'gugs pa'i nyi mal 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'bugs pa'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i phyis pa ni nyi ma gnyis pa
'am/ zla ba gnyis pa 'am/ bzhi pa 'am/ le brgyad pa 'ag/ bcu pa la gal te sha chad du ma gyuran/ de ni pha ma legs pa dang/ nog chung zhing rmongs pa dang/ sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan

zhing ngang tshul ldan la nad du can du 'gyur bdar tshangs par spyod cing dpa' la sdug pa dang/ sar snyadang ldan par 'gyur te/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa bzhir 'tsho la/ smra ba'i nyi ma la rang gi khyim du 'chi bar
'gyur ro// smra ba'i nyin la btsas pa'i byis pa ni/ nyi ma gnyis ba 'am/ lnga pa 'am/ zla ba gsum pa 'am ) dgu pa 'am ) lo dgu pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ des ni rang gi ragasastor
shing chog shes pa dang/ bstan bcos phun sum tshogs shing bzo sna tshogs rig pa dang/ dba' la nga rgyal che ba dang/ g.yo sgyu can yin la phrag dog dang ldan zhing nor nyur ba dang/ gzugs bzang
cha'ang byab thams cad yang ba yin te/ tshe le drug cu rtsa gsum du bde bar 'tsho la yugs sa mo'i nyi ma la chur 'chi bar gdon mi za'o// yugs sa mo'i nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa ninyi ma gnyis ra
'am/ bcu ba 'am/ zla ba gnyis pa 'am/ brgyud pa'am brgyad pa la gal te shi chad du ma gyur na/ re nasdig pa'i blo dang ldan zhing sems can kun bka'akhyal tshig smra zhing nor nyung la
phyar ba dang/ thams cad du nad kyis thebs la rgyal po'i chad pas gtsed cing/ bud med thams cad la skal ba bzang bor 'gyur la bzod dang dor thapas thams cad kyi bzo la mkhas pa ste/

tshe lo lnga bcu tsalnga 'am/ yang na sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho la chu srin gyi nyi ma la 'chi bar the tshom mdado// chu srin gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa na nyi ma bcu ba 'cha/ zla ba gsum pa 'om ) lnga pa/
'am/ le dgu pal ma shan bsod nams dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs shing ) zhi des dang/ bslab pa dang ldan ning/ nor dang/ gzugs dang/ skal ba phun sum tshogasal/ dbal dang
grags pa dang/ bu dang/ tsha 'pha la/ grong khyer gyi gtso bor 'gyur ba dang/ 'khor dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bzo dang dus kyi mtha' la mkhas pa dang/ dgra thams

cad rlag par byed do// tsho le lnga bcu rtsa lnga 'am/ yang na drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'tshol/ rus sbal gyi nyi ma la'achi bar 'gyur ro// rus sbal gyi nyi ma la btsas pa'i byis pa na nyi ma gnyis pa dang/
dgu ba dang/ zla ba brgyud pa dang/ lo dgu pa la ma shin/ da ni rtag tu sems khral che ba dang/ khro ba dang bcas shing cung zad kyis mgu ba dang/ mang du sa zhing gnyan rnams byams pa
dang/ rtag tu g.yon pa dang/ phyugs la gtong phod che ba dang/ bu dang chud ma gsod pa dang/ soms chung zhing bsam pa ngan pa dang/ zhing las kyis 'tsho zhing mdze nad kyis thebs te/
tshele drug du rtsa bzhi 'am/ brgyad cu tham b.ra'atsho la khyu mchog gi nyi ma la rang gi yul du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// khyu mchog gi nye ga la btsas pa'i byis pa ni nyi ma dgu ba 'am/ zla ba gnyis//

zo/ ba dang/ brgyad po 'a ma/ le brgyad pa dang/ dgu ba la gal te ma shi na da bgazhing rtul phod pas pha rolaganon la sgrog cing phyag ba dang/ chung ma mang du len la gnyen 'dun thams cad dga' zhing ba'i tshe/
'dzoms pa dang/ kha slogs dang/ ga lo ma pa la dga' zhing le lo dang/ mu cor du sa ba dang/ ngang tshul ngan pa dang/ las gdug pa la dga' sta/ tshe le drug cu 'am/ tishur 'tshol bzang bo'i
nyi ma la mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// bzang bo'i 'o ma la btsas pa'i byis pa na nyi ma lnga pa kham/ zla ba dgu pa 'am/ lo bcu pa la ma gi na/ de ni dbulazhing chos la bden par sna ba dad ) snyan
par sla ba dang/ chung ma gcig la dga' zhing rig pa'i bdag por 'gyur ba dang/ bzo dang dus thams cad shes shang rang ga gnyen 'dun byams pa dang/ rigs kyi 'chad pas 'tsho ba ste/ tshele brgyar
'tsho la/ gti mug gi nyi ma la tshur 'chi bar 'gyur ba las gzhan du ma yin no// gti mug gi nyi ma la btsas pa'i phyis pa na nyi ma gnyis pa 'am/ zla ba dgu pa 'am/ la dgu pa la gal te sha chad du ma

gyur na mang du za zhing sems chur la rtag tu gu lom pa la dga' ba dang/ rgyun du khro zhing brkam chags che la/ nad bu can du 'gyur ba dang/ yid 'dazhungs shing gnyen 'dun byams pa dang/ rtag tu khro ba

dang nga rgyal can du 'gyur ba dang/ rangatshul ngan zhing sdug sbyod la tshig rtsub dang 'tshul ba la dga' ba dang/ mtshon cha brdeg pa la dga' ste/ tshe lo drug cu rtsa bzhi mtsho la/ phal ba'i nyin la yan//

lag gi zug rngu dang skrangs 'bur gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba la ji tsom medago/ 'phel ba'i nyi ma la nad kyis khebs na shin tu bag bya dgos te/ gal te zhag bco lngal ma shin de ni nyi ldan 'atshobar gyur/

sa'i dbang phyug la nyi ma gsuman ma shin de nas nyi ma bdun 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// tshilam la'ang nyin gsum na ma shi na de bzhin du nyi ma bdun 'tsho'o// 'khyo bal ni nyi ma gsum mam/ lnga la 'tsho'achi
byed de// 'bugs ral nito ma gsum mam/ bzhi ba la mashi na shi ma bcu na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// smra ba la ni nyi ma gsum pa las che ba'am brgyad pa 'tsho un par du nad kyis gdung bar 'gyur
ro// yugs sa mo lani'i ma lnga la dmi ba 'am dgu pa la ldang bar 'gyur la zhag bcu nand las grol bar 'gyur// chu srin la ni nyi ma brgyad pa 'chi ba 'am zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis
'chi 'tsho phyid bar 'gyur ro// rus sbal la ni nyi ma brgyad pa la ma shi na de nas zhag bcu ba la nad las grol bar 'gyur// khyu mchog lan nyi ma gsum pa 'am ) lnga ba la ma shinand cung zad bcas

bar 'gyur shing brgyad pa la ldang ngo// bzang bo la ni nyi ma brgyad pa dang bcu ba la mngashin de nas grol bar 'gyur ro// gti mug la ni nyi ma gsum pa 'am/ bdun ba la ma shin de nas grol bar 'gyur ro
gang gi mche bas mngon zamin// 'chi bdag dang ni mngon par 'grogs// dug bstsab yi sbyor ba yis// de rnams ji ltara'agrub 'gyur zhing// tshe dang nad mod rgyal ba'i phyir//
gzhanalatsho ga ji ltar sbyar// bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun gyi nad rnams // gzhom zhing bslang bar bya ba dang// shi ba rnams kyang 'tsho 'gyuran// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// de
sgo rnams bsod nams tsho'agyur ba// chu yi sbyin sreg tsho gan// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ba// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// sa yi cha ni yid 'ong la// kha dog dkar po dra yis byug/ me tog/
'phrang dkar gyis brgyan cing// rgyal mtshan bla res 'bar byas par// tshe banag po ra 'ad// thum ra chu yis bkangasogs pa// de dbus lha mo bsam pa na// pad+ma'i stan la yang dag bzhugs//
zhal gcig phyag na gnyis ba ste// shin tu mdzes ba'i na bzas klubs// rgyana rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// pad+ma'i 'phrang bsamadzes par byas// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor las// gangs dang
tsha kunod zla 'dra ba'i// bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa yis// dug gi mthu ni 'phrog par mdzad// lha mo'i sbyor ba 'di lta bu s// bsams na dug ni'ajoms par 'gyur// 'o mna' bor gyur bar//
chun pas rang du zil mnan pa// slar yang bdug pas bdug bar bya// dpyid zla ra sogs rim bzhin du// nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe// ji lta'i dus bzhin mtshan ma ni// rim gyis sbyar bar bya ba yi//
byang gi nyin mo la ni chu tshod dag/ mkhas pas bzhi dang bcu gnyis khaskyag/ mtshan mo drug dang bcu gsum bsgyur// chu tshod mkhas pas brtsa par bya// re'u mig dag ni gnyis pa la// dus la mkhas pas
mtshan ma bya// nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis bsgyur// chu tshod kyinamtshan ma bya// bzhi dang pan gsum bsgyur ba ni// mtshan mo'i chu tshod dun brtag/ brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag/ nyin mo
ru ni brtag par bya// gnyis dang bcu na gsumaM bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du na brtag/ chu tshod sum cu tham pa// dbus kyi pi 'u gnyis dkar sbyar// gnyis dad bcu na gsum po dag ]

nyin mo'i chu tshod shes bya ste// brgyad dang bcu gnyisaM bsgyur pa dag/ de yi mtshan mo'i mtshan mar bya// bzhi dang bcu gsum mtshan ma ni// nyin mo la ni chu tshod do// drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba//
mtshan mo'i chu tshod mtshan// drug dang btsun gsumo bsgyur ba// nyani mo yir ni shes bya ste// bzhi dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags// de bzhin lhor ni'agro ba
ya/ dus shes pa ni bshad par bya// bzhi dang gsum bstsor chu tshod ni// nyin mo yir ni bshad pa yin// drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// mtshan mo yi ni mtshan mor bya// gnyis dang
bsu na gsum bsgyur ba// de bzhin nyin mo'i chu tshod yin// brgyad dar bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// chu tshod mtshan gyir rab tu grags// bcu ni gsum du bsgyur ba dang// bi shu'i nyin mo'i chu ]
@#@#// tshor de// de bzhinamtshan gyi chu tshod kyang// bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba// nyin mo ya ni bsam par bya// gnyis dang btsun
gsum bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni ba rtag/ drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// nyin mo'i chu tshod rim pa yin// bzhi dang bcu na gsum bsgyur ba// de bzhin mtshan mo'i chu tshod do//
sum brgya drug cu'i 'bugs kyis ni// chu tshod kyi ni dus rnams bzla// chu tshod drug cu'i grangs kyis ni// nyin mtshan phrugs gcig tu ni brjod/ zla ba'i go rim ji bzhinadu// rim pa de
bzhin mtshan ma bya// chu tshod dbugs nirdzogs dang po// rim gyis 'phel zhing rim gyis 'bri// las dang las min bye brag bzhin// 'bugs ni rim gyis gzung bar bya// mkha'
tshe 'gro gnyis dang dus tshigs dang// bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya// gnyis po dag ni bcur bsgyur ba// de bzhin tshe yi chu tshod do// de yi mtshan ma ldan pa yis// nyin mtshanagyin
dbugs su brtsi// ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzung nas// dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon par gzhag ma ning gnyis ni sbyangs nas su// sa yi dbang phyug kun tu gzhag/ a yi rim pa la
bab na// dang la dang mngon par mnyis 'grogs shing// nor med par ni snang ba ste// skal ba bzang por gdon mi za// A yi re'u mig la bab na// rims dang nad kyis gzir ba dang//
'jigs shing skrag par snang 'gyur bas// a zhes bya bas nges par ston// yi ge e la bab gyur na// rgyal po'i dpal ni star 'gyur te// kun nas nor ni rnyed pa dang// gang zhig bsams pa/
de'agrub 'gyur// yi ge A la babagyur na// zla ba drug na'achi ba dang// de bzhin dgras ni gzer ba dang// ma yis 'jigs par shes par bya// yi ga u la bab gyur na// dpal ldan grogs
mosnyad pa dang// nor dang 'bru ni ya la ba dang// dpala rnams kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur// u gal te bar gyur na// de ni dgra yis 'tsho bar snang// bran gza' dang ni gnyen tshan rnams //
jigs shangasgrag par snang bar 'gyur// yi ga el bab gyur na// 'phral du skye bsal can gyur// skyes pa bud med dwag gis ni// mchod pa'i gnas 'di 'thob par 'gyur//
mtshan ma la lhung na// dgra dang rgyalaM po'i 'jigs pa dang// lus canarkun pos gzir 'gyur zhing// nad dang rin sa kyis thebs par 'gyur// o yi mtshan ma la bab na// gnas kyi
dbang por 'gyur ba dang// nor dang 'khru na nyid 'gyur zhing// yid 'ong rim pa de bzhin no// oM ya mtshanam la baban// 'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe zhing// gnas lasanyams dang
brdeg khatsog dang// byas pa chud na zos par bgyur// yici oM la babagyur na// bran bza' dag ni rnyed 'gyur zhing// budang rig pa rnyed 'gyur te// de bzhin grogs po red par 'gyur/
tsa ]@#// ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes bag/ de bzhin mtha' ma'ang gzung bar bya// drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su snga ma de bzhin sum 'gyur bya// sum brgya drug cur bsros nas su// sa
gzhirun bcad nas kyang// yigi lhag ma bzung byas te// dge dang mi dpe mtshon par bya yong na ra mi kyag kyog bri// dbyangs kyi dang bol sogs bgrang// langan me tog gtor nasan/ de bzhin
san mtshon par bya// yang n snga dro bo ta'i// dus su rtsi ba bo yas blta// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rab rgyas pa'o/ bcu gnyis kyinanas rab tu// sems ni bskyed pa'i cho gro bshad// ro hita'i
dus bdag nyid bsam// sa dbang phyug la de bzhin khyis// rmi lam la ni skrunagyi bsam/ bya kul la nye du so/ li hri la na bu la bsam// smra ba la ni dgra yir bstan// ra la ni sbyar ba bsam/ ma
kar la gso dpyad don// rus sbalaM lan chos kyi don// khyu mchog la ni drag po'i las/ khazang bo la ni nor shes ga/ gti mug la ni kun tu 'khrug/ 'phal ba la ni rig byedan// don rnamasa'agrub
par 'gyur ba dang// nor dang 'bru dang phrad pa dang// grogs po smug dang phrad par 'gyur// dus ni ring por mi stod cing// myur du phrad 'gyur gdon mi za// sa dbang phyug la reg tsam gyis// lam
[H ]du 'gro ba nyid dang ni// kha zas sogs dang bu dang nor/ las kyi bsam pa ston par byed// rmilamalananor chud cing// mtshod pa thob cing grogs dang phrad// gnyen bshos yid ni dga' ba dang// zhi

zhing dgos pa 'ang 'grub par ston bya ku la la mya ngan dang// khyad par can gyi don nyams shange// gnyen 'dun dang ni 'bral bar 'gyur// ba hrimyos ni stor ba dang// byams par smra ba rnyed 'gyur te//
bun rgyab mthong bar 'gyur// mi ki ri la rtsod pa dang// ca cos kun tunyon mongs shig/ chos bo bkran mashis dang// gnyena' dunand kyis thebs par 'gyur// ran da la ni btung dang bza'
gos dang rgyan la sogs rnyed cing// stor ba slar yang rnyed pa dang// bud med sdug dang ldan par 'gyur// ma ka ra la sems khral dang// don gnyer 'bras bu med par 'gyur// yid 'ong nor dang 'bral
'gyur zhing// 'dod pa rnams dang phrad 'gyur// rus sgra la lan skal bzang zhing// zhi dang srung dang bkra shis 'gyur// stan dang nor dang btung brnyed// khyu mchog la ni las rnams la// rgyal
bo'i chad pas nges par 'jigs// mya ngan dang na gnas su 'gro/ khyobral dag na mthong bar 'gyu// bzang po la longs spyod dang// don rnams thams cad des par 'grub// mchod pa'i gnas
'gyur grogs dang ni/ khakra shis dgana' byung bar 'gyur// gti mug la na dono rnams kun// snying bo med pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs// gnas bcingasanas lam gyi ni// 'du shes dag ni mthong bar
'gyur// nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo// yan lag gi ni mtshan ma rnams // 'phal ba'i nyi ma la mig ga yon nga 'gulan/ phadang ma sgrig par 'gyur ro// sa'i dbang phyug lan mdzes par snang ngo//
[:]// rmi lam la'i gos rnyed do// 'byob la ni nor red de// 'bugs ba ni ma dad pa la nyes don 'byung ngo/ smra ba la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro/ g.yugs sa mo la ni gnyen 'dun 'ong ngo/
chu srin la na bgo ba rnyed do// rus sbal la ni 'thab rtsod do// khyu mchog la ni byang phyogs nas bgron bo 'angago/ bzang po dang/ gti mug la de bzhin du bgo ba'o// 'phal ba'i nyi ma la mig g.yas pa
blo 'gul ba'i 'dras bu'ang snga ma bzhin no// sa'i dbang phyug lo na ci'i mtshan mar yang mi 'gyur ro// rmi lam la ni 'thab rtsod do// bya ku li la ni lam rings kyi gtam thos par 'gyur ro// 'bugs
pa la ni nor nyams par 'gyur ro// smob la ni nor rnyed pa 'gyur ro// yugs sa la ni du bar ston no// chu srin la ni cir yang mi 'gyur ro// rus sbal la ni bgo ba rnyed do// khyu mchog
la ni stor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// bzang po la ni 'gron po 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gti mug la ni pho nyadang phrad do// yang 'o hi ta'i nyi ma la rna ba g.yas pa du na bud med dang phrad do// sa'i dbang
phyug gis ni mdzes bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyis na mgu bar 'gyur bya ku lasani ba tung ba rnyed do// bi Ti sa na cung zad skrag par 'gyur ro// mi ki ris kyang de bzhin no// ran das na mya ngan
[I ]gyis 'dzin// ma karos ni mdzes par 'gyur ro// kur bas ni 'gron po 'ing go/ ba ra b+has byams sdug tu 'gyur// bzang pos ni mnyes par 'gyur ro// gtilug gis ni cir

[4]/ yad mi 'gyur ro// ro ha ti'i nyi ma la rna ba g.yon ba du na bza' ba dang btung ba 'od par 'gyur ro// sa'i dbang phyug gis ni dag par 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyis ni sngon ma mthong ba cung zad mthong bar 'gyur
ro (bya ku la bcings par 'gyur ro// bi Ti la'athab rtsod 'byung ngo/ mi ki ri la gzhan dag 'ong ngo// ron da bstor brlag thosaM bar 'gyur ro// ma kar la shi chad blogo par 'gyur ro// kur
mal mya ngan gyis 'dzin no// bri ga lha la dge bar ston no// bzang bos ni gtam ngan thos par 'gyur ro/ ro hita'i nyamal rkang ba g.ya' na mi chen po 'ong ngo// sa'i dbang phyug gis khyim dge
bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyisan su zhig 'ong bar ston no// bya ku lis ni mgo ba rnyed do// bi Tis ni sams khral skya'o/ mi ki ris ni bde bar ston no// ran dus ni skyagag/ ma karas ni
khyim 'thol lo// kur mas nagu zhig 'chi ba'aston to// khyu mchog gisani 'gron po 'ong bar ston to// bzang pos ni tshom po'ang bar ston te// gti mug gis ni khyim mdzes par ston to/
ro hi ta'i nyi ma la lus thams cad g.yon 'thab rtsod dang skyo sngogs 'byung ngo// sa'i dbang phyug gis ni nor rnyed do// rmi lam gyis ni 'jig par 'gyurar// bya ku las ni ma dang pha la nyes
dona'abyung ngo// bi Tis las nye bar gnas par ston to// miki so pha ma sag bskye bar 'gyur ro// ran das ni lho phyogs nas 'gron po 'ong bar ston to// ma ka ras skya bsang 'od ba
'u@#// ston to// kur mas ni 'gron po blo bur 'ong ngo// kha b+has ni mya ngan stsa'o// ba Tis ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo// gti mug gis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dranan// rehi ta'anyi
ma la rkad pa'i sha 'gul na dgagro/ sa'i dbang phyug kyang de bzhinano// rmi lam gyis ni gtam bdag 'ong ngo// bya ku lis ni'athob rtsod do// baTasan bdag po mdzes par gyur ro// mi kar

kyang 'thab rtsod do// ran ras ni 'thab rtsod dang skyo sngogs su 'gyur ro// ma karas kyang de bzhinan// kur mas ni de nyid du su zhig 'chi bar ston to// dri ba b+has ni gos red do// pa trasani nad dang

phrad par 'gyur ro// mo ha tas ni mya ngan dang phrad par 'gyur ro// 'phal ba nor rgyas bu yin te// gti mug de bzhin 'jog po stobs kyis rgyu ba ste// khyu mchog pad+ma shas bya ste// rus sbal de bzhin
pad+ma// chu srin du ni dud sbyong gsungs/ yugs sa mo ni mtha' yas bshad// rigs ldan skye bar shes par bya// 'bugs pa mgo brgya ba zhes bya// 'phyo ba yid kyis 'gro bas// rmi lam gtsugs
pa zhes bya yin// sa yi dbang phyug char 'bebs so// lha mo bcu gnyis 'di dag na// tshe gnas rten 'brel bcu gnyis dngos// de ltar sa rnams shes byas nas// dge dang tshe dge brtag pa bya//
de nas dus su bgrod pa na// khahaMd kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// dga' ba skad cig nyid dang na// 'bras bu'i yan lag bye brag rnams // sum 'gyur du ni bsgyur byas te// kun la rkang pa bzhi yis dgang/

capa/ mdud pa kha cad nyid 'char ba yi// dus ni de ltar brjod pa yig/ chad pa bgeg dang gza' rnams dang// mdung dang dgra rnams ltung ba dang// khyim sa yi ni dpyad dag la// lto 'phyu'i lter na brko ba dang//

'gro 'ong sbyor ba'i bye brag dang// tshe dang nad mad stsal ba dang// de bzhin sa bon gdab pa dang// phyug rnams ji ltar gdul ba dang// bral dang 'du dang rgyal srid dang// rnyed pa dgan srung bya zhing// yid

dang byung dang g.yul 'gyod dang// ldeng bu'i phung po de bzhin te// byis pa gso ba'i sgrub pa dang// mig sman khyad par de bzhin te// dus dang tshod la sogs pa nyid// nyin dang nyin gyis dbye bar bya//
bcud kyis len dang rtsi rnam gnyis// lasan yongs su smin par bya// semasa' phol mnyam par 'jug pa yis// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin te// de ltar rtsi dang bcud len sogs// blo dang 'bad ba
shesamya zhes// dam tshig kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rjemakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje soms dba' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo
rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'du gas rtsis zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu go sa ba/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dngos grub mchog gi ga ba la// sgyu ma chen bo zhes bya ba// gsang
ba chen po'i dbang phyug ste// sems can thams cad gdulamadzadaganyon// dbang phyug thams cad byed pa bo// 'di ni rig pa dam pa mchog/ ming can mchog tu rnyed dka' daM// dang po chos kyi 'byung gnas/
dur kya/ bsam// de nas yi ga dgod par bya// dbyangs yig dang po thig ler bcas// pad+ma'i stod du yang dag gnas// rtag tu 'bugs kying ba ste/ 'byung ba run byed pa yin// 'bar
ba'i 'phreng bas mdzes pa'i mdog/ phyogs kun tu ni rnam par 'phro// sna tshogs mdud pa'i 'bar ba che// zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom par bya// kun tu 'gro ba'athob 'gyur zhing/ 'di nirId dka'i
sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nyid spangs pas yi ga med// 'gyur med rtog pa med pa ste// dung dang zla 'dra dri mad pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya// rang gi dbus su gyur pa na// 'dab brgyad
brgyas shin tu brgyan// de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni// gangs dang 'dra bar 'dzag pa ste// mchog tu zhi ba'i hi la ni// dbyangs yig drug pa dang sbyar nas// thig les stong du brgyan pa yi// yi ge rgyud
bas dgod par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub byed// dngos dang dngos med rnams spangs ra'o// rang gi mgrin pa 'i dbus gnas bar// bar dmar po kun rtog mdzes// der ni thig le zla ba yis/
brgyanapa'i dpyadas yig bcu gsum pa// pu lu ta zhes bya bar grags// mgo la klad pa'i dbus gnas bar// thig le'i gzugs can mi shigs pa// a tas ya ma tog bzhin// 'og tu bltas shing
'phyang ba ste// nyin dang mtshan du bdud rtsi yi// tshul gyis 'bab pas yang dag gnas// dang po 'khor lo bsgoms nas na// dbyangs yig gis ni khyad par sbyar// rang gi phyagargyur mngon ldan pas//
cha/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu star// de yi brtul zhugs pa bshad de// sbyin srog las dang sngags rnams dang// bzung ba dang ni bgrang 'phreng dag/ gcig nas gcig tu ldeg par 'gyur// sngags kyi
dkyil 'khor dbyibs chos dag/ sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste// dug med byas nas nan tan du// brtanabya 'di ni brten byas nas// srid pa'i longs spyod dag 'gyur zhing// srid pas srid pa
mchog gi bdag/ ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa 'di rtag tu rgyan goms byas// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rdorjesams dang 'a mnyam
'gyur zhes// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungag/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa// b+ha ga'idabus su bsgom par bya/ de yi dbus gyuras bonon//
sngo zhing cung zad dmar ba'i 'od// 'od zer sngon po'i 'phrang 'khrugs las// 'dam skyes sngon bo lta bu yi// zhal gcig phyagakhan spyanagasum pa// mgo sa kham pa gyen 'greng zhing// rgyan
rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// rked pa stag gi pags pas dkris// phyag na lcags kyu zhags pa dag/ mda' dang gzhu ni mchog tu 'gengag/ in+danIl lta bu ste// dang po'i yig las
byung bsgom// gang gi rig pa rab sbyor bas// kun nas de mthog tu 'grub// dmarapo ru na bsgoms nas su// de nas cho ga bzhin du bya// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par// srid pa gsum
@#// pokhasgom par bya// 'bad pas bsgrub bya snang byas te// slar yang de nyid du ni bzhug/ des ni sa gsum ma lus pa// sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur// tshangs dang khyab/
'jug drag po dang// dbang pa dang na 'dod lha sogs// yi ge phan tshun bskul ba yas// chung ma dang ni bcas te 'gugs// bcom ldan de ni shesaM bya ba// spyod nga 'o gar gyi gtso bo yani//
de nas dbus ma'i mtha' dang ldan// thig le sa yis yang dag ma// sku gsung thugs la legs gnas par// dngos po bsgom pas bsgom byas na// gong bu dgug pa'i dam pa yin// b+ha ga ye
nad dus gyur par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom byas la// yi ge mi 'gyur rdzogs pa las// sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa// rdo rje dang ni kha TaM bsnams// dpa' bo spyi gtsug zla phyed brgyan
gshor dang bod pa bad bsnams pas// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// rlung dang ma ning dag ldan// tshudang dbang chen mnan pa ste// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spyi/ 'bad de bsgrag
byu dmigs nan// khu ba dgug pa'i dam pa yin// rtsi yi ye shes las byung ba// sku mdog ser po kun tu 'bar// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// mgor sa skrod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyun/
sdigs mdzub rdo rje zhags pa dang// ka pA la na phyag g.yon na// g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba dang// de bzhin du ni lcags kyu'i mchog/ rta zhal tshul du byas nas ni// tshong 'gugs pa yi dam
pa yin// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// 'od zer dmar po drag chen po// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// rgyan kun gyis nirnam par klubs// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhir// lce sbyang gi ni/
gdong can te// kha dz+wa ga dang thod pa dang// rdo rje de bzhin ral gri bsnams// khrag gis gang ba'i lus can sgom// 'bad de bsgrub bya dmigs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor le spro//
rdo rje phra mos phug nas su// 'jib pa nyid du rab bsgoms na// khrug dgug pa yi dam pa zhes// skya ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes grags pa// de rjesams dpa'
de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po dpal rdo rjen kha' 'gro las/ slam kun tu rnam par 'phrul ba'i rim pa phyi bas bcu gcig pa'o//
rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs ni// bshad par bya yis lha cha nyon// dang bo'i ro na bsgrogs byas te// mkhas pas chos dbyings rang bzhin bsam// rnal 'byor pan der
gnasanas// go 'phang mchog ni bsgomo par bya// rang snying zla ba'i dbus su ni// de nyid thams cad bkod nas su// de la 'od zer las byang nga// mkha' 'gro ma sogs mchod nas ni// phyag
byas nasani 'di skad brjod// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams // kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// dus 'di nas bzung ji srid du// byang/
@#// chub snying por mchis kyi bar// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams // yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa// de bzhin bla med byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyod
par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bskyod sdom pa// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams te mchog tu gzung// bslab pa yi ni
tshul khrims dang// dag pa'i chos ni bsdu ba dang// sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis so sor brtan por gzung// rdo rje rigs mtho chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgyu yang/
yang dag nyed du gzung bya zhing// slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis gzung// rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi stsal
bar bgyi// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos yang dag gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la//
mchod pa ci nus bgyi ba dang// sdomaM pa thamasacad ldan par bgyi// bla na med nga 'i byang chub sems// dam pa de ni bskyed bgyi zhing// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sdom pa ma lus
I]gzung bar bgyi// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing// 'gro kun mya ngan 'das la dgod// de nas o snga

bzhib+hA ba shud+d+ha: sarbad+d+harmA: sba b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ de nas tshig 'di brjod nas chos thams cad bdag med par blta sgyu/ de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dba' de bzhin gshags// sku//
modog sngon po 'a jigs chen po// byed pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par klubs// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum gyis nimadzes pa ste// yi dgas chen po gdan du byas// nyi ma la
zhugs gur dang ldan// phyag na thod pa kha TaM dang// de bzhin gzhan yang gzhu dang mdag/ tshogab bya ba de nyid kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// shar ni dkar zhing 'od sngo to// g.yon na
kha []dril bu dang/ gzhanan rdo rje thod pa'i// byang phyogs mar gad sar skya'i 'od// g.yon na kha TaM zhags pa dang// g.yas na rje'u chung thod pa bsnams// nub phyogs dmar zhing sar skya'i
'od gzhu dang mda' yi mchog dang ni// sna tshogs pad+ma thod pa dag/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag tu dgod// lhan dkar zhing sar ba'i 'od// g.yon na mdung dang rin chen te// g.yas na
ba dan thod pa bsnams// glang chen lce spyang ma dwang ni// glang gi thod par rim bzhin bzhugs// dang po ltung byed ma yin te// gnyis pa de bzhin gsod ma yin// gsum pa 'gugs ma
zhes bya ste// bzhi pa gar gyi dbang phyug mo// rig ma de dag rgyanas 'bar// rgyun rnams thams cad rnam par klubs// gar dang ldan pas yang dag bzhugs// phyogs mtshams dag ni
ku/ bzhi po ru// thod pa rnam pa bzhi bo dgod// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis rnam brgyan pa// spyi gtsug gsal bar lang dgaldan// dang bo'i yi ge ldan pa ru// bsgoms na
skad cig de la 'bar// rdzas kyi dngos grub 'bras rab ster// lha mo de ltar bsgoms nani// sbyor ba'i dngos grub rig pa cho// yid ches yang dag 'jug par 'gyur// mi snang pa dang thams cad dang//
sgrub bos skad cig gis mthong 'gyur// lha mchog las skyes phrogs nas su// sangs rgyas kun gyi bu mo spyod// gang+ga'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams // nyid kyi rdo rje gnas bzhugs pa// lag tu shing

thog bzhag pa bzhin// rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang+ga'i bye snyad zhang dag na// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyidi rnams // thams cad rang gi sams rjid kyis// ri mo las byung mthong bar 'gyur/
sngags kyi yi ge go bzlog pas// rgyun dang sngags ni bsgom par bya// gsang chen dam pa de dag ni// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// tho rangs rang gi snying stsakhar ni// a lasaM zla ba'i dkyil
'khor bsam// de stong yig rtsu bsgoms la// byams ba'i sems na bskyed nas su// de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi dang// kha khyer de bzhin rdo rjes mtshan// skud pa
bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dar gyi phreng bas mdzes par byas// dkyil 'khor grwa rnams thams cad dang// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rdzo che rnams smras par bya// phyi yi dkyil
00/'khor gdab par bya/ shes rab can gyis de'i nang du// 'khor lo'i 'phreng bas rnam brgyan te// de'i dbus su pad+ma ni// dkar pos shin tu mdzes bar bya// slar yang de yi dbus gyur ba
'od ldan bod+ma dmar bo// denas sngags pas de'i nang du// rdo rje 'phrang pa kun 'khrugs bri// slar yang bad chen 'dab brgyad dang// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar bri// rdo rje ka kha'i nang legs su//
dgyila'akhor lngas na rnam brgyan ba// ri rab lhun po'astong du// sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong bsam// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje so/
dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje cin gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rdzomakha' 'gro las/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcuganyis pa'i ke
de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dngos grub thams cad ra bsgyur// gang zhag shes pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// a ni snartsor bsamA
nas su// kha ni ling ga'i lte bar bsam// de nas mnyam par sbyar byas te// rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor la kun// pad+ma'i lte brnamos su sgyur// a ba d+ma po'i gnas de bzhin// smin ma'i
bar du gzhag par bya// dbyangs yig dang bor yang dag ldan// bsgoms na skad cig del 'bar// de nas 'bar 'brong rgya mtshor ni// kun nas sgo yi 'khor lebasam// lta ba
[r/ ge]// snying kha kha dang ni// dpral stong spyi gtsug 'khor lo ni// dang po sngags tshogs byinagyis brlab// lte ba snying khar rnal 'byor ma// lce gnyis dwar 'a bos byin gyis
brlab// dpa' bo dang ni rnala'abyor ma// gnyis medacho ga ji bzhin du// mgal me'i 'khor la gnas pa// mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin 'khor// glog lta bu r ni gsal ba'i 'od// yid
shugs chen pos rig nga che// lha ya rnal 'byor dus sun// phyogs bcu rnams su sngo bar bya// shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshogs ni// shin tu phra ba'i dngos por bsgom// 'gyur ba med cing
snang ba med// kun mkhyen 'bras bu skor ba'o// ma tog lan gnas bsams te/ de gang la byin de rgyas 'debs 'gyur// dung dang zla 'dra'i 'od mdzad pa// ltung byedam yi sbyor ba bsam/
bsgrub bya kha ru bcug nasan// ldabashad bzlas na ltung bar 'gyur// de nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i// mdung tshul nyi ma'i 'odicanani// bskal pa'i mi ltar rab 'jigs pa'i// gsod ma bsams te
yid kyis su// bsgrub par lhan tsagi gcig gyur nas// stong du bltasan 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas rlud dang mo yi ni// dkyil 'khor la gnas ma sdugag/ phung po 'phro ba'i 'gugs gabasam// yid
kyis bsgrub bya'i snying zhugs to// de la snying ni rtsa nas dbyung// 'gugs ma'i sngags bzlas 'gug par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyi ni// rlung mdog bsgrub bya rlung nang bsam// slar
yang bdag dang bsgrub byin brlab// gcig tu gyur te gar mdzad ma'i// sngags zlosangashing ni gar byas na// gar byed du ni 'jug par 'gyur// mchod pa rdo rje rab sbyor gyis// de nas las rnams kun
bsgrub bya// snying kha nyid dang de bzhin la// mgo dang spyi gtsug mtshon cha ste// lte ba snying kha rnams sun// dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya// dang po rjerdzasogasad ba ste// gnyis pa pad+ma

garedabang rgyal// gsum pa rnam par snang mdzad de// de bzhin bzhi pa rta mchog rgyal// lnga pa rje rje nyi ma ste// drug pa he ru kar na brjod/ slar yang lte ba snying kha dang// de bzhin kha dang mgo dang
ni'i[]spyi gtsug mtshon cha nyid dag ste// rdzordza phagamog shin rje ma// de bzhin rmongs ma bskyod ma so// skrag ma dang ni gtum mo rnams // drug po 'di dag rin po che// pha rol phyin pa rnam bdug/
de nas dbang bskur bsgoms nas ni// phyi nang mchod pa brtsam par bya// bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ rnyedapal ldan he ru ka dran bya// dam tshig ye shes gcig gyur bas// des 'di rdo rje tsan du
brjod// rnal 'byor 'di na mchodachen dang// de bzhin sngags kyi dgod pa ste// de nas da bab bo mchod shes nas// lasani 'bad pa nyid kyis bya// sngags pas rang dgar dbye bya ste// phyin ci log tu
nges par sbyar// tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i// las kyi mdog du rnam par sgom// de nyid dbye bas phye nasan ]/rtsa yalam du sbyar bar bya// sbyor ba yini donanams la// dga' ba chen po
[s @]/ 'dis bsgrub bya/ cho ga 'di yis bsgrubasan ni// lha dang lha min mir bcas 'grub// mkhaga'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog//
za rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo tsho can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen bo dba'ardo rje mkha' 'gro las/ dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa dang/ las kyi tshogasarnam
lha 'byung ba'i rin bar bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o/// de nas sku gsung thugs kyi ni/ 'khor lor gnas pa'i bya brug dang// gnas kyir ba tu dbye ba dang// yul gyi dbye ba bad
par bya// mgo na ma la ya yul te// spyi gtsug dza lan+d+ha ra yin// orgyan rna ba g.yos ba sto// ar bu dan rgyab phyogs yin// gnas kyi ming cananam bzhi'o// god pa 'i rnag yon te/ rA ma
shAri dbus su gsung// mig ni de si ke To lta// darungo pa mAl ba zhes brjod/ 'di dag ta ba gnas yin te// gnas kyi khyad par tshul gyi ni (mkha' spyod thugs kyi 'khor lor gnas// kAm

du mchan khung de bzhin du// nu ma o trar rab tu grags// de dag zhing ni lte ba ni// tri sha ku nizhes bya yin// sna yi rtse mo kos la/ de dag nye ba'i zhing du brjod// kha na ka ling ka yin te/ mgrin
ba'-i ba ka ru brjod// tshan de bzhes bya bar grags// snying kha ka zhes bya ste// chu so ha mal zhes#// nye ba'i rol sar brjod pa yin// gnas kyi khyad par tshul gyis ni// sa spyod gsung gi
'khor lor gnas// mtshanani yi dgas gnas pa ste// kri ha de ba bshang ba'i lam// de dga' dun sar brjod pa ste// brla ni sorAhazhes bya// byin pa gnyis ni gser gling stsa// nye pa'i/
'dun sa nyid yin no// sor mo rnams ni na ga ra// rkang pa'i bol ni sin+d+ha ste// dur khrod ces ni bya bar brjodo// mthe bong ma ru zhes bya ste// bus mo ku lu tAzhes brjod// nye ba'i dur khrod sa
gi ni// sku yi 'khor lor yang dag gnas// rang lus skyes pa'i yulo 'di dag/ mkha' spyod ma yi gnas su brjod// phyi dang nang dang yang dag gnas// nyishu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis//
sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor le yan// gnas rnams dag ni thams cad du// rtsa rnams kun na yang dag bshad// yul 'di rnams na bu mo gang// rtsa yi gzugs kyi gnas so zhes// dab
bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// rdo rje sams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// slar yang bsdus te bshad bya ba// de ni bdag
gas bshad kyis nyon// bu l+ler ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu can dang rab tu gtum mo ste// so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o// dzAlan+d+hA rar kangarus chen mo dang gtum pa'i mig can ma ste// de ni sku dang kha
sgyu 'bab pa'o// o Ta ya nar keng rus dang 'od ldan ma sta// bags pa dang dri ma 'khab khago/ ar bu dar mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ste/ sha babab pa ste/ gnas so// gor
bA ri'i lha'i dgra dang dpa' mo'i blom ste/ thams cad duni rgyas pa la bab nga 'o// ra me shArar 'od dpag med pa dang mi'u thung ma ste/ rus pa'i 'phrang ba 'bab pa'o// de ba ko ri
derje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma sta/ rtag tu mchin pa 'bab pa// mAlo bar rdo rdzo'i lus dang lcen grib ma ste/ snying phrug 'bab pa ste/ nye ba'i gnas so// de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni/
blugs kyi 'khor le mkha' spyod de// snyoms par zhugs ras yang dgaganas// kA mA ru panamyu gu can dang sa srungs ma ste/ rtag tu mig 'bab pa'o// o Tar na rdordzoral pa can dang 'jig
byed chen mo ste/ mkhris pa 'bab par grags pa ste/zhing// trig kun dang 'a bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs ma ste/ glo ba'abab pa'o// ko sa lar rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang chang 'thung ste/
rgyuma'i 'phreng ba 'babalag/ nye ba'i zhing ngo// ka ling kar shin tu bzang po dang sngo bsangs lha mo ste/ rtsib logs kyi snal ma 'bab pa'o// lam ba kar ni ri rdzobazang po dang shinatu bzang
tshos bong bu rnamAltar lho'abab pa 'o// rol sago/ kany+tsi ni 'jigs byed chen po dang rta snyam ste/ bshang ba 'bab par grags so// hi ma la yar ni mig mi bzang dang khra gdong ma ste/
tshogs ma'isrubs 'bab dgo/ nye ba'i ril sago/ gsung gi 'khor les spyod do// snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag gnas/ bra ta pu rir ni stobs po che dang 'khor 'gas can ste
so// su ban dI b.ranam mkha'i snying bo dang 'khor le'u gi cha ma ste/ de bzhinodu rdul 'bab pa// 'a ba'i 'dun sa'o/ nag rarani lha'i dbra dang shin tu dpa' mo ste/ tshil 'bab pa'o// sin+ta'i
ga/ phashadapa tAranaran chan rnarje dang dum skyes ma ste/rtag tu nag 'bab pa'o/ 'dunasa'o// so rATharan rdza mgan rang gang sa ma so/
yul dun pad+ma gar gyi dad du byug na rang stobs chen ma ste/ rtag tu mchim 'a pa pi pa'o// dur khrod de// ma rur na rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyuram// mchil ma 'bab par grags [”]
ku lu tAranarje samasadapa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ snabasal zhon nu 'bababa'o// te pa'i dur khrod do// sku yi 'khor las sa 'og spyod/ snyoms par zhugs pas zhugs yin zhes
mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bang// rdorje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sams dpa' de bzhin gshegag/ bcom ldan rdo rje canakyis gsungs// rgyud kyirgyal po chon po dag la rdoNo
mkha' 'gro las/dang 'a bo gnyis su med pa'i gnas bstan ba zhes bya ba'i rim khar phye ba ste bcu bzhi bgo/ de nas las kyi ra ba mchog ni// sbyor ba kun gyi dam ba stag
gang yang grub par byed pa'i sngags// de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad// yi ge pho nya la sogs sngags// mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/
sde tshan brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// sngags rnams thams cad 'byungab ste// gzhan yang ci yang rung ba skye// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// lus can rnams kyi snying
dga' byed// sgra lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// ya ral bas rnam par klubs// lengs spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba// ro rnams kyi ni rten rang bzhin// ma rnams bzhi po dag gis ni// kun nas yongs
subaskor ba go/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor le tshe// byang chung sum cu gnyis dang ldan// zla ba ti ma zhes bya ba// g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su// dba' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi//
'gro dang 'ong bar nges pa/ra brjod// gnas gnyis la ni mnyam par zhon// 'og dang stong du yang dag brten// g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su// dbyangs yig gcuganyis stong bltas bris//
kasogs 'og tu bltas pa ni// ngos gnyis dag tu spel ba ste// dbus su des ni sbyar bar bya// de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni// rtsa dang sgra yi rang bzhin ni// gnyis med yi shes rdo rje ste// mkha' 'gro
sku sgra yi rang bzhinano// nges 'byung sangs rgyas thams cad de// gang du skye bzhes byar grags// shin tu rnam dag la shes che// lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin gang// rdo rje sangs dang 'azhes bya ste/
mtshog tu bde bar brjod ba yinaM// rang byung gi ni gzugs 'di nyid// spro dang sdud par byed pa go/ ya gi pho nya la sogs sngags// der ni cha dang srol ba gong
chod pa// de ni rtag tu gnas pa yin// smin dbus pad+ma'i zla b.ru// bcu drug skud pas bskor ba yin// shes rab thabs kyi mnyam sbyor gyis// kha sbyor zhes byar brjod pa yin// lag
gnyis kun tu 'khyud pa yin// rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcinges brjod// slar yang rnam par grol ba'i lam// 'bab pa'i tshogs ni mchog tu dga'// sbyor bo kha sbyar nyid dang ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud
du bzhed// rdo tsho pad+ma dbye ba dang// sbyo tshun sbrang rtsi byed par bshad/ bskor ba gang phyir skyod pa ste// bde de'i thabs kyis kun rag pa// dga' dang bdeba'ing bzhin gyis//
zhags pa ba dor bcug pa yin// chags pa lcags kyu sa bon te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug/ mi 'khrug rdo rjes dkrug par bya// de gsal zhing zhes byar brjod// de
nas chags sogs nyen tshang01gi/ bag chags dum bu nyid du bya// shin tu rgya cher dmigs pa yi// kun rdzob de bzhin brdung ba dang// dngos kun rdoN+Disamed par bya// rdo rje zhes bya de ba nan
gshegs// ji ltar bstan kyang de dbus su// rtag stong 'byin dang sdud pa go/ de nid nyid ces bya ste// rang byung gcig gis khyab pa 'o// gang ming sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// skya mazhes
khyar grags pa ste// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid gang gnas pa'o// 'di'i kun mkhyan zhes bya ste// kun tu 'gro mi shigs pa'o// pad+ma yi ni sna [”]rtsoru//
rgyu dang mi rgyu kun bsgom bya// phyi rol yi ge spangs nas su// yid kyi bzlas dang ldan par bya// nges pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas// brtan pa chos dbyings rang bzhin no// rtag
zatu phra ba rdul dang bral// shasaM sku ste dris mod// gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin shes// mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig yul// phan tshun mdud pa gsang sngags ni// bya phrug tu ni phu nas su/
ts+tshas bon 'phrang ba de nas sgrom// hU~M gi skud pas brgyu bar bya// bsgrub 'gog par gyuran na// gom pas gnyis kyang mi 'gro// 'di yi shes rab ldan rgyas te// de yi gzugs su gyur
bas gnas// las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nas 'baraM// sgyu ma chen po zhes byar bshad// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// sgra rtse brgyaragyur pa yin/
skad cig glog gi 'od zer canaM// lha yi rnal 'byor dus sun// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ phyogs bcu rnamasu spros nas ni// lha dang lha min kun basdogs te// snying kha'i chos kyi 'khor
g+ha we// bsregs te longs spyod 'khor ler song// sna bugagayas nas byung nas ni// slar yang zhugs te sminamatshams kyi// mdzod spu'i khung nas byung nas su// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i
sangs rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// sa sgo g.yon du zhugs nas ni// spyi bo'i 'i khor lobasregs nas su// sngon gyi lam nas byung gyur te// slar yang spyi gtsug tun
[rd]) zhugs/ bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // dga' ba brgyadanas lte ba gi/ dkyil 'khor dun song gyur na// sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur// dus min 'chi ba las rgyal nyid//
yan lag kha shug dang sbyar// thod pa 'di mchod yon snod du na)/ zhal du mchod yon nges sbyar zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bgi/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjesams/
dang bad bzhinagashegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ sku gsum dang/ sngags dang/ rgyud kyi 'byung ba dang/ 'chi ba bslu ba
zhes bya ba'i mo ba'i phye ba ste btsolnga pa'o/ dranas dngos grub kun gyi gnas// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ste/ la yid 'ong btsud na gyi borten na// sems can kun
la bde ster ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis brgyan// bla re dam pa brus bas 'bab// 'dab stong ldan pa'i pad+ma che// sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa la// derani lha mos zhus gyur pa//
'khor kun gyi nges pa dang// dbyangs rnams kyin bye brag dang// yi ge dbye rnab ma 'tshal te// 'khor lo'i rgyus ni ji lta bu // de rnams las nici zhig lags// sna tshogs klu yisasngags
[I ]dngani// 'khrula'akhor dag ni mdor bsdus dang// 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dus dang ni// de bzhin dang 'a bo rnamA kyis bstan// 'di dag la ni the tsom mchis// bde ba chen ros bshad du/
brgyu@#/ gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa gang// de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa// legs so legs so lha mo tsho// blo/
za gros chen po legs so legs// mkha' 'gro mni thams cad kyang// the tshom skyo na gzhanaci smos// sgyu ma kun tunam 'phrul ba// nyon cig lhamo sgyu mche// gabazhag bris pa tsam gyis ni//
sgrub bos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ste// de nabadag gis bshad kyis nyon// gnag dang dam bar rtag gyur nas/ khyad par du ni gtor ma sbyin// tsha ru'i bza'
balhagacig bya// sgrub pa de los g.yon nas bskor// 'di yi sgrub pakun la na// ma mo dga' 'gyur the tshom med// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// sa rnams lan rnam rol pa// brtson
chen 'khor losgyur mo dang// stobs chen ma dang rab dpa' go )'khor lo'agi cha glang snyam// khaN+Da roha'akhor lo'i shugs// bya gdong ma dang rta snamo// shin tu bzang mo sde bsangasamo//
chang 'thung chu dang rlung shugs ma/ de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo dang// sa srungs ma dang rten grub sa// lang ka'i bdag mo ma'i krung go// du ba bo'i blo ma sna chen mo// 'od ldan ma dang gtum
migam// rab gatum ma ste sgrub byed yin// mkha' 'gro ma ni ti shu bzhi// 'ad reg sngon de grub pa yin// rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni// mthar nits+tsaM hUM phaT dang sbyar// o ni thams
cadu gsal byed de// grub gsol 'dod pa thams cad la// rnal 'byor dam mchog ma mthong na// gzhan dag snying po mad rtsar mtshungs// dung 'a bo nyid gyur grub pa ni// dang la ldan he ru ka'i
ni// dkyil 'khor dam ba mthong bas yin// de nas de shes rtag sgom pa// dngos grub re bzhin gshags pas gsungs// nyon cig lha moshes rab can// rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs//
'khor lechen po rmad gyur pa// gdengs ka'i dbang phyug ces bya ste// thos pa tsam gyis srog byed na// ming dang ldan par bris pa yis// gdengs ka thams cad smos ci dgos// dbang ldan nas
ni de rnams nas su// klu rnams sa bon las byung ba// rin chen dang ldan gdengs gsum mtho// gzhan yang phyogs na kun tu bsam// de nas mgur ni 'di bzhes te// shar du klu mang bar du bri//

nung tu hi sta byang du haM// ga shanirjer hU~M zhes bya ba bris// ki li ki la yi dgas su// srin po'i tshul ji snyed pa// rlung nisi li si li bri/ ma yi phyogs sud+hil nyid// dar porarab gtum ma nas ni/
brtsonachenam yi mthar thug pa// sngags 'di dganabyin gyis brlab// 'khor 'di ni skal chen ldan// grwa rnams kyi ni bcad gcod pa// hU~M phaT ces bya stsal ba ya// bsgrub bya de yi dbus su bri/
lan cig bzlas ba'i gu gul gyis// bdug pa nyid du sbyar byas la// klu rnams thams cad bababs bar 'gyur// lag ba g.yon pa la 'khor lo 'di de ngos su 'am yid kyis brisaM lag/ sngags lan
tshig kha zlas pas bya bas na 'chi bas dus su zin ba slong bar byed de// ka ra bA ra'i 'dab ma'i khu bas ka ra bA ra'i smyug gus bris te/ lanacig bzlas pas reg na mngal gung du
'dod ba der 'bo bar 'gyur ro// dug dang/ lan tshwa dang/ sku tshes bris te/ khros na gsod par 'gyur// ro bsregs pa'i mgal pa dadura'i khu bas me bsad de 'byung po'i 'gal de nyid kyis
'khor lekhris lanacigapa zlas pa des gangal bsnun ba ltung bar 'gyur ro// sang kon ta'i lcagagus sngags chog snga ma bzhin bris la/ thal ba la mngon par basngags te ) gang la bsnyan pa de sha
bras gzung par 'gyur ro// ra khrod kyi sol bso shing leb bam rtsig ngos la 'byung bo'i mi tshanamo gang gi snying khar ming bris pa de gdon chen pos gzung bar 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la/

rgyu/ de'i snying khar 'khrul 'khor bshug ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du dri'i chu'i nang du bzhag nas/ a ti mug ta'i lhag ma la lan bdun bsngags te de la bsnun na/ zhag bdun gyi mthar rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong

bar 'gyur ro// 'khor la de nyid bye brag tu dur khrod kyi las la pho nya'i kha dog gi bye brag tu gyur ba bris pa las kyi pho nya dang lhan cig tu sgrub bar bya// kar pI ra'i lcagam khru phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad dang
ldan ba la gang la mno bar phyogs te sngags bris nas 'o bsregs pa'i ma 'bar ba la der te/ ji srid ma tshig pa dang myur du blangs larig pa'i rgyal bo lan bdun bzlas nas gang zhig dran te klad la

[d/]bskoran/ de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i 'a kham phor la ba bla dang yung ba'i khu bas gang gi ming bris pa de de'i mad la bcings par 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi ras sam/
zla mtshanagyi sa 'ashing a sho ka'i smyug gus klu rnams spangs pa'i 'khor 'a 'di bris la/ de'i dbus su sngags pas cho ga bzhin yi ge a dang de la ba bris na mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad par thams cad dang/
lus srul po thams cad ngacanges parob gyur ro// thod pa la skyes pa'i khrag gis gang gi ming bris la sngags pa khro ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlasan/ de'ikhrug 'gugs par byedra la yid zhi ba dang
ldan pas zhi bas sngags bzlas na slar gtong bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo de nyid bla bas brgyan cing gsal bar go ra tshunas gro ga la skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par bris te/ bud mad gang gis rtag tu bcangs na
rig pa'i rgyal po 'di deb lhums su 'jug par 'gyur go/ bud med dpal dang zhi ba'i 'dus pas kun tu spyod pa'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang dbrog par mi nus la/
rnam pa de lta bu'i chog dang ldan pas dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu stor bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dras 'di la ni brtul zhugs dang/ spyod pa dang/ bsnyung ba dang/ chog mad par yang
cho ga zhib mo'i sbyor ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyi las thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byed do// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dadus bsam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmo ba ste// 'od zer tshogs
@#/ gsal ba'i mdangs// 'khor lo'i 'phrang ba rnam par klubs// de dbus 'khor lo rna bas brgyad dang// pad+ma'i 'phrang bas shin tu mdzes// slar yang 'khor lo/
bri bar bya// rdo rje 'brang ba rnam par 'brog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu yin// nam mkha' thams cad g.yogs byed pa// rang gi lus las spro bar/
bya dkar dang dmar dad sngon po ste// kha dog mchog gi bye brag bya// bya ba'i cho ga 'di yisan// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug de bzhin bri// dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming// ji ltar 'dod bzhin
sbyar bar bya// phyi rol rdordzo'i 'phrang ba ni// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phrang 'khrugs bri// 'di ne srung pa chen po ste// thams cad srung ba bla na med// rims dang nad dang dug dang ni// mkha' 'grom
mgi 'tsho ba dang// gdon dang bdud dang leg 'dren dang// gang yang lus srul la sogs pa// grib ma yang na mi 'gongan// de yalus lta smos ci dgos// zla gzugs lta bu'i yi ga blta// phyog/
bcur rnam par 'byor bar byed// dkar po yis ni'i 'gyur te// nag pos skad cig dag gis gsod// dmar po yis na dbang byed de// de gnyisakyisani ris par 'agugs// sar pos nges par
'ami 'gyur te// dmag gi debur ni 'o chung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ las thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i srung ba'i 'a khor lego/ dka' yi 'khor lo'i khyad par ni//
denas yang dag bshad par bya// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi// dkyil 'khor/
'khor lo lta bu bsam// de dbus pad+ma bri ba// bcu drug 'dab mas rnam par brgyan// de dbus pad chen 'dab brgyad pa// rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi mchog/ 'od zer dkar bos shing tu mdzes//
sgyupa bos 'khor le'i phyi rol bri// pad+ma'i lte bar A hAbri// dngos grub thams cad ster ba'o// ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar// tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas ni// 'bol zhing shin
tu 'jam pa yi// stan la skyo gnas phyag rgya bcings// sngags pas bsgrub bya mngon phyogs te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// yan lag rus pas brgyan bsam shing// gcer bur
gyur pas rang gis bri// yi dgas gos sam ro yini// bum pa skam po dag la yang// yi dgas son rtsi khrag dang ni// de bzhin tsan dan dmar pos bri// 'khor lo rwa ya stong gnas te///
ji ltar 'dod bzhin spun gsum du// blo ldan mathe'u chung bskyodanas ni// bram ze gsod pa'ang nyin bdun 'grub// tsan dan dmar po'i rdul las ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la//
tsha ba gsumagyis lus byugs nas// sbra tshil gyis kyang phyug bar bya// zangs ma'i khab kyis skya gnas dbug/ seng ldeng ma ni du med la// blo dang ldanings nyin bdunabasro// sgrub pa po
yis brgya bzlasan// rgyalakho blon bcas mdun na 'don// btsun mo'i 'i khor dang bcas par ni// myur du 'gugs par byed pa yin// gro ga ya na'adab ma la// ro ya son/
rtsiratshanas// mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas par// ming dang sbal to bra breg bya// mngon par phyogs te bzlas bzhin du// song ldeng dang ni dur khrod// ji srid sbra tshilam zhu bar// ma yastang
du gdung bar bya// bsgrub bya mngon par gdung tsam gyis// lha dang lha min 'ong 'gyuranA// sa stong skyo bo smos ci dgos// yi dgas son rtsa rgyas pa yi// khrag dang gi wang bcas pa yis ka
bsgrub bya'i ming spel gro gor gri/ sgrub khar bya ba'i rkang rjes su// tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// dur khrod zad lhag thal ba rnams // sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus nas// sang ldeng ma ni
du tshod ga/ rdul de lag ba gnyis kyisan// mnyis nas sbyin sreg byas ba yi// thal ba de ni bzung nas su// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas te// snying khar 'khor lebacuganas// zlos
bzhin du na mor gdungasan// brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'gyur la// rmongs shing rab tu myos nas na// rlung giteshugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyug/ cho ga'i bya ba 'di yis ni// yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis
bzhed// lha mo sngags chen 'di dag ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi snyinge 'dzoms yin// de nas de bzhinagashegs kun gyis// yid 'ong zhi ba skyo bso// bka' yi 'khor la bshad par bya// mkha'
0/ dbyings dbus gyur bsam pa ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje rtse gsum kha bzhi pa// des na de nas bri bar bya// de dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad nga// shin tu mdzes pa bris nas su//
po rotsa na'i rig pa che// sams can kun byed sdud pa mo// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// nad thams cad med par byedang zhes bya ba srung ba'i
'khor lo'i sbyor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pas// ye shes mngon par shes pa yi// 'khor lo zhes bya bka' stsal pa// ge sar lta bar ldan pa yi// pad+ma'adab ma drug par bri// zla
ba bzang pos nyi par brgyan// rdo rje 'brang bas rnam bar klubs// de yi phyi rol 'khor lo ste// ston ka'i zla ltar dri med pa// yi ge'i mchog ni rnam pa bdun// lha mo chen mo phan pa gcig/
bdud thams cad kyi las 'joms par byed pa 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya'o// tsan dan dkar po rotsan// gro ga lan bris nas su// 'khor la lag pa g.yon par bsrang//
'khor lo 'di ni lha me che// las kyi 'od kyis brgyan pa yin// de nas bsgrub bya'i dbusasu// bsams te stong du bzlasanasan// yi ge shel gyi rnam pa ltar// bsams te nad kyis gdung
la bstan// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la// nad rnams kun las rnam grol bar// 'gyur banyid duthe tsom mod/ lag pa g.yon par 'khorale 'di// zla ba'i dbus su rnam bkodan// ston ka
yi na zla 'drar 'gyur// 'khor 'a 'di ni lha mo tsho// las kyi 'od kyis rab brgyanan// las kyi chog mthong ba yis// bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur// dur khrod nas/
za sam khrod pa bas// arga yi ni 'dab mo la// sngar bstan pa yi sol ba dang// skyes pa'i khrag gi snag tsha yis// sgrub pos ma 'us smug chus gi/ nyi ma'i dbus gyur khro sems kyis//
gzugs brnyan dus la bslab bya yi// dbus su de ni datsug gnas su// sku tshe yisani phyugs nasan// yang dang yang du bgrod par bya/u0f38)sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis// bya ba zlums
cad byed par 'gyur// 'di yis nad rnams thams cad ni// 'phel dang de bzhin sbyor byed ba// rames la yi dgas snying khar bri// 'ga' re ya degs klad pa ste// brjod byed rlung dang sprin la khri
pas gzer bar bya ba ma la ste// dug dang mdze nad lto 'phya la// gzag lagaza' la mtshan mar bri// mdor bsdus nas ni 'khor lor dgod// shal dang zla ba'i 'odra'adra ba'i// yi ge bdud rtsi rgyun 'bab
sa ston ka'i zla zer lta bu r// bsam gtan bsam pa tsam gyis// 'chi ba'ang nges bar slong ba'i 'gyur// sbrul chen brgya yis zin nasani// 'chi'ang myur du slong bar byed// dug/
gis brgyal bar 'gyur ba dag/ bstan pa tsam gyis slong bar 'gyur// rims dang gdon dang brjed byed dang/ lag pa mthong bas rlag par byed// grib ma yang ni mi 'gong na// de yis lus
g+ha smos ci dgos// zangs ma yi na 'dab ma 'am// lagapa g.yonabar 'khor lo 'di// ba bla dang ni gung bas gi/ de nas chu yi nang bzhag la// ji ltar 'byung bzhin 'bad de mchod// mtshams
kyi dus su mnyam bzhag bas// de bzhin du ni sngags bzlas bya/ chu yi nang nas bton nas su// 'o mas bkrus la rgya mtshor gzhug/ g.yul du khu tshur bcangs nas na// rgyan rnams kun gyis
rnam brgyan te/ yid la rtag tu zlos byedan// ji srid khu tshur ma dgrol bar// myur du thams cad rengs 'gyur ti// dgra bo gal te laganagi/ mtshon na phyar to thogs pa yang/ jisrid khu tshur
dkrol par// mtshon chagatong bar mi nus so// yi ge bdun dang rnal 'byor ma// drug gi yi ge 'di dag ni// 'khor lo drug la gnas par ni// lag pa'i dbus su bkod nas su// cho ga rig pas
bcang bar bya// khanas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos// de yi gzugs gyur bzung nas ni// da nas 'gug 'gyur lhatsom med// tsan dan dmar po'i rdul dang na/ lan tshu sku tshe de bzhin te//
bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes rdul dang ni// gcig tu byas nas btag par bya// lan brgyar bzlas te rab bsgoms na// sa dgaskyo bo'i nor dang ni// bcas te dbang du 'gyur ba'am/ de'agug
'gyur the tshom med// sbyor ba 'di ni 'grub pa skyo// gzhanadag tu ning mi smra// rdul de nyid na bzung nas su// lcags phyi dang ni bsre bar bya// dur khrod ras la gtums nas su// lan
0 @#// bdun du na ba zlas par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdor sor brgyad tsam/ bgos te dgra ming nas ni// ba zung nas sa yis dgab pa bya// gang gi ming bzung de bcings 'gyur//
phyis de nyid bzung nas su// 'om yis ni'i pad de bkru// slar yang 'grolo 'gyur the tshom med// phyi ma de nyid bzung nas su// smyo byed lnga dang ldan par bya// de yagos la bsgrub bya yi// ming bris
nas ni gtum par bya// lan brgya bzlas te dur khrod du// smras na skyes bu 'phral dun// smyo ba 'di la the tshom med// phyung nas ba yi 'om yis// 'grol 'gyur 'di ni blotsom med// rdo rje
soms dang 'a de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje canagyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje dpa' bo'i 'khor la gsungs// zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rjon// rtse gsum de bzhin
ba drug ga slar yang zabar ba ni// 'dabadrug legs par gnas pa bri// de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni// 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// sngags pas lte bar bri bar bya// bsgrub bya'i ming
nasal bar bya// rdordzasams sogs lha rnams ni// thams cad snyatshogs bla na med// sangs rgyas kun gyi go cha che// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// dbus su snga ma'i gsang sngags bri
pad+ma'i 'dab ma de bzhin gshan/ ri bo drugan yongs sris pa// rdo rjo yin lte bar bri// gur kum son rtsi rang khrag dang// ro tsa na yis grog la// cho ga bzhin du bris nas ni// dus gsum dun
[d/]bzlas byas mchod chen byas nas gzung bar bya// lan bdun dun mngon bzlas te// gos kyi tha mar bcing bar bya// lam du 'gron rkun po dang// stag sogs 'jigs par mi 'gyur la/
thams cad dun srung 'gyur ba// 'gruba'agyur 'di la the tshom med// lte ba deran thogale yis// bskor ba'i thig le dag kyang bya// a ra tsaka bcud dang/ lung ba dag gis khyad par du// ga
shoka yi gu yis// dar ba bo yos niras mar bri// bsgrub bya'i ming dang sbrel ba yi// sngags 'di stod du de nas bzla// bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni// glang po che yi rkang rjes rdul//
dur khrod thalo bar bcas pa las// sgrub pos gzugs kharAn byas nas su// bcade bas bcings te de yi ni// snying kha ru nagazhug por bya// ma tog ser bos mchod nas ni// gsang pa'i
gnas su smras gyur na/ dgra rnams thams cad 'ching 'gyur zhing// rlag par byed pa mi bzad pa// rdo rjesams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rjecan gyis gsungs// mkha'
'gros yi snying po'i sngags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// nam mkha'i dbyings gyur sa bonani/ kun tu 'od zer rab 'phro ba// ston ka'i zla ltar drisad pa'i/ 'khor lo
tsangs ni bcu gnyis bya rtsibasado rnams la sa bon gyi/ ya gi mchog tu phan pa dgod/ de yi lte bar dgod bya ba la rig pa chen mob yigatsho// bsrung brdo rje'i cho ga rigs// mkha'
'gro ma kunucho ga bya// sngags kyi rgyal bo bskul ba yi// dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming bri// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ru// sngo ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// gur/
kum dang ni ri tsanas// grog 'am ni rasadakar la// snying stobasacan gyis bri bar bya/ lasakyi tshig mthong ba yis// thams cad du ni bsrung ba dang// sgrub pa po yis sngar bstan bzhin//
gdug pa rnams na tsher gcod byed// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i las mchog de nas bshad par bya// gang zhig bsgrubs pa tsamachis na// 'jig rten gsum bo dbang byed pa'o// skyag
rdo rdzob rogs dang ni// gzugs bzang bu mo gzhan yang rung/ kar bIra'i ma tog dmar// rgyal gyi sbyor bas bsgrubs nas su// ma tog der ni chur gnas la// sgrub po shin tumanyam bzhag pas//
lan brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// chu bo chen po zhugs nas su// lte ba man chad chur bcug/ lag pa thal sbyar da bus bzung nas// rig pa stong du bzlas par bya// snyim ba chu yis bkang ba dang//
bcas pas sgrub pos btung bar bya// de nas de ni 'grub 'gyur te// sgrub pos dgan grub pa yis// rgyal po chung mar bcas pa dag/ yid kyis bkugs 'gyur gdon mi za// kar bA ra'i mdog
yin// dmar po yang dag bzung nas// rig pa lan bdun bzlas byas l// skye gnas dbus su gzhug bya ste// ma togade ni kha sbyar nas/ gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag par bya// gnyis med ye shes
rnal 'byor bas// brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas bar bya// sgrub po rtse gcig yid kyis// me tog de ni blangs nas su// me tog gis ni gang bstan pa// de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur// brgyal zhing
sems dang bral ba dang// yan lag tshogs kun gzhan dbang ste// mngonagyur sems na ldog pa ru// skad cig gisan debad byed 'gyur// 'dinamangon sum grub pa yi// don yod dbang du byed pa
yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs pa'i cho ga'akhor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o// gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis su// rdo rjesams dpang
rlag 'gyur zhing// dngos grub myur du sbyor 'gyur ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ste// de bzhin gzhan yang pad+ma'o// kun nas rnam par 'phro ba yi// mkha' 'grom yis
bon dgod/ dbus su rdo rje phag mon/ shin tu dra gtsang gsal ba'i gzugs// yi lo yi 'god dged par nga// rim pa de ltar brjod pa la// zhi la zhi ba'i yid kyis su// tsan yis gro gar bri ma
mo'i ginas dang dur khrod du// gos chand bzhin khro dang bcas// chags ba la ni dmar bo'i gos// rgyas la gos sa' de bzhin te// de dang der bsgoms byas na// cirogis bar ni smral bar bya//
bu mo gzhon nu'i yigi gosan 'bad de blangs nas su//tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhig/ de nyid las byung sol ba yis// snatshogs rdo rdzakha bzhi la// sngags dang spel ba'i bris nas/ lan bdun/
ba @#// du ni bzlas nas su// gang gi khyim du sbas gyur pa// de ni gshenaDa'i grong khyer du// nyi ma bdun gyis 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi rkang pa rkang skyabs dang// bum pa la sogs
dag kyang rung// rus pa'i phur bu'i sbra gur na// 'khrul 'khor 'don bcug bya sta// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za// las rnams kun tse sgrub pa pos// cho ga dang ni
sgo/ ldan bar bya// rang gis bzung ba'i sngogs kyis ni// bskal pa bye ba brgyas tsha 'grub// log 'di mchogatu shes bya sta// sngags bzhin rgyas bas ci zhig bya// de dag thames cad spangs nas sa/
'dren 'bad de gzung bar bya// gang dang grang gi bsam gtan gyis// sgrub des bzlas pa brtsam par bya// sbyor ba de dang de dag gis// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// ji ltar nor bu dag
zha/ bani// rdzas gang la brtenade gzugs 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rjemakha' 'gro yang// yang dgabasam gtanamatshog 'dzin 'gyur// bsam pa gang dang gang gsan// mi rnams yid n yang dag
sbyor// do dang de yi dngos 'gyur to// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// de nyid bsdus dang 'dus pa ste// gzhan yang sngon dang bla ma yi// de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga can// bya ba'i rgyud rnamA
thams cad du// ji sride a yis 'jig gi bar// da der 'gro ba na rmongs 'gyug/ thams cad du ni sbyangs pa ste// brtsona'agrub pha rol 'jonAs mgo/ rdordzasoms dbang mnyamaldan pa'i// rdo
rdza slob dpon bdag nyid che// myur du dngos grub 'gyur la// 'phral la yang dag yid ches byed// sgrub pos phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// ston mi rmongs par 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig mi/
ldan mi dag la// klog gam g.yaMta byan gyur na// ngan pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas ni// ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar 'gyur// g.yon gyi rgyud ni dmigs nas su// skya bo g.yon gyi spyod pa bya//
thams cad g.yon pas byas na ni// myur du dngos grub 'grub 'gyur zhes// rgya ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rjemakha' 'gro bdaba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
bcom ldan rdo rjecan gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'grolas/ dpa' bo thoms cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i le'u 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug ba'o//
de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// sgrub po'i bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i mchog/ ga pur dang/

na gur kum dang// gan rgyu dang ni pa tra ste// shing tsha dang nisug smal bcas// ku su ma dang ni de bzhin chu// pi sa ti dang kun tu ru// de bzhiner yi zhig dang na// ri skyes dang ni sgra gu'i zhag/
dri yomar khu so dang ni// de bzhin lag skyes kyi ni rdul// gangs kyi chu dang snying po dang// rgya mtsho las skyes de dag ni// lus can rnams la phan byed pa// gang gang la ni gangs chu bzhin// de/
ltar bco brgyad rdzas rnams ni/bcud kyis len mchog phan byed yin// de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni// yon tan yan lag cho ga bshad// tsam pa ka dang ba ku la//

na ga ge sar ku mu dang// ut+pal she pha li ka dang// sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang pri yang ku// kusu ma nA nyid dag go/ shipha la dang po sem// ka pi ta dang la ku tsha// sku ba dang ni brtaka/ a ru ra dang ba

sgyu ru ra/ ba la ta ka sgyu ru ra// a la tsi dang phun ke/ arend dang mi ra gi/ de bzhin du ni pi pi ling// bca' ba dang ni shu dag gang// yung ba dang ni ru rtadang// bca' sga dang na sgog skya dang// blun
can gyin do ba dang// nA ga pha la dkar po dang// de bzhin rgan po gzhon nur byed// glang chen dgra dang ri mdzes dang// 'dzag dang byis ba stug po dang// ral pa dmar po smyo byed dang// mtshan
ma mo' shing dad myur 'gro dang// kA tas ba dang gsar shing ste// de bzhin du na ga resha// ka rany+dza dang sha khru dang// nam pa dang na ba li saM// de bzhin ga du mo dzagi pa lag dang tsan don/
gnyis// de bzhin a kar nag po dang// gur kum gur shing byar ka/ sbrang rtsi mokru pus kar// ma tog 'bras bu rtsa ba dang// shun pa shong dang ro nyid do// khu byug zangs kyi gtsug
pud can// bya rog dnganig radang// rma bya ti bya phug ron dang// drang srong bu stobs 'phel bar byed// ri bo dgas dang/ sa la ba dang phag dngani// khyad par du ni bya ba rnams // nad
rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// me tog 'bras bu shun ba'i chang// de bzhin du 'bru yi nang// gzhan yang chang ga bye brag dag/ mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i mchog/ 'di dag/
skyes pa bud med kyi// stobs rnams spyod pa'i sman yin te// bza' dang btung dang bzhib pa dang// bldag pa dang na mur ba dang// sna smanamago bor bsku ba dang// bkru ba dang ni dril byas
dang// bza' dang btung sogs de dgano// rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog/ de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// rdzas dang bco brgyud dag tu sbyar// sbom po phra mo'i sbyor b rnams // skyes pa dang ni
bud med kyang// chung du la sogs dbye ba ste// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs// re re zhing yang gsum du 'dod// nag po dkar po spyi bsangs te// 'dzag dang de bzhin 'pho ba la'o// dgra
dang mdza' bshes bar ma ste// khams kyi snga tshano bsdus pa yin// dpa' bo gcig dang skyaganyis rtswa// 'bras bu chen po bska ba gsum// lhang tsher dang ni dngul chu bzhi// bdud rtsi yi ni
snying po lnga// dus drug de bzhin drug cu ste// bdun bo yaMl ga 'dab sogs bcas// skam sa dang na rlan can yul// mar dang mar nag bkru smanan// no dang dngul chu'i zas su sbyin// rang skyar/
dang ni lung ba dag/ tshamanyam dngul chu'i 'bras bu ste// nyi ma'i 'od zerab sros nas ki/ sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs ba blug/ thal sman lan tshwas bu gar sgrub// ron bska ba rnams dang yang// lhong ]
tshor dkar bo'i skyo ma sbyin// dngul chu drug char bya ba mchog/ skyed byed don ni che ba 'joms// cha ni tshad ldan 'ching byed de// 'bras bus byed pa 'gyur ba ya ]/sngon du
gsashog blugs pa yi// rang skyon 'dzoms pa'i cho ga yin// de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang// thal ba'am rdul na blugs par bya// dron mo blugs na skra dkar skyo// glangachenamago yi bcud blangasal/
song ge'i tshad du btso bar bya// de nas slar na phyung nas su// argya'ashing gi khu ba blugs// tshos pa'i 'od kyis snying miga'ajoms// tsan+d+ho dang ni sa ran// sgog skya dang ni koras dang// a
tAr ti ru pa dang// de bzhin du ni mo tog gzung// bya gli dang ni kun du ru// sa rib dang sanamo dang// nor bu zla 'od na ge sar// thigs pa'i rgyan dang ka tam pa// tsam pa kari so ba dang//
gishu pil ba ut+palag/ rar sbyor dang nibs bdu// 'dzag dang dngul chu khra chos#// phyungan sbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur// khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing thugs// skra dkar gyi na nyes pa
'joms// rgas dar mdzand sayo bar byed// rnon po thal smanabacas pa yis// bkrus shing bskus na gzhang 'brum 'joms// lto skyes ma ban+tings rdzas kyi las// bcad dang bcud len/
tshar zhig bsngags// shi ri shi yi rtsasakyang gzug/ mgo gnas la skyesaldan par bya// mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gso// gsos te 'khrul na 'bras bu'i lam// tshad las 'das na

[& ]dug tu 'gyur// de nas pags pa shun pa dang// me tog dang na 'bras bu sogs// kha dang bska dang mngar ba dang// tshudang skyar ba la sogs pas// khyad par dun btso bya ba// kha mad rdzar na btso bar
bya// kha dang bcas par srog pa ste// tshar gcad pa dang mnan pa dang// khamed pa dang bod pa'i dbyibs// 'od m dang ni bya regomonu// de dag btsong bzhi la rdza// btso ba yin tshad bzhi ni// yib dang
khroso dang 'thor ba dang// bzhi pa chu ru 'bros bgo/ shin tu tshos pagyuranani// 'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang// khrol khrol sgranasgrogs pa yin// btsir dang ma'o dang dkrug pa dang// de bzhin du

nade rdung ba'o// sbrang rtsi btsadang bu bar btso// klung chenabatso dang sang ger btso// rnon por byas te btsopar bya// mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'byor 'gyur// blo gros 'khrul pa med pa yis// rim gyis
ram byasemanye bar bya// chayi tshadangs gso bani/ sgyur nas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// de nas tshagazhan bcas pa la// gi ri karani'i phyi mgi/ lugs las bzlog pa'i lam btsugs la//
tshad ldan cho ga bzhin du btso// du ru ka dang ba li ka/ tsakra mar de'is don dang// pha la ta shi kru yi 'bras// pa'i tsa ta ku sum// ut+pal ma 'aka sa bon// bar dar rus pa ka si dang// sir/
sa sku sa bon dang// sgrung ni po son pa la sha// zhig rdzo'u ni tshos pa dang// de dag skyo ma bskyed phyir blugs// de dag gi ni rtogs byas la// yid la sems dpa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// bu mo'i
@#/[。、 ]/bcud ni drangs te blugs// 'di yis rab tu bsgrub babya// gzhan du nam yang ma yin no// bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni// mang po'i bar du brtag par bya// lhang tsher dngul/

chu shingechenon// de tshe 'bras bu smin par 'gyur// bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni// byed pa po dang za bor 'gyur// lhamin rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin// tishu rtsa lnga'i tsha yi bar// stobs ldan bzung ba

lcuganasasu 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul gyi na tshad dang ldan// dngul chu rmabya'i mgrinabadra dang// sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal pa'i gzugs// chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi// sa la'i dri dang dri zhim dang//
de bzhin chang dang chang min dri// chaganyis dngani cha gsum dang// bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing// bong tshod ran dang ring ba dang// yan lag rtsa ba 'dod mgrin pa ring// mig ni zangs ltar

rtswaramar ba sogs// stobs ldan sngo bsangs num med// rked pa'i 'khyud par sngar bshad dang// sbrang rtsi lta bu'i dri deng ldan// sgrub po dbang ba'i yon tan byed// de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te//

rtsub dang gnyen dang yan lag mkhrang// las ldan zhes ni bya pa yinaM// de dang 'khyud las byung ba ni// rdzas ni yongs su sbyor byed de// rnon po dang ni lhang tshor la// thunamong du ni brtenanas su// zha
blugs bas 'dzoms par 'gyur// don la dang bas bar 'gyug/ de nas rang sbyoranang du na// lci bas btsos na nyes pa 'byung// de nas gciba'alen tshwa dang// phag gi shag dang tshil dang khrag

ngas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byung// slar yang tshu ra dza tin// blo dang dmar po nyadi dang ni// pinadzar dod tsam pa dang// smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu gcig/ de dang mnyam pa'i sbyang rtse chu//
mnyes na nyes pa zad par 'gyur// de nas ma he'i rmig par ni// char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la// grangs kyi phyi dang sman phye ma// sman phye mar blugs shing btso// tshos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang
du bzhug// dA yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin// de nas khrag nI cha bdun gyis// sbyangs nas snum zhang stobs ldan lag/ slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni// mnyes pas snyam zhing rtsub par 'gyur/

ra gnatsu ta'i shing dang ni// zangs dang yung ba la sogs drug/ byin pas nyes pa tshar gcod 'gyuro// de nas tsana'i shing dang na// sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang sen mo dang// thalasnyana'abras zos shing phyo
