dang/ rnam hAha tamok+Sha na// lus ka ra dar brtaki/ sku bsin+d+hab re phyo// bcam par n yi rkang du gzhug/ cung zad bzhag ste phyung nas su// rje yagatun du mnye bar byed// 'od ma'i nang du
blugs nas ni// btso dza rgod mar 'du dang// kar na da yi dbyibs 'dra la// bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo'i gdong// kha cha 'di dag bcang ba dang/ 'tsharagacodapa la bsngags pa yin// gang
yang 'khrul 'khor kha che ba// dzo rje yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang// 'oma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs dang// mtshon cha ralagri'i shugs 'dra ba// kad ya namagrin pa 'dra// nyes pa tshar gcod pal
akA) bsngags// gzhan yang dngul chu bsrings bal// bshad pa de dag rjes su gzung// bzhi cha lus pa btso yin te/ dpyad lus stobs chen bco ba yin// dngul chur rten
ba'i dris nI/ de bzhin dunasbyar bar bya// sbyang ba dang ni rtogs pa dang// rmongs pa dang zhin gsod pa go/ de nas lhang tsher rdul phye dang// bcas par rtsi yinang du blugs// pan du zhes
bya'i phyi mni// skyomar bcas pa'i nang du btung// lhang tshor dngul chu rnon po yi// chog yisanaso so'i bcing// de nas cung zhig ngol bso@#// bzhag pa ma yiganasasam ni// chu yi shing la
brten par bya// lci ba 'am 'bras kyi phung bo'ang rur// rdob yi nanong dag dang// baglang ma he sogs pa lhas// bye ma ya na phung por sbyar// de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni// gzugs
dang sgra dang dri'o sogs// tshad dang mtshanam jibazhin brtag/ la'i 'bras bu la la'i rtsa// kha cig ma toga'adab ma dang// shun pa dang ni'us pa'ang rung// rnal 'byor ba yis longs spyod ni//
rnam ba sna tshogs blta bar cu// bcos ba'ang bcos min yod khyadan// rnyed na rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de yang stobs can bcud bralan// sngonAbazhin nyes pa snatshogs 'gyur// dngul
tshulhang tsher kha dog ni// sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te// khra ba dang mkhris ba spyod byed la// dkar pos zug gzer skyod 'gyur zhing// srogani 'joms par byed pa yin// ljangasor
wa/ dgon masmin dang// sar skya lam 'gag 'gyur zhing// nyis 'gyuratshanishin tu 'ching// nyes pa dag ni brgya ldan pas// blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'// rdo dang nag po bcud chen yin// de
ltar bcud len rnam dpyadan// chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan// dngul chu'i kholas cig dang ni// rgya mtsho las byung nyis 'gyur ldan// bzhi 'gyur gyi na mi tog bcas// sa sman blugs pa'i mchog
yin te// khrag dang dngul chu bcu 'gyur du// rim gyis spel te bza' bar bya// de phan chadani 'bras bu med// dngul chu bso bas rmongs pa dang// khyad par dun bsad kyang rung/ sngar bstan pa yi
ma tog dang/ byang chub sems dang bcas te bza'// thams cad du ni snga dri bza'// cho ga'i rim pa 'di yin no// lhang tshor chudang dngul chu na// dgongs mo'i dus su blug par bya// zla ba la ni zla
ba'i lag/ tre ma la ni nyi ma ste// de dang de nas sbyin par bya// de ltar lul dang dus dang na// rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag/ yid gzhung la sogs 'phel byed yin// mkha' 'gro kun dang
mnyam sbyor bgyi rdo rjemakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchogo/ rdoN+Disoms dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ bcud
len gyi tshoga'i rim pa phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o///de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyud du sbas pa nges bar bya// yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni// bshad kyis sgrub pa bo
rnams nyon// bde mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab// ye shes ldan ba'i rang skyes gnas// yul dang yul dumangon par skyo// 'di ni/
mkha' 'gro zhes bya// norjodakyil 'khor gtsobo yin/ rna'abyor ba drug sgrub gol// brda yisad kyis bshad pa yin// ku lu ta dang ma ru yi// yul duganasab ma ma si// sin d+hu dang nin ga/
bar// rigs gtsotsho rnams yin no/ lam pa ka dang so rab+har// gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin// kha ba'i ri dang kaN+Din// gang yod byis bcas mo zhesacu// pAny+tsal ye yul dag dang//
za hareb tAdag na// lhan gi skyes ba'i bu mo gnas// ka ling ka dang kos lar// brtul zhugs 'dzan ma shachen za// pra ta bu ri zhesacu dang// sha ku nire sbom dbang phyug/ khan ha zhes bya
Aganas// bu wer dang dzAlan+d+har tsaN+DaliyaMbud medaganas// mo tradang nikA maru// u0f00ladu bu mo mdzes ma sto// de'i ko Tazhesakhyadang// ram shA ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod// go dAbar mar bu dar//
sokha' 'gro ma yi dbang phyug mchog/ gser gling ltarab stan ba bzhin/ ]on na yang de bzhin no// yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang// dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste// kun kyang 'dod pa'i
gzugs canas// yid kyi shugs kyis 'jugam yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chos sar yang mchod cing phyag khus te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad//

bar dang// zhing skyong 'jig pa chen po yi// ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni// gnas rnams kyin khyad par dang// gang du sgrub pa bos thosan/// the tshom med par 'grub 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad 'deb/
bsdus te// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dang ba de bzhin gshogos// nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad pawaM/ gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka'/
'o/ gang yan khyod na zhu 'dod ba// legs so legs so lha mo tshe// sgyu ma chen por rang 'gro ba// bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// ags yul gnas pa// zhi ba'i gdeng zhes grags/
ba ste/ rgyal bo'i lha mo'i skyo gnas 'khyud// rdo rje yin mtshon cha bsamaMs/ khul der gnas ba'i lha mo de// kata ba yi shing la rten// dril bu chen po zhes bya bgi/ k+She tra pA la stobs po che//
kog gis ni dpal chen mo// gags paspyi gnas las byung ba// gtsags pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste// rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs su rung// grong khyer nar gnas drag shul can// ri yi rtse
mor brten te gnas// ma yi gdong pa zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la mdzes pa'i gdong// dar na bde byedam// smra brtsegs chen po'i skyo gnas byung// lha mo ga yi mtshon cha bsnams// chos kyi dbang
phyag gsol bso// zhing der gnas par grags pa ste// ta la'i shing la brten te gnas// gyen du 'bar sgra zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA lagatsags pa ni// do shAkoTi'i na mo che// stobs po mi yi snyaganas
'byung// lha molag na mdung can te// rnal 'byor dmar phyug kun gyi mchog/ gnas der lha mo drag chen mo// b+ha rnga'i shing la brten te gnas// k+She tra pA la lus chen po/

za mchog gi dbang phyugargyu zhes bya// bir dzar ni phyi mo ste// ba danagyin phyag na bsnams/[“]/zhiba'i gzugs can lha mo tshe// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol ba// zhing der gnas pa me 'bar ma// amra'i
wA shing la brten to gnas// ha har dgod ba sgra chen po// sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed// ma ru dar ni mo lce'i la// thod po dge ba'i skyo gnas byung// lham rjeN+Dishag tu bsnams// zhing/
der shin tu chos las gnas// grong khyer der gnas lha mo de// rgasar shing la ni brten te gnas// dril bu sgra zhes bya ba yi// k+She tra pA la dpa' bo che// pra ta pu ri'i dmar ser te// 'jigs pa
chen mo'i sbyin dang ldan// lha mo tunashing mtshon cha bsnams// gtsigs pa'i skyo gnas las byung ba'o// zhing gnas pa yilha mo dar// dza ti'i shing la brten te gnas// byin chen zhes bya'i zhing
skyong/ shin tu gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung// cha la pu rir bong zhen la// rab tu gtusaM ba'i skyo gnas byung// phyag na zhags pas 'jigs chen mo// zhing der myos bas yang dag gnas//
phyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo'i// stobs chen pha rol gnon bo/ glang chenan bzhes bya bgi/ zhing skyesamchog chen las smyos pa'o// kha che'i yul du bgrang na// gtum bskya gnas las
byung// rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni// sgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson// gnas der gnas pa'i lha mod// ra yi rtsa la brten tags// smyu gu'i byin pa cazhes bya'o// k+She tra pAl
'jigs chen po// ma ru'i yul du rim ba mo// 'jigs gdung dba' bo'i skyo gnas 'byung// lcags kyu zhags thogs lha mod// zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas// yul der gnas pa'i lha mo
da// dbye tshan la ni brten te gnas// gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong gi/ domongs bar byed pa'i gzhin yangs pa'o// nag rar na thong gshol ma// sa brnags yan lag gnas byung// ro
las can ni 'od chenas// dpa' bo kun dngos grub sog druganas der gnas pa'i bzang mo de// sa yishing gi lham rar gnas// sku yi byin pa zhes bya ba'i/ klu drapA lagatsigs pa che//
buN+Dabats+tshA'i yul dun// tsamuny+tsi zhes bya ba ste// stobs po che yi skyo gnas byung// kha TI ga yis lag pa brgyan// lha tshospyod dang grol bar byed// sdig pa ma lus zad byed ge/ bum bzhes
bya'i zhing skyong ni// zhing de na ni yang dag gnas// dzA lan+d+har nibazhin dngas/ chags pa'i gyes kyi skyo gnas 'byung// rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas// bde ba'i mchog kun la su
grong khyer mchog der gnas lha go// khang pa brtsegs mor brtan te gnas// thal ba gsum zhes bya ba yi// zhare skyong shin tu gtsigs pa che// pra ta pu ri'i glog gi gdong// gtsagis
pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung// lha mo dbyig bshag te brogs// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo do// drag po'i gzugs can 'jig
bar byed// dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi// k+She trapAl snyad pa min// 'ug pa'i gdong can jigasasu rung// so bdar na ma lce'i gdong// zangs gri yis ni lag pa brgyan// shachen gyi nustan
laganas// bde ba'i dbang phyug rab ster ba// zhing der gnas pa'i lhamo tsho// shal ma li yi shing la gnas// bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i/ kye tra pA la'ajigs chen po// tsa Ta ya
yul du ni// ka rany+tsa gnas [”]zhes bya ba// shag ti gtsigs pa'i gnas byung// shag te yi ni phyag rgya thogs// dril bu chen bo zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// sbrul dang ldan pa'i
gyenaskra can// gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad// orlan du na lha mo tsho// gsang ba zhes bya'i skyo gnas byung// lha mo rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs// na tudrag cing gsal ba'i gzugs/
lha sgra chen zhes bya drag po'i gzugs// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// gnas mchog der gnas lha mo du// a hoka yo shing rten gnas// dza lan+d+harar gdum mon// zhi ba yin sa gnas byung/
lag na zangs kyi phyar te thogs// dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo// gnas der gnas ba drag chen mo// gser shing la ni brten te gnas spyad pa zhes bya'i dpa' bo che// bdud rnamaMs
[d]thams cad 'jigs par byed// kye re kar nas bo'i ma// drag cing sngo la stobs che la// ral gri lag thogasalha mo tsho// dngos grub thams cad stor ba mo// lha mo chen mo gyin 'bar// sa la'i
shing la brten te gnas// lhun po chen bo zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la'ang dor gnas// ma ya pu rer 'dod ma ste// 'jigs pa'i gdong ga skyo gnas byung// rdo rje shag ti dge ba thogs// sgrub po
rnams la stobs star ba// gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste// 'byung ba'i shing la brten te gnas// der gnas 'jog pa zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// pu tanar na a mi ka/
dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// thong gshol dang nag la thogs// sems can thams cad dbang byed ma// da ru'i shing la brten te gnas// sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/
brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas// rgyal ri 'a khab tu dzanas// khrug chen gyin skyo gnas byung// rdo rje lcags kyur yang dgaldan// pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar
mdzad// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de dzi li'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byed// na chen zhes bya'i zhing sbyong ni// rtag du de dang nye bar gnas// bod yul du ni lhan skyes te// rang byung gi ni skyo
gnas byung// chu srin rgyal mtshan lagan thogs// zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can te// yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de// brag gi khrim la brten te gnas// longs spyod ces bya'i dpa'
bso// kyi trapA la thub dka' ba'o// mo la cerani dbang bskur ma// thob yin phyag rgya thogs// sgrub po la rtag tu brtsa// grags dang dbal dang bkra shis stag/ zhing
der gnas pa'i lha mo de// mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas// skyes bu'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i// zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug yod// zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang// dpa' bo rnams ni
dngos grub ster// rtag tu mtshan mo 'dus par byed// mkha' la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba// dngos grub yangs bstsar 'gyur te/[u0f38]sgrub pa kho yi las rnams ni// thams cad 'grub 'gyur the tsom
med// de nas dngos grub kun ster ba'i/ mchod pa'i tshig bshad par bya// ma tog bdug pa de bzhin du// mar ma dri yi khyad par dang/ gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod// g+hA rlon dang ni nye la
sogs// bza' ba'i rdzas na thams cad dang/ de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga yi mchog/ g.yon gyi char ni snod yin te// g.yasasu khro bo bstan par bya// o/ shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang// ri

bo dang ni'i sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni// khyad par du ni khong stong dang// sems can snod dang thang dang ni// khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag po drag chen po// lha sbyin mnyam
du ston pa dang// nag po gcigs pa 'jigs byed dang// rga las 'dus dang log 'dren rnams // rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang// 'jigs byed ma dang zhum dang// rgyal dang rnam par rgyalam dang//
mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang monag chen mo// nag sbyoms dang ni rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drug tu snang dang ba phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar ma ma//
'jigs byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mcho ba gtsags dang thod chen ma// thod 'phrang 'phrang can kha tshwa ma// sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta canA// rdo
de bzhin gzhu can ma// de nyid chen mo'i mkha' 'gro lnga// las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo ni// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug ga/ de bzhin gshags nga 'i sa chen

te// rdul mod rnalani 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig 1 mo kA kA kab+han d+ha b+han d+ha na kha lA khad+hAnasarba dut+taM na/ han han/ b+ha ta ya g+ha ha/
ya/ oM mu ka sa kA t+yaM ku ru hUM hUM hUMphaT phaT dza: suhA/ bdud rtsi yis na kha bkang ste// lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yisani// las rnams thams cad slob

par sgom// oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ saMrtsa yo gi shwa ri hU~MhU~M hU~Mdza : sA hA/ la sogs sbyor ba ji bzhin du// gtor ma'i las ni sbyar bya ste// zhi dang dbang dang dakhug pa dang// gsad dang snang dang btsong
bal// sgrub pos gtor ma'i de nyid kyis// las rnams thams cad bslababya zhing// yashes lcags kyu'i bye brag gis// rang 'dod lha ni tshim bar bya// zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong/
grong khyer ra yi rtse mo ru// 'byung po thams cad tshogs rgyur par// 'dusan sgrub po la mchog ster// gnas la sogs par rtag gnas shing// sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la///
lha mo rnams kyis mchog stor bar// sgrub pa po la blo tsom med// gang gi sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i// ri yi bsgrub pa bshad par bya// rgan po ma yinarma med cing// mdzod ku ba la sogs spangs/
shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis// 'byung po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang// lha yi chu yis bkru bar bya// mar khu chen pos byug pa dang// bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya//
maN+Dal gru bzhi byas nas ni// de dbus 'bad pas gru gsum bye/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// zhes bya la sogs sngon bzhin brjod// ha hAho hI hun+tu he ho// zhes bya'i rgod pa rnam pa
brgyad// sgrub pa po yis chog bzhin bya// ma la gnas pa'i sa bon na// rlung gis bon gyis phya pa// spyi gtsug tu ni sbyar byas la// sa yi steng du mchod par bya/ rnal 'byor ma yi dbus gnas par
'bad pa yiso namyur du blta// sgrub pos bdag nyid bsam bya ba/ skya gnos dbus su rim bzhin blta// 'bar bo phrang gi ni rgya mtsho ste// tho'i 'od dang bcas bltazhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang
mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha'o 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dang 'a de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las 'du
ba[d/ ]ba'i gnas nges pa dang/ sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba stabaco brgyad pa'o///de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma mo' dikyil 'khor dge ba dang// lha rnams thams cad
sgrub pa dang// de bzhin pho nya'i khyad par dang// 'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che// gangagazhan lus sul la sogs pa// de bzhin sngags kyi 'phrang ba rnams // da ni khyod la bshad kyis nyon//
grubazhi pa la sgo bzhib// sgo khyud dang ni ldan pa yi/u0f38/dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bri bar bya// dngoso grub kun gyi yon tan gnas// 'dod yon lnga yis rab brgyan// mchod pa 1 dang yang
dag ldan// ro la g.yogs pa'i ris sam ni// mtshon gyis brgyan pa'i ras dag dang// bubatsas pa yi ras dang ni// ba glang ko ba la sogs la// dam tshig canagyi 'dri mkhan gyis// sgrub
po mchog gis 'dra ru bzhug/ tshes brgyad dang na bcu bzhi la// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bslab par bya// denas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas// mngon gsum du ni mdun gsal 'gyur/
tshangs pa che dang zhi ba mo// gzhon nu ma dang phag mo dang// dbang mo dang ni chu// tshogs kyi debang mo srogabyed ma// rim pa gnyis pa yi'o/ dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang na yi
dgas gtso// srogabyed bdenabralaM rlung galha// rim pa gsum pa yi'o// nyi ma dang na zla ba dang// mig dmar dang nagaza' lhag dang// phur bu dang ni pa sangs dang// spyan pa dang ni ra h+phul
ba ]// rim pa bzhi pa yi'o// tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin du// du ru ma byed sgo bzhir ro// sa dang chu dang ma dang rlung// 'byung bo chen po'i khams rnams dang// mkha' 'gro ma//
dang mar ma// 'jib byed 'brogabyed bcas pa gtso// 'byung bo las kyang 'byang ba'i gzugs// sab pas cho ga bzhin du sgrub// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// pha rol dkyil 'khor grwa
bar bya// dbus su kun nas zlum por ni// ri mo mdzes pa bskor bar bya// pad 'dab brgyad bris nas ni// ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul gyis// dbus su khro bo chen po bu/zhal gcig phyag nibazhi/
ba ste// gal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal// sku mdog sngon po drag chen po// thod pa'i 'phrang bas rnam por klubs// yi dgas la zhan te mar bzhugs// sum cu
gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad// gar dang ldan zhing stag lcags bsnabs// spyan gsum shing tu gsal ba'i gzugs// rdo rdzo'abar ba ba dan gsum// khrag gang ba yi gsher dang bcas// mda' dang
gzhun de bzhin te// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis 'phyur// shar du mkha' 'grom bri ste// lho yi phyogs su 'phrog byed ma// 'jib byed lhamo nub du bri// byang du lha ma 'baran 'o/ lha mo phag mo
zhes bya ba// phyag bzhi yi ge hU~M las byung// sku mdog sngon mo drag chenamo// phag gi gdong cana'ajigs par byed// mda' dang de bzhin gzhudang ni// rgyal mtshan thod pa thogs pa'o// zhi ba mon
las byung// mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo ste// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu dang// kha TaM Ta ru de bzhin no// gzhonanu man hilas byung// kha dogasar mo phyag bzhi pa// mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan
gsum// mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin no/ tsamuts+tshinaholas byung// mdog sngo lag ba bzhi pa ste// kha cha dang ni thod ba dang// gshor dang de bzhin ka ma ru// khaM las byung ba'i tshangs ba mo// mdog
dkar lag pa bzhi pa ste// pad+ma dang ni khrod ba dang// de bzhin gzhan na mda' gzhu'o/ tshogs kyi dbang mo gi las byung// sngo bsangs mdog ste lag banam// mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa dang/
bgrang 'phreng g.yas g.yon lag tu thogs// khyab 'jug ma na khaM las byung// mdog sngolag pa bzhi pa ste// chang dang chu yi thod pa dang// zhags pa kha Ti de bzhin gzhan// dbang mo a las babyang ba
sto// mdog ser las ba bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje shag ti thod pa dang// sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid// thams cad byen zla 'bar ba dang// sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan pa ste// ro yi stan bzhugs
spyan gsum dang// stag gi pags pa rkang dkris pa'o// shar sgo tshangs pa dri bya ste// mdog dkar lag pa bzhi dang ldan// thod pa dang ni bgrang 'phreng dang// ril ba spyi blugs bad+ma thegs/ byang du
do bzhin khyab 'jug ste// mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan// mdung dang de bzhin 'khor ladang// thod pa dang ni dbyug pa mchog/ lhor ru tra dri bya ste// du ba'i mdog can lag pa la// rtsa gsum
mdung dang thod pa dang// zhags pa dang ni brang 'phrang thogs// nub tu skam byed bri bya ste// mdogasar lag pa bzhi dang ldan// shag ti dang ni dbyug pa dang// dpa' bo'i thod pa//

za bgrang 'phreng thogs// dbang ldan khyu mchog stan la zhon// kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum thogs// gzhanaganyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang bo glang chenazhon pa ste// mdog ser lags

sh+tsa bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje dang na thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// ma ni lug gi snyan la zhon// kha dog dmar po lag bzhi pa// ma thab nyid dang thod pa dang// gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'o//
gshin rjea ha'i stan la zhon// kha dog sngon po lag bzhi pa// dbyug pa dang na thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o// bden bral gi rong ston bzhugs pa/ kha dog ljang ku lag bzhi pa//

khaTab dang brod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag stathal sbyar ba'o// mu sgyu chu srin stan la bzhugs// kha dog dkar po lag pazhi pa// zhags pa dang ni thod pa thogs/ gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar bgo/

tsha rluran sha ba'i stan la bzhugs// du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa// ba dan dang ni thod ba thogs// gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o// lus ngan gter gyi stan la gnas// kha dog sor de lag ba'i nga//

rin chen dang ni bro ba thogs// lag gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar bgo/ gza' dang skar ma thams cad kyang// rang rang dam tsheg 'as byung zhing// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs chen po// rang rang stan la gnas
[.]bar bas// ma mo rnams kyang kun gyi ma// 'byung bo'i rig pa gzhan de bzhin// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa yi// pho nya'i sgrub thabs de nas bshad// so sor stobs kyis tshar gyis tshar bcad pa////
nyon cig lhamo skal chenas// les spyod la ga'i sgrib pa pos// bon las ni brtsam par bya// zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms byas te// sngags kyi rgyal bo bskul ba yis//
thams cad dran bzhin byed bar gyug/ dur khrod dang nibang gcig tu// dar ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya// shar dung byang dang nub dang ni// de bzhin du ni lho phyogs su// drug drug tu ni byas nas su//
de nas mchod pa brtsam par bya// gnas la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi// ram pa bzhin du yongs su bskor// dri dang ma tog de bzhin du// mar ma dang ni dro yin// dri yi chu yis bkang ba yi//
bum pa'ang gos kyis mdzes par bya// nyin mtshan phrugs gcig gnas gyur cing// de nas mtshan gcig gnas par bya// gnas sogs yang yang phyag byas nas// de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya//
dpa' bo yi ni ston mo yas// dang bor slob dpon mnyes par bya// de ltar byas ba'i sngags pa yis// phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang// dmyal bar nges par srog 'gyur
te// bgegs kyis nye bar gtses nas ni// nges par dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i dri mkhan gyis// 'byung po'i nyim la rnyed pa'i// bu btsas la sogos ras la ni// tshon rtsi khrag
dang bsras nas su// stong du skyes pa'i nang bzhag nas// sgrub pa 'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// yi dgas son rtsi mar chen dang// sha chen gyis ni bdug par bya/ 'di la dri yis
bsgos nas su// de bzhin ye dgas me tog mchod// lha mo chen po mchod pa 'disaM// ma 'bar ma na mchog tu mnyes// shing gcig gan drud du/ chog bzhin du 'bum bzlas bya// rgyal
sogs pa'i dus su ni// slob dpon gyis ni 'dri ru gzhug/ sor na bcu gnyis tshad du bya// gzugs bzang bzhon pa phun sum tshogs// rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// gos sor po
bgos par bri// lag gnyis gyen du thal mo sbyar// mo 'bar ba ni kun tu 'od// sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas ni// 'bad de cho ga bzhin mchod bya// ma tog dmar dang dri la sogs// sha sam
gyis ni bdug nga ra bya/ sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs// nye bar spyod pa gto mo sbyin// rdzas lha dag gi dngos po yi/ mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na na// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste//
gnyis pa la nita dra 'o// gsum par shingan g.yo 'gyur to// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya bstan nas ni// sngags de la brjod bar bya// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni/
spyi bor bzhag ste brjod bya ba// o de pe ArihUM/ thuphu :dam tshig sngags dang phyagargyu'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba yi// dam tshig chun sbyin par bya// 'bad de dam tshag byin nas ne/
lag pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyes med pa// byin gyis rlobs la yang sgra bas shig/ de nas shin tu mdzes ma yis// bza' dang btung sogs ston modang// gas
gnyis star 'gyur te// zad ba nyid du longs spyod bya// 'dod la dga' ba'i dga' byed ma// gal te grub par ma gyur na// drag mo ya nas bon gyis// gzir te 'bum du bzlas bar bya//
sa bon gyis na gzer tsam gyis// mar mo ma yi sbyare 'gam// rtag tu sems can don brtson pas// 'bar ma chung mar bsgrub par bya// nyon cig lha mo shes rab che// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro
sgrub pa'i thabs// thang ka bras gnyis byas nas su// lhag par gnas te mchod gtor nas// de nas ri mo 'du ru gzhug dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis nga
[W]3/ shin tu mdzes pa'in ba[é]'a gsol// lag na sdigs mdzung lcags kyu thogs// sku grol bas ni rnam par mdzes// ma 'a ra 'od zer shinatu gsal// ha har dgod cing mig g.yonam/
sa la khrag gis byugs nas su// gnas de bris sku dgram par bya// ma tog dmar po la sogs pa// dri dang bdug pa'i khyad par gyis// nye bar mchod dang gtor ma da gang/ shadang nya dang btsong
la sogs// bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang bar bya// rnalaM 'byor mni sgoma'ang zlos// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// khar bcug nas ni bgad par bya//
tshoTak+ki ni hUM phu/ sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang po san g.yo gyur to/ gnyis pa la nimadun du dgod// gsum pa mdun du snang 'gyur te// ngani ba la ni bka'
nodaro// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig babadade byin nas ni// g.yog moru nibasgrubs pa yis// ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya// dgra rnams bsad cing smad pa dang// yan lag gzir ba
ny+tsa gang 'dod bgo/ de la sogs pa'i thams cad na// g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub pa 'gyu'o// gal te 'bum gyis gdon than// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin// mkhas
bas gzir bar byas te bzla// ra dag gi ni pags pa la// 'bad de thang ka brkyang bar bya// 'jing byed ma ni 'di ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po'an tu mdzes// lus la rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang// mdzes
pa'i gos gyon bar bri// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang/ g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong ba/mkhas pa yis ni bslab bya ste// lci ba yis na phyogs bya
la= dme tog sna tshogs dgram bcu// ma tog bdug ba mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// khrag dang nya dngasha dang btsong// bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang// bdud rtsi lnga yis
bkang la sbyin// 'bad de bsam gtan gnas bar bzla// oM A karA ya phuphaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas su// nags ba'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgyago
[4]rnal 'byor ba yis 'bum bzlas bas// 'jib byed ma ni 'grub gyur te// dang po khyi ni du ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod// gsum pa lan mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni
'ong bar byed// bzhi bar mdun du 'duganas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol sgras// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig dgan byin nas su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul bo
bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so// de nas nyi ma re re zhing// gser srang phyed phyedaskor bar 'gyur// gal te 'khum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying pos gzir tA bzla// sa bon 'dre yis gzir tsam gyis//
'jig byed ma yi mego'agams so// chu 'gram gyi nis phyogs su// kam bo dzani bsgrub bar bya// ba glang la sogs ko ba gi/ brkyang sa 'brog khyod ma 'drir gzhug/ lus ni skabagyis brgyan pa ste//
kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// sku grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar bgongashing phyag gnyis brjes// ral gri dang nizhag sa ba thogs// ho har dgod cing rnam par gtsigs// khrag gis
maN+Dal byugs nas// dri dang me tog bdug bas bdug/ sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan ng yi// gyon bzhin lha ya gtor ma sbyid// rnal
'byor bzhisgom zhing zlos// 'bum gcig gsani 'grub 'gyur te// dang bo mun g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bab// gsum bar thog na'i bab 'gyur te// ban pa lan mdun du
[6 ]@#// gnas// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin// o krus phuphu sA hA/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// de yi sngags brjod par/

zabya/ snying bo'i sngags dang phyag rgya lo// mdun na thal mo sbyar nas// ci zhig bgyi nas brjod par 'gyur// tisa'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni// brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang 'dir ni 'ong
ba dang// rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung// nga 'dod ba ni khride de shog/ gsar dang dngul dang zangs khra sogs// bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong//
lha yi bu mo 'am mi'ang rung// tiso gangs kyi rna ru ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes
mkha' 'gro ru// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// don rkang pa g.yon pa yis// mnan te brgyar ni bzlas na ni// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma grub na//
dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas// dum bu dum bur gtub par bya// ka zhes bya dang gsod pa dang// hU~M gis bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cad du ni bza' bar bsag/ des ni bsgrub
bya'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyi ni debad phyug ma'ang// gal te ba sgrub 'chapar 'gyur// bstan po'i las kyis ma sgruban// ba la ka nag po yi shing// ma sbar ba yi dbus su ni//
khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni// nye ma'i phyed na hUM zhes pa// brjod de sbyin sreg byas nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur bas// gdon mi za bar bgrub par 'gyur/
da nas shangadakar sgrub ba'i thabs// nyon cig lhamo sgol chen ma// dur khrod dang ni shing gcig dang// chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyang// dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis// tshonagyis dkyil
'khor bri bar bya// sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad dag tu// dpa' bo ya ni sa la bri// gru gsum dkyil 'khor dag ba ste// dkyil 'khor zlum ba'i tshul du bya// sku mdog sngon po glang la zhon//
lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// pho mtshan gyen 'greng zhi ba'i gzugs// ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan// zhal bzhi nga la phyago bzhi pa// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par klubs//
kha hUM ga dang thod pa nyid// dobazhin gzhan ni gshor dang ldan// bshang gcir ldan pas mchod bya ste// 'byung po kun la gtor ma sbyin// sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas su/[”]/'bum
du bzlas par bsgrub bar bya// o ka pA la mA la a la kri ta khri hU~M hU~M/ A gats+tsha A gtsA ru dra ya swA hA/ spyan drangs pa'i sngags so// oM Aru ru hUM hUMsAg+ha ) 'bum du bzlas pas
'grub par 'gyur// gal te grub par ma gyur na// de nas de ni bsreg par bya// grub nas bye ba thams cad ni// byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min/// de nas yang dag bshad/
bya ba// nor lha ya naslob ba'i thabs// ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram// 'bab chu 'dus pa 'i mde dag tu// sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor mchogan bsgrub
bar bya// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad dag tu// khyed bar du ni bsgrub par bya// kha dog nag po shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyagani bzhi pa ste// 'khor lo dang ni dbyig pa bsnams// thod pa pad+mado
bzhin ni// rin chen gyi ni cod pan dang// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// bshang gci dang ni khu ba khrag/ mchod pa'i nyid du sbyin bya zhing// mi yi' yes bdug byas na// dngos grub ra
bar byed par 'gyur// oM A:badzranArA ya NahU~MhUM swA hA/ sbyan drang ba'i sdigs so/// oM ma tsakra sA d+hu a sarba a su ra da ma na hU~MswA hA/ stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis// lha ma yin ni kun
gyi sgor// 'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur zhing// sgyu ma thams cad ston byed do// dgra rnams thams cad 'dul nus shing// rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur// choga'i rim pa 'di nyid
kyis// de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste// chu yi 'gram na dben pa dang// khyad par pad+mo'i tshal du sbyab// kha dog sor po phyag bzhi pa/ gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas//
zhib ral pa'i cod pan 'chang// mchod phyir thegos kyis rnam par brgyan// pad+ma dang ni bgrang 'phreng dang// dbyug nga dang ni thod pa bsnams// sgrub pa rong ya gtso bo yis// bris sku dag ni
dmigs nas su// yid 'ong sna tshogs dri 'a ma ni// gur kum tsan dan la sogs pa// dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing// rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yi// mchod pa'i tshoga'i ram de dag/ b+ha ga'i dbus

su sbyin bar bya// oM bra h+phagatsachu AsA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM b+hud+d+ha bsta tra bi dru ba ra Nab+hargo de ba sa d+himahid+hi yo yon pra tshod ya rta/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te// zhi ba dang
ni rgyas pa dang// dgug deng dbang du bya ba dang// nor bskyod ba dang mngon spyod sogs// las rnams thams cad nus 'gyur te// bzlas dang spyin srog kun gyis 'grub// khyod la yang dag bshad/
pa yin// nyon cig lhamo skal chen mo// bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabasag/ ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar// bsgom pa dag pa byas nas// blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas// 'bad
dbris sku dmigs par bya/ kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba// skyili krung phyed nga 'i gar gyis bzhugs// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan// 'od zer dmar bo/
'bar zhing 'khrug/ mtsho ba gtsigs pa'ajigs par bri// dgra sta dang ni gtun shing dang// mda' dang gzhu ni dra bzhin te/ kha ga dang lcags kyu dang// khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang// de bzhin

rdo rje ral gri ste/ gzhan yang sha chen thod ba bsnams// mu sund dang ba dan gsum// shag ti dang ni bcu gnyis so// oM a mo le g+ha sid+d+ha sarba rgya ma sA d+ha ya hU~M hU~Mdza dzas hA/ sbyan drang ba'i/
sngags so// oM a: gan+d+haM swA hA/ bzlas ba'i sngags so// stong phrag brgyas na 'grub 'gyur te// de nas las ni brtsam par bya// lan cig bzlas nas thig le dag/ sngags pas
byas n skal bzang 'gyur// rgyal po sbyor yang mchod 'thob ste// dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur// bgegs rnams ma lus bsad pa dang// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras star bar// 'gyur ba 'di

blo tsam mod// cho ga' sbyor ba de nyid kyis// ma mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs mchog/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// gza' rnams kyang ra sgrub par 'dod// oM sarba ti thinak+Sha du grwa de mang+ge b+huswA hA/ gza'
thams cad kyi sngags so// o zhes bya ba dang po ste// sA hA'i mtha' na byin rlabs ces// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo tshonakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshags//
bcog ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'byung bo dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste banu dgu pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cade phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes de nyid khyad pa ra dang// lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags// de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te//
bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// nyen tsage lha mo sgyu ma che// sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba// rtsachen po na sum cu gnyis// de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso// bcu

[4:]dung gnyis ni de bzhin du// dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de// yar ngo mar ngo'i phyi brag gas// nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin// dus ni myur dang ra de ba dag/ yan lag mtshan ma nyid dang ni// gang
zhig shes ba tsam gyis na// 'che ba'i dus la bab pas gnas// dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na// lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi// snga dro ro hita'i dus su// de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya// sna

dang mig gi gnas dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa// lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni// de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang// snying kha'i dra ba lte ba dang// brgya dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// chu so dang ni

mtshan dag dang// mgo dang spyi gtsug gi na phyogs// dbugs ni chad cing gyur pa yi// lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru// 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed// nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis na ]/'khor les dus kyi bdag
nyid brtsi// sgo gcig nas na ni drug tu// gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa// yon tan gsum gyi la dag ni// zhag ni sum brgya drug nu ru// bgos pa yin tshad dag ni// mdor bsdus nasan bstan par bya//

lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag/ dus kyi grangs su bstan pa dang// nyin zhag dag ni bco brgyud du// de yi tshadani yang dag brjod// 'am dag ni bdun dang mjug/ gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na// kho gnyis dang ni

de bzhinadu// zla ba drug tu 'tsho'agyur zhing// de bzhin lo gnyis zla bani// rig byed kyi nigs dang ni// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// 'tsho 'gyur dus kyi gras yin no// galaM de 'on dgu rgya gyur na// lo gnyis
zla ba bzhi dang ni// nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni// lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin// gal te nyin bcur rgya gyur na/ leganyis las ni mi 'tsho// gal te nyen nag banugacig/
tu/sgo gcig nas ni rgyu ba dgu/ lo gcig bzla ba dgu dang ni// nyin zhag babargyad dag lasan// mi'atsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad// nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyun ni// la gcig dang na zla bani//
dbyangs kyi rgyungs dang nyin zhag ni// dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho'o// gal te nyi ma bcu gsum du// g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba na// gcig dang ni zla ba dag/ rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyim dgu
las mi 'tsho zhes// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de// lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni// nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las// 'tsho
b.ra'i 'gyur de yi ni// tshe tshad nges bar bstan pa yin// gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du// g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyu na// legocig na ni gdon mi za// gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas

nasarlung ni rgyu ba dag/ de yi tshatshad nges pa dag/ zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni// ti shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni// mi 'tsho bar na ngas bshad de// gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyun/

denas de yi tshe tshad ni// zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag na// bco brgyad dag las mi 'tsho bar// gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin// shin zhag bco brgyar rgyun ni// zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni// nyin zhag nyi ma'i
grangs su ni// de yi dbus ni bshad pa yin// gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru// dri yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag 'ji srid 'tsho ba bshad par bya// zla ba dag ni bdunadang ni// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za//

gal te nyin zhag nyi shurani// rgyu ba zla ba drug na// de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig/ nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu ba// zla ba lnga dang nya mni// nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tsho'o//

nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na// zla ba rige bying grangs dang ni// nyin zhag lheshu rtsa bzhi las// mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag ste// nyin zhag nyi shu gsum gyi bar// sgo gcig nas ni rlung rgyun// zla ba bzhi dang

'am ni// dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho brjod// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyur ngang// zla ba gsum dang nye ma ni// bcu gcig dag las ma 'tsho'o// nyin zhag nyi shu lnga rgyu na// zla ba gsum las mi 'tsho'o// de
las gong ma sngar bstanapa'i// grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya// nganu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las na// bar bar gyisani bstan pa yin// tshadang chu yis rim bzhin du// bar bar nyi ma gsal bar
byas// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// dus de dag ni bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus// shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa// khams snyoms pa yi lus la ni// de dag blta zhing yid

ches bya// sgo na stong du 'bab pa yi// sna yi ba yod tshad gyur na// nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med// cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas// de bzhin sgo na sdong bltas las// mig gi chu ni chad gyur na//
nyi ma ldan 'chi bar 'gyur// cha shas brnyan shes bya ga/ steng du bltas te 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yon dang 'gram pa yi// ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni// nyin zhag gcig las
mi 'tsholo/ tshashas bcu gcig gnas ba yi// gsal bar stong du 'gro ba las// rnab g.yas par brten pa yis// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag na'achi// cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas//
ny+tsa/ lce yi skud pa nag mthong na// lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi// cha shas bcu gsum brten pa gi/ da bzhin stong du 'bar ba yi// stong 'og tun 'thams gyur na// 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren//
srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brtan pa ni// mgrin pa'i klon gnas ba'i rtsa// stong du bltas ba zhes grags kyis// nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tsho// cha shas bco lnga
gnas pa yi// stong dubaltas pa mchog dol// brangagi dra ba zhom gyur na// zla phyedan ni gdon mi za// chashas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag/ lte ba'i dbus gyur stong bltas pa// sen mo'i khrig ni
med gyur na// nyin zhag bdun yang dag nyal// slar yang cha shas bcu bdun// gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhin// 'chi 'gyur 'dir na gdon mi za// cha shas bco
brgyad gnas ba yi// byin pa la gnas ba'i rtsa// de bzhin stong du bltas pa yis// nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis 'chi// khacu dgu la zhi cha shas gnas// nus de bzhin stong bltas pas//
de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni sgra tsam med// chashas te shu gnas pa yi// pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// stod du bltas ba mchog dbang phyug/ mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi/
grus kyis 'tsho 'gyurtse tsam med// re'u mig bcug nyis brtsisakha la// bar b.ranyi ma bstan pa dag/ lo ya rim gyis de sbyangs to// bdun du rtsaganyis rim pa dang// sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad
kyis// zla ba la sogs go rims bzhin// rim gyis bal gyis dbri bar bya// lhag mar gang zhig gyur nga gi/ bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus suni// lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang
mnyam sbyor bar// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rjemakha' 'gro las/
rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung bzhes bya ba'i rim par phul ste shu bko/ sgo dgu po ya mtshan nyid dang// rtsani gang bar gnas pa ya// yon tan skyon
sogs ji ltar blta// da rnams bye brag 'tshal te// ya shos dbang nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// gong du 'bo ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid// bshad kyisalha mo mnyan
bar gyis// sngon du bdag nyid sbyang byas la// phyin las brtsam par bya// gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i// pad chen zla ba lta bu 'adzag slar yang gzugs su gnas ba ste//
rnam pa kun gyis brgyan pa'o// cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// khani thur du bltas te 'phyang// go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas nasan// kund zla 'od rtagatu dag/ rnam
shes yashes bdud rtsi na// lha mo chen mo 'bab ba'i mchog/ rten du gyur ba'i pad+ma gang// zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// de ni cha dang chayi gzugs// gong bu gnas pa zhes byar brjod//
de nas gzhan yang bshad byas// gnas kyi mtha' ni dag bar bya// dganas srid pa 'pho bya yi// gzhan du nani bdwa par 'gyur// dgang ba yisanilus bkang na// dug dang 'aAkyis tshe ba 'phrog/
bum pa can gyis sgo bcings na// sgo ya sbu gu dag par 'gyur// 'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya// rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur// rnam shes dbrog pa'i chog dang// gzhan du 'gro ba'od bshad
ts+tshA bar bya// de nas phyi rol sbyor ba// mkhas pa gsan sbyang bar bya// gnas gnyis dag ni bsamasanas su// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom bar bya/ rlung ga debus su ma yis ni// yang dang
mang du dbye bar bya// A li kA lir ldan pa yi// sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya// rnal 'byor ba yi khyad par du// 'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya// 'byung ba ye shes sa bon bya// bsnyan dang
ldan bar bsam par byed// 'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la// mo tog lta bu r brnyan par// rnal 'byor bas ni'akhyong bzlas to// bdag nyid las ni phyi rolaM bya// 'jug ba 'byung bar mtshon bya ste/
de khon nyid mnyam par grol// mnyam gzhag dngos bo bsgoms nan// 'grub 'gyur 'dire na tho tsog ma// denas phyi rolo lus la ni// sgrub pa po yas rnam par sprul// nyi ma'i lam nas dad phyung ste//
lhamochashas ldan par bya// bsgrub bya'i snying khar zhugs nas ni// rlung dang mi yis 'bar ba dag/ de yi rnam shes bzung nas ni// lus kyi dkyil 'khor duzhigazhug/ bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus
nas su// 'og gi kho la sbyar ba'i bya/ ji srid zad par byas bsu// de sridazhugs te gnas bar gyur// 'chi ba'i dus la babagyur na// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang// rtsis la sogs paMs/
ma khog par// gong du 'pho ba mchog yin no/ denas gzhanagyi lus l 'jug/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// sang gi rnam rol lug rgyu yig rnal 'byor ba yis bcings
nas su// rtag tu srog dang rtsol bar bya// khyod kyis gnas su sbyar nas ni// rang gi lus na yongs btang sti// rim gyis sbyor bas phu nas su// cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis// sngags ba gzhan gyi
lus la 'jug/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// rang gis lus la sbyar bar 'dod// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis// mnyam par bzhag ste gang byed pa// dba' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang/
mkha' 'grom dang sbyor bas mchod// gang gis ring nas thos gyur ba// de ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon// de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sams kyi// bsam pa rjes su shes par bya// sgom dang
bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi/ sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur// gang ga la nas bsams na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// 'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan bar// zhugs
te nyan bganyis su ni// 'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni// ma stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor// rlung gis bskyod pa'i mo yis ni// shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na// zla drug tsam gyis ngos
bar ni// ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur// bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// bshes mig gis ma thod gyur pa// shin tu ring na gnas pa yang// sgrub khos skad cig gsal bar mthong//

bstan dang ma bstan gang ci'ang rung// de kun nga gis yang dag bshad// nyonatsayig lha mo sgyu ma che// dag pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang// gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// thar ba'i dngos grub rang sbyor pa//
mchogadang tha ma'i bye braga rnams // mdor bsdus nasan bshad par bya// lte ba lasan 'dod khams lha// thig ler gzugs can mtho bse te// stong nas 'gro bar stong gin// myur du 'grolor
byed par 'gyur// snanas gnod sbyin gnas su ste// rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha// gal te mig lam ye shes 'gro// mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo las yi dgos te/ de
bzhin nu las dud 'gro go/ chu min gyis na dmyal bar lhung// thar pa'i lam las gzhan du 'gro// sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis// sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rgyal ba lnga yi mchod
[z/]rtanagyi/ sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya/ de la 'og gi sgo run// chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/ dang numanag+ho lani// cha yi sa bon 'bar ba ste// de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// dbugs

nibu ma ba can du sgrog/ lus ni rlung gi re dog tu sa// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ra bya// rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can// rlung gi sa ben rtsa bar te// thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi// rtsa ba'i sa bon/
drang ba'akhyu// 'og tu rlung gi dkyilaM 'khor gyis// sgra dang sgra yis 'phul bar byed// dus min lho rnams gsod par 'gyur// lha rnams bsad ba tsam gyis ni// dmyal bar nges par srog par 'gyur/
de bsal chiba'i mtshanaman// mkhas pas 'badu de shes par bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngar bstanang gi/ sngo chen bde ba phun sum tshogs// sgrub po rnams kyis smin pa la// stong gi rna ba
bza' bar bya// chu dang skya reng 'a na pa dag/ g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la// zos nazhi dang rgyas pa ste// dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog/ tshiga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// b.rIs dang smin
ba 'joms ba'i byed/ lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis// nam mkha'i 'gro ba brjod par bya// rlud dang ma yi bya brag gis// rkang pa'i 'khor lerasgyur byas te// yid kyis rab tu ni'i sgranas//
nam malo'alane'agro 'gyur zhing/ mkha' 'gro kun gyis bskor nas su// lha yalus kyis kun tso// ji srid zla nye yod kyi bog/ desrid nam mkha' gnas par 'gyur// slar yang lug
las bzlog pa yis// kha dog dkar po'i pad+ma bas// bslab bya'i dbus su sbyar na ni// rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed// rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba// rlung gdekyil
'khor 'khrug pa ltar// rang gi khams byung nas su// bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim par bya//nyi ma bdunagyis dngos grub tu// 'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin// rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi// lus
la thim par gyur ba dang// de yi sems no bzung nas su// bdag la gzhug sta ma la// bsams de rludadad moh+pharabs// de yi lus ni'akhrug par 'gyur// tshigs dgu'os stong gzhan
gyis// mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste// nyin rer bram ze gsod pa dang// mtshams med ldan byed pa dang// rku 'phrog 'a dod la spyod pa yang// lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te// sdig pas gos
par mi 'gyur zhing// srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro// ji ltar 'dalas skyes pa yi// bad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba// de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni// ye shes skun 'dod bzhin 'gro//
mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdoNo
mkha' 'gro las/ gongadu 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang/ sang ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung ba'i rim par phyob sta nyi shu gcig pa'o//klungag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni//
[4 ]de nas yang dag bshad par bya// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de// sor mo khar ne'ajug byed pa// mkha' 'grom le mtshanam 'o// gyo gyu : thal mo spyi bor 'jog//
byed ba// 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// gu glu : mthe bong 'ching bar byed pa na// 'jig byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// mu g+ha lag par rdebs pa ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lu glu :
sna rtser skyor mo rdeb pa ni// thugs bad mi bde 'dri ba yin// daMSh+Tha/ sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa// rnal 'byor byed nga 'i mtshanama'o// gan d+hod/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa/ nga
yi snying sdug grogs po 'o/ a la nad ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshar phyod pa// 'dusanang gtor ma ba za zhes pa'o// b+hak+Sha ye ) lag pa tshul 'ju byed pa'o// khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// dI
ra ti/ lag pa sIng ba byed ni// dan nga yid 'ong ba'i// ru tsa pa da ba da/ sna rtsa khu tshur 'chang ba// mad do zhus na ston pa'o/ shun tA/ lag pa brkyang ste ltar rdzob na// phunasum
ldan par yod ces pa'o// tri ka sa ha/ lte ba ru ni nyid byed na// kha zas za bar 'dod pa'i// tsats+tshali ka/ mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na// zhe gnag gtum la drag po go/ na la dan tu ba/
ta/ sminamal ni reg byadan// 'dir 'dod ba na da lta ston// a ni ga yu ta ) lce ne 'grel bar spyod pa dag/ da ltar 'chi zhes bya'o// dur ga te/ kun tu lta ba'i byed pa ni// tshes gras
[% ]ka khul largya nyi zam pa/ roshes par 'dod pa'o/ gtar gan/ tshes gciganas ni brtsams nas su// mthe bos ra mo bri bar bya// nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa// sngar bstan dun mdun du rig//
gi rigs stong du lta bar byed pa ni// nyin byed dga' bas rol pa// sa ma tshal/ 'dzum dang bcas par byed cing// lag pas lag tu bzung nas su// rgyu mtsholta bu r stonapyad pa// nor
wA/zas khyenazhes bya ba 'o// dzarnab ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chad byedan// da ltar grogs la 'dong zhes pago/ sawA ta/ mthe bong gisani srin lag gsal// reg pa'am be ram 'gyur ba'o// som/
mkhre bong khro gzab la sogs// sAr+ya/ mal 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rdzomakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo tshosams dpa' de bzhin gshags// bcom ldan rdarjecan gyis gsungs/
b+hU rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po dpal rdo rjo mkhalo'agro las/ rnal 'byor ba dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ngag gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i tshoga' rim par phye bas che shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
lha mos slar yang gar mdzad de// rgyu 'di yisan mnyes par byas// a bo si ta ya/ ru Nani b+ha dzani til sbrum/ ga ma a gam d+ha d+ha ma ya nas/ ni ga ma sA/ rig ma b+hu pa tisi'i 'i sa'i
rAs nasam rgyam sar sru tan sa ni/ ra b+hag ma ya/ d+ha mAd+hamA ) sar pa pA ma a a pa pA ad+ma mi te/ mozhis rtsako/ shar du mgo/ gshin rjer ni khri'o/ nub tu ni mo byang dun ku'o/ me
mtshams sud+ma sago/ bden bral du nis ka/rlung mtshams su nikun na'o// dbang ldan du ni ba ma'o// an rgyur bko/ a ni zla ba la skyes ba'o/ un lha'i blama'i go/ e ni ba lha sangs
kyi'o// mo ni nyi ma'i bu 'o// an gza'i bdag po'i bong can no// ani te mgo/ gza' rnams kyi nitshog las// zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya// zla bkakaral dbang// nyi ma gdongalnga pal ste//
gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa// rasi ga nyis gnyis lan spyod// sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod kyis bshad// skar ma dus dar nyi ma gi/ bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal te// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol
bka' stsal ba/ lug dang ro hi ta sogs pa// gang gis 'chi ba bshad kyis nyon// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bar bya// zla ba dang na tshes grangs dang// skar ma dang ni dus dang ldan// gdon dang nadan/
bzhin te// sgrung ga shongarAsi tshad mni// gang zhig lasani rgyas ba'i 'ad// ba hrala'i mgo/ dgun zlar ba'i zla ba yi// gza' natshig dmar dag dang ni// rgyu skar smin drug ldan gyur pa/ rten
de yi 'chi dus yig/ sus kyang bskyab bar mi zhusaso// khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la//lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang// smyo zhing 'gul ba'i nad kyis ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya// de bzhin
dgun zla 'bring bo yo// gza' lhag dang ni sna'atshaldan// nyi ma bzhi pa de la ni// dgongs mo'i chi'agyur the tshom med// dgun zla tha chung lhamotshe// skar ma 'go dang ldan pa dang// gza' ni gza'
lhag bcas pa 'ag/ 'khrig pa'i ma ni gang yin pa// nyem drug la 'chibar 'gyur// dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la// skaram mgo dang ldan ng dang/ gza' ni ba lus ngas
'dzom zhing// nyi ma snga dro'i dus lan// karka Tar na 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyiso lnga la// skar ma mchu dang ldan pa dang// gza'anasrin par ldan pa la// sang ge'i ma ni 'chi
bar 'gyur// dpyid zla tha chung bcu gnyis la// sar ma nag par ldan ba dang// graza' na nyi ma dag la ni// skrun dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni// bu mo ma ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi
la// skor ma lha mtshams ldan pa dang// gza' ni mig dmar dag la ni// srang ga ma ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la// nage ba dang ni mig dmar la// sdig pa'i ma ni 'chi bar
'gyur// dbyar zla thachung tshos dgu la// skar ma gre bzhane ldan pa dang// gzhu yi mna'ache bar 'gyur// de dag nges par ldan gyur na// 'chi 'gyur bden par nga yis bshad// ston zla ra ba'i
bdun pa la// skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang// gza' ni zlo bar bcas pa la// chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// ston zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la// skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang// gza' nyi zla par
bcas pa la// bum pa' ma ni thod du 'gro// ston zla tha chung skya ma chen/ nyi ma dag na brgyad pa la// skar ma nam gru ldan pa dang// bza' ni san par bcas pa la// ta yem ni'ache bar
[s/]'gyur// sngon du skyo dus shes bya ste// phyi nas dus ni brtse bar bya// gzhan du dus ni smra ba dag/ thams cad don med nyid du 'gyur// skyo dus shinatumanyam bzhag ste// zhi dang drag po dpyad/
par bya// tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa// de nas de ltar lung bstan zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ rdo rje mkha' 'gror da ba mchog/ rdo rjesams dpa' de bzhin gshegs//

bzhi ldan rdo ts+tshacan gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chon ngo bo dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gza'i dang nyi ma'i dris nga ra 'ching tshar bcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye bas nyi shu rtsa gsum/ pa'o ka
lta sa kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyen// A li kA li mnyamabyas la// sde tshan du ni bstab par bya// dbyangs dang gsalabyed dang po
sogs// bltas te ming ni gzung bar bya// cha shas ldan la snying stobs can// de yi rigs ni shes par bya// mtha' yas la sogs klu rnams dang// nyes la sogs de bzhinagazag/
mkha' 'gro ma sogs ma mo rnams // de yi rigs su rab tu grags// lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni// sngags rnams thams cad de las skyes// skya bo thams cad skyed byed ma// des na/
zhes bya bar brjod// a yig dang ni de bzhin A// ka tsa Ta dang yang dag ldan// ta pa dang ni ya' ste// sde dgu yi ni yi ge'o// i dang slar yang lha mo A// de bzhinagazhan yang kha tsha//
tha pha dang ni ra ba nyid// sde tshan gnyis pa yin par brjod// chu dang lha mo de bzhin A// gu dza Da dang yang dag ldan// da pa dang le sasta// de dag sde tshan gsum pa yin//
yi ga a dang de bzhin so// de bzhin slar yang g+ha dz+ha// d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin// 'di dag sna tshan bzhi pa yin// a yig dang ni a yig dang/ daoMzhes byadang tsheg drag bcas// slar
yang nga nya Nanam// 'di dag sde tshan lnga pa yin// kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang// lhagam lnga dang bcas par bya// de dag skye bo thams cad kyi// skya dang 'jig par yang dag gnas// yi ge bcu
gnyis sgyu 'phralatsho// mtsho dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod// de dag rI sA zhes bya ba// skar ma kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba nyaga' bya drag gis/ de bzhin 'og dang stong du blta// brtan pa nyid
tshudang g.yo ba nyid// gces ngo gnyis su brjod ba yin// brkyang ba dang ni sbyar ba ste// rang dang thud dang pham dang skyag/ de las stong gi rgyal ba ste// 'og na'achib shes par bya// rgyu/
bar don 'gro ba yi// gza' dang rwa sa skar ma rnams // nyi ma la ni gnas to'achar// ra sa gza' dang gsum bar 'dod// dbugs rgyu ba dang yang dag ldan// thams cad rA ser shes par bya//
karka Ta dang glang bo'i dgra// de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang srang// chashas drug dang yang dag ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// sdig pa dang ni ru skyes dang// khyu mchog dang nibum par
bcas// mashas lnga yi tshad dang ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// nya dang lug dang de bzhin du// gzhu dang zung du spyod pa dag/ mashas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// snga ma bzhin du/
'char bar 'gyug/ slar yang ltas dang bcas pa yi// gza' rnams 'char ba bshad par bya// 'bras bu'i ming dang ldan par bya// ltas chen 'byung po mnyan par gyis// nag mo dang/ gcig
ma dang/ rga las 'das pa dang/ log 'dren ma dang/ gtum mo dang/ dragamo'i gzugs can ma dang ) dka' zlog lha mo dang/ rgyal ma dang/ rnam par rgyal ma dang/ me thub ma dang/ gzhan
gyis mithub ma dang/ nagamo bzang mo dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ nAg mo sbom mo dang/ dgong mo dang/ zla ba mo dang/ drag mo dang/ sdong ma dang/ 'phyang ba ma dang/ sum cu'i dbang mo dang//
'phrog byed ma dang/ 'baram dang/ 'jig byed ma dang/ lha mo 'di rnams mang dang na// ltas chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu star// nyes 'gyur du ni byas nas su//
dbang po'i dang yang dag ldan// ltas ni lhag ma bzung nas su// las ni shes pa nyid du bya// nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang// drag mo'agazugs dang dka' zlog nyid// nag bo ma dang
rgyal ma dang// drag mo sum cu'i dbang mo dang// 'phrog khyodam dang 'jib byed ma// bcu po 'di dag rtsub par grogs// bag ma len dang bkra shis dang// grong dang tshong 'dus gzugs pa dang/
lam du smyug dang 'thab mo dang/ chen po'i sar ni dbyung ba sogs// ltas de las ni 'bras med pas// dag b.las rnams mi bya sta// rigs de rnams la sgyu ma che//
za ba zang kho'ilasazhisbyar bar bya// dge bas kyang n gsod 'gyur na// dragamo'i los kyis smos ci dgos// lus gnas pa'i dbugs dang ni// phyi rol gza' dang ra si ste// phyi dang nang du btsas pa la//
sgyu rgyu ba shes na 'khrub par 'gyur// gza' gang yin pa dbyangs zhes bya/ dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang// rAsi nyid du shes par bya// dbus dang rwa sa da bzhin du// skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugs
su blta// phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par// 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyurag/ g.yo ba 'char la g.yo ba'i las// brtan pa la ni mi g.yo bar// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste// phyi dang nang du
( cas bas gsal// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rjemakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po tshon
ba bo dbal rje 'khaka'agro las/ gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba dang sde tshan gyi ltos kyi tshoga'i rim par phye ba ste ti shu rtsa bzhi bgo/dan gza' dang skar ma ru// bams pa'i rgyu ba
bshad kyis nyon// nyi ma rgyu ba'inyin mo ni// thun phyod lnga dang bdun pa la// bya ba ci yang mi 'grub bo// zla ba yi na bzhi dang drug/ mig dmar gyi ni gsum dang lnga// gza' lhag gnyis dang
bzhi pa la// gdon ma za bar 'jom par 'gyur// bla mas dang bo gsum pa la// 'che ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// ngan sdong gnaganyes pa dang// bdun pa la shes par bya// phal pa yin dang/
po dang// drug pa la 'chi bar byed// rigs de dag gi 'chi ba yi// dus ni yongs su chad bar bstan// de dag thunasong mtshan red de// rnal 'byor pa las gzhan bshad nyon// ldan s nye shu lnga yi
bar 3'di dgatun brjod bya ste// de las bzhugasum gyi bar du// ro re spel bar bya// dgun zla tha chung nya sa la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug/ gsum zung zla lhag tshos phyogs mda' yon tan/

thig le de dag gi ni 'tsho ba yang dag bshad pa yin// lnga las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu nas ni// bco lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni// de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du sbyang bar bya// de nas
sgrub pos shes bya ba// gnas skabs 'gyur ba bshad par bya// zla ba gang la gnas pa yi// dang po skar ma bgrang bar bya// nyi ma ye ni chu tshod dag/ jisnyad 'das pa de snyad ni// zla bar gnas
stobs rgyu ba'i phyir// de na drug nur bsgyur bar bya// slar yang nyi tshod zla ba bsnan// drug nu dun bsgyur bas na// mda' rang srog byed ro ya ni// dbang por bcas pas de bzhin bcad// bcu gnyis
dag gi nang nas// lhag ma'i cha shas gzung bar bya// lhag ma'i cha shas de yi// skyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan gyi sbyor ba yis// lhag ma'i chu tshod du ni brjod//
dang po'i zla ba'i bar gnas pa// de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur// gnyis pa bkra shis shis pa ste// gsum pa 'chi sta gsod par 'gyur// bzhi pa rgod de tshom par 'gyur//
lnga panor te nyams par 'gyur// drugab rims te lus 'jig 'gyur// bdun pa las ni dga' ba sta// tshem pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur// brgyad pa 'jig rten rlag par 'gyur// zla ba dgu par gnas
g.yis// lus ni dgra dang bcas par 'gyur// bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing// sna tshogs bsan rgyal bar 'gyur// bcu gcig sna tshogs 'jigs pas gdung// bcu gnyis pa ni los
sbyod de// bde ba chen pos brgyal bar 'gyur// lug la sogs pa bstan pa yis// zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo
semasadapa' de bzhinagshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje kun gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rjemakha' 'gro las/ thams cad rgyu ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mos mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sgang gshong 'khor lo khyed bshad pa// de rnams dbye ba ci 'dra dang// dus kyi grangs ni
ji bzhinagasungs// rgyu ba yi ni khyad par dag/ 'di la bdag ni the tshom skyes// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// dus kyi bgrang
b.lus yod cing// thams cad du na thams cad gnas// dngos po kun la khyab ba ste// lus la gnas kyang lus mi sku// dus nyid dus ni med pa dang// 'jig rten nyid ni 'jig rten min//
bden pa dang ni brdzun pa min// lha mo khyod kyis sngar bshad pagi/ bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid// gang zhig khyod kyis bshad pa de// don dam shin tu rnyed dka' ba// lus las
'das shing drimad nga// rnal 'byor pa yis ji ltar rtogs// skye bo kun la sman slad du// dbugs kyi nges pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nad med rlung dang bral
ba dang// khams ni snyoms par gnas pa dang// ran par za zhing chung bzhin rgyu// de yi mag nebatsums pa ste// mig btsums drug la cha shas ni// gracig ces bya bar brjod pa yin// yud tsam
drug nasnyad cig ste// skad cige drug ni thang cige yin// thang cig drugan cung zad yin// dus kyi gedzoms bya ba 'duse// sum cu tham par bsgyur ba la// yi ga lce ba'i dus zhes brjod// yug cig lci ba
bcu la ni// srog gcig ces bya'i dusasu bshad// de ni bcu gsum bsgyur ba las// de yang gnyis su bsgyur bani// srang gcig ces ni brjod pa yin// srangani drug cu tham pa la// chu tshod gcig tu
bzhed pa yin// de brgyad thun cig ces bya go/ de bzhi las ni nyin gcig go// nyin mtshan dus ni mnyam pa lo// mtshan mo 'ang de dang mnyam par bshad// chu srin nas ni sbal pa'i por// nyi ma 'phel/
bar brjod pa sta// lha mo srung ni gsum gsum gyi// nyin ra bzhinan stsal bar bya// chu srin las na 'das nas su// mtshan mo srung rwagasum gsum 'bri// tshad ma de dag
bstanaba'i phyir// zangs ma srang ni bcu gnyis la// snod ni dbang du sor brgyad dang// rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis pa// legs ba nyid du brdung bar bya// gser ni'olas sum cu las// sor drug pa
yi tshadatsam du// thur ma legs par brdungs nas ni// thur ma de yis bu ga ni// zangs ma'i snod la mkhas pas dbug/ nu ni slob ma med pa las// srang ni drug cu'i tshad du bya// srang 'dis chu

'a tshod tshad yin te// skya bo rnams la phan phyir bshad// chu tshod de na yud tsam ste// thun phud dang na thun gcig dang// nyin dang mtshan mo'i ched kyis ni// rim bzhin bla phyed zla bar sngal// zla ba
tsho gnyis ni dus yin te// de gsumanyi ma 'gro ldog brjod// nyi ma 'gro ldog gnyis lano// lo gcig nyid du brjod pa yin// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i
mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po tshon po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ dus 'byung ba'i ram par bya bas nyi shu rtsa drug
de nas skar ma'i rigs gang yin// mdor bsdus nas ni raMshad par bya// bla skar dang na mgo dang rgyal// de bzhin du ni rnab so dang// ma ba'i lha mtshams de

[f]/ bzhin du/ gnam gru sa ra gre bzhan bcas// lha yi tshogs zhes brjod pa yin// skar ma kre dang chu stod dang// khrums stod dang ni bra nye dang// lag dang mgo dang nu snyad dang// khrums smad ma yi/
tshogs yin no// snyenadrug dang numachu dang na// mon gru dang na man grwa rang// skag dang nag pa son dang ni// sa ga dang ni snubs rnams ni// sren po yi nirags yin par// bzhin mdzes ma ni
khyod la bshad// smin drug rgyal nur yin te// mgo dang snar ma klu yin no// lag dang sbyabasanI yan to// lha mtshim nabs phag gi rigs// mchu dang gre na bye ba 'o// skag ni bya bar
bshad pa ste// nag pa sa ga stag yin no// dbo dang khrums stod gnyis po na// khyu mchog ces ni bshad pa ste// stobs 'dod nga sa na shes par bya// ma bzhi dang nas re gnyis// ma nyer
shes bya stobras kyi mchog/ bskar dang ni khrums snang gnyis// rta ya rigs na bya bar grags// chu stod dang na gro bzhin gnyis// snga 'u rigs su brjod pa yin/ 'bra nye dang ninam gru gnyis/
glang po' rigs kyisabyin brlabs pa'o// mon gru dang ni mon grwa dag 'am yi rigs su yang dag gsungs// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa/ shulhag ngas gi bden par gshad// mu snyad dang ni
byin bzhin dag/ ne'u le'i rigs su grags pa yin// mang po nyid kyis ci zhig bya// mdor bsdus ba ningashad kyis nyen// rang gi skyo ba'i skar ma ni// bya ba kun la dpyad mi dgos// skar
da// ma mi yi srog yin te// gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad do// skar ma'i cha ni bzlog pa dag/ bzung na nges par 'chibar 'gyur// lug dang srang dang karka Ta// chu srin dag ni
g.yo bar brjod// sdig pa bum pa sang ge dang// khyu mchog dag ni brtan pa ste// nya dang gnyis sbyor gzhu dang ni// bu mo rnams ni 'dren ma'o// lha yi bla ma nye ma dang/ mig dmar skyes pa'i
wA gzugs yin te// pa wa sangs dang sgra gcan dang// zla ba mo ya gzugs yin no// gza' lag dang nan pa gnyis// ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste// nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas
pa'i gzag/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bge/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bad ba'i mchog/ rdo rje soms dang 'a de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po
chen po dang la rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sa 3 skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i rim par phye ba sa ke shu rtsa bdun pa'o//tshes dang skar ma gatha' 'char bo/ rab tu bshad
tshik+ka kyis lhamo nyen// ro hi tra sa tshis lani// smin drug dang ni mig dmar la// 'gron po lam du 'jug par bzang// tshes de rnyed ba thob 'gyur ba// ma ka ra yi 'a ma la// mchu dang mag
dam ra ldan pa la// gzir dang 'dzems sogs 'byung bas na// tshes de yongs su spang bar bya// sra b+han yi nyi ma la// lag dang sman bar ldan pa'i tshe// nag po nyid du shes bya bas// tshes
de'ang yongs su spang bar bya// mo hi ta yi nye ma ga/ mchu dang gza' lhag ldan pa la// bkra shis dadan bzang por byed// ratsaya na nya mal// lag dang gza' lag bcas pa dag/ kun tu/
'joms par bshad pasan// mchog gi sbyor bas de yang spyod// sa yi dbang phyug tshes la na 'bru nye dang ni gza' lag ldan// de yang nag po'i dus shes bya// b+ha dra yi ni tshos dag la//
gro dang lha yi bla maldan// tshos de rnyed pa byed pasan// sbyor ba po yis bstan par bya// mi kar yitshes la ni// mon gru lha yi bla ma dag/ gal ton ni 'dzom gyuran// 'bru dang nor rnams
thad byed par// gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin// tshes ni bcu gsum dag la ni// skag dang lha yi bla ma dag/ gal te 'dzom na nag po ngas// nyes pa kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur dri 'a
byu yi tshe la ge/ stobs ldan gyi blon po dang// gal te khrums stod 'dzom nani// tshes de rgyas pa star 'gyur zhing// dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed// bri ti ka yi nyi mni// chu stod
ngan pa wa sangs//gal te 'dzom na nad kyis ni// gdungs shing 'joms bar the tshom med// 'byung po yin nyi ma la// dra nye dang ne pa lnga sangs// 'dzom gshin rje'i mche ba lta tsho
mir yongs su spang bar bya// gyur ma yin nyi ma la// smin drug dang ni sman pa ru// gal te 'dzom par gyur na ni// rnyed dang grags pa la sogs dang// bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thob// mya
@#// dku la yi nyi man// skag dang sman par ji zhig ltar// 'dzom na gdung bar byed pas na// nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang// zla ba nya yi nyem la// mchu dang spyan par ldan gyur na//
'chi ba'i dus la bab pas na// tshes de shin tu spang bar bya// ma ya mtshams sumer kabri// gshin Doru ni rand sta// srin po ru na 'ur madra// chu yi phyogs su khyu mchog ste// 'jigs byed
dun bya ku la// gter gyi phyogs su sa ban/ kAmag gsum phyogs su bzang po bra// shar gyi phyogs su'ang khyu mchogago/ zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis// de rnams su ni rgyu por bshad// pa tra nasan
ran+tar te// bya ku li dang bri tu byu// 'di dag nye ma rgyu bar ni// rigs mchog ma ni khyod la bshad// khyu mchog dngan ma kir// sa pa na dang kur ma// zla ba'i rgyu bar bshadapa ste// rim pa
de ltar brjod pa yin// nya la sa mtshams gnas pa ste// stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas// daltar de dag dbus su ni// gnas pa de dag gdung bar 'gyur// zla bo nyin las byung ba'i// ri mo
tsha mnyam du blta bas na// des na shes rab can gyis sang// zhi dang sdig par blta bas na// blta ba'i chad pa 'byung ba ste// myur du gsod par byed pa yin// sgra gcan gyi rgyu ba yi// dus ni
mdor bsdus pa yi// yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis// blo ldan 'bad de shes par bya// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// dordzomakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchogo/ rdo rje soms dpa' de bzhin
0/ gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chon bo dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ tshes grangs dang skar ma'i dris pa rim par phye ba sa nye shu rtsa brgyad pa 'o/
nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// lus can kun gyis rnam rol pa// lus can kun ni rnam shes te// lus las 'das shing dri ma mad// lcanapo dang ni tis dang// de bzhin du ni
'bigs byed sogs// shar gyi lus 'phags ba glang spyod/ byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni// 'dzam bu'i gling dang bcas pa dang/ lan tshwa can dang 'o ma[”]yi// rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang//
'og dang stong du gang gyur ba// khams gsum ma lus zad por bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang// skyamachod khams rnams zad par bya// 'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi//
'jig rten khams kun thad bsams te// dngos dang dngos med 'dres par ni// bdag nyid du ni bsgom par bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams // mnyam nyade stong pa nyid du blta//
thams cad nam mkhar thim nas ni// ba glang rmig par grong khyer sgom// rnal 'byor can gyis tsho ga bzhin// sems ni ma mar lta bu r sgom// de dbus yid kyis bltas nas ni// der ni mtshan
ma brtag par bya// ma mar lta dus zhi bar 'gyur// dmar pos brgyan na rgyas pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang na// tshogs pa'i las sogs 'grub par 'gyur// mtha' mar du pa'am
gnag mthong na// mngond dun grags pa yin// rlung gi mdog ltar bar 'khrugan// de ma thag tu smad bar gyur// 'od zer dkar bo leng leng bos// blo ldan sngags
kyi dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub ces bya// bkra shis kyin ma ston pa// cho ga 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang// gzhan gyi gzugs su dbu ma rnams // de 'og rnal 'byor bskyod
bar bya// ya shes la sogs sems kyis ni// gang zhig stong nyid shes pa byas// samasan myur du thar bgyur ba// yo shes kyis shes bya brtag/ shes byas 'gro ba brtag nga ra bya//
ba dang ma ni bsad byas te// bram ze gtsang mganyis bzung nas// rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcoman// mde dag par 'gyur zhes bya// ye shes rang bzhin kun dang sbyor// rdo rje mkha'
'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjesams dang ba de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dang la rdo rjemakha' 'gro las/ gshes 'byung ba'i ma par phye ba
snyateshu rtsa dgu pa'o//yo shes khyad par gang gis na// ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa// bye brag can ni ji lta bu // lha las rol gromanyan paMr 'tshal// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// la bar gyur ba sum cu pos// dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras 'byung bar// nga rgyal gyis ni byin brlabs pa// soms kyis byas pa'i las tshogs kyis// sgom
bar 'gyur ba'i rang rig ba'i// sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro// sred pa'i zhags pas rtag 'jigs pas// de yi 'gro ba mi mthong ngo// 'du shes rnam pa lnga dang ni// lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro//
lha ya yi shes gsal bar blta// lha min ye shes khro ba'o// yi dgas ye shes zhan pa ste// dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs pas nyon// byol song ye shes blun pa ste// brtan pa rnams ni
sems med pa'o// rgyur ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga/ g+han pas bsgo bas// glen pas bsgribs dang lugs pa dang// byis ba'ishes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongs su ma smin dang//
blama'i las ni sun 'byin pa// de dag kun gyis mngeshas to// gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul// ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ bde bachen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ nyon cig yang dag sgyu ma che// los rnams kyi na bye brag gis// ya shos bye brag sprul pa yin// dman dang rab dman dman pa can//
gnod sbyin lha min grub pa bo// klu dang byol song gsang ba pa// lho 'gro dang na mi 'am ci// ma dang yi dgas mkha' 'grom// dmyal ba lo sogs gang gyur dang// gsal ba'i gzugs su/
mngon brjod dang// phram sgo nga la byung ba// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// de bzhin du nas yi khams// brten pa la sogs thams cad dang// rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang// sa dang rdo dang
'a// brag la sogs// thams cad gshegabya brlabs pas// thams cad snang stagazhan dun// mashes chad par snyoma'agyur// skya ba bye ba stong phrag tu// sangs rgyas
ye shes kyis bskul bas// de nasarnal 'byor bstan bcos la// 'bad de dang bo bskyod par bya// gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa yi// phyi rol bstan bcos sun 'byin pa// rnal 'byor
bstanabacos rjesaM 'brasan// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob// snying po las kyang snying po mchog/ rnal 'byor bstan bcos mtshon par bya/mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o//
rdo rjemakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdordzasoms dang de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam
bar 'phrul par 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu pa'o/// de nas yang dag bshad bya la// rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan 'de de// rdo rjesams sogs lha rnams su// rdorje'i blos
na shas bar bya// zhi dang rgyas dang sngon spyod kyi/ darjodag ni thams cad kyang// gsar la sogs la legs par brdung// rdo rje kun gyis shin tu brgyan// cha gsum du ni bzung nas su// cha
brgyad ska rags legs bar brgyan// phyogos dad phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni// dbus ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu// rtse mo dgu ni lha nyid de// lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs// chu srin las

ma na byung ba yi// rtse mo pad+ma zla bar gnas// rtse dgu zhes ni bya ba ste// rdo rje ye shes 'gro ba sgrol// chagasum gyi na tshad dag la// dbus ma cung zad du yang rung// 'di na thun mong tshad yin no//
rtsa mo kun gyi dbus ma zlum// phyogs sogs rtse mo 'dud pas gnas// dbus ni cur brgyud dag tu bya// dbus kyi cha yi tshad ldan pa// gnas pa lta ba zhes bya// rin chenam ra ga taltar// de
stong gi pad+ma zla ba ni// drug cha kun nas zlum por bya// de dag la ni seng ge'i sna// nas phyed
tsam du mtho bar bya// mche ba yi ni mthar gnas pa// de ni drug cha zhes byar grags// cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun la// so so ru ni dgu dgur 'dod// cha gsum bla ma'i ma 'a ma ni// stong gi cha
ni gnyis spangs nas// dbus kyi mtha' yang de bzhin no// 'dab ma la ni gang gnas pa'i// chu srin cha gcig nyid yin te// de yi phyed du ska rags 'dod// rdo rje kun la blo ldan pas// chu dad
zhing ni mnyam por bya// de nas yang drag bshad bya ba// dam tshig rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de// gsar la sogs pa las brdungs pa// cha lags pa yi sngon du// ji ltar bstan bzhin sa par
bya3/ pad+ma zla ba la gnas pa// chu srin gyi ni mtsho ba'i gzugs// 'og gi chu srin las byung ba// nu 'ong ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// rtse mo shes rab rang bzhin 'byung// kun gyi dbus su rnam/
snang ste// shar phyogs su ni ma khe skyod pa'o// lho'u gne chen bstan pa ste// 'od dpag med pa nub tu dgod// byang du don yod grub pa ste// rtsa ba'i kha sogs lha yin no/ pad+ma/
byang chub yan lag brgyud// sa la ji bzhin dgod par bya// phyag na pad+mabyams pa dang// mkha' snying kun tu bzang po dang// gnod sbyin dag dang 'jam pa'i dpal// sa snying sgrib sel de bzhin te/
lha na brgyad po 'di dag nyid// 'dab ma brgyad la ji bzhin pa rtag/ dbus su ye shes sems dang ba ni// bcu gsum gnas su tham pa re bya// gzhan yang 'dab brgyud lha mo brgyad// ji bzhin gnas/
su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang// derdzo lcags sgrog dril bu 'di// lha mo dag ni bzhi po 'di// phyogs kyi pad+mar yang dag gnas// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang// slar yang de
bzhin lha mo bzhi// skul byed u0f7cna chen 'gro ma dang// dobazhin rdo rje lcags sgrog dang// da bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub ma// pad+ma'i 'dab ma kun la dgod// rtsa mo dag ni rnam lnga la// mkha' 'gro

ba ni lnga'adede// shar du rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma// byang du drag mo zhes bya ba// lho ru de bzhin tsan+d+ha// dbus su yo shes mkha' 'groste// dam tshig rdo rje bsgom par bya// bdug la rdo rje rtse gsum ste/
rtsamo dag ni gdengs par bya// de bzhin rtsa mo gcig pa na// klu rnams skrag par byed pa'o// khro bo'i rirdzogadengs pa ste// lhag ma rnams na 'dul byed pa'o// zhi la zhi ba'i lha nyid de// rigs
[: ]kyi rim ba'i tshogs dbye// lam gyi cho ga mthong ba las// bya ba thams cad byed bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyed do// malnga'i tshad dad ldan pa ni//
spyi gtsug rdo rje zhes byar grags// rna cha cha drug tshad du bya// mgul do ma ni bzhi pa ste// snying khar tshalnga pa ni gzung// gsang ba dang lag par yang// chadrug par nagazung bya ste// ji ltar
mdzes par brtag par bya// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas ni// rnal 'byor pa ya yo shes 'phagra// cho ga bya ba 'danyid kyis// rnal 'byor dge pas rtag tu sgom/ de nas dril bu'i
mtshan nyid kyi// chu zheng la sogs bshad par bya// rin chen sna tshogs 'bar ba dang// rdo rje'i ska rags 'brang ginyis bya// shel sgong dri ma med pa ltar/ dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan//
cha gsum mtshan nyid ldan pa la// rdo rje la sogs mtshan mas brgyan// dbus kyi khog pa zab pa dang// thams cad dga' byed bcud kyis gnas// de nas pad+ma rin chen dang// ut+pal
ku mu dA yis brgyan// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams cha brgyad du// lha mol sogs brgyad du grags// de yi steng dulha mon// sa bon brgyad las bsam par bya// shar phyogs su ni sgrol
ma ste// de bzhin byadadu gos dkar mo'i// nub tu bdag mo'i ming can te// lho ru sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya// mdog mdzes sbrang rtsi yid 'ong ma// de bzhin rin chen 'khyil ma 'o// nam mkha'i
[p ]/phyogs kyi dbus su ni// gzugs rdzogs bskor bas yang dag gnas// bad+ma rgyas pa lta bu'i dbyibs// gzugs med srid pa'i phyogs su ni// gshes bdud rtsi bum pa
dra// shes rab bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te// de yi dbus kyi ston la// stong du pad+ma rdo rjogi/ rtse mo dgu bar bsam par bya// dbus kyi dbyug pa yushes te// thams cad spro zhing sdud pa mo//

o ltar mchog ni stsol bar 'grub// bya ba thams cad rab sgrub ma 'o// ya shis rdo rje'i drale bu ni// rtse mo dgu pa de bzhin no// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du ni// rdo rje'i 'phrang ba ska rags byas M// pad+ma
mchog gi 'dab ma dang// drab dra phyed pa yis brgyan// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// lha mo ya na mtshan mas mdzes// shar gyi phyogs su pad+ma na// kha dog dkar pos mdzes par bya/
gshin rjer bad+ma sngon mar te// nub kyi phyogs su pad+ma rAmar// byang du utu lan bri// bdud rtsi gnas kyi dbusanani// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa bla// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'o// gzugs
mdzesabaskor bas yang dag gnas// stong gi padarang re rdzun// snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya// dbus kyi ya shes dbyig pa ni// zur brgyad pas na mdzes par bya// dril bu la ni lha mo che//
tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs// de nas dpa' bo'i dril bu ste// rdo rje'i 'phror ba'i ska rags ldan// de bzhin dunashes rab dang// bdud rtsi yi ni bum par ldan// mtshan nyid thams cad
yongs su rdzogs// drab dra phyedaslad bar bya// sor dgu dun yangs pa ste// kha dog sor lnga'atshad du bya// de las chung zad lhag bya min// rtsa lnga pa 'am rtsa dgu pa// skal ba bzang po thams
cad dang// dbang phyug dang ni sngags rnams kyi// 'bras bu thams cad rab ster zhing// mkha' 'gro' skyibs dang rdzu 'phrul stor// da bzhin phun tshogs thams cad dang// de bzhin gsheg
ba thams cad kyi// dngos grub mchog na gsal bar star// de ni de bzhin gshags pa yi// dril bu'i mtshan nyid baishadopar bya// 'khar ba las byang sgra snyan byed// khong stong dang ni bum
par ldan// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// ral gri la sogs mtshanam can// dra ba drab phyed pas smras// chusrin lasan byung ba yi// yashes lnga yi rnam dag ngas// rtsa lnga dang ba sa pa ste//
ska rags gnyis kyi dbus su ni/ 'khor le'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan// de bzhinaska rags gnyes dbus su// pad+mal nib da 'bring gnyis// rin chen la ni rin po che// de bzhin sa rags
ldan bar bya// don yod grub ba zhes bya la// skarags gnyes dbus ral gris brgyan// kun la shes rab gdong ldan pas// dpa' bo kun gyis rgyal bar 'gyur// kun la'ang 'khar ba'am
yang na ni// lcags gsum las byung dril bu sku// chagasum dang ni ldan par bya// rdo rje'i rigs las ba glang gdong// ska ragasardo rje'i 'phrang bas bskor// bum pa'i stod du gnas pa yi//
kha khyer cud zad gru bzhir bya// baglangagadod na myur ba ru// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar byed// nad med stobs ni rtag star zhing// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog b.racod/
za/ sngar bstunarjes su 'brang nas ni// rdo rje mtshan nyid mtshon par byed// rin chen dbangasogs bod pa dang// rangar nga mtshan ma shes bar bya// sor brgyad dam ni bcu drug gam// nye shu las
nilkog me bya// ji ltar nus shing rjes mthun pas// bsgrub ba'i dbang bos de dag#// kha yang choga' che ba yis// khor mo lnga las gzhan bar spang/ lha mo 'di ni dril bu yi// sgrub thabs
rgya cher bstanang ste 'thunamong gnargyud kun las// dbe'abo rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ mkha'a'agro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjesams dpa'
bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo tsho canagyis gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal bo chenapo dang la rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang choga'i rim par phye ba sbyasum cu rtsa gcig
ba'o/// rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// rab tu bshad kyis lha morten// dul zhing lugasamadzes ba dang// sems can kun lami'ajigs sbyin// sngags dung
rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// rnal 'byor bzo yi cha lamakhas// thams cad dun 'jam par smra// sems can kun la bu bzhin la// rtag tu gtod la dga' ba dang// bsam gtanasbyor lamangon
