par brtson// snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// bdenabar sla zhing 'tshami byed// rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pas// sems can kun gyi mgon skyob ste/ sems can bsam pa'i bya
brag na khas// mgon med rnams la gnyen ltar brtseg/ mdzes sdug gan legs pa ste// sngags kyi tshul la shin tu goms// dam tshig spyod la rab tu gus// phyag rgya brdayi sbyor ba rig rnal
byor ma rnams dam tshig la// brda yis sbyor ba ston pa dang// gnyis med sbyor ba'i khyadaganas// sngags kyi 'khor lo spyod pa gus// dbang bskur don gyi yon tan 'byung/ [” ]/gnas sogs
mthong ba'i ngang tshul can// de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes// 'di ni slob dpon zhes par brjod// gsol pa/ dolta bu'i slob dpon la ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa u0f38/ sangs rgyas kun gyi
rang bzhin sku// yan lag byang chub sems dpa' ste// ba snga rnams ni dgra bcom nyid// spyi gtsug rigs lnga'i sangs rgyus te// 'jage rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan// 'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la
sogs// de ltar yon tan rang bzhin lus/ nal 'byor can gyi sa rtag tu bag/ ji lta'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par// ye shes can gyis mtshan shes nas// de lta'i bla ma 'bad de bstan// gang
lang khro dang sgyu can dad 1/ ngag na shin tu rtsub pa dang// yon tan dag gas chog shes pa// de ni bla mar bstan mi bya// gzhan yang slob ma'i spyod pa dang// las kyi de nyid bshad kyis nyon// khro
dang bcas shing rtog ger gus// na so dag ni yol ba rung// gang yang dge slong dngos gnas dang// zhen dar chags pas bcings pa la// rin thang med ba'i rin chen ni// de la
bshad par mi bya// gang yang nga rgyal chod pa dang// rgyu med bdag tu mi 'dzin cing// de bzhin chos la mngon par dang// de la man ngag sbyin par bya// gzhan dun ni ltung bar 'gyur// slob dpon gyi
ni gsang ba dang// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig sbyor// lha yarem tshig spyod pa dang// gtoramakhasogs gsang sbyor ba// snod pa dag tu dbye byed pa// skrag pa kun dang bcas bzhin du/ 'amanar
chad par ni myur bar lhung// slob dpon gyani las snyan dang// lham dang gdugs dang na bza' sogs// nye ba'i les spyod thams cad dang// grib ma 'gom par mi bya zhing// co'adi bar ni
zla/ mi bya'o// gal te bus na dus kun tu// de ni kun tu gzi'i gyu zhig/ don nyams dang las ring du 'gyur// bdud dang sdang ras gzir 'gyur te// mchod rten bshig dang sdigamatshungs pas//
A de bas sgrib ma 'gom mi@#// slob dpon smod byed gang yin pa// rmi lam du yang dngos grub med// slob dpon gyin yon tan gzung// skyon rnams nam yang gzur mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya'i
sbyol sogs// de lam gyis 'grub par 'gyug/ matsal chog sogs rim pa yis// sngon du bslab pa sbyin bar bya// dngos po 'od bzhin med par// mthong ba byang chub rim pa ste/
tsa rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams ni// ngo bo medal dngos mthong bas// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ste// de ltar rnam
bcur phye ba las// dkar bo yasan dkar 'gyur la// nag pos de bzhin 'bras gnag 'byin// de ni de dag spang bya ste// sems can rnams la tshig rtsu ba dang// tshig 'khyal sna bgrang bar
bya: snying rje yi nasems kyis su// 'tshe dang gnod ba spang bar bya// bdag shi bar gyur kyang bla'i// srog chags gsod pa de ltar min// rab tu 'bar mor mtshungs pas na// gzhan gyi nor
la reg mi bya// rnal 'byor pa yis brdzun bsrung zhing// bla ma'i dka' stsayathams cad bya// rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor pa// brdzun du smra ba thams cad dang// sams can kun la
skyon sngogo min// gzhan gyi bud med spang bya zhing// log pas 'tsho dang rnyed la sogs// de bas thams cad sbyang ba bya// dga' ba dag la spyod pa dang// gtor ma dag gi dus sogs la//
dam tshig spyod bar byed pa yang// bza' dang bca' sogs tshod zin bya// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams // sems can mgu las dngos grub 'byung// de la dang por re zhig slob
mas bla gos phrag pa gcige la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs la/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces brjod par byan@#/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// ]
/ rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma// theg pa gsum po thams cad dang// dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// bdag nyid chenamo rnams

dang ni// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// rtag par bdag ni skyabs su 'chi// o pany+tsakanA pU dza u pa smanA ya At+ma naM nir ta yA mehU~M/ sarba A tsAr+ya pU dza mu nga smanA ya Ats+tshan noru tI yA mihUM/

sarba satA pa ri rwa NA thA ya AtA naM nir+ya ta yAm ny+nyo/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la/ slar yang 'diskor ces brjod par bya ste/ khro dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang// tshig rtsub zhe gcod spang bar bgyi//
rgya sdig pa'i grogs dang srog gcod dang// rku 'phrog dag ni smad bar bgyi// longs spyod rgyan sbyang bgyi zhing// nges dang bcas pas chog shes bgyi// gar dang gnas dang mtshungs pa yi// phyi
rol bstan bcos spang bar bgyi// zhes so// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// sdom pa'i cho ga bla na med// dang po bla ma dam tshig/ thob pa rgyudang 'bras bu 'byung/ bstan dang de bzhin
nges par bstan// sku gsung thugasakyi rang bzhin te// bstan pa dag longs spyod yin// nges par bstan pas myang 'das// bshang ga sogs bza' ba dang// rigs dang rigs min
dbazhin gzhan// sngags rnams kyi zhi man ngag gis/ medasogs chog bzhinadabang bskur// slob mas dngos po bsgoms nas su// mya ngan 'das pa bstan par bya// khyod kyis srog
0 chags gsad bya zhing// brdzun du yang ni bar bya// ma byin bar na blang par byu/ gzhan gyi bud med bstan b.rubya// mchod rten las na mi bya zhing// glegs bam bklog pa'ang mi bya'o//
khag ba'i phyag rgya mi bcings shing// sngags kyi yi ga bzlas mi bya// bstan bcos dag ni red sla ste// dpa sbyor ba rnyed par dkag/ bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtsonab yi// thabs kyis rnal
khyor ba yasered// bdag nyid lus dang gzhan gyi lus// bdag nyid bde mchog byang grol te// bdag gi lus la ma chags shing// gzugs brnyan sogs 'dra'i lha ru brtag/ mkha 'gro
kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rdzomakha' 'gro dba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshags// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen bo dang la rdo rje/
mkha' 'grolas/ bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang/ dam tshig dang/ sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni//
sa rnams lan rnam lo khagi/ sngags kyi 'byung bar re la pa ste// dani yang dag bshad par bya// o kiM kiM phaT phaT/ ka ra ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+hA/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hAhU~M/ hU~MhU~M/ daha ha ku ru

kur 3 tAs ya trA sa ya/ b+hak+Shab+hak+Sha/ hU~MhU~M/ kal ka la/ ba sa ru d+hi ra An tA mA lA pa lam ba na/ srid+d+hige ts+tsha/ klob+ha ya klob+ha ya/ hwahA/ A ka rdzu A ka rgyu/ tsal tsil/ si li si li//

! da sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba bA/ tArdza ya tats+tsha ya/do// hri hU~M/ d+hi li d+hi li hUM hUM phaT/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bI re shA ya ma hA kaldake sin+d+rib+ha ya ) dza TA mu ku To d+ha nA ya/

baNan yi/ badzra TA ki nI yi sI hA: oM su b+ha ni su b+ha hu hU~M phaT/ oM gra h+phagra snyadu tshu phaT/ oM gyi rtswa pa spa gro sna ba ya hu hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga wan/ bi dA rA dza hU~M hU~M pha'u hA 1oM badzraT ki

[e ]yas nasgrub pa'o// las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te// sngags kyi cho ga ji bzhin du// nyon cigelha mo bshad par bya// oM namo b+ha ga ba ti badzrapA rA he Ar+ya a pa rA dzi te tre la ku'amahAtamahAsi'i grwa

desarba b+hU ta b+ha yA ba he/ ma hA badzra badzus na/ a dzi te a pa rA dzi te ba sh+ya ka ri ni tra sgyu ma Ni bi dza sha 'a ni ro ni ro 'a Ni kro d+ha na ka rA li ni san+nA sa ni mA ra Ni su pra b+he da ni pa rA dza ya bi dza ya dzi b+han saM da blun mo

tshani/ badzra bA rA hi/ ma hA yo ga ni/ kAmashAri kha ga/ tad+ya thA/ bro tog po tige )han han/ pANIkaM ki Na li khri ni/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra hastosho Sha ya sho Sha ya kha TI ga ka ba la mAlAts+tshar Ni ma h+'a pa si tAlaM/

trel kya tsag da re ma tra me kha le gra sa hUM hUM phaT/ bArA dri te hU~MhU~M hAhAm hA pa shu mo hani yo gi shwa riTaMT ka nisacha le kAnaM ban+d+ha ni sadu: bra t+ya ya kA ri NihUM phaT/ b+hU tat+tA sa nim hAbIr par ma sid+d+hi yo gi shwari tha2
phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ a A/ e A 1 u A/ ri rI/ la lA/ a a/ e o/ aM a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga ]tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha btsum/
ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ 'di ni bcom ldan lhad nyid// lha rnams kun gyi mchog gi gnas// sngags rnams thams cad skyed byed/// rgyud rnams kyang nid bzhinano// mkha' 'gro kun dang
mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bad ba'amchog/ dordza sems dang 'a de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba sta sum cu rtsa gsum ba'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya// de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar// sna tshogs
lte bar mi shigs dag/ bris nas cho ga bzhin du sngags// chos kun gcig tu bsgyu bar bya// A li kA li mnyam byas nas// statshanal ni thim par bya// der gnas pa las dpa' bon/ 'dod
pa'i don kun sbyab byed btu// ye shes lengs spyod rdzogs pa dang// sprul pa blobagyur gdon mi za// 'og dang stong 'grub rtag tu ster// bdag gi pho 'am kun 'gro// pho nya mo de grub kun ster//
mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang// sum ba ma dang rtag par 'khyud// sbyor ba'i gnas kyi khyad par nyid// ji snyad rnal 'byor tshogs rnams na// thams cad dngos grub byedapar bshad/ 'baden pa
[dl]klams cad na bu ste// gzhan du nam yang ma yin no// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// chung ma pho nya mor gnas la// gang zhig rtag tu sngags spyin pa// rang gi chog de bzhin bya// thod pa yi ni dbu
rgyan dang/ de bzhin sangs rgyasagatsug nor bu// pad+ma dang lagyi nags rtsa ba// brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgyu yin// dpang po gang dang ga mo nas// rang bzhin de dang de 'gro ba// mchog tu
mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun tu rang nyid 'gyur// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom
ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal bo tshon po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rdo rjodabang bskur ba'i rim bar bya ba ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
ma rnams kyi// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// ye shes 'byung babashad bar bya/ 'khong bu'i che byad rnal 'byor bdag/ yod shugs kyis zlog par byed// mkha' 'gro ma dang mdzes
ma dang// dum skyes gzugs can rnal 'byor ma// rnal 'byor mna'odi dag nyid// brda yi tshul gyis brtan pa ste// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'ded gzugs can// bong bu'i cha byad khrag 'dzag
[I]zhal// sbrul gyis dkris pa'i mdung rtse ni// gsum pa mkha' 'gro lagan thogs// kha TaM ga dang thod bani// stong du bstod de thogs pa dang// me ro'i snyan bzhugs cher 'bar ba// sgra ni spu
[s/ ]01/ kham pa gyen brdzes shing// spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes par byas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// phyag na zangs gri bsnams shing brtsa// sna tshogs ma tog
'bras ldan pa// rin chen mthon de 'a rganasasu sgom// tshe thung ba dang shi ba yang// 'tsho ba dang ni tsha ring bar// bong bu'i tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis// lag mthil gnas pa bzhin du mthong//
mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rjemakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje
mkha' 'gro las/ han ka'i rnam par rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba sta sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o/// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sgrub po'i cho ga ji bzhin te// nyin re'am
yang na zla ra 'am// yang na de bzhin lo re na// jibazhin byin gyis brlabs ni// thug rgyu'i dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur// sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis// pad+mo'i snod na bzung nas su//
lag pa g.yas pa ba danan// gsum par byas te bsgom par bya// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang// de bzhin srog dang rtsa lasakhyung// mngon par 'dus byas legs bris pa// thams cad
kun spyod sbyin par bya// lnga yi rgyan dang yang dag ldan// phyagargya'i mtshan mas rnam par klubs// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom skyes pas// skal ba bzang bo'agar chen bya// pad+ma mchog la rag
byedapa// le gcig bar du 'ong ma byas na// sgrub pos dam tshig sbyangs 'gyur te// des ni dam tshig sbyangs nas su// slar yang ma bya'i sdom pa byung// gzhan du sngags dang phyag rgya ni// rim
bas 'bras bu med par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro krin dang mnyam sbyor bge/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rjemakha' 'gro las/ brda yis rnam rol dang/ dam tshig dang/ sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa drug ba'o/// mtshon
kun gyi mtshananyed gi/ rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon// 'khrul 'khor gyis phan me 'phan dang// de bzhin lag pas 'phen pa dang// 'phangs nas slar ni gzung ba dang// lag
pas 'gyed dang rnam pa lnga/ dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang// stod rgyud sbyor dang 'dren dang myur// 'gongs dang 'phan dang gsal ba 'o// groms pa nyid dang sran 'dzugs dang//
mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa dang// rgya cher 'gengs shing rnam par dag/ lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can// 'di yi lus la brgyan nasan// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang//
mkha' 'gros gces dang gdon rnams kyis// nams kyang tshugs par ma 'gyur ro// rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul du// bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas// g.yas su rab tu skor byed cing//
mda' 'phangs na ni grub par 'gyur// shar phyogs legs par bsrang nas ni// nub phyogs cung zad bkug nas su// gu'u rgyud dal bus drangs nan// 'grol
thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// rna drung ba'adu zlum por ni// rigs par ni legs par gzung// yi ga oM gyis khar drangs te// ji srid yi ga
a brjod pa// de srid bar du gzung bar bya// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o// ci rigs par ni drangs nas su// chog bzhin du gzung nas su// der ni cung zad dbye bar bya// 'gongs pa'i
phyag rgyu'o/ chang bas 'bam na bsgribasanas su// mig nishud cad gdangs te blta// lta bamar pa la gtad de// myur du 'phangs na 'grub pa'i mchog/ mda' gzhus rnam por
rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ gru bzhi pa dang rnon po dang// de bzhin kun nas zlum po ste// g.yas phyogs nas ni bskor nas su/ stong dang de bzhin 'og tun/ 'aren gyis gnon cing drag tu gnon//
babigs ba bcu yi rgya mchog gis// khams gsum rgyal srid chen po la// bde bar rgyal zhing longs spyod 'gyur// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bla na med ngago/
mkha' 'grokun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde pa'i sa chog// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen bo dbal
rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ mtshan ma thams cad kyi brda'i ye shes kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun bgo/pho nya gdul ba'i sgrub pa'i smobs// de nas
yang dag bshad par bya// tha mal sngags kyi lus can dang// zhing skyes man gang yang rung// sgrub pos de drag thams cad la// phan ba'amchog gas bde ba sgrung// 'di dag gnas pa
ba ngos spyod kyi// bsnyen bkur gyis ni bstan mi bya// skal bzad phyug cur sra ba ste// rang gi bkra shis rags spyod dang// ri mo canan soms g.yo zhing/ 'on 'dzin sbom bad+macan//
lte ba dung 'dra dung canam// de dgam pa bzhin du brjod// 'byung ba thobang gi rtsa kha 'bad pas khar gtsug na ji srid du bu mo'i bde ba rnyed pa de srid kyi bar du bsngags pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
gnad sha dar lakA na'i sman ratags te tam ba char du bcos lo rkang pa la bskus na yang bded pa la spyod pa rnams kyis bsngags so// a shAt+tA'i shing kan dadang/ pa tho dang/ pu shel pho rnams
chab snyams te/ shing arga'i 'om dang sbyaral des bo mtshan dril phyis byas n/ gdon mi za bar 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu myur duchu dron gyis bkrusan ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gyur ro//
bad+ma dkar bo'i gi sar smrang rtsi dang lhan cig btags te lte bar bsus na/ bud med sra ba rnams kyang khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur ro// til dkar po dang/ nA ga ge sar dang dpa' bo chog ba glang
ga rtsa ba rnams btags te/ sbrang rtsi dang ma ha'i mar dang lhan nyug tu sbyar dalta bar bskus ra/ pho mtshan mkhrang zhing bud med chags pa re pa rnar sa yid 'phrog par 'gyur zhing/
bong bu ltar ni 'dod spyod pas// bde don gnyer la bad star ba// 'dul ba don yod rgyud las na// ngas ni 'dzin pa bshad pa yin// lang gas bud med bsgrub bya zhing// b+ha gas skyes ba bsgrub
par bya// ling ga don gnyer mtshan ma zhes bshad de/ b+ha ga la ni sbal bar bya// phyag rgya phyag rgyar sbyor ba yin// rnam par rol pas ling gzhes// bya ba ro ni bstan pa ste// rnam par 'byed pos
b+hag yin// ma bstan gsal bar bstan pa ste// nye bar bstan pa'i rang bzhin nyid// a yig ba yi yi ge las// b+ha ga ling ga bskyod nas ni// bud pa la sogs rim ji bzhin// mkha' 'gro
ma kun bsgrub par du// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde pa'i mchog/ rdo rje sanas dang de nga zhen gungashogs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal
po chen po di lardo rje mkha' 'gro las/ pho nya gdul ba'i cho ga'i rim pa ra phye ba ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad
ces gsol to// sams can bsod nams mad pa dang// sngags rnams rten par mi nus pa// de rnams dngos grub ji ltar 'thob// stobs med rnams ni stobs skyed cing// sngags dang dra la//
[j]yang srung 'gyur ga/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol// sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// sems can rnams ni chags bya'i phyir// lha yi sman ni bshad par bya// daneng
ltar gzung bya ba// dani de bzhin bshad par bya// bdag nyid hUM yi dngos byas nas// phyi nas sa bon bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams ni chags ba dang// de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs byed// sa
bon lasogs gzugs ba yi// las rnams sna tshogs 'byung ba'o/ lha mos gsol pa/ ji lta bu'i sa yin la sogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ran dang gsar
shing la sogs pa'i shing gi sa bon te/ de la sogs ba yongs su smin pa rnams cho ga bzhin bsgrub par bya'o// mar ngo' 'i byung pa'i nyi ma la// zla mtshan tshon dang dbang po bsgo// dur khrod lan
babaldan pa dang// gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bcas// de bzhin lha yi lcag mgazugs ba tha dang ni rgyal ba dang// gzhanagyis mi thub pa nyid dang// tsakra a da ga rmongs byed rnams / mtsho
cha thams cad zlog par byed// tsakra ang ga lag pas 'phan// ba tas 'khrul 'khor 'dzin pas// 'bangs nus bzung bas rgyal pas so// gzhan gyis mi thub lag pas 'gyed// rmongs byed
kyis mes ban pa ra bde dag brda yi tshul gyis bshad// de dag thams cad grims par ni// g.yon phyogs sun bsgril nas su// mgrin pa'am phyi de'i bzung byas na mtshon cha ldan zlog par byed//
gdul ba'i bu mo mdog sngon gyi// pad+ma las ni sus pa dang// bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgos nas su// nyi tshan dag la bskam par bya// khyi nag po yi thod ba ni// dur khrod/
sa mis bkang ba ru// mar ngo'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la// pha mas kyi ni nags su gzugs// de ni 'bad de blangs nas su// dur khrod dang ni bla ma dang// ha ru ka dar la mchod byas la//
grub pa'i sa bon bzung byas te// thod pa 'u ni bshag pa la// chog bzhin dumangon bsngags te// mgul ba bcades na smad par 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag ste bcing ba dgrolag/ bya rog nag
po'i thod pa dang// mdung ngamam tshon gyis bsad pa yi// skyes bu yan thod b.ru// sbrul nag ba la zhag gis ni// gser shing la sogs sa bon la// yang dang yang du bsgos byas l//
grog mkhar gyi sa dag dang// dur khrod sa yis bgros bkang ste// bzhi mdo lam gyi dbuso sam// chu bo yan 'gram dag tu// sgrub po'an du mnyam bzhag bas// byed par dgodra
mo'i dus su gzhag/ gtor ma sbyin zhing bcu pa dang// bsrung ba dag na nyin re bya// kha TAl sogasaldan pa yi// dpal ldan he ru ka gozugs bya// lag g.yon thod pa bzung nas ni//
brtul zhugs spyod bar ldan ba yis// cho ga bzhin du bskyod byas n// sha tra la sogs co mi 'dri// sa bon smin pa bzung nas na las bsag 'am las bas sngon bzhin mchod byas nas//
grub pa'i rjes kyi phud dgan// khyad par du nibla mar dbul// sgrub pos de'i khar bcuganu// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su snang// lha dang sbyin bdag gnod sbyin sogs// thiltar 'ded
bzhin gzugs bsgyur te// lha mo lu mo rnams dang ni// ji srid 'dod kyi bar du rol// dgongs mo gtor ma sngon 'gro bas// ji bzhin lhag pa'i gnas bya zhing// shing bskyed chog rgyas
ba las// 'byung bzhin bsrung ba la sogs bya// gzhan du ma tog 'bras bu sogs drag po'age don gyis gtses pas ni// 'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de nas sku grol gcer bu'i ni//
gyur ba'i khu mo'i lag g.yon du// gal te smin pa'i 'bras bu de// sgrub pa bos ni gzhug par bya// gang dang gang gi khragags ni// yang dang yang du 'bras bu bko/ de yi khrag gis
bsgos pa yi// sha la sogs pa mtshon bya zhing// de yi thal bas bskyod par bya// de yi thod bar gzugs pa dang// de yi sha khrag zhag gin// yang dang yang du bcu bar bya// de yi sha
sogs 'dug pa dang// byug pa 'ang yang dang yang du bya// sngon du gtor ma bsrung sogs bya// salenade nasmin pa dang// tshog bzhin du blangs nas// kha yi nang du bzhag gyur na// cho ga ji
ltar bsams pa bzhin// de dang de yi gzugs 'gyur te// de bzhin 'di yi mthu yis// mi snang bar ni thams cad 'gyur// sa bon ma nyams stobs kyis su// 'ag pa la sogs
[r/ ]@#/ nams kyis kyang// cha tsam yang mthong mi nus// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mtshon cha thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir// nye ma gzas ni zin dus su// paN+Di nAg/
zhes bya dang// dpa' bo gcig kha stobs boche// snga dro nyi ma shar dus su// byang phyogs rtsa ba brkos nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas gzung bar bya/ sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis//
rgyu dang mi rgya rmongs ba'i byed// bgrod ka'i laman nyam ngan// stag dang seng ge sogs 'jigs dang// rgyal po rkun po'a'i jags sogs pa// thams cad bsrung ba bla na med// yang na de
yig sar na// zho dang lhan cig bza' bar bya// ji sridamagren par lud kyi bar// de srid bar du bka' bar bya// ji srid de ni ma zhu'i bar// rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i lus su 'gyur// de'i lus
mtshon cha thog pa yang// chu yi thigs pa ltar mi gnod// mtshon cha thams cad bzlog pa yi// de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya// sngon bzhin gtor ma sogs ldan par/ ang go ta ka'i
chaka rtsa blangs la// de las ril bu byas nas su// lcags gsum gyis ni bkri bar bya// lha mo der ni khar bcug na/ mtshon cha thams cad ldog 'gyur shing// rigs dang blo dang dbugs mi
bde// nad rnams gzhan la nga tshar gcod la// rnam pa sna tshogs dug dang na// lus sul la sogs gzhan dag kyang// seng ge yis na glang chen bzhin/ 'di tsam gyisani 'bros par 'gyur//
denas sbyor ba gzhan bshad pa/ pa ti zhes bya lha ya sman// rgya la dang nyi ma dag gaman// yang na zla ba gzas zin tshe// phyag rgyur bsus ba'i sgrub pa pos// lha yarnal 'byor dmigs nan/
gtor mamchog sogs byas nas su// 'bad de sngagasani bzlas byas las// sku grol gcer bur gyur pa las/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste gzung// cho ga'i bya ba 'di yis// 'grub
gyur 'di ni tho tsom mad// cha bdun du na bgos nas su// mkhas pas spyi bor gzung bar bya// rim pa bde yis sgyu ma me// mtshon cha thams cad bzlog 'gyur te// ji snyedas stongs
gnas pa yi// mtshon chagazhan yang zlog byed nga// nyi ma las mun pa bzhi// bltas pa tsam gyis zlog par byed// de nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa// nag po chen po snyan chen po//
blo ldan gza' ni nyi ma dang// skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa la// mchod dang gtor ma'i cho ga yis// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gzung// khyu mchog ra yis dad ni// phyi nas gcig tu
bsro bar bya// lo gcig bar du nus dang ldan/ de nas rgasar ba gzhan gzung bya// ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar/ 3mtshon chas chod cing thugs mi 'gyur// sgrub po de yi lus lan
dug kyang 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro// sngar bstan cho ga'i bya ba yis// bla ma dan ta'i smanagazung bya// pad+ma ye na 'dam dang ni// lhan cig tu na bsra bar du/ sngar bstano tshoga'i rim pa yis//
i shwa ni gzung bar bya// mtshan ma gcigag sa dge dang// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bas/ 2yon tan dgan sngam bzhen// rten cag lha mo shes rab che// ku ma'i/
zhes bya ba'i sman// gzhon nu ma yi rkang rjes rdul// de yi gce ba'i sa dang bcas// ma ho ra ya sa dang ldan// 'dan 'di sum cu gsum pas mchod// de nas yang dag bshadabya ba// be sna
bzhes bya ba'i sman// sngar bstan cho ga'i bya ba yis// nags kyi 'phrang ba gzung bar bya// bzlog sta 'khor ba'i 'khor la yagi/ 'a jim pa 'bad de blangasanas su// de dang lhan cig ldan
par bya// lus la gnas na bsrung bar 'gyur// rtse gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis// phag mo zhes bya'i sman dang ni// phag de lus las byung ba'i 'dam// ma ho'i ra yinang du gzhag/
sbyo legacig bar du nus dang ldan// des kyang snga ma bzhin du 'gyur// lam gyi bzhi mdo ra rtsa dang// glang chenamache bar chags nga 'i sa// dbang po shang gi rtswa bar bcas// sum cu gsumadabang
'dam zhes bya// de na rtsa luN+Da bshad bya// kha dog gcig pa blo named// tsan+dale ye rtsa bzung la// sngar bstan bzhin du bsgrub par bya// shing gcig dang ni mtshan gcig ba/ sa dang sbyar te
'dam du bya// de ni lus la gnas bar du// sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shigs// denas cho ga gzhan bshad bya// snying po thamasaM cad bsdus pa ste// mngal nas dang bo byung ba// ma yenu zho ma 'thung
0 pa 3/ rdo rje phag mor bcas pa yi// he ru kanAmachod byas la// de ltar byas nas lha mo tsho// gtor ma byin la yang yang bsrung// de yi ltag pa gshags nas su// lce ni rtsa bar bcas te blang// gling/
garA dzagasar shing dang// ka ga ga dzag zhan mi grub// lha yi sman dang bcas pa las// ril bu ru ni byas nas su// khar bcug nas ni bzung gyur na// mtshon cha thams cad bzlog gyur te// ji
sridas stongs gnas pa yi// mtshon cha rnams kyang zlog byedan// kha cig la lta smos ci dgos// rims dang dug dang nad rnams dang// mkha'agrom dang gdon gyis 'tsho// de dag thams cad/
bzlog 'gyur te// gzhan dag tu ni da mi sna// de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya// de yi sha dang zhag dang khrag/ gcin dang khu bar bcas pa yis// yung ba nag po byugs te// rgyal dang 'byung po'
nyim la// bgagasan zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// 'byung po kun gyi gtor byin te// las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir// sngags pa cho gar ldan pa yis/ byis pa'i ro yi lte ba na//
mar ngo khyad po 'a nyi ma lag/ dur khrod kyini sa gzhi ru// cho ga bzhin du btsugs la bskyod// ca spyod la sogs bsrung bar bya// 'dab ma brul zhing smin pa dang// sngar gyi cho ga bzhin blangs
te// de naso lus la gnas kyi bag/ skad cig gis na dpa' bor 'gyur// sngar bstan byis pa'i lce dang ni// yung ba nag por bcas pa las ya// ri khur byas te bar bcug la// g.yul
du zhugs na dgu bcudas 'gyur// de nas dpung rnams thams cad ni// rmongs phyongaskud pa bshad par bya// skar ma rgyal la nan tan du// nags kyi ras bal byas nas ni//
zla mtshan gyis ni phyugs byas la// sum sgril yod ni sum sbrel du// gzhon nu ma yis 'bad de bkal// rkang pa brgyud pa'i sngags kyisan// bzlasangashing mdud pa de tsam bya// mdud pa
dag ni thams cad kyid// ma mo brgyad du brtag par bya// de ltar sngags brgyad byas pa yis// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su// sa so ra ra dga' yang// brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas byas la//
lag ba g.yon par btags na ni// mda' dang ral grwa la sogs pa gi/ mtshon cha thams cad bcings par 'gyur// sgyu ma chen ma 'a rag pa 'di// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya// de nas cho ga
ts+tshA gzhan bshad pa// nags kyi[︽]sha' ma la yi ni// bal ni skar ma rgyal la blang// bu mo ya nagaci ba yis// brtags te de dang bsre bar bya// lu mo yis na bkal bar bya// gza' dang skar ma dag
ba dang// zla ba stobs can dag la ni// mdud pa'i sbyor ba byas nas su// sa so nang ni re re la// sngar gyi rim pa bsgyur ba yis// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgral// 'di yis bcings pa
tsam gyis ni// sum nu gsum pas kyang mi 'ching// lus kyi chog mthong ba yis// mtshon cha thams cad 'chir 'gyur te// 'di ni ba glang lhasasu bsgrub// su lag pa dang seng ldeng dang// nim pa/
dang ni arga'od nung//skur ma rgyal dang nyen la// shing bu de gnyis bzung nasan// myos bar byed pa'i rig pa che// rig pa kun gyi gtso mo ste// lan brgya run bzlas nas su// shing bu phan tshun drud
gyur na// dgra bo nang na thab par 'gyur// rdo rje yin chu dang ni// 'dzub mo'i khrag dang bcas pa la// myos par byed pa'i rig pa bzla// sngags kyi bzlas pa sngon 'gro bas// dpral bar sgrig
la byas na ni// tshem po dang nerkun po dang// 'tsho bar byed pa gzhan yang rung// skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/
rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ stobs bskyod pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste sum cu
rtsa dgu pa'o///gang gi sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i// denas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya// ras star gyis sa bon dag/ sU ma'i tshor gnas blang bar bya// sngon bzhin cho ga'i
sbyor ba yi// 'byung de'i nyim gza' bzung// go rA la sogs mkha' 'gro mar// bcas pa'i he ru kamagon mchod// bud med kyi ni me tog gis// yang dang yang du bsgo par bya// bgeg/
nga a ni mtshon gyis bsad// sbyang ka la sogs ma zos pa'i// bud med thod pa mdzes pa ru// mo ga de yis bskyod par bya// de yang rnga mo dag gi ni// 'khrul 'khor lan bskyon nas su//
[s/ ]@#// de yi rtse mo blang bar bya// sngags pas mchod pa byas nas ni/ dbu mor bsgoms shing de bskal pa ge nu ni 'a dad dang bcas rta gtor// budamada'i bsregs sa dang ni// thal/
bar bcas pas de bkang la// ras star gyi ni sa bon nyid// thod pa der ni bskyod par bya// bgegs dgra dang ni gshen gshed kyi// sngags ni mngon par bzlas pa yis// mchod dang gtor ma pa
phul nas ni// ci riges su nabasrung ba la bya// zhi ba'i tshigs bcad sngags kyis ni// da rgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i nus// der ni bcu sta brgyud bar bya// gzhan du ye dgas 'tsho bar 'o byung//
'bu la sogs pa bsrung ba dang// shing bskyod rig byed bzhin du bya// de ni 'bad de smin pa yi// ras bal dag ni bzung nas su// gzhon nu ma yi khrag gis ni// bsgos la sngar gyi bu mo yis//
sgra dad pas nga bu mos bkal// skud pa de yis bcings gyur na// de ma thag tu skyes bu ste// 'dod chags gdungs pa 'i bud med 'gyur/ 'bakrol naslar yang rnal mar gyur/ bgags
pa'i ro yo khrag dang ni// khag gis yungs kar yang yang bsgo// gsang ba yi ni zhing sa ru// tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal 'a ni// lam dang rigs mchog thed pan/ ro bsregs sas kha kang dang
bcas// nyim shis ra dag la gzugs// de ni shin tu smin pa byang// ci rigs 'phrul 'khor btsir ba'i sar// bskrad pa la sogs bya ba kun// blo ldan ji ltar 'dod bzhen byed/ samatha'alnga
pa yang dag ldan// rlung gi sa bon las byung ba// de yi mod la bsgod 'gyur te// bsgrub bya don slog mi ga ga ba gegasanas bsad pa'i skyes bu'ido// cho ga'irim bzhin mchod byas la/ sngar
na ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// mar des yan lag kun tu byug 'aho'u ka yi spyod pa yis// sngagasan zlos shing shin tu gnas// sbyor chen des ni bgegs bskradabya// sngags pachen pos de dus su
bgegs ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa// go yi lus las byung mthong ste// de nas der ni de dus su// grub ba'i rdzas kyi bar chad byed// g.yog dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa pos// de tshe phyag rgya gcod pa ste//
skyo gnas phyag rgya dang la ba yi// ster du bcings la bostan bya zhing// dug bo yin gzugs kyis su// dang na po'i dam tshig ci rigs bstan// sha dang khrag tu bcos pa yi// gtor ma yi dgag
rnams lasIn/ de lus las 'dzags pa'i mar// blangs te kru ba la sogs blugs// de yis lus la byugs tsam gyis// nam mkhar rgyu ba 'grub par gyur// gzhan yang ral gri mag
sman dang// tshul sogs pa rab tu 'grub// khrag dang mi zhig gsan// yungs kar la ni bsgos nas su/ mar ya ni khar gnug la// bsrung ba la sogs 'bad de bya// de nas snga ma
pa zhazhebaskyod pa'i// yungs kar gang la bsnun pa yi// bsgrub bya de na rims nad kyis// 'dzin te de ma thag tu 'chi// so bya yan khrag dang ni// zhag gas snum ston bso byas la// de yi
thod par re bsregs pas// bkang ba ru na bskyed par bya// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa// snar bstan bzhin du ci rigs bya// sman ba'i 'bras bu khar ba nug na//
spyas khu bya yi gzugs su 'gyur// de ltar sa bon gzhan dag kyang// dog pa la gnas 'bras bu bzung// de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'gyur to// kha las btonan sngon bzhin 'gyur// bya rnams
kyin tshi dang mtshungs// glang po'i gzugs sogs de bzhin bya// ba da ra yis bonan// mar ngoskar ma rgyal dang ni// gza' na nyi ma dag la gzung// ma rtalung ga yar ngo la// mi ro zhig gis
byugs nas su// zla ba bzas ni zin pa'i ni// de yi yan lag mchog tu gzugs// zin pa de yi gzugs su gyur// de yi rus pa rkang dang ni// ba sogs ba bskyed par bya// de yi pags pa
rus pa yi// phyag rgyas yan lag brgyan byas la// blodang ldan pas sngar bstan bzhin// mchod sogs byas te thal ba gtor// sngags dang bcas pa'i chu yasan// mkhas pa yisani rtag tu bcug/
bgegs mthar byed dang gshin gshad kyi// sngags ni sngags pas rtag tu bzla// sha za ba ni gtor ma sbyin// gzhan dunani bdon takhyer// sa bon de na smin pa brdung// lcag ma gsum gyis bkris
nas su// khar bcuganan smad 'gyur te// nyi ma zla ba sogs pas kyang// 'jig rtenagasum 'dir mthong 'gyur// ma duludag gcig bu ke/ khar bcugam du lungagor gyur// gten naslar
0 yang snang 'gyur te// 'brus spyod thunamodacho ga go/ denas sngags kyi cho ga bshad// spyanama'i sngags kyis gzugs bar bya// kA ma kI yi sngags kyis banu/ sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bskyod par bya//
de bzhin gos dkar mas ni bsrung// 'di dag sa la sogs pa ste// thams cad 'dzin tsangagaso ba yin// de na 'khod pa thams cad kyis// spyanalasogs pas bsrung bar bya// de nas dgongs
mo'i dus su ni// sku bakhan do'os bon dag/ ma yi zhag sogs kyis byugs la// bzhi mdo'i sas bkang thod par bskyod// de yi dpral bar thig le bya// bza' dang bca' sogs rnam pa ka/ mkhong
pa tsan gyis kha bar 'gyur// de nas thig le phyis na ni// de yi mod la rnal mar 'gyur// 'ol mas yi sa bon ni// bram ze yin gledapa ru// skar ma rgyal la sngags pas bskyod// de nas phyar sa slar
langan// tha ma la skyes bu'i thod par baspyod// sa bon de ni grub 'gyur ni// kha ru bcug pas de gzugs 'gyur// skyes pa bud med ma ning sogs// bya ba'i cho ga bzhin du'agyur// kha los btonan
slar yang ni// tha mal gzugs 'gyuratshe tsam med// sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste// gzhan dag tun nga ma// sngags pas bung ba'i rgyal po'i sman// gsal shing bsad pa'i thod bar bskyod// zhag/
dang khrag gis gtor bar bya// de yi rtsa ba blangs nas su// srin lag gzhi khrag dang// zhag tu bcas pa bsre bar bya// spyi bor bzhag na rgyal bar 'gyur// lha la sogs pa dbang du byed// bgrang
rna ba lcag ma ni// rnyed nas de yi sa bon ni// smin ba bzung ste khar bcug nas// g.yul du zhugs nargyal bar 'gyur// gling gar dza gzung nas su/ shanapa'i bu mo sngon
mo gi/ khrag gis zla ba mar nge lo// yang yang byugs te sbyar bar bya// ba glang rna ba lcag dar ni// skyes ba'i byed par bskyed dor bcas// 'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur// de la sogs pa rtsa
ba dang// 'bras bu tshul bzhin bskyod pa yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rlag byed par// sangs rgyas nges ba'i rgyud las gsungs// bsgrub bar ma bya ba dang ni// 'grub par ma 'gyur ci yang med//
man ngag dag ni ma gto khar// dngos grub snang bar mi 'gyur// ko kan ta'i 'bras bu ni// sna tshe gun thod par ba spyod// dur khrod rgyas ba'i blong ga ni 'thod rar bskyod pa'i rtsa dang bcas// yar
ngomar de'i bcu bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga dang lhan cag btag/ ril khu mdzes ba byas nasan// grib ma la nibaskam par bya// de yi thig le byas nas ni// 'gro kun dran bzhin dbang du 'gyur// oM ba'i
shing gi rus bani// mar khu chen pos byugs pa dang// de bzhinab yi rnam lngas phyag/ lag par khu bu byags nas su// 'bras de gang la byin pa ni// de dbang 'gyur te gzhan du min// bal bo so
bu'i 'bras bu ni// khrag gis byugs to bud med kyi// thod par btsugs ba smin po yi// 'bras bu de ni mi dbang la// rgyal la byin na rtag dbang 'gyur// sku ba khan da'i sa bon ni// nam bal
sogs 'bras bus byag/ ro bsregs sa dang ldan pa yis// chags can khan bor sa bon baspyod/ ngashin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsrung// mar ngo yin ma la// nyin pyod nyi ma tsha dus bsgrub// de
ni blugs pa tsam gyis su// chang sogs drag 'gyur the tsam med/ 'de nas gzhan yadu bshad bya ba// yungs kar smin pa brgya dang ni// rtsa brgyad blangs nas zhag gis// bgos te legs 'ong sbrum
por bya// bud med ro yalto bar gzhug/ nyin bdun bzhag ste phyung nas su// de yi mchin par bcas pa'i sas// de yi thod pa bkar bar bsgyur// gtor ma dang ni bsrung ba dang// bdug ba dang ni
chus bcu sogs// shin tu 'bad dang bcas pa yis// las rnams thams cad sngon bzhin bya// ji srid smin gyi bar du bskyed// de nas sngar bzhin 'bad pas bu nga// bud med kyin khrag gis byug/
'dab ma dang ni sa bon sogs// de yi yan lag rtsa u0f7a yang rung// bud med gang dang gang bsnun pa// de ni phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur// 'al sa'i sa bona' bad de garlung// dma' sar byed pa la
bskyod par bya// de yi lcags bzung nas su// blo dang ldan pas sgo nga bya// de yi nang du chang blugasan// snod dar ba nas ba'i rdzas rnams ni// ji srid ma zad bar du ni// de na gnas pa'ang bad mi
gyug chu 'gram sa dang rdza mkhanas// de bzhin thod par chags nga 'i sa// grogs khar na sa dag dang// mtshan ma gcig pa'i sa rnams // bskyod pa kun la shin tu bsngags// gci'i

byas la// sngags pas de yikhar bskyod bya// de yi yan lag lnga bzung ste// ril bu dganam dzes par bya// las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te// khyad par dun dbang du byed/ yus kar lasogs
'bras bun// glang po che yang shadangano// khrag dang rus pa'i zhag la sogs// de yi thal ba sogs pas byug de yi thod par bskyod pa dag/ de yi kha ru bcug tsam gyig/ glang po che yi gzugs
su'agyur// 'di ni thun mong chog ste// de bzhin rta dang ma he sogs// de bzhin stag dang ri bodasogs// chog de bzhinabargyadang yig/ khrag khacas bsgoms nas stag sogs gyur// sbyor
ba'i choga'adus su// grub kha'i gza' lasogs dang sbyar// rtagatu bsgom dang bzlas la dgag/ dmatshig sbyod pa bsrung bdag/ de yis rtag pa 'grub 'gyur te/ gzhan du nan khrus bu
med// rdo rjesogs dpa' do bzhin gshegs// bco ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgya la bo chen po dbal rdo rjemalo' 'gro las/ 'bras bu bcos ma'i phyag rgya'i yo shos kyi rim par
bya ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o//gad nas A la kA li gnyis// de nyid las ni kun bskyod cing// yang sdud par byed pa po// tha snyad kyi ni chog ste// sngags kyi mtshan nyid thunamong ]
ba/cho ga bde dag ji bzhin nyon// a zhes bya ba mdog dmar pa// mgo dang thig le sbaras bgi/ bslab bya'i snying kha mgo bo dang// gsang ba dang ni lte bar bsam// a zhes bya ba theg ler ldan//
mtshal dang bal ma sa dang// ku su mnalta bu'i mdog/ bsgrubabya'amagor ni bsam byas la// chos shing sems dang bral pa dang// lkugs shing rnam par nyams par bsams// de yi lus ni
rang nyid kyi// sa bon gyis dkrugs rmongs bsgoms na// ring por ma thogs dbang gyur te// rtag tu thams cad ster bar 'gyur// azhes bya ba skyes lta bu // dbyangs yig gsum pa thung ngu ni//
bsgrub bya'i snying kha lte ba dang// de bzhin du ni mgrin par bsgrog/ I zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig bzhi// li khri ya ni mdog lta bu // bsgrub bya ye ni dpral bar dgod// gang gi lus la gsum
pa dong// bzhi pa'i mchogani bkod pa yis// myos sheng cha lugs nyams pa dang// sems dang bral bar byas nas su// jisrid 'tsho ya bar du ni// lkugs pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur//
de nas dbyangs yig lnga pa yi// dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i 'od// u zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya yi// mgrin par zhags pa lta bu r bsam/ 'aglog dang mtshungs par 'bar ba yi// dbyangs
yig mchogani drug pa ste// sku zhes bya pa khasgrub bya yi// snying gi dbus su bsgom par bya// lkugs shing myos par 'gyur ba dang// lus ni g.yo zhing sems dang bral// gang du sgrub pa po
gnas par// 'khrugs bzhin du'ong bar 'gyur// bdag nyidadang nor dang pa nas// dbang du yang 'gyur ba yin// ra zhes bya bdu ba'i mdog/ dpral ba lus dang bral/
bag/ dbyangs yig gnadam kha re// snying ga dang ni gsang bar bsgom// desapAnimun ba'i mdog/ bsgrub bya'i lus kyi mgo bodang// de bzhin rkang pa 'grin par/ ring po de na bsgom
bar bya// 'dun pa dang na brgyad pa 'dis// myur du skyod par byed pa ste/ semasani chugs shing nyamasagyur nas// sagazhis lus rgyu 'gyur te// mthong ba yi na tsha'adril// slar yang ldog
par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba srid pa sdom/ bya rog gan gshog pa 'dra// sgrub pos bsgrub bya'imag dang ni// mgrin pa dang no gsang bar bsgom// dbyangs yig rang re zhes pas//
bsgrub par bya ba dkris par bsam// bsgrub bya'i lus la bsgoms tsam gyis// sdong bar byed pa'i mchog yin te// sems can kun gyis sad pa dang// skye bo kun gyis brnyas pa dang// mar khu
phyung ba'i 'ba' cha bzhin// skya bo kun gyis sbyong bar 'gyug/ cog 'am yi mtshal dang ni// lham bu chuganyer ltakhu'i mdag/ ma zhes bya ba dbyangs kyi rgyug/ gsangadang lte ba snying khar dgod// oM
zhes bya ba gzi brjidacho// li khri dang ninyi ma'i mdog/ bsgrub bya'i mig dang de bzhin du// kha dang mgrin par bsgom par bya// sgrub pa'i mchog gis yid la ni/ las 'di byas pa tsam gyis su//
02 khams gsum po nam lus pa// mthe bo'akhyen tsam dun mthong// gdong dang gdong ni mngon phyogs te// de yi yi ge'i cha shas kyi// dbugs kyi ri mo lcag mas dgug/ cha shas lcag ma'i dam tshig/
dbang// a zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yigani// thig le dang ni zla phyed bcas// zla ba gnyis ni tsheg drag bcas// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye gi mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ sangs rgyas pa'i
mor yang dag gnas// 'di ltar A li kA la zhes// bcud len thams cad ces byar brjod// gtso pel ni thag byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs dang sbyar// de yi 'og tu phye nas ni// che
ge thams cad gzhug par bya// ji srid snang ba yod kyi bar// 'dis man srung ba byed par brjod// thig le zhes bya sems yin te// sogs kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi// zla ba gnyis dang yang dag
ldan/ mi 'gyur mchog gi phyag rgya 'o// de las dbyangs yig rnams kyi ni// sgrub bo bdag nyid chen po yi// las ni lha dang lha min dang// mar bcas myur du dbang du byed// mo zhes bya ba nyi ma
ltar// 'od zer 'khor ba stong dang ldan// bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang// dpral ba khyad par snying khar bsgom// go zhes bya ba rtag 'bar ba// nyin bya ba'i gzi brjid can// bsgrub bya yin lus kun
la// khyabab nyid du bsgom par bya// bas la pa yin mdapungaltag/ dbyangs kyis khyab nas bsgom pa dang// dbyangs kyi cha yis bsgrub bya yang// rab tu 'bar bar bsgoms phyosanas// dgra de
[s/ ]shu/ lekhargyar 'tsho ba yang// de ma thag tu lta bar 'gyur/ an thams cad sdud pa ste// 'tsheb zlog par byed pa 'ad yin// ma ni gshigs su gsol ba ji ltar 'dod
zabazhin lha mad byed/bud med kun gyi mngal dun// bsamasanakhu ba 'dzag par gyur// khyad par du na gzhan dag la 'ad// dkar po dmar po'i ting 'dzin bya/ ma la sogs dang yi ge rnams / lus
la bkodan spyad mi dgos// de ltar dbyang sakyi las rnams ni// khyod la bdag gis gang bstan la// dbyangs yig dge ba bcu drug ni// lus la ge char bkod de bya// a zhes bya ba rkang gnyis dged/
An khyen pa gnyis 'a bsam// i ni brla la dgod bya ste// I zhes bya ba gsang bar gnas// unalte ba'i rtsa bste/ u zhes bya ba lta nga 'i dbus/ ran lte ba'i stang du dgod// rA zhes bya ba snying
khar yin// zhes bya ba mgrin par dgod// de bzhin lAni kan lako dge zhes bya ba la la// de bzhin tshanasna lag/ onan pa dag la ga// cho zhes bya ba dpal bar ro// i mgo 'a dgor
dbyas te// a :zhes bya ba rgyab tu dgod// dbang dang dgug la dmar por to// gsad la thams cad sngon por 'o/ du ba lta bu r bsamasan/ bslad ba nyar gyur the tshom med// dbyangs yig kun gyis
byen pa blangs 'di// bdag gi de nyid gsal ba yin/ sgrub po bdag nyid dam pa yis// de ltar go cha bgos nas// sgrub pos dbyangs dang yi ge yi// byinas lasa rnams shin tu myur// de nas rig pa'i de

0/ nyid du byung// lus rnams dag tu byas pa ste// kanas ma yi mthar thug pa'i/ las ni blo gros chen pos nyen// lha dang lha min mi dang bcas// gang gis sa gsum thams cad ni// sgrub po shan tu rgyas pa yi//
dbang du de dag thams cad 'gyug/ yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras stor ba// den nga yis bshad bar bya// dbyangs yig bcu drug po rnams kyi// mdzes ma khyod la ngas bshad nas// dan kasogs yi ge

yi// lasa rnams 'dod bzhin byed pa bshad/ sbrulha mo yi gi dang po ni// nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing// li khri sbyangs ba lta bu yi// thig ler ldan pa'i yi ge che// sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i snying ka dang zla

lta ba dang ni mgo bor bsgom// de yis bsgrub bya'i lus kyi ge/ nang du khug su khyab par bsam// de yis lus ni 'khrugs nas su// rmongs shing sams dang bral ba dang// brgya' bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur//

ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar// de srid dbang du 'gyur ba sto// ji srid 'tsho yi bar duni// bdag nyid nor dang bcas 'gyur la// khazhes bya bang brtson chen ma// lham bu chu gsher lta bu dang// trema'achar

kha lta bu'i mdog// thig ler bcas pa gzi brjid che// gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa ste// bsgrub bya ya na snying ka dang// mgo dang rkang pa kun tu dgod// de yis bsgrub bya phug nas ni// rmongs shing sems
dar bral bar bsam// sgrub pa po ya mchog gis ni// de yi lus ni dkrugs pa dang// myos shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya// de yis shin tu brgyal 'gyur zhing/ yi ge'i dbang pos che bsan// sgrub
@#/ bo bdag nyid chen po yi// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni// nor dang bcas pa dang nga du gyur// ga zhes bya ba'i sa lon che// rang gi lha yi sdom pa des// tsheg drag bcas ba gzi brjid che//
gtso bon rasnyen lta bu'i mdog/ bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang// khyad par dun snying kar bsam/ de los bsgrub par bya ba'i lus// yi zhes kun tu lug bsams na// lus ni rtag tu dkrugs pas
rgyun// 'dar zhing de yi dbang du gyur// bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas// snang ba'i dgra rnams ma lus pa// khyim la sogs pa kun tu ni// ji srid nyi zla 'od kyi bar// ma lus par n 'dzems par
byed// ga zhes bya ba sgyu ma che// bskal pa'i mo dang gzi brjidamatshudas// stong du thig les brgyan pa ste// kusu a yi khu ba 'dra// bsgrub bya yin lte ba dang// gsang ba snying ka kha dang ni/
wAmago bo na bsams tsam gyis// bsgrub bya dga' bas myos nas su// sags dang bral zhing nyams nas na// ji srid 'tsho yi bar dun// bdag nyidanon dang bcas pa ru// shin tu de yi dbang
du gyur// zhes bya ba gzi brjid che// sngatshan ni mtha'achar gnas// da ni'i dod pa'i mda' yin te// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed// don bsgrub bya gsang bar bsam// khu ba dag ni 'dzag
par byed// gsang ba chu nizhugs pa yis// thams cad du ni 'bigs par 'gyu// lan lag gi ni tshegs kun tu// de yis phug pas myos nas ge// nor dang bdag nyedabacas pani// myur ba nyid du/
dbang du 'gyur// ji srid 'tsho yi bar dun// da lags dang bral mi 'gyur// yi ge lnga po kun gyis kyang// bdag nyid go cha bgon par bya// ka zhes bya ba snying khar dgod// kha zhes bya ba
mgo la ste/ ga zhes bya ba spyi gtsug tu// g+ha zhes bya ba go nar bya// nga zhes bya ba sgrub pa po'i// lag pa g.yon la dgod par bya// de nas bsgrub bya dbang dang ni// dgug dang gsad la sogs
bar sbyang// chog de ltar byas na ni// byad ma dgos par dngos grub 'gyur/ tsa zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog/ rlung gi gnas kyi ye ge ste// sgrub pos de yi snying kha dang// mgo dang rkang par bsam pa
bsgrub bya rlung la gnas nasani// kun tu 'phro bar bsam pa dang// sems dang bral bar gyur nas su/ (nam mkha' la ni gnas bzhin du// rlung gis gzhan dang gzhan dag tu// khyer ba ru ne
bsgom bar bya// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis// bsgrub bya shin tu brtan pa yang// bsad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// bsgrub bya'i lus ni 'phangs pasan// ji srid 'tsho yi khyad dun//
slar la 'od bar me 'gyur ro// tsha zhes bya ba'i yi ge che/ gsal zhing mig smananag po'i mdog/ chaganyis pa dang yang dag ldan// bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bor bsam// de yi mgo la du ba yi//
tshogs dang mtshungs pa'i rlung gis khyab// nur zad tsam gyis bsgrub bya ga/ lus n de yis bskor bar bsam// slar yang tshani tshig drag bcas// lte ba ru ni sems nas su// lan gsum dun
brjod byas na// yig 'di nib/da ba mchog/ bsgrub bya rmongs shing sems dang bral// dkra bo mdangs ni nyams nas su// sa stang ma lus pa ru 'khyam// ji srid tsho/
za yi bar dun// gar yang ldog par mi 'gyuro dzazhes bya ba'i yi ge rgyal/[u0f38]/du ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// 'od zer ldan zhing shin tu khar// rdul phranadagan stong du 'phro// bsgrub bya yi
mgo bo dang// gsang bar yi ga zhugs par bsgom// yan lag tshigs kun bug da dang// soms dang bral ba bzhin du gnas// yigs yongs su bkang bas na// denas brgyu bar gyur
nas ni// nyin dang mtshan du rmongs pa dang// mi bad bar ni bsgom par bya// sa stangs shing dang nags tshal bcas// thams cad du ni 'gro bar 'gyur// bskrad pa'i tshig 'di dag ni// dge
ma khyod la nga yis bshad// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni// slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur go dz+hazhes bya ba stobs po cho// bsgrub bya yini snying kha ru// nyi ma lta bu r 'kher pa dang// 'od zer gsal
rma brnam bar 'bro// thig le zla ba phyed pas brgyan// bsgrubabya'i mgrodang snying ka dang// lto ba'i stod du yig bsam// sgrib pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya'i lus// 'bar bas bcud dang bral bar
bsam// de yis bsgrub bya brgyal gyur zhing// bsladapaM mna' mi ga'am// yang na smyon pa nyid du 'gyur// yi go yiso ni ltung bas na// ser bas bor bar mi 'gyur te// sa ba'i nags tshal
00 bcas paru// smo'ang 'gro 'gyur zla tsam chad// dza zhes bya ba 'di yis ni// myur du bsad 'gyur grwa rtsom med// nya zhes bya ba'i ye ge mchog/ sna tshogs pa yemadog dang ldan// bal sha yi
ma tog gi/ 'odozer stong phrag 'bar ba ste// chu rgyun stong na 'bab pa yis// de yolus la dbo bar bya// de yis nor dang bcasapa/ brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang// rmongs shing
myur du dbang du gyur// tra zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ dbang bo'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog/ 'od zer 'bar ba stong phrag gis// yi ge'akhar dang ldan par bsam// bsgrub bya yi ni dpral
ba dang// mgrin pa dang ni snying kar bsam// bsgrub bya'i stang du nam mkha' la// bdud rtsi sgo ya thig ni// spyi bo'i stong du rtag tu bsam// cung zad glog ni g.yo 'dra ba// kha ba dag ni
'bar bar bsam// sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya// yan lag tshogs kun g.yo ba dang// brgyal zhing rmangs myos bsams na// ji srid nyi zla yod bar du// nor dang bdag nyid bcas
b.ru// de yis rnams rtsod dbang du 'gyur// de ltar rnga yi rgyal pa yi// las ni khyod la nga yis bshad// de nas yi ga gnyis pa yi// las kyi mchog ni bshad par bya// bla zhes bya ba'i yi
gni/ dbang chen dang ni 'dra bar 'dod// spyi bor bdud rtsi thig les brgyan// de bzhin glog dang 'brug gis brgyan// ye ga'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// bdud rtsi chu rgyun 'bab pa yis//
[© ]sa sa/ bsgrub bya'i lus la kun rtagator//bslab bya'i mag dang 'dzin pa dang// snying kha na gnas par bsam// bsgrub bya'i mgon phug pa dang// lus l kun tu khyab ba las//
bsgrub bya myos shing 'dar b.ru// gags pas yi gas rtag tu bsgom/ de nas ji srid 'tsho bar du// brgyal zhing rmongs bas dbang du 'gyur// donas Tazhes pyab// yi ge'i rgyal po gtum
pahU~M// de la las kyi mchog rnamasakri/ rtsa gcig yid kyis gus pas nyen zhes bya ba thib 'ar bas// de tsho lta bu'i dbyibs can yin// ut+pa la ltar ljang sar te// 'od trar
gsal ba kun tu 'gro/ bsgrub bya'i spyi bor bsams pa yis/ khasgrub bya'i tshigasan 'bugs shing 'byed// bsgrub bya ma g.yor bsgom byas na/ lus ni kun tu g.yo bzhin du// ji srid 'tsho
gi bar du ni// rmongs da bcas pas dbang du 'gyur// de nas las kyi mchog gzhan ni// shin tu gal bar byed pa ste// zhes bya ba la ga'argyal// shin tu rmad byung byed pa po// dbang
bo'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog nyes lta bu 'bar bas// bsgrub bya'i snying dang lte ba dang// mgrin par yi ge bsams nas su// byang chub sems nirab 'dzag bsaM// de yi lus la dgo
bar bya// de yis bzazhing brgya gsasu// gnyid log pa ni bsgom byas n 'di yis 'di bor mi thogs par// rmongs shing sgrub lo'i dbang du 'gyug/ choga' sbyor ba 'di yis ni//
[d ]nam yang chags dang 'bral mi 'gyur// de nas mtha mag las// ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'bad de nyon// Nazhes bya ba du ba'i mdog/ cung zad 'bar zhing gsal ba ste/ 'dri ma med pa'i
du ba las// 'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'gro// bsgrubacu yi lus kun lag/ de yis rnam par khyab byed cing// 'od zer glog stong 'khyuga'adra ba// bsgrub par bya ba'i stong du bsgom//
'od zer brgya yis bkang bas na// chos nas sun brgyal bar 'gyur// de yis ji srid 'tsho bar du// deni de yi dbang du 'gyur// ta zhes bya ba'i yi ga'am chog 'od zer glog ltar gsalabasu/
mdog ni rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra// yi ge 'di ni bsgrub bya yi// snying dang mgrin gsang ba dang// lte bar bkod de 'bugs bar bsam// yig de yis rmongs pasan// bsgrub bya sems dang
bral ba dang// rmongs shing brgyal bar gyur nasasu// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du na// myos shing dbang 'gyur gzhan duman// de yi drung na gnas pa yi// tha zhes bya ba yig mchog/ mu man gyi ni
mdog 'dra dang// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i 'od// bsgrubabya'ising ka dpral ba dang// de bzhin dun tang bar dgod// bsgrub bya'i lus la dbod po ya// mtshon cha bzhin du thim par
bsam )la gi'i rgyal pos mnan bsan// bsgrub bya soms dang bral 'gyur zhing// sa 'dzin gyan dbang bo bzhin// 'gro ba dag kyang bcings par 'gyur// reg bya me bas dri mi shes//
sgra'i thog shing gzugs mi 'byed// lce yis ro rnams mi myong yod// dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du gnas// gang dang gang gi steng du// nyi 'od lta bu'i yi ge bsams/ )/
yig brgyal posgra yis ni// skyes bu bcings gyuratshom med// de nas gzhanayang da yis ni// stong lo' 'is kyi chog nyon// dazhes byabamadog sngonan// char sprinanag po'a'adodang mtshungs//
'od zer 'bar ba nas 'brob// bsgrub bya yinamagar bsams la// mo stag 'phro ba bsgoms pan// phyogs kun tu ni bsam par bya// yig dbang phyugade yis// bsgrub bya'i mgo bo phug
bar bsam// 'kharara'i nan stong phrag gas// de ni kun tu bskor bar bsam// de ni bkod pa tsam gyis// sdong gog dngani mtshungs bar 'gyur// byugs te shin tu bcos pasan/ 'gro
ba'ang mig b.ranigyug/ ji srid sgrub po 'don bar du// sems dang bral zhing brtan par gnas// slar yang sgrub pas bsams tsam gyis// rmongs pa las ni grol bar gyur// de nas yi ge
d+ha yin// las ni rmad du gyur pa nyon// d+hazhes bya ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ kha dog ser po gsar gyi mdog/ gser lta bu yi 'od zer 'phro// bsgrub bya yin mgrin pa nu// zhags lta bu r 'bar bar
bsam// sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya de// khrod de 'od bar bsgoms byas na// sgrub pa po na gar gnas par// rmongs dang bcas te 'ong bar 'gyur// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bduni// phyugs te soms

dang bral 'gyur zhing// nyi ma brgyad pa'i cha la ni// rang gi gnas nas 'ong bar 'gyur// de nas yi ge na yigi/ las kyi choga'i sgrub pa rten// mdogan du ba'i phung po 'dra// rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrul
dang ldan/ bsgrub bya'i snying ka mgrin pa dang// lte ba dang nerkang par sbyar// de yisaM ngaga rnams rang yul las// bslad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// donermongs pas rang yul du// nam yang phyis
ni'ing ma'agyug/ denas sde tshan lnga ba ni// yi ga rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog/ las nishAn tu grub pa sdu// gzhan dang gzhan ni bshad par bya// ba zhes bya ba rlung gi gnas// char sprinagyi ni sprin
gyis bskor// 'bar ning du bas 'khrigs par ldan// bsgrub bya yini mgo bo dang// mgrin pa snying ka kod ba dang// rkang pa dag tu bsams nasan// ba zhes bya bo'i ya ge des// bsgrub bya'i lus
ni dkri bar bya// bsgrub par bya ba nga rgyal dang// khro bas brtanaMganas gtso bo yang// yi ge gtso bo bkod pa yis// skad cig gis ni bskyed gyur to// gal te tshe rabs gzhan dag la'ang// slar yang
ldog pa mi 'gyur/// denas yi ga pha yin// las mchog nga yis bshad kyis nyon// yi ge pad+ma'i mdog 'dra zhing// 'bar ba bsgrub bya'i spyi bo dang// mgrin pa snying ka lta ba dang// gsang ba'i
gnas sukhakodasan// ku su ma ya khu 'o dra pa// 'dzag pa nani rnamakhasams te// bsgrub bya lus n phyi nang du// de las gang bar bsgoms byas na// bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyuralag/
[© ]/sems med lus ni 'das gyur nas// rmongs pas sgrub pa bo yani// dbang du 'gyur te dpyadam dgos// bzhes bya ba'i rgyal pon// gru bzhi ba la stobs po tsho// dung dang zla 'dra/
dkar ba'i mdog/ zla ba'i 'od can bsgrub bya gi/ dbus su sgrub pos thim bar bsam// de lus dug gas mi tshugs shing// nad la sogs pasagAzer mi 'gyur// rigs dang bkres dang skom 'byung/
'di ni rtag tu bsgoms gyur// tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyu// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di las// zla ba dmar dang bcas ba ru// lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na// rtag tu bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'drar 'gyur/
de nas rgyal bo b+hazhes pa'i// las kyi mchog ni mnyan bar gyis// dbang po mtshon tshalta bu ste// nyim 'char ka lta bu'i mdog/ bsgrub bya yin mgo bo ru// rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsams la//
de yi lus n ma lus par// yi ga'i rgyal pos dbug par bya// rmos shing sems dang bral gyur te// rdo rje yin yang brgyal gyur nas// man bas zin ltar skad cig la// ltuban de 'chi ba nyid gyur
pas// de yi srog ni rmos bar 'gyur// dgra ni lo brgya 'tsho ba yang// skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas gzi brjid chen po la// yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog// de
yi las ni ji bzhin nyon// tsam pa ltar sor ba'i mdog/ bsal pa'i mi bzhin gzi brjid 'bar// 'od ni glog ltar 'khyug pa bzhin// bsgrub par bya ba'i stong bsams la// de yi 'od kyis
0 bsgyu ba bya gi/ stong dang 'ogazhis lus bar// lus kun tug yogs bsags na// gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu// sha za dang nasrin podang// khams gsum yi ge'i bdag po dang// lha dang lha min
mi dor bcas// sgrub po bdag nyid chen po pa// skad cig gsan dbang 'gyur bar// mdor bsdus sa khyod la bshad/ ya zhes bya ba'i ye gemchog/ dun pa dang ni du ba'i mdog/ rlung gi dkyil
'khor dbus gnas shing// rlung gi gzugs can yi geche// rlung bdunagyin gtso bo dang/ (gonas zhes bya bar brjod pa ste// zla spyod kyin dbyibs can la// ba dan brgya yas rnam par klubs//
rnam ba bzhi yi rten gyur pa// phyi rol gos ltar dkris pa ste// ra zhes pa yi yi gamchog/ 'bar ba byo bstong dang ldan// de la stong du bsam par bya// du ba yi ni' phung pas brgyan// bsgrub
bya'i mgo bor bsgoms nas// dgra bo la brgya 'tsho ba yang// sbrul gyi mche bas zin ba ltar// sad cig tsam gyis srog dang ni// bralazhing 'chi ba'i sgor gzhol 'gyur// lha sogs thams cad gong
rung// stong du yi ge 'di sbyar na// myur du ltung 'gyur dpyad mi dgos// gdon dang rimasa rnams thamasacad ki/ de la 'bab par 'gyur ba dang// sbrul chen brgya yi mche ba 'bab// de yis
myur du 'chi'agyuraMn// gnod pa gzhan lta smosatsod gos// bzhes pa dang ra zhes pa// rlung dang ma yi gzugs can du// nam mkha' phyogs su bsams nas ni// nam mkha'i sa nig yogs
rgya// bsams na// nyi zla gza' skar sogs pa'ang rung// chu bo dang ni rgya mtsho ya ]/dbus su yi ge gnyis po dag/ bsams nas te ma brgyud pa la// rgya mtsho la sogs thams/
cad skam// zhings 'bru yi phung po dang// khyim la sogs pa'i gnas bsams na// phyi rol ma lce 'bar ba yis// thams cad yi ge thal bar byed// ma yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te/ rlung gis
kun tu bskor ba'i// yi go mchog nags bsams na// las ni kun tu nye bar gnas// de nas gzhan yang yi ge gnyis// stobs chen ldan pa bshad par bya// dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu
las rnams thams cad byed pa po// la zhes bya bas yin te// sazhes bya ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ dbang po rdo rjes mtshan pa dang// 'od zer glog ltar 'bar ba ste// kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ru// yi ge'i
dbang po sa la bsgom// de steng chu ya yig ni// bzhi pa legs par gnas pa ste// dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog/ kha ba'i rgyunani 'bab pas/ la yi stang du bkod nas su// shin tu ngasal
ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzag/ dbang chen gyis ni bskor ba yi// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// spyi bor thig le dang ni ldan// chor pa'i rgyunan stong phraga' bangs// stong du sprin gyi phung pon/ klog
rang 'brug la sogs pas brgyan// bdud rtsi mar gyi rgyun 'babs pa// nam mkha' thams cad khyab b.ru// dkyil 'khor gsakyi dbusaM 'gyur// gang gi mgo yi stong bsgoms na// sgrub po
bdag nyid chen bo ga/ las ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// gdengs ka gsum gyis mdzes pa yi// lhag mnan na gzugs bsam la de yi mig gnyis dbang bo yagi/ mtshon chas brgyan/
ba'i dbus su// bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'i a yig dgod// grong khyer gyin mtha' ma ru// bsgrub bya ya na stong du dbab// dug dang gdon dang rims la sogs// skad cig gis na zhi bar
gyur// da ni sgra dgar gzhom ba ga/ tshogo bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur yi ge ni// de ltar rtag tu bsams gyur na// tshesdud ba mang ring 'gyur na// skra dkar la
sogs smos ci dgos// bud med dbang phyug rnams la ni/ 'bad pas yang dag g.yon bskor zhing// rang gi spyi bo'i steng du ni// le gcig bar du bsgoms byas n// rga ba dang ni 'chi ba 'joms//
da kyis gdung bar ma gyur te// gal te klachen brgyad kyin// mche ba'i dug gis zin gyur kyang// dug ni dug mod byas nas su// dug gis brgyal ba slong bar mdzad// 'gron po lam gyis
dub pa dang// gdon la sogs pas gzir ba rnams / kun las thar bar 'gyur ba yin// bdag ga spyi bor bsams tsam gyis// skad cigags ni bkres skom 'joms// nad rnams
kun gyis gdungs pa la// yi ga bkod pas grol bar 'gyur// de ltar las rnams sna tshogs na// lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin// gtsomo ba zhi yi rnam pa bzhi// las kyi cho ga rgyas pa ste//
rlung dang mo dang bdud rtsi bcud// de bzhin drod kyi snga pa ste// gshin rdzobartanam phyag gnyis pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// lus ni ma las byung bar/ bskal
ba'i me lce lta bu r bsam// 'og dang stong du la yig brgyun// de yi phyogs kun thams cad du// 'khor ba gang gi snying kar bsag// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam par 'phro// wa dang ldan pa'i yi ge che//
nam mkha' khyab pas bcings 'gyur te// brtan ma yini 'khrul 'khor gyi// yi ge'i rgyal pos bcangs pas na// sa'adzin lta bu r brtan par 'gyur// rkang mang dang ni rkang gnyis dang// rkang bzhi la
sogs sems can gyi// lte ba du ni bsgoms byas na// de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur// de yang bskal pa'i mi lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'bar ba 'phro ba ge/ wan stong du bsgom par bya// slar yang
mi yis 'bar bsamasan// gang gi lag pagayon pa la// yi ga de na dgod par bsam// ji srid lag tu bsam gyi bar// sa stong gi ni skya bo rnams // rang gi gnas ni de nyid nas// 'bebs shing
la/ 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni gshin rje brtanam la// mos pa'i las rnams bshad pa yin// dbang po thams cad 'babs pa yi// gshin rje'i pho nya'i las bshad bya// ut+pal sngon
po'i mda' 'dra la// mgo dang thig le sbyangs bani// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab lta bu // gang gi lce dang rkan bsams na// skal ba bzang po 'joms par gyur// snying dang kha dang sna dang ni// mig dang
[/]rnabar de bzhin du// yi ga dbu ma bkod nagi/ dab da po thams cad 'phrog 'gyur te// gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos// dri tshor zhang stobs mi 'gyur// de bzhin lce yis ma myong// dugags
brgyal ba bzhin du gnas// las rnams de dag thams cad la// yid kyis bzlog na grol bar 'gyur/ gshin rje gacho ga du ba'i mdog/ srog pa'i skal ba lta bu ste// thams cad khyad par 'khyams
gyur pa// sna tshogs 'od can bsgom bar bya// drod kyi sdo pa'i yi ges// du ba dang ni rlung gi mdog/ snying dang lag brkyang bar dgod/ khams gsum yang nibaskrad 'gyuran// sa stangs skyo bo
smos ci dgos// thig ler bcas shange ha dang na/ bcas pa gangag rtse stong du// bsams na phur bu lta bu r 'gyur// yi ge dge ba de dan// rtag tulce stong bsams nan// lan cig bzlas pas
zina'agyur te// da ni snyan dngags mkhan por 'gyug/ de ltaras dngas mtha' yi// yi go'i cho ga bshad pa'o// 'jig rten gsum po 'joms byed ma// 'od zer dmar po gzi brjid no/
tig bye blta bu'i 'od// bcung zadasngo ba 'jigs chonam// ma he dang ni rta dag gi/ 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba kun la bsam// de yi ya go'i rgyal bon// gzi brjid chen po yi ge ha// de yi lasani sna
tshogs mchog/ 'dod pa'i lasanibashad par bya// de ltar bdagakhus rtag tun/ g.yage lngaranabasam byas// 'gro b rnams kyi bya ban/ tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur// sastasalha
thubya// dang lhaminadang// mi dang bcas pa bdebs byed cing// sgrub pa po ni dus chen dar// 'chib dganab joms par byed// sgrub bo yid la 'a dod bzhin du// nad rnams thams cad

gnon par byed// ngag tsam gyisan dbung tshogs dang// chu dang rgya mtsho 'ching ba dang// rgyu dang khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor dang// rta dang glang po la sogs 'ching// shing chen sa la skyel ba dang// som
can rnams ni dbang du byed// las kyi cho gamathong ba yis// bya ba rnamasana'adod bzhin byed// hazhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ mgo dang bral zhing thig les brgyan// de la las rnams ma lus pa//
phan bakha shad kyis mnyan par gyis/ )khyab bya khyab byed stong pa ste// kun tu 'gro bami shigs pa// shin tu stong dang stong pa che// de nasoms mod gnyid leg pa// sad pa dang ni bral ba ste// de

zla nicir yang snang mi 'gyur// lha dang lha min gnadasbyin man mi'am ci dang dri za minA/ klu rnams dang ni srin po dang// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab men// chu bo'i shing dang nags tshal dang// de bzhinas
sogasam yin te// 'jigs rung dmyal ba la sogs min// mdang du ba sogs min zhing// nyi ma zla ba gza' skar min// mi dang sha zal sogasamin// mngal skyes dang ni drod las skyes// sgo nga
dngani rlan skyes min// thang la gnas dang nu gnas min// pad+ma lasan skyes pa dang// dbang po khyab 'jug bde byed min// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs// 'byung ba'i tshogs la sogasamin te/[II]
0/ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog// rtagatu bsams na dmigs gyur// lego cig bar du ba sgoms gyur na// rgodang nad kun 'joms gyur te// de la dug kyang mo'i bon/ nad kyi 'jigs pag khazhig/
dug ni khur bu brgya zos kyang// den 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ rtagatu stong nyid bsgoms ni/ dachar 'gyur the tshom med// mgo dang dbral ba'i yi ge klu/ de nyid mchog tuthimanas su// bsgomA
naskad cig mngon shes skya// thig ler ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rgan dang sna sgo'i lam du ni/ ratsho dganazhugs pa bsag/ rimolar ma'i rtsi lhagu/ dkyil 'khor bzhi yi gzi can bsam// rtag
tu rkan ni thug ste gnas/ rtag tu sbyor bar gnas pa sa// nyi ma bdunanamab+bong 'gyur te// 'di dang mtshungs pa yodam yin/ bram ze gsod pa'i nga nyin bdun gyi// tu rgyas par mgrong
'gyur te// de ltar mthong ba'i rnal 'byor bas// gzhan gyi grong sogs 'dod bzhin 'go/ k+Sha yi rgyal bo 'di nyid kyi// las ni bsam gyisam khyab gnas// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos
grub// brtul zhugs ma ni khyod la bshad// re re yin lasa rnams kyang// bstan pa ru ni nus ma yin// skye bo rang don byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin// yi ge sngatshanaso so ya/ ye
go dganaso so zhingag re re'ang sbyor ba bzhi bzhi ste// gcig kyad bzhi ru sbyor ba bzhin// A li kA li'i phyag rgya che// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// shes rab thabs ma gtogs bar//
go'abadamchog naglob ma gyur// sgyu ma che dang mnyam sbyor ngag/ rdo rjes kha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjesams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can
gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dang la rdzo'akhatso 'gro bas/ A li kA li'i sngags kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye bstabazhi bcu rtsa gcig pa//
zlade nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchodacing phyag 'tshal te slar gsol la/ khyod kyis sngar bshad gsang ba dang// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu zhugs// ma le bcu drug rig kha che//
bde mchog bla mar bshadar dang// khams rnams dang ni de bzhin rtsa// 'byung gnas sgra tshul nges 'gyur dang/ 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' bas// thog ma dbus mthar dbya ba dag// ji ltar
nang du yang dag gnas// de rnams dbye ba de bzhin gsungs// ba ka'i rgyal po/ sbya ma kun gyis rnam rol ba'i// nyon cig lha mo sgyumatsho// sangs rgyas kun la'ang gsal ba ste// gzhan rnams
lalta smos ci dgos// sgyum chen po bcu drug ni// ma mo nyid du rab tu bshad// de yis nang gi dkyil 'khor du// gyur pa nyid duwe tsamachod// rnal 'byor ba yi bdud rtsi sbyo// bcu
drug char yang mi bod de/ slar yang bdud rtsi rdzas rnams ni// don bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// ra dmar chen po yakhams// ha zhes bya ba las skyes// san gan+da ba tA ste// pa ni
[:/]gags par bstan pa yin// zhes bya ba dri gsungs// che zhes byakhra che tog sa/ de bzhin razhinu yin// ma zhes bya ba pas ta// sa ni kun tu nyid yin// rAnas zhes bya ste// at+ma
zhes byanal dza// zhis bya ba dri yi mag/ sa ni so dang lag rgyas yin// danargya mtsho las byung ba// smini'a'a'i snying po yani/ tazhes bya ba ga pur te// byang chub sems las byung ba yiki
rtag tu ye shes dam bamchog/ rtsa rnams thams cad yang dag 'dus/ de dag lha mo khyed la bstanaM gsar sogs rnal 'byor pa yi rdzas/ bshang dang gnyisogs lnga la bya// khams rnams
sdud pa'isna tshanan// de ltar bcud len bstan yin// mkha' 'gro dngos chags pa yi// sems dpa' rdordzolas byung ba// 'dab byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// padaga' dbang zhes bya ste/ stong
dugasal bar 'phrongs ga/ rje'am zhes bya la// 'din gsal zhing 'bar bsan/ rnam snang mdzad chenakhrub ba'ang yinaM/ rlung na snatshogs las byug/ khyad par spyod pas rtamchog yin//
rnam shes rdorje sems dpa' ste// phan tshunaganyis mo darang bzhin/gnas der nyamanub pa yi// sbrul ba'i sku yi gzugs kyi bdag/ lha dang mi yi bde ba'i// bsdus byas rnyog pamed
sku// 'khor ba'i laman gcod pa bo// smos bathams cad nyer zhi ba'i/ rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/ mkha' 'ge mdun du bshad// yong na mkha' 'grom nagyi sgra ni rab tu gtum mol
sogs pa bya la/ dngos po narang nga zhen te de rnams kyi rdul phra rab las bslabs pago de nyid sems can gyi don la nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems dba'i sgrar brjod de/
mi shes pa'i ri 'joms pas na ye shes nyid ni rdo rdzo'o sems dpa'arnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ snod dang bcudakyi'ajig rten// bcudan rgyu ba zhes bshad la// de bzhin snod brtan pa'o/ ro
pozhing ang gnyis gnyis te// skal ba bzang dang skal ngan no// sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/ gzugasazhwarnam pa bzhir gnas// 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan de nyid der du byung bas na 'du byung bcom
ldan 'das so// rang byung ba zhes bya ba ni'akhyud bachen po rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin gyi bya de/bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan bsas// yang n nyon
mngos ba'i bdud bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das te/ rad byung bcom ldan 'das de nyid lhag pa'i lha ni gcig nyid de/ lha da yin zhing lhag pa nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i lha ste/ lhag pa'i lha ya

sgrar gang sngar nga stan pa khamasa rnams kyi nang na gtso bo dang dmo bar gyur ba ste/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skya mchod rnams yang dag par skyod par byed pa'i khu ba dang khrag ga/ mchog tu bde
las skyes shing byung bsan 'byung gnas te/ nges 'byung ni sems skyo ba'i bzhed gzhung gsungs pa'o// sman dbyangs te shes rab kyi dbyangs kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o// tshul ni sgrar brtags pa sta
bde las byung ba'o// bstan cing bsnyan bar bya bas na dam tshig/ yul can gyis yang dag par bzhag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang/ don dam par dbyer med pas nye bar brtag
nas yulo can dbang po la'ang yul zhes bya// spyod ba ni dbang po bcuganyis po de rnams kyi bar rgyu bsta/ da rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyisams thob bzhi spyod yul/
'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' bzhes bya ba na zago ba dang bcas pa'i dngos po gsum lasarnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas bag/ de la thegom nagasang
ba ste/ 'di skad ces bya ba sngar 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i 'ag pago mtha' zhes bya ba na dgyes pa ste thos bzhes bya ba bsten par bya'o/ dbus zhes bya ba mchog ste bdag gi zhes bya ba shin tu ma
b.ragyur pa'o// yang dag gnas thams can bdag nyid de dus gcig nazhes bya ba'o/ kham ldan 'dasam sgyu ma chen mo nyid da bar spyod bste/ le brgyad pa dang rdo rje pad+mo spyor bas byung ba'i
khrag dang bcas pago/ lha dang mi yi bde ba ni// bsdus byas rdorje rdul gyi ni// bcu drug char yang mi phod pa ste/ de 'bacu drug ni bud med kyi skud pa las byungaba'i khams rnams skyod pa
bcu drug dang lhan cig tu sbrel bsta/ chags pa chen po zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o/ de ltar skudab bcu drug dang/ sgril ba'i choshas bcu drug po// bsdus byas zhes bya ba bdud rtsi lnga'i snying ]
ba'i// gong bur byas pa ste/ bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor bar gyur bgo/ dang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i don te sde tshan rnams kyis bsdus shing bstan pa'i khams gang dang gang yin
ba' brnyan de dang de sa bon dang bsgril te brtag par bya'o/ lha'i bde ba zhes bya ban de bdud rtsi ltar yongs su smin pas rang gi sku rdo rjer gyur pa'i skad cig ga/ ma'i yin bsanama'i sta nges pa
gsal ba'i bde ba'o// de'ang dngos grub thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtag tu bde ba'i gsal bas mtshan pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sags kyi rdo rjemangon du byu zhing bde ba bstan
pa las bde ba nyid du skye bar 'gyur te/ ther zug tu bde ba myur bas so// de'ang dpalan/ mngar pos bsgos pa'is bon ni// 'dar po 'di ni bstan pa dang// gang phyir mang pos bskyod
byas na// de yi ro ni mngar por 'gyur// de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi las byung ba'i bde ba bsonan bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dang mnyam pa dngos po gang du'ang yod pa ma yin tacha shas
kun dang mtshungs pa lta zhog/ deb rdul phrad kyi cha dang mtshungs pa'ang yod lam yin no/ rdul phra rab ni rdo rje phram rad bzhin te/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i bdag nyid spros ba'o//
mthu dang ngo bo nyidi dag dang// rang bzhin gyis ni grub ba ste// de yi rang bzhin gtam dag ni// bzhin mdzes mni khyod la bshad// gang zhig phyi rol sbyor la dga'// bcu drug char yang
a phod de// sbyor ba'i mchogana' de mthodang// de dag 'a bus zos rtswa dang 'dra// dan du byas chen po'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste/ mi gsal brda yi
tshul ni// gnas ni gsang bzhes byar bshad// mi gsal ba yi dngos por gi/ brda yiskad kyis bshad pa yin// 'di na rtog pa 'a rtonanas/ gnasani gsang ba bshad par bya// dgon

chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin no// gzhan yang dgon chen zhes bya ban re'is rab sto/ sngags kyi yon tan gyi shing gi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nyid rang bzhin gyis
lha'i bdag nyid pas na sa phyogs so// rigs mtha' yas par ng bzhin gyi phyir mang po'i tshig go/ bdag dang sems can la sogs par rtog pa dang bral bar rnam par dben pa sto/ lta ba ngan pa rnamA
kyis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ra bo// 'jug par dka' ba'i phyir bor te/ zab cing rgya che ba'i shes rab kyi nu pe'i gnas su gyur pas rgya mtsho chenang ba'agram rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad dang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa grub pas gdod nas grub bsto/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub 'a dod chags kyi mas bsregs pas dur khrod de// de ltar na me
lang lta bu la sogs pa lnga rnam par dag pas gnas rnam pa lngar bsgrags so// chung ngu na dang por lo bcu gcig ma'i bang dang rol bas bcud kyis len bsgrub par bya'o// gnyis par lo bcu gnyes
mdang re'i bsan dmatshig don du gnyer bar bya'o// gsum par lo bcu drug ma dang lhan cig tu dga' bas ni sngags rnams goms par bya'o// ba'i par 'a nyi shu ma dwang nam

mkhar 'phur ba bsgrub bar byag/ lnga bar la 'atsalnga ma dang dbang bskur bar bya'ozhes bya ba'i bar du// de ltar na/ dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma dang// zhes bya ba gnas lnga po de dag dang rim pa/
bzhin du sbyarago/ de'arigasaldan rnams ni rdo rje rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa rnams dri'i chusamachod par bya sto/ bcas pa zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu mo de 'am tog bzung la mkhas pas rang gi khu ba/
dang bcas pas mchod de// rtag tu zhes bya ban thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par te/ dus kyi khyad par zhes bya ba snga dro'i dus su'o// gzhan yang lhan cig skyes grub ces bya ba thun mong gi dngos grub
dang ldan zhing sgrub pa po la brtse ba ste/ thig le des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnamasamachod par bya'o/ gzhan yang dgon bachen po zhes bya ba ni bud med kyi phyag sta/ 'dod chags
ka la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa'i phyir// de nyid thabs kyis yongs su sbyang san byung chub kyi lam ste/ yongs su sbyangs pan mthar thug par son pa'o// de'i d+harmod pa
nas phyogs te/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje rag lasogs pa'i bu mo bas na rnam par dben pa'o// de nyid bde ba chen pos mi g.yo bsan ri bo// sems
can dman pas 'jug po dka' bas na ri bor te phug dang ldan pasanatshad tshang ngo// thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgya mtsho'i gnas pasaskya mtsho'i 'gram sta/ sams can thams cad
kyi rgyud la mnyam par gnas pas na dur khrod de// gdod nas grub pa ni rtag tu grub pa ste/ 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shinganam mkha' ltar yongs su grub nga sa rtag tu bde ba chen po'i tshul
gyis dmigs pas de'i rang bzhin du byas nga go/ na zhes bya ban 'dus pa ste de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs zhes bya ba lasna tshogasani rnam pa dum ste/ pad+ma ra
gzugs kyi tshig bla dwaka pa so// ras na gsal bar ma byas te/ g.yogs pan shin tu mi mngon par byas pa'o// stan ni rig pa nyid du gdan du byas pas dag pa na 'jam pa'o// lha mo
rnams kyis pad+ma rang gi mtshan ma'i gos kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// bzhag pa ni mchod par bya ba ste/ yang dang yang du 'dod pas ma'os par bya ba'o/ston pa ni bde ba'i mareg ge pad+ma'i
khrag dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du khragan pa rgyud kyis len pa ste/ khrag nipad+ma yin pa bshad pa la sogs pa ni bcud kyis lonano// des 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te/ khragachen ga pur bcas
yil dang/ tsanaldan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na// ra sa yan bla na med// ces bya ba la khrag chen ni dus su 'bab pa'i zla mtshan du gyur pa'o// tsan dan dmar pon
@#/ sha ste de dang bcas ba'o// tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na dbang bo thams cad las byang ba ste/ de dag thams cad kyi bcud ni ras ya na'o// bza' bar bya zhes bya bal
za chog gang gis bza' bar bya zhen/ sbom po 'am mtha' ltag ces bya ba la sbom po ni rdo rje'o// mtha' ltag na b+ha ga ste/ AnAgazhes bya baming gis bsnyad pa'i phyir ro// khar zhes bya ba ni de
sgyu nyid kyi khas rang gi lha'akhago/ de yang/ dang po bla mar dbul byas te// denas sangs rgyas rnams la dbul// phyag rgya lan byin nas su// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin du myong// mchod pa ba'i
zhes bya ba la byang chub kyi sems bskyed ba'i rim pa sgom pa bos ni dus bzhir mkha' 'gro ma ka sogs pa'i lha mo dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i bdag nyid can ji srid stong pa nyid kyi nga rgyal
nas bzung sku gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du nges par byas pas mchod par bya'o/ das 'a bo dang ni snyoms 'jug pa zhes bya bani/gzhan yongs su rdzogs pa'i ma ba la gnas pa'i sgom
ba po' sto/ dus kyi nges pa med cing thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i nga rgyalagyis rtag tu gnas pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya nen/ yid ninang du chud pa'i sto/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud ma
mo'i rigs ba ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam par sbyor ba dang ldan pas mchog tu dga' rnam par spyaso/ gnas pas tshim par bya zhes bya ba'i bar dug/ de ltar mchod pas mchog dang bar ma ste/ tha man

09chags ba chen po'i tshul lo// de'ang rdo rje canagyis thams cad bsdus nas btsunamo'i b+ha ga bde ba canang spos la/ derani dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ba ste/ gzhan gyi de kho na nyid ji bzhin/
du bstan pago/ bar mni bdag gi de kho na nyid de/ rdo rje 'dzin pas 'khor le thams cad rang gi dbus su bsdus la/ rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin du byas pa chog des bsgoms pa ni mchog go/ bud med kun
gyi sgyu ma zhes bya la bud med kun n gzugs lasogs pago/ sgyu ma na yon tan te rang bzhin gyis sku la sogs pas gnas pa'o// sgyum ste yon tan gyi rgyus ma lus ba sgyun 'i don du gsungs so//
ma lus pa ni chags te chu dang bcas ba'o/ chani dngos bor bstan pa ste// cha med yon tan zhes bya yin// yon tan yon tan nasbya'i nga// yul dang dbang po rab tu dge/ A li kA la yon tan
gsus// mnyam pa dam tshig spyod yul yin// de di ni mtshan ma yin pas na phyag rgya sta/ 'din zhes bya ban 'dzin pa po'i blos mngon du byas pa'o// yon tan des rtag tu yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i
ring po la sogs pa gnyis su med pa 'i tshul nyid mchog ste/ bla na med cing dam par gyur pa'o/ de'ang lugs ma la sogs pa gzhan dag las phul du byung bar rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir// rangabazhin

kyis grub pan 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ngo bo nyidi rnam par dag pa sta/ ji ltar 'o ma la zhi la sogs ba bzhin no// de bas na bcos tshalas bye brag tuM gyur pa'o// gzhan yang/ ngan par sbyor ba'ang
[zl/g]@#// 'grub par 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis zhes bya ba la/ rnyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems red pa ste/ de nyid dga' ba kun gyis khyad par du ba phal bas len gyi/ slongs
zachos 'tsho ba la sogs pa dang/ dka' thub kyi sbyor la sogs pa na mi mthun ba'i phyogs yin pas nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te spang bar bya'o// des zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i rdzas kyis te/ khyod
bar ji lta bu zhig cen/rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis sngags kyi yi ge yos su gyur ba las rang gi lha'i gzugs su yongs su brjob ste/ sngags bzlas pa dang/ rang gi
sa bon yongs su gyur pa las rang bzhin longs su brjobako/ sna tshogs zhes bya ba na khams kyi rang bzhin te// mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa bco brgyad du phye ba yin gyi/ phyu ba la sogs pa'i khams nim
yin// nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pa zhes bya ba la/ nam mkha'i sgrusan sams la bya sta/ ji ltar nam mkha'i khams la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyurapa bzhin du thams cad kyi go skabs
star ba'i phyir ro// yang nanyan thos la sogs pa'i gnas bsregs bas na nam mkha' sto/ nam mkha' der bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu zhing spyod pas na de ni nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub bas/ mkha'

'grom zhes rab tu grags zhes so// sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgyas zhes bya ba la/ kun tun sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i nges thoms cad do// snatshogs ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po sto/ de'i phyogargya ni dkyil 'khor/

kyi 'khor lo' phyag rgya thams cad de// desan sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin gyis zla ba dang dmar po'i grub pa'i rdzas de dag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du rtag tu goms par bya bas stobs su gyur pa'o//

sna tshogs sdom banarnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba grub pa ste mkha' 'gro kun zhes bya ba khrag dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogasasngags pa rdorje mkha' 'gro zhes bya bar grags bsto/ rang nyid skyes par gyur pa'o//
de nyid med sems ni de khon nyid kyi sams med pa sto/ phyin log gi sems kyis sbyor bgo/ lha la dmigs pa na 'dod pa'i lhar bsgom pago/ shin tu de nyid sems zhes bya ban de kho na nyid kyi sems
kyis brgyan pa ste/ byin rim leg pa'i mtshan nyid do// debang khrag la sogs pa'i khams sangs rgyas rnams kyirang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid de/ dngos grub thams cad kyiganas so/ lugs ma la sogs pa'i
rnal 'byor na de spangs nas bcos ma sgom par byed pa ste/ gang gi phyir gzugs brnyan ma yin pas so// des ni 'di skad bstan par gyur te/ ji ltar smin ba'i 'bras bu bor nas shing gi rtsa ba len par

byed pa bzhin du rnal la bor te bcos ma la chags pa'ang blo gros dman zhing shin tudun par ston to// desan de khon nyid kyi sems kyis phun sum tshogs pas bdag nyid sbyor zhing rdzogs pa'i ril bas sangs

rgyas kyi sku la dmigs pa ni mchog tu mi gyur ba'i ya shes 'grub par 'gyur ro// ye shes de nyid ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba sta/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro// desanagazhan yang gzugs brnyan dang [L]
