lugs ma la sogs pa spangs te/ khams sna tshogs kyi shes pa nyid sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par brtag par bya'o// lha yi rnal 'byor dus sun// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga/
nasazhes pa la// ba spu ni lta ba'i dkyil 'khor te bu ga ni nam mkha' go/ rtsa mo'i bar zhes bya ban yig bcu drug yongs su gyur pa'i khams rnams te/ spro ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor to// rnal 'byor
bsani rtag tu bsgoms// dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// rang gi pad+ma'i lte dbus su// blabar gnas pa'i hUM yin te// sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrug ni// phyogs bcu dag tu sbyo bar byeng/ thig
le bcu drug thig skud kyi// sngags pas thig gis sgrig btAb pagi/ lta ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug par// a sogs klu yi mthar thug pa// tham las ni sngags btu bya// phyi nas thig ler cha dang
bral// bshang dang gciba'irang bzhan pas// 'di ru kun sbyang bar bya// yi ga da ni yongs gyur pas// yi ge thams cad yal ga 'dra// 'dir du byang bcomaldan 'das// gcig pu nyidanalhag
ba'i lha// sangs rgyas kun dangos stong nga ya/yi ge nyid na mkha' 'grom// zhes bya banAsngags kyi man ngag go/ ka sogs yang dgaganus pa yi// yigalha yi gzugs yin te// asogs
dbyas rnams thams cad kyi// sngags kyis sgrog cing brgyan pa yin// lhag pa'i lhani yi ge hUM// lte ba'i dbus su bsam par bya// lte ba pad+ma zhes bya ste// bsam pa bsgom par bya ba yin//
sangs rgyas kun dngos stong bani// rnam shes hU~Mgi gzugs nyid de/ yi ge nyidani mkha' 'gro ma// sgra yi gzugs kyis gnas bgo/ gang phyir gzhan yang 'di dag ni// ji ltar sangs rgyas kun
de bzhin// 'dan rtag tu 'dren pa dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// mgo dang thig le rnam spangs pa// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// rang gi dbus gnas rdo rje can// yi ge rnams kyis
yongs su bskor// de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba la ye shes kyi spyod yul yongs su shes pago/ yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas shes pa'i yi shes te/ de nyid kyis

nibadag nyid sangs rgyas thamasacad do// bdag nyid ces bya ba ni kun rdzob ste/ kun rdzob yongasasu shes ba nisangs rgyas nyid do// de nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du grub go/ thabs gangagis
shin/ de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bgi/ rdo rjemakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa de khon nyid 'byung ba'i rim par phye bas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyisapag/ sbyin srog las kyi chog/
yi// jibazhin bshad kyis lha mo nyen// rgyal srid phyir ni sngags ba yis// stong phrag bcur ni bzla bar bya// pho nya'i stong du gnas nas// sbyin srog stong phrag ldan bya// sha chen 'om la bsgres pa
rim pa 'di yis bsregasanani// dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgya yi bar// tshun chad pho brang rnyed par 'gyur// dpal ldan rgyal srid che grub pa// sus kyang gzhig brar mi nus
zaso// ma dang ba glang lce spyang shas// de bzhin ngo mtshar mchog gyur te// rang dang 'o mar sbyags nasan// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na// gling bdun la ni dbang ba yi// rgyal srid langs
spyod dpal chen 'gyur// de nas mtshams tshod lta byed pa// gang gis gzhom par 'dod pa des// dug dang khrag drang mar nag bcas// ma yi rus pa bsreg byas te// tsher ma can gyi shing dang
ni// de bzhin phub ma mi skyar bcas// shan pa yini ma sbyar la// gcer bu skrani lhag pa yis// lho phyogs su na kha bltas te// khro dang bcas pas nyin phyedan// sems mi ga yangs pas
srog pa'am// yang na gos sngon gyon nas su// mtshan phyadan ni bsag par bya// sngagros kyi mah+pharani ming dang sbyar// dgra bo stobs dang ldan pa yang// dpung dang bcas par brlag 'gyur nA//
phal pa la lta ci zhig smos// de nas dgra bo stobs kyis ni// dregs pa bslad pa'i chog bshad// lwa yi gshog pa zhag dang ni// nag pa'i khu bar bsres pa dag/ sha za'i shing la ma sbyar te//
rlur du bltas te bsregs byas n// mtshan mo bdun ni tshun chad kyis// bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni thatsam med// de nas dbye ba bshad par bya// smyo byed ma ni 'bar ba la// nim pa yi na ma dang//
[zel]sprul kyi pags par bsres byas la// bya rog dang ni shug pa yi// tshang gi shang dang bcas pa dag/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs nan// mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun bcas pa dwag/ skye bo thams/
tsado snang bar gyur// de nas dgug pa bshad bya ste// bsgrub bya shing gi stan la ni// la par bcas shing g.yog dang bcas// rlung gis gdong na steng du blta// le khri lta bu'i mdog tubs
zhagasapa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi mthadzobazlas te// bsgrub bya'i snyingag bad+madabug/ bud med yin na skyaganas dgug/ khams gsum grub par gdon mi za// de nas
cho ga gzhan bshad pa// dgug pa la sogs ji bzhin 'byung// dum bu gcig pa'i thod pan// gzugs mdzes ma chagam gsal// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs bris te// 'dab ma rlon pa
brgya lani// khrag dang go ro tsanar bcas// da rlu ra yi lcog gu yis// sngags ni ming dang bcas par bri// grod pa'i nang du bzhag nus su// bsgrub bya dmar por ras kyis g.yogs// sngags
kyi nga rgyal bskyengs nasasu// 'dab ma re re bzung nas// gobazlog snying bo'agasang sngagasan// zlos shing 'dab ma thams cud srog/ yid la bsams bzhin 'gugs par 'gyur// de
nas gzhan yang tsan danan// dmar las bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la/ rang khrag gor tsamar pa cas// mar bres bsgrub bya'i snying khar gzhug/ tsha ba gsum gyis byugs nas su// snying ka
ka zhum ba/lte ba gsang ba'i gnas// zangs ma'i khad kyis dgug byas nas// mtshan phyadanani 'dod bzhin 'gugs// gsar btsug gis ni skye gnas kyi// gzugs bris de yi
stod dun// 'gang g.yon pa bzhag byas la// brgya rtsa brgyud du bzlas nani// gang gis ming nas bzung gyur pa// den de mod 'ong bar 'gyur/ shArlung gis btsubs pa'i shing le lag 'khru yi
sgro yi smyug gu yis// ming dang bcas pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni// mchi ma las ni bris nas su// gyen du ldang ba'i tshub mar bskur// cho ga des na ba/da nga ra 'gyur// sgra yi nus pa'i thun
bu ni/ sor drug pa yi tshad du bya/ sngags ni lo na bdun bzlas nas su// gang gi khyon sgor sbas nani// de yi rigs ni chad par 'gyur// ba glang rtadang glang chen dang/ bong bu rngago ma ha yi//
gnas su sbas na rlag par gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// bsgrub bya rdza ma'i stong du bskyon// gcer du mar khus byugs pa drang// skra grol khan lhar bltas// skyabasamad du
zhing brgyal bar bsam// mgrin nga 'gos pas bcings nas su// rgyab nas gro bas rdeg byed cing// khams gsum gnon ba'i bsam pa yis// mo yi mtshams su gdong bltas te// sngagA
kyi mthar ni dzabazlas na// ji ltar 'dod bzhin grub par 'gyur// rta dang ma her zhon pa yi// dgra bonangan phan tshun du// mtshon cha thogs nas khros nas ni// phan tshun dpung dang bcas pa ru//

'grub ma byed pa bsgom par bya// sngags pa g.yul du khabaltas te// de yi ming dang spyal ba yis/ yi ge ra ni bri bar bya// gdong gi stong du bltas par bsam// sgrub po ro ya stong du ni// rdo rje skyil krung/
mgayer gnas// de yis bsgrub bya mnan nas su/ lus dang ngag ni gzer bar bya// sngagasan ming dang sbal ba ru// sngam bzhin du bzlas bar bya// bcing bo'i cho ga'o// mkha' 'gro kun dang
mnyam sbyor ba'i// rje rjemakhaga'agro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhinagashegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rjen pa 'gro'as/ las thamA
cad kyi bsam gtan 'byung bdang/ sbyin sregag cho ga'i rig par che bsta bzhi banu rtsa gsum pa'o// ga dan sbyin sregacho ga gzhan// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo no// bgegs da/
'amanIgazhan yang rung/ rma med 'an tu mdzes ba ni// 'byung po'i nyin zhag la rnyed pa// sgrub bos sngar bshad bzhin basmra bas na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub// zla mtshan phyes pa 'i sam
ni// byi la'i rtag bar bcas pa dag// zhib tu brdungs pas bdug pa bya// bdug ba 'di yis sgrub ba bo// shin tu byin gyis rlob bar 'gyur// khyimanag mo' rom dang// ma sha 'bras bu bsus pa/
las// 'o thug byas te ro pa khar// 'jigs pamed par sbyin sreg bya// de nas ro de langasaM nasani// ci bgyi zhes ni sgra 'gyur te// ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang// rkadabyug gal grad bzhin
@#// te// gter dang dgra bo tshar gcad dang// gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyis len// gang bslangs gcig byin nasasu// 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// dpa' bo rnams dar rtse
gyur ba// gakun dag tu na nga mi smra// de nas ro langs chen pa yi// sgrub thabs gzhan ni bshad par bya// sngar bstan mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// ronamadzes ba bzung nas na// rnal 'byor chen por
legs gnas pa// mtshan phyed na ni bsgoms nas su// de yi sha ni dmar chen bcas// sbyin srag brgya rtsa brgyad busan// dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo na// mkha' 'gro ma yis bskor gyur cing//
ro langs srin po du mas bskor// ha har bzhad pas 'jigs byed pa// der ni drung du 'ong bar 'gyur// ce kyang brgya phrag mang po na// bskor nas 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs byed// de ma grong 'jig
par mi bya ste// sngags kyis bskyis pa'i 'gusu bya// no rje brtul zhugs bdag nyid sems// kye ho dang 'a bo chen po legs// lha mo de skad brjod nas// sgrub po yid la gang 'dod pa'i//
dngos grub brgyayang ster bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma yis yongs bskor te// dpa' bo rang gi gnas su 'gro// don de yi mod la yang// lha la lus su gyur nas ni// khams gsum kun tu rgya bar
'gyur// dpa' bo 'dod pa'i gzugs can to// skal bzang de bzhin gshags ba 'dra// rtag tu nam mkhar 'phur ba dang// rgadang 'chi ba rnam nga ra song// sa gzhi kun tu rgyu 'gyur zhing// ji

[0]ltar 'dod bzhin dngos grub 'jug/ de nas nyon mongs zhi bya dang// ting nge 'dzinani rgyas bya'i phyir// rang gi lha yi sbyor bar gnas// nang gi sbyin sreg brtsamapar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus: su
ni: bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya// 'od zer 'brang ba 'khrugs shing drug/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'phreng ba can// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal bani// stong gsum stong gi rdul mtshungs pas
kha dog dkar la sogs bkugasta// lus mchog de la gzhug par bya/ 'din zhi ba'i sbyin srog yin// rgyas la byang chub sems dad 'a dgug/ rengs pa'i gzugs su lhag par mos// de na
tu nyen mongs zad bya'i phyir/ khyad par khro bo ba gzugs su bya// sna tshogs rjes su chags bya'i phyir// bud med kyi ni gzugs su bsam// 'di ni nang gi sbyin srog tu// sgrub po kun la bstan
nga yin// phung po la sogs bud shing ni// las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'bar ba// ye shes me la bsreg par bya// tshangs pa'i ma rind bar gnas/ la la nAn
dgang gzar te// ras nAn blugs gzar khu// dbyug ba rdo rje bde chen 'og/ rang gi rdo rdzomatha' yi bar// thod pa bsrag rdzas snod yin te// rdzas rnams thams cad brlag par bya/ 'di
ni blamang sbyin sreg gi/ goma'o ram pa nyid yin te/ lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin// de ltar byas na ting 'dzinan// nyams par mi 'gyur brtan 'gyur bar// rgyud rnams kun s na
mang du 1 chog 'debs na rang du bla gos// sala' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor pa'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje soms dang 'a de bzhin gshegs// bcom
ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro' sa/ rolasasgrub ba dang/ nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim pa phya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa ba'i nga//
bgrang 'phrang cho ga ji bzhin du// rabi tu bshad kyis lha cho nyen/ yang dag cho gagang gis// 'di ni grub gyur the tsom mod// shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang// khams kun la sogs gzhan yang rung

dung dang lung tung mu mnani// tshe dang nad med 'phel bar byed// gsar dang de bzhin dngul dang ni// khyad par pad+ma'i sa bon dang// rin chen 'phreng ba mdzes pa ni// mkhas pa yis ni bgrangs nas su//
! rgyal srid phyir ni sngags bzlas na// dba' chen myur du thob par 'gyur// gur kum la sogs dri dngani// khyad par du yang byu ru dang// tsan dan dmar po dngul la sogs// sgrub pa po yis ril bu
tsha/ zhenacing rjes su chags pa mchog/ sgrub pa de la 'bras bu star// ru rag lung tang sa bon dang// mi yi rus pa de bzhin te// drag po'i las la sbyar par bya// khyad par dun mngon spyod la'o//

zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la// bo de rtsis ni las kun byed// sngags mnyes pa la lnga bcu sta// rjes su chags par de yi phyed// zhi ba lanibargya yin te// rgyas la brgyad ni lhag par bya// mngon

spyod lan drug cu ste// las kyi bya khrag gisan sbyar// las kyi bya brag ji bzhin du// bgrang ba'i 'phrang ba rnamasan du// gsar gyi skud pas brgyu bar bya// las rnams kun byed dgu ba yin// ya ngan sa
bal skud pa ni// bu mo gzhon nu gzugs mdzes shidra/ yan lag shin tu rdzogs ba dang// blo gros ldan zhing ngag 'jam smra// de yis bkalo ba'i rgud pas rgyu// sngags kyi dngos grub grol bar 'gyur/

ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom ste// stangamamachod rten du ni brtag/ mchod rten chos kyi dbang po bas// chos kyi dbyibasan dbus su bya// bslang la bya rog spu dang no// bong bya rnga mo'i spu las bya// rta dngam
de'i yul sa ni// phan tshun snang ba'i skud par bya// dur khrod sgra yi skud pa dang// khyi yi sgyu dang bsres te bkal// drag po'i las la khyad par du// mdor bsdusanasani bstan pa yin// zhi ba la ni
mdzub tshor gzhag/ rgyas la gung mor dgal bar bya// dbang du byabasran lagagasungs// mtha'am la mngon spyod bya// mthe bong lcags kyur byas nas ni// lho rnams thams cad dgug par bsam//
ldan du mnyam bzhag sngagasabazlas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom mad// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bgyi/ ro rdzomakha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjesams dang 'a de bzhin gshegs//
bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsus/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dar la rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ bzlas pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsalnga pa'o//
btsug ba bskyodacing gar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to// gtsug lag khang dang khang bzang dang// mchod rten dkyil 'khor grong khyer dang//
khyim dang ldum ra 'a sogs dka/ lto 'phyi'i lto bar brkabadang// slob mas gzhi gzung ba dang// bum pa sta gon gnas pa nyid// srung ba'i chog sngon 'gro bgi/ lha dang slob ma sta gan bcas/ yo
bshes skud po tshon rtsi rnams // ma der brgyus nas ni bshad du gsol// slob ma yin chog dag/ ji bzhin bshad kyis lhamo nyon// sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa dang// ye shes yongs su rdzogs
pa'i 'as// sems can don brtson sams kyis ni// dngos po kun gyis gsol ba gdab// slar yang dkyil 'khor khri ba'i phyir// slob ma yis ni bla ma la// yang dang yang du gsol bar bya// gsol
nas bla ma sa smra bya ste// yo byadab+bams cad 'byor ram ci// cung zad cig ni 'byor gyur la// kha cig dag nam 'byor ces// sman slob dpon bdag chen gyis/ de yis sems na brtag par bya// brtan
pa lani brtan por to// g.yo ba 'a ni g.yo ba ru// 'dren ma la ni 'dren par shos// slob ma ya na rkang mthil du// gzhu 'dra'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam// lte bar kha shas me 'bar ba// de yi 'od
cher snying khar 'bar// 'bar bas kun nas 'khrigs par bsgom// khaM las byung ba'i mi sdug gzugs// sdig ni sna yi sgo nas dbyung// de nas khro bo'i gzugs bsgoms la// don kun nas za bar

bsgog/ oM badzra TA kani kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarbapA paM da ha da ha b+hasmi ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT bsgrub bya lha gzugs bskyed nas su// bsrung ba dgan dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor cho ga jibazhin du// brtag pa ru
nisu yis nus// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dag ni brtagis nu'agrub// grong dang dur khrod tshong dus dang// tshal dang lha khang grong khyer gyi// shar dang byang gi sa gzhi shes// lho
dang nub phyogs de lta min// gtsug lag khang gi gnas khang dang// tshal dang ri rtsa lib dang// khang pazas kun snying phyogs dang// dur khrod dang ni lha yi khyim/ 3sa yachan jisnyad pa// rgyud
rnams kun la bsngags pa yin// sa ya mtshan nyid shes par bya// yang na yid nagar dga' bar// de rnams su ni dkyil 'khor bri// dman sogs dngos grub bye brag gis// pus mo chusilci
ba'i bar// brkos la phub ma rnodang ni// gyo mo sol ba zug rdudang// tsher ma la sogs bsal la bcag/ phyi nas mtho gang tshad du bano// don chu yis rab bkang la// shar du bltas tregom
brgyur 'gro// slar log 'asane brtag par bya// rdzun gangabar gnas nas// bsams nasngags pas sbyang bar bya// sngon du 'grul sogs pa gzhug/ de ltar sa yi cha sbyangs la// u0f38gyi sa bon
las byung ba'i// gos dang rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// zhal gcig phyaganaganyis pa ste// 'od zer ser po kun tu 'bar// sa yi lha mo lag pa na// gsar gyi bum pa thogs pa ni// lus phyed sa
la gnas pa na// bltas te lag pa g.yas bani// sa la rig nas bskul bar bya// oM a rgyam hA de ba bru tha rwa lo kan te sarba rata saM pAr+yadi bya a lang+kAr b+haTi ti hAr nu pu ra nim+mo
badzras tA pra pu dzi ta gahItA/ i daM a asmon+tanAhito b+ha ban+ti he hi hi haMsAhA/ me tog dril sogs mchod nas// de nyid du ni thim par bsam// khang bzang rdo 'bib gzhi dngani// gtsug lag
khang dang zhabs kyis bcuge/ ba glang lhas dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram// lag pas la bzhag nas su// rang gi snying po brgyad brgyar bzla// der nib rka sogs bya mi dgos// de ltar sbyangs nga 'i sa gzhi
la// dkyil 'khor dang ni rjes ca thun pa'i// rin chen la sogs bzhi 'gyur gyi// dkyil 'khor gyin khad pa bya// oM AthalaHhU~M zhes brjod nas// sa rdo rje'i dngos por bya// o mo den padzib+ha
bahU~M/ khung nam pa 'di yis dgang// de dbus khro bo chen po ni// bskal pa'i ma ltar 'bar ba bsgoms// de nas klu yigadong sogs ni// stangan khro mo'i gzugs can la// lte ba man chad rtsi
gcig pa// rdo rje yin gzugs su spro// bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og gzigs pagi/ bangs bcas sngags ni zlos bzhin du// de rnams snying kar gdab par bya// oM badzaDA ki nI sarba bag+ha
nan anuts+tshad ya kA lA ya hUphaT/ de nas sngar bstanas dbus su// rdo rje'adzinachen sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid nye bar gnas nas ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs par bsgom// don dam la ni
[s blta ba ste// 'di ni bsrung ba'i dam pa mchog/ gang zhig bsrung ba'i cho ga kun// 'di nyid du ni brtags pa yin// de nas rdorjomada' yin// dra ba rdo rjer ba dang// rdorje'i rang bzhin sar bya///
rgyal bo chen por bsgyings byas la// dkyil 'khor sa la hU~M zhes brjod/ rdo rje'i 'gros kyis kun tu bskog/ bdud rtsi lngas ni kun tu byug/ de bzhin gshegs nga 'i gnas rnams su// tshan
danasogs bas gru bzhir bya// phal pa yin gnas rnams su// so sor zlum por byas nas ni// lha yi 'khor la cho ga bzhin// ma rtog sogs bsamachod par bya// de nas rinachen gsar dang/
dngul// zangs sam 'jig pa dag kyang rung// ji ltar 'byor ba'i rjes mthun pa// bum pa dgan bya bas// rtsa banag po la sogs spangs// lto yangs bum pa bzang po'i dbyibs// du
gra song gi dbyug pa yi// ut+pa la dang gzhan mi grub// sa ha de ba'i smag nabacas// gsor dang dngul dang mu tig dang// mu man tsu ru rin chenalnga// til dang nas rang gro dang ni// mon sran
gre'u dang mud kar bcas// ga bur tsan dan dmar po sogs// sman gyi chu yis dgang bar bya// de ltar dam tshig chen po yis// ma rtog chu dang ldan par bya// dngos po rang bzhin dang ba'i phyir/
yid 'ong mi 'ong brtag mi bya// dngos kun rtog pa las byung bas// yid 'ong mi 'ong dpyad mi bya// rdzas kyi nus ba bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas nyid du 'bab par 'gyur// dper na snga
ba u@#// yi rtsa ba ni// dkar po nag po rnab dang// dpral bar byugs pas bud mod kyi// zla mtshanu'adzag pa zhi bar gyur// glang chen gcin dang ga ba k+Sha// dkar po'i sa bon
zamig bskusan// rten khru bar 'gyur ba bzhin// 'dir yang yo byad khyad brje can// sbyangs la nye bar spyod ba yis// khyad par 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// dper na sngags kyis skyas pa'i
dug/ zos pas nad rnams thams cad ni// 'joms shing bcud len nyid du 'gyur gdobazhin 'dir yango brtag par bya// thams cad rang rang mtshan ma dang// so so'i sngags kyis mngon par
bzla// mtshanam rang ra ngamadog tu bya// mgrin par ras zung gsar pas dkyi/ khan shing lo gsar pas dgab// kusha'i chun po 'og tu bting// kha dog btsos pa'i skud pas brgyan// lhag
par gnas shing mchod byas nas// bdug sposaragazhi phul nas su// 'khor lo' dibus su gzhag par bya// de nas bus mo g.yas pan// sa la btsugs taspyis gtugs la// 'di skad brjod de
mkhyen par gsol// dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i rang bzhin can// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang// khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bdag de ring 'dribar 'tshal// ji bzhin re ba bskang ba
dang// sems can rnams la sman slad du// mgon pos gus ldan bdag la ni// bka' drinadagan gnang bar gsol// de ltar lan gsum brjod bya zhing// bum pa sta gon gnas nas su// sangs
rgyas 'jig rten mgon po rnams // de ring bdag la brtse bar dgongs// byang chub sems dang la dag bcom dang// gang gzhan sngags kyi lha rnams dang// 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang//
bstan pa la ni dga' ba yi// 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang// gang yang lha yi spyan can rnams // rdo rjecan dag 'dazhes byas// dkyil 'khor dge ba 'di zhes pa// yo byad ci'abyor pa
yis ni// de ring 'dri bar 'tshal lags n// dkyil 'khor dang na gnas pa yi// bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs bcas la// kun gyis byin rlobs nye bar bzhugs// cho ga bzhin du lan gsum
brjod// de nas gosar ba legs par bsgrel// tshad ldan shin tu mdzes pa yi// skud pas shes rab thigan gdab// chog bzhin du ma tog mchog/ nyi shu rtsa lngar phya ba yi// skud nga dag ni
brkyang bar bya// shar dang nub dad byang dang lhur// thig skud brkyang ba'i rim pa 'dis// dkyil 'khor dgan cha brgyad bya// phyed ni lag par bsdogs nas su// thig gdab chog brtsam par bya//
g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshuran// lte bar bzhag ste gzung bar bya// de yi 'og tu ci bder bya// sngags pa shar du kha bltas te// phyogs kun mnyam par dmigs nas su// mnyam zhing tshad dang ldan nga'u//
tshangs ba'i thig gnyis bri bar bya// ma mtshams gnas te rlung dang ni// bden bral grwar gnas dbang ldan du// sngags pa shar dang lhor bltas la// skud pa dag ni gdab par bya// 'di ni slob dpon
slob ma dang// g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya// slob ma mdun rang nyid kyis// phur bur btags te bri bar bya// nyis 'gyur byas te phur bur gdag/ nang ga grakhor la rdo rje
rnga 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rim gnyis su// dbang ldan mtshamasanas brtsams nas ni// g.yas skor du na skud pa bskor/ gson dkyil 'khor brgyad ma ru// mu khyud mad nga ra 'dodapa yin// sgo yi
tshad kyis sgo khyud de// de yis phyid kyis 'gram pa bya// sgro yi sum 'gyur tAr Na// ba dan dril bur ldan pa yin// rgyal mtshan ba dan dgas bcas// kha khyer tshad dang ldan par bya// trar Na ya
rol tu// tshon gyis sa yi nyis 'gyur du// phyi yi bod kyi dkyil 'khor bya// 'khor la de yi phyi rol tu// shing la sogs pa'i dur khrod bya// gzhan yang 'khor lo'i rjes mthunapar// ji ltar
mdzes par rab tu brtag/ thig skudachadan slob dpon 'chi// dman dang lhag pas nad babyung rtsa// phyogasani 'khrul naslobam myos// de bas skyon med shes pa ra bya// ye shas thig skud gshags
gsolas// de nas las bde brtsam par bya// 'dod dang thur par bastar ba'i// tshon rtsi dogani bskyod par bya// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang// kun gyi nang rol nag po ru// tshon gyi cha ni rim
bzhin dgye// de nas slob mas cad gar dgye/ 1tshon rtser gzhing dun// sgo yanyi shucha yi tshad// gal te tshon rtsi mi mnyam zhing// yo dang dma' bar gyur na ni// rimo dma' bas dngos mi 'grub/
yon bo gdung ba skyed byed bas/ dpangs mthe'u chung gang tsam du// mtho nang drang ba bri bar bya// de la spom na nad 'byung ste// dma' nar ni zad par gyur// yon bos phan tshun snang 'gyur te//
chadan bla ma slob ma dag/ gnyis ka bzhi bar shes par bya// g.yas bskor ma yin brisanani// rdul tshon phur dus botab par 'gyur// sha ni shin tu dkar ba'i mdog/ lhan rimar po 'an dag/
tubya// nub phyogs sar por bya ba ste// byang ni ljang ku nyid du bya// tshog dgan de dag gis// sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan bzhugs pa// rdo rje la sogs dpa' rnal 'byor// 'dab ma'i mkha' 'gro
la sogs pas// khA gdong la sogs dbye bar bya// dbus su sna tshogs pad+mani// ge sar dang ni ldan pa 'ag/ mtshams rnams sun spyod pa go/ dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin sngo// skul sogs
pa'i kha dog dbye// de ltar 'khor la lha mo che// dpa' bo rnamasanamanod par bya// sngar bshad sa yi mtshan nyid la// dbus su mtho bar bri bar bya// shar dang byang du gzhol bani// sngags pa rnams
kyi dngos grub 'gyur// dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dang// rig pa 'a dzin pa'i gnas dag thog// byang du mtho bas 'chi 'gyur ram// nor rnams brlag par 'gyur ba ste/ yang na nad kyis 'debs par/
'gyur// ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas// myur du rages rnams zad par 'gyur// dbus su dam ba'i lo nga bzhin sa// sgrub pa po ni 'joms dang ldan// de nyid bsdus dang bde mchog dang//
u@#// gsang dang rdo rje'ajigs byed du// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di// ma byung 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung// thams cad he ru ka la gnas//
mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bge/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba mchog/ rdo rjesems dpa' de bzhin gshagasaM// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dang la rde rje mkha' 'gro
las/ sa gzung ba dang/ sta gon la gnas pa dang/ thig bri ba'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug nga 'oT/ de nas bcom ldan ' ris lha mos mchod cing phyag byas nas bde
skad ces gsol to// rig bar phye ba bcu bdun pag/ khyod kyis khams kyi bcud lenagasungs// phyi rol rnam pa du zhig dang// nang ni rnam pa du ma dang// dgra dang mdza' bshes dar ma dang/
de bzhin gzhan yang tshad dang dang// skams dang ni rgyan can yul// khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa dag ngomatshar chen po'adi dag la// bdag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// dan snga tshan rnams dang ni// 'brel ba rab tu bshad kyisanyon// sbom po phra mo'agyur ba med// chung ngu la sogs bye brag dag/ rlung dang mkhris nga ngad kan sogs// skyes
ba dang ni bud med kyang// re re zhing yang gsum gsum 'dod// nag po ser skya sngo bas sa dang// rtsa ba dang 'jam dang yan lag mkhrang// 'dzar po can zhes bya ba yin// sdom nyung bong tshod
can dang rang// sngo bsangs mtshungs rdub mgrin pa ring// mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste// 'phrang can thun mong nu mched// mdog nyams sA li'i dri dang ni// chang dang chung min myos pa'i dri/
chang gnyis dang ni chung gsum ste// rked nga yin bya brag yin// sbrang rtsi ltar 'dzag sbrang rtsi'i dra// so sor bya yi gzhan du min// yid la sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// bu mo'i bcud ni drangs
ta blugs/ 'dri niso sor sgrub pa yin// bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang// mang po'i bar du brtag par bya// yon tan gsal bar gyur pa ste// sgrub pa'i dbang po'i yon tan byed// nyi shu'i
bar du gzhon nu yin// de rnams thabras kyis sbyang bar bya// stobs dang than pa gzung ba'i gnas// de dang 'khyud las byung ba ni// sa rnam yongs su sbyong byed yin// bya nga kun gyi mtsham
ldan ni// byed po zabo'i lam chen yin// dngul chu yinishing chen bos// des na chu skyes yon tan lnga/ rang skyon 'dzoms pa yid ches yin// de dag ni thun mong gi cho ga'o/ lto sam bltos
rdzas kyi las// bskyed don nani rgas pa 'joms// lhang tsher dngul chu bcings pa'i mchog/ gsar bsgyur rtsi tshon cho ga yis// rdzu ba thul la sogs gsal bar 'gyur// lhang tsher dang dngul
chu bzhi// rma bya'i mgrin pa'i gzugs dang ni// sbrul gyi gzugs dang sal nga 'gazugs// gzugasaM dang sgra dang dri dang ro// de yi tshad ni kun shes bya// de yang stobs ldan danud bya na//
sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur// dngul chu lhung tshar ba dogani// sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te// mkhris ba dag kyang skyed par byed// dmar pos khrag ni skad par
byed// dkar pos gzer nad spyod 'gyur zhing// srog ni 'dzoms par byed pa yin// ltang sar dag ni ma smin dang// ser skyas bshang gci lam ni 'gag/ zhes 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching//
nyes pa dag na brgyud ldan pas// blo dang ldan nga sa dang da de bza'// bcud len sngon por shes byas nas// 'bad pas de ltar bcud len spyad// nga zhag bam yi gnas dang ni// chu yi shing 2 brten
ba dang// 'bru yi dbus su gzhug pa dang// bya ma'i phung por 'khrul 'khor 'jug/ gso la kha cug 'bras bu dang// khacag me tog 'dab mar nga cas// nyan pa dang ni rus pa sogs/ sgrub po
blo nye ba'i longs spyodon// de nyid rig pas sbyar bar bya// rtog du ma mthong ba yis// bcos ma'am bcos ma ma yin pa'i// yo byad dag nirnyed 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes

yi bya ba dang ni bzhag pa dang gsol ba'i cho ga'o// lci ba dang ni rdanang dang// ba glang ma he'i lhas la sogs// cho ga bzhin du rnam brtags pa// bcud kyis rdzasan gzhag par bya// bcud len sngon ngo
shes nas ni// kha bad de de ltar nga cud len du// bcud brtag pa'i gnas kyi cho gago/ glang chen mgo yi bcud rlugs to// sang ger btso bar byas ba yis// 'bras chen ster ba'i yon tan 'gyur//
sha rig ye rtsa ba dang// gser shog gisan gso bar bya// mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa yin// pags ba dang ni shun pa dang// ma tog 'bras bur ldan pa yis// smon por bcas te btsos pa dag/
mnyesan drin 'i rdul 'thor 'gyur// blo gros 'khrul pa med pa yis// rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya// 'di dgan 'jug pa'i cho ga'o// de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang// phag gi zhag dang tshil dang

khrag/ bcas bas mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'phyang// slar yang 'byung po'i sa dang ni// dzani ta dang ral pa dmar// ben dza ra dad tsam ba dang// so bye ra dgan na bsams te// de dang mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi bu/

mnyes na rtse yi 'og zad 'gyur// denasam de'i rmig da ran// chor pa'i chu dang bcas pa la// zas kyi phyi ma khar phye dang// mig sman phye ma blugs shing btso// tshos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug/ de yis
bcings par 'gyur ba yin// de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis// sbyangs na snyam zhing lce la sogs// de yi stobs ni brad par 'gyur// slar yang mtshanyam khrag dang ni// mnyes pas snum zhing lta bar 'gyur//

ra gnatsuta'i shing dang ni// zangs mdang ni yung ba dang// go ra sAni dkar nag gnyis// drug pos nyes nga tshar gcod 'gyur// denas tsan dra'i shing dngan/ sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang san mo dang// thang sman bshus
zos shing phyi dang// mahAhahamaklu dang// bus kar dang bar tu ki/ sku ba sin du ba ra'i phye// bcas pa mi yi nang du gzhug/ cung zad bzhag ste byung nas su// rdogatun brdung ba ltar bshad bzhin/
klad/ 'od ma'i nang du blugs nasan// de nas 'khrul 'khor nang du gzhug/ bcos nas lhang tsher dngul phye dang// bcas par rtsa yi nang du blugs// lhang tsher dngul chu rnan pa yis// cho ga
yis so sor bcing// de dag zla ba las byung ba// a tra ba ta'i nus pa dang// de bzhin du name tog bzung// bya gri dang na kun tu ru// sar pa dang sen mo dang// nor bu zla 'od n gsar// skyu ru ru khu
ka tam pa// tsam pa karis pa dang// ri shobal ba ut+pal// rang sbyar dang ni bcas pa ru// 'dzag dang dngul chu khA tshos bya// phyuganasbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur// khrag dang smyo byed yung ba blugs
sgyudakar nyes pa kun 'joms byed// mar dang mar nag bskol ba ni// gnyis po yang dang yang du bya// chu shing a pa mag dang// sgyu ha pa la sha yi 'a dab// so pan tsa na'i bcud dang ni// thal sman sde
yi sbyang bar bya// sbyang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas rang sgyur lung ba dag/ rnon po dngul chu'i zasasu sbyin// de nas 'og gi lam nasan// 'khrul 'khor gyis ni bkru sman bya// rgas dang mdzenadasal bar
byed/ non bo thal smon bcas pa yis// bkrus poshing bskus na gzhang bzum 'joms// rtsi dang bcud len rim gyis 'phel// rnon po dang ni nga tsho la// thunamong du na brten nas su// zhanye
blugs nga sa 'dul gyur te// de tshe don 'dang bas// de nas rang skyar nang du// lci bas bcosananyes pa 'byung// nyi ma'i 'od las bsros pas kyang// sgra dkar gyi ni nyes pa bskyed// bcud ni

'tshad shin tu bskol pa yi// 'od kyi snying dang mig 'joms so// de la sbrang rtsi po son ma// thig le dag ni spyin bas sbyang// skyon sbyang tshogasngon du// gsar shog thal sman lan tshwas bsgrubs// ro ni bska
ba dang banus pa'i// lhang tsher dkar bo'i skyo mas blugs// man rig pa dang bcas pas// unar nga du ni mnyes gyur na// nyes pa 'byang gi gzhan du min// gzhan yang chu dang mtshon dang// gar

karana'i phyi ma drug/ drugacha dngul nubya ba yin u0f7c nani tshad ldan nges par 'ching// de tshe go bzlog lam nas su// 'khrul 'khor chog bzhin du blugs// zhi kharje'u ru btsa bar bya// de nas du ru ka
dngani/ ri la tse kramadzad ye// sa bon ba la ta ka dang// ka gi khru'i 'bras bu dang// bar tsi takam tog/ ut+pal ma li ka sa bon// rgyu shug gini rus pa dang// shi risha dang sku sa bon//
sbrang rtsi po son cha dang na// pa na yi shun ba dag/ chog shes pas rdzi ga rdzor// tshos nas legs par blugs par bya// de nas cho ga bzhin rton nas// slar yang de dag btab pa yin//

phyi ma dang ni skyo ma blugs// btso ba dang ni srog dra dang// tshar gcad pa dang mnan pa 'o// btso nga thod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang// 'od ma bya rog chu yi dbyibs// mib dang 'khrog dang 'thor ba dang//

chu yi nang du 'a bros po yin// shin tu tshos pa'i mtshan ma ni// bdar ba dang ni rmongs pa dang// du bar 'thul zhing khrol sgra 'byin// btsar dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang// brdung ba dang ni rnam pa bzhi/
sbrang rtsir btso dad bung bar bgo glang chenabatso dang sang ger btso// rgodam dang ni kan dang// bong bu dang ni rnga mo'i kha// bcing ba dang ni tshar gcad la// 'khrul 'khor
'di dag shanatu bsngags// 'khrul lor gang zhig khache pa// rdza rnga yin dbyibs 'dra dang// 'od ma lta bu la sogs pa// mtshon cha lagri'i shubs 'dra dang// kang ka'i mgrin ma bya rog ma ru//
gzhan yang bcong bar gang bshad pa// sa ni tshar gcad rjes gzung bya// bzhi cha lus pabaskor chen te// phyod lus stobs ldan bskol ba yin// rtse la rten pa'i nyes pa dag/ thun mong min pa de
yis pa byang// sbyang ba dang ni rtog pa dang// rmongs dang de bzhin gsad pa'o// lhang tshar smananu bcing ba ru// dadul gyi phyi ma blugs par bya// dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis ma// 'bras bu chen po
bas ba gsum// lhang tsher dang ni dngul chu bgi/ bdud rtsi yin snying po lnga// dus drug de bzhin drug cu so// bdun po yal ga'i dab sogs bcas// tsha dang kha ba skam skyes mchog/ mngar dang sgyur
brlan can bzang// lan tshu bas ba gnyis ka'ang rung// nam pa b.ru ra dang na// a ru ra yi 'bras bu rnams // mar nagabaskolan bya ba byed// skya rung khus mkhrisasel te// bud mde'i
mar bskol ban// 'tsho zhinganadamadabal bar byed// tsam ba la dad bkug/ nA ga gsar ku muta// ut+pal shi phaling kadang// sbrang rtsi 'dzago dang pra yang khu// kusum pa dang spyi dang/
ka@#/le'u nu ka dad da chu gcig ste// me togagan sna ru brjod// brel bo sonan// ka pa ta dang la ku tsha// sku ba dang ni bar ta ke/ a ru ra dang ba ru ra// bal ta ka su ru ra// la dzidar du/
naka/ araNA dang ma'i tso// pi pi ling dang bcu drug so// 'di dag 'bras bu'i sde tshan yin/ bca' ba dag ni shu dag dang// yung ba dnganaru rta dang// bca' sga dong na sgog skya dad//rlan can
gyi nad pa dang// nag ka ba la dkar bo dang// de pozhin rgan po gzhon nur byed// b.leka sdugamtshan mo'i shing// bcu gnyis rtsa ba yin/// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o// klung
chenaska dang ra mdzes dang// 'dzag dang byis pa stug po dung// ran pa dmar po daru grwa// asha ka na bdun bani// sdong bo yalag rtsa bar bcas// ka tag pa dang gsor shing ste// dbazhin
duTishi ri// kun dza dang nga'i khru dang// nam pa dang ne pa las// de bzhin ka rum dzar// 'di brgyud shun pa'i sde zhes brjod// tsanadanaganyis dang a karani// nug bo dang gsum rdzongapo
bzung// bu ram phye ma ka ra dang// sbrang rtsi i kru dus ka ra// sha kha ra dang rnam pa drug/ bcud kyi sgo zhes bya ba lan// khu byug dang ni bya rog dang// rma bya dadan ti bya rnams // 'di dgagan
sha bzung ste// nyams dang stobs ni 'bal bar byed// zas kyigatsug bud gor gong dang// phug ron dang nanatso rnams // 'di dgagan khu ba bzung// sems can kun l stobs par ster//
radangar bong sha ba dang// sa la gi dang phag dang ni// khyad par du ni byi ba rnams // nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// khyad par du rirlung la bsngags// rebunu ka dang
ba'akhrib// a ma'i la kha'i ma tog dang// ma dzar dang lha hun dgra// suras dang ral ba can// ba b.ranag pus pa dang// ar dza ka yi 'dab ma dang// ka tshu dang ni shan// sgron shing
rig ba 'dzin ba dang// yalagarnam bsnar bshad ba// 'di dgamadza' bo'i sde zhes bya// b.rapa ra dang gun dang// dza la dang ni gya gyu dang// mu pe ta shun pa dang// rnag gi dra dang rkun po

dang// khu rta lahashuka ti// chur skyas shing dang brag zhun dang// sbrang rtsi ma tog 'bring ga ra// ha ta she pa la dang ni// de bzhin du ni ba ya sa// bar ma yin snatshan yin/ 'dird dang nib la dang/

na dang na dur ki tadza// thang shing dang ni sra rtsi dang// po soganA yi khu ba dang/ sngags pa 'gas pa la bal pa dang bcas pa la// shu dag dar ni gan ng+hadang// tuhinadang ra las skyes// khri ga dnganang gu dzra/ sgog skya
dngan ma si dang// shing kun dang ni yung ba rnams // dgra bo sgo zhes bya bar bshad// dgra bo yin rdzas la khyab// gu gul dang ni bri kha dang// ke tad de bzhin bo ma so/ bor dadani rang sgyur dang
ga bur dang ni sa la ke/ dgu bo de dag sla ba'i rdzas// tshur ral pa dmar po dang// dza ladang gya gyu dang// stag po nad dang kuphyir// rig dang ni khru dang/ shi ra bca' bshu dag rnams //
bcu gnyis rtsa ba la skyes yin// pu ba dang ni ka so dang// gla ba dang nasanamo ste// gnad kur zhes bya ba// lnga bo srog chags las byung ba'i// bu sgrub pos shes bar bya// shishadang gsar
shing dang// ler dang zhin ka pa// na ga ka dad pa tshu shug/ sgyur tsachen bo zhes bya ba// bdun po 'di dag shun pa'i ste// tsan dan gsum dang a kaMr gnag/ smon shing dang ni shing shal// drug
bo 'di dag sdod bu yi// sde zhes bya bar kun tu bshad// sbyatshakun dadamanyam sbyor bgyi/ rdo rjemakha' 'grazhes grugs pa// rdo rjesams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po dbal rdordzomakha' 'gro las/ bcud kyis lenagyi rjes kyi dbang du byas pa'i cho ga'i grwa par bya ba sa bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//de nas bcom
ldan 'dasalartswachosamachod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/ sbyin sreg khyod kyis sngar gsungasan// thab khung rnams kyi tshad dung na// 'dug
stas mgashingasogasam tshag/ bcom ldan ' sa kyis bka' stsal pa// skyam kun gyis rnam rol gi/ nyonacig lcamoskya mtshe// dang po sa ga'u bzung nasasu// phyinas do khung brtsam
bar bya// zhi bas gzhi dkar po'achar// khru gang tshad la shin tu zlum// khu khyadab+bir bgo bar bya/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yosi// sor brgyad pa yi rdadzin// pad+ma'i stong du bri bsamtshan
khung nas sor bzhu bor nas ni// sor bzhi'i dbangs dang zheng ldan pa'i// kha khyer gyis ni bskor bar bya// mtshams su rnadza'i dbyibs lta bu // rtsa gsum rdo rjes bskor
bar bya// sa dkar dang ni brtsi yis// ho khud kun tu phyug bar gyu/ brtul zhugs can gyis gnyis kar yang// drinadaka' bos byags nas su// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis// ma dog
dkar pos gtor bar du// dkyil 'khor khang ba la sogs ba'i// shar gyi phyogs su las de brtsam// rgyas pas gzhisor po la// rin po che yi dbyibs 'dra'i thub// yang na gru bzhi ba yang
rung// khru do zabs su khru gang bko// denang sor brgyud bor nas su// kha khyer sor brgyud tshad du bya// so brgyud dpangs dang ldan pa la// rin chen 'phrang bas bskor bar du// ho khung nang du
'khor na// rtsibs brgyudasar po bris pa la// 'og tu chu drug sor drug pa// rdo rjerin chenabri bar bya// sasar dngani drisar gyis// ho khud kun tu byags nas su// ma rtog ser po la sogs
[= ]pagi/ mchod pa dag ni ji bzhin bya// 'din rtag tu grong khyer sogs// byang gi phyogasarur bya ba yin// dbang las gzhi dmar pol// pad+ma yasan mtshon pa yi// thab khung skyo gnas dbyibs
su bya// yang na bla phyed dpyangs lta bu // khung bu dang ni kha khyen sogs// so bzhi yi nitshad du bya// sa dmar dri dmar sogs byugs te// ma tog dmar po la sogs gtor// 'di na grong

[z/]khyer la sogs pa'i/ nub kyi phyogs char rtagatu bya// mngon spyod phalas nags dang ni// mtsho'i khyim du nub pa dang// gas pa'i sa la bri bar bya// khru gsum sor mo nyi shu tshad// sor bcu gyur du
bgro bar bya// rtse gsum khro bo'i rdo rjen// char sprin gyin 'od dang mtshungs// sor brgyad pa yitshad tsam du// de yi dbus su mtshan par bya// khung bu sor gsum bor b.ran// kha khyer sor gsum
bskor bar bya// sa nag dur khrod thal ba sogs// jisnyad pa yis byugs byas te// dkyil 'khor khang sogasalho phyogasabya// lhag ma yan dbus sumtshan// bar las rnams kyang// las
bzhi'i khung bur 'dus yod kyi// slar yang de rnams khyad par gyi khung bu'adeban bshad kyis nyon// dgug pa'i do khung rdo rje'i// rtsa gcig lta bu'i dbyibs su bya// rdo rje lcags kyus bskor
bag/ lhag ma dragan dbang dang gangs// bcuder lan gru bzhi// rmongs largyas pa lta bu yin// dbang ldan ni phyogs charu// sa ni dkar dang ser por bya// bsad la mngon spyod lta bu
sta// khyad bar du ni rlung mtshams su// rnga so'i lci bas byugs te bya// mdza' bo dag ni nyams nas su// phan tshun sded bor bya dul// de yang mngon par spyod pa yi// cho ga ji bzhin blta bar bya//
las rnams thams tsad bsdus pa yi// chog de nas khaMshad bya ste// las kun de nyid rig pa yis// bsam pa la sogs bye bragadabye// las kyi rjes mthun sagazhi la// las kyi rjes mthun
thab khung bya// sngags ba'i yid n garadaga' bgi/ sa phyogs sun sgyur yang rung// khru gang ba yi tshad du ni// pad+ma ut+pal dbyibs 'dra ba// khakhyer pad+ma lta bu s/ khung
dang khakhyer cung zad gdung ]/nad du bor sogs zhi ba 'dra// phyogs bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bya// rgyunasor brgyad tshad tsam la// dang ngas nasor gcig tshud tsam pa'i/ 'khor la rin chen
pad+ma dang// ral gri mtshon nas bskor ba yi// dbus su rdo rje'i mtshan mkhya// sa su rdo rje'i rab las// ho khung kun nas zlum po la// ga ni'akhor bar bri bar bya// haM khung ga ni cho ga'o
yagashang pa la shadang ni// u dum ba ra a ma dang// rgya bod+hi dang ra' sha// ka tam pa sogs 'o ma can// rtse mo'i cha los byas pa ste// sorani bcu gnyis tshad du bya// rlon shing 'dab mar

bcas pa ste// rang dang rtse ma nyams pa drang// shun pa med cing gas pa dang// rgyud dang shin tu ring ba dang// phra dang grom dang 'a khyog pa dang// gas dang chag dang 'bus zos dang// rtsa mocha ni
gnyis yod cing// srog chags ldan shing bsams pa dag/ dge ba'i las rnams thamasacad g/ sngangs te sdig pa'i las 'gas// nas dang la dwang 'gazhe// sA li'i 'bras chan sri
yang ku// ku sngon po tsu ta'i 'dab// me tog tsan dan dkar bo dang// sbrang rtsi mar dang yos bag dang// dur ba zhag khu ba rnams // rnal 'byor pa yis zhi ba la// ji ltar rnyed pa bsug par
bya rnamachod sbyin gyi nishing rnams la// bud shing thab las dma' ba du// nags kyi skam dag kyang rung// srogachags ldan baspang bar bya// zhu ba'i yum shing dang/ bud shing dang da
'ju la sogs pa bsreg rdzas kyi cho ga'o yam shing zhi ba'i lta bu ste// dbus kyiman mdzes pa 'gas// srid du bcag khru gang du bya// dri sar nu mas gtor nasane// zho dang 'o ma mngal
sdug/ mngar gsum 'a nirtags par bya// de nas bsamchog zhe zan dang// mar dang tel ni nag pa dang// shadang dus ba tshar dang bcas// sbrang rtsi dang nasA la'e 'bras/ 'bru rnams gzhan
dang pad+ma dang// nA ga ge sar bababa'i 'bras// de bzhin dur bar bcas pa dag/ rgyus ba'i las la bsreg par bya// bud shing sngar bzhin khyad par du// 'dras bu dang ni bcas pas//
tsam pa dngan anga'o// 9 nanAganAg sar// shin tu dmar shing sgyur ba dang// ma tog dang na 'bras bur bcas// yal ga ya nin las byas// sor lnga pa yi tshad du ni// drab ng gi las kyi
yam shing bya// budangashing yang ni skyur ba dang/ ma tog bcas pa'i shing la bya// ma tog dri ngan rnams dang ni// de bzhin 'thu nanag po dang// thubam dag nigator bar bya// de bzhin che rus phra ma
dang// dug la sogs pa dbul bar bya// tsha zhing kha dang tshad mar bcas// dur khrod du ni skyes pa'i shing// rtsa ba'i cha las byas pa ste// sor mo bcu gnyis yagashing tshad// rtse mo rno la rtsub
paste// rtse gzhes dug la sogs pa sbag/ bug pa'i sgrol sogs ba'ang rung// drag po'i las kyi bud shing bya// de nas mchod yon snod bshams pa// gser dang dngul
las byas ba 'am// dung dang nya phyis dwag kyang rung// zangs dang 'khar ba'i rdzas rnams dang// sa dang shing lo dgakyang rung// ji ltar 'byor ngar bsham par bya// ma te 'o mar bcas pa yi//
argab snod ni mdunadu bzhag/ drizhim bdug bas bdugasanas su// rang gi sngags kyis lan bdun bzla// g.yon du chu snod gzhagabya ste// zhi ba las kyi mchod yon yin// zhi dang til
du bcas pa dang// drisor la sogs ldan pa'i chu// rang gasngags kyisamangon bzlas pa// rgyus pa ya ni arga yin// dbang la zangs kyi snod sogs par/ dri dmar la sogs bcas pa'i chu/
ma tog dmar pos 'bar ba sta// yongasasu bkang bas chags par bya// tshun gnag cing dri zhim// khrag rung ldan pas bya ba 'am// rang sgyur dang ni bgrang gan/ yang na me yi gtsa ba 'am
yang n bong bu'i gcin yang rung// phaT dang sbal ba'i sngags bzlas pa// g.yas kyi phyogs su bshags ni// drag po'i las la sbyar b.ratsa// arga' cho ga'o// nan sogs ni phyir ni bani//
snying rjer ldan pas dgongasamo bya// dpa' bo shar du bltas nas su// me tog 'phreng sogs rgyan dang ni// bgo ba dag ni dkar por bya// 'jam pa'i stan la gnas nasan// pad+ma'i skyil krung bcas nas
dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad bsgoms te// brtse dang ldan pas mi sna bar// sbyang bya yi ge a byung ba'i// chu yi dkyil 'khor dkar po la// seng ge pad+ma zla ba yi// stanal gnas pa dmigs
nasasu// 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// sAhA'i mtha'i can sngags bzlas la// rtag tu zha ba'i las rnams bya// dngul dang rid sogasargyas pa'i sa
dga' dang ldan pas sna dri bya// gos ser la sogs brgyan nas// byang phyogs su kha bltas te// bzang po yin 'dug stangs sam// yang na rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas// 'bras chan
dkar bo zhe dang/bcas bza' de nyid dag pa yis// bza' dang btung bas tshim nas su// rin chen 'byung bar bsgoms nas ni// yi ge las byung ba yi// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor la//
glang chen stod du gnas pa yi// bsgrub par bya pa dmigs nas su// sngags kyi mthar ni o brjod cing// rgyas par bya ba'i cho ga sbyar// dbang gi don du 'degasungs te// mtshan mo chags pa'i
sems kyis// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// dmar po'i rgyan gyis klubs nas// sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas su// rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bsgom// yaM las byung ba'i rlung
dkyil la// btsun mo'i bod 'jam ldan pa// bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas su// sngags kyi mthar ni hebazlas te// 'od zer dmar pos bskul nas su// zur mig blta bos sbyin sreg
bud med rnams na rmongs par 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang// dam tshig 'das shing khri bal// sdang pa'i sems kyis lhar bltas te// mtshan phud dam na
za nyin khyod la// gos sogs sngon pos brgyan nas su// mkhrang zhing nu ba pa'i stan la ni// khre de'i spyi la sa gnas nas su// rdo rje khro bor bsgom par bya// raM sa nye ma'i dkyil 'khor la// bsgrub
par bya ba dmigs nas su// hU~Mdang pa Ta ces bya ba'i// 'brug gi sgra ltar grags pa ste// glog ma dbus mtha' sbyar bar bya// bsgrub bya'i las kyi cho ga 'o// de nas sgrub po dpal ldan pas// rgyano
rnams rtsa gyis brgyan nas su// gsang ba gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gnas// sbyin srog las ni brtsam da ra bya// chu yi snod ni g.yon du gzhag/ g.yas su bsreg rdzas gegag par bya// las kun byed
pas bzlas pa yis// rdzas rnams kun la bsang gtor to// de nas bkra shis bcas pa yis// g.yas nas bskor bas ku sha dgram// rtse mo' ra las byas pa ni// drin med cing ma kums
pa// 'dang mar bcas shing kha dog sngo// shin tu ring min thung ba yin// mdud nga ra byas pa g.yas bskor dgram// de nas las kyi rjes mthun par// thab khung phyogs kyi bye brag gis// gzhan
yad shar phyogs bstan te bgram// de yis sgo na bkram nas su// de nas thab nang du'i// sgrub pa po yis kun sbyin// ku sha'i las ni rdzogs nas su// ma spelas ni brtsam par bya// gtsug
mang las gyur me 'am ni// yang las kyi bye brag gis// skye gnyis la sogs ma yang rung// rlung yab kyis ni sngar nas su// 'o mar ldan pa'i bud shing sogs// ma gsal bar sprul bar bya//
mni 'bar bar shes nas// de nas ma lha dgug bar bya// mo yig phyogs nas spyan drang ba// drongaslong gin kher gyis bskor// yi ge raM las yang dag byung// o las byung ba'i pad+ma ni// mdzes
pa lug gi stong gnas pa//bsam gtan la bzhugs yang dag bsam// mdog dang na bza' rgyan la sogs// las kyi rjes su mthun par du// ma yi khams kyi rang bzhin te// 'bar ba'i 'phreng
ba rgya chen bcag// zhal gcig dang ni phyag khazhi ldan// rdo rje rtse gsum dbyig pa dang// bgrang 'phrang ral ba spyi blugs// g.yas dang g.yon du rim bzhin bsam// rdo rje me na byon pa dang//
thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de nas arga sogs byin te// cho ga bzhin du mchod ba bya// las kun spyod pa'i tshu yis ni// gsang gtor byas nas zhal bsil sbyin// dngos grub blang ba'i
bsam pa yis// de yis kharan dwagang blugs dbul// dge ba las la gru mo na// pus mo'i bar du bcug ste bsreg/ drag po' sa la 'a ga pa g.yon// phyi ru phyung ste bsreg par bya// oM badzra

a na la ma b+hab+hu ta dzA la ya sarbab+hasmi ku rus cha dut+tAn bahUM hUM phaT/ ma yig sngags nad nyid la// las dang rjes su mthun bar spel// oM sarba sam de swA hA/ no zin gyi'o// oM ag+ha ye swA hA/
mar gyi'o// oM a pra ti hata badzra ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni ku shagi'o// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzuya sAhA/ zhes bya pa til gyis sdeg ba bsreg par bya ba'ig/ oM badzra A yu
ba sANA/ zhes bya ban d+hur ba'i sta tshe spel bar byaba'agro oM badzra put+taya g+hAnA/ zhes bya ba'i gras kyi sto/ khyim rgyas par byaba'i'i// 'bru la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang 'dir mar gyis bsgos
te bsrog par bya'o/ do 'og bsang gtor zhal bsel sogs// ma ni tshim pus 'bar nga gi/ rnam par yongs su thim par 'gyur// donas ma dadus bdag gi lha// rgyan dang na bza' kha
dog sogs// las kyirjes su mthun par ni// bsam zhing ma yi mtshan ma brtag/ gsar la sogs pa'i kha dog gis// me yi mdoganI shes par bya// zhi la kha dog dkar po ngas// rgyas
pa 'ani gser lta bu // dang nga la bya ru bag pa'i mdog/ mngon stod la ni nag po dang// sngon sogs mtshan mar shes bar bya// dbyibs ni dpal gyi be'u dang ni// rdo rje 'khor lo la sogs pa//
rang gamtshanams brgyan pas shes// mne shin tu dri zhim na/ dge pa las kyi dngos grub ster// me ro'i dri dang nya yi dri// du ba che shing sbra dang ldan// ma stagags ni sngags pa srog/
ma yi mtshan ma ngan pa de// mi dge ba yi mtshanamagi/ me rig pa yi las shes// de nyid zhisi ra las rnams la// gnas pa'i mtshanam ma yin no// de nas bgogasani bskyed nas su//
denas slar yang sbyin grog po rnam// de nas rang gi sngags kyisani me la bsang gtor byas nas su// dgang gzar cho ga bzhin bkang la// dgang blugs na gsum sbyin par bya// o ag na
ma a chu kas+yapa' ru swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so// lha rnams tshim bar bya ba'i phyir/yi ge gsum gyi sngags mngon du bzlas pa dang rang gi sngags stsal te ram pa bzhin du bsreg par
bya// de la bsreg pa'i go rimin 'di yin te/ dang por ni yagashing ngo// de'i 'og tu ni gar// de nas gro dang til la sogs pa'o// de nas bza' la sogs pa'o// de nas zanano// de nas
zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ 'bras bu la sogs pa dang/ bldag pa dang/ btung ba la sogs ba'i tshogs bsregs la/ de nas rnal 'byor ngas me tog dang/ so rtsa la sogs ba dbu'al 'de// de
bzhin du rang gi lha'ang mchod nas 'dod pa'i dan gyi dngos grub gsol bar bya'o// de nas mgon po gshegs su gsol nas/ slar yang slob mas lha mchod de gshegs su gsol na rnal 'byor
pa la 'dopa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro// sbyin srog gi chogago/ gas ram dngul lam thangs ma 'am// mchod sbyin gyinishing yang rung// dgar gzar skya dang dbyig pa sogs// tshad dang
dbyingasal sogs pa bshad// stod dusarab zhidang ldan ba'i// spyan gru bzhir bya ba sta// thabs su sor gnyis bsko bar bya// dkyil du ye shes rdo rjes brgyan u0f38de yi steng du mchu sor bzhi//
pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu r bya// de dbus bcud ni' dzag pa ya// bu gamagri'u chung tshad du bya// de nas 'og tu dbyug pa ste// rdo tshu rin chenasor drug brgyan// dgang gzur chos
nastsor ba'i na// blugs gzar ro ldan khrabs yin te// sams can kun la phan byed pa// rgya du sor gnyis zubs sor gtsag/ khra ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra// dbus su rdo rjes mdzes pa
sta// lhag ma sngon bzhin mtshon bar bya// sor mo lnga dang ldan pa yis// gang ba'i sbyin sreg bya bar brjod// sor mo gsum dad ldan pa yi// sbyin sregacigangashes bya bar nga rjod// zhi ba byang chub
mchog gis gzung// nor bu'i khu tshur rgyus pa la// dbang dang dgug pa dag la no// de bzhin pad+ma'i khu tshur gzung// drag po'i las la 'bad pa yis// de bzhin khro bo'i khu tshur bya// dgang
gzar blugs gzar gyi cho ga'o// dgang blugs zhes bya ba ni grang ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa'o/ de yi cho ga gzhan bshad bya// zhing dang ni rgyus dang dbang// dge ba yini las rnamasa'//
chu gdongani'idzum dang bcas par bya// drag po las la khyo gdeng shes// yan shing la sogs bsreg bar bya// de nyid bsdus dang bde mchog dang// bsang dang rdo rje 'jigs byed bcas// ti ka
sogs ma bshadang// sbyin sregamador bsdus pa go/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// de rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ 'jorjesams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
ka gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ las thums cad kyi gsang chen smin srag gi cho ga'i rim par phye bas bzhi bdu rtsa brgyad dang/
yang lha mos gor byas te// tshig 'di dag na gsal bar gyur// chung du la sogs ji lta bu // de rnams bye brag ji ltar lags// khams kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs la// rdzas kyi mtshan nyid gang bshad
ba// de dag bdag nagyi tshom skyes// thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'dras kyis bka' stsal pa// ngan chung ngu la sogs kyi// bye brag la sogs bshad par bya// yon tan ldan pa'i
rdzas mtshan nyid// bshad kyis shes rab lha mo nyon// chud du la sogs pa gang dag ga yin pa de dag ni chung du la sogs pa sta/ sogs nga 'i sgras bar ma da da chen po rang chen po'i chen po dag la
bya ste// gnas skabs kyi dbye ba rnam ba bzhir dbye bar bya'o// rlung dang/ mkhris ba dang/ bad kan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbye bag bud med dang skyes ra dag bye brag tu shes par bya ste//

rdzas rnams sbyar bar bya'o/ de'ang rlud can lan snyam pa'i rdzas sbyin par bya la/ mkhris dang kun la ni bsi la pa'i rdzas byin na ngan te/ bad kan can la ni kha ba dang/ bas ba'i rdzas sbyin no// yang
rtsub pa dang/ bsil ba dang/ snum pa rnams rlud dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan canaso sor bsngags so// smyos pa dang ni bud med kyang// re re zhing yang gsum gsum 'dod// ces dra
khan khams kyi rang bzhin gyi nges ba gsum du 'dod ba// kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa ste/ ma ning la ni bcud kyis len me sbyar ba'i phyir ro// nag ponAkha dog nag po sto 'dzag pa la
sngags so// ser skya yang kha dog sta ba pho ba la'o// sngo bsangs nanag po dang ser po gnyis 'dus ba sta/ 'dzag pa dang 'pho ba gnyis ka la'o// dang zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin du sbyar ba'i don/
to// nub ces bya bani ba lang gi lce ltar rtsub ba'o// 'jam pa ni pad+ma can zhes bya ba/mkhrang pa na khu ba sra ba ste/ gang gi khu ba 'thas par gyur pa'i// 'dzar pa can na dung can ma ste/ pad+ma
khasha 'dzi yod pa// bud med 'di dag ni bzhud bcing ba la dbang bar gyur pa la yin no// sbom zhes bya ban gdong dang/ kha dang/ nu ma 'a phal kha che zhing sbom pa'o// thung las bya bani bong
thung ba dang skya thung zhing mang gi dri dang ldan la 'a dod bsamyos pa lta/ de dag ni bong tshod ran zhes bya bar bshad do// ring ban gdong dang/ lag pa rung/ rkang pa 'i dkyus rang ba'ago/ gzhan

rgyu mang nya'i dri dang ldan pa'i khu ring du 'dzag pa sdu/ dung can ma'o// sngo bsangs mtshungs zhes bya ba nidabyangs ma snyan zhing yan lag dang sgra thung ba'o// man lag rtsub ces bya ngani dri mazhagazhid dgras

dul ba rgyu/ ri mo can mgo/ mgrin pa ring ba ni gang gi mgrin nga mtho ba de mgrin pa ring ba ste 3 pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i 'od yod cing yid du 'ong la dus rtag tu rdul gyi dri zhim pa dang/ ri dgas kyi
mig 'dra la dgas ltar ltazhing mgrin pa dang lte ba degs 'dra la rked pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po lta bu snya pad+macan du shes par bya'o// mig na zangs ltar dmar ba zhes bya ban mig dang/ rkang pa
dang/ lag pa shin tu dmar zhing ma leka'i dradang ldan pa dang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i rigasa' dga' zhing de bzhin du bde ba'i dngos grub ster ba'o// pin kun tu zhes bya ban pa na ni 'o ma
'dzin ba sta/ de mkhrang zhing sga leb dang/ bzhin kun nas zlum pa dang/ lteba'i dbus na ri mo gsum yod pa de ni 'o phrang ba can du shes par bya pa'o// thun mong ni gang ga rgyu sbyin par byed
pago/ num med ces bya ba ni dang tshul ngan pa dang skyes pa ltarinu ma spangs pahU~M/ yan lag ma tshang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// mdog nyams pa zhes bya ba nimadangs rtsub pa'o// sa la dri
zhes bya ba nasA la ltar yid du bod ba'i dri yod pa// chang ni stobs ste/ dam tshig dang sbyor pa phun sum tshugs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o/ nang man bre zhes bya ba'i khyad par du
re dra'i rdzig su 'gro ba'o// myos bani shin tu khyad par gyur ba'o/ dganyis pa ni ma gnyis te gnyis gnyis bsdus pa 'o// cha gsum nan gnyes ri de gsum du bsgyur ba ste/ spu lang
pa dang/ sha che ba dang/ rus sbal gyi rgyab ltar mtho ba dang/ glang po che'i za ba ltar ma khrang ba dang/ skyes gnas yongs nga dang/ khrag dang khu ba rtag tu 'dzag pa sto u0f7cdrug po de dag
ku@#// skal bzang ma// su b+ha ga yan la de dag ni sgrub pa po la mchog ster ba yin no// de dag ni rkad pa'i bu brag go/ de nyid kyis sngang rtse ltar 'khrig sbrang rtsi'i dris/
sgyur rtsi'i rang bzhin no// so so na dam tshig gi don dang gzhan la so so tha dad par sbyar gyi/ gnan du sta sams can gyi don du ra sa yan la sogs pa las gzhan du ma nas lang ma yin te/
gzhan du na tshoge tsam yang sgyur bar mi bya'o// 'di na so so sgrub bsto/ yid 'a soms pa khel khrul 'khor gyis zhes bya ba ) yid las byung ba ni yid la gnas pa ste/ 'khrul 'khor
ni shing dang nga gas pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'khrul 'khor ro// sgra'i ba ni des bsgrub nga ra bya'o// bu mo gtsug ni dang bo ste/ byang chub dang thar pa'i don du'o/ 'ganyis ni dmatshig gangar lo//
mang po ni nor gyi don du brtag par bya zhes bya ba'i khyad nga ra du rdza saM bco nga rgyad kyi ste/ gsa' bar gyur pa ni gcig nyid mtha' las nga 'i yon tan ster ba'i phyir re// su 'ganyen/ sgrub pa
la dbang bo la sta/ yon tan byed pan de nyid kyis bu'i gdeng pa'i rtsi'i bdud rtsi yon tan du yang dang yang du goms bar bya bas so// byis nga zhes bya ba na shadam bye ba sku/ bu mo go na ru
ma'o// nyi shu zhes bya ba lishu'i bar du'o// de rnams thabs kyis sbyang bar bya zhes bya bani de rnams nyid sa bon gdab pa'i zhing du gyur bas sbyang bar bya ba yin la/ de rnams red grabs
te mngon par 'dod ba'i don nye bar gtod cing sta la 'dras bu mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// phra ma na yid du 'ong ba ste// nam mkha' lta bu'i spyod yu'u 'a/ stobs ldan gzung
ba yinaganus zhes bya ba la/ stobs ldan nanus pa yod pago/ gzung ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o// gnas ni dbyibs te thur du 'bebs pa dang ) gyen du 'phen pa' da la dang/ kur pa la//
sogs bgo/ rdzasan yongs su sbyong zhes bya go la rdzas ni srid pa rgyu mtshe'i// de las gru ltar sbyong zhing phan 'dogs bar byad pa sa na yongs su stong ba'i/ kun khyab ces bya bar srog
chags na bu le ltar kun tu 'khyud pa dang/ phug ron ltar 'o byed cing sos na maru bzung ste 'jib pa dang/ sgra nas gzung ba dang/ san re 'debs pa dang/ khu tshur bsnun pa dang/ gos
'deng sa'ang 'dral ba dang/ mchan khung dang/ nu ma dang/ rked pa dang/ brla gnyis dang/ mgrin pa dang/ rgyang tu sen mos 'da' zhing med ces bya ba'i sgra dang bas ngar sngag
bas sngon du bya zhing/ gzhan yang nam ma'o ba la sogs pas de'i sems rnam pa ra 'dul ba'i bya ba de dag so sor byed pa 'dems kyang da sngar re// san ma 'debs pa de'ang
'jam zhing gzhon nu lani 'a'i tshad tsam du gdab pa dang dral bar byas te/ rkad pa dang/ rgyab dang/ b+ha ga'i stang dang kyang bkra sa la sogs pa rnams su ba bras kyi gzeg
ma'i tshad tsam gyir ma pa rigs par chags pa lhod pa rnams 'apa gdab bo// de'ang san mo 'ba' zhig ni ma yin gyi/ 'o bya ba tA sogs ba rnams kyis tshim par bya'o//
gang zhig chags pa sra ba rnams la ni sor mo de ngo gsum sbrul gyi mgo ltar byas la/ mo mtshanag du gal bcug nas srid ces bya ba'i sngags 'byung gi bar du dud par byas nga sa/ rgan mo
la sogs pa rim bar bya ba ni dordzasar ma zhes bya'o// gang zhig gzhon shing mnyen pa rnams la ni rang gi mtshana' dang 'od dang ldan pa'i byang chub saMms 'a bab pa'i rtsar lce bcugs bsgral

nga tsam gyis dga' bar bya ste/ rdo rje 'u 'a grur ra zhes bya'o// de ltar sgrub pa pos yang dang yang du bsgyu'adang sa snying 'dar ba dang/ dang/ lta bas na kalase la kye rdul phra mo'i chu 'dzag 27/
ngo tsha ba la sogs pa dang bral to/ ba spu langs nas shin tu chags das ltazhing 'khyud pa'i bus ra ra gyur cing [< ]sa dran pa dang de nas skya2 pa rdo rje dang nga du ma/ ma pa rasbyar gras
de la dang/ ku ra pa na dang/ pu tsa dang/ ud kyi nga dang/ su dra sa ra dang/ gra ma na grwa ra dang drang khen dang/ su ru bta zhes bya ba la sogasab ji sAd bsan bcos thams cad las byung ba'i
ka ra na bstan nga ra ba// de dag kun kyang rdo tsho sems ngang gi phyag rgyar brjod de// de dag gis rang 'des ga rab tu smra ba bcas la de dang gar gi las byang ba'i rdzas ni yongasaM susbyong
zhi byed yin zhes bya ba nyid zab mo zhes bya ste/ de'ang ji srid du yul rnams kyi ra sa yan la/ skyes bus dman par spyod cing dga' ba pa mer khyer ga las lag pa ! rgyu bu dman par spyod nga na/
mi' bo zhes bya// bya ba kun gyis lam gyisani zhes pa ni byang chub kyi lam ste zab mo zhes bya ba phyi dang nang gi mig la sogs pa'i dadad pa dang/ gzugs la sogs dang yul thams ca dgacige
tubasdus shing rang rang gi tshul dang la darang gi cha la gnas pa nyibaledas spyod pa thams cad bsdus te nyan sa bstar ba yin gyis/ gzhan du sa sogs ni gnam gang che ra longs spyodang ra

mi 'gyur ro// nye bar longs spyod dang de 'ad khrid nga ra byed pa sa na ldam mo// dngul chu yi ni shing chen po zhes bya ba na ji ltar dang ga bsam gyi shing 'dod pa'i don rdzatsan nu ma ster ltar byang chub kyi
sams 'dis kyang 'bras bu thams cad spyod yul du byed pa'i phyir ro// des na nusus yon tan ldan// rang skyon 'dzoms nga 'i yid ches yin// zhes bya ba la gang gis don ston nga gsa' ba
byed pas na yid ches te/ de kho na nyid la lta bar byed pa'o// de'ang 'dir phyagargya'i yi shes kyi dang nga bskur bas dbugs phyung ba yin la/ phyag rgya'i ye shes kyang rnam pa gnyis te/ dngos grub
sna tshogs dang/ bde ba 'jug pas rig pa dang rig par bya ba gzung ngo// de ltar na dbang po kun las rgyas pa'i yid ches pa des dpa' dang naso dang/ nad mad da gi bde ba phun sum tshogs
par 'gyur te/ dpal dang/ na so dang/ chags pa dang ldan pa'i zla ba la sogs pa'anye bar spyad pas dbang phyug dang/ nad med pa dang/ stobs 'phul ba dang/

sems can gyi don du yunaring du 'a tshozhing bde ba dam pa de nyid kyis de kho na nyid la lta zhing yid chos pas phyin cig ma lag ngo'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dugro/ rang ge zhes bya ba
ni rang gi khub ste/ des zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ dgug pa 'a sogs pa kun tu 'gyur te/ de nyidan tsazhis bya ba ra sa ya na'i gtso bor bshad do/ lta skyes ma brnyengs
rdzas kyi las zhes bya bul/ ma brnyes pa ni ma rgas ba sta 'khu la sogs ba dang bral zhing mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o/ lo rgyas namangal nas dang po byung ba shi ba'ago las ni de'i
bya ba ste mi snang ba la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur ba dang/ rtsi la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad sbyar ba'o// skyod byed don ni rgas pa 'joms zhes bya ba la/
bdag nyid kyi mkhru gang gis skyod byed kyi don rgas pa 'dzems pa nyid/ skyid byed na 'byin pa pog/ rdzas der spyod byed kyi don 'dogs pa 'dzoms pa// rgas pa 'joms pa la sogs
pa'ang dbang pos o tsa ka'i nada rnams la zla ba brgyad du ma dalanaganas pa'i byas ba'i ros brtsom pa la sogs pa yin no// lhang tsher dngul chu bcing ba'i mchog ces bya ba la/ mchog
xxx
tshogs yin la/ de dang bral ba la 'grub pa'o// dadul nuban zhes bya ba ni bar da dang/ nye ba'i bcud dang/ bcud can dang// rtse'i dbang po rnams so// lhang tshor ba'i zhes bya ba ni
dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ sngon bo dang/ dmar po'i bya brag gis so// der zhing ang rnam pa bzhi sta/ rma bya'i mgrin pa dang/ sbrul dang/ sbal pa dang/ sprinagyi bye brag
gis so// de la rma bya'i mgrin pa namagrin pa'i spu ltar sngon dgur du bdug pa'o// sngon bo ni bcud chenA pa ste lhag par gzud par bya'o// sgrol gyi gzugasan bye brag tu 'phel bas sngal
gyi dbyings ltar gyur pa'o// sbal pa'i gzugs ni sa 'apagi 'gros lta bu // sprin gyi gzugs ni chu 'dzin gyi 'gros lta bu'i// stobasiM ldan sogs bcud bralanan// sngon bzhin
nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ stobs ldan na tshu za ste/ de'i skyonani lci ba dang/ snyam pa dang/ sra ba dag yinato skyon des snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur pa'i// gnag pa dang/
g.yo ba dang/ lci ba ni lhang tsher dang rtse'i skyon no// rdo dang/ rlan dang/ lci ba dang/ srog chagos kyis zos ba lta bu dang/ rtul ba ni rnon po'i skyon te/ skyon lnga po des snga ma bzhin no/
rdodang bcas pa'ang mu zi'i skyon// ba bla yanasar skya go/ mu tig gi gang sar skya ste sId po mdu bgo/ bya ru'i nasnyam bag med pa'o// ma bar ba'in gsur rdo'i// mu/
tshan gyi nagaseratshad pago/ nor bu'izhi phug bgo/ gser gyi ni bcos ma'i lhad do// dngul gyin 'gas lnga dang sra ba la sogs pa'o// zha nyen yan lag la gnod pa go/ ronya' ni sbrul ltar ring
bgo/ 'khar ba'i g.yudad phyi ma la sogs pa ni skya pa'i// skyon de dag thams cad kyis kyang snga ma bzhin te rin po tsho'i cho ga'o// malus pa zhes bya ba gzhanasrogachags dang rtsa ba la sogs pa'ang
sta/ sA sta'i 'daban pho yang bar skyago/ kha di sa'i rig pa'i yang bcos ma dang ser skyag/ smanasonamo rin zhu ba'i rna pa lta bu 'o/ri dgas kyi skyon chen pon tu dang sprul sman la sogs pa'i dri
lta bu dad bsragasanamyur du tha'akhur 'gyur bstaspang bar bya'o// rgya mtsho'i sdig pa'i yang cung zadasar zhing skyabasta/ las thams cad la slang bar bya'o/ lung ba'i nimadog med pa dang/
skya bo dang/ phru ba'o// shu dag ni ljang kurasgrub ba pos shes par byag ru rta'i ni bcaganargya mtsho'i dbu ba lta bu g/ ka ko la'anastsal ba'i gzugasaltarami mnyam la spyan pa ltar yang bgo/
dza ti la'i skyonani skye ba dang/ snum med par/ sgra phyung ba'o// sug snyal dang 'bras bu gsum gyi skyonan skrun pa ltar yang bsta/ nyes ba gsum skyes par byed do// ro'u ka'i nin le

ka shamawA zhu'i rgyu ngan 'byobago/ dri lad ku'i ni smyung ku lta ba gal 'go/ thur kum gyi blo dang ldan pas phra ba dang/ seng ldeng lcabu dang/ ge sar chung ba dang/ cung zad sar ba dang/ mar nag lta
mdog med pa'o// rata'ani kushi ra'i skyon na'od ljadakrur 'dug pa dang/ thung pa ste rtag tu dbar bya'o// kekhar ti'i gla sgang gi na nurnyog ma can las rgyas pa dang zi ma'i nang nas skyes ba ste
spang bar bya'o// glasgrung gni rlan can las skyes pa'o// oM tra ka'an kha dog ljang ku'o// so hala'i nortsa ba med pa'o/ ku su ma'i phu bgo/ tsam pa ka'i ni khacher bye bar bya'o/ ke ta ki'i ni
bu mang ba'o// nyon cig lha mo sku la chen ma// rtsi dar rdzas rnams bya ba'i yul// ro kha ba canagyi rtse mo dang// ri bo dbang chen dang/ 'bags byed kyi brag las byung ba dang/ gzhan ya nganags kyi

tshang tshing gang nas mig sman lta bu'i chu rgyun du 'bab pa'i brag las skyes pa su/ gang dag gis rje byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas kyang bshad par bya// bung ba'i tshogs kyis nam mkha'i ngas sung rgyun pa
dang// rlung tshogs mirgyu de nyid rlung sbyos kha ba 'bab// sna tshogasashing bu ga la ba'i las bsgos pa dang/ mkha' la lha tshogs sangs rgyas sgra yis gsal byed pa/ snatshogs dri zhim dri yis rol
pa'i yid du 'ong// snatshogs shingag 'bras bu bul bas sa gzhi nga rgyan// de lta'i ri shos chu 'bab pa// bcudani skyo ba'i gnas su bshad// de la brag dkar po las shel dang chu shel la
ku/ bas bas sogs pa'i nang du skye bar 'gyur// khragasar bo zhusar ba 'bab pa lasun bya nu dang/ btsag dang/ brgya byin gyi gzhu lta bu'i nor bu dang/ nor bu dza nga ni'i dmar po dgalas
skyo bar gyur ro// ra'i ljongs gang ldang sngon du 'duganyid drang dang bcas la chung sa pa du ba lta bu yod cing// sa rdoganag pa las ni gsar rdodang/ 'khar bdang/ gzhan dag dang/ lcags khab
zla legyi rigs rnam pa bzhi skye bar 'gyur ro// brag ljang sngon lasan byi ba la sogs pa rnams dang/ mu men dang/ nor bu stam pa la sogs ba sna tshogs dog skyo bar 'gyur ro// brag kha dog sngon
dmar sna tshogs su bdug pa ngasani ldong ros dad/ ba bla dang/ mu zi la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur// bragagasum nang srog chags las bcas pa las ni tshal la sogs pa thal sman rnams rgya
bar 'gyur// de dag blang ba'i dang po gtor ma byin la sku ba'i snod du gyud par bya'o// dngul chu gang rdolas phyi rlon gyi sbyor bas bsgrubs pa de ni mchog go/ rig pa de dag lha mo ni// sbyor ba kun
gyi dam pa yin// tshas pa brgya byinasegs 'gruban// gzhan dag la lta smos ci dgos// 'das pa'i dusan sngon byung ba// skal ba dang po bdebache// der ni rdo rje sems dpa' che/ kaulhag pa
yinilhagacig bzhugs// lhamin grub pa sogs mthong ste// lha yi tshogasan skragagyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nasan// myur du nga la skul bar byed// thag ler zhu las lha mo che/
dbadud kyis kun tu gter ba ni// thams cad rmongs par byed pa yi// dngul chu zhesani bya bar grags// chu gting las byung dman pa ste// de bzhin las skyes pa mchog/ da ni dri yi sbyor ba dag/
slar yang bshad kyis lha mo nyen// dkar po dang dmar po dang// khyad par du nasarapo sta// de rnams dbye ba bshad par bya// mchog dang dman dang bar ma yin// ke tra ke ltar dri ma zhing//

yang la snum pa gla rtsi'i mchog/ kha da sin skam skyes pa'i// rlig pa chen zlum po ngashis// sdig pa sbo zhing snum pa dang// rgya mtsho las ni byung ba bzang// sonamo rta ya rmig 'dra dang// glang po che
yi rna lta bu // ba dan si ut+pal dang// 'dab ma lta bu rnam pa bzhi// gnyis gnyis shing na bdug pa sbyar// oM ka ru ni lci ba dang// snyam zhing bu reg mchu 'dra'ashis// bca' ba sor mo'i dbyings
'dra zhing// dril med pa shin tu bsngags// mu ra ser po mchog yin te// skya bo dga'i dman shes bya// shu dag sgrom zhing phyi rol sar// nang na dkar po yod pa bzang// nad dbangasha bar 'dra
bar// mdzes pa yon tanaldan pa yin// lung ba ku ta tsaltar sar// sbom shong tshegs che ba dang// bcag na mig snyanamadog 'dra ba// rtsi yi las la dge ba yin// cung zad ma dganasdo ba
dag/ bcag nas har yi dri// yung ba de ni mar ga dang// rtsi yi las la dman par bshad// ra nasran ma mud ka ltar// sngo ba mchog na yin par bshad// pri yang kun nagasaskyes shang//
sa hade ba'i 'dab 'dramchog/ gur kum chu sumadamar 'dra zhing// sam ge sar srab pa mchog/ ge sar sbom zhing sar kha dang// sbrang rtsi' ldan 'phreng bo yani// dzA
za ti ba lasmache shing// lce la snum pa shin tu gces// ka ko ba ni snyoms pa dang// zhing sgromadu bzang ba yin// u si ran dkar ba dang// de shang gra ba de bzhin bsngags// ke bar ti
chu gla sgang ni// chu bo'i 'gramo dang mtsho 'gram dang// dri ma med pa'achul skyas// ze ma 'dram bu la sogs bral// shin tu dri zhim yid 'ong mchog/ tsha tib na gi wang gi/ mdog ltar 'tshod pa
bsngags pa yin// klu sgrung skam skyes mkhregs pa bzang// dranasnyoms yul nas skyes pa 'bring// a ru ra ni' bags byed kyi// nags dang ri bo dbang chen skyes// nar mda' yi nuskyes mchog/

gzhan dag dman dang 'bring po yin// snying po dang ni' dzigs med dang// 'tshodang de bzhin bdud rtsi ste// gtsang ma dang ni 'phral ba dang// rnam par rgyul ba bdun du brjod/ 3ri mo gsum de smyung po ste/
'jigs med ri mo lnga ba yin// 'tsho ba gosar mdog shes par bya// bdud rtsing chen zhes bya ste// de bzhinagatsang ma sha medayin// ser skya 'phel bzhes bya ste// sku ba lta bu rnam par rgyal// dri la
sbyang bo sbyang bya ste// bcud kyis len pa bdud rtsi bsngags// 'jigs medarnam par rgyal ba 'brang// lhagama rnams ni don med do// skyu ru ra ni'ache zhing// rus pa chung dang ro dang ldan// rdo ba
[r/]tsan gyi ri las skyes// shin tu skyen pa mchog tu bshad// ba ru ra ni bla ma 'a ra gi ri las skyes pa 'am gzhan yang rung// a nu skad ni snag zhing rtogs// lci zhing mar dang bcas pa bzang// /
da ni de dag re re zhing// gzung bar bya ba bshad kyis nyon// rdzas na dus bzhin skyes pa dang// bcud dang bcas pa gzung bya ste// mthun ros phan pa nyid 'gyur gyi// bzlog bas gnod pa nyid

du 'gyur// da na tshim par bya ba yi// cho ga bshad kyis lha mo nyon// mad+hidang ni pa'i dang// de bzhin g+ha d+hi dzaka la// de dag 'bru dang bcos pa 'chang// ro yi bye brag sna tshogs te// rim pa de dag

brjod pa yin// mad+hi rnam pa ltar bshad de// paN+Di rnam pa brgyad du brjod// go d+hi rnam pa bdun yin te// de bzhin dza ga la nA gsum// btso dang sbyar ba'i cho ga dag/ da ni rab tu bshad kyis nyon/
sbrang rtsi las byung dang po ste// khardza ri ya gnyis pa yani// rgun 'brum las byung gsum pa ste// bcu tshogs las byung bzhi pa yin// lnga pa dbang chen zhes bya ste// thams cad kyi gtso bor brjod/
rab tu gdang dong bar skya dang// myos par byad pa thams cad 'byung// la dra los byung mdog bzang dang// mchog tugasar dang dzi po dang// zhi ba dang ni rnam pa brgyad// de brgyud palas byung ba//
[I]mdor bsdus nasan brjod pa yin// ik+ta las byung dang po ste/ si du yan gnyis po yin// gsum pa bur ma gnyis las byung// bzhi pa skya bonas bya ste// sna tshogs dang ni di bzhin gzhano// mi'ajig
zhes bya dang ni bdun// 'bras bu yi na khu ba dang// me tog dang ni de bzhin gzhan// nya bu can gyi 'bras bu dang// tsakra ang ka bzung nas ni// na ce kani drug cu bzhi/ 3kyi
sgyu ru ra khu srang bcudang// ba son chan srang phyed bcas// chu bri gang du mnyes nas ni// nyi ma'i 'od la bco bar bya// sa har da dri'i ma tog dang// lu gu sha ta dus nga dang// ma la ya dang u
ra// ra las skyes du ba gzhon nu ma// dzatishing tsha ngo sen na// de dag so sor zho gnyis gnyis// chu shing khu ba grang brgyud dang// chu ni de yi bzhi 'gyur pa dus// sngon po kan ta ka ri
dang// rgya spos sug smel ta mal// btsod dnganA ga ge sar dang// u shir dang na le sham// glang po chu yi pa pe ling// bu ram srangani gcig dang bcas/ chu na srang bdun nang du blugs//
rgyu spos brag shun ta ma la// rgya spos ru dmar bya// 'phru chang hre ganganang du ni// thams cad bcas te nyin bdun du// nyi ma'i 'od la btso bar bya// de nas sbrang rtsi de mnyam dang// 'dzam+bu'i
shing ni ma brgyad bcas// slar yang sngam bzhin du ni// nyin la btso byas te// sbrang rtsi tsam zhig lus ba dang// bdug spos kyis ni bdug ba bya// de nas zla ba gcig tu ni// 'bras kyi so/
ba'i nang du gzhug/ de nas sa yi 'og tu ni// zla ba gcig dang nyin bzhi gzhag/ thogam tha ma mnyam pa ste// bar ma bzhi 'gyur du ni blugs// ducig pur gla rtsis bdug/ de ni sgagam zhes

bya yin// da tri'i ma tog srang byed dang// rang dang mnyam pa'i bu ram dang// lhag ma'i ma ni rdzogs nas su// phyi nas gcig tu bsre bar bya// chang gi btu dug ru dang ni/ da khri'i ma dag drisAdang//
dri zhimagyi ni skyo ma dang// de rnams thams cad gcig tu spro// zla ba re re spel bya ste// de yi nang du sgug che blugs/ dang ngo ra mnyam por blugs bya ste// zla ba gnyis 'dra gnyis 'gyur du//
de ltar gsum bzhi lnga drug bdun// la sogs la gcig bar du spel// de nas zla ba drug du na// kha gcad nas ni sba bar bya// bu ram khu bas sbol bya ste// rab tu myos byadagaso rar bshar// chu
shing smin pa rdogam brgyad// de bzhin sgrib mo srang brgyad dang// khur mo'i phu ma srang gcig dang// 'od ma'i nang du blugs nas su// 'bru yi nang du zla phyed bzhag/ chags can mnog ces pa 'ad
pa yin// 'bras bu gsum dang shab dang// a ka ru dang ardzu na// dza tim tog bcas pa'i rdzas// pha ma srang gtsugagazung nas su// slar yang sgrog mo srung brgyad bcas// nyi ma bdun du
gzhag par bya// ma tog myos byed rtses bya yin// rgun 'brum ka t+taMshing dbang phyug/ kha rdza ri yi khu ba dang// snga yi rtsa ba rnam pa gnyis// pa ta ma tog la sogs bcas// rnam pa brgyad no
sbyar bar bya// phabs ni bcos pa'i cho ga yin// de 'i las byung myos byed de// zan las byung ba chu can mchog/ tsuta la sogs shun pa las// byung ba chang zhes bya ba yin// dza ga la ni 'ju
kya ma/ chang brjod// rgun 'brum sbrang rtsi dpa' bo gcig/ skyar bo g.yon can bram m lani// pen partsa ba las byung gang// nya phyis canazhes bya bar grags// ma tog gis bsgos rab
myos yin// dri zhim dang bcas sgrogamor bshad// kha rgas me la na'id bra dang// mkhris pa can la 'dzag phan// bad kan can la khron chang phan// gnyis kal nidza bo sgrags// sbyor bas bcud lenar yi

mchog/ tsakra ang ka sbrang rtsi dang// du rta dang ni zla sang gi/ khu ba dang ni tshu ta dang// kum pa la sogs gzhan dag kyang// chang gi phabs su sbyar bar bya// chang dang thabs kyi chog go/ bla sgrung dngan

kutsa dang/ yung ba dang ni slog skya rnams // sing po' nang du zhag gsum spang// de nas lem lnga pa yi// khu ba'i nang du bskol bar bya// bu bus phye dang ni bu ram bcas// shi khru khu bar gcin gyis//
bkrus na dag par 'gyur ba yin// sho ban dza dang du gcin tu// gla rtsi dgan sbyang byas nas// de yis dri dang 'bul mo 'gyur// kha da se yi slog pani// dang po thal bas phyi la// de nas la lnga pa
yis// khur bar 'tshos byas nas ni// slar yang shi khru'i khu ba dang// ra yi gcin du sbyar nas ni// ka ta ki yi nang bcug la// se panatsa yi rtsa bar gzhug/ de ni kha da so mig spyad// shu dab dang
ni yud ba gnyis// yungs kar rdo rje'i 'o ma dang// sid ngo cha mnyam nang bskol bos// dag 'gyur na dar ni rje tsam med/ e ran da yi khu ba dang// brag zhunagyi ni chur bocas pas// sa
kacha hal la ni bkrus nas su// 'dab mar gtugs te skye bas byug/ sa yi 'og tu smras pas 'dag/ ku su ma drang 'a bras bu rnams // dang bo ta krar sbyang nas ni// bkrus nas shi ba' ye// nang
du bcug nas bsros pa sa ba dag/ mu se mar khus dag 'gyur ti// ba bla pa la sha yis 'dag/ bya dri ba glang lci bas sbyang// ldong ros rang sgyur gyisani 'dug/ gur kum mar gyis 'dag
'gyur// bca' ba glang gi gcin gyis te// a ru ni khrag gis sbyang// si ha la du cho' drag gis 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mas mchod srid phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
gcud kyis 'a nani rab sbyor ba// gnas ni gang du brtsam par bgyi// sdu tshan rnams ni sngar bshad pa'i// 'gro'al pa dag ni ji ltar lags// sbyor ba rim pa khyod rang shar nga gi dgos pa dag
ni ci zhig lugs/ mar nag btso ba cho ga dang// yul dang 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin// khams ni nga tsho brgyad bstan pa yi// phan tshun bsdus ra ji lta bu // 'khrul 'khor bye brag bshad pa dag/ phyi
dang nang na ji ltar lags// nad rnams sna tshogs byung ba dag/ ji ltar smin nga sa 'bras bur 'gyur// sngon po'i bye brag du zhig mchis// phro mo yini khyad par ci// rdzas dang bcud len mi 'tshal te//
khyod kyis sbyor nga gang bshad pa 'i// dus kyi khyad por ji lta bu // de rnams bdag ni the tshom skyaso// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma kun gyis rnal la nga// rten cig
lha mo sgyu ma che// sbrang rtsi lta bu r bcud bsdus pa// rgyud rnams kun tu gsad pa yin// gnas sogs ji bzhin mchod nas su// bde mchog sngags kyi bstan par bya//
dang ba bornal 'byor gnyis mdong// nyi shu rtsa ba'ar cher mchodas// rnal 'byor chen po de yas ni// bcud len sman gyi sbyor ba brtsam// rig nga 'dzin pa'i grags pa ni// sngags kyi bstan/
par gus pa dang// phyogs dub mad cing degs pa med// dam tshig spyod la gus pa ste// dang 'a zhing brtan la g.yo sgyu med// 'jam zhing khama'i bsAn bkur brtson// de dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya//
sgrub pos gzhin du byas na na/ dngos grub 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/ sngar bshad rig pa sbyang shas te// dang po dam tshig spyin par bya// gcer bu'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa yis// gnyis pas ming
blo sogs dbang ni bskur/ dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan// stong dang stong min sogs spangs pa'i// ro ni mi mchog gis rtogs bu// sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas sbom po zhes ni bya ba sta/
rdzas ni 'ju bar byed pa yin// bcud ni dngul gyi lhag ma yin// len pa snying stobs zhes byar bshad// snying stobs rdzas zhes bya ba ste// dngul ni zhu ba zhes byar brjod// de ltar rdza sa dang zhu ba
ni bsdus pa len pa zhes bya'o// mun pa phra mo zhes bya ste// phra ma nam mkha'i khams mtshan nyid// phung po lasogs khyad par dang// khams rnams thams cad 'tshad pa yin// sna tshog
gzugs rnams 'byin pa ni// da tshe ye shes kyis bskul yin// de dag lha mo skal chen mo// rdzas dang khams ni bsdus pa ste// brtson 'grus danan zhing thal dang// bsod nams
dman ras madzrad mi 'gyur// brtson 'grus bcud kun gnas yin pas// du bas brtson 'a grus brtsam bar bya// bcudano bcing dang gso ba dag/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// yongs
su smin pa'i mchog gis ni// mnyam med bcud la brten pa gi/ rnam pa ci nga la sogs nyes pa brgyu// blo dang ldan pas dpyad de dag/ bcud ni nag po sngon po ste// bcud ni yongs su grub
pa yin// dngul chu lhung tshar cho ga yis// ji srid bcud chen gung kyi bar// de srid dun 'bad de dpyad// 'khrul 'khor gang zhig kha che ba// de ka ran rgod ma la// 'khrul 'khor gang
zhig rdza rnga 'dra// de nyid bong bu rngamo'akha// rgod ma'i khani 'od ma yin// sbu gu yisani brgyan par bya// ka raNA yi 'khrul 'khor ni// ral gri shubs kyis brgyan par bya// 'khrul 'khor

nga da bu'i kha zhes pa// kang ka'i mgrin pa'i sbu gur sbyar// rnga mo'i kha yi 'khrul 'khor ni// bya rog mchu dang mtshungs par sbyar// tshar bcad ba ni skal pa ste// dam can gyis sbrang rtsir btso//
bya rob mchu can bung bar btsa// rdo leb 'bar zhing 'od dang bcas// kang ka'i mchu can glang chen ba// ral gri shubs can 'khrul 'khor gyis// seng ge run btso ba yin/ bcud chen yib
dang khros pa dang// ba gor zhing shin tu tshos pa yis// chu yi nang du 'a bros bar 'gyur// de nas glang chenamago bcud dang// mu zi la sogs byon nas ni// bsregs pas tshur
gcad mnan pa dang// 'og tu sa la bor nas su// 'dar zhing rmongs 'du bar 'grul// khrol khrol gyi ni sgo 'byen no// de nas chu sa gnad dang// ba tsa kra mardudang// gal ta ka shi khru ste/ de
ratshad ku mu dang// ut+palam lakas bon// rgya ga sab ki sa bon// ku ba'i sa bon ma du dang// po son pa la sha bkug/ phyi ma skyo bar byas pa yi// nang du de nas brdung bar bya//
man nges dang bcas pas chang// rdzas ni drug chu sbyin par bya// de nas rdo ya gtun du mnye// dang po re zhig sbyang bar bya// de nas gci ba lan tshwa dang// phag gi zhag dang khrag tu pa cas//
dkrugs pas nyes pagazhom par bya// 'khrul 'khor gzhug pa bshad par bya// tsan+d+ha thal sman la sogs dang/ bcas pa rka nga ga nang du gzhug/ dbang po brgya rtsa brgyad par bya// phyi
nas lta skyos ngas ba'i bcud// 'od ma'i nang du bcug nas su// sbyar bshad gnas su gzhag bar bya// rtsa nga 'brus su zhes bya bani so ngan dza la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'o// ka tu
ma dza rdza la sogs ba'i ni ma tog dang/ 'dabam dang/ rus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo// bcud bco ba'i sbyor ba'i chogago// lhang tsher phyogs kyi cha dang ni// bcud na dbang po'i chadang
